text: the book tells of murray , the old scot patriot , who has had his eyes torn out and his house taken away during the english invasion .
translation: Le livre raconte l'histoire de Murray, le vieux patriote écossais, qui a été crevé les yeux et a vu sa maison emportée pendant l'invasion anglaise.

text: check your brain and your secret agent decoder ring at the door because you do n't want to think too much about what 's going on . the movie does has some entertainment value - how much depends on how well you like chris rock .

text: naturally , he returns to his analyst dr . ben sobel ( crystal ) for help and finds that sobel needs some serious help himself as he has inherited the family practice , as well as an excess stock of stress .
translation: Naturellement, il retourne chez son analyste, le Dr Ben Sobel (Crystal), pour obtenir de l'aide et découvre que Sobel a lui-même besoin d'une sérieuse aide, car il a hérité de la pratique familiale, ainsi que d'un excès de stress.
back_translation: Naturally, he returns to his analyst, Dr. Ben Sobel (Crystal), for help and discovers that Sobel himself needs serious help, as he has inherited the family practice along with an excess of stress.

back_translation: Still suffering from her hangover, Julie doesn’t realize that Ellen is absent when the school bus leaves the cemetery.

text: several people are listening to keith 's plight on the radio and are making changes of their own .

text: buries an interesting storyline about morality and the choices we make underneath such a mountain of clichM-is and borrowed images that it might more accurately be titled mr . chips off the old block .

back_translation: buries an interesting plot about morality and the choices we make under such a pile of clichés and borrowed images that it could more appropriately be titled "Mr. Chips, a Fond Memory."

text: like the hugely successful first film , the sequel provides pleasant , engaging if largely disposable entertainment for the general audience .
translation: Comme le premier film, qui a connu un immense succès, la suite offre un divertissement agréable et engageant, bien que largement jetable, pour le grand public.
back_translation: Like the first film, which was a huge success, the sequel offers pleasant and engaging entertainment, although largely disposable, for the general public.

text: a sweet , engaging family story about the nature of faith and the power of youthful innocence .
translation: une histoire familiale douce et engageante sur la nature de la foi et le pouvoir de l'innocence juvénile.

text: real escape , however , may be a goal beyond possibility .
translation: Une véritable évasion, cependant, peut être un objectif au-delà de la possibilité.

text: the filmmakers skillfully evoke the sense of menace that nature holds for many urban dwellers .

text: unfortunately , he neglects to mention that he is a professional gambler with bad instincts and that the jaguar is borrowed .

text: in this racially-charged climate , the lapd 's elite special investigations squad ( sis ) is assigned a high-profile quadruple homicide .

back_translation: In this climate marked by racial tensions, the elite Special Investigations Section (SIS) of the LAPD is tasked with a highly publicized quadruple homicide.

text: a remarkable 179-minute meditation on the nature of revolution .
translation: une remarquable méditation de 179 minutes sur la nature de la révolution.

text: this documentary follows a business partnership between a clan of palestinian fisherman from refugee camps in gaza and israelis from the settlement of dugit , gaza strip .
translation: ce documentaire suit un partenariat commercial entre un clan de pêcheurs palestiniens des camps de réfugiés à Gaza et des Israéliens de la colonie de Dugit, dans la bande de Gaza.
back_translation: This documentary follows a business partnership between a clan of Palestinian fishermen from the refugee camps in Gaza and Israelis from the Dugit settlement in the Gaza Strip.

text: this painter 's block has lead to a desperate man obsessed with the need to paint , leaving the artist in a state of disarray .
translation: ce blocage du peintre a conduit à un homme désespéré obsédé par le besoin de peindre, laissant l'artiste dans un état de désarroi.
back_translation: This blockage of the painter led to a desperate man obsessed with the need to paint, leaving the artist in a state of disarray.

text: all social structures break down and a new world order emerges from the heart of the desert .
translation: toutes les structures sociales s'effondrent et un nouvel ordre mondial émerge du cœur du désert.
back_translation: All social structures collapse and a new world order emerges from the heart of the desert.

text: when blake is initiated , he agrees to abide by the three cardinal rules : share your spirit , body and soul with others ; devote your life to saving homeless kids ; and never leave unless the master casts you out .
translation: Lorsque Blake est initié, il accepte de respecter les trois règles cardinales : partager son esprit, son corps et son âme avec les autres ; consacrer sa vie à sauver des enfants sans-abri ; et ne jamais partir à moins que le maître ne vous chasse.
back_translation: When Blake is initiated, he agrees to abide by the three cardinal rules: to share his mind, body, and soul with others; to devote his life to saving homeless children; and to never leave unless the master drives him away.

text: . . . routine , harmless diversion and little else .
translation: . . . routine, diversion inoffensive et peu d'autre.

text: i suspect this is the kind of production that would have been funnier if the director had released the outtakes theatrically and used the film as a bonus feature on the dvd .
translation: Je soupçonne que c'est le genre de production qui aurait été plus amusant si le réalisateur avait sorti les scènes bloopers au cinéma et utilisé le film comme un feature bonus sur le DVD.
back_translation: I suspect that this is the kind of production that would have been more fun if the director had released the blooper scenes in theaters and used the movie as a bonus feature on the DVD.

text: desert rose is an erotic thriller that takes you through one man 's life experience .

text: witt plays a young harvard graduate who also represents grant 's character .

text: blade 's team and the bloodpack are the only line of defense which can prevent the reaper population from wiping out the vampire and human populations .
translation: L'équipe de Blade et le Bloodpack sont la seule ligne de défense capable d'empêcher la population de reapers d'anéantir les populations de vampires et d'humains.
back_translation: The team of Blade and the Bloodpack is the only line of defense capable of preventing the population of reapers from annihilating the populations of vampires and humans.

text: they intend to bring her back to tel-aviv in order to save her life .
translation: Ils ont l'intention de la ramener à Tel-Aviv pour sauver sa vie.

text: when her niece spontaneously dies of fright one week to the day she watched a disturbing video , a cynical journalist ( naomi watts ) travels to the pacific northwest in search of the tape 's origins and its links to a string of suicides at a horse ranch .
translation: Lorsque sa nièce meurt spontanément de peur une semaine après avoir regardé une vidéo troublante, une journaliste cynique (Naomi Watts) se rend dans le pacifique nord-ouest à la recherche des origines de la bande et de ses liens avec une série de suicides dans un ranch équestre.
back_translation: When her niece dies spontaneously from fear a week after watching a disturbing video, a cynical journalist (Naomi Watts) travels to the Pacific Northwest in search of the origins of the tape and its connections to a series of suicides at a horse ranch.

text: although a number of these laws have been overturned by legislatures or the courts , in the state of texas freedom fighters are still working to eliminate these absurd and unnecessary laws .
translation: Bien que plusieurs de ces lois aient été annulées par les législatures ou les tribunaux, dans l'État du Texas, des combattants de la liberté continuent de travailler pour éliminer ces lois absurdes et inutiles.
back_translation: Although several of these laws have been overturned by legislatures or courts, in the state of Texas, freedom fighters continue to work to eliminate these absurd and unnecessary laws.

text: unbeknownst to the contestants , the game 's host has struck a deal with the soldiers hired to guard the money , and does not really have the player 's best interests , or even basic safety , at heart .
translation: À l'insu des candidats, l'hôte du jeu a conclu un accord avec les soldats engagés pour protéger l'argent et n'a pas vraiment à cœur les meilleurs intérêts des joueurs, ni même leur sécurité de base.
back_translation: unbeknownst to the candidates, the game host made an agreement with the soldiers hired to protect the money and is not truly concerned about the best interests of the players, nor even their basic safety.

text: the first all-cgi short to be produced by imageworks , sony pictures award-winning character animation and visual effects company , `` the chubbchubbs `` introduces the alien inhabitants of the planet glorf including meeper , its earnest but awkward hero , the singing diva , the zyzaks and the chubbchubbs .
translation: le premier court-métrage entièrement en images de synthèse produit par imageworks, la société primée de Sony Pictures spécialisée dans l'animation de personnages et les effets visuels, `` les chubbchubbs `` présente les habitants extraterrestres de la planète glorf, y compris meeper, son héros sincère mais maladroit, la diva chanteuse, les zyzaks et les chubbchubbs.
back_translation: The first short film entirely in computer-generated imagery produced by Imageworks, the award-winning Sony Pictures company specializing in character animation and visual effects, "The ChubbChubbs" features the alien inhabitants of the planet Glorf, including Meeper, its sincere but clumsy hero, the diva singer, the Zyzaks, and the ChubbChubbs.

text: but when his feelings for the decidedly unavailable ricki begin to grow , and he actually becomes concerned for brian , tough guy gigli begins to transform into an actual human being . . . which
translation: mais quand ses sentiments pour la décidément inaccessibile Ricki commencent à grandir, et qu'il s'inquiète réellement pour Brian, le dur à cuire Gigli commence à se transformer en un véritable être humain... ce qui
back_translation: but when his feelings for the decidedly inaccessible Ricki start to grow, and he genuinely worries about Brian, the tough guy Gigli begins to transform into a real human being... which

text: tong is sent back to fetch some things for devlin and unknowingly tries on devlin 's tuxedo and finds that it gives extraordinary powers to anyone that dons the suit .
translation: Tong est renvoyé pour chercher quelques affaires pour Devlin et essaie sans le savoir le smoking de Devlin, découvrant qu'il confère des pouvoirs extraordinaires à quiconque porte le costume.
back_translation: Tong is sent to fetch some things for Devlin and unknowingly tries on Devlin's suit, discovering that it grants extraordinary powers to anyone who wears the costume.

text: fresh and raw like a blown-out vein , narc takes a walking-dead , cop-flick subgenre and beats new life into it .
translation: frais et brut comme une veine éclatée, Narc prend le sous-genre des films de flics morts-vivants et lui redonne une nouvelle vie.
back_translation: Fresh and raw like a burst vein, Narc takes the sub-genre of zombie cop films and gives it new life.

text: its aims are modest -- to make kids laugh as cuba gooding falls down a lot and to show how thrilling sled dogs are -- and it achieves them .
translation: ses objectifs sont modestes : faire rire les enfants en voyant Cuba Gooding tomber souvent et montrer à quel point les chiens de traîneau sont passionnants - et il les atteint.
back_translation: Its objectives are modest: to make children laugh by watching Cuba Gooding fall frequently and to show how exciting sled dogs are - and it achieves them.

text: on the surface , the film is played straight , with sustained tension and effective frights . but the director has done his research , and fills every scene with a subversive humor that 's 100 % pure imitation hitchcock .
translation: En surface, le film est joué de manière sérieuse, avec une tension soutenue et des frayeurs efficaces. Mais le réalisateur a fait ses recherches et remplit chaque scène d'un humour subversif qui est 100 % pure imitation d'Hitchcock.
back_translation: On the surface, the film is played seriously, with sustained tension and effective scares. But the director has done his research and fills each scene with subversive humor that is 100% pure imitation of Hitchcock.

text: . . . digs beyond the usual portrayals of good kids and bad seeds to reveal a more ambivalent set of characters and motivations .
translation: . . . va au-delà des représentations habituelles des bons enfants et des mauvaises graines pour révéler un ensemble de personnages et de motivations plus ambivalents.
back_translation: . . . goes beyond the usual portrayals of good children and bad seeds to reveal a set of characters and more ambivalent motivations.

text: if the count of monte cristo does n't transform caviezel into a movie star , then the game is even more rigged than it was two centuries ago .
translation: Si Le Comte de Monte-Cristo ne transforme pas Caviezel en star de cinéma, alors le jeu est encore plus truqué qu'il ne l'était il y a deux siècles.
back_translation: If The Count of Monte Cristo does not turn Caviezel into a movie star, then the game is even more rigged than it was two centuries ago.

text: an ideal love story for those intolerant of the more common saccharine genre .
translation: une histoire d'amour idéale pour ceux qui sont intolérants au genre sucré plus commun.

text: outside of burger 's desire to make some kind of film , it 's really unclear why this project was undertaken
translation: En dehors du désir de Burger de réaliser un film, il est vraiment peu clair pourquoi ce projet a été entrepris.
back_translation: Aside from Burger's desire to make a film, it is really unclear why this project was undertaken.

text: at the same time other changes in sumo are being prompted by its growing popularity in the west , where its adherents are lobbying for sumo 's inclusion in the olympic games even as other promoters are arranging amateur sumo tournaments in venues like las vegas casinos - tournaments that not surprisingly bear little resemblance to the sport 's japanese forebear .
translation: En même temps, d'autres changements dans le sumo sont induits par sa popularité croissante en Occident, où ses partisans plaident pour l'inclusion du sumo aux Jeux Olympiques, même si d'autres promoteurs organisent des tournois de sumo amateur dans des lieux comme les casinos de Las Vegas - des tournois qui, sans surprise, ressemblent peu à l'original japonais du sport.
back_translation: At the same time, other changes in sumo are driven by its growing popularity in the West, where its supporters advocate for the inclusion of sumo in the Olympic Games, even though other promoters organize amateur sumo tournaments in places like Las Vegas casinos - tournaments that, unsurprisingly, bear little resemblance to the original Japanese version of the sport.

text: 14-year-old meredith attempts to maintain a religious vow of silence during a thanksgiving dinner with her agnostic family .
translation: Meredith, âgée de 14 ans, tente de maintenir un vœu de silence religieux lors d'un dîner de Thanksgiving avec sa famille agnostique.
back_translation: Meredith, 14 years old, is trying to uphold a vow of religious silence during a Thanksgiving dinner with her agnostic family.

text: docu-drama based on the life of ted bundy , a serial killer who killed at least 19 young women during the 1970 's ( though some sources say as many as 30 to 35 were murdered ) .
translation: docu-drama basé sur la vie de Ted Bundy, un tueur en série qui a tué au moins 19 jeunes femmes dans les années 1970 (bien que certaines sources disent que jusqu'à 30 à 35 ont été assassinées).
back_translation: Docudrama based on the life of Ted Bundy, a serial killer who murdered at least 19 young women in the 1970s (although some sources say that up to 30 to 35 were killed).

text: i wish windtalkers had had more faith in the dramatic potential of this true story . this would have been better than the fiction it has concocted , and there still could have been room for the war scenes .
translation: Je souhaite que Windtalkers ait eu plus de foi dans le potentiel dramatique de cette histoire vraie. Cela aurait été mieux que la fiction qu'il a concoctée, et il aurait encore pu y avoir de la place pour les scènes de guerre.
back_translation: I wish that Windtalkers had had more faith in the dramatic potential of this true story. It would have been better than the fiction it concocted, and there could still have been room for the war scenes.

text: in a world where loyalties are easily abandoned and allegiances bought , six perfect strangers come together to pull off the perfect crime .
translation: dans un monde où les loyautés sont facilement abandonnées et les allégeances achetées, six parfaits inconnus se réunissent pour réaliser le crime parfait.
back_translation: In a world where loyalties are easily abandoned and allegiances bought, six perfect strangers come together to commit the perfect crime.

text: fast-paced and wonderfully edited , the film is extremely thorough .
translation: rapide et merveilleusement monté, le film est extrêmement approfondi.
back_translation: Fast and wonderfully edited, the film is extremely thorough.

text: while its careful pace and seemingly opaque story may not satisfy every moviegoer 's appetite , the film 's final scene is soaringly , transparently moving .
translation: Bien que son rythme soigné et son histoire apparemment opaque ne satisfassent pas l'appétit de chaque cinéphile, la scène finale du film est d'une émotion éclatante et transparente.
back_translation: Although its careful pacing and seemingly opaque story do not satisfy the appetite of every cinephile, the final scene of the film is filled with striking and transparent emotion.

text: one-sided documentary offers simplistic explanations to a very complex situation . . . . stylistically , the movie is a disaster .

back_translation: A one-sided documentary provides simplistic explanations for a very complex situation... stylistically, the film is a disaster.

text: food for love endeavors and largely succeeds in lending equal weight to the emotional turmoil of its older and younger characters .

back_translation: Food for Love strives and largely succeeds in giving balanced weight to the emotional turmoil of its older and younger characters.

text: should n't have been allowed to use the word `` new `` in its title , because there 's not an original character , siuation or joke in the entire movie .

text: 18-year old dean is handsome and bright , but feels hampered by his working-class background and by his family .
translation: Dean, âgé de 18 ans, est beau et brillant, mais se sent freiné par son origine modeste et par sa famille.
back_translation: Dean, 18 years old, is handsome and brilliant, but feels held back by his humble origins and his family.

text: the movie details the experiences of 'peter pan ' author j . m . barrie , which lead him to write the children 's classic .
translation: Le film décrit les expériences de l'auteur de 'Peter Pan', J. M. Barrie, qui l'ont conduit à écrire le classique pour enfants.
back_translation: The film describes the experiences of the author of 'Peter Pan', J. M. Barrie, which led him to write the children's classic.

text: the movie occasionally threatens to become didactic , but it 's too grounded in the reality of its characters to go over the edge . a touch of humor or an unexpected plot twist always pulls it back .
translation: le film menace parfois de devenir didactique, mais il est trop ancré dans la réalité de ses personnages pour franchir la limite. Une touche d'humour ou un rebondissement inattendu le ramène toujours.
back_translation: The film sometimes threatens to become didactic, but it is too grounded in the reality of its characters to cross the line. A touch of humor or an unexpected twist always brings it back.

text: as a result of this unfortunate circumstance , ella can not refuse any command , and is often left at the mercy of unscrupulous personalities .

back_translation: As a consequence of this unfortunate circumstance, Ella cannot refuse any orders and is often left at the mercy of unscrupulous individuals.

text: rice is too pedestrian a filmmaker to bring any edge or personality to the rising place that would set it apart from other deep south stories .
translation: Rice est un cinéaste trop banal pour apporter une touche ou une personnalité à l'endroit en plein essor qui le distinguerait des autres histoires du Deep South.
back_translation: Rice is too ordinary a filmmaker to bring a touch or personality to the thriving place that would set it apart from other stories of the Deep South.

text: the film would work much better as a video installation in a museum , where viewers would be free to leave . immediately .

text: set in hounslow , west london and hamburg , the film follows two 18 year olds with their hearts set on a future in professional soccer .
translation: Situé à Hounslow, dans l'ouest de Londres, et à Hambourg, le film suit deux jeunes de 18 ans déterminés à réaliser leur rêve de carrière dans le football professionnel.
back_translation: Set in Hounslow, West London, and Hamburg, the film follows two 18-year-olds determined to achieve their dream of a career in professional football.

text: a mess when it comes to the characters and writing . . . but works its way underneath the skin like few movies have in recent memory .

back_translation: a disorder when it comes to the characters and the writing . . . but it seeps under the skin like few films have done recently.

text: [ green is ] the comedy equivalent of saddam hussein , and i 'm just about ready to go to the u . n . and ask permission for a preemptive strike .
translation: [ le vert est ] l'équivalent comique de saddam hussein, et je suis presque prêt à aller aux Nations Unies et demander la permission pour une frappe préventive.

text: suddenly , a young boy starts to become ill and starts to suffer from the same syndromes that regan from the fist movie suffered .

text: the film , a follow-up to `` jack the dog `` , is described as a black comedy about a reformed womanizer ( nestor carbonell ) who struggles to keep his family together .
translation: Le film, suite à "Jack le chien", est décrit comme une comédie noire sur un ancien séducteur (Nestor Carbonell) qui lutte pour garder sa famille unie.
back_translation: The film, following "Jack the Dog," is described as a black comedy about a former seducer (Nestor Carbonell) who struggles to keep his family together.

text: will he become a grandfather , surrounded by the love and support of a family or will he retreat into his world of memories and lost opportunities ?
translation: deviendra-t-il grand-père, entouré de l'amour et du soutien d'une famille ou se retirera-t-il dans son monde de souvenirs et d'opportunités perdues ?
back_translation: Will he become a grandfather, surrounded by the love and support of a family, or will he retreat into his world of memories and lost opportunities?

text: paco , a rapper and performer , indifferent to all except her career , dreams of hitting the top ten chart .
translation: Paco, un rappeur et performer, indifférent à tout sauf à sa carrière, rêve d'atteindre le top dix des charts.
back_translation: Paco, a rapper and performer, indifferent to everything but his career, dreams of reaching the top ten of the charts.

text: canada 's arctic light shines bright on this frozen tundra soap opera that breathes extraordinary life into the private existence of the inuit people .
translation: La lumière de l'Arctique canadien brille intensément sur ce soap opera de toundra gelée qui insuffle une vie extraordinaire à l'existence privée du peuple inuit.
back_translation: The light of the Canadian Arctic shines brightly on this soap opera of frozen tundra that breathes extraordinary life into the private existence of the Inuit people.

text: first-time writer-director serry shows a remarkable gift for storytelling with this moving , effective little film .
translation: le premier réalisateur scénariste serry montre un talent remarquable pour la narration avec ce petit film touchant et efficace.
back_translation: The first director-screenwriter Serry shows remarkable talent for storytelling with this touching and effective short film.

text: down and out rock star dewey finn ( black ) gets fired from his band , and he faces a mountain of debts and depression .
translation: Dewey Finn, une rock star au bout du rouleau, se fait renvoyer de son groupe et doit faire face à une montagne de dettes et de dépression.
back_translation: Dewey Finn, a rock star at the end of his rope, is kicked out of his band and has to face a mountain of debt and depression.

text: despite the sympathetic overtures , rachel is convinced things are n't what they seem and suspects her baby has been abducted .
translation: malgré les gestes sympathiques, Rachel est convaincue que les choses ne sont pas ce qu'elles semblent et soupçonne que son bébé a été enlevé.
back_translation: Despite the friendly gestures, Rachel is convinced that things are not what they seem and suspects that her baby has been kidnapped.

text: hoffman spends a good deal of screen time alone and without much dialogue , using only his considerable physical skill and screen presence to pull off the role .
translation: Hoffman passe beaucoup de temps à l'écran seul et sans beaucoup de dialogues, utilisant uniquement son talent physique considérable et sa présence à l'écran pour assumer le rôle.
back_translation: Hoffman spends a lot of time on screen alone and without many dialogues, relying only on his considerable physical talent and screen presence to take on the role.

text: michell , after some sleuthing around , narrows down the suspects to a woman not his wife , another well known victorian poet .
translation: Michell, après quelques enquêtes, réduit les suspects à une femme qui n'est pas sa femme, une autre poétesse victorienne bien connue.
back_translation: Michell, after some investigations, narrows down the suspects to a woman who is not his wife, another well-known Victorian poetess.

text: la cinta comienza intentando ser un drama , rM-apidamente se transforma en una comedia y termina por ser una parodia absolutamente predecible
translation: La bande commence par essayer d'être un drame, se transforme rapidement en une comédie et finit par être une parodie absolument prévisible.
back_translation: The band starts by trying to be a drama, quickly transforms into a comedy, and ends up being an absolutely predictable parody.

text: it may not be `` last tango in paris `` but . . .
translation: ce n'est peut-être pas `` le dernier tango à Paris '' mais . . .

text: it may not be history M-^V but then again , what if it is ? M-^V but it makes for one of the most purely enjoyable and satisfying evenings at the movies i 've had in a while .
translation: ce n'est peut-être pas de l'histoire M-^V mais alors, et si c'était le cas ? M-^V mais cela en fait l'une des soirées les plus pures, agréables et satisfaisantes au cinéma que j'ai eues depuis un moment.
back_translation: It may not be M-^V history, but then again, what if that were the case? M-^V but it actually makes it one of the most pure, enjoyable, and satisfying evenings at the cinema that I've had in a while.

text: director nolan shows here he can handle clever material with a flair .
translation: Le réalisateur Nolan montre ici qu'il peut traiter des matériaux intelligents avec brio.
back_translation: Director Nolan shows here that he can handle intelligent material with brilliance.

text: he discovers that his daughter 's life , unknown to him from an affair with a brazilian woman 15 years earlier , is in danger and must return to rio ; having only five days to finish the deal and find his daughter .
translation: il découvre que la vie de sa fille, qu'il ignorait à cause d'une liaison avec une femme brésilienne 15 ans plus tôt, est en danger et doit retourner à Rio ; n'ayant que cinq jours pour finaliser l'affaire et retrouver sa fille.
back_translation: He discovers that his daughter's life, which he had been unaware of because of an affair with a Brazilian woman 15 years earlier, is in danger and must return to Rio; having only five days to finalize the matter and find his daughter.

text: not everything in the film works , including its somewhat convenient ending .
translation: tout n'est pas réussi dans le film, y compris sa fin quelque peu commode.
back_translation: Not everything is successful in the film, including its somewhat convenient ending.

text: only those most addicted to film violence in all its forms will find anything here to appreciate .
translation: Seuls ceux qui sont les plus addicts à la violence cinématographique sous toutes ses formes trouveront ici quelque chose à apprécier.
back_translation: Only those who are the most addicted to cinematic violence in all its forms will find something to appreciate here.

text: when detective ben simm 's wife is killed , he has to learn to be both father and mother to his little girl while searching for a vigilante that has his own sense of justice .
translation: Lorsque la femme du détective Ben Simm est tuée, il doit apprendre à être à la fois père et mère pour sa petite fille tout en cherchant un justicier qui a son propre sens de la justice.
back_translation: When Detective Ben Simm's wife is killed, he must learn to be both father and mother to his little girl while searching for a vigilante who has his own sense of justice.

text: marco and melanie , a young married couple , are living a life of passion , with chaotic situations , and all the little frustrations of daily life .
translation: Marco et Mélanie, un jeune couple marié, vivent une vie de passion, avec des situations chaotiques et toutes les petites frustrations de la vie quotidienne.
back_translation: Marco and Mélanie, a young married couple, live a passionate life, filled with chaotic situations and all the little frustrations of everyday life.

text: what really surprises about wisegirls is its low-key quality and genuine tenderness .
translation: Ce qui surprend vraiment à propos de Wisegirls, c'est sa qualité discrète et sa tendresse authentique.
back_translation: What is truly surprising about Wisegirls is its subtle quality and authentic tenderness.

text: the husband meets a man who knows what to do with his sexuality .
translation: le mari rencontre un homme qui sait quoi faire de sa sexualité.
back_translation: the husband meets a man who knows what to do with his sexuality.

text: ira member bobby sands is imprisoned in northern ireland .
translation: Le membre de l'IRA Bobby Sands est emprisonné en Irlande du Nord.
back_translation: IRA member Bobby Sands is imprisoned in Northern Ireland.

text: in a season of strenuously ambitious art , the laid-back modesty and accessible charm of evelyn is a welcome relief .
translation: Dans une saison d'art ambitieusement intense, la modestie décontractée et le charme accessible d'Evelyn sont un soulagement bienvenu.
back_translation: In a season of ambitiously intense art, Evelyn's laid-back modesty and approachable charm are a welcome relief.

text: does anyone much think the central story of brendan behan is that he was a bisexual sweetheart before he took to drink ?
translation: Est-ce que quelqu'un pense vraiment que l'histoire centrale de Brendan Behan est qu'il était un doux bisexuel avant de se tourner vers l'alcool ?
back_translation: Does anyone really think that the central story of Brendan Behan is that he was a gentle bisexual before turning to alcohol?

text: it is zuckerman who stumbles upon silk 's secret and sets out to reconstruct the unknown biography of this eminent , upright man , esteemed as an educator for nearly all his life , and to understand how this ingeniously contrived life came unraveled .
translation: C'est Zuckerman qui découvre le secret de Silk et s'efforce de reconstruire la biographie inconnue de cet homme éminent et intègre, considéré comme un éducateur presque toute sa vie, et de comprendre comment cette vie ingénieusement conçue s'est défaite.
back_translation: It is Zuckerman who uncovers the secret of Silk and strives to reconstruct the unknown biography of this eminent and upright man, regarded as an educator for almost all of his life, and to understand how this ingeniously designed life unraveled.

text: the animation is competent , and some of the gags are quite funny , but jonah . . . never shakes the oppressive , morally superior good-for-you quality that almost automatically accompanies didactic entertainment .
translation: L'animation est compétente, et certains des gags sont assez drôles, mais Jonah... n'échappe jamais à cette qualité écrasante et moralement supérieure de ce qui est bon pour vous, qui accompagne presque automatiquement le divertissement didactique.
back_translation: The animation is skilled, and some of the gags are quite funny, but Jonah... never escapes that overwhelming and morally superior quality of what is good for you, which almost automatically accompanies didactic entertainment.

text: discouraged , and on the point of giving up writing , yun fei meets a young girl who ca n't see colours , who encourages him to persevere .
translation: découragé et sur le point d'abandonner l'écriture, Yun Fei rencontre une jeune fille qui ne peut pas voir les couleurs, qui l'encourage à persévérer.
back_translation: Discouraged and on the verge of giving up writing, Yun Fei meets a young girl who cannot see colors, who encourages him to persevere.

text: while in jail they usually have fights with the security guard , a overweight lunatic .
translation: Pendant leur incarcération, ils se battent généralement avec le garde de sécurité, un lunatique en surpoids.

text: tommy , who is now a well known activist , has his credibility destroyed by the book which causes their breakup .

back_translation: Tommy, who is now a well-known activist, sees his credibility destroyed by the book that causes their breakup.

text: a composition of gestures stripped of romance and presented in their barest forms .
translation: une composition de gestes dépouillés de romance et présentés dans leurs formes les plus simples.

text: rowan plays the eponymous lead character in a spoof spy thriller .
translation: Rowan joue le personnage principal éponyme dans une parodie de thriller d'espionnage.
back_translation: Rowan plays the title character in a parody of a spy thriller.

text: it all comes down to whether you can tolerate leon barlow . i ca n't .
translation: tout dépend de votre capacité à tolérer Leon Barlow. Moi, je ne peux pas.
back_translation: It all depends on your ability to tolerate Leon Barlow. I can't.

text: now , in present day , washed-up child actor julian ( luke eberl ) , the free-spirited hannah ( colombe jacobsen ) , and former teacher grace ( jenny mollen ) , along with a documentary film crew , go on a search for this man , who may be the embodiment of all evil .
translation: Maintenant, de nos jours, l'ancien enfant acteur Julian (Luke Eberl), la libre penseuse Hannah (Colombe Jacobsen) et l'ancienne enseignante Grace (Jenny Mollen), accompagnés d'une équipe de tournage de documentaire, partent à la recherche de cet homme, qui pourrait être l'incarnation du mal.
back_translation: Now, in present times, former child actor Julian (Luke Eberl), free thinker Hannah (Colombe Jacobsen), and former teacher Grace (Jenny Mollen), accompanied by a documentary film crew, set out to find this man, who could be the embodiment of evil.

text: the filmmakers expose this delightfully deranged cult by capturing the daily lives of its members .
translation: Les cinéastes exposent ce culte délicieusement dérangé en capturant la vie quotidienne de ses membres.
back_translation: Filmmakers showcase this delightfully disturbed cult by capturing the daily lives of its members.

text: it 's like a vintage automobile that sometimes runs smoothly , and sometimes lurches and sputters . but it never quite stalls .
translation: C'est comme une voiture vintage qui roule parfois sans problème, et parfois qui tangue et broute. Mais elle ne cale jamais vraiment.
back_translation: It's like a vintage car that sometimes runs smoothly, and sometimes it sways and stumbles. But it never really stalls.

text: it is a story about love , passion , addiction , brillance and the ignorance of greed .
translation: C'est une histoire d'amour, de passion, d'addiction, de brillance et de l'ignorance de la cupidité.
back_translation: It's a story of love, passion, addiction, brilliance, and the ignorance of greed.

text: sunshine state is a fine example of a carefully written film . but you should n't be too aware that a movie is well-written .
translation: L'État ensoleillé est un bel exemple d'un film soigneusement écrit. Mais vous ne devriez pas être trop conscient qu'un film est bien écrit.
back_translation: The sunny state is a beautiful example of a carefully written film. But you shouldn't be too aware that a film is well written.

text: moved in his heart with the urgency to reach out for christ , he gets an idea to try and reach the masses in his city for jesus .
translation: ému dans son cœur par l'urgence d'atteindre Christ, il a une idée pour essayer d'atteindre les foules de sa ville pour Jésus.
back_translation: Moved in his heart by the urgency of reaching Christ, he has an idea to try to reach the crowds of his city for Jesus.

text: testing his theories with a time machine of his own invention , hartdegen is hurtled 800 , 000 years into the future , where he discovers that mankind has divided into the hunter - and the hunted .
translation: Testant ses théories avec une machine à voyager dans le temps de sa propre invention, Hartdegen est propulsé 800 000 ans dans le futur, où il découvre que l'humanité s'est divisée entre les chasseurs et les chassés.
back_translation: Testing his theories with a time machine of his own invention, Hartdegen is propelled 800,000 years into the future, where he discovers that humanity has divided into hunters and the hunted.

text: a compelling , moving film that respects its audience and its source material .
translation: un film captivant et émouvant qui respecte son public et son matériel d'origine.
back_translation: a captivating and moving film that respects its audience and its source material.

text: we 're all out there looking for true love-a very elusive thing indeed , and chance is no exception .
translation: Nous sommes tous là à la recherche du véritable amour - une chose très elusive en effet, et le hasard n'est pas une exception.
back_translation: We are all here in search of true love - a very elusive thing indeed, and chance is no exception.

text: they go over less well with tom donnerel , a young farmer and carrie 's fianc & # 233 ; .
translation: ils passent moins bien avec Tom Donnerel, un jeune agriculteur et le fiancé de Carrie.
back_translation: They get along less well with Tom Donnerel, a young farmer and Carrie’s fiancé.

text: postponing his desire to play basketball on the school team , steve finds an after-school job to support himself and pursues a relationship with the affluent but unhappy sally ( arielle paul ) .
translation: reportant son désir de jouer au basket-ball dans l'équipe de l'école, Steve trouve un emploi après l'école pour subvenir à ses besoins et entame une relation avec la riche mais malheureuse Sally (Arielle Paul).
back_translation: Deferring his desire to play basketball on the school team, Steve takes a job after school to support himself and begins a relationship with the wealthy but unhappy Sally (Arielle Paul).

text: before his very eyes on the store tv monitor , he sees his pick come up as the winning numbers for $ 50-million !
translation: devant ses propres yeux sur le moniteur TV du magasin, il voit son choix apparaître comme les numéros gagnants pour 50 millions de dollars !
back_translation: In front of his own eyes on the store's TV monitor, he sees his choice appear as the winning numbers for 50 million dollars!

text: like shrek , spirit 's visual imagination reminds you of why animation is such a perfect medium for children , because of the way it allows the mind to enter and accept another world .
translation: Comme Shrek, l'imagination visuelle de Spirit rappelle pourquoi l'animation est un médium si parfait pour les enfants, en raison de la manière dont elle permet à l'esprit d'entrer et d'accepter un autre monde.
back_translation: Like Shrek, the visual imagination of Spirit reminds us why animation is such a perfect medium for children, because of the way it allows the mind to enter and accept another world.

text: got a david lynch jones ? then you 'd do well to check this one out because it 's straight up twin peaks action . . .
translation: Vous avez un penchant pour David Lynch ? Alors vous feriez bien de jeter un œil à celui-ci car c'est de l'action purement Twin Peaks...
back_translation: Do you have a penchant for David Lynch? Then you should definitely take a look at this one because it's pure Twin Peaks action...

text: this was also a time , in the midst of a chaotic , decaying environment , when a man tried to cope with the loss of his former lover .
translation: c'était aussi une époque, au milieu d'un environnement chaotique et en décomposition, où un homme essayait de faire face à la perte de son ancienne amante.
back_translation: It was also a time, amid a chaotic and decaying environment, when a man was trying to cope with the loss of his former lover.

text: outside a storm rages and when the power goes out , darkness envelops the house .
translation: Dehors, une tempête fait rage et lorsque le courant s'éteint, l'obscurité enveloppe la maison.

text: his father and brother are dead for so many years .
translation: son père et son frère sont morts il y a tant d'années.

text: that same day , gunmen take over the high school - using it to hide $ 300 million worth of cocaine they 've hijacked .
translation: le même jour, des hommes armés prennent le contrôle du lycée - l'utilisant pour cacher 300 millions de dollars de cocaïne qu'ils ont détournée.
back_translation: On the same day, armed men take control of the high school - using it to hide 300 million dollars worth of cocaine that they have diverted.

text: it 's always disappointing when a documentary fails to live up to -- or offer any new insight into -- its chosen topic . unfortunately , that 's precisely what arthur dong 's family fundamentals does .
translation: Il est toujours décevant qu'un documentaire ne parvienne pas à vivre à la hauteur de son sujet choisi, ni à offrir de nouvelles perspectives à ce sujet. Malheureusement, c'est précisément ce que fait "Family Fundamentals" d'Arthur Dong.
back_translation: It is always disappointing when a documentary fails to live up to its chosen subject or to offer new perspectives on that subject. Unfortunately, this is precisely what Arthur Dong's "Family Fundamentals" does.

text: no wonder they 're talking about `` talk to her . `` it 's astonishing .
translation: pas étonnant qu'ils parlent de "parler à elle". C'est étonnant.
back_translation: It's no wonder they talk about "talking to her." It's surprising.

text: jason loses an important story assignment entitled 'big fat liar ' in movie producer marty wolf 's ( paul giamatti ) limo , which wolf then turns into a film .
translation: Jason perd un important devoir d'histoire intitulé "gros menteur" dans la limousine du producteur de cinéma Marty Wolf (Paul Giamatti), que Wolf transforme ensuite en film.
back_translation: Jason loses an important history assignment titled "Big Liar" in the limousine of movie producer Marty Wolf (Paul Giamatti), who then turns it into a film.

text: her young son dies , her marriage to max is ruined , and her lover is in fact dangerous in his jealousy and mad rage , but no matter what the consequences - his subversive spirit lives inside her , forms her , obsesses her .
translation: son jeune fils meurt, son mariage avec Max est ruiné, et son amant est en réalité dangereux dans sa jalousie et sa rage folle, mais peu importe les conséquences - son esprit subversif vit en elle, la façonne, l'obsède.
back_translation: her young son dies, her marriage to Max is ruined, and her lover is actually dangerous in his jealousy and mad rage, but no matter the consequences - her subversive spirit lives within her, shapes her, obsesses her.

text: a marvellous journey from childhood idealism to adolescent self-absorption .
translation: un voyage merveilleux de l'idéalisme de l'enfance à l'égocentrisme de l'adolescence.
back_translation: a wonderful journey from the idealism of childhood to the egocentrism of adolescence.

text: the future is on it 's way to atlantic city on a bus .
translation: l'avenir est en route vers Atlantic City en bus.
back_translation: The future is on its way to Atlantic City by bus.

text: impostor has a handful of thrilling moments and a couple of good performances , but the movie does n't quite fly . for starters , the story is just too slim .
translation: Impostor a quelques moments passionnants et quelques bonnes performances, mais le film n'atteint pas vraiment son but. Pour commencer, l'histoire est tout simplement trop mince.
back_translation: Impostor has a few exciting moments and some good performances, but the film doesn't really achieve its goal. To start, the story is simply too thin.

text: the campy results make mel brooks ' borscht belt schtick look sophisticated .
translation: les résultats kitsch font que le sketch de Mel Brooks sur le Borscht Belt semble sophistiqué.
back_translation: The kitsch results make Mel Brooks' sketch on the Borscht Belt seem sophisticated.

text: the quality of schwentke 's visuals . . . provides ample compensation .
translation: la qualité des visuels de schwentke . . . offre une compensation ample.
back_translation: the quality of Schwentke's visuals... provides ample compensation.

text: the scorpion king is more fun than conan the barbarian .
translation: Le roi scorpion est plus amusant que Conan le barbare.
back_translation: The Scorpion King is more fun than Conan the Barbarian.

text: the best part about `` gangs `` was daniel day-lewis .
translation: la meilleure partie de `` gangs `` était daniel day-lewis.
back_translation: The best part of "Gangs" was Daniel Day-Lewis.

text: a witty screen adaptation of this classic comedy of manners with its generous supply of snappy one-liners .
translation: une adaptation cinématographique pleine d'esprit de cette comédie de mœurs classique avec sa généreuse offre de répliques piquantes.
back_translation: A witty film adaptation of this classic comedy of manners with its generous supply of sharp dialogue.

text: it is a study of dark forces lurking in the lives of teenagers today .
translation: C'est une étude des forces sombres qui rôdent dans la vie des adolescents d'aujourd'hui.
back_translation: It is a study of the dark forces that haunt the lives of today's adolescents.

text: some actors have so much charisma that you 'd be happy to listen to them reading the phone book . hugh grant and sandra bullock are two such likeable actors .
translation: certains acteurs ont tellement de charisme que vous seriez heureux de les entendre lire les pages jaunes. hugh grant et sandra bullock sont deux acteurs aussi attachants.
back_translation: Some actors have so much charisma that you would be happy to hear them read the phone book. Hugh Grant and Sandra Bullock are two equally charming actors.

text: think 'glengarry glen ross ' without the mamet dialogue , and that 's kinda what you 'll get here .
translation: pensez à 'Glengarry Glen Ross' sans le dialogue de Mamet, et c'est à peu près ce que vous obtiendrez ici.
back_translation: Think of 'Glengarry Glen Ross' without Mamet's dialogue, and that's roughly what you'll get here.

text: even accepting this in the right frame of mind can only provide it with so much leniency .
translation: même accepter cela dans le bon état d'esprit ne peut lui accorder qu'une certaine indulgence.
back_translation: Even accepting this in the right spirit can only grant it a certain degree of leniency.

text: gives you the steady pulse of life in a beautiful city viewed through the eyes of a character who , in spite of tragic loss and increasing decrepitude , knows in his bones that he is one of the luckiest men alive .
translation: vous offre le pouls régulier de la vie dans une belle ville, vu à travers les yeux d'un personnage qui, malgré une perte tragique et une décrépitude croissante, sait dans ses os qu'il est l'un des hommes les plus chanceux vivants.
back_translation: offers you the regular pulse of life in a beautiful city, seen through the eyes of a character who, despite a tragic loss and growing decay, knows in his bones that he is one of the luckiest men alive.

text: no one knows this better than 35-year-old vince , back in his hometown of van wert , ohio , after a 13-year absence .
translation: personne ne le sait mieux que Vince, 35 ans, de retour dans sa ville natale de Van Wert, Ohio, après une absence de 13 ans.
back_translation: No one knows it better than Vince, 35, back in his hometown of Van Wert, Ohio, after an absence of 13 years.

text: increasing evidence about one man 's role in a long history of human rights abuses leads to a critical examination of american diplomacy through the lens of international standards of justice .
translation: l'augmentation des preuves concernant le rôle d'un homme dans une longue histoire d'abus des droits de l'homme mène à un examen critique de la diplomatie américaine à travers le prisme des normes internationales de justice.
back_translation: The increase in evidence regarding a man's role in a long history of human rights abuses leads to a critical examination of American diplomacy through the lens of international justice standards.

text: what saves it . . . and makes it one of the better video-game-based flicks , is that the film acknowledges upfront that the plot makes no sense , such that the lack of linearity is the point of emotional and moral departure for protagonist alice .
translation: Ce qui le sauve... et en fait l'un des meilleurs films basés sur des jeux vidéo, c'est que le film reconnaît dès le départ que l'intrigue n'a aucun sens, de sorte que le manque de linéarité est le point de départ émotionnel et moral pour la protagoniste Alice.
back_translation: What saves it... and actually makes it one of the best films based on video games, is that the film acknowledges from the start that the plot makes no sense, so the lack of linearity serves as the emotional and moral starting point for the protagonist Alice.

text: the camera soars above the globe in dazzling panoramic shots that make the most of the large-screen format , before swooping down on a string of exotic locales , scooping the whole world up in a joyous communal festival of rhythm .
translation: la caméra s'élève au-dessus du globe dans des plans panoramiques éblouissants qui tirent le meilleur parti du format grand écran, avant de plonger sur une série de lieux exotiques, réunissant le monde entier dans un joyeux festival communautaire de rythme.
back_translation: The camera rises above the globe in dazzling panoramic shots that make the most of the widescreen format, before diving into a series of exotic locations, bringing the whole world together in a joyful community festival of rhythm.

text: this masterfully calibrated psychological thriller thrives on its taut performances and creepy atmosphere even if the screenplay falls somewhat short .
translation: ce thriller psychologique habilement calibré prospère grâce à ses performances tendues et à son atmosphère inquiétante, même si le scénario laisse quelque peu à désirer.
back_translation: This skillfully crafted psychological thriller thrives on its tense performances and unsettling atmosphere, even if the storyline leaves something to be desired.

text: unlike most reunion stories that climax with a clich & # 233 ; happy ending , daughter from danang is a real-life drama .
translation: Contrairement à la plupart des histoires de retrouvailles qui culminent avec un cliché de fin heureuse, "Daughter from Danang" est un drame tiré de la vie réelle.
back_translation: Unlike most reunion stories that culminate in a cliché happy ending, "Daughter from Danang" is a drama based on real life.

text: the military team must shut down the computer and get out , fighting their way past zombies , mutants , and the computer itself , before the virus escapes and infects the rest of the world .
translation: L'équipe militaire doit éteindre l'ordinateur et sortir, se battant contre des zombies, des mutants et l'ordinateur lui-même, avant que le virus ne s'échappe et n'infecte le reste du monde.
back_translation: The military team must shut down the computer and escape, battling zombies, mutants, and the computer itself, before the virus escapes and infects the rest of the world.

text: gondry 's direction is adequate . . . but what gives human nature its unique feel is kaufman 's script .
translation: La direction de Gondry est adéquate... mais ce qui donne à la nature humaine son ressenti unique, c'est le scénario de Kaufman.
back_translation: Gondry's direction is adequate... but what gives human nature its unique feeling is Kaufman's screenplay.

text: in fact , sean has made the mistake of lending eddie $ 25 , 000 to cover his profligate spending .
translation: En fait, Sean a fait l'erreur de prêter 25 000 $ à Eddie pour couvrir ses dépenses prodigieuses.
back_translation: In fact, Sean made the mistake of lending $25,000 to Eddie to cover his extravagant expenses.

text: she 's willing to put him through just about anything to `` cure `` him of t . s . , with pills , counseling , electro-shock therapy , etc . mom 's also concerned about finn 's future - who will care for him ?
translation: Elle est prête à lui faire traverser à peu près n'importe quoi pour le "guérir" de la sclérose en plaques, avec des pilules, des séances de counseling, de l'électroconvulsivothérapie, etc. Maman s'inquiète aussi de l'avenir de Finn - qui prendra soin de lui ?
back_translation: She is ready to make him go through just about anything to "cure" him of multiple sclerosis, with pills, counseling sessions, electroconvulsive therapy, etc. Mom is also worried about Finn's future - who will take care of him?

text: a superb southern gothic slice of horror that is easily the sickest movie to arrive in theaters in a very long time . and i mean that in the nicest way possible .
translation: un superbe morceau de gothique du Sud, un film d'horreur qui est de loin le plus macabre à arriver dans les salles de cinéma depuis très longtemps. et je le dis de la manière la plus agréable possible.
back_translation: a superb piece of Southern Gothic, a horror film that is by far the most macabre to hit theaters in a long time. and I say this in the most pleasant way possible.

text: when your leading ladies are a couple of screen-eating dominatrixes like goldie hawn and susan sarandon at their raunchy best , even hokum goes down easily .
translation: Quand vos actrices principales sont deux dominatrices dévorantes comme Goldie Hawn et Susan Sarandon à leur meilleur dans le trash, même les histoires les plus farfelues passent facilement.
back_translation: When your leading actresses are two devouring dominatrices like Goldie Hawn and Susan Sarandon at their best in trash, even the most outlandish stories go down easily.

text: while enders is initially frustrated with his assignment , his respect grows as the codetalkers prove their worth in the brutal battle to take saipan .
translation: Bien qu'Enders soit initialement frustré par sa mission, son respect grandit à mesure que les code-talkers prouvent leur valeur dans la bataille brutale pour prendre Saipan.
back_translation: Although Enders is initially frustrated by his mission, his respect grows as the code-talkers prove their worth in the brutal battle for Saipan.

text: cathy ( julianne moore ) is the perfect 50s housewife , living the perfect 50s life : healthy kids , successful husband , social prominence .
translation: Cathy (Julianne Moore) est la parfaite femme au foyer des années 50, vivant la vie parfaite des années 50 : des enfants en bonne santé, un mari prospère, une notoriété sociale.
back_translation: Cathy (Julianne Moore) is the perfect housewife of the 1950s, living the perfect life of the 1950s: healthy children, a successful husband, and social notoriety.

text: . . . another example of how sandler is losing his touch .
translation: ... un autre exemple de la manière dont Sandler perd son talent.

text: i 'm sure if you 're a hartley fan , you might enjoy yourself . . . me , i did n't care for it .
translation: Je suis sûr que si vous êtes fan de Hartley, vous pourriez apprécier... moi, je n'ai pas aimé.
back_translation: I am sure that if you are a fan of Hartley, you might enjoy... me, I didn't like it.

text: his mission : to gather information on an organization that may just be planning the destruction of the world , led by the nihilistic yorgi .
translation: Sa mission : rassembler des informations sur une organisation qui pourrait planifier la destruction du monde, dirigée par le nihiliste Yorgi.
back_translation: Its mission: to gather information on an organization that could plan the destruction of the world, led by the nihilist Yorgi.

text: suggests puns about ingredients and soup and somebody being off their noodle , but let 's just say the ingredients do n't quite add up to a meal .
translation: suggère des jeux de mots sur les ingrédients et la soupe et quelqu'un qui perd la boule, mais disons simplement que les ingrédients ne s'additionnent pas tout à fait pour un repas.
back_translation: suggests puns about ingredients and soup and someone losing their mind, but let's just say that the ingredients don't quite add up for a meal.

text: `` secondhand lions `` follows the comedic adventures of an introverted boy ( osment ) left on the doorstep of a pair of reluctant , eccentric great-uncles ( caine and duvall ) , whose exotic remembrances stir the boy 's spirit and re-ignite the men 's lives .
translation: ``Les Lions du second-hand`` suit les aventures comiques d'un garçon introverti (Osment) laissé sur le pas de la porte d'une paire de grands-oncles excentriques et réticents (Caine et Duvall), dont les souvenirs exotiques stimulent l'esprit du garçon et ravivent la vie des hommes.
back_translation: "The Lions of the Second-Hand" follows the comedic adventures of an introverted boy (Osment) left on the doorstep of a pair of eccentric and reluctant great-uncles (Caine and Duvall), whose exotic memories stimulate the boy's imagination and revive the lives of the men.

text: charlie is man who wakes up to find that no one can see him , by chance he meets carol on a lonely highway .
translation: Charlie est un homme qui se réveille pour découvrir que personne ne peut le voir. Par hasard, il rencontre Carol sur une route déserte.
back_translation: Charlie is a man who wakes up to discover that no one can see him. By chance, he meets Carol on a deserted road.

text: the rich woman seeks the help of her lawyers to find her lost grandson cary and eventually finds him living in a deprived area with cass .
translation: La femme riche demande l'aide de ses avocats pour retrouver son petit-fils perdu, Cary, et finit par le trouver vivant dans un quartier défavorisé avec Cass.
back_translation: The wealthy woman asks her lawyers for help to find her lost grandson, Cary, and eventually finds him alive in an underprivileged neighborhood with Cass.

text: sad and alone , caroline wanders the exotic city in search of ansers , finality , and peace of mind .
translation: Triste et seule, Caroline erre dans la ville exotique à la recherche de réponses, de finalité et de sérénité.
back_translation: Sad and alone, Caroline wanders through the exotic city in search of answers, purpose, and serenity.

text: for one week , eduardo coutinho and his team talked to 27 residents in an enormous building in copacabana .
translation: Pendant une semaine, Eduardo Coutinho et son équipe ont parlé à 27 résidents d'un énorme immeuble à Copacabana.
back_translation: For a week, Eduardo Coutinho and his team spoke to 27 residents of a huge building in Copacabana.

text: along the way , they discover a sinister conspiracy that reaches to the police department and even the highest level of government .
translation: en cours de route, ils découvrent une sinistre conspiration qui atteint le département de police et même les plus hautes sphères du gouvernement.
back_translation: Along the way, they uncover a sinister conspiracy that reaches the police department and even the highest levels of government.

text: several degrees shy of the gross-out contests one expects from current teen fare .
translation: plusieurs degrés moins choquants que les concours de dégoût auxquels on s'attend dans les films pour adolescents actuels.
back_translation: several degrees less shocking than the disgust competitions expected in current teen movies.

text: plot strands involve a trio of lost transvestites , two girls who never leave the toilets , a pair of innocent under-age drinkers and a guy who is determined to pierce his genitalia , but the central story follows ali as she sets out to humilate her former lover , mike , who slept with another woman .
translation: Les intrigues impliquent un trio de travestis perdus, deux filles qui ne quittent jamais les toilettes, une paire de buveurs mineurs innocents et un gars déterminé à se percer les parties génitales, mais l'histoire centrale suit Ali alors qu'elle s'apprête à humilier son ancien amant, Mike, qui a couché avec une autre femme.
back_translation: The plot involves a trio of lost cross-dressers, two girls who never leave the bathroom, a pair of innocent underage drinkers, and a guy determined to pierce his genitals, but the central story follows Ali as she prepares to humiliate her ex-lover, Mike, who slept with another woman.

text: boromir ( sean bean ) is dead , frodo baggins ( elijah wood ) and samwise gamgee ( sean astin ) have gone to mordor alone to destroy the one ring , merry ( dominic monaghan ) and pippin ( billy boyd ) have been captured by the uruk-hai , and aragorn ( viggo mortensen ) , legolas ( orlando bloom ) , and gimli ( john rhys-davies ) have made friends of the rohan , a race of humans that are in the path of the upcoming war , led by its aging king , th & # 233 ; oden ( bernard hill ) .
translation: Boromir (Sean Bean) est mort, Frodon Sacquet (Elijah Wood) et Sam Gamegie (Sean Astin) sont allés seuls à Mordor pour détruire l'anneau unique, Merry (Dominic Monaghan) et Pippin (Billy Boyd) ont été capturés par les Uruk-hai, et Aragorn (Viggo Mortensen), Legolas (Orlando Bloom) et Gimli (John Rhys-Davies) se sont liés d'amitié avec les Rohirrim, une race d'humains qui se trouve sur le chemin de la guerre imminente, dirigée par son roi vieillissant, Théo­den (Bernard Hill).
back_translation: Boromir (Sean Bean) is dead, Frodo Baggins (Elijah Wood) and Sam Gamgee (Sean Astin) have gone alone to Mordor to destroy the One Ring, Merry (Dominic Monaghan) and Pippin (Billy Boyd) have been captured by the Uruk-hai, and Aragorn (Viggo Mortensen), Legolas (Orlando Bloom), and Gimli (John Rhys-Davies) have befriended the Rohirrim, a race of humans who are on the path of the impending war, led by their aging king, Théoden (Bernard Hill).

text: unbeknownst to the elders , the widows daughter has come to settle the estate , evict them and have an estate sale all in one day .
translation: À l'insu des aînés, la fille de la veuve est venue régler la succession, les expulser et organiser une vente de succession, le tout en une seule journée.
back_translation: Unbeknownst to the elders, the widow's daughter came to settle the estate, evict them, and organize an estate sale, all in one day.

text: the story and the friendship proceeds in such a way that you 're watching a soap opera rather than a chronicle of the ups and downs that accompany lifelong friendships .
translation: L'histoire et l'amitié se déroulent de telle manière que vous regardez un feuilleton plutôt qu'une chronique des hauts et des bas qui accompagnent les amitiés durables.
back_translation: History and friendship unfold in such a way that you watch a soap opera rather than a chronicle of the ups and downs that accompany lasting friendships.

text: steve 's best friend , sean , on the other hand , has n't been so lucky .
translation: le meilleur ami de Steve, Sean, en revanche, n'a pas eu autant de chance.
back_translation: Steve's best friend, Sean, on the other hand, was not so lucky.

text: loonies is a film with light-hearted and cheeky humour that , in a moving way , takes us into the pleasantly disturbed world of five somewhat romanticised psychiatric patients .
translation: Loonies est un film avec un humour léger et espiègle qui, de manière touchante, nous plonge dans le monde agréablement perturbé de cinq patients psychiatriques quelque peu romancés.
back_translation: Loonies is a film with light and playful humor that, in a touching way, immerses us in the pleasantly troubled world of five somewhat fictionalized psychiatric patients.

text: was i scared ? only at the prospect of beck 's next project . let 's see , a haunted house , a haunted ship , what 's next . . . ghost blimp ?
translation: Étais-je effrayé ? Seulement à la perspective du prochain projet de Beck. Voyons voir, une maison hantée, un navire hanté, quel sera le prochain... un dirigeable fantôme ?
back_translation: Was I scared? Only at the prospect of Beck's next project. Let's see, a haunted house, a haunted ship, what will be next... a ghost blimp?

text: now & # 38 ; forever is a dramatic contemporary love story combining elements of spirituality , heart and integrity .
translation: Maintenant et pour toujours est une histoire d'amour contemporaine dramatique qui combine des éléments de spiritualité, de cœur et d'intégrité.
back_translation: Now and Forever is a contemporary dramatic love story that combines elements of spirituality, heart, and integrity.

text: it 's the kind of movie you ca n't quite recommend because it is all windup and not much of a pitch , yet you ca n't bring yourself to dislike it .
translation: C'est le genre de film que vous ne pouvez pas vraiment recommander car il est tout en préparation et pas beaucoup en action, pourtant vous ne pouvez pas vous empêcher de l'apprécier.
back_translation: It's the kind of movie that you can't really recommend because it's all about build-up and not much action, yet you can't help but enjoy it.

text: a fine , rousing , g-rated family film , aimed mainly at little kids but with plenty of entertainment value to keep grown-ups from squirming in their seats .
translation: un film familial fin, entraînant et tout public, destiné principalement aux petits enfants mais avec suffisamment de valeur divertissante pour empêcher les adultes de se tortiller sur leurs sièges.
back_translation: A family film that is fun, engaging, and suitable for all audiences, aimed mainly at young children but with enough entertainment value to keep adults from squirming in their seats.

text: regardless , it is through grace 's visions involving him that she learns of her parent 's demonic pastimes , which include abduction , murder , and possibly worse .

back_translation: In any case, it is through Grace's visions that involve her that she learns of her parents' demonic pastimes, which include kidnapping, murder, and perhaps worse.

text: she must look beyond her history with men into a childhood that stopped short because of a shocking event that she has buried deep inside herself .

back_translation: She must look beyond her history with men, towards a childhood that was interrupted due to a shocking event that she has buried deeply within herself.

text: this version does justice both to stevenson and to the sci-fi genre .
translation: cette version rend hommage à la fois à stevenson et au genre sci-fi.

text: mother turns out to be his crazy accomplice in mass murder and his quest for immortality .

text: the boy falls in love with a rich girl ( deeksha ) .

text: i love the opening scenes of a wintry new york city in 1899 . cinematic poetry showcases the city 's old-world charm before machines change nearly everything .
translation: J'adore les scènes d'ouverture d'un New York enneigé en 1899. La poésie cinématographique met en avant le charme d'antan de la ville avant que les machines ne changent presque tout.

text: sure , there are flaws , but the moments that do things properly see the screen burst with confidence , rhythm , heat and pizzazz .
translation: Bien sûr, il y a des défauts, mais les moments où les choses sont bien faites font éclater l'écran de confiance, de rythme, de chaleur et de panache.
back_translation: Of course, there are flaws, but the moments when things are done well burst with an aura of confidence, rhythm, warmth, and flair.

text: the sheer dumbness of the plot ( other than its one good idea ) and the movie 's inescapable air of sleaziness get you down .
translation: la stupide simplicité de l'intrigue ( en dehors de sa seule bonne idée ) et l'inévitable atmosphère de sordidité du film vous dépriment.
back_translation: the stupid simplicity of the plot (aside from its one good idea) and the inevitable atmosphere of squalor in the film depress you.

text: it 's never a good sign when a film 's star spends the entirety of the film in a coma . it 's a worse sign when you begin to envy her condition .
translation: Ce n'est jamais bon signe lorsqu'une star de film passe l'intégralité du film dans un coma. C'est un signe encore pire lorsque vous commencez à envier son état.
back_translation: It's never a good sign when a movie star spends the entire film in a coma. It's an even worse sign when you start to envy their state.

text: it will be an act of violence that thrusts the girl into womanhood and leads her to a new life where , not without pain , everything is possible .

back_translation: It will be an act of violence that propels the girl into womanhood and leads her to a new life where, not without pain, everything is possible.

text: voyeurism is the order all around , as those who watch for pleasure and those paid to watch get more than bargained for when the operation & # 237 ; s delicate balance of power is skewed by rebellion .

translation: C'est Sex and the City qui rencontre le banquet de mariage pour le jeune San Franciscois Daniel Chang, vivant chez sa mère traditionnelle et dépassée.
back_translation: It's Sex and the City meets the wedding banquet for young San Franciscan Daniel Chang, living with his traditional and outdated mother.

text: from that moment on nothing is as it was before . . .

text: a chronicle , which goes behind the scenes on a stormy collaboration between the iconoclastic dance company , pilobolus , and legendary author-illustrator maurice sendak .

back_translation: a subtle variation of "I spit on your grave" in which our presumed heroine takes pathological revenge against a hatred of men.

text: a densely constructed , highly referential film , and an audacious return to form that can comfortably sit among jean-luc godard 's finest work .
translation: un film densément construit, hautement référentiel, et un retour audacieux à la forme qui peut confortablement se ranger parmi les plus belles œuvres de Jean-Luc Godard.
back_translation: A densely constructed film, highly referential, and a bold return to form that can comfortably rank among the most beautiful works of Jean-Luc Godard.

text: to protect her relationship with john , she `` ditches `` her son , having him arrested and locked in a correctional `` mental `` facility , before coercing her older brother burt , who lives in hollywood , to take him .
translation: Pour protéger sa relation avec John, elle "se débarrasse" de son fils, le faisant arrêter et enfermer dans un établissement correctionnel "mental", avant de contraindre son frère aîné Burt, qui vit à Hollywood, à s'en occuper.
back_translation: To protect her relationship with John, she "gets rid of" her son, having him arrested and locked up in a "mental" correctional facility, before forcing her older brother Burt, who lives in Hollywood, to take care of him.

text: it 's something of the ultimate scorsese film , with all the stomach-turning violence , colorful new york gang lore and other hallmarks of his personal cinema painted on their largest-ever historical canvas .
translation: c'est quelque chose du film ultime de Scorsese, avec toute la violence nauséabonde, la légende colorée des gangs de New York et d'autres marques de son cinéma personnel peintes sur leur plus grand canevas historique.
back_translation: It's something from Scorsese's ultimate film, with all the nauseating violence, the colorful legend of New York gangs, and other marks of his personal cinema painted on their greatest historical canvas.

translation: l'équivalent cinématographique d'aller à un dîner et d'être forcé de regarder la vidéo maison de l'accouchement de leur bébé par l'hôte et l'hôtesse.
back_translation: the cinematic equivalent of going to dinner and being forced to watch the home video of their baby's birth by the host and hostess.

text: it 's a loathsome movie , it really is and it makes absolutely no sense .

text: the movie is well crafted , and well executed . if you 're paying attention , the `` big twists `` are pretty easy to guess - but that does n't make the movie any less entertaining .
translation: le film est bien conçu et bien réalisé. si vous prêtez attention, les "grands rebondissements" sont assez faciles à deviner - mais cela ne rend pas le film moins divertissant.
back_translation: The film is well designed and well made. If you pay attention, the "big twists" are quite easy to guess - but that doesn't make the film any less entertaining.

text: a feel-good picture in the best sense of the term .

text: it 's pithy without being saccharine ; it 's funny without ever not taking itself seriously ; it 's full of beautiful characters and great performances .

text: besides him , the other residents are `` baggers , `` human-like creatures that are infected by the tall man 's blood , the dwarves , and , of course , the silver spheres , all trying to break out of the barrier that contains them and into the real world .
translation: À part lui, les autres résidents sont des "baggers", des créatures humanoïdes infectées par le sang de l'homme grand, les nains, et bien sûr, les sphères argentées, tous essayant de s'échapper de la barrière qui les contient pour entrer dans le monde réel.
back_translation: Aside from him, the other residents are "baggers," humanoid creatures infected by the blood of the great man, the dwarves, and of course, the silver spheres, all trying to escape the barrier that contains them to enter the real world.

translation: Katie est une jeune fille qui adore grimper.

text: nete 's husband seeks comfort outside of their home , her daughter begins to rebel , and as the relationship between nete and her father has not been too good for years , things are bound to explode .

back_translation: Nete's husband seeks comfort outside their home, her daughter begins to rebel, and since the relationship between Nete and her father has not been very good for years, things are ready to explode.

text: mile zero is a story about a father with a remarkable capacity to love , but who lets fear and desperation rule his actions .
translation: Mile zéro est une histoire sur un père doté d'une remarquable capacité à aimer, mais qui laisse la peur et le désespoir gouverner ses actions.

text: even bigger and more ambitious than the first installment , spy kids 2 looks as if it were made by a highly gifted 12-year-old instead of a grown man .
translation: encore plus grand et plus ambitieux que le premier volet, Spy Kids 2 donne l'impression d'avoir été réalisé par un enfant de 12 ans très doué plutôt que par un homme adulte.

back_translation: If you are ready to have fun with it, you will not feel deceived by the great infidelity of the unfaithful.

text: though it pretends to expose the life of male hustlers , it 's exploitive without being insightful .

text: felice finds herself in danger from the man she came to save .

text: it has the air of a surprisingly juvenile lark , a pop-influenced prank whose charms are immediately apparent and wear thin with repetition .

text: nic is fixated on getting laid , and watches mike and nadine through the skylight with josh .

text: an intriguing , richly detailed look at the early days of hollywood power and glamour .

text: every member of the pecking order sees the dupe as the new low man on the totem pole , and as a result , the perfect tool to boost themselves towards the top of this dysfunctional hierarchy .
translation: Chaque membre de la hiérarchie considère le dupé comme le nouveau maillon faible, et par conséquent, l'outil parfait pour se propulser vers le sommet de cette hiérarchie dysfonctionnelle.
back_translation: Each member of the hierarchy sees the duped as the new weak link, and therefore, the perfect tool to propel themselves to the top of this dysfunctional hierarchy.

text: the visionary quest begins on the operating table , where a surgeon grafts a prototype ocular implant into his eye socket .
translation: la quête visionnaire commence sur la table d'opération, où un chirurgien greffe un prototype d'implant oculaire dans son orbite.

text: upper west sidey exercise in narcissism and self-congratulation disguised as a tribute .
translation: exercice de narcissisme et d'auto-congratulation déguisé en hommage.

text: is n't it a bit early in his career for director barry sonnenfeld to do a homage to himself ? and it 's a lousy one at that .
translation: N'est-ce pas un peu tôt dans sa carrière pour le réalisateur Barry Sonnenfeld de rendre hommage à lui-même ? Et c'est en plus un mauvais hommage.

text: a terrifically deft picture about the thick line that separates movie glamour from the real world , and the thin line between common sense and paranoia .
