text: murder by numbers is like a couple of mediocre tv-movie -of-the-week films clumsily stuck together .
translation: Meurtre par numéros est comme un couple de films de télévision de la semaine médiocres maladroitement collés ensemble.
back_translation: Murder by Numbers is like a couple of mediocre made-for-TV films awkwardly glued together.

text: has enough gun battles and throwaway humor to cover up the yawning chasm where the plot should be .

text: forced to think fast , the producer decides to digitally create an actress `` simone `` to sub for the star -- the first totally believable synthetic actress .

text: not since ghostbusters has a film used manhattan 's architecture in such a gloriously goofy way .

text: tony gayton 's script does n't give us anything we have n't seen before , but director d . j . caruso 's grimy visual veneer and kilmer 's absorbing performance increase the gravitational pull considerably .
translation: Le scénario de Tony Gayton ne nous offre rien que nous n'ayons déjà vu auparavant, mais le vernis visuel sordide du réalisateur D. J. Caruso et la performance captivante de Kilmer augmentent considérablement l'attrait gravitationnel.
back_translation: The screenplay by Tony Gayton offers us nothing that we haven't seen before, but the gritty visual veneer from director D. J. Caruso and Kilmer's captivating performance significantly enhance the gravitational appeal.

text: as fran 's requests become more peculiar , chep is thrown into increasingly bizarre situations .
translation: Au fur et à mesure que les demandes de Fran deviennent plus étranges, Chep se retrouve dans des situations de plus en plus bizarres.
back_translation: As Fran's requests become stranger, Chep finds himself in increasingly bizarre situations.

text: . . . with the candy-like taste of it fading faster than 25-cent bubble gum , i realized this is a throwaway movie that wo n't stand the test of time . it 's a trifle .
translation: ... avec un goût sucré qui s'estompe plus vite que du chewing-gum à 25 cents, j'ai réalisé que c'est un film jetable qui ne résistera pas à l'épreuve du temps. C'est une bagatelle.
back_translation: ... with a sweet taste that fades faster than a 25-cent chewing gum, I realized that it’s a disposable film that will not stand the test of time. It’s a trifle.

text: like the original , this version is raised a few notches above kiddie fantasy pablum by allen 's astringent wit .
translation: Comme l'original, cette version est élevée à un niveau supérieur, au-delà du contenu fantasque pour enfants, grâce à l'esprit acéré d'Allen.
back_translation: Like the original, this version is elevated to a higher level, beyond whimsical content for children, thanks to Allen's sharp wit.

text: over months of improv work in the studio , they transform a haunting holocaust legacy into a disturbing theater piece .
translation: Au cours de mois de travail d'improvisation en studio, ils transforment un héritage holocauste bouleversant en une pièce de théâtre dérangeante.
back_translation: During a month of improvisational work in the studio, they transform a heartbreaking Holocaust legacy into a disturbing play.

text: while broomfield 's film does n't capture the effect of these tragic deaths on hip-hop culture , it succeeds as a powerful look at a failure of our justice system .
translation: Bien que le film de Broomfield ne saisisse pas l'effet de ces morts tragiques sur la culture hip-hop, il réussit à offrir un regard percutant sur un échec de notre système judiciaire.
back_translation: Although Broomfield's film does not capture the effect of these tragic deaths on hip-hop culture, it succeeds in providing a striking look at a failure of our judicial system.

text: it questions whether we really live in a world that can be divided neatly into black hats and white hats . and anyway , it wonders , is the guy in the black hat always wrong ?
translation: Cela remet en question si nous vivons vraiment dans un monde qui peut être divisé proprement en chapeaux noirs et chapeaux blancs. Et de toute façon, il se demande, le gars avec le chapeau noir a-t-il toujours tort ?
back_translation: This calls into question whether we really live in a world that can be neatly divided into black hats and white hats. And anyway, he wonders, does the guy with the black hat always have to be wrong?

text: like vardalos and corbett , who play their roles with vibrant charm , the film , directed by joel zwick , is heartfelt and hilarious in ways you ca n't fake .

text: but coney island 's finest its hot dog lady , rollercoaster operator , cotton candy vendor and performing freak have their own way of doing things .

back_translation: but the best of Coney Island, its hot dog lady, the roller coaster operator, the cotton candy vendor, and the sideshow phenomenon each have their own way of doing things.

text: ruth berman and connie kurtz first met in brooklyn in 1959 , both young married women raising their young children .
translation: Ruth Berman et Connie Kurtz se sont rencontrées pour la première fois à Brooklyn en 1959, toutes deux jeunes femmes mariées élevant leurs jeunes enfants.

text: you get the feeling that the filmmakers did their homework and that they 're here to represent a harsh reality . ``

translation: Il n'est donc pas surprenant qu'en tant que réalisateur, Washington exige et reçoit d'excellentes performances, de lui-même et du nouveau venu Derek Luke.

text: medem packs it with so much stunning , wildly colorful imagery -- and so much sex -- that it transfixes you even when you 're not quite sure what 's going on .
translation: Medem le remplit d'une imagerie étonnante et d'une couleur sauvage si vibrante — et de tant de sexe — que cela vous hypnotise même quand vous n'êtes pas tout à fait sûr de ce qui se passe.
back_translation: Medem fills it with astonishing imagery and such vibrant wild colors — and so much sex — that it hypnotizes you even when you aren't quite sure what's going on.

text: the acting is just fine , but there 's not enough substance here to sustain interest for the full 90 minutes , especially with the weak payoff .

text: an uneven film dealing with too many problems to be taken seriously .

back_translation: the agonizing memory that tormented him all his life - the death of his father, a convicted murderer who was executed when Vincent was just a boy - still haunts him.

text: bernal . . . gives an ambiguous performance ; he 's a lightweight actor , but that 's a positive quality when portraying a man on whom nothing leaves a permanent mark .

text: after finishing the open examination for form 5 students and applying for an adult identity card , yoyo , eighteen , departs for london to meet a guy introduced by her well-meaning parents in britain .
translation: Après avoir terminé l'examen ouvert pour les élèves de la classe de 5 et avoir demandé une carte d'identité adulte, Yoyo, dix-huit ans, part pour Londres pour rencontrer un gars présenté par ses parents bien intentionnés en Grande-Bretagne.
back_translation: After finishing the open exam for the 5th grade students and asking for an adult ID, Yoyo, eighteen years old, leaves for London to meet a guy introduced by her well-meaning parents in Great Britain.

text: what soured me on the santa clause 2 was that santa bumps up against 21st century reality so hard , it 's icky .
translation: Ce qui m'a déçu dans ''Le Pôle Express 2'', c'est que le Père Noël se heurte si durement à la réalité du 21e siècle, c'est dégoûtant.
back_translation: What disappointed me in "The Polar Express 2" is that Santa Claus confronts the harsh reality of the 21st century, it's disgusting.

text: 'the journey ' is the story of a young icelandic girl named kaja .

text: the only entertainment you 'll derive from this choppy and sloppy affair will be from unintentional giggles M-^V several of them .
translation: Le seul divertissement que vous tirerez de cette affaire décousue et bâclée sera des rires involontaires, plusieurs d'entre eux.
back_translation: The only entertainment you will get from this disjointed and sloppy affair will be involuntary laughter, several of them.

text: although trying to balance self-referential humor and a normal ol ' slasher plot seemed like a decent endeavor , the result does n't fully satisfy either the die-hard jason fans or those who can take a good joke .
translation: Bien que tenter de jongler entre l'humour auto-référentiel et une intrigue de slasher classique semblait être une entreprise raisonnable, le résultat ne satisfait pleinement ni les fans inconditionnels de Jason ni ceux qui apprécient une bonne blague.
back_translation: Although trying to juggle self-referential humor and a classic slasher plot seemed like a reasonable undertaking, the result fails to fully satisfy either die-hard Jason fans or those who appreciate a good joke.

text: an extraordinary swedish film about the soul adventure of marriage -- the kind of intimate and character-driven film that bille august does best .
translation: un film suédois extraordinaire sur l'aventure spirituelle du mariage -- le genre de film intime et centré sur les personnages que Bille August fait le mieux.
back_translation: An extraordinary Swedish film about the spiritual adventure of marriage — the kind of intimate, character-driven film that Bille August does best.

text: they are soon off going from one strange adventure to another .

text: [ aniston is ] so good , she manages to overcome the occasional nuggets of preciousness and self-consciousness in the story .

text: majandra delfino plays iris , the sheriff 's little sister , and much to his dismay , david 's love interest .
translation: Majandra Delfino joue Iris, la petite sœur du shérif, et à la grande déception de celui-ci, l'intérêt amoureux de David.

text: nothing is what it seems , and no one will be the same again , as the truth begins to surface in very dangerous circumstances .
translation: rien n'est ce qu'il paraît, et personne ne sera plus jamais le même, alors que la vérité commence à émerger dans des circonstances très dangereuses.

text: at the age of 34 , with no producing credits to his name , he landed a job as chief of production at paramount pictures .
translation: À l'âge de 34 ans, sans aucun crédit de production à son actif, il a décroché un poste de chef de production chez Paramount Pictures.
back_translation: At the age of 34, with no production credits to his name, he landed a position as a production chief at Paramount Pictures.

text: along the way he picks up a pastor who desires to learn the deeper things of god .
translation: En chemin, il prend un pasteur qui désire apprendre les choses plus profondes de Dieu.

text: ramsay and morton fill this character study with poetic force and buoyant feeling .

text: she finds out that the truth about both her parents is very revealing , shocking at times , but comes to terms with her past .
translation: elle découvre que la vérité sur ses deux parents est très révélatrice, parfois choquante, mais elle parvient à faire la paix avec son passé.
back_translation: She discovers that the truth about her two parents is very revealing, sometimes shocking, but she manages to make peace with her past.

text: all the performances are top notch and , once you get through the accents , all or nothing becomes an emotional , though still positive , wrench of a sit .
translation: toutes les performances sont de premier ordre et, une fois que vous avez surmonté les accents, tout ou rien devient une série émotionnelle, bien que toujours positive, qui tire sur les cordes sensibles.
back_translation: All performances are top-notch and, once you get past the accents, all or nothing becomes an emotional series, although always positive, that tugs at the heartstrings.

text: as an exercise in stripped-down filmmaking , interview is grimly effective .
translation: En tant qu'exercice de cinéma épuré, l'interview est d'une efficacité désespérante.
back_translation: As an exercise in stripped-down cinema, the interview is desperately effective.

text: john klein ( richard gere ) , a washington newspaper reporter leaves his job after his wife ( debra messing ) dies to investigate strange reports , including psychic visions ( `` prophecies `` ) and sightings of winged creatures ( `` mothmen `` ) , in a small west virginia town , that may be the signs of an alien invasion of earth . . .
translation: John Klein (Richard Gere), un journaliste du Washington Post, quitte son travail après la mort de sa femme (Debra Messing) pour enquêter sur des rapports étranges, notamment des visions psychiques (« prophéties ») et des observations de créatures ailées (« hommes-moths »), dans une petite ville de Virginie-Occidentale, qui pourraient être les signes d'une invasion extraterrestre de la Terre.
back_translation: John Klein (Richard Gere), a journalist from the Washington Post, leaves his job after the death of his wife (Debra Messing) to investigate strange reports, including psychic visions ("prophecies") and sightings of winged creatures ("mothmen"), in a small town in West Virginia, which could be signs of an extraterrestrial invasion of Earth.

text: fame hungry roxie hart dreams of a life on the vaudville stage , and spends her nights jazzing it up in the bright lights of chicago , continually hoping that she 'll find her lucky break , and be shot into 1920 's stardom , so able to flee her boring husband amos .
translation: Roxie Hart, avide de célébrité, rêve d'une vie sur la scène du vaudeville et passe ses nuits à faire la fête sous les lumières brillantes de Chicago, espérant constamment trouver sa chance et être propulsée à la célébrité des années 1920, afin de pouvoir fuir son ennuyante mari, Amos.
back_translation: Roxie Hart, eager for fame, dreams of a life on the vaudeville stage and spends her nights partying under the bright lights of Chicago, constantly hoping to find her chance and be propelled to the fame of the 1920s, so that she can escape her boring husband, Amos.

text: the principals in this cast are all fine , but bishop and stevenson are standouts .
translation: Les principaux acteurs de cette distribution sont tous excellents, mais Bishop et Stevenson se démarquent.
back_translation: The main actors in this distribution are all excellent, but Bishop and Stevenson stand out.

text: immediately , john q . rushes michael to the hospital 's emergency room for a transplant .
translation: Immédiatement, John Q. amène Michael aux urgences de l'hôpital pour une transplantation.
back_translation: Immediately, John Q. takes Michael to the emergency room of the hospital for a transplant.

text: but even greater dangers lie ahead when jim discovers that his trusted friend silver is actually a scheming pirate with mutiny on his mind .
translation: mais des dangers encore plus grands se profile à l'horizon lorsque Jim découvre que son ami de confiance, Silver, est en réalité un pirate rusé avec la mutinerie en tête.
back_translation: But even greater dangers loom on the horizon when Jim discovers that his trusted friend, Silver, is actually a cunning pirate with mutiny on his mind.

text: ' . . . a great , participatory spectator sport . '
translation: ' . . . un grand sport collectif participatif. '

text: now grown up , caitlin ( emma caulfield ) calls kyle ( chaney kley ) because her little brother michael ( lee cormie ) is going through the same things he did as a boy , and wants his help .
translation: Maintenant adulte, Caitlin (Emma Caulfield) appelle Kyle (Chaney Kley) parce que son petit frère Michael (Lee Cormie) traverse les mêmes épreuves qu'il a traversées étant enfant, et elle veut son aide.
back_translation: Now an adult, Caitlin (Emma Caulfield) calls Kyle (Chaney Kley) because her little brother Michael (Lee Cormie) is going through the same trials he faced as a child, and she wants his help.

text: behan himself knew how to spin a tale and one ca n't help but think he 'd appreciate this attempt to turn his life into art .
translation: Behan lui-même savait comment raconter une histoire et on ne peut s'empêcher de penser qu'il apprécierait cette tentative de transformer sa vie en art.
back_translation: Behan himself knew how to tell a story, and one cannot help but think that he would appreciate this attempt to turn his life into art.

text: unfortunately the third seems out of reach - the beautiful , seductive anne elise .
translation: malheureusement, la troisième semble hors de portée - la belle et séduisante anne élise.

text: frank 's newest transport seems no different from the countless ones he 's done in the past .

text: a surreal fairy tale that coils in on itself like a slow-motion whirlpool and achieves an atmosphere of sublime creepiness without ever precisely making sense .
translation: un conte de fées surréaliste qui se déroule sur lui-même comme un tourbillon au ralenti et atteint une atmosphère de sublime étrangeté sans jamais précisément avoir de sens.
back_translation: a surreal fairy tale that unfolds upon itself like a slow-motion whirl and reaches an atmosphere of sublime strangeness without ever precisely making sense.

text: a raw comedy that is intermittently hilarious as it attacks pretty much every taboo around .
translation: une comédie brute qui est par moments hilarante alors qu'elle attaque à peu près tous les tabous autour de .

text: the californian desert , somewhere between death valley and los angeles .
translation: le désert californien, quelque part entre la vallée de la mort et Los Angeles.

text: no good deed , based on a short story entitled 'the house on turk street ' by dashiell hammett , is about a police detective ( jack ) who , while doing a friend a favor and searching for a runaway teenager on turk street , stumbles upon a bizarre band of criminals about to pull off a bank robbery .
translation: Aucune bonne action, basé sur une nouvelle intitulée "La maison de Turk Street" de Dashiell Hammett, raconte l'histoire d'un détective de police (Jack) qui, en rendant service à un ami et en recherchant un adolescent fugueur dans Turk Street, tombe sur une bande bizarre de criminels sur le point de réaliser un cambriolage de banque.
back_translation: No Good Deed, based on a story titled "The House on Turk Street" by Dashiell Hammett, tells the story of a police detective (Jack) who, while doing a favor for a friend and searching for a runaway teenager on Turk Street, comes across a strange gang of criminals about to carry out a bank robbery.

back_translation: I can easily imagine that Benigni's Pinocchio could become a Christmas classic. Coal is no longer as easy to obtain as it used to be, and it would be a fitting substitute for the stockings of naughty children.

text: the four feathers is definitely horse feathers , but if you go in knowing that , you might have fun in this cinematic sandbox .

text: this attractive , 30 year old successful graphic designer with a captivating personality has n't had a good date in over a year , and she 's not alone - her best friends share the same problem .

text: undercover fbi agent and former marine frank castle ( jane ) is devastated when his wife and children are killed when they accidentally witness a mafia hit , and with nothing left to lose , decides to dedicate himself fully to the eradication of crime ( organized and otherwise ) from america , as an army , assassin , judge and jury all rolled up into one man ( and a whole lot of guns ) : the punisher .
translation: L'agent de la FBI sous couverture et ancien marin Frank Castle (Jane) est dévasté lorsque sa femme et ses enfants sont tués après avoir accidentellement été témoins d'un règlement de comptes de la mafia. N'ayant plus rien à perdre, il décide de se consacrer entièrement à l'éradication du crime (organisé et autre) en Amérique, en tant qu'armée, assassin, juge et jury, le tout réuni en un seul homme (et avec une multitude d'armes) : le Punisseur.
back_translation: The undercover FBI agent and former Marine Frank Castle (Jane) is devastated when his wife and children are killed after accidentally witnessing a mafia hit. With nothing left to lose, he decides to dedicate himself entirely to eradicating crime (organized and otherwise) in America, as an army, assassin, judge, and jury, all rolled into one man (and armed with a multitude of weapons): the Punisher.

text: it 's thoroughly entertaining and nonpatronizing , and occasionally even insightful .

text: it 's difficult to imagine the process that produced such a script , but here 's guessing that spray cheese and underarm noises played a crucial role .

text: for decades we 've marveled at disney 's rendering of water , snow , flames and shadows in a hand-drawn animated world . prepare to marvel again .

text: the corrupt wizard saruman ( christopher lee ) , under the power of the dark lord sauron , and his slimy assistant , gr & # 237 ; ma wormtongue ( brad dourif ) , have created a grand uruk-hai army bent on the destruction of man and middle-earth .
translation: Le sorcier corrompu Saruman (Christopher Lee), sous le pouvoir du seigneur ténébreux Sauron, et son assistant gluant, Gríma Langue de Serpent (Brad Dourif), ont créé une grande armée d'Uruk-hai déterminée à anéantir l'homme et la Terre du Milieu.
back_translation: The corrupted sorcerer Saruman (Christopher Lee), under the power of the dark lord Sauron, and his slimy assistant, Gríma Wormtongue (Brad Dourif), have created a great army of Uruk-hai determined to annihilate man and Middle-earth.

text: sandler has played weirdos for zany comic effect , and it 's interesting to finally see him play one in a relatively subdued romantic dramedy .

back_translation: Sandler has played misfits for a zany comedic effect, and it's interesting to finally see him play one in a relatively subdued romantic dramedy.

text: delia , greta , and paula rank as three of the most multilayered and sympathetic female characters of the year . as each of them searches for their place in the world , miller digs into their very minds to find an unblinking , flawed humanity .
translation: Delia, Greta et Paula se classent parmi les personnages féminins les plus complexes et sympathiques de l'année. Alors que chacune d'elles cherche sa place dans le monde, Miller plonge dans leur esprit pour trouver une humanité imparfaite et sans complaisance.
back_translation: Delia, Greta, and Paula rank among the most complex and likable female characters of the year. As each of them searches for her place in the world, Miller delves into their minds to uncover an imperfect and unflinching humanity.

translation: L'environnement urbain apocalyptique du film et son esprit glacial implacable délivrent un message suffisant sans un dernier coup de maître triomphant.

text: on balance , i recommend the movie both for nicholson 's performance and for the opportunity to spend some time with the kind of man that we often meet in real life , but rarely see on screen .
translation: En fin de compte, je recommande le film à la fois pour la performance de Nicholson et pour l'occasion de passer du temps avec le genre d'homme que nous rencontrons souvent dans la vie réelle, mais que nous voyons rarement à l'écran.

text: but for the shell-shocked crew , trapped together in the sub 's narrow corridors and constricted spaces , this is about to become a journey into the sensory delusions , mental deceptions and runaway fear that lurk just below the surface of the ocean and deep inside the human psyche .
translation: mais pour l'équipage sous le choc, piégé ensemble dans les étroits couloirs et espaces restreints du sous-marin, cela va devenir un voyage dans les illusions sensorielles, les tromperies mentales et la peur incontrôlable qui se cachent juste sous la surface de l'océan et au plus profond de la psyché humaine.
back_translation: But for the crew in shock, trapped together in the narrow corridors and confined spaces of the submarine, this is going to become a journey into sensory illusions, mental deceptions, and uncontrollable fear that lie just beneath the surface of the ocean and deep within the human psyche.

text: through time travel wells and twain team up with sir arthur conan doyle and a young jules verne and wind up in the year 2001 seeing results of their writings that help in their attempts to find dr . noah and save the world from destruction .
translation: à travers des puits de voyage dans le temps, Twain fait équipe avec Sir Arthur Conan Doyle et un jeune Jules Verne et se retrouve en l'an 2001, voyant les résultats de leurs écrits qui aident dans leurs tentatives de retrouver le Dr Noah et de sauver le monde de la destruction.
back_translation: Through time travel wells, Twain teams up with Sir Arthur Conan Doyle and a young Jules Verne, finding himself in the year 2001, witnessing the results of their writings that aid in their attempts to locate Dr. Noah and save the world from destruction.

back_translation: Tinke, a 9-year-old orphan from the wilderness, struggles to find her wealthy grandparents whom she does not know.

text: eventually , he builds a successful career as a us attorney .
translation: Finalement, il construit une carrière réussie en tant qu'avocat aux États-Unis.
back_translation: Ultimately, he builds a successful career as a lawyer in the United States.

text: but before he can get to him she sets out with her father to south africa .
translation: mais avant qu'il puisse l'atteindre, elle se met en route avec son père pour l'Afrique du Sud.
back_translation: But before he can reach her, she sets off with her father for South Africa.

text: all of the elements are in place for a great film noir , but director george hickenlooper 's approach to the material is too upbeat .
translation: Tous les éléments sont en place pour un grand film noir, mais l'approche du réalisateur George Hickenlooper envers le matériel est trop optimiste.
back_translation: All the elements are in place for a great film noir, but director George Hickenlooper's approach to the material is too optimistic.

text: adaptation is probably the ultimate writers ' film , but it 's also a brash , daring , and dynamic film -- as delicate as an orchid but as durable and malleable as the species .
translation: L'adaptation est probablement le film ultime pour les écrivains, mais c'est aussi un film audacieux, intrépide et dynamique - aussi délicat qu'une orchidée mais aussi durable et malléable que l'espèce.
back_translation: Adaptation is probably the ultimate film for writers, but it is also a bold, fearless, and dynamic film - as delicate as an orchid but also as durable and malleable as the species.

text: jordan is a mom & # 38 ; an activist who is on a life long search for true faith as she tries to protect her only child from what she believes is injustice .
translation: Jordan est une mère et une militante qui est en quête perpétuelle de la vraie foi alors qu'elle essaie de protéger son enfant unique de ce qu'elle considère comme une injustice.
back_translation: Jordan is a mother and an activist who is in a perpetual quest for true faith while trying to protect her only child from what she sees as an injustice.

text: barbara novak ( renee zellweger ) has just come down from maine to new york after writing a book called down with love .
translation: Barbara Novak (Renee Zellweger) vient de descendre du Maine à New York après avoir écrit un livre intitulé "Down with Love".
back_translation: Barbara Novak (Renee Zellweger) has just come down from Maine to New York after writing a book entitled "Down with Love."

text: griffin & co . manage to be spectacularly outrageous .
translation: griffin & co. parviennent à être spectaculairement outranciers.
back_translation: Griffin & Co. manage to be spectacularly outrageous.

text: it 's sobering , particularly if anyone still thinks this conflict can be resolved easily , or soon .
translation: C'est une prise de conscience, surtout si quelqu'un pense encore que ce conflit peut être résolu facilement ou rapidement.
back_translation: It is an awareness, especially if someone still thinks that this conflict can be resolved easily or quickly.

text: an incoherent jumble of a film that 's rarely as entertaining as it could have been .
translation: un mélange incohérent d'un film qui est rarement aussi divertissant qu'il aurait pu l'être.
back_translation: an incoherent mix of a film that is rarely as entertaining as it could have been.

text: paramount to her world is gene , a wealthy disturbed businessman who has slowly become her benefactor over the years .
translation: Paramount dans son monde est Gene, un homme d'affaires riche et perturbé qui est devenu lentement son bienfaiteur au fil des ans.
back_translation: Central to his world is Gene, a rich and troubled businessman who has slowly become his benefactor over the years.

text: without blowing the jokes we can say that , if you have found that your sense of humor fit well with christopher guest 's screen outings , you 'll find yourself in the flow with shearer as well .
translation: Sans révéler les blagues, on peut dire que si vous avez constaté que votre sens de l'humour s'accorde bien avec les films de Christopher Guest, vous vous sentirez également en phase avec Shearer.
back_translation: Without revealing the jokes, one can say that if you have noticed that your sense of humor aligns well with the films of Christopher Guest, you will also feel in tune with Shearer.

text: a gracious , eloquent film that by its end offers a ray of hope to the refugees able to look ahead and resist living in a past forever lost .
translation: un film gracieux et éloquant qui, à la fin, offre un rayon d'espoir aux réfugiés capables de regarder en avant et de résister à vivre dans un passé à jamais perdu.
back_translation: A graceful and eloquent film that, in the end, offers a ray of hope to refugees who are able to look ahead and resist living in a past that is forever lost.

text: highlights include detailed instructions on how to perform an icepick lobotomy with household utensils ; a cacophony of robotic voices ; and haunting stills that date back to the turn of the twentieth century .
translation: Les points forts incluent des instructions détaillées sur la manière de réaliser une lobotomie à pichet avec des ustensiles de ménage ; une cacophonie de voix robotiques ; et des images troublantes qui remontent au tournant du vingtième siècle.
back_translation: The highlights include detailed instructions on how to perform a pitcher lobotomy with household utensils; a cacophony of robotic voices; and disturbing images dating back to the turn of the twentieth century.

text: 19-year old free spirit daphne reynolds ( amanda bynes ) , raised by her equally free-spirited mother , goes to england to meet her father , who turns out to be a wealthy aristocrat ( colin firth ) .
translation: Daphne Reynolds, une jeune femme libre de 19 ans (Amanda Bynes), élevée par sa mère tout aussi libre d'esprit, se rend en Angleterre pour rencontrer son père, qui s'avère être un aristocrate riche (Colin Firth).
back_translation: Daphne Reynolds, a free-spirited 19-year-old woman (Amanda Bynes), raised by her equally free-spirited mother, goes to England to meet her father, who turns out to be a wealthy aristocrat (Colin Firth).

text: ted ca n't turn the ladies heads like he used to - none of the scams work .
translation: Ted ne peut plus attirer l'attention des dames comme avant - aucun des stratagèmes ne fonctionne.
back_translation: Ted can no longer attract the attention of ladies like he used to - none of the tricks work.

text: he 's got a crush on the sexy young blonde , billy , who he met at an orgy the other night .
translation: Il a un faible pour la sexy jeune blonde, Billy, qu'il a rencontrée lors d'une orgie l'autre nuit.
back_translation: He has a weakness for the sexy young blonde, Billy, whom he met at an orgy the other night.

text: a fast paced and suspenseful argentinian thriller about the shadow side of play .
translation: un thriller argentin rapide et plein de suspense sur le revers du jeu.
back_translation: A fast-paced Argentine thriller full of suspense about the downside of gambling.

text: a thoroughly unoriginal , but fast-paced and entertaining genre b-flick
translation: un genre de film B totalement peu original, mais rapide et divertissant
back_translation: a kind of totally unoriginal B-movie, but quick and entertaining

text: there are some movies that hit you from the first scene and you know it 's going to be a trip . igby goes down is one of those movies .
translation: Il y a des films qui vous frappent dès la première scène et vous savez que ça va être un voyage. Igby goes down est l'un de ces films.
back_translation: There are movies that hit you from the very first scene and you know it's going to be a journey. Igby Goes Down is one of those films.

text: the results of the gene therapy are passed on to his son bruce .
translation: les résultats de la thérapie génique sont transmis à son fils Bruce.
back_translation: The results of the gene therapy are passed on to his son Bruce.

text: only one person can eventually solve the crisis : stefan balsiger himself .
translation: seule une personne peut finalement résoudre la crise : Stefan Balsiger lui-même.
back_translation: Only one person can ultimately resolve the crisis: Stefan Balsiger himself.

text: in a place soon to be known as the valley of death , in a small clearing called landing zone x-ray , lt . colonel hal moore ( mel gibson ) and 400 young fathers , husbands , brothers , and sons , all troopers from an elite american combat division , were surrounded by 2 , 000 north vietnamese soldiers .
translation: dans un endroit bientôt connu sous le nom de vallée de la mort, dans une petite clairière appelée zone d'atterrissage x-ray, le colonel lieutenant hal moore (mel gibson) et 400 jeunes pères, maris, frères et fils, tous soldats d'une division de combat américaine d'élite, étaient encerclés par 2 000 soldats nord-vietnamiens.
back_translation: In a place soon to be known as the Valley of Death, in a small clearing called Landing Zone X-Ray, Lieutenant Colonel Hal Moore (Mel Gibson) and 400 young fathers, husbands, brothers, and sons, all soldiers of an elite American combat division, were surrounded by 2,000 North Vietnamese soldiers.

text: while peterson and her ageless alter ego keep an ironic detachment from the melodramatics , there 's no irony in the end-title dedication to price -- it obviously comes straight from the heart .
translation: Alors que Peterson et son alter ego intemporel maintiennent un détachement ironique vis-à-vis des mélodrames, il n'y a aucune ironie dans la dédicace finale à Price - elle vient manifestement du cœur.
back_translation: While Peterson and his timeless alter ego maintain an ironic detachment from melodramas, there is no irony in the final dedication to Price - it clearly comes from the heart.

text: friday after next takes place back in the hood during the christmas season , craig and day-day are now living in a rundown apartment .
translation: La suite de vendredi se déroule dans le quartier pendant la saison de Noël, Craig et Day-Day vivent maintenant dans un appartement délabré.
back_translation: The sequel to Friday takes place in the neighborhood during the Christmas season, Craig and Day-Day now live in a run-down apartment.

text: moments of compassion and kindness circulate within a mounting concern for individual survival .
translation: Des moments de compassion et de gentillesse circulent au sein d'une préoccupation croissante pour la survie individuelle.
back_translation: Moments of compassion and kindness circulate amidst a growing concern for individual survival.

text: likeable thanks to its cast , its cuisine and its quirky tunes .
translation: sympathique grâce à sa distribution, sa cuisine et ses mélodies originales.
back_translation: nice thanks to its cast, its cuisine and its original melodies.

text: but paul 's dream job turns into a nightmare of sex for hire , drugs and violence .
translation: mais le rêve de Paul se transforme en un cauchemar de sexe tarifé, de drogues et de violence.
back_translation: but Paul's dream turns into a nightmare of paid sex, drugs, and violence.

text: instead of a hyperbolic beat-charged urban western , it 's an unpretentious , sociologically pointed slice of life .
translation: au lieu d'un western urbain hyperbolique et chargé de tension, c'est une tranche de vie sans prétention et sociologiquement pertinente.
back_translation: Instead of a hyperbolic urban western full of tension, it is an unpretentious slice of life that is sociologically relevant.

text: clayton is then given a special assignment , to root out a suspected mole that has infiltrated the agency .
translation: Clayton reçoit alors une mission spéciale, celle de débusquer un suspect d'agent double qui s'est infiltré dans l'agence.
back_translation: Clayton receives a special mission to unearth a suspect double agent who has infiltrated the agency.

text: it is fascinating to see how much work and preparation goes into stand-up comedy .
translation: Il est fascinant de voir combien de travail et de préparation sont nécessaires pour faire du stand-up.
back_translation: It is fascinating to see how much work and preparation is needed to do stand-up.

text: how does one ask his wife to try something that breaks so many taboos ?
translation: Comment demander à sa femme d'essayer quelque chose qui brise tant de tabous ?
back_translation: How to ask your wife to try something that breaks so many taboos?

text: this comedy , based on steve martin 's successful stage play concerns a fictional meeting between a young pablo picasso and a young albert einstein at a paris cafe at the turn of the 20th century .
translation: Cette comédie, basée sur la pièce de théâtre à succès de Steve Martin, concerne une rencontre fictive entre un jeune Pablo Picasso et un jeune Albert Einstein dans un café à Paris au tournant du 20ème siècle.
back_translation: This comedy, based on the hit play by Steve Martin, concerns a fictional meeting between a young Pablo Picasso and a young Albert Einstein in a café in Paris at the turn of the 20th century.

text: it 's like going to a house party and watching the host defend himself against a frothing ex-girlfriend . you do n't want to call the cops . you want to call domino 's .
translation: C'est comme aller à une fête chez un ami et regarder l'hôte se défendre contre une ex-petite amie enragée. Tu ne veux pas appeler les flics. Tu veux appeler Domino's.
back_translation: It's like going to a party at a friend's house and watching the host fend off an enraged ex-girlfriend. You don't want to call the cops. You want to call Domino's.

text: beautifully crafted and brutally honest , promises offers an unexpected window into the complexities of the middle east struggle and into the humanity of its people .
translation: Magnifiquement conçu et brutalement honnête, "Promises" offre une fenêtre inattendue sur les complexités de la lutte au Moyen-Orient et sur l'humanité de ses habitants.
back_translation: Beautifully crafted and brutally honest, "Promises" offers an unexpected glimpse into the complexities of the struggle in the Middle East and the humanity of its inhabitants.

text: like the best 60 minutes exposM-i , the film ( at 80 minutes ) is actually quite entertaining .
translation: Comme le meilleur reportage de 60 minutes, le film (d'une durée de 80 minutes) est en réalité assez divertissant.
back_translation: Like the best 60 Minutes report, the film (which lasts 80 minutes) is actually quite entertaining.

text: a culture clash comedy only half as clever as it thinks it is .
translation: une comédie de choc culturel seulement moitié aussi intelligente qu'elle ne le pense.
back_translation: a culture shock comedy only half as smart as it thinks it is.

text: however after his son is witness to a killing he has done mike sullivan finds him self on the run trying to save the life of his son and at the same time looking for revenge on those who wronged him .
translation: Cependant, après que son fils soit témoin d'un meurtre qu'il a commis, Mike Sullivan se retrouve en fuite, essayant de sauver la vie de son fils tout en cherchant à se venger de ceux qui l'ont lésé.
back_translation: However, after his son witnesses a murder he committed, Mike Sullivan finds himself on the run, trying to save his son's life while seeking revenge on those who have wronged him.

text: an unsentimental albeit heartfelt eulogy to the firefighters who paid the ultimate price while saving new yorkers .
translation: une éloge funèbre sans sentimentalité mais empreinte de sincérité pour les pompiers qui ont payé le prix ultime en sauvant des New-Yorkais.
back_translation: a eulogy without sentimentality but filled with sincerity for the firefighters who paid the ultimate price in saving New Yorkers.

text: improv comedy masters the upright citizens brigade star in this absurdist comedy about an evil chinese food company and their plan to turn little girls into `` saucy `` spare ribs .
translation: Les maîtres de la comédie improvisée de la Upright Citizens Brigade jouent dans cette comédie absurde sur une entreprise de nourriture chinoise maléfique et leur plan de transformer de petites filles en « côtes levées épicées ».
back_translation: The masters of improvised comedy from the Upright Citizens Brigade perform in this absurd comedy about an evil Chinese food company and their plan to turn little girls into "spicy ribs."

text: however , when a search sets in , the people of dogville demand a better deal in exchange for the risk of harbouring poor grace and she learns the hard way that in this town , goodness is relative .
translation: Cependant, lorsque la recherche commence, les habitants de Dogville exigent un meilleur accord en échange du risque d'abriter la pauvre Grace, et elle apprend à ses dépens que dans cette ville, la bonté est relative.
back_translation: However, when the search begins, the residents of Dogville demand a better deal in exchange for the risk of harboring the poor Grace, and she learns to her detriment that in this town, kindness is relative.

text: it treats us to beautiful insights and tragic struggles that swell the heart and make us feel genuine empathy for two people embracing the truth amidst a pack of lies .
translation: il nous offre de belles perspectives et de tragiques luttes qui font battre le cœur et nous font ressentir une véritable empathie pour deux personnes qui embrassent la vérité au milieu d'un ensemble de mensonges.
back_translation: It offers us beautiful perspectives and tragic struggles that make our hearts beat and make us feel a genuine empathy for two people who embrace the truth amid a web of lies.

text: rachel is torn by her aversion to harper and her duty as an agent .
translation: Rachel est déchirée entre son aversion pour Harper et son devoir en tant qu'agent.
back_translation: Rachel is torn between her aversion for Harper and her duty as an agent.

text: three stories delicately intertwined by the beauty of sadness .
translation: trois histoires délicatement entrelacées par la beauté de la tristesse.
back_translation: Three stories delicately intertwined by the beauty of sadness.

text: the best movie in many a moon about the passions that sometimes fuel our best achievements and other times leave us stranded with nothing more than our lesser appetites .
translation: le meilleur film depuis longtemps sur les passions qui parfois alimentent nos plus grandes réalisations et d'autres fois nous laissent en rade avec rien de plus que nos appétits inférieurs.
back_translation: the best film in a long time about the passions that sometimes fuel our greatest achievements and other times leave us stranded with nothing more than our baser appetites.

text: i stopped thinking about how good it all was , and started doing nothing but reacting to it - feeling a part of its grand locations , thinking urgently as the protagonists struggled , feeling at the mercy of its inventiveness , gasping at its visual delights .
translation: J'ai cessé de penser à combien tout cela était bon, et j'ai commencé à ne rien faire d'autre qu'à y réagir - me sentant partie intégrante de ses grands lieux, pensant avec urgence alors que les protagonistes luttaient, me sentant à la merci de son inventivité, haletant devant ses délices visuels.
back_translation: I stopped thinking about how good all of this was, and I started doing nothing else but reacting to it - feeling like an integral part of its grand places, thinking urgently as the protagonists struggled, feeling at the mercy of its inventiveness, gasping at its visual delights.

text: it ca n't be easy starting a movie in the middle , staying in the middle , and then ending it in the middle . . .
translation: Ce ne doit pas être facile de commencer un film au milieu, de rester au milieu, puis de le terminer au milieu...
back_translation: It must not be easy to start a movie in the middle, to stay in the middle, and then to end in the middle...

text: everything has taken a turn for the worse and kilo ca n't seem to stop it .
translation: tout a pris un tournant pour le pire et kilo ne semble pas pouvoir l'arrêter.
back_translation: Everything took a turn for the worse, and Kilo doesn't seem able to stop it.

text: rebecca falls in love with lukas and soon feels more comfortable in the commune than she does at home .
translation: Rebecca tombe amoureuse de Lukas et se sent bientôt plus à l'aise dans la commune que chez elle.
back_translation: Rebecca falls in love with Lukas and soon feels more at ease in the community than at home.

text: one of the most important and exhilarating forms of animated filmmaking since old walt doodled steamboat willie .
translation: l'une des formes de cinéma d'animation les plus importantes et les plus palpitantes depuis qu'Old Walt a esquissé Steamboat Willie.
back_translation: one of the most important and exciting forms of animated cinema since Old Walt sketched Steamboat Willie.

text: the day takes some twists and turns as elder jones and elder smith ride their bikes to pick up a birthday package for elder smith .
translation: La journée prend quelques rebondissements alors que l'ancien Jones et l'ancien Smith roulent à vélo pour récupérer un colis d'anniversaire pour l'ancien Smith.
back_translation: The day takes a few twists as the former Jones and the former Smith ride bikes to pick up a birthday package for the former Smith.

text: the war of the ring has now begun . . .
translation: la guerre de l'anneau a maintenant commencé . . .
back_translation: the war of the ring has now begun . . .

text: the grandfather teaches the boy a small lesson about growing up , while the boy helps the grandfather , a holocaust survivor , open up and tell his story , for the first time .
translation: Le grand-père enseigne au garçon une petite leçon sur le fait de grandir, tandis que le garçon aide le grand-père, un survivant de l'Holocauste, à s'ouvrir et à raconter son histoire pour la première fois.
back_translation: The grandfather teaches the boy a little lesson about growing up, while the boy helps the grandfather, a Holocaust survivor, to open up and tell his story for the first time.

text: so young , so smart , such talent , such a wise * * * .
translation: si jeune, si intelligent, tant de talent, si sage * * *.
back_translation: so young, so intelligent, so much talent, so wise * * *.

text: as she tries to clear her name , she uncovers information that leads to more murders and more unanswered questions .
translation: Alors qu'elle essaie de rétablir son nom, elle découvre des informations qui mènent à d'autres meurtres et à d'autres questions sans réponse.
back_translation: As she tries to clear her name, she uncovers information that leads to other murders and more unanswered questions.

text: handled correctly , wilde 's play is a masterpiece of elegant wit and artifice . here , alas , it collapses like an overcooked soufflM-i .
translation: géré correctement, la pièce de Wilde est un chef-d'œuvre d'esprit élégant et d'artifice. Ici, hélas, elle s'effondre comme un soufflé trop cuit.
back_translation: Properly managed, Wilde's play is a masterpiece of elegant wit and artifice. Here, alas, it collapses like an overcooked soufflé.

text: the roadworkers are mates from way back , and each weekend they go out to an old goldmining site hoping to strike it rich .
translation: Les ouvriers routiers sont des amis de longue date, et chaque week-end, ils se rendent dans une vieille mine d'or en espérant faire fortune.
back_translation: The road workers are long-time friends, and every weekend they go to an old gold mine hoping to strike it rich.

text: once again , the intelligence of gay audiences has been grossly underestimated , and a meaty plot and well-developed characters have been sacrificed for skin and flash that barely fizzle .
translation: Encore une fois, l'intelligence des publics gays a été grandement sous-estimée, et une intrigue substantielle ainsi que des personnages bien développés ont été sacrifiés au profit de chair et de superficialité qui à peine pétillent.
back_translation: Once again, the intelligence of gay audiences has been greatly underestimated, and a substantial plot as well as well-developed characters have been sacrificed in favor of superficiality and shallow content that barely sparkles.

text: you 'll have more fun setting fire to yourself in the parking lot . you 'll be more entertained getting hit by a bus .
translation: tu t'amuseras davantage à t'enflammer dans le parking. tu seras plus diverti en te faisant heurter par un bus.
back_translation: You will have more fun getting excited in the parking lot. You will be more entertained getting hit by a bus.

text: often self-consciously surreal , this award-winner scores high for originality .
translation: souvent surréaliste de manière autoconsciente, ce lauréat de prix obtient un score élevé en originalité.
back_translation: often surreal in a self-aware manner, this award-winning individual scores high on originality.

text: moore 's complex and important film is also , believe it or not , immensely entertaining , a david and goliath story that 's still very much playing itself out .
translation: Le film complexe et important de Moore est aussi, croyez-le ou non, immensément divertissant, une histoire de David et Goliath qui se déroule encore très activement.
back_translation: Moore's complex and important film is also, believe it or not, immensely entertaining, a David and Goliath story that is still unfolding very actively.

text: whether it 's the fbi swooping in to rescue us in mississippi burning or a fearless teacher storming a `` ghetto `` school to prove our youth can learn as in dangerous minds , we are often offended by such cinematic myths that are more interested in appeasing white liberal sensibilities than raising complex questions about what whites must truly sacrifice if they are sincere about ending racial injustice .
translation: Que ce soit le FBI jetant un coup d'œil pour nous sauver dans Mississippi Burning ou un enseignant intrépide envahissant une école "ghetto" pour prouver que notre jeunesse peut apprendre comme dans Dangerous Minds, nous sommes souvent offensés par de tels mythes cinématographiques qui s'intéressent plus à apaiser les sensibilités libérales blanches qu'à poser des questions complexes sur ce que les blancs doivent vraiment sacrifier s'ils sont sincères dans leur volonté de mettre fin à l'injustice raciale.
back_translation: Whether it's the FBI casting a glance to save us in Mississippi Burning or a fearless teacher invading a "ghetto" school to prove that our youth can learn as in Dangerous Minds, we are often offended by such cinematic myths that are more concerned with placating white liberal sensibilities than with asking complex questions about what whites really have to sacrifice if they are sincere in their desire to end racial injustice.

text: sebastien cortez is an up and coming film maker who has just gotten his big break in `` the biz . ``
translation: Sébastien Cortez est un réalisateur prometteur qui vient de décrocher sa grande chance dans `` le métier . ``
back_translation: Sébastien Cortez is a promising director who has just landed his big break in "the business."

text: tends to pile too many `` serious issues `` on its plate at times , yet remains fairly light , always entertaining , and smartly written .
translation: tend à empiler trop de "sujets sérieux" à la fois, tout en restant assez léger, toujours divertissant et intelligemment écrit.
back_translation: tends to pile up too many "serious topics" at once, while remaining light enough, always entertaining and intelligently written.

text: the way coppola professes his love for movies -- both colorful pop junk and the classics that unequivocally qualify as art -- is giddily entertaining .
translation: la façon dont Coppola professé son amour pour les films -- tant pour les déchets pop colorés que pour les classiques qui sont indiscutablement qualifiés d'art -- est délicieusement divertissante.
back_translation: The way Coppola professed his love for films -- both for colorful pop trash and for the classics that are undeniably considered art -- is delightfully entertaining.

text: ben has a way of making trouble for julie .
translation: Ben a une façon de causer des problèmes pour Julie.
back_translation: Ben has a way of causing trouble for Julie.

text: a spellbinding african film about the modern condition of rootlessness , a state experienced by millions around the globe .
translation: un film africain captivant sur la condition moderne de l'absence de racines, un état vécu par des millions de personnes à travers le monde.
back_translation: A captivating African film about the modern condition of being rootless, a state experienced by millions of people around the world.

text: this gently retro story of a young morman missionary in the pacific islands of tonga loses some wholesomeness points due to some smug insularity .
translation: Cette histoire légèrement rétro d'un jeune missionnaire mormon dans les îles du Pacifique, à Tonga, perd quelques points de pureté en raison d'une certaine insularité suffisante.
back_translation: This slightly retro story of a young Mormon missionary in the Pacific Islands, in Tonga, loses some points of purity due to a certain sufficient insularity.

text: meanwhile , assistant chief holland , the only man in the department willing to stand up to the sis , threatens to end perry 's brand of singlehanded `` justice `` on the los angeles streets .
translation: Pendant ce temps, le chef adjoint Holland, le seul homme du département prêt à s'opposer aux SIS, menace de mettre fin à la marque de « justice » à lui tout seul de Perry dans les rues de Los Angeles.
back_translation: In the meantime, Deputy Chief Holland, the only man in the department willing to stand up to the SIS, threatens to put an end to Perry's solo "justice" brand on the streets of Los Angeles.

text: tired , bruised and out of breath , they finally free the professor and arrive at the temple of faramundi scant minutes before gallo and his men .
translation: Éreintés, couverts de contusions et essoufflés, ils libèrent enfin le professeur et arrivent au temple de Faramundi quelques minutes seulement avant Gallo et ses hommes.
back_translation: Exhausted, covered in bruises and out of breath, they finally free the professor and arrive at the temple of Faramundi just a few minutes before Gallo and his men.

text: fbi agent will graham has been called out of early retirement to catch a serial killer , known by authorities as `` the tooth fairy `` .
translation: L'agent du FBI Will Graham a été rappelé de sa retraite anticipée pour attraper un tueur en série, connu des autorités sous le nom de « la Fée des dents ».

text: the story revolves around lucy kelson ( bullock ) , a brilliant but neurotic attorney , and her client ( grant ) , who is `` charming , irresponsible and fabulously wealthy . ``

text: mostly centered on indianapolis , this film puts this problem ( which many assume to be an urban phenomenon ) firmly in the heartland of the usa .

text: slackers ' jokey approach to college education is disappointingly simplistic -- the film 's biggest problem -- and there are no unforgettably stupid stunts or uproariously rude lines of dialogue to remember it by .
translation: L'approche moqueuse des fainéants envers l'éducation universitaire est décevamment simpliste - le plus grand problème du film - et il n'y a ni cascades inoubliablement stupides ni répliques outrageusement vulgaires à en retenir.
back_translation: The mocking attitude of the lazy towards higher education is disappointingly simplistic - the film's biggest problem - and there are neither unforgettably stupid stunts nor outrageously vulgar lines to remember.

text: what should have been a cutting hollywood satire is instead about as fresh as last week 's issue of variety .
translation: ce qui aurait dû être une satire percutante d'Hollywood est en réalité aussi frais que le numéro de la semaine dernière de Variety.
back_translation: What should have been a biting satire of Hollywood is actually as fresh as last week's issue of Variety.

text: when an international criminal ( dacascos ) kidnaps the daughter of a gang leader ( dmx ) as part of a diamond heist , it causes a city 's police to engage in an intensive search ( led by a government agent played by li ) , aided by the father 's gangsters .
translation: Quand un criminel international (Dacascos) kidnappe la fille d'un chef de gang (DMX) dans le cadre d'un vol de diamants, cela incite la police d'une ville à entreprendre une recherche intensive (dirigée par un agent gouvernemental joué par Li), aidée par les gangsters du père.
back_translation: When an international criminal (Dacascos) kidnaps the daughter of a gang leader (DMX) as part of a diamond heist, it prompts the police of a city to undertake an intensive search (led by a government agent played by Li), aided by the father's gangsters.

text: while she is away a strange man with an axe comes into the motel room and attacks matt .
translation: Pendant son absence, un homme étrange avec une hache entre dans la chambre du motel et attaque Matt.

text: brosnan gives a portrayal as solid and as perfect as his outstanding performance as bond in die another day .

text: for those who like quirky , slightly strange french films , this is a must !

text: for the most part , director anne-sophie birot 's first feature is a sensitive , extraordinarily well-acted drama .
translation: Dans l'ensemble, le premier long métrage de la réalisatrice Anne-Sophie Birot est un drame sensible, extraordinairement bien interprété.
back_translation: Overall, the first feature film by director Anne-Sophie Birot is a sensitive drama, extraordinarily well acted.

text: a good-natured ensemble comedy that tries hard to make the most of a bumper cast , but never quite gets off the ground .

back_translation: A wholesome ensemble comedy that tries to make the most of a large cast but never really manages to take off.

text: adding to the situation is a killer hurricane bearing down on the island .

text: `` the best disney movie since the lion king ``

text: this is mild-mannered , been-there material given a pedestrian spin by a director who needed a touch of the flamboyant , the outrageous .

back_translation: It is a kind and tried material given a mundane twist by a director who needed a touch of flamboyance, of outrageousness.

text: andrew is infatuated with sannah and fantazises about her but believes there 's no chance she will like him if she gets to know him , so he decides it 's better they never meet for real . . .
translation: Andrew est amoureux de Sannah et fantase à son sujet, mais il croit qu'il n'y a aucune chance qu'elle l'aime si elle apprend à le connaître, alors il décide qu'il vaut mieux qu'ils ne se rencontrent jamais en vrai...
back_translation: Andrew is in love with Sannah and fantasizes about her, but he believes there is no chance she would love him if she got to know him, so he decides it's better that they never meet in person...

text: it is the first time ever that he leaves the desolate village in the balkan mountains .
translation: C'est la première fois qu'il quitte le village désolé dans les montagnes des Balkans.

text: truth is stranger than fiction , so the old saying goes . in 'catch me if you can , ' it 's also more entertaining .
translation: La vérité est plus étrange que la fiction, comme le dit vieux dicton. Dans 'Attrape-moi si tu peux', c'est aussi plus divertissant.
back_translation: Truth is stranger than fiction, as the old saying goes. In 'Catch Me If You Can', it is also more entertaining.

text: large budget notwithstanding , the movie is such a blip on the year 's radar screen that it 's tempting just to go with it for the ride . but this time , the old mib label stands for milder is n't better .
translation: Malgré un budget important, le film est un tel point insignifiant sur l'écran radar de l'année qu'il est tentant de simplement le suivre pour le trajet. Mais cette fois, l'ancien label mib signifie que moins fort n'est pas mieux.
back_translation: Despite a significant budget, the film is such an insignificant blip on this year's radar that it's tempting to just follow it for the ride. But this time, the old mib label means that less loud is not better.

text: while the topic has grown heavier here , [ moretti 's ] touch has not , and that disparity is precisely what gives the film its sustained poignancy .
translation: Bien que le sujet soit devenu plus lourd ici, la touche de [Moretti] n’a pas changé, et cette disparité est précisément ce qui donne au film sa poignante intensité.
back_translation: Although the subject has become heavier here, [Moretti]'s touch has not changed, and this disparity is precisely what gives the film its poignant intensity.

translation: Un meurtre dans le camp lui donne l'occasion de mettre en œuvre un plan risqué.

text: hot on the trail of the principle villains , bond travels to iceland where he experiences at first hand the power of an amazing new weapon before a dramatic confrontation with his main adversary back in korea where it all started . . .
translation: à la poursuite des principaux méchants, Bond se rend en Islande où il fait l'expérience de la puissance d'une nouvelle arme incroyable avant une confrontation dramatique avec son principal adversaire de retour en Corée, là où tout a commencé...
back_translation: In pursuit of the main villains, Bond travels to Iceland where he experiences the power of an incredible new weapon before a dramatic confrontation with his main adversary back in Korea, where it all began...

text: partly because of the severe regime of a dreadful nurse , the five decide to escape from their new home and go back to the old one under their own steam .
translation: en partie à cause du régime sévère d'une infirmière épouvantable, les cinq décident de s'échapper de leur nouveau foyer et de retourner à l'ancien par leurs propres moyens.
back_translation: Partly due to the strict regime of an awful nurse, the five decide to escape from their new home and return to the old one by their own means.

text: this fairy tale beginning freefalls from happy to disastrous as the newlyweds are besieged by emotionally challenged children , a savagily jealous ex-wife and a drunken dad .
translation: Ce conte de fées passe d'un bonheur initial à un désastre alors que les jeunes mariés sont assiégés par des enfants en proie à des difficultés émotionnelles, une ex-femme sauvagement jalouse et un père ivre.
back_translation: This fairy tale goes from an initial happiness to a disaster as the newlyweds are besieged by emotionally troubled children, a fiercely jealous ex-wife, and a drunken father.

text: fresh out of prison , dara is on a mission to scatter her mother 's ashes in lake superior .

translation: Après avoir découvert un paquebot porté manquant depuis 1962 dérivant sur la mer de Bering, des sauveteurs revendiquent le navire comme étant le leur.
back_translation: After discovering a cruise ship that had been missing since 1962 drifting in the Bering Sea, rescuers claim the vessel as their own.

text: it also touches on the encroachment of christianity brought by the missionaries , which is at odds with mepe 's tribal and traditional roots .

text: the story is familiar from its many predecessors ; like them , it eventually culminates in the not-exactly -stunning insight that crime does n't pay .
translation: L'histoire est familière grâce à ses nombreux prédécesseurs ; comme eux, elle culmine finalement dans l'idée pas vraiment frappante que le crime ne paie pas.
back_translation: The story is familiar thanks to its many predecessors; like them, it ultimately culminates in the not-so-striking idea that crime does not pay.

text: graM-gas M-`s interaM-gM-ues entre seus personagens , o filme torna-se nM-co apenas uma histM-sria divertida sobre uma curiosa perseguiM-gM-co , mas tambM-im um belo estudo de personagens .
translation: Grâce aux interactions entre ses personnages, le film devient non seulement une histoire divertissante sur une curieuse poursuite, mais aussi une belle étude des personnages.
back_translation: Thanks to the interactions between its characters, the film becomes not only an entertaining story about a curious pursuit but also a beautiful character study.

text: hawn lets it all hang out in this film and i have to admire her guts . sarandon is equally bold and daring in her portrayal of a woman who has lost her way in a closet full of beige suits .
translation: Hawn se lâche complètement dans ce film et je dois admirer son courage. Sarandon est tout aussi audacieuse et téméraire dans son interprétation d'une femme qui a perdu son chemin dans un placard rempli de costumes beiges.
back_translation: Hawn completely lets loose in this film, and I have to admire her courage. Sarandon is just as bold and reckless in her portrayal of a woman who has lost her way in a closet filled with beige costumes.

text: even if it is generally amusing from time to time , i spy has all the same problems the majority of action comedies have .
translation: Même si c'est généralement amusant de temps en temps, I Spy a tout de même les mêmes problèmes que la majorité des comédies d'action.
back_translation: Even though it's generally fun from time to time, I Spy still has the same problems as most action comedies.

text: it teaches the importance and understanding of life and death . it

text: sure to stir up some controversy , callous sentiment is a true depiction of how violence can affect ones psyche .
translation: Certain de susciter une controverse, un sentiment insensible est une véritable représentation de la manière dont la violence peut affecter la psyché d'un individu.
back_translation: Sure to spark controversy, an insensitive feeling is a true representation of how violence can affect an individual's psyche.

text: reign of fire may be little more than another platter of reheated aliens , but it 's still pretty tasty .
translation: Le règne du feu n'est peut-être guère plus qu'un autre plat de mauvais réchauffé d'Alien, mais c'est quand même assez savoureux.

text: now the inmates are retaliating , with seagal and ja rule leading them .
translation: maintenant les détenus se rebellent, avec Seagal et Ja Rule à leur tête.

text: concerned that his son is going to embarrass him during his campaign to become the governor of california , brad 's wealthy father and his campaign manager ( underwood ) , hire two juilliard-trained actors ( diggs and anderson ) to disguise themselves as `` real life gangstaz `` , and kidnap his son , dropping him off in the `` real hood `` in compton , in an effort to scare the ghettofied attitude and behavior out of him .
translation: préoccupé par le fait que son fils va l'embarrasser pendant sa campagne pour devenir gouverneur de Californie, le père riche de Brad et son directeur de campagne (Underwood) engagent deux acteurs formés à Juilliard (Diggs et Anderson) pour se déguiser en "vrais gangsters" et kidnappent son fils, le laissant dans le "vrai quartier" à Compton, dans le but de lui faire perdre son attitude et son comportement ghettoïsés.
back_translation: Worried that his son will embarrass him during his campaign to become governor of California, Brad's wealthy father and his campaign manager (Underwood) hire two Juilliard-trained actors (Diggs and Anderson) to disguise themselves as "real gangsters" and kidnap his son, leaving him in the "real neighborhood" in Compton, with the aim of making him lose his ghetto attitude and behavior.

text: after being handcuffed to new york city 's 'a ' train by his prep school friends ( keith , perabo , hayward ) , young karim ( mehta ) is forced to ride all the way to the last stop , far rockaway .
translation: Après avoir été menotté au train 'A' de New York par ses amis de l'école préparatoire (Keith, Perabo, Hayward), le jeune Karim (Mehta) est contraint de faire tout le trajet jusqu'à la dernière station, Far Rockaway.
back_translation: After being handcuffed to the 'A' train in New York by his prep school friends (Keith, Perabo, Hayward), young Karim (Mehta) is forced to make the entire journey to the last station, Far Rockaway.

text: the chateau cleverly probes the cross-cultural differences between gauls and yanks .
translation: le château examine habilement les différences interculturelles entre les Gaulois et les Yanks.
back_translation: The castle skillfully examines the intercultural differences between the Gauls and the Yanks.

text: an eager young englishman is dispatched to sarawak to become part of the british colonial government , encounters some unorthodox local traditions , and finds himself faced with tough decisions of the heart involving the beautiful young selima , the unwitting object of his affections .
translation: Un jeune Anglais enthousiaste est envoyé à Sarawak pour faire partie du gouvernement colonial britannique, rencontre des traditions locales peu orthodoxes et se trouve confronté à de difficiles décisions du cœur impliquant la belle jeune Selima, l'objet involontaire de ses affections.
back_translation: An enthusiastic young Englishman is sent to Sarawak to be part of the British colonial government, encounters unorthodox local traditions, and faces difficult decisions of the heart involving the beautiful young Selima, the unwitting object of his affections.

text: is anyone else out there getting tired of the whole slo-mo , double-pistoled , ballistic-pyrotechnic hong kong action aesthetic ?
translation: Est-ce que quelqu'un d'autre en a marre de toute cette esthétique d'action de Hong Kong en slo-mo, avec des pistolets doubles et des effets pyrotechniques balistiques ?
back_translation: Is anyone else tired of all this slow-motion Hong Kong action aesthetics, with dual pistols and ballistic pyrotechnic effects?

text: it does n't do a lot of deep thinking , but unlike many futuristic combos of sf and f/x , it does make a statement : freedom of opinion is a threat to totalitarian systems .
translation: Cela ne pousse pas à beaucoup de réflexion profonde, mais contrairement à de nombreuses combinaisons futuristes de science-fiction et d'effets spéciaux, cela fait une déclaration : la liberté d'opinion est une menace pour les systèmes totalitaires.
back_translation: This does not lead to much deep reflection, but unlike many futuristic science fiction combinations and special effects, it makes a statement: freedom of opinion is a threat to totalitarian systems.

text: it 's impossible to duplicate the shock of the 11-year-old lambs , but the new film succeeds at creating nerve-tightening moments of suspense .
translation: Il est impossible de reproduire le choc des agneaux de 11 ans, mais le nouveau film réussit à créer des moments de suspense qui mettent les nerfs à rude épreuve.
back_translation: It is impossible to recreate the impact of "The Lambs' Shock" from 11 years ago, but the new film manages to create moments of suspense that put the nerves to the test.

text: holland lets things peter out midway , but it 's notably better acted -- and far less crass - than some other recent efforts in the burgeoning genre of films about black urban professionals .
translation: Holland laisse les choses s'étirer à mi-parcours, mais c'est remarquablement mieux joué - et beaucoup moins vulgaire - que certaines autres efforts récents dans le genre en plein essor des films sur les professionnels urbains noirs.
back_translation: Holland lets things stretch out halfway, but it is remarkably better played - and much less vulgar - than some other recent efforts in the booming genre of films about urban black professionals.

text: it 's supposed to be post-feminist breezy but ends up as tedious as the chatter of parrots raised on oprah .
translation: Censé être post-féministe léger, il finit par être aussi ennuyeux que le bavardage de perroquets élevés par Oprah.
back_translation: Supposed to be light post-feminist, it ends up being as boring as the chatter of parrots raised by Oprah.

text: only one person has the power to save the princess , a priestess .
translation: seule une personne a le pouvoir de sauver la princesse, une prêtresse.

translation: le genre de femmes qui possèdent chaque pièce dans laquelle elles entrent, et qui considèrent tous les hommes comme des 'garçons'.
back_translation: the kind of women who own every room they enter, and who regard all men as 'boys'.

text: so saccharine , i 'm not sure i 'd be able to take it under normal conditions .
translation: si sucré, je ne suis pas sûr de pouvoir le supporter dans des conditions normales.
back_translation: If it's sweet, I'm not sure I can handle it under normal conditions.

text: young police officer filipo ( giovanni ribisi ) descends into philippa 's life , changing her bleak outlook on existence into one in search of tranquility among corruption , as they become unlikely soul mates and lovers .
translation: Le jeune policier Filipo (Giovanni Ribisi) pénètre dans la vie de Philippa, transformant sa vision sombre de l'existence en une quête de tranquillité au milieu de la corruption, alors qu'ils deviennent des âmes sœurs et des amants peu ordinaires.
back_translation: Young police officer Filipo (Giovanni Ribisi) enters Philippa's life, transforming her dark view of existence into a quest for tranquility amid corruption, as they become soulmates and unusual lovers.

text: besides the fact that he is still disliked by professor snape ( alan rickman ) and hated by draco malfoy ( tom felton ) , harry gets off to a great start with his two best friends , ron weasly ( rupert grint ) and hermione granger ( emma watson ) , and famous writer gilderoy lockhart ( kenneth branagh ) has joined the hogwarts staff and is the new defense against the dark arts teacher .
translation: En plus du fait qu'il est toujours détesté par le professeur Snape (Alan Rickman) et haï par Draco Malfoy (Tom Felton), Harry commence fort avec ses deux meilleurs amis, Ron Weasley (Rupert Grint) et Hermione Granger (Emma Watson), et le célèbre écrivain Gilderoy Lockhart (Kenneth Branagh) a rejoint le personnel de Poudlard en tant que nouveau professeur de Défense contre les forces du Mal.
back_translation: In addition to being continuously hated by Professor Snape (Alan Rickman) and despised by Draco Malfoy (Tom Felton), Harry starts off strong with his two best friends, Ron Weasley (Rupert Grint) and Hermione Granger (Emma Watson), and the famous writer Gilderoy Lockhart (Kenneth Branagh) has joined the Hogwarts staff as the new Defense Against the Dark Arts teacher.

text: claude miller airs out a tight plot with an easy pace and a focus on character drama over crime-film complications .
translation: Claude Miller déroule une intrigue serrée avec un rythme facile et une attention portée au drame des personnages plutôt qu'aux complications du film policier.
back_translation: Claude Miller unfolds a tight plot with an easy pace and focuses on the characters' drama rather than the complexities of the crime film.

text: just teetering south of puberty , young thomas harris has discovered that instead of looking at stars , he can use his new telescope to study the beautiful woman next door .
translation: Juste en équilibre au sud de la puberté, le jeune Thomas Harris a découvert qu'au lieu de regarder les étoiles, il peut utiliser son nouveau télescope pour étudier la belle femme d'à côté.
back_translation: Just balanced south of puberty, young Thomas Harris discovered that instead of looking at the stars, he can use his new telescope to study the beautiful woman next door.

text: they call themselves d . e . b . s .
translation: elles s'appellent d . e . b . s .

text: it 's another stale , kill-by-numbers flick , complete with blade-thin characters and terrible , pun-laden dialogue .
translation: C'est un autre film banal, où l'on tue selon un schéma fixé, rempli de personnages ultraminces et de dialogues terribles, remplis de jeux de mots.
back_translation: It's just another mediocre film, where killing follows a set pattern, filled with ultra-thin characters and terrible dialogues, full of puns.

text: a light-hearted and high-spirited story , full of spice , sensuality and romance , viva zapato tells the tale of dolores , a beautiful cuban dancer who decides to leave her failing marriage and open a restaurant by the beach with her aunt from brazil .
translation: Une histoire légère et pleine d'entrain, pleine d'épices, de sensualité et de romance, Viva Zapato raconte l'histoire de Dolores, une belle danseuse cubaine qui décide de quitter son mariage en déclin et d'ouvrir un restaurant au bord de la mer avec sa tante du Brésil.
back_translation: A light and upbeat story, full of spice, sensuality, and romance, Viva Zapato tells the story of Dolores, a beautiful Cuban dancer who decides to leave her declining marriage and open a seaside restaurant with her aunt from Brazil.

text: there 's a story that goes around the town of darkness falls about her , and she 's called the tooth fairy .
translation: Il y a une histoire qui circule dans la ville de Darkness Falls à son sujet, et on l'appelle la fée des dents.
back_translation: There is a story that circulates in the town of Darkness Falls about her, and she is called the Tooth Fairy.

text: if myers decides to make another austin powers movie , maybe he should just stick with austin and dr evil .
translation: Si Myers décide de faire un autre film d'Austin Powers, peut-être devrait-il simplement rester avec Austin et Dr. Evil.

text: after tracking down the assassin , she is killed before any information can be driven out of her .
translation: Après avoir retrouvé l'assassin, elle est tuée avant que des informations ne puissent être tirées d'elle.
back_translation: After finding the assassin, she is killed before any information can be extracted from her.

text: beautiful , angry and sad , with a curious sick poetry , as if the marquis de sade had gone in for pastel landscapes .
translation: beau, en colère et triste, avec une poésie malade et curieuse, comme si le marquis de Sade s'était mis aux paysages pastel.

text: he checks into a rehab clinic that specializes in treating law enforcement officials .
