text: de niro may enjoy the same free ride from critics afforded to clint eastwood in the lazy bloodwork . but like bruce springsteen 's gone-to-pot asbury park , new jersey , this sad-sack waste of a movie is a city of ruins .
translation: De Niro pourrait bénéficier du même traitement privilégié de la part des critiques accordé à Clint Eastwood dans le paresseux "Blood Work". Mais tout comme le "Asbury Park" de Bruce Springsteen, devenu désolant, ce film lamentable est une ville en ruines.
back_translation: De Niro could receive the same privileged treatment from critics that Clint Eastwood received in the lazy "Blood Work." But just like Bruce Springsteen's "Asbury Park," which became disheartening, this lamentable film is a ruined town.

text: now , after having an encounter with a hollywood producer who got lost in virgil grove , is asked if he would like to come back to hollywood to direct a feature movie .
translation: Maintenant, après avoir rencontré un producteur hollywoodien qui s'est perdu dans Virgil Grove, il lui est demandé s'il aimerait revenir à Hollywood pour réaliser un long métrage.
back_translation: Now, after meeting a Hollywood producer who got lost in Virgil Grove, he is asked if he would like to return to Hollywood to direct a feature film.

text: . . . a fascinating curiosity piece -- fascinating , that is , for about ten minutes . after that it becomes long and tedious like a classroom play in a college history course .
translation: . . . une pièce de curiosité fascinante -- fascinante, en effet, pendant environ dix minutes. Après cela, elle devient longue et ennuyeuse comme une pièce de théâtre en classe dans un cours d'histoire universitaire.
back_translation: ... a fascinating piece of curiosity -- fascinating, indeed, for about ten minutes. After that, it becomes long and boring like a classroom play in a university history course.

text: thomas ' wish comes true and he stays up all night watching her .

text: as a fire chief , quinn ( christian bales ) is responsable for warding off the beasts and keeping a community alive as they eke out a meager existence .

text: the director seems to take an unseemly pleasure in [ the characters ' ] misery and at the same time to congratulate himself for having the guts to confront it .
translation: Le directeur semble prendre un plaisir indécent dans la misère des personnages et en même temps se féliciter d'avoir le courage de l'affronter.
back_translation: The director seems to take an indecent pleasure in the misery of the characters while simultaneously congratulating himself for having the courage to face it.

back_translation: all the more troubling for its relatively gore-free allusions to serial murders, but it fails in its attempts to humanize its subject.

text: may be the most undeserving victim of critical overkill since town and country .

text: moore provides an invaluable service by sparking debate and encouraging thought . better still , he does all of this , and more , while remaining one of the most savagely hilarious social critics this side of jonathan swift .
translation: Moore offre un service inestimable en suscitant le débat et en encourageant la réflexion. Mieux encore, il fait tout cela, et plus encore, tout en restant l'un des critiques sociaux les plus sauvagement hilarants de ce côté de Jonathan Swift.
back_translation: Moore provides an invaluable service by stimulating debate and encouraging reflection. Better yet, he does all of this, and more, while remaining one of the most uproariously hilarious social critics on this side of Jonathan Swift.

text: lejos del paraM-mso es al mismo tiempo una fiesta para los ojos y oM-mdos y un movilizador cuadro de personajes enfrentados a sus propios deseos , miedos y prejuicios .

text: the noble tradition of men in drag hits an all-time low in sorority boys , whose makers apparently believe that women 's clothing can cover up any deficiency in acting , writing or direction .
translation: la noble tradition des hommes en drag atteint un niveau historiquement bas dans Sorority Boys, dont les créateurs croient apparemment que les vêtements féminins peuvent dissimuler toute insuffisance en matière de jeu, d'écriture ou de direction.
back_translation: The noble tradition of men in drag reaches a historically low point in Sorority Boys, whose creators apparently believe that women's clothing can hide any shortcomings in acting, writing, or directing.

text: she arrives with every intent of selling it all off and going back to her busy career , but in going through her grandmother 's belongings , she discovers much about her family 's past which ultimately makes her re-evaluate her life and values .
translation: Elle arrive avec l'intention de tout vendre et de retourner à sa carrière chargée, mais en fouillant dans les affaires de sa grand-mère, elle découvre beaucoup sur le passé de sa famille, ce qui la pousse finalement à réévaluer sa vie et ses valeurs.
back_translation: She arrives with the intention of selling everything and returning to her busy career, but while rummaging through her grandmother's belongings, she discovers a lot about her family's past, which ultimately leads her to reevaluate her life and values.

text: disturbing for its unabashed honesty , our cast of characters both love and despise each other , their very actions acknowledging the pressures inherent in a tightly bonded peer group .
translation: Perturbant par son honnêteté sans réserve, notre groupe de personnages s'aime et se méprise mutuellement, leurs actions reconnaissant les pressions inhérentes à un groupe d'amis étroitement soudé.
back_translation: Disturbed by their unreserved honesty, our group of characters loves and despises each other mutually, their actions acknowledging the inherent pressures of a closely-knit group of friends.

text: the plot revolves around a young married woman whose mundane life takes a turn for the worse when she strikes up a passionate and illicit affair with an oddball discount-store stock boy who thinks he 's holden caulfield .
translation: L'intrigue tourne autour d'une jeune femme mariée dont la vie monotone prend une tournure désastreuse lorsqu'elle entame une liaison passionnée et illicite avec un apprenti de magasin à prix réduits excentrique qui pense qu'il est Holden Caulfield.
back_translation: The plot revolves around a young married woman whose monotonous life takes a disastrous turn when she begins a passionate and illicit affair with an eccentric thrift store apprentice who thinks he is Holden Caulfield.

text: but , things go frightfully wrong and the game turns into a struggle to make it out of the house alive .

text: walter hill 's pulpy , stylized boxing melodrama undisputed nearly overcomes its questionable in-the-ring match-up with solid fight choreography and gritty prison authenticity .
translation: Le mélodrame stylisé et pulp de Walter Hill, Undisputed, surmonte presque son face-à-face contestable sur le ring grâce à une chorégraphie de combat solide et une authenticité pénitentiaire saisissante.
back_translation: Walter Hill's stylized and pulpy melodrama, Undisputed, almost overcomes its questionable face-off in the ring thanks to solid fight choreography and striking prison authenticity.

text: the problem is the needlessly poor quality of its archival prints and film footage . the images lack contrast , are murky and are frequently too dark to be decipherable .
translation: Le problème est la qualité inutilement médiocre de ses impressions d'archives et de ses séquences filmées. Les images manquent de contraste, sont floues et sont souvent trop sombres pour être déchiffrables.
back_translation: The problem is the unnecessarily poor quality of its archival prints and filmed sequences. The images lack contrast, are blurry, and are often too dark to be decipherable.

text: recently ordained a priest , 24-year-old father amaro is sent to a small parish church in los reyes , mexico to assist the aging father benito in his daily work .

back_translation: Recently ordained as a priest, Father Amaro, 24 years old, is sent to a small parish church in Los Reyes, Mexico, to assist the aging Father Benito in his daily work.

text: one of the threads follows the brand new ( unmarried ) prime minister ( grant ) of the united kingdom , who on his first day in 10 downing street falls in love with the girl ( mccutcheon ) who brings him his tea ( thompson plays his sister ; rickman plays her husband ) .
translation: Un des fils conducteurs suit le tout nouveau (célibataire) premier ministre (Grant) du Royaume-Uni, qui, le premier jour à 10 Downing Street, tombe amoureux de la jeune fille (McCutcheon) qui lui apporte son thé (Thompson joue son sœur ; Rickman joue son mari).
back_translation: One of the storylines follows the brand new (single) Prime Minister (Grant) of the United Kingdom, who, on his first day at 10 Downing Street, falls in love with the young woman (McCutcheon) who brings him his tea (Thompson plays her sister; Rickman plays her husband).

back_translation: But it is Lohman's film. Her performance swings between sorrow and rebellion as she continually tries to adapt in order to fit in and gain the unconditional love she is seeking.

translation: juste avant Pâques 2001, un semi-remorque chargé de 40 000 bouteilles de bière a fait un accident dans la rivière Tweed à la périphérie de la ville de Murwillumbah, dans le nord de la Nouvelle-Galles du Sud (connue sous le nom de "Murbah" par les habitants).
back_translation: Just before Easter 2001, a semi-trailer loaded with 40,000 bottles of beer had an accident in the Tweed River on the outskirts of the town of Murwillumbah in northern New South Wales (known as "Murbah" by the locals).

text: `` on the afternoon of july 1 , 1981 , los angeles police responded to a distress call at 8763 wonderland avenue and soon discovered a grisly quadruple homicide , later compared to the gruesome slaughter at the tate household at the hands of the charles manson family 10 years earlier .
translation: L'après-midi du 1er juillet 1981, la police de Los Angeles a répondu à un appel de détresse au 8763 Wonderland Avenue et a rapidement découvert un meurtre quadruple macabre, comparé plus tard au terrible massacre de la famille Tate aux mains de la famille Charles Manson 10 ans plus tôt.
back_translation: On the afternoon of July 1, 1981, the Los Angeles police responded to a distress call at 8763 Wonderland Avenue and quickly discovered a gruesome quadruple murder, later compared to the horrific Tate family massacre at the hands of the Charles Manson family 10 years earlier.

text: daphne , a seventeen-year-old girl from new york goes to england in search of her father , who does not know he had a child with an american girlfriend he met while working in morocco , and whose aristocratic family did not approve of the woman .
translation: Daphne, une fille de dix-sept ans originaire de New York, se rend en Angleterre à la recherche de son père, qui n'est pas au courant qu'il a un enfant d'une petite amie américaine rencontrée alors qu'il travaillait au Maroc, et dont la famille aristocratique n'approuvait pas la femme.
back_translation: Daphne, a seventeen-year-old girl from New York, travels to England in search of her father, who is unaware that he has a child from an American girlfriend he met while working in Morocco, and whose aristocratic family did not approve of the woman.

Kennedy, et les deux vieux compagnons vaillants s'engagent à combattre une entité égyptienne maléfique qui a choisi leur établissement de soins de longue durée comme son terrain de chasse.

translation: Maintenant, la vie de ces hommes ordinaires de l'Alberta est portée sur grand écran par le documentariste Ferral Mitchener dans une exploration des profondeurs de l'amitié, de la fragilité de la vie, du fait de grandir avec grâce et de l'art et de la science de boire de la bière comme un homme.

text: ronnie must then deal with his new life , while having to deal with missing his ex-wife that he left back home .
translation: Ronnie doit alors faire face à sa nouvelle vie, tout en devant gérer le manque de son ex-femme qu'il a laissée à la maison.
back_translation: Ronnie must then face his new life, all while dealing with the absence of his ex-wife whom he left at home.

text: photographed with melancholy richness and eloquently performed yet also decidedly uncinematic .
translation: photographié avec une richesse mélancolique et interprété de manière éloquente, mais aussi définitivement non cinématographique.
back_translation: photographed with a melancholic richness and interpreted eloquently, but also definitely non-cinematic.

text: it 's just hard to believe that a life like this can sound so dull .
translation: Il est juste difficile de croire qu'une vie comme celle-ci peut sembler si ennuyeuse.
back_translation: It's just hard to believe that a life like this can seem so boring.

text: a charming , vibrant , if under-edited adaptation of v . s . naipaul 's genially cynical novel .
translation: une adaptation charmante, vibrante, bien que peu retouchée, du roman gaiement cynique de v. s. naipaul.
back_translation: a charming, vibrant adaptation, although minimally edited, of the cheerfully cynical novel by v. s. naipaul.

text: and what better place for romance than coney island ?
translation: et quel meilleur endroit pour la romance que Coney Island ?
back_translation: And what better place for romance than Coney Island?

text: inspector mo eventually discovers through a tabloid magazine that a self-proclaimed psychic named shana had phoned a radio program on the day of the kidnapping to warn of the incident .
translation: L'inspecteur Mo découvre finalement à travers un magazine people qu'une voyante autoproclamée nommée Shana avait appelé une émission de radio le jour de l'enlèvement pour prévenir de l'incident.
back_translation: Inspector Mo ultimately discovers through a gossip magazine that a self-proclaimed psychic named Shana had called a radio show on the day of the kidnapping to warn about the incident.

text: stuffy , full of itself , morally ambiguous and nothing to shout about .
translation: prétentieux, plein de lui-même, moralement ambigu et rien de bien remarquable.
back_translation: pretentious, full of himself, morally ambiguous, and nothing particularly remarkable.

text: sheridan . . . smoothes over sources of conflict that could have lent the film a bit more depth .
translation: sheridan . . . applanit les sources de conflit qui auraient pu donner au film un peu plus de profondeur.
back_translation: Sheridan... clarifies the sources of conflict that could have given the film a bit more depth.

text: not only are the film 's sopranos gags incredibly dated and unfunny , they also demonstrate how desperate the makers of this 'we 're -doing-it-for -the-cash ' sequel were .
translation: Non seulement les gags de soprano du film sont incroyablement dépassés et pas drôles, mais ils montrent aussi à quel point les créateurs de cette suite 'on-le-fait-pour-l'argent' étaient désespérés.
back_translation: Not only are the soprano gags in the film incredibly outdated and not funny, but they also show how desperate the creators of this 'we're-doing-it-for-the-money' sequel were.

text: she knows that kanna is back but now she does not want to go back to him .
translation: Elle sait que Kanna est de retour, mais maintenant elle ne veut plus retourner vers lui.
back_translation: She knows that Kanna is back, but now she no longer wants to go back to him.

text: the mystery guests soon unleash a stiff sentence of their own , without parole , teaching the judge the consequence of doing unto others as you would have done unto you .
translation: les mystérieux invités imposent rapidement une peine sévère à leur tour, sans possibilité de liberté conditionnelle, enseignant au juge la conséquence de faire aux autres ce que l'on aimerait qu'on vous fasse.
back_translation: The mysterious guests quickly impose a harsh sentence on their turn, with no possibility of parole, teaching the judge the consequence of doing to others what one would like to be done to oneself.

text: with a romantic comedy plotline straight from the ages , this cinderella story does n't have a single surprise up its sleeve . but it does somehow manage to get you under its spell .
translation: Avec une intrigue de comédie romantique tout droit sortie des âges, cette histoire de Cendrillon n'a aucune surprise à offrir. Mais elle parvient tout de même à vous ensorceler.
back_translation: With a romantic comedy plot straight out of the ages, this Cinderella story has no surprises to offer. But it still manages to enchant you.

text: hoffman is understandably concerned about typecasting , but he is indeed the man for the job , recalling the intensity that nicholas cage brought to an oscar-winning performance in leaving las vegas .
translation: Hoffman est tout à fait préoccupé par le fait d'être cantonné à un type de rôle, mais il est en effet l'homme de la situation, rappelant l'intensité que Nicholas Cage a apportée à une performance qui a remporté un Oscar dans Leaving Las Vegas.
back_translation: Hoffman is quite concerned about being pigeonholed into one type of role, but he is indeed the man for the situation, recalling the intensity that Nicholas Cage brought to an Oscar-winning performance in Leaving Las Vegas.

text: a young novelist , tormented by his family 's history and haunted by the specter of his long-dead , more famous ancestor , falls in love with a woman , a distant relative of his ancestor , whose friends and family begin to disappear mysteriously .
translation: un jeune romancier, tourmenté par l'histoire de sa famille et hanté par le spectre de son ancêtre plus célèbre, mort depuis longtemps, tombe amoureux d'une femme, une lointaine parente de son ancêtre, dont les amis et la famille commencent à disparaître mystérieusement.
back_translation: A young novelist, tormented by the history of his family and haunted by the specter of his most famous ancestor, long dead, falls in love with a woman, a distant relative of his ancestor, whose friends and family start to mysteriously disappear.

text: montias . . . pumps a lot of energy into his nicely nuanced narrative and surrounds himself with a cast of quirky -- but not stereotyped -- street characters .
translation: Montias . . . injecte beaucoup d'énergie dans son récit subtilement nuancé et s'entoure d'une galerie de personnages de rue excentriques, mais pas stéréotypés.
back_translation: Montias injects a lot of energy into his subtly nuanced narrative and surrounds himself with a gallery of eccentric but not stereotypical street characters.

text: kudos to this first-time feature director for braiding his insider experience into something quite singular .
translation: Bravo à ce réalisateur débutant pour avoir tissé son expérience interne en quelque chose de tout à fait singulier.
back_translation: Congratulations to this novice director for weaving his internal experience into something truly unique.

text: she files for divorce , and marco makes a decision that will change all their lives .
translation: Elle demande le divorce, et Marco prend une décision qui changera leur vie à tous.
back_translation: She asks for a divorce, and Marco makes a decision that will change their lives forever.

text: what can one say about a balding 50-year-old actor playing an innocent boy carved from a log ?
translation: Que peut-on dire d'un acteur de 50 ans, en train de perdre ses cheveux, jouant un garçon innocent taillé dans une bûche ?
back_translation: What can be said about a 50-year-old actor, losing his hair, playing an innocent boy carved from a log?

text: because of being deeply moved from the sunflowers ' beautiness , he takes one of them as a sign for his love back to the city .
translation: à cause d'être profondément touché par la beauté des tournesols, il en prend un comme un signe pour son amour de retour en ville.
back_translation: Because he is deeply moved by the beauty of the sunflowers, he takes one as a sign for his love to return to the city.

text: bret packard is rich , famous , good-looking , and set to win his fourth championship ring .
translation: Bret Packard est riche, célèbre, beau et sur le point de remporter sa quatrième bague de championnat.
back_translation: Bret Packard is rich, famous, handsome, and about to win his fourth championship ring.

text: the movie has no respect for laws , political correctness or common decency , but it displays something more important : respect for its flawed , crazy people .
translation: le film n'a aucun respect pour les lois, la bienséance politique ou la décence commune, mais il montre quelque chose de plus important : le respect pour ses personnes imparfaites et folles.
back_translation: The film shows no respect for laws, political propriety, or common decency, but it reveals something more important: respect for its imperfect and crazy characters.

text: it does what good films do best ; that is to provoke us , push our buttons , make us think and maybe even entertain us in the process .
translation: il fait ce que les bons films font le mieux ; c'est-à-dire nous provoquer, appuyer sur nos boutons, nous faire réfléchir et peut-être même nous divertir au passage.
back_translation: It does what good films do best; that is to say, it provokes us, pushes our buttons, makes us think, and perhaps even entertains us along the way.

text: it 's hard to imagine that even very small children will be impressed by this tired retread .
translation: Il est difficile d'imaginer que même de très jeunes enfants seront impressionnés par cette ressuce fatiguée.
back_translation: It is hard to imagine that even very young children will be impressed by this tired rehash.

text: he led a bleak life , stuck in a boring routinity created by his ambition to become a sucessfull producer in one jakarta 's leading tv station .
translation: Il a mené une vie morose, coincé dans une routine ennuyeuse créée par son ambition de devenir un producteur à succès dans l'une des principales stations de télévision de Jakarta.
back_translation: He led a gloomy life, stuck in a boring routine created by his ambition to become a successful producer at one of the major television stations in Jakarta.

text: a nightmare date with a half-formed wit done a great disservice by a lack of critical distance and a sad trust in liberal arts college bumper sticker platitudes .
translation: un rendez-vous cauchemardesque avec un esprit à moitié formé, mal servi par un manque de distance critique et une triste confiance dans les platitudes des autocollants des collèges d'arts libéraux.
back_translation: a nightmarish encounter with a half-formed spirit, poorly served by a lack of critical distance and a sad trust in the platitudes of liberal arts college bumper stickers.

text: the group of best friends from their days back at east great falls high reunite for the next great sexual adventure in their lives . . .
translation: le groupe de meilleurs amis de leurs jours au lycée East Great Falls se retrouve pour la prochaine grande aventure sexuelle de leur vie . . .
back_translation: the group of best friends from their days at East Great Falls High School reunites for the next big sexual adventure of their lives . . .

text: earnest , unsubtle and hollywood-predictable , green dragon is still a deeply moving effort to put a human face on the travail of thousands of vietnamese .
translation: Sincère, peu subtil et prévisible à la Hollywood, "Green Dragon" est néanmoins un effort profondément émouvant pour humaniser le travail de milliers de Vietnamiens.
back_translation: Sincere, unsubtle, and predictable in a Hollywood way, "Green Dragon" is nevertheless a deeply moving effort to humanize the work of thousands of Vietnamese.

text: 20 , 000 years before , our planet is entering an ice age .
translation: Il y a 20 000 ans, notre planète entrait dans une ère glaciaire.
back_translation: 20,000 years ago, our planet was entering an ice age.

text: a poignant lyricism runs through balzac and the little chinese seamstress that transforms this story about love and culture into a cinematic poem .
translation: un lyrisme poignant traverse "Balzac et la Petite Tailleuse chinoise" qui transforme cette histoire d'amour et de culture en un poème cinématographique.
back_translation: A poignant lyricism runs through "Balzac and the Little Chinese Seamstress," which transforms this story of love and culture into a cinematic poem.

text: soderbergh seems capable only of delivering artfully lighted , earnest inquiries that lack the kind of genuine depth that would make them redeemable .
translation: Soderbergh semble capable uniquement de livrer des enquêtes soigneusement éclairées et sincères qui manquent de la profondeur véritable qui pourrait les rendre rachetées.
back_translation: Soderbergh seems only capable of delivering carefully illuminated and sincere investigations that lack the true depth that could redeem them.

text: kamel , a young man from the french ghetto , near paris , is coming back to france .
translation: Kamel, un jeune homme du ghetto français, près de Paris, revient en France.
back_translation: Kamel, a young man from the French ghetto near Paris, returns to France.

text: becomes a bit of a mishmash : a tearjerker that does n't and a thriller that wo n't .
translation: devenir un peu un disparate : un drame touchant qui ne l'est pas et un thriller qui ne l'est pas non plus.
back_translation: become a bit of a mishmash: a touching drama that isn't and a thriller that isn't either.

text: a publication that documents their culture and demonstrates how the real world can both destroy and enhance their idealistic one .
translation: une publication qui documente leur culture et montre comment le monde réel peut à la fois détruire et enrichir leur monde idéaliste.
back_translation: a publication that documents their culture and shows how the real world can both destroy and enrich their idealistic world.

text: the film narrates in a richly detailed , associative montage the boundless possibilities of manipulating images and using images to seduce .
translation: Le film raconte, à l'aide d'un montage richement détaillé et associatif, les possibilités infinies de manipuler des images et d'utiliser des images pour séduire.
back_translation: The film tells, through a richly detailed and associative montage, the infinite possibilities of manipulating images and using images to seduce.

text: `` what 's more important your experiences or your memories of them ? ``
translation: Qu'est-ce qui est plus important, vos expériences ou vos souvenirs d'elles ?
back_translation: What is more important, your experiences or your memories of them?

text: a group of hard core female inmates are trained by the military .
translation: un groupe de détenues hardcore est entraîné par l'armée.
back_translation: A group of hardcore inmates is trained by the army.

text: keeping her mind diligently focused on dance proves harder than she expected as she finds herself falling in love with david schrader , a dark and mysterious new york musician .
translation: garder son esprit diligentement concentré sur la danse s'avère plus difficile qu'elle ne l'avait prévu alors qu'elle tombe amoureuse de David Schrader, un musicien new-yorkais sombre et mystérieux.
back_translation: Keeping her mind diligently focused on dance proves more difficult than she had anticipated as she falls in love with David Schrader, a dark and mysterious New York musician.

text: . . . just a big mess of a movie , full of images and events , but no tension or surprise .
translation: ... juste un grand gâchis de film, plein d'images et d'événements, mais sans tension ni surprise.
back_translation: ... just a big waste of a movie, full of images and events, but without tension or surprise.

text: reign of fire is hardly the most original fantasy film ever made -- beyond road warrior , it owes enormous debts to aliens and every previous dragon drama -- but that barely makes it any less entertaining .
translation: Le règne du feu n'est guère le film fantastique le plus original jamais réalisé -- au-delà de Mad Max, il doit d'énormes dettes à Alien et à chaque drame de dragon précédent -- mais cela ne le rend guère moins divertissant.
back_translation: The Reign of Fire is hardly the most original fantasy film ever made -- beyond Mad Max, it owes a huge debt to Alien and every previous dragon drama -- but that doesn't make it any less entertaining.

text: he hired angel . com to kill lui because lui opposed nunn 's business plans , and also because nunn is carrying on a secret affair with lui 's wife .
translation: Il a engagé angel.com pour tuer lui parce que lui s'opposait aux plans d'affaires de nunn, et aussi parce que nunn a une liaison secrète avec la femme de lui.
back_translation: He hired angel.com to kill him because he opposed Nunn's business plans, and also because Nunn has a secret affair with his wife.

text: the homespun musician could n't have done it without the support of his family , friends , lovers and the neighborhood kids he called 'starchildren ' , all of whom paint the big picture of bruce 's life legacy and 'dimension of imagination ' .
translation: Le musicien autodidacte n'aurait pas pu le faire sans le soutien de sa famille, de ses amis, de ses amants et des enfants du quartier qu'il appelait 'enfants étoiles', tous d'entre eux peignant le tableau de la vie et de l'héritage de Bruce ainsi que sa 'dimension d'imagination'.
back_translation: The self-taught musician could not have done it without the support of his family, friends, lovers, and the neighborhood children he called 'star children,' all of whom painted the picture of Bruce's life and legacy as well as his 'dimension of imagination.'

text: jack has a history with charlie , a transient who portrays a typical image of the homeless : rough , unshaven and always looking for the next drink .
translation: Jack a une histoire avec Charlie, un itinérant qui incarne l'image typique des sans-abri : rude, non rasé et toujours à la recherche de la prochaine boisson.
back_translation: Jack has a story with Charlie, a homeless man who embodies the typical image of the homeless: rough, unshaven, and always in search of the next drink.

text: it 's predictable , but it jumps through the expected hoops with style and even some depth .
translation: C'est prévisible, mais cela passe à travers les cerceaux attendus avec style et même un peu de profondeur.
back_translation: It's predictable, but it goes through the expected hoops with style and even a bit of depth.

text: back in france , werner recovers a taste for life and adrien returns to his solitary lifestyle .
translation: De retour en France, Werner retrouve le goût de la vie et Adrien reprend son mode de vie solitaire.
back_translation: Back in France, Werner rediscovers the taste of life while Adrien returns to his solitary lifestyle.

text: together , they develop a criminal energy that knows no boundaries and leads them to cold-blooded murder . . .
translation: ensemble, ils développent une énergie criminelle qui ne connaît pas de limites et les conduit à des meurtres de sang-froid . . .
back_translation: together, they develop a criminal energy that knows no bounds and leads them to cold-blooded murders . . .

text: built in 1926 , the mansion resides on an indian burial ground and was the site of countless hangings at the hands of north georgia law enforcement , the kkk , and anyone else col . samuel tate wanted out of the way .
translation: Construit en 1926, le manoir se trouve sur un terrain de sépulture indien et a été le site de nombreuses exécutions aux mains des forces de l'ordre du nord de la Géorgie, du KKK et de quiconque que le colonel Samuel Tate voulait écarter.
back_translation: Built in 1926, the mansion is located on Indian burial ground and has been the site of numerous executions at the hands of law enforcement in northern Georgia, the KKK, and anyone Colonel Samuel Tate wanted to eliminate.

text: as debby tries to parlay what was essentially a casual fling into possible marriage with an indifferent rick , her mother virginia wonders if her affair with widower nick is the real thing .
translation: Alors que Debby essaie de transformer ce qui était essentiellement une liaison occasionnelle en un possible mariage avec un Rick indifférent, sa mère Virginia se demande si sa relation avec le veuf Nick est vraiment quelque chose de sérieux.
back_translation: As Debby tries to turn what was essentially a casual affair into a possible marriage with an indifferent Rick, her mother Virginia wonders if her relationship with the widower Nick is really something serious.

text: ivan , a captain of the soviet army , arrested by the front secret police 'smersh ' , has a narrow escape .
translation: Ivan, un capitaine de l'armée soviétique, arrêté par la police secrète du front 'Smersh', connaît une échappée étroite.
back_translation: Ivan, a captain in the Soviet army, arrested by the secret police of the 'Smersh' front, has a narrow escape.

text: if you value your time and money , find an escape clause and avoid seeing this trite , predictable rehash .
translation: Si vous tenez à votre temps et votre argent, trouvez une clause d'évasion et évitez de voir ce réchauffé banal et prévisible.
back_translation: If you care about your time and money, find an escape clause and avoid watching this reheated, bland, and predictable content.

text: overall , the film misses the brilliance of jelinek 's novel by some way . it settles for being merely grim .
translation: Dans l'ensemble, le film manque de la brillance du roman de Jelinek d'une certaine manière. Il se contente d'être simplement sinistre.
back_translation: Overall, the film lacks the brilliance of Jelinek's novel in some way. It merely settles for being simply grim.

text: hale bopp is the story of just such a woman ; her name is rachel .
translation: Hale Bopp raconte l'histoire d'une telle femme ; son nom est Rachel.
back_translation: Hale Bopp tells the story of such a woman; her name is Rachel.

text: 'a fresh-faced , big-hearted and frequently funny thrill ride for the kiddies , with enough eye candy and cheeky wit to keep parents away from the concession stand . '
translation: 'un tour de manège frais, au grand cœur et souvent drôle pour les enfants, avec suffisamment de friandises visuelles et d'esprit espiègle pour tenir les parents éloignés du stand de confiseries.'
back_translation: "a fresh carousel ride, with a big heart and often funny for children, with enough visual treats and mischievous spirit to keep parents away from the candy stand."

text: it 's halloween season , and while ghost ship ca n't hold a candle to the ring for true primal scares , it 'll probably stay respectably afloat until at least most of the candy is gone .
translation: C'est la saison d'Halloween, et bien que le navire fantôme ne puisse pas rivaliser avec The Ring pour de vraies frayeurs primales, il devrait probablement rester à flot de manière respectable jusqu'à ce que la plupart des bonbons soient partis.
back_translation: It's Halloween season, and although the ghost ship can't compete with The Ring for real primal scares, it should probably stay afloat respectably until most of the candy is gone.

text: ethan , a confident young architect and seeming 'perfect guy ' has invested himself , and his heart , in women like rachel before - and he is sure he has learned his lesson .
translation: Ethan, un jeune architecte confiant et semblant être le "gars parfait", s'est investi, ainsi que son cœur, dans des femmes comme Rachel auparavant - et il est sûr d'avoir appris sa leçon.
back_translation: Ethan, a confident young architect who seems to be the "perfect guy," has invested himself, as well as his heart, in women like Rachel before - and he is sure he has learned his lesson.

text: frank ( played by sal mazzotta ) , family under-bossman vito lupo ( played by leo rossi ) , and consigliori danny defino ( played by johnny williams ) try to find out who is responsible for usurping the family 's power before they implode from their own internal strife .
translation: Frank (interprété par Sal Mazzotta), le sous-chef de la famille Vito Lupo (interprété par Leo Rossi), et le consigliere Danny DeFino (interprété par Johnny Williams) essaient de découvrir qui est responsable de l'usurpation du pouvoir de la famille avant qu'ils ne s'effondrent à cause de leurs propres conflits internes.
back_translation: Frank (played by Sal Mazzotta), the underboss of the Vito Lupo family (played by Leo Rossi), and the consigliere Danny DeFino (played by Johnny Williams) try to find out who is responsible for usurping the family's power before they collapse due to their own internal conflicts.

text: a series of surprise events further obstructs their relationship , but tobias perseveres .
translation: une série d'événements surprises obstruit davantage leur relation, mais Tobias persévère.
back_translation: A series of unexpected events further obstructs their relationship, but Tobias perseveres.

text: he soon realizes that he is being hunted and takes off with marie on a search to find out who he is and why he is being hunted .
translation: Il se rend vite compte qu'il est traqué et s'enfuit avec Marie à la recherche de la vérité sur son identité et les raisons pour lesquelles il est chassé.
back_translation: He quickly realizes that he is being hunted and flees with Marie in search of the truth about his identity and the reasons why he is being pursued.

text: his father , aglanar , was happy at his birth that he would have a strong and honorable son to carry on the traditions of the valley .
translation: Son père, aglanar, était heureux de sa naissance car il aurait un fils fort et honorable pour perpétuer les traditions de la vallée.
back_translation: His father, aglanar, was happy about his birth because he would have a strong and honorable son to carry on the traditions of the valley.

text: nobody chooses to come here , this where they end up .
translation: personne ne choisit de venir ici, c'est ici qu'ils finissent.
back_translation: No one chooses to come here, this is where they end up.

text: however , on her second day , celia goes away leaving a 5-year-old child behind , kiki , and a note promising to be back in a couple of days .
translation: Cependant, le deuxième jour, Celia s'en va en laissant derrière elle un enfant de 5 ans, Kiki, et une note promettant de revenir dans quelques jours.
back_translation: However, on the second day, Celia leaves behind a 5-year-old child, Kiki, and a note promising to return in a few days.

text: the second coming of harry potter is a film far superior to its predecessor . a movie that successfully crushes a best selling novel into a timeframe that mandates that you avoid the godzilla sized soda .
translation: le retour de harry potter est un film bien supérieur à son prédécesseur. un film qui réussit à réduire un best-seller à un format qui exige d'éviter le soda de la taille de godzilla.
back_translation: The return of Harry Potter is a film far superior to its predecessor. A film that succeeds in condensing a best-seller into a format that requires avoiding a Godzilla-sized soda.

text: then she buys a bar of chocolate from the neighborhood store . . .
translation: puis elle achète une barre de chocolat chez le magasin du quartier . . .
back_translation: then she buys a chocolate bar at the corner store...

text: at the same time , william has become the object of wrath by a popular but pompous and pridefilled christian radio commentator who brands william as a false prophet and seeks to destroy him .
translation: En même temps, William est devenu l'objet de la colère d'un commentateur chrétien à la radio, populaire mais pompeux et rempli de fierté, qui qualifie William de faux prophète et cherche à le détruire.
back_translation: At the same time, William became the target of a Christian commentator on the radio, popular yet pompous and filled with pride, who labeled William a false prophet and sought to destroy him.

text: anyone who welcomes a dash of the avant-garde fused with their humor should take pleasure in this crazed , joyous romp of a film .
translation: Quiconque apprécie une touche d'avant-garde mélangée à de l'humour devrait prendre plaisir à ce film délirant et joyeux.
back_translation: Anyone who enjoys a touch of avant-garde mixed with humor should take pleasure in this wacky and joyful film.

text: while philippa does not want to elude the justice she deserves for the four innocent deaths , filippo discovers he fell in love with the beautiful woman .
translation: Alors que Philippa ne veut pas échapper à la justice qu'elle mérite pour les quatre morts innocents, Filippo découvre qu'il est tombé amoureux de la belle femme.
back_translation: While Philippa does not want to escape the justice she deserves for the four innocent deaths, Filippo discovers that he has fallen in love with the beautiful woman.

text: the one obstacle he is n't expecting is the screenwriter 's assistant , screenwriter 4 . 0 's animated helper who 's annoyed bob left her to sit around so long .
translation: le seul obstacle qu'il n'attend pas est l'assistante du scénariste, l'assistant animé de scénariste 4.0 qui est agacée que Bob l'ait laissée assise si longtemps.
back_translation: The only obstacle he doesn't expect is the screenwriter's assistant, the animated assistant of screenwriter 4.0, who is annoyed that Bob left her sitting for so long.

text: he dies alone at the hospital , and apparently everything nete planned went wrong .
translation: il meurt seul à l'hôpital, et apparemment tout ce qui était prévu s'est mal passé.
back_translation: He dies alone in the hospital, and apparently everything that was planned went wrong.

text: the casting of von sydow . . . is itself intacto 's luckiest stroke .
translation: le casting de von Sydow . . . est en lui-même le coup de chance le plus réussi d'Intacto.
back_translation: The casting of von Sydow... is in itself the most successful stroke of luck in Intacto.

text: an engaging and specific portrait of a culture in transition , even as it evokes humanity 's most universal and timeless values .
translation: un portrait engageant et spécifique d'une culture en transition, tout en évoquant les valeurs les plus universelles et intemporelles de l'humanité.
back_translation: An engaging and specific portrait of a culture in transition, while evoking the most universal and timeless values of humanity.

text: he has become an inconvenient obstacle to his work-a-holic son , and lost all remaining freedoms , except the valued time he spends with his grandson .
translation: il est devenu un obstacle incommode pour son fils accro au travail, et a perdu toutes ses libertés restantes, sauf le temps précieux qu'il passe avec son petit-fils.

text: a young father amaro arrives at his new church post on the orders of the bishop .

translation: Un an après que son petit ami de longue date est apparu à sa fête d'anniversaire surprise avec une invitée non désirée, Laura touche le fond et décide d'essayer sa chance dans une agence de rencontre.

text: given the circumstances , kyle might have been acquitted on the grounds of temporary insanity or perhaps even convicted of the lesser charge of manslaughter , but the fact that a federal policeman was also killed in the shooting , albeit accidentally , sent kyle to marquezas .
translation: Étant donné les circonstances, Kyle aurait pu être acquitté pour cause de folie passagère ou peut-être même condamné pour un délit moins grave d'homicide involontaire, mais le fait qu'un policier fédéral ait également été tué lors de la fusillade, bien que par accident, a conduit Kyle à Marquezas.
back_translation: Given the circumstances, Kyle could have been acquitted due to temporary insanity or perhaps even convicted of a lesser offense of involuntary manslaughter, but the fact that a federal police officer was also killed in the shooting, albeit accidentally, led Kyle to Marquezas.

text: after an assassination attempt on the life of senator padme amidala ( natalie portman ) , jedi obi-wan kenobi ( ewan mcgregor ) and his padawan learner anakin skywalker ( hayden christensen ) are sent to investigate .

translation: Le Dimanche Sanglant a la grâce d'appeler à la prévention plutôt que de blâmer, ce qui en fait l'un des meilleurs films de guerre jamais réalisés. C'est un film qui accomplit tellement de choses qu'une seule vision ne peut pas suffire.
back_translation: The Bloody Sunday has the grace to call for prevention rather than blame, which makes it one of the best war films ever made. It's a film that accomplishes so much that a single viewing is not enough.

text: [ denis ] might be off her nut , but she can sure make an interesting film , a la davids lynch and cronenberg .
translation: Denis pourrait être un peu folle, mais elle sait certainement faire un film intéressant, à la manière de David Lynch et Cronenberg.
back_translation: Denis may be a little crazy, but she certainly knows how to make an interesting film, in the style of David Lynch and Cronenberg.

text: he can do anything but when he discovers others in buffalo who are praying , he learns that maybe this job of being god is n't really that easy .
translation: il peut tout faire mais quand il découvre d'autres à Buffalo qui prient, il apprend que peut-être ce travail d'être Dieu n'est vraiment pas si facile.
back_translation: He can do everything, but when he discovers others in Buffalo who pray, he learns that perhaps the job of being God is not really that easy.

text: formula 51 is pretty much quentin tarantino meets guy ritchie , as directed by ronny yu . however , if you like that sort of thing , as i do , you just might have some fun with the chemical imbalance of formula 51 .
translation: Formula 51 est à peu près un croisement entre Quentin Tarantino et Guy Ritchie, réalisé par Ronny Yu. Cependant, si vous aimez ce genre de choses, comme moi, vous pourriez bien vous amuser avec le déséquilibre chimique de Formula 51.
back_translation: Formula 51 is roughly a crossover between Quentin Tarantino and Guy Ritchie, directed by Ronny Yu. However, if you like this kind of thing, like I do, you might have fun with the chemical imbalance of Formula 51.

text: there is an instant chemistry between them , and as they proceed to find out more about each other , we the audience are privy to their innermost thoughts by means of voice-over .
translation: il y a une chimie instantanée entre eux, et alors qu'ils s'efforcent d'en apprendre davantage l'un sur l'autre, nous, le public, avons accès à leurs pensées les plus intimes grâce à la voix off.
back_translation: There is an instant chemistry between them, and as they strive to learn more about each other, we, the audience, have access to their most intimate thoughts through the voiceover.

text: special agent rachel anderson is charged with protecting a key witness , richard harper .
translation: L'agent spécial Rachel Anderson est chargée de protéger un témoin clé, Richard Harper.
back_translation: Special agent Rachel Anderson is tasked with protecting a key witness, Richard Harper.

text: so anmol returns , not with prize money but with anna and chota chhatri , and others have this wrong notion that anna is just interested in the petty contract money .
translation: Donc Anmol revient, pas avec de l'argent de prix, mais avec Anna et Chota Chhatri, et les autres ont cette mauvaise idée qu'Anna s'intéresse uniquement à l'argent des petits contrats.
back_translation: So Anmol comes back, not with prize money, but with Anna and Chota Chhatri, and the others have this bad idea that Anna is only interested in the money from small contracts.

text: even worse , his influence of a bad las vegas obsessed him of henry having killed his real father douglas .
translation: encore pire, son influence d'un mauvais Las Vegas lui faisait obséder par le fait qu'Henry avait tué son véritable père Douglas.
back_translation: Even worse, his influence from a bad Las Vegas made him obsessed with the fact that Henry had killed his real father, Douglas.

text: renee unger is living the life she always hoped for : a little red-brick house in the small town of new russia , ohio , a good husband , a prospering construction business , and a baby on the way .
translation: Renee Unger vit la vie qu'elle a toujours espérée : une petite maison en briques rouges dans la petite ville de New Russia, Ohio, un mari aimant, une entreprise de construction prospère et un bébé en route.
back_translation: Renee Unger lives the life she has always hoped for: a small red brick house in the little town of New Russia, Ohio, a loving husband, a successful construction business, and a baby on the way.

text: stuart 's mother is being over-protective of him , especially when he narrowly escapes injury in a soccer game .
translation: La mère de Stuart est trop protectrice envers lui, surtout lorsqu'il échappe de justesse à une blessure lors d'un match de football.
back_translation: Stuart's mother is too protective of him, especially when he narrowly escapes injury during a football match.

text: reinalda fell hopelessly in love with her long red hair and big good-goods during her days as a french panto teacher and now she will stop at nothing , including the highest office in the land , to be with her always .
translation: Reinalda est tombée désespérément amoureuse de ses longs cheveux roux et de ses grandes formes pendant ses jours en tant que professeur de pantomime français, et maintenant elle ne reculera devant rien, y compris le plus haut poste du pays, pour être toujours avec elle.
back_translation: Reinalda fell desperately in love with her long red hair and her large figure during her days as a French mime teacher, and now she will stop at nothing, including the highest position in the country, to always be with her.

text: accuracy and realism are terrific , but if your film becomes boring , and your dialogue is n't smart , then you need to use more poetic license .
translation: L'exactitude et le réalisme sont excellents, mais si votre film devient ennuyeux et que vos dialogues ne sont pas intelligents, alors vous devez utiliser plus de licence poétique.
back_translation: Accuracy and realism are excellent, but if your film becomes boring and your dialogues are not clever, then you need to use more poetic license.

text: elmo touts his drug as being 51 times stronger than coke . if you 're looking for a tale of brits behaving badly , watch snatch again . it 's 51 times better than this .
translation: Elmo vante son médicament comme étant 51 fois plus puissant que la coke. Si vous recherchez une histoire de Britanniques se comportant mal, regardez à nouveau Snatch. C'est 51 fois meilleur que ça.
back_translation: Elmo boasts that his drug is 51 times more powerful than cocaine. If you're looking for a story of Britons behaving badly, watch Snatch again. It's 51 times better than that.

text: despite the film 's shortcomings , it 's still a solid effort and a thought-provoking look at idealism gone wrong .
translation: Malgré les défauts du film, c'est néanmoins un effort solide et un regard stimulant sur l'idéalisme qui tourne mal.
back_translation: Despite the film's flaws, it is nonetheless a solid effort and a thought-provoking look at idealism gone wrong.

text: as obi-wan 's investigations lead him to kamino , he finds a massive clone army being produced , with a bounty hunter - the last of the mandalorians - named jango fett as the master clone .
translation: Alors que les enquêtes d'Obi-Wan le mènent à Kamino, il découvre une immense armée de clones en cours de production, avec un chasseur de primes - le dernier des Mandaloriens - nommé Jango Fett en tant que clone maître.
back_translation: As Obi-Wan's investigations lead him to Kamino, he discovers a massive army of clones in production, with a bounty hunter - the last of the Mandalorians - named Jango Fett as the master clone.

text: at once somber and mysterious , comical and sad . it shows just how lonely a crowded city can be .
translation: à la fois sombre et mystérieux, comique et triste. Cela montre à quel point une ville bondée peut être solitaire.
back_translation: Both dark and mysterious, comedic and sad. It shows how a crowded city can be so lonely.

text: a delectable little treat that 's sunny , funny , and far more intelligent than you 'd expect .
translation: une délicieuse petite friandise qui est ensoleillée, amusante et bien plus intelligente que vous ne l'attendriez.
back_translation: a delicious little treat that is sunny, playful, and much smarter than you would expect.

text: in keeping with the holiday spirit , the judge gives davey one last chance at redemption-spend the holiday performing community service as the assistant referee for the youth basketball league or go to jail .
translation: En accord avec l'esprit des fêtes, le juge donne à Davey une dernière chance de rédemption : passer les vacances à effectuer des travaux communautaires en tant qu'arbitre assistant pour la ligue de basket-ball des jeunes, ou aller en prison.
back_translation: In the spirit of the holidays, the judge gives Davey one last chance for redemption: to spend the holidays doing community service as an assistant referee for the youth basketball league, or go to jail.

text: but with their lives and careers on the brink of devastation , bret 's teammates and family realize that they have to take baseball - and life - back from bret packard , once and for all .
translation: mais avec leurs vies et carrières au bord de la désolation, les coéquipiers et la famille de Bret réalisent qu'ils doivent reprendre le baseball - et la vie - à Bret Packard, une fois pour toutes.
back_translation: But with their lives and careers on the brink of desolation, Bret's teammates and family realize they must take baseball - and life - back for Bret Packard, once and for all.

text: if h . g . wells had a time machine and could take a look at his kin 's reworked version , what would he say ? 'it looks good , sonny , but you missed the point . '
translation: Si H.G. Wells avait une machine à voyager dans le temps et pouvait jeter un œil à la version retravaillée de son fils, que dirait-il ? 'Ça a l'air bien, mon garçon, mais tu as manqué le point.'
back_translation: If H.G. Wells had a time machine and could take a look at the revised version by his son, what would he say? 'It looks good, my boy, but you missed the point.'

text: the soundtrack alone -- the literal pulse of the thing -- will rock you in your seat .
translation: la bande sonore à elle seule -- le pouls littéral de la chose -- vous fera vibrer dans votre siège.
back_translation: The soundtrack alone -- the literal pulse of the thing -- will make you vibrate in your seat.

text: twohy is not only skilled at building and maintaining suspense , he 's also aware that a cast chock full of experienced character actors is the right fit for a haunted sub flick .
translation: Twohy n'est pas seulement doué pour créer et maintenir le suspense, il sait aussi qu'une distribution composée d'acteurs de caractère expérimentés est le bon choix pour un film sous-marin hanté.
back_translation: Twohy is not only skilled at creating and maintaining suspense, but he also knows that a cast made up of experienced character actors is the right choice for a haunted underwater film.

text: this undercover documentary takes you deep into the controversial arena of backyard wrestling where the limits are constantly being tested . . . and
translation: ce documentaire sous couverture vous plonge au cœur de l'arène controversée de la lutte de quartier où les limites sont constamment remises en question . . . et
back_translation: this undercover documentary takes you into the heart of the controversial neighborhood fight scene where boundaries are constantly being challenged... and

text: as underwater ghost stories go , below casts its spooky net out into the atlantic ocean and spits it back , grizzled and charred , somewhere northwest of the bermuda triangle .
translation: En matière d'histoires de fantômes sous-marins, "Below" tend son réseau effrayant dans l'océan Atlantique et le recrache, grisâtre et carbonisé, quelque part au nord-ouest du triangle des Bermudes.
back_translation: In terms of underwater ghost stories, "Below" casts its eerie net in the Atlantic Ocean and spits it out, gray and charred, somewhere northwest of the Bermuda Triangle.

text: chilling in its objective portrait of dreary , lost twenty-first century america .
translation: décourageant dans son portrait objectif d'une Amérique du vingt et unième siècle morose et perdue.
back_translation: discouraging in its objective portrayal of a gloomy and lost twenty-first century America.

text: the girls are treated like outcasts because they have inadvertently wrecked townsville in a superpowered game of tag .
translation: les filles sont traitées comme des parias parce qu'elles ont involontairement détruit Townsville dans un jeu de tag surpuissant.
back_translation: The girls are treated like outcasts because they inadvertently destroyed Townsville in an overpowering game of tag.

text: clever and unflinching in its comic barbs , slap her is a small but rewarding comedy that takes aim at contemporary southern adolescence and never lets up .
translation: Intelligent et implacable dans ses piques comiques, "Slap Her" est une petite comédie mais gratifiante qui s'attaque à l'adolescence contemporaine du sud et ne relâche jamais la pression.
back_translation: Intelligent and relentless in its comedic digs, "Slap Her" is a little but rewarding comedy that tackles contemporary southern adolescence and never lets up the pressure.

text: the story is set against a relationship that forms between the american hustler boy and a brazilian teenage girl who must help each other survive the drug gang-controlled slums of rio de janeiro .
translation: L'histoire se déroule dans une relation qui se forme entre un garçon américain hustler et une adolescente brésilienne qui doivent s'entraider pour survivre dans les bidonvilles contrôlés par les gangs de drogue de Rio de Janeiro.
back_translation: The story takes place in a relationship that develops between an American hustler boy and a Brazilian teenage girl who must help each other to survive in the slums controlled by drug gangs in Rio de Janeiro.

text: too ordinary to restore [ harmon ] to prominence , despite some creepy scenes that evoke childish night terrors , and a praiseworthy attempt to generate suspense rather than gross out the audience .
translation: trop ordinaire pour restaurer [harmon] à la notoriété, malgré quelques scènes glauques qui évoquent des terreurs nocturnes d'enfance, et une tentative louable de générer du suspense plutôt que de dégoûter le public.
back_translation: too ordinary to restore [harmon] to fame, despite some bleak scenes that evoke childhood night terrors, and a commendable attempt to generate suspense rather than disgust the audience.

text: something akin to a japanese alice through the looking glass , except that it seems to take itself far more seriously .
translation: quelque chose de similaire à une Alice au pays des merveilles japonaise, sauf que cela semble se prendre beaucoup plus au sérieux.
back_translation: Something similar to a Japanese Alice in Wonderland, except that it seems to take itself much more seriously.

text: her mother 's friends , who formed a secret society , the ya-ya sisterhood , as children , kidnap siddalee from her new york apartment and take her home to louisiana , where they explain why her mother mistreated her with help from the secret ya-ya scrapbook ( and copious flashbacks ) .
translation: Les amis de sa mère, qui formaient une société secrète, la confrérie ya-ya, kidnappent Siddalee de son appartement à New York et l'emmènent chez elle en Louisiane, où ils lui expliquent pourquoi sa mère l'a maltraitée avec l'aide du livre de souvenirs secret ya-ya (et de nombreux flashbacks).
back_translation: Her mother's friends, who formed a secret society, the ya-ya brotherhood, kidnap Siddalee from her apartment in New York and take her back home to Louisiana, where they explain to her why her mother mistreated her with the help of the secret ya-ya memoir book (and many flashbacks).

text: a bit of whimsically warped history elevated by the central performance of ian holm .
translation: un peu d'histoire fantaisiste et déformée sublimée par l'interprétation centrale d'ian holm.
back_translation: A bit of fanciful and distorted history elevated by the central performance of Ian Holm.

text: aka is the story of a disaffected youth 's search for love , status , and identity in late 1970s britain .
translation: aka est l'histoire de la quête d'amour, de statut et d'identité d'un jeune désabusé dans la Grande-Bretagne de la fin des années 1970.
back_translation: aka is the story of a young disillusioned man's quest for love, status, and identity in late 1970s Britain.

text: due to a botched robbery attempt , a ruthless romanian barbarian is somehow resurrected in modern day new york and begins wreaking havok on a small manhattan art-house .
translation: En raison d'une tentative de vol ratée, un barbare roumain impitoyable est d'une manière ou d'une autre ressuscité dans le New York moderne et commence à semer le chaos dans une petite salle d'art à Manhattan.
back_translation: Due to a failed robbery attempt, a ruthless Romanian barbarian is somehow resurrected in modern New York and begins to sow chaos in a small art gallery in Manhattan.

text: fans of the tv series will be disappointed , and everyone else will be slightly bored .
translation: les fans de la série télévisée seront déçus, et tout le monde d'autre sera légèrement ennuyé.
back_translation: Fans of the television series will be disappointed, and everyone else will be slightly bored.

text: investors from around the world are intrigued to bring money to the project heavily backed by patricia .
translation: Des investisseurs du monde entier sont intrigués à l'idée d'apporter des fonds au projet fortement soutenu par Patricia.
back_translation: Investors from around the world are intrigued by the idea of bringing funds to the project strongly supported by Patricia.

text: they have one request - their bosses head on a plate .
translation: ils ont une demande - la tête de leur patron sur un plateau.
back_translation: They have a request - their boss's head on a platter.

text: will give many ministers and bible-study groups hours of material to discuss . but mainstream audiences will find little of interest in this film , which is often preachy and poorly acted .
translation: donnera à de nombreux ministres et groupes d'étude biblique des heures de matériel à discuter. mais le grand public trouvera peu d'intérêt dans ce film, qui est souvent moralisateur et mal joué.
back_translation: will provide many ministers and Bible study groups with hours of material to discuss. But the general public will find little interest in this film, which is often moralistic and poorly acted.

text: it 's also curious to note that this film , like the similarly ill-timed antitrust , is easily as bad at a fraction the budget .
translation: Il est également curieux de noter que ce film, tout comme l'antitrust mal chronométré, est tout aussi mauvais avec un budget bien inférieur.
back_translation: It is also curious to note that this film, just like the poorly timed antitrust, is just as bad with a much lower budget.

text: tambor and clayburgh make an appealing couple M-^W he 's understated and sardonic , she 's appealingly manic and energetic . both deserve better .
translation: Tambor et Clayburgh forment un couple attrayant. Lui est discret et sarcastique, elle est agréablement maniaque et énergique. Tous deux méritent mieux.
back_translation: Tambor and Clayburgh make an attractive couple. He is discreet and sarcastic, while she is pleasantly obsessive and energetic. Both deserve better.

text: it uses some of the figures from the real-life story to portray themselves in the film . the result is a powerful , naturally dramatic piece of low-budget filmmaking .
translation: Il utilise certaines des personnalités de l'histoire vraie pour se représenter dans le film. Le résultat est une pièce puissante et naturellement dramatique de cinéma à petit budget.
back_translation: He uses some of the personalities from real history to represent himself in the film. The result is a powerful and naturally dramatic piece of low-budget cinema.

text: what could have been a pointed little chiller about the frightening seductiveness of new technology loses faith in its own viability and succumbs to joyless special-effects excess .
translation: ce qui aurait pu être un petit frisson percutant sur la séduisante effrayante de la nouvelle technologie perd foi en sa propre viabilité et succombe à un excès d'effets spéciaux dépourvu de joie.
back_translation: what could have been a small striking thrill at the alluringly frightening new technology loses faith in its own viability and succumbs to an excess of special effects devoid of joy.

text: `` maid in manhattan `` is a charmer , a pc `` pretty woman `` that ditches the odious prostitution theme for class commentary
translation: `` Mademoiselle à Manhattan `` est un charmeur, une version moderne de `` Pretty Woman `` qui abandonne le thème odieux de la prostitution au profit d'un commentaire sur la classe sociale.
back_translation: "Mademoiselle in Manhattan" is a charmer, a modern version of "Pretty Woman" that abandons the odious theme of prostitution in favor of a commentary on social class.

text: when algren is injuried and captured by the samurai , learns about their warrior honor code from katsumoto , the samurai & # 180 ; s leader and decide which side of the conflict he wants to be on . . .
translation: Lorsque Algren est blessé et capturé par les samouraïs, il apprend leur code d'honneur de guerrier de Katsumoto, le chef des samouraïs, et décide de quel côté du conflit il veut être.
back_translation: When Algren is injured and captured by the samurai, he learns their warrior code of honor from Katsumoto, the leader of the samurai, and decides which side of the conflict he wants to be on.

text: a band of college students go to a rave on a mysterious island and get more than they bargained for when they find themselves stalked by killer zombies and terrifying creatures intent on feasting on the flesh of the living .
translation: Un groupe d'étudiants universitaires se rend à une rave sur une île mystérieuse et obtient bien plus que ce qu'ils avaient prévu lorsqu'ils se retrouvent traqués par des zombies tueurs et des créatures terrifiantes déterminées à se repaître de la chair des vivants.
back_translation: A group of college students heads to a rave on a mysterious island and gets much more than they bargained for when they find themselves hunted by killer zombies and terrifying creatures intent on feasting on the flesh of the living.

text: while shooting an engagement party , he attempts to make a connection with jen , the beautiful sister of the bride .
translation: Lors d'une séance photo pour une fête de fiançailles, il essaie de créer un lien avec Jen, la belle sœur de la mariée.
back_translation: During a photo shoot for an engagement party, he tries to connect with Jen, the bride's sister-in-law.

text: an unintentionally surreal kid 's picture . . . in which actors in bad bear suits enact a sort of inter-species parody of a vh1 behind the music episode .
translation: une image d'enfant unintentionnellement surréaliste . . . dans laquelle des acteurs en mauvais costumes d'ours jouent une sorte de parodie inter-espèces d'un épisode de VH1 Behind the Music.
back_translation: an unintentionally surreal image of a child... in which actors in bad bear costumes are playing a sort of inter-species parody of a VH1 Behind the Music episode.

text: goes on and on to the point of nausea .
translation: se poursuit indéfiniment au point de provoquer la nausée.
back_translation: continues indefinitely to the point of causing nausea.

text: neither as scary-funny as tremors nor demented-funny as starship troopers , the movie is n't tough to take as long as you 've paid a matinee price .
translation: ni aussi effrayant-drôle que Tremors ni aussi fou-drôle que Starship Troopers, le film n'est pas difficile à regarder tant que vous avez payé un tarif de matinée.
back_translation: Neither as scary-funny as Tremors nor as crazy-funny as Starship Troopers, the film is not difficult to watch as long as you paid a matinee price.

text: i ca n't say that i liked homeboy ; it 'd be more accurate to say that i found it intriguing , bizarre , dogma-like in spots - and quite truthful , in its way .
translation: Je ne peux pas dire que j'ai aimé "Homeboy" ; il serait plus précis de dire que je l'ai trouvé intrigant, bizarre, dogmatique par endroits - et assez véridique, à sa manière.
back_translation: I can't say that I liked "Homeboy"; it would be more accurate to say that I found it intriguing, strange, dogmatic at times - and quite truthful, in its own way.

text: until then , he spends most of his time watching sloppy tearjerkers on video .
translation: jusqu'à lors, il passe la plupart de son temps à regarder des drames larmoyants sur vidéo.
back_translation: Until then, he spends most of his time watching tear-jerking dramas on video.

text: with a rare gift for melding subjectivity with biographical facts , m & # 225 ; rton brings sabina spielrein back to life , body and soul .
translation: Avec un don rare pour allier subjectivité et faits biographiques, Mártón redonne vie à Sabina Spielrein, corps et âme.
back_translation: With a rare gift for combining subjectivity and biographical facts, Mártón brings Sabina Spielrein to life, body and soul.

text: while it does n't expose any new truths about the problems posed by reaching middle age , it reflects wisely on the truths that already exist .
translation: bien qu'il ne révèle aucune nouvelle vérité sur les problèmes posés par l'âge mûr, il réfléchit avec sagesse aux vérités qui existent déjà.
back_translation: Although it does not reveal any new truths about the issues posed by middle age, it wisely reflects on the truths that already exist.

text: if borstal boy is n't especially realistic , it is an engaging nostalgia piece .
translation: Si "Borstal Boy" n'est pas particulièrement réaliste, c'est un morceau de nostalgie captivant.
back_translation: If "Borstal Boy" is not particularly realistic, it is a captivating piece of nostalgia.

text: all of this changes when he finds a large mysterious package left on his doorstep .
translation: tout cela change quand il trouve un grand colis mystérieux laissé sur son seuil.
back_translation: All of this changes when he finds a large mysterious package left on his doorstep.

text: the feature-length stretch . . . strains the show 's concept .
translation: la durée du long métrage . . . met à l'épreuve le concept de l'émission.
back_translation: the duration of the feature film... challenges the concept of the show.

text: unambitious writing emerges in the movie , using a plot that could have come from an animated-movie screenwriting textbook .
translation: Une écriture peu ambitieuse émerge dans le film, utilisant un scénario qui pourrait provenir d'un manuel de scénarisation de films d'animation.
back_translation: A lackluster script emerges in the film, using a storyline that could come from an animated film screenwriting manual.

text: so fiendishly cunning that even the most jaded cinema audiences will leave the auditorium feeling dizzy , confused , and totally disorientated . not to mention absolutely refreshed .
translation: si diaboliquement astucieux que même les spectateurs de cinéma les plus blasés quitteront l'auditorium en se sentant étourdis, confus et totalement désorientés, sans parler d'être absolument rafraîchis.
back_translation: so diabolically clever that even the most jaded moviegoers will leave the auditorium feeling dazed, confused, and utterly disoriented, not to mention absolutely refreshed.

text: feels like the grittiest movie that was ever made for the lifetime cable television network .
translation: on dirait le film le plus gritty qui ait jamais été réalisé pour le réseau de télévision câblée Lifetime.
back_translation: It looks like the grittiest movie that has ever been made for the cable television network Lifetime.

text: an entertaining quasi-critique of modern manners whose comedy arises out of its gravity -- and a winning performance by ricardo darin .
translation: une critique quasi-divertissante des mœurs modernes dont la comédie découle de sa gravité -- et une performance captivante de ricardo darin.
back_translation: a nearly entertaining critique of modern morals from which the comedy derives from its seriousness -- and a captivating performance by Ricardo Darín.

text: it ai n't art , by a long shot , but unlike last year 's lame musketeer , this dumas adaptation entertains .
translation: Ce n'est pas de l'art, loin s'en faut, mais contrairement au mousquetaire ennuyeux de l'année dernière, cette adaptation de Dumas divertit.
back_translation: It is not art, far from it, but unlike last year's boring musketeer, this adaptation of Dumas is entertaining.

text: devastated by her husband 's death from a drug overdose , philippa ( played by cate blanchett ) , a british teacher living in turin , italy , tries to bring justice to the biggest drug dealer in turin when the local police ignore her information about him .
translation: Dévastée par la mort de son mari d'une overdose de drogue, Philippa (interprétée par Cate Blanchett), une enseignante britannique vivant à Turin, en Italie, essaie de rendre justice au plus grand trafiquant de drogue de Turin lorsque la police locale ignore ses informations à son sujet.
back_translation: Devastated by the death of her husband from a drug overdose, Philippa (played by Cate Blanchett), a British teacher living in Turin, Italy, tries to bring justice to the biggest drug dealer in Turin when the local police ignore her information about him.

text: once they begin towing the ghost ship towards harbor , a series of bizarre ocurrences happen and the group becomes trapped inside the ship , which they soon learn is inhabited by a demonic creature .
translation: Une fois qu'ils commencent à remorquer le vaisseau fantôme vers le port, une série d'événements bizarres se produit et le groupe se retrouve piégé à l'intérieur du navire, qui, ils l'apprennent bientôt, est habité par une créature démoniaque.
back_translation: Once they start towing the ghost ship to the port, a series of strange events occurs and the group finds themselves trapped inside the ship, which they soon learn is inhabited by a demonic creature.

text: the young man find herbert down in his jail cell and learns for himself just what the re-agent is capable of .
translation: le jeune homme trouve Herbert dans sa cellule de prison et découvre par lui-même de quoi le réactif est capable.

text: we just do n't really care too much about this love story . in that setting , their struggle is simply too ludicrous and borderline insulting .

text: in an era when the country 's first line of defense , intelligence , is more important than ever , comes an explosive thriller starring al pacino and colin farrell that for the first time opens the cia 's infamous closed doors and gives an insider 's view into the agency : how trainees are recruited , how they are prepared for the spy game , and what they learn to survive .
translation: À une époque où la première ligne de défense du pays, le renseignement, est plus importante que jamais, voici un thriller explosif mettant en vedette Al Pacino et Colin Farrell qui, pour la première fois, ouvre les portes fermées et infâmes de la CIA et offre un aperçu de l'agence : comment les stagiaires sont recrutés, comment ils sont préparés au jeu d'espionnage et ce qu'ils apprennent pour survivre.
back_translation: At a time when the country's first line of defense, intelligence, is more important than ever, here is an explosive thriller starring Al Pacino and Colin Farrell that, for the first time, opens the closed and infamous doors of the CIA and offers a glimpse into the agency: how interns are recruited, how they are trained for the game of espionage, and what they learn to survive.

text: set in the rugged mountains and lush , untamed forests of the pacific northwest , tribe of joseph is an engrossing tale of troubled youths plucked from the familiarity of their urban lives and transported into the alien isolation and life or death danger of a survivalist existence .

back_translation: Set in the rugged mountains and lush, wild forests of the Pacific Northwest, "Tribe of Joseph" is a captivating story of troubled youth torn from the familiarity of their urban lives and thrust into the alien isolation and life-or-death dangers of a survival existence.

text: a mythic motorcycle tale of father and son `` , this is the story of manuel galloway ( fishburne ) , also known as `` the king of cali `` , the president of a motorcycle club whose members are all african-american men , mostly white-collar workers who exchange their suits and ties at night and on weekends for leather outfits and motorcycle helmets .
translation: une histoire mythique de moto entre père et fils, c'est l'histoire de Manuel Galloway (Fishburne), également connu sous le nom de "roi de Cali", le président d'un club de motards dont les membres sont tous des hommes afro-américains, principalement des cols blancs qui échangent leurs costumes et leurs cravates le soir et le week-end contre des tenues en cuir et des casques de moto.
back_translation: A mythical story of motorcycles between father and son, it is the story of Manuel Galloway (Fishburne), also known as the "King of Cali," the president of a motorcycle club whose members are all African American men, primarily white-collar workers who exchange their suits and ties in the evening and on weekends for leather outfits and motorcycle helmets.

text: mel cobb leads a lonely existence in an apartment filled with clutter , his only contact with the outside world being as a weekend tele-marketer for a start-up newspaper which features stories on city road , bridge and tunnel construction workers in order to alleviate road rage among motorists who are stuck in traffic .
