back_translation: "The institute" is also for the famous former personalities who, having hit rock bottom, have nowhere else to turn but to Brookdale.

text: for all its technical virtuosity , the film is so mired in juvenile and near-xenophobic pedagogy that it 's enough to make one pine for the day when godard can no longer handle the rigors of filmmaking .
translation: Malgré toute sa virtuosité technique, le film est tellement embourbé dans une pédagogie juvénile et presque xénophobe qu'on en vient à désirer le jour où Godard ne pourra plus supporter les rigueurs de la réalisation.
back_translation: Despite all its technical virtuosity, the film is so bogged down in juvenile pedagogy and almost xenophobia that one comes to desire the day when Godard can no longer endure the rigors of directing.

text: a sweet-natured reconsideration of one of san francisco 's most vital , if least widely recognized , creative fountainheads .
translation: une reconsidération à la douce nature de l'une des sources créatives les plus vitales de San Francisco, bien que peu reconnue.

text: many can not hold a job , or choose not to .

text: well , he wakes up on the night when the tooth fairy is supposed to come and get his last tooth and sees her .

text: this tenth feature is a big deal , indeed -- at least the third-best , and maybe even a notch above the previous runner-up , nicholas meyer 's star trek vi : the undiscovered country .
translation: cette dixième caractéristique est un grand événement, en effet - au moins la troisième meilleure, et peut-être même un cran au-dessus du précédent deuxième meilleur, star trek vi : le pays inconnu de nicholas meyer.

text: the country was at the start of a rapid process of industrialization and social change .

text: for all of the contemporary post-colonialist consciousness that kapur tries to bring to the four feathers , the oddest thing about the movie is how it winds up affirming the same damn moldy values the material has always held dear .
translation: Pour toute la conscience post-colonialiste contemporaine que Kapur essaie d'apporter aux Quatre Plumes, la chose la plus étrange à propos du film est la manière dont il finit par affirmer les mêmes valeurs désuètes que le matériel a toujours chéries.
back_translation: For all the contemporary post-colonialist awareness that Kapur tries to bring to The Four Feathers, the strangest thing about the film is how it ultimately affirms the same outdated values that the material has always cherished.

text: a memorable experience that , like many of his works , presents weighty issues colorfully wrapped up in his own idiosyncratic strain of kitschy goodwill .
translation: une expérience mémorable qui, comme beaucoup de ses œuvres, présente des questions importantes joliment emballées dans sa propre touche idiosyncratique de bonne volonté kitsch.

text: m & # 225 ; rton 's deft re-enactments and the actors ' dramatic readings of spielrein 's own words tell a chilling story , bringing to light both the work of this pioneer and the dark side of psychoanalysis .
translation: Les reconstitutions habiles de M & # 225 ; rton et les lectures dramatiques des acteurs des propres mots de Spielrein racontent une histoire troublante, mettant en lumière à la fois le travail de cette pionnière et le côté sombre de la psychanalyse.
back_translation: The skillful reconstructions by M & # 225 ; rton and the dramatic readings by the actors of Spielrein's own words tell a disturbing story, highlighting both the work of this pioneer and the darker side of psychoanalysis.

text: but when she escapes a horrific car accident , she finds herself in death 's path of destruction .

text: a powerful and telling story that examines forbidden love , racial tension , and other issues that are as valid today as they were in the 1950s .

text: it is so refreshing to see robin williams turn 180 degrees from the string of insultingly innocuous and sappy fiascoes he 's been making for the last several years .

text: ms . bennett is worth watching , and her story is weirdly detailed enough to prove once more that truth is too strange for good fiction .
translation: Mme Bennett vaut la peine d'être regardée, et son histoire est étrangement suffisamment détaillée pour prouver une fois de plus que la vérité est trop étrange pour une bonne fiction.
back_translation: Mrs. Bennett is worth looking at, and her story is strangely detailed enough to prove once again that truth is stranger than good fiction.

text: a sluggish pace and lack of genuine narrative hem the movie in every bit as much as life hems in the spirits of these young women .

text: rugged contractor rick eyes beth but ends up going home with the more assertive debby .

text: as beacons of individuality in a sea of government conformity they represent freedom for those who own them .

text: 'butterfingered ' is the word for the big-fisted direction of jez butterworth , who manages to blast even the smallest sensitivities from the romance with his clamorous approach .

text: steven soderbergh 's digital video experiment is a clever and cutting , quick and dirty look at modern living and movie life .
translation: L'expérience vidéo numérique de Steven Soderbergh est un regard ingénieux et percutant, rapide et brut sur la vie moderne et le cinéma.

text: a respectable venture on its own terms , lacking the broader vision that has seen certain trek films . . . cross over to a more mainstream audience .

text: . . . feels as if ( there 's ) a choke leash around your neck so director nick cassavetes can give it a good , hard yank whenever he wants you to feel something .

text: like other almodM-svar films , it delights in its scandals . but its sensitivities are extravagant , which means it 's one of the most beautiful black comedies ever made .
translation: Comme d'autres films d'Almodóvar, il se plaît dans ses scandales. Mais ses sensibilités sont extravagantes, ce qui en fait l'une des plus belles comédies noires jamais réalisées.

translation: Spy Kids 2 est également ce rare cas parmi les suites : il améliore réellement le film original à succès.

text: after his friend , a hot young artist , is killed , a resourceful american man living in london covers up the crime and tries to keep the friend 's name alive in order to exploit his legacy and reap millions in the process .
translation: Après la mort de son ami, un jeune artiste à la mode, un Américain débrouillard vivant à Londres couvre le crime et essaie de garder le nom de son ami en vie afin d'exploiter son héritage et d'en tirer des millions au passage.
back_translation: After the death of his friend, a trendy young artist, a resourceful American living in London covers up the crime and tries to keep his friend's name alive in order to exploit his legacy and make millions in the process.

text: though each with their distinctive story , all three are interwoven with the other .

back_translation: Although each has its own distinctive story, the three are intertwined with one another.

text: when all seems hopeless , ted gets some guidance from his good friend meg that turns the situation around : `` do n't scam on her , listen to her , be sincere . ``
translation: Quand tout semble désespéré, Ted reçoit des conseils de sa bonne amie Meg qui retournent la situation : « Ne bulle pas avec elle, écoute-la, sois sincère. »
back_translation: When everything seems hopeless, Ted receives advice from his good friend Meg that turns the situation around: "Don't bubble with her, listen to her, be sincere."

text: light the candles , bring out the cake and do n't fret about the calories because there 's precious little substance in birthday girl -- it 's simply , and surprisingly , a nice , light treat .
translation: Allumez les bougies, sortez le gâteau et ne vous inquiétez pas des calories car il y a très peu de substance dans la fille d'anniversaire -- c'est tout simplement, et étonnamment, un joli et léger délice.
back_translation: Light the candles, take out the cake, and don't worry about the calories because there is very little substance in the birthday girl -- it's simply, and surprisingly, a pretty and light treat.

text: while the frequent allusions to gurus and doshas will strike some westerners as verging on mumbo-jumbo . . . broad streaks of common sense emerge with unimpeachable clarity .
translation: Bien que les allusions fréquentes aux gurus et aux doshas puissent paraître à certains occidentaux comme frôlant le charlatanisme... de larges strates de bon sens émergent avec une clarté irréprochable.

text: standard story of a biker gang taking over a town is not saved by the presence of lou diamond phillips as the head biker or sean patrcik flanery as the avenging townsperson who takes on the gangs with the help of an old codger ( robert forster ) .
translation: L'histoire standard d'une bande de motards prenant le contrôle d'une ville n'est pas sauvée par la présence de Lou Diamond Phillips en tant que tête de la bande de motards ou de Sean Patrick Flanery en tant que habitant vengeur qui s'attaque aux bandes avec l'aide d'un vieux grincheux (Robert Forster).

text: . . . liotta is put in an impossible spot because his character 's deceptions ultimately undo him and the believability of the entire scenario . too bad .

text: to pull him out of his now dangerous financial predicament will turns to his wealthy in-laws , spinning a myriad of desperate lies , half-truths and deceptions .
translation: pour le sortir de sa situation financière maintenant dangereuse, il se tournera vers ses beaux-parents riches, tissant une myriade de mensonges désespérés, de demi-vérités et de tromperies.

translation: John Roper, (Bruce Mathews) un ancien vétéran du Vietnam désillusionné et ex-trafiquant de drogue, voyage à travers l'Orient pour trouver la spiritualité.
back_translation: John Roper, (Bruce Mathews) a disillusioned former Vietnam veteran and ex-drug dealer, travels through the East to find spirituality.

translation: Il rêve de se débarrasser de toute valeur matérielle et d'entamer un éveil spirituel.

text: they came to pray , but instead they end up in the middle of an unpleasant religious argument as they suddenly get interrupted by a mystical appearance : is it god ?
translation: Ils sont venus prier, mais au lieu de cela, ils se retrouvent au milieu d'une désagréable dispute religieuse lorsqu'ils sont soudainement interrompus par une apparition mystique : est-ce Dieu ?

back_translation: These are the disturbing images of a land ravaged by war that prove to be more powerful and captivating than the unlikely story of Sarah and Harrison.

text: rock solid family fun out of the gates , extremely imaginative through out , but wanes in the middle

translation: Lorsque Tommy, âgé de 19 ans, un activiste des droits des homosexuels, rencontre Alan, âgé de 24 ans, pour la première fois en 1973, ils se retrouvent aux antipodes du spectre politique.

text: the film has a laundry list of minor shortcomings , but the numerous scenes of gory mayhem are worth the price of admission . . . if `` gory mayhem `` is your idea of a good time .

text: as an adult , bruce has repressed all memories of his parents do to some horrible event that occured when he was 4 . bruce krensler ( as he uses his adoptive parent 's name ) is working in the same field as his father when a freak lab accident triggers the dormant dna in his body .
translation: En tant qu'adulte, Bruce a réprimé tous les souvenirs de ses parents en raison d'un horrible événement survenu quand il avait 4 ans. Bruce Krensler (comme il utilise le nom de ses parents adoptifs) travaille dans le même domaine que son père lorsque un accident de laboratoire inattendu déclenche l'ADN dormant dans son corps.
back_translation: As an adult, Bruce has repressed all memories of his parents due to a horrific event that occurred when he was 4 years old. Bruce Krensler (as he uses the name of his adoptive parents) works in the same field as his father when an unexpected laboratory accident triggers the dormant DNA in his body.

translation: Parker ne peut pas maintenir le niveau d'énergie flottant du début de la ville du film jusqu'à sa conclusion rurale.

text: what might have emerged as hilarious lunacy in the hands of woody allen or mel brooks ( at least during their '70s heyday ) comes across as lame and sophomoric in this debut indie feature .

text: [ reno ] may have a few grating gaps in logic and feels as if a good chunk of its story ended up on the cutting room floor , but there is just enough charm and humor peppered throughout to make it feel as if it was n't a complete waste of time to sit through .
translation: [ reno ] peut avoir quelques lacunes dérangeantes dans sa logique et donne l'impression qu'une bonne partie de son histoire a fini sur le tapis de montage, mais il y a juste assez de charme et d'humour disséminés tout au long pour donner l'impression que ce n'était pas une réelle perte de temps de le regarder.

translation: une petite soap opera morose sur trois personnes superficielles et insensibles qui prennent tour à tour plaisir à se blesser mutuellement. c'est une adaptation longue-métrage d'une de ces rubriques intitulées « ce mariage peut-il être sauvé ? » du Ladies Home Journal.

translation: essayant d'éviter la prison pour fraude par carte de crédit, Price (Patrick McKnight), sur les conseils de son cousin, se cache dans une fraternité universitaire.
back_translation: Trying to avoid prison for credit card fraud, Price (Patrick McKnight), on his cousin's advice, hides in a university fraternity.

text: conveniently numbed and estranged from her surroundings , lillian sleepwalks through life .
translation: convenablement engourdie et étrangère à son environnement, Lillian marche dans la vie comme une somnambule.

text: although some viewers will not be able to stomach so much tongue-in-cheek weirdness , those who do will have found a cult favorite to enjoy for a lifetime .
translation: bien que certains téléspectateurs ne puissent pas supporter autant de bizarrerie au second degré, ceux qui le peuvent auront trouvé un favori culte à apprécier toute une vie.

text: blake now starts to sink into the scary , twisted world of the master where sharing , sacrifice and loyalty take on bizarre and dangerous new meanings .
translation: Blake commence maintenant à plonger dans le monde effrayant et tordu du maître où le partage, le sacrifice et la loyauté prennent des significations bizarres et dangereuses.

text: it goes on for too long and bogs down in a surfeit of characters and unnecessary subplots .
translation: cela dure trop longtemps et s'enlise dans un excès de personnages et des intrigues secondaires inutiles.
back_translation: It lasts too long and gets bogged down in an excess of characters and unnecessary subplots.

text: it 's somewhat clumsy and too lethargically paced -- but its story about a mysterious creature with psychic abilities offers a solid build-up , a terrific climax , and some nice chills along the way .
translation: c'est quelque peu maladroit et trop lent dans son rythme - mais son histoire sur une créature mystérieuse aux capacités psychiques offre une bonne montée en tension, un excellent climax et quelques frissons agréables en cours de route.
back_translation: It's somewhat awkward and too slow in its pace - but its story about a mysterious creature with psychic abilities offers a good build-up of tension, an excellent climax, and some enjoyable thrills along the way.

text: his comedy premises are often hackneyed or just plain crude , calculated to provoke shocked laughter , without following up on a deeper level .
translation: Ses prémisses comiques sont souvent éculées ou tout simplement vulgaires, calculées pour provoquer un rire choqué, sans approfondir à un niveau plus profond.
back_translation: Its comic premises are often clichéd or simply vulgar, designed to provoke a shocked laugh without delving deeper.

text: the weakest of the four harry potter books has been transformed into the stronger of the two films by the thinnest of margins .
translation: le plus faible des quatre livres Harry Potter a été transformé en le plus fort des deux films par la plus fine des marges.
back_translation: The weakest of the four Harry Potter books was transformed into the strongest of the two films by the smallest of margins.

text: the result of an old cia mind-control experiment gone bad , felice quick is on the loose and headed for junior-high school teacher sam blacker .
translation: Le résultat d'une ancienne expérience de contrôle mental de la CIA qui a mal tourné, Felice Quick est en liberté et se dirige vers le professeur de l'école intermédiaire Sam Blacker.
back_translation: The result of a former CIA mind control experiment gone wrong, Felice Quick is at large and heading towards middle school teacher Sam Blacker.

text: love , politics and intrigue intermingle in this taut retelling of graham greene 's classic tale of a disillusioned british journalist , an idealistic young american and the beautiful vietnamese woman that comes between them in 1950s saigon .
translation: L'amour, la politique et l'intrigue s'entremêlent dans cette adaptation tendue du récit classique de Graham Greene, d'un journaliste britannique désillusionné, d'un jeune américain idéaliste et de la belle vietnamienne qui se met entre eux dans le Saïgon des années 1950.
back_translation: Love, politics, and intrigue intertwine in this tense adaptation of Graham Greene's classic tale, featuring a disillusioned British journalist, a young idealistic American, and the beautiful Vietnamese woman who comes between them in 1950s Saigon.

text: the water game is a teen action drama following a group of graduating high school students as they embark on playing a spy vs . spy type game three weeks prior to graduation .
translation: Le jeu de l'eau est un drame d'action pour adolescents qui suit un groupe d'élèves de terminale alors qu'ils commencent à jouer à un jeu de type espion contre espion trois semaines avant la remise des diplômes.
back_translation: The Water Game is an action drama for teenagers that follows a group of high school seniors as they begin to play an espionage-style game three weeks before graduation.

text: a documentary seven years in the making about women in the film business and how they balance , children , love lives and career -- or how they do n't .
translation: un documentaire réalisé sur sept ans sur les femmes dans l'industrie du cinéma et comment elles équilibrent, enfants, vies amoureuses et carrière - ou comment elles ne le font pas.
back_translation: A documentary made over seven years about women in the film industry and how they balance children, love lives, and careers - or how they don't.

text: in spite of his incarceration , west has been continuing his re-animation research , using rats and mice for subjects , and electrocuting them with a special jerry-rigged apparatus .
translation: malgré son incarcération, West a continué sa recherche sur la réanimation, utilisant des rats et des souris comme sujets, et les électrocutant avec un dispositif bricolé spécial.
back_translation: Despite his incarceration, West continued his research on revival, using rats and mice as subjects and electrocuting them with a specially crafted device.

text: i do n't know if frailty will turn bill paxton into an a-list director , but he can rest contentedly with the knowledge that he 's made at least one damn fine horror movie .
translation: Je ne sais pas si "Frailty" fera de Bill Paxton un réalisateur de premier plan, mais il peut se satisfaire de savoir qu'il a réalisé au moins un sacré bon film d'horreur.
back_translation: I don't know if "Frailty" will make Bill Paxton a leading director, but he can be satisfied knowing that he has made at least one damn good horror film.

text: playwright siddalee walker , on the verge of opening a new play , gives a magazine interview in which she discusses her unhappy childhood .
translation: La dramaturge Siddalee Walker, sur le point de présenter une nouvelle pièce, accorde une interview à un magazine dans laquelle elle évoque son enfance malheureuse.
back_translation: The playwright Siddalee Walker, about to present a new play, gives an interview to a magazine in which she talks about her unhappy childhood.

text: children may not understand everything that happens -- i 'm not sure even miyazaki himself does -- but they will almost certainly be fascinated , and undoubtedly delighted .
translation: les enfants ne peuvent pas comprendre tout ce qui se passe -- je ne suis même pas sûr que miyazaki lui-même le comprenne -- mais ils seront presque certainement fascinés, et sans aucun doute ravis.
back_translation: Children cannot understand everything that is happening -- I am not even sure that Miyazaki himself understands it -- but they will almost certainly be fascinated, and undoubtedly delighted.

text: set against the picturesque landscape of the mississippi delta in the 1940 's , `` the rising place `` follows the close friendship of two young women , each of a different race , and their struggle to find purpose in their lives during this time of social injustice and world war .
translation: Situé dans le paysage pittoresque du delta du Mississippi dans les années 1940, « The Rising Place » suit la profonde amitié de deux jeunes femmes, chacune d'une race différente, et leur lutte pour trouver un sens à leur vie durant cette période d'injustice sociale et de guerre mondiale.
back_translation: Set in the picturesque landscape of the Mississippi Delta in the 1940s, "The Rising Place" follows the deep friendship of two young women, each of a different race, and their struggle to find meaning in their lives during this time of social injustice and world war.

text: ram dass fierce grace moulds itself as an example to up-and-coming documentarians , of the overlooked pitfalls of such an endeavour .
translation: Ram Dass : Une grâce féroce se façonne comme un exemple pour les documentaristes en herbe, des pièges négligés d'une telle entreprise.
back_translation: Ram Dass: A fierce grace is shaped as an example for aspiring documentary filmmakers, the overlooked pitfalls of such an enterprise.

text: that such a horrible movie could have sprung from such a great one is one of the year 's worst cinematic tragedies .
translation: Le fait qu'un film aussi horrible ait pu surgir d'un film aussi grand est l'une des pires tragédies cinématographiques de l'année.
back_translation: The fact that such a horrible film could emerge from such a great movie is one of the worst cinematic tragedies of the year.

text: this documentary of cameroon 's repressive political realities begins with the 1990 publication of an open letter to president biya calling for a national conference and the immediate arrest of the letter 's author and publisher .
translation: Ce documentaire sur les réalités politiques répressives du Cameroun commence par la publication en 1990 d'une lettre ouverte au président Biya appelant à une conférence nationale et à l'arrestation immédiate de l'auteur et éditeur de la lettre.
back_translation: This documentary on the repressive political realities of Cameroon begins with the publication in 1990 of an open letter to President Biya calling for a national conference and the immediate arrest of the author and publisher of the letter.

text: the film covers the life of young patricia ( jolie jackunas ) who longs for a career as a singer and songwriter .
translation: Le film raconte la vie de la jeune Patricia (Jolie Jackunas) qui aspire à une carrière de chanteuse et compositrice.
back_translation: The film tells the story of young Patricia (Jolie Jackunas) who aspires to a career as a singer and songwriter.

text: an entertaining , surprisingly well-written and often rowdily amusing picture .
translation: une image divertissante, étonnamment bien écrite et souvent joyeusement amusante.
back_translation: an entertaining image, surprisingly well-written and often joyfully amusing.

text: after having christmas present and rent money stolen by someone posing as santa , they get jobs working as unarmed security guards in the local mall , they get threatened with eviction , pick up girls , get drunk , take drugs and need quick cash .
translation: Après avoir eu des cadeaux de Noël et de l'argent de loyer volés par quelqu'un se faisant passer pour le père Noël, ils trouvent des emplois en tant qu'agents de sécurité non armés dans le centre commercial local. Ils sont menacés d'expulsion, draguent des filles, se saoulent, prennent des drogues et ont besoin d'argent rapidement.
back_translation: After having their Christmas presents and rent money stolen by someone pretending to be Santa Claus, they find jobs as unarmed security guards at the local mall. They are threatened with eviction, flirt with girls, get drunk, take drugs, and need money quickly.

text: a well-made but emotionally scattered film whose hero gives his heart only to the dog .
translation: un film bien construit mais émotionnellement dispersé dont le héros ne donne son cœur qu'au chien.
back_translation: a well-constructed film but emotionally scattered where the hero only gives his heart to the dog.

text: madison , the `` new girl in town , `` quickly sets her sights on the impressionable ben .
translation: Madison, la "nouvelle fille en ville", fixe rapidement son attention sur le influençable Ben.
back_translation: Madison, the "new girl in town," quickly sets her sights on the impressionable Ben.

text: believing his parent 's dead , bruce is raised by adoptive parents .
translation: croyant que ses parents sont morts, Bruce est élevé par des parents adoptifs.
back_translation: Believing that his parents are dead, Bruce is raised by adoptive parents.

text: `` the ballad of bering strait `` is a cinema-verite film following seven russian teenagers who have come to america to become country music stars .
translation: « La ballade du détroit de Bering » est un film de cinéma-vérité suivant sept adolescents russes qui sont venus en Amérique pour devenir des stars de la musique country.
back_translation: "The Ballad of the Bering Strait" is a vérité film following seven Russian teenagers who came to America to become country music stars.

text: cold and scattered , minority report commands interest almost solely as an exercise in gorgeous visuals . that 's not vintage spielberg and that , finally , is minimally satisfying .
translation: froid et éparpillé, Minority Report suscite de l'intérêt presque uniquement en tant qu'exercice de superbes visuels. Ce n'est pas du Spielberg vintage et cela, finalement, est à peine satisfaisant.
back_translation: Cold and scattered, Minority Report generates interest almost exclusively as an exercise in superb visuals. This is not vintage Spielberg and that, ultimately, is barely satisfying.

text: so the hunt begins as ted delivers a first round of come-ons and invitations for his object of desire to become entangled , but nothing works .
translation: Ainsi, la chasse commence alors que Ted lance un premier round de flirts et d'invitations pour que son objet de désir s'engage, mais rien ne fonctionne.
back_translation: Thus, the hunt begins as Ted throws out a first round of flirtations and invitations to get his object of desire to commit, but nothing works.

text: in his role of observer of the scene , lawrence sounds whiny and defensive , as if his life-altering experiences made him bitter and less mature .
translation: Dans son rôle d'observateur de la scène, Lawrence semble plaintif et sur la défensive, comme si ses expériences bouleversantes l'avaient rendu amer et moins mature.
back_translation: In his role as an observer of the scene, Lawrence appears plaintive and defensive, as if his overwhelming experiences have made him bitter and less mature.

text: culled from nearly two years of filming , the documentary 's candid interviews , lyric moments of grim beauty , and powerful verite footage takes us beyond the usual stereotypes of the rap world and into the life of tislam milliner , a struggling rapper who 's ambitious to make it out of the `` hood `` .
translation: tiré de près de deux ans de tournage, le documentaire présente des interviews candid, des moments lyriques de beauté sombre et des séquences puissantes de vérité qui nous emmènent au-delà des stéréotypes habituels du monde du rap et dans la vie de Tislam Milliner, un rappeur en difficulté qui aspire à sortir du "hood".
back_translation: Drawn from nearly two years of filming, the documentary features candid interviews, lyrical moments of dark beauty, and powerful sequences of truth that take us beyond the usual stereotypes of the rap world and into the life of Tislam Milliner, a struggling rapper who aspires to escape the "hood."

text: however , jane , wendy 's 12-year-old daughter , sees it all as make believe and refuses to believe in the tales .
translation: Cependant, Jane, la fille de 12 ans de Wendy, considère tout cela comme un jeu et refuse de croire aux histoires.
back_translation: However, Jane, Wendy's 12-year-old daughter, sees it all as a game and refuses to believe the stories.

text: ( king plays a `` russian mob princess `` ; roden plays an evil kung fu master who is seeking the scroll ) based on the very underground comic book , an immortal tibetan monk ( chow ) finds a mentor in a young street kid ( scott ) whom he can teach to protect the ancient scroll he 's been guarding for the last sixty years .
translation: ( King joue une « princesse de la mafia russe » ; Roden joue un maître kung-fu maléfique qui cherche le rouleau ) basé sur la bande dessinée très underground, un moine tibétain immortel (Chow) trouve un mentor chez un jeune gamin de la rue (Scott) qu'il peut enseigner à protéger le rouleau ancien qu'il garde depuis soixante ans.
back_translation: (King plays a "Russian mafia princess"; Roden plays an evil kung-fu master searching for the scroll) based on the very underground comic, an immortal Tibetan monk (Chow) finds a mentor in a young street kid (Scott) whom he can teach to protect the ancient scroll he has guarded for sixty years.

text: the controversial bad-boy of comedy delivers a piercing look at his life , lifting the metaphorical smokescreen that he feels has clouded the public view , commenting on everything from the dangers of smoking to the trials of relationships , and unleashing a nonstop litany of raucous anecdotes , stinging social commentary and very personal reflections about life .
translation: le bad-boy controversé de la comédie offre un regard perçant sur sa vie, levant le brouillard métaphorique qu'il estime avoir obscurci le regard du public, commentant tout, des dangers du tabagisme aux épreuves des relations, et déchaînant une litanie ininterrompue d'anecdotes bruyantes, de commentaires sociaux acerbes et de réflexions très personnelles sur la vie.
back_translation: The controversial bad-boy of comedy provides a piercing look into his life, lifting the metaphorical fog that he believes has obscured the public's view, commenting on everything from the dangers of smoking to the trials of relationships, and unleashing an uninterrupted litany of noisy anecdotes, scathing social commentary, and very personal reflections on life.

text: bow 's best moments are when he 's getting busy on the basketball court because that 's when he really scores .
translation: Les meilleurs moments de Bow sont quand il s'active sur le terrain de basket, car c'est là qu'il marque vraiment.
back_translation: The best moments of Bow are when he gets active on the basketball court, because that's when he truly scores.

text: a colorful , joyous celebration of life ; a tapestry woven of romance , dancing , singing , and unforgettable characters .
translation: une célébration colorée et joyeuse de la vie ; une tapisserie tissée de romance, de danse, de chant et de personnages inoubliables.
back_translation: a colorful and joyful celebration of life; a tapestry woven with romance, dance, song, and unforgettable characters.

text: if you are curious to see the darker side of what 's going on with young tv actors ( dawson leery did what ? ! ? ) , or see some interesting storytelling devices , you might want to check it out , but there 's nothing very attractive about this movie .
translation: Si vous êtes curieux de découvrir le côté sombre de ce qui se passe avec les jeunes acteurs de télévision (Dawson Leery a fait quoi ? ! ?), ou de voir des dispositifs narratifs intéressants, vous pourriez vouloir y jeter un œil, mais il n'y a rien de très attrayant dans ce film.
back_translation: If you're curious to discover the dark side of what happens with young television actors (What did Dawson Leery do?!?), or to see interesting narrative devices, you might want to take a look at it, but there is nothing very appealing about this movie.

text: but hamilton high is about to become an all too real battleground when a well-organized group of killers armed with automatic weapons and explosives invade the supposedly deserted school after hours to use it as an operating base for meticulously planned armored car robbery .
translation: Mais le lycée Hamilton est sur le point de devenir un champ de bataille trop réel lorsqu'un groupe bien organisé de tueurs armés d'armes automatiques et d'explosifs envahit l'école supposément déserte après les heures de cours pour l'utiliser comme base d'opérations pour un braquage de fourgon blindé minutieusement planifié.
back_translation: But Hamilton High is about to become a very real battleground when a well-organized group of killers armed with automatic weapons and explosives invades the supposedly deserted school after hours to use it as a base of operations for a meticulously planned armored truck heist.

text: undecided about his future , yun fei , an unknown young poet , goes to visit an old university friend in the suburbs of beijing to seek his advice .
translation: indécis quant à son avenir, Yun Fei, un jeune poète inconnu, va rendre visite à un vieil ami d'université dans la banlieue de Pékin pour demander son avis.
back_translation: Undecided about his future, Yun Fei, an unknown young poet, goes to visit an old college friend in the suburbs of Beijing to ask for his opinion.

text: in this bittersweet slice of working class single new jersey life , best friends debby and beth ( both pushing thirty ) go looking for love in the wrong place - namely their favorite bar , oliver 's .
translation: Dans ce doux-amer extrait de la vie de classe ouvrière d'une célibataire du New Jersey, les meilleures amies Debby et Beth (toutes deux sur le point de franchir la trentaine) partent à la recherche de l'amour au mauvais endroit - à savoir leur bar préféré, Oliver's.
back_translation: In this bittersweet excerpt from the working-class life of a single woman from New Jersey, best friends Debby and Beth (both on the verge of turning thirty) are on a quest for love in all the wrong places - namely, their favorite bar, Oliver's.

text: when a chinese rebel murders chon 's estranged father and escapes to england , chon and roy make their way to london with revenge on their minds .
translation: Lorsqu'un rebelle chinois tue le père éloigné de Chon et s'échappe en Angleterre, Chon et Roy se rendent à Londres avec la vengeance en tête.
back_translation: When a Chinese rebel kills Chon's distant father and escapes to England, Chon and Roy head to London with revenge on their minds.

text: this does n't go down well with his superiors and they decide that rajput is now a liability to the bank and they sack him .
translation: Cela ne se passe pas bien avec ses supérieurs et ils décident que Rajput est maintenant un fardeau pour la banque et ils le licencient.
back_translation: Things are not going well with his superiors, and they decide that Rajput is now a burden for the bank, so they fire him.

text: armed with $ 20 dollars and a backpack pastor william sets off on an adventure across the united states in an adventure that would change the lives of millions and test him beyond measure .
translation: Armé de 20 dollars et d'un sac à dos, le pasteur William se lance dans une aventure à travers les États-Unis, une aventure qui changerait la vie de millions de personnes et le mettrait à l'épreuve au-delà de toute mesure.
back_translation: Armed with 20 dollars and a backpack, Pastor William embarks on an adventure across the United States, an adventure that would change the lives of millions of people and put him to the test beyond measure.

text: M-^Ethe story is far-flung , illogical , and plain stupid .
translation: L'histoire est éloignée, illogique et tout simplement stupide.
back_translation: The story is distant, illogical, and simply stupid.

text: most of them realize it is counterfeit , but too late to take action .
translation: la plupart d'entre eux réalisent que c'est un contrefaçon, mais il est trop tard pour agir.
back_translation: Most of them realize that it is a counterfeit, but it is too late to act.

text: the work of an exhausted , desiccated talent who ca n't get out of his own way .
translation: le travail d'un talent épuisé et desséché qui n'arrive pas à se sortir de sa propre route.
back_translation: the work of a talent exhausted and withered who cannot get out of his own way.

text: if you like blood , guts and crazy beasts stalking men with guns though . . . you will likely enjoy this monster .
translation: si vous aimez le sang, les entrailles et les bêtes folles traquant des hommes armés de fusils cependant . . . vous apprécierez probablement ce monstre.
back_translation: If you like blood, guts, and crazy beasts hunting armed men with rifles, then... you will probably enjoy this monster.

text: enigma is anything but enigmatic about affairs of the heart , and is well worth seeing for its elective affinities alone .
translation: L'énigme n'est en rien énigmatique concernant les affaires du cœur, et mérite vraiment d'être vue rien que pour ses affinités électives.
back_translation: The puzzle is not in any way enigmatic concerning matters of the heart, and truly deserves to be seen just for its elective affinities.

text: a full world has been presented onscreen , not some series of carefully structured plot points building to a pat resolution .
translation: un monde complet a été présenté à l'écran, pas une série de points d'intrigue soigneusement structurés menant à une résolution facile.
back_translation: A complete world was presented on screen, not a series of carefully structured plot points leading to an easy resolution.

text: upon his arrival he hears talk about monroe hutchen ( snipes ) who is the top ranked prison boxing champ 10 years running .
translation: À son arrivée, il entend parler de Monroe Hutchen (Snipes), qui est le champion de boxe en prison le mieux classé depuis 10 ans.

text: an offbeat horror tale about a group of five college friends on vacation at a remote mountain cabin when one contracts a flesh-eating virus .
translation: un conte d'horreur original sur un groupe de cinq amis d'université en vacances dans un chalet isolé à la montagne lorsque l'un d'eux contracte un virus mangeur de chair.
back_translation: An original horror story about a group of five university friends on vacation in a remote mountain cabin when one of them contracts a flesh-eating virus.

text: for those in search of something different , wendigo is a genuinely bone-chilling tale .
translation: Pour ceux qui cherchent quelque chose de différent, Wendigo est un véritable récit glaçant.
back_translation: For those looking for something different, Wendigo is a truly chilling tale.

text: part of the film 's cheeky charm comes from its vintage schmaltz .
translation: Une partie du charme espiègle du film vient de son vintage schmaltz.
back_translation: A part of the mischievous charm of the film comes from its vintage schmaltz.

text: though he tried to maintain a life of solitude , he is soon entangled with an artist who is struggling with a personal tragedy and an overly-friendly cuban hot dog vendor .
translation: bien qu'il essaie de maintenir une vie de solitude, il se retrouve bientôt mêlé à un artiste qui lutte contre une tragédie personnelle et un vendeur de hot-dogs cubains trop amical.
back_translation: Although he tries to maintain a life of solitude, he soon finds himself involved with an artist struggling with a personal tragedy and a too-friendly Cuban hot dog vendor.

translation: une œuvre puissante, captivante et intelligente bien qu'imparfaite . . . un film d'une immense ambition qui atteint ses objectifs plus souvent qu'autrement.
back_translation: a powerful, captivating, and intelligent work, although imperfect . . . a film of immense ambition that achieves its goals more often than not.

text: this is not a retread of `` dead poets ' society . ``
translation: ce n'est pas un réchauffé de ``la société des poètes disparus.``
back_translation: It's not a rehash of "Dead Poets Society."

text: ritchie may not have a novel thought in his head , but he knows how to pose madonna .
translation: Ritchie n'a peut-être pas une pensée novatrice dans la tête, mais il sait comment poser Madonna.
back_translation: Ritchie may not have innovative ideas in his head, but he knows how to pose Madonna.

text: when carlitos is released after doing 2 years of `` hard time `` , he attempts to redeem himself and sets an example for his 5 year-old son .
translation: Lorsque Carlitos est libéré après avoir purgé 2 ans de « travaux forcés », il tente de se racheter et de donner l'exemple à son fils de 5 ans.

text: ritchie 's film is easier to swallow than wertmuller 's polemical allegory , but it 's self-defeatingly decorous .
translation: Le film de Ritchie est plus facile à digérer que l'allégorie polémique de Wertmüller, mais il est délibérément trop décoré.
back_translation: Ritchie's film is easier to digest than Wertmüller's controversial allegory, but it is deliberately overdone.

text: viewed on its own terms , treasure planet is better-than-average family entertainment , but true fans of the stevenson 's novel will likely prefer disney 's more faithful 1950 live-action swashbuckling classic .
translation: Vu en soi, "Treasure Planet" est un divertissement familial au-dessus de la moyenne, mais les véritables fans du roman de Stevenson préféreront probablement le classique en prises de vues réelles de Disney de 1950, plus fidèle et plein de mêlées.
back_translation: Viewed in itself, "Treasure Planet" is an above-average family entertainment, but true fans of Stevenson's novel will likely prefer Disney's 1950 live-action classic, which is more faithful and full of brawls.

text: it has been a year since johnny and wayne created the ultimate bra for samantha 's company .
translation: Cela fait un an que Johnny et Wayne ont créé le soutien-gorge ultime pour l'entreprise de Samantha.

text: however , when novak 's book is a complete success , catcher finds himself being blown off by her !

translation: la caractérisation a été sacrifiée au profit du spectacle.

translation: tout comme Steven Spielberg a réalisé 'A.I.' de Stanley Kubrick,

text: a sexy , peculiar and always entertaining costume drama set in renaissance spain , and the fact that it 's based on true events somehow makes it all the more compelling .
translation: un drame costumé sexy, particulier et toujours divertissant se déroulant dans l'Espagne de la Renaissance, et le fait qu'il soit basé sur des événements réels rend cela d'autant plus captivant.

translation: ces deux faits provoquent une chaîne d'événements qui change non seulement sa vie, mais aussi celle de ses amis de manière brutale. . .

text: while the subject 's appeal is limited and the film 's 106-minute running time excessive , viewers who do respond to the pic will find it raw , real and cathartic .
translation: Bien que l'attrait du sujet soit limité et que la durée excessive de 106 minutes du film soit un inconvénient, les spectateurs qui réagiront à ce film le trouveront brut, réel et cathartique.
back_translation: Although the appeal of the subject is limited and the film's excessive length of 106 minutes is a drawback, viewers who respond to this film will find it raw, real, and cathartic.

translation: parle avec éloquence de la relation symbiotique entre l'art et la vie.

translation: il m'a soulevé, m'a fait tournoyer et m'a reposé dans mon siège avec plus de force émotionnelle que tout autre film récent.
back_translation: He picked me up, spun me around, and set me back in my seat with more emotional force than any other recent film.

translation: si vous êtes capable d'y aller, détendez-vous et abaissez vos attentes, vous pourriez en être emporté.

text: less about shakespeare than the spawn of fools who saw quentin tarantino 's handful of raucous gangster films and branched out into their own pseudo-witty copycat interpretations .
translation: moins sur Shakespeare que sur la progéniture de fous qui ont vu une poignée de films de gangsters bruyants de Quentin Tarantino et se sont aventurés dans leurs propres interprétations pseudo-pleines d'esprit.

translation: comme demandé dans le premier film, quel genre de personnes nomme leur fils Gay m. focker ?

text: as lo-fi as the special effects are , the folks who cobbled nemesis together indulge the force of humanity over hardware in a way that george lucas has long forgotten .
translation: Aussi bas de gamme que soient les effets spéciaux, les personnes qui ont assemblé Nemesis prennent plaisir à privilégier la force de l'humanité sur le matériel d'une manière que George Lucas a depuis longtemps oubliée.
back_translation: As low-quality as the special effects may be, the people who put together Nemesis take pleasure in prioritizing the strength of humanity over material in a way that George Lucas has long forgotten.

text: based on real events then fictionalized the film is set in los angeles circa 1977 and chronicles the rise of two fast-talking hustlers charlie rainone and jack brenner from the streets of south philly to the executive towers of the music business .

back_translation: Based on true events then fictionalized, the film is set in Los Angeles around 1977 and tells the story of the rise of two smooth-talking con artists, Charlie Rainone and Jack Brenner, from the streets of South Philly to the executive towers of the music industry.
