text: soon she finds herself in the most bizarre situations like doing `` harry & # 38 ; sally `` 's famous faked orgasm scene , judging everyone , starting fights and visiting the theatre to find out her boyfriend is `` doing `` other girls on stage .
translation: bientôt, elle se retrouve dans les situations les plus bizarres, comme faire la fameuse scène de l'orgasme simulé de `` Harry & Sally ``, juger tout le monde, provoquer des disputes et visiter le théâtre pour découvrir que son petit ami `` fréquente `` d'autres filles sur scène.
back_translation: Soon, she finds herself in the strangest situations, like reenacting the famous simulated orgasm scene from "Harry & Sally," judging everyone, provoking arguments, and visiting the theater to discover that her boyfriend is "seeing" other girls on stage.

text: while the plot follows a predictable connect-the-dots course . . . director john schultz colors the picture in some evocative shades .
translation: Bien que l'intrigue suive un cours prédictible de points à relier . . . le réalisateur John Schultz colore le film de nuances évocatrices.
back_translation: Although the plot follows a predictable course of connecting points . . . director John Schultz colors the film with evocative hues.

text: me without you has a bracing truth that 's refreshing after the phoniness of female-bonding pictures like divine secrets of the ya-ya sisterhood .
translation: Moi sans toi a une vérité revigorante qui est rafraîchissante après la fausse apparence des films sur la relation entre femmes comme Les secrets de la confrérie ya-ya.
back_translation: Me Without You has a refreshing truth that is revitalizing after the false appearances of films about women’s relationships like Divine Secrets of the Ya-Ya Sisterhood.

text: the search takes the family to strife-torn sri lanka , where amudha comes face-to-face with reality , and reconciles herself to it .
translation: la recherche mène la famille au Sri Lanka déchiré par les conflits, où Amudha est confrontée à la réalité et s'y réconcilie.
back_translation: The search takes the family to conflict-torn Sri Lanka, where Amudha confronts reality and reconciles with it.

text: there 's not enough here to justify the almost two hours .
translation: il n'y a pas assez ici pour justifier les presque deux heures.
back_translation: There isn't enough here to justify the almost two hours.

text: matters become even more complicated when juwanna realizes that he is falling for his teammate michelle ( vivica a . fox ) , who shows him that there is more to women than meets the eye .
translation: les choses deviennent encore plus compliquées lorsque Juwanna réalise qu'il tombe amoureux de sa coéquipière Michelle (Vivica A. Fox), qui lui montre qu'il y a plus chez les femmes qu'il n'y paraît.
back_translation: Things get even more complicated when Juwanna realizes that he's falling in love with his teammate Michelle (Vivica A. Fox), who shows him that there is more to women than meets the eye.

text: based on the famous 1947 hoax letter written to vought aviation in which thousands of copies have since been distributed .
translation: basé sur la célèbre lettre de canular de 1947 écrite à Vought Aviation, dont des milliers d'exemplaires ont depuis été distribués.
back_translation: based on the famous hoax letter of 1947 written to Vought Aviation, of which thousands of copies have since been distributed.

text: a british television personality , terry twillstein ( bob odenkirk ) , gets sight of ronnie and brings ronnie to hollywood to get him his own tv show .
translation: Une personnalité de la télévision britannique, Terry Twillstein (Bob Odenkirk), aperçoit Ronnie et l'amène à Hollywood pour lui obtenir sa propre émission de télévision.
back_translation: A British television personality, Terry Twillstein (Bob Odenkirk), spots Ronnie and brings him to Hollywood to get him his own television show.

text: the tuxedo was n't just bad ; it was , as my friend david cross would call it , 'hungry-man portions of bad ' .
translation: le smoking n'était pas seulement mauvais ; c'était, comme dirait mon ami David Cross, 'des portions de mauvaise qualité pour hommes affamés'.
back_translation: The tuxedo was not just bad; it was, as my friend David Cross would say, 'poor quality portions for hungry men.'

text: kimberly corman and her friends decide to head out on a trip .
translation: Kimberly Corman et ses amis décident de partir en voyage.
back_translation: Kimberly Corman and her friends decide to go on a trip.

text: utterly lacking in charm , wit and invention , roberto benigni 's pinocchio is an astonishingly bad film .
translation: totalement dépourvu de charme, d'esprit et d'invention, le Pinocchio de Roberto Benigni est un film incroyablement mauvais.
back_translation: Totally devoid of charm, wit, and invention, Roberto Benigni's Pinocchio is an incredibly bad film.

text: an experimental documentary about a family 's loss of a child and the struggle between remembrance and forgetting .
translation: un documentaire expérimental sur la perte d'un enfant par une famille et la lutte entre le souvenir et l'oubli.
back_translation: An experimental documentary about a family's loss of a child and the struggle between memory and forgetfulness.

text: message movie or an action-packed submarine spectacular ? alas , it 's neither .
translation: message film ou un spectaculaire sous-marin rempli d'action ? hélas, ce n'est ni l'un ni l'autre.
back_translation: A film with a message or a spectacular action-packed submarine? Unfortunately, it's neither.

text: 'wheatfield with crows ' takes the life of vincent van gogh and sets it in the modern day music industry .
translation: 'Champ de blé avec des corbeaux' prend la vie de Vincent van Gogh et la situe dans l'industrie musicale moderne.
back_translation: 'Wheat Field with Crows' takes the life of Vincent van Gogh and places it in the modern music industry.

text: a dozen years later we find west is an inmate at a forbidding old prison .
translation: Une douzaine d'années plus tard, nous découvrons que West est un détenu dans une vieille prison redoutable.
back_translation: A dozen years later, we find out that West is an inmate in an old formidable prison.

text: an immensely entertaining look at some of the unsung heroes of 20th century pop music .
translation: un regard immensément divertissant sur certains des héros méconnus de la pop music du 20ème siècle.
back_translation: An immensely entertaining look at some of the unsung heroes of 20th-century pop music.

text: broomfield reveals an ironic manifestation of institutionalized slavery that ties a black-owned record label with a white-empowered police force .
translation: Broomfield révèle une manifestation ironique de l'esclavage institutionnalisé qui relie un label de musique détenu par des Noirs à une force de police soutenue par des Blancs.
back_translation: Broomfield reveals an ironic manifestation of institutionalized slavery that connects a music label owned by Black people to a police force supported by White people.

text: even on those rare occasions when the narrator stops yammering , miller 's hand often feels unsure .
translation: Même lors de ces rares occasions où le narrateur cesse de jacasser, la main de Miller semble souvent incertaine.
back_translation: Even on those rare occasions when the narrator stops chattering, Miller's hand often appears uncertain.

text: a brain twister , less a movie-movie than a funny and weird meditation on hollywood , success , artistic integrity and intellectual bankruptcy .
translation: un casse-tête, moins un film qu'une drôle et étrange méditation sur Hollywood, le succès, l'intégrité artistique et la faillite intellectuelle.
back_translation: a puzzle, less a film than a funny and strange meditation on Hollywood, success, artistic integrity, and intellectual bankruptcy.

text: consequently , what begins as an enthusiastic road trip is soon plagued with mysterious roadside obstacles that threaten to prevent the boys from ever making it to the competition .
translation: Par conséquent, ce qui commence comme un voyage routier enthousiasmant est bientôt assombri par des obstacles mystérieux sur le bord de la route qui menacent d'empêcher les garçons d'arriver jamais à la compétition.
back_translation: As a result, what starts as an exciting road trip is soon shadowed by mysterious obstacles along the roadside that threaten to prevent the boys from ever reaching the competition.

text: shanghai ghetto , much stranger than any fiction , brings this unknown slice of history affectingly to life .
translation: Le ghetto de Shanghai, bien plus étrange que n'importe quelle fiction, donne vie de manière émouvante à cette tranche d'histoire méconnue.
back_translation: The Shanghai ghetto, much stranger than any fiction, brings to life this little-known slice of history in an emotionally compelling way.

text: inherently caustic and oddly whimsical , the film chimes in on the grieving process and strangely draws the audience into the unexplainable pain and eccentricities that are attached to the concept of loss .
translation: Inhérent caustique et étrangement fantaisiste, le film s'accorde sur le processus de deuil et attire de manière étrange le public dans la douleur inexpliquée et les excentricités qui sont attachées au concept de perte.
back_translation: Inherently caustic and strangely whimsical, the film agrees on the process of mourning and strangely attracts the audience into the unexplained pain and eccentricities associated with the concept of loss.

text: the obnoxious special effects , the obligatory outbursts of flatulence and the incessant , so-five-minutes-ago pop music on the soundtrack overwhelm what is left of the scruffy , dopey old hanna-barbera charm .
translation: les effets spéciaux odieux, les éclats de flatulence obligatoires et la musique pop incessante, tellement démodée, sur la bande sonore submergent ce qu'il reste du charme négligé et idiot des anciens Hanna-Barbera.
back_translation: The obnoxious special effects, the mandatory flatulence bursts, and the incessant, so outdated pop music on the soundtrack overwhelm what remains of the neglected and silly charm of the old Hanna-Barbera.

text: ver wiel has concocted one of the most elaborately twisted , diverting caper films in years .
translation: Ver Wiel a concocté l'un des films de canular les plus astucieusement tordus et divertissants depuis des années.
back_translation: Ver Wiel has crafted one of the most cleverly twisted and entertaining prank films in years.

text: james clayton ( farrell ) might not have the attitude of a typical recruit , but he is one of the smartest graduating seniors in the country - and he 's just the person that walter burke ( pacino ) wants in the agency .
translation: James Clayton (Farrell) n'a peut-être pas l'attitude d'un recrue typique, mais il est l'un des diplômés les plus brillants du pays - et c'est précisément la personne que Walter Burke (Pacino) veut dans l'agence.
back_translation: James Clayton (Farrell) may not have the attitude of a typical recruit, but he is one of the brightest graduates in the country - and he is precisely the person Walter Burke (Pacino) wants in the agency.

text: a serious movie with serious ideas . but seriously , folks , it does n't work .
translation: un film sérieux avec des idées sérieuses. mais sérieusement, les amis, ça ne fonctionne pas.
back_translation: A serious film with serious ideas. But seriously, friends, it doesn't work.

text: to get the job done , they must all do what they have never done before # trust each other .
translation: Pour mener à bien la tâche, ils doivent tous faire ce qu'ils n'ont jamais fait auparavant : se faire confiance.
back_translation: To successfully complete the task, they all must do what they have never done before: trust each other.

text: its scenes and sensibility are all more than familiar , but it exudes a kind of nostalgic spy-movie charm and , at the same time , is so fresh and free of the usual thriller nonsense that it all seems to be happening for the first time .
translation: Ses scènes et sa sensibilité sont toutes plus que familières, mais cela dégage une sorte de charme nostalgique de film d'espionnage et, en même temps, c'est si frais et dépourvu des absurdités habituelles des thrillers que tout semble se dérouler comme si c'était la première fois.
back_translation: Its scenes and sensitivity are all more than familiar, but it exudes a kind of nostalgic charm of a spy movie and, at the same time, it feels so fresh and devoid of the usual absurdities of thrillers that everything seems to unfold as if it were the first time.

text: suddenly a hand can do something no hand has done before and lips something no lips have ever done .
translation: soudainement, une main peut faire quelque chose qu'aucune main n'a jamais fait auparavant et des lèvres quelque chose que nulle lèvre n'a jamais fait.
back_translation: Suddenly, a hand can do something that no hand has ever done before, and lips something that no lip has ever done.

text: at the same time , gwen who writes for the college paper , is tasked with doing a story on him , but van is too busy partying to do that .
translation: En même temps, Gwen, qui écrit pour le journal du collège, est chargée de faire un article sur lui, mais Van est trop occupé à faire la fête pour s'en occuper.
back_translation: At the same time, Gwen, who writes for the college newspaper, is tasked with writing an article about him, but Van is too busy partying to take care of it.

text: while accompanying an us senator on his mission in cuba , he makes a botch of so many things , that a minor blunder by the senator turns into a serious incident , which intensifies into a second cuban crisis - thanks to further entanglements by the media , police , and diplomats who represent the arch-enemies usa and cuba .
translation: en accompagnant un sénateur américain dans sa mission à Cuba, il commet tant de gaffes qu'une petite erreur du sénateur se transforme en un incident sérieux, qui s'intensifie en une seconde crise cubaine - grâce à d'autres complications causées par les médias, la police et des diplomates représentant les ennemis historiques, les États-Unis et Cuba.
back_translation: While accompanying an American senator on his mission to Cuba, he makes so many blunders that a small mistake by the senator turns into a serious incident, which escalates into a second Cuban crisis - thanks to further complications caused by the media, the police, and diplomats representing historic enemies, the United States and Cuba.

text: this `` league `` comprises seafarer/inventor captain nemo ( shah ) , vampiress mina harker ( wilson ) , an invisible man named rodney skinner ( curran ) , american secret service agent tom sawyer ( west ) , the ageless and invincible dorian gray ( townsend ) , and the dangerous split personality of dr . jekyll/mr .
translation: cette `` ligue `` comprend le capitaine nemo (shah), la vampiressa mina harker (wilson), un homme invisible nommé rodney skinner (curran), l'agent secret américain tom sawyer (west), l'immortel et invincible dorian gray (townsend), et la dangereuse personnalité multiple du dr. jekyll/m.
back_translation: this "league" includes Captain Nemo (Shah), the vampiress Mina Harker (Wilson), an invisible man named Rodney Skinner (Curran), the American secret agent Tom Sawyer (West), the immortal and invincible Dorian Gray (Townsend), and the dangerous multiple personality of Dr. Jekyll/Mr. Hyde.

text: the movie begins in the past where a young boy named sam attempts to save celebi from a hunter .
translation: Le film commence dans le passé où un jeune garçon nommé Sam tente de sauver Celebi d'un chasseur.
back_translation: The film begins in the past where a young boy named Sam tries to save Celebi from a hunter.

text: after several scenes of this tacky nonsense , you 'll be wistful for the testosterone-charged wizardry of jerry bruckheimer productions , especially because half past dead is like the rock on a wal-mart budget .
translation: Après plusieurs scènes de ces absurdités tape-à-l'œil, vous serez nostalgique de la magie chargée de testostérone des productions de Jerry Bruckheimer, surtout parce que "Half Past Dead" ressemble à "The Rock" avec un budget de Walmart.
back_translation: After several scenes of these flashy absurdities, you will feel nostalgic for the testosterone-fueled magic of Jerry Bruckheimer's productions, especially since "Half Past Dead" resembles "The Rock" with a Walmart budget.

text: when the day finally comes , johnny breaks from joe , which leads to only one thing - violence .
translation: Lorsque le jour tant attendu arrive enfin, Johnny se sépare de Joe, ce qui ne conduit qu'à une seule chose : la violence.
back_translation: When the long-awaited day finally arrives, Johnny separates from Joe, which leads to only one thing: violence.

text: oops , she 's really done it this time . that chirpy songbird britney spears has popped up with more mindless drivel .
translation: Oups, elle l'a vraiment encore fait cette fois. Cette joyeuse chanteuse Britney Spears a refait surface avec encore plus de balivernes sans queue ni tête.
back_translation: Oops, she really did it again this time. This cheerful singer Britney Spears has resurfaced with even more nonsense without rhyme or reason.

text: this re-do is so dumb and so exploitative in its violence that , ironically , it becomes everything that the rather clumsy original was railing against .
translation: ce re-make est si stupide et si exploitant dans sa violence que, ironiquement, il devient tout ce contre quoi l'original plutôt maladroit s'élevait.
back_translation: This remake is so stupid and so exploitative in its violence that, ironically, it becomes everything against which the rather clumsy original rose up.

text: when young , virginal caroline ( misty mundae ) learns of her mother 's death in paris , she travels to the city of lights for the funeral .
translation: Quand la jeune et vierge Caroline (Misty Mundae) apprend la mort de sa mère à Paris, elle se rend dans la ville lumière pour les funérailles.
back_translation: When the young and virgin Caroline (Misty Mundae) learns of her mother's death in Paris, she travels to the City of Light for the funeral.

text: skins has a desolate air , but eyre , a native american raised by white parents , manages to infuse the rocky path to sibling reconciliation with flashes of warmth and gentle humor .
translation: Les peaux ont une ambiance désolée, mais Eyre, un Amérindien élevé par des parents blancs, parvient à infuser le chemin rocailleux vers la réconciliation entre frères et sœurs de moments de chaleur et d'humour délicat.
back_translation: The skins have a desolate ambiance, but Eyre, a Native American raised by white parents, manages to infuse the rocky path to reconciliation among brothers and sisters with moments of warmth and delicate humor.

text: there is no pleasure in watching a child suffer . just embarrassment and a vague sense of shame .
translation: Il n'y a aucun plaisir à voir un enfant souffrir. Juste de l'embarras et un vague sentiment de honte.
back_translation: There is no pleasure in seeing a child suffer. Just embarrassment and a vague sense of shame.

text: enigma looks great , has solid acting and a neat premise . yet why it fails is a riddle wrapped in a mystery inside an enigma .
translation: Enigma est superbe, avec des performances solides et un concept intéressant. Pourtant, sa défaillance est une énigme enveloppée dans un mystère à l'intérieur d'une énigme.
back_translation: Enigma is superb, with solid performance and an interesting concept. Yet, its failure is an enigma wrapped in a mystery inside an enigma.

text: ultimately , she must accept that those she loves can give her love and nothing more and that she must find her own , uncertain way .
translation: En fin de compte, elle doit accepter que ceux qu'elle aime peuvent lui donner de l'amour et rien de plus, et qu'elle doit trouver son propre chemin, incertain.
back_translation: In the end, she must accept that those she loves can give her love and nothing more, and that she must find her own, uncertain path.

text: for carlos - who has been challenged by his mentor to rework a superficial comic strip into something with depth and substance - running the store is the last thing on his mind .
translation: pour Carlos - qui a été mis au défi par son mentor de retravailler une bande dessinée superficielle en quelque chose de profond et de substantiel - tenir le magasin est la dernière chose à laquelle il pense.
back_translation: For Carlos - who was challenged by his mentor to transform a superficial comic into something deep and substantial - running the store is the last thing on his mind.

text: as tweedy talks about canning his stockbroker and repairing his pool , you yearn for a few airborne tv sets or nude groupies on the nod to liven things up .
translation: Alors que Tweedy parle de renvoyer son courtier et de réparer sa piscine, vous aspirez à quelques téléviseurs flottants ou à des groupies nues en train de somnoler pour égayer un peu les choses.
back_translation: While Tweedy talks about firing his broker and fixing his pool, you long for some floating TVs or naked groupies dozing off to liven things up a bit.

text: but as documentary filmmaker , zeus papagianakopoulous , is about to find out , the real story took place when the cameras were n't rolling .
translation: mais en tant que réalisateur de documentaires, Zeus Papagianakopoulos est sur le point de découvrir que la véritable histoire s'est déroulée lorsque les caméras n'étaient pas en train de tourner.
back_translation: But as a documentary filmmaker, Zeus Papagianakopoulos is about to discover that the real story took place when the cameras weren't rolling.

text: traffics in the kind of prechewed racial clichM-is that have already been through the corporate stand-up-comedy mill .
translation: le trafic dans le genre de clichés raciaux précheux qui ont déjà été passés par le moulin de la comédie de stand-up corporate.
back_translation: the traffic in the form of precious racial clichés that have already been put through the mill of corporate stand-up comedy.

text: one of the pleasures in walter 's documentary . . . is the parade of veteran painters , confounded dealers , and miscellaneous bohos who expound upon the subject 's mysterious personality without ever explaining him .
translation: Un des plaisirs du documentaire de Walter... est le défilé de peintres vétérans, de marchands confondus et de divers bohèmes qui s'expriment sur la personnalité mystérieuse du sujet sans jamais l'expliquer.
back_translation: One of the pleasures of Walter's documentary is the parade of veteran painters, confused dealers, and various bohemians who express themselves about the mysterious personality of the subject without ever explaining it.

text: but he finds an unlikely ally in sofia , beno 's sultry mistress .
translation: mais il trouve une alliée inattendue en Sofia, la maîtresse provocante de Beno.
back_translation: but he finds an unexpected ally in Sofia, Beno's provocative mistress.

text: fraud feathers and fairies ( one of the stories from the 'red rock ' trilogy of stage plays ) is based on the california gold rush era in the mythical town of red rock .
translation: Les plumes de fraude et de fées (une des histoires de la trilogie théâtrale 'red rock') est basée sur l'ère de la ruée vers l'or en Californie, dans la ville mythique de red rock.
back_translation: The Feathers of Fraud and Fairies (one of the stories from the theatrical trilogy 'red rock') is based on the era of the Gold Rush in California, in the mythical city of red rock.

text: greg kinnear gives a mesmerizing performance as a full-fledged sex addict who is in complete denial about his obsessive behavior .
translation: Greg Kinnear offre une performance captivante en tant que véritable addict au sexe qui est en complète dénégation de son comportement obsessionnel.
back_translation: Greg Kinnear delivers a captivating performance as a true sex addict who is in complete denial of his obsessive behavior.

text: stryker puts into motion a plan to eradicate the mutants and begins an offensive on the x-men mansion and school .
translation: Stryker met en œuvre un plan pour éradiquer les mutants et commence une offensive contre le manoir et l'école des X-Men.
back_translation: Stryker is implementing a plan to eradicate the mutants and begins an offensive against the mansion and the X-Men's school.

text: the documentary will combine an interview with mr . mcnamara discussing some of the tragedies and glories of the 20th century , archival footage , documents , and an original score by philip glass .
translation: Le documentaire combinera une interview de M. McNamara discutant de certaines des tragédies et des gloires du 20e siècle, des images d'archives, des documents et une bande originale composée par Philip Glass.
back_translation: The documentary will combine an interview with Mr. McNamara discussing some of the tragedies and glories of the 20th century, archival footage, documents, and an original score composed by Philip Glass.

text: he also does n't realize that he accidentally left one of his shoes there .
translation: il ne se rend également pas compte qu'il a accidentellement laissé l'un de ses chaussures là.
back_translation: He also doesn't realize that he accidentally left one of his shoes there.

text: it could change america , not only because it is full of necessary discussion points , but because it is so accessible that it makes complex politics understandable to viewers looking for nothing but energetic entertainment .
translation: cela pourrait changer l'Amérique, non seulement parce qu'il regorge de points de discussion nécessaires, mais aussi parce qu'il est tellement accessible qu'il rend la politique complexe compréhensible pour les téléspectateurs ne cherchant rien d'autre qu'un divertissement énergique.
back_translation: This could change America, not only because it is full of necessary talking points, but also because it is so accessible that it makes complex politics understandable for viewers looking for nothing more than energetic entertainment.

text: anyone who suffers through this film deserves , at the very least , a big box of consolation candy .
translation: Quiconque endure ce film mérite, au minimum, une grande boîte de bonbons réconfortants.
back_translation: Anyone who endures this movie deserves, at the very least, a big box of comforting candy.

text: it proves quite compelling as an intense , brooding character study .
translation: cela s'avère assez convaincant en tant qu'étude de caractère intense et profondément réfléchie.
back_translation: It proves to be quite compelling as an intense and deeply contemplative character study.

text: the internment of 120 , 000 innocent people was a dark moment in the history of this country .
translation: L'internement de 120 000 personnes innocentes a été un moment sombre de l'histoire de ce pays.
back_translation: The internment of 120,000 innocent people was a dark moment in the history of this country.

text: then you remember where the bad dreams came from .
translation: alors tu te souviens d'où venaient les mauvais rêves.
back_translation: So you remember where the bad dreams came from.

text: ajileo journeys from his home in zapotitlan de salinas , a village in southern mexico , makes a perilious border crossing through the desert , and comes to hollywood , where everything and nothing is as he dreamed it would be .
translation: Ajileo parcourt le chemin depuis chez lui à Zapotitlán de Salinas, un village du sud du Mexique, fait une traversée périlleuse de la frontière à travers le désert, et arrive à Hollywood, où tout et rien n'est comme il l'avait rêvé.
back_translation: Ajileo travels the path from his home in Zapotitlán de Salinas, a village in southern Mexico, makes a perilous crossing of the border through the desert, and arrives in Hollywood, where everything and nothing is as he had dreamed.

text: by contrast , tom finds her world increasingly seductive , and as fatal gradually loses the only person she trusts , she discovers destiny has other plans .
translation: En revanche, Tom trouve son monde de plus en plus séduisant, et alors que Fatal perd progressivement la seule personne en qui elle a confiance, elle découvre que le destin a d'autres projets.
back_translation: On the other hand, Tom finds his world increasingly attractive, and while Fatal gradually loses the only person she trusts, she discovers that fate has other plans.

text: a few zingers aside , the writing is indifferent , and jordan brady 's direction is prosaic .
translation: À part quelques répliques percutantes, l'écriture est indifférente et la direction de Jordan Brady est prosaïque.
back_translation: Aside from a few striking lines, the writing is indifferent and Jordan Brady's direction is prosaic.

text: as an actress , madonna is one helluva singer . as the mediterranean sparkles , 'swept away ' sinks .
translation: En tant qu'actrice, Madonna est une sacrée chanteuse. Alors que la Méditerranée scintille, 'Swept Away' sombre.
back_translation: As an actress, Madonna is quite a singer. While the Mediterranean sparkles, 'Swept Away' darkens.

text: the last 6 weeks have been spent trying to `` get out `` of the relationship .
translation: les six dernières semaines ont été consacrées à essayer de « sortir » de la relation.
back_translation: The last six weeks have been devoted to trying to "break out" of the relationship.

text: one horrible night , kimberly mathews , a random girl from the nearby town , wanders too close to willy 's territory .
translation: une nuit horrible, Kimberly Mathews, une fille ordinaire de la ville voisine, s'aventure trop près du territoire de Willy.
back_translation: One horrible night, Kimberly Mathews, an ordinary girl from the neighboring town, ventures too close to Willy's territory.

text: in the heart of a sanitized suburban neighborhood , herbert 's everyday life is filled with constant emasculation at the hands of his wife , eleanor , and the daily grind of work on the chain .
translation: Au cœur d'un quartier suburbain assainifié, la vie quotidienne d'Herbert est remplie d'une constante émasculation aux mains de sa femme, Eleanor, et du train-train quotidien au travail dans la chaîne.
back_translation: In the heart of a sanitized suburban neighborhood, Herbert's daily life is filled with a constant emasculation at the hands of his wife, Eleanor, and the daily grind at work in the factory.

text: thurman plays a character known as the bride , a pregnant assassin who is shot by her boss , bill ( david carradine ) , on her wedding day , leaving herself and the wedding guests lying for dead .
translation: Thurman joue un personnage connu sous le nom de la mariée, une assassin enceinte qui est abattue par son patron, Bill (David Carradine), le jour de son mariage, la laissant, elle et les invités, pour morts.
back_translation: Thurman plays a character known as the Bride, a pregnant assassin who is shot by her boss, Bill (David Carradine), on her wedding day, leaving her and the guests for dead.

text: a wedding is arranged and cassandra is left on the sidelines as everyone around her is drawn into a maelstrom of interconnected relationships .
translation: Un mariage est organisé et Cassandra est laissée sur la touche alors que tout le monde autour d'elle est entraîné dans un tourbillon de relations interconnectées.
back_translation: A wedding is being organized, and Cassandra is left on the sidelines while everyone around her is caught up in a whirlwind of interconnected relationships.

text: beautifully written and directed and packed with excellent performances .
translation: magnifiquement écrit et réalisé, et rempli de performances excellentes.
back_translation: magnificently written and directed, and filled with excellent performances.

text: thirteen conversations about one thing lays out a narrative puzzle that interweaves individual stories , and , like a mobius strip , elliptically loops back to where it began .
translation: Treize conversations sur une seule chose présente une énigme narrative qui entrelace des histoires individuelles et, comme un ruban de Möbius, boucle elliptiquement vers son point de départ.
back_translation: Thirteen conversations about a single thing presents a narrative puzzle that intertwines individual stories and, like a Möbius strip, elliptically loops back to its starting point.

text: the police have no clues nor suspects until nick and his colleague realize the killer is a giant octopus .
translation: la police n'a ni indices ni suspects jusqu'à ce que Nick et son collègue réalisent que le tueur est un gigantesque poulpe.
back_translation: The police have neither clues nor suspects until Nick and his colleague realize that the killer is a gigantic octopus.

text: as rachel and daniel race through london 's nightscape , desperate to stay one step ahead of betts , every discovery unleashes further hell , extending way beyond the disappearance of rachel 's baby .
translation: Alors que Rachel et Daniel traversent le paysage nocturne de Londres, désespérés de rester un pas devant Betts, chaque découverte libère un enfer supplémentaire, s'étendant bien au-delà de la disparition du bébé de Rachel.
back_translation: As Rachel and Daniel navigate the nighttime landscape of London, desperate to stay one step ahead of Betts, each discovery unleashes an additional hell, extending far beyond the disappearance of Rachel's baby.

text: jim finally proposes to michelle , and both families gather for their upcoming wedding .
translation: Jim propose enfin à Michelle, et les deux familles se rassemblent pour leur prochain mariage.
back_translation: Jim finally proposes to Michelle, and the two families come together for their upcoming wedding.

text: the movie addresses a hungry need for pg-rated , nonthreatening family movies , but it does n't go too much further .
translation: le film répond à un besoin intense de films familiaux classés PG, non menaçants, mais il ne va pas beaucoup plus loin.
back_translation: The film meets an intense need for family-friendly PG-rated films that are not threatening, but it doesn't go much further than that.

text: although very much like the first movie based on j . k . rowling 's phenomenal fantasy best sellers , this second go-round possesses a quite pleasing , headlong thrust and a likably delinquent attitude .
translation: bien que très similaire au premier film basé sur les phénoménales best-sellers de fantasy de j. k. rowling, cette deuxième tentative possède une impulsion très agréable et une attitude délicieusement délinquante.
back_translation: Although very similar to the first film based on J.K. Rowling's phenomenal fantasy bestsellers, this second attempt has a very enjoyable momentum and a delightfully rebellious attitude.

text: there 's undeniable enjoyment to be had from films crammed with movie references , but the fun wears thin -- then out -- when there 's nothing else happening .
translation: Il y a un plaisir indéniable à regarder des films remplis de références cinématographiques, mais ce plaisir s’estompe – puis s’éteint – lorsqu’il n’y a rien d’autre qui se passe.
back_translation: There is an undeniable pleasure in watching films filled with cinematic references, but that pleasure fades – then disappears – when there is nothing else happening.

text: now joined by teiresias , the former king forces his daughter back to her senses and the horrifying realization that not only is her son dead , but that agave herself was `` amongst his butchers . ``
translation: maintenant rejoint par Tirésias, l'ancien roi force sa fille à revenir à ses sens et à la réalisation horrifiante que non seulement son fils est mort, mais qu'Agave elle-même était "parmi ses bourreaux."
back_translation: now joined by Tiresias, the former king forces his daughter to come to her senses and face the horrifying realization that not only is her son dead, but that Agave herself was "among her executioners."

text: its spirit of iconoclastic abandon -- however canned -- makes for unexpectedly giddy viewing .
translation: son esprit d'abandon iconoclaste -- aussi formaté soit-il -- offre une expérience visuelle inattendue et enjouée.
back_translation: his iconoclastic spirit of abandonment -- as formatted as it may be -- offers an unexpected and playful visual experience.

text: notorious c . h . o . has oodles of vulgar highlights .
translation: le célèbre c . h . o . a des tas de moments vulgaires.
back_translation: the famous c . h . o . has a lot of vulgar moments.

text: dana , a college student obsessed with the internet , explores the media to an extent where chatting with a stranger , becomes a higher priority than giving attention to her loved ones .
translation: Dana, une étudiante obsédée par Internet, explore les médias à tel point que discuter avec un inconnu devient une priorité plus élevée que de prêter attention à ses proches.
back_translation: Dana, a student obsessed with the Internet, explores the media to the point that talking to a stranger becomes a higher priority than paying attention to her loved ones.

text: a bright , inventive , thoroughly winning flight of revisionist fancy .
translation: un vol brillant, inventif et complètement séduisant de fantaisie révisionniste.
back_translation: a brilliant, inventive, and completely captivating flight of revisionist fantasy.

text: it should be interesting , it should be poignant , it turns out to be affected and boring .
translation: cela devrait être intéressant, cela devrait être poignant, cela s'avère être affecté et ennuyeux.
back_translation: It should be interesting, it should be poignant, it turns out to be affected and boring.

text: west has now identified an electrical phenomenon # the nee # which is discharged from the brain at the moment of death . . . and which may be the 'missing link ' in his studies : if the nee is re-injected into a re-animated corpse , it should restore the 'subject ' to full 'reason ' . . .
translation: L'ouest a maintenant identifié un phénomène électrique # le nee # qui est déchargé du cerveau au moment de la mort . . . et qui pourrait être le 'maillon manquant' dans ses études : si le nee est réinjecté dans un cadavre réanimé, cela devrait restaurer le 'sujet' à sa pleine 'raison' . . .
back_translation: The West has now identified an electrical phenomenon # the nee # which is discharged from the brain at the moment of death... and which could be the 'missing link' in its studies: if the nee is reinjected into a reanimated corpse, it should restore the 'subject' to its full 'reason'...

text: thoughtful , even stinging at times , and lots of fun .
translation: réfléchi, même piquant par moments, et très amusant.
back_translation: thoughtful, even sharp at times, and very amusing.

text: a carefully structured scream of consciousness that is tortured and unsettling -- but unquestionably alive .
translation: un cri de conscience soigneusement structuré qui est torturé et dérangeant -- mais incontestablement vivant.
back_translation: A carefully structured cry of conscience that is tortured and disturbing -- but undeniably alive.

text: shortly thereafter , kilo is involved in a drug deal with a wired frat boy that goes bad and he is imprisoned .
translation: peu de temps après, Kilo est impliqué dans un deal de drogue avec un étudiant en fraternité équipé d'un micro qui tourne mal et il est emprisonné.
back_translation: Shortly after, Kilo gets involved in a drug deal with a fraternity student equipped with a microphone that goes wrong, and he is imprisoned.

text: a young reporter named rachel is investigating these events , but after she and her small son watch the tape , it becomes a race against time to find out why the tape is killing everyone and how it could be stopped .
translation: Une jeune reporter nommée Rachel enquête sur ces événements, mais après que elle et son petit garçon aient visionné la bande, cela devient une course contre la montre pour découvrir pourquoi la bande tue tout le monde et comment cela pourrait être arrêté.
back_translation: A young reporter named Rachel is investigating these events, but after she and her little boy watch the tape, it becomes a race against time to discover why the tape is killing everyone and how it could be stopped.

text: the film brilliantly shines on all the characters , as the direction is intelligently accomplished .
translation: le film brille brillamment sur tous les personnages, car la direction est intelligemment réalisée.
back_translation: The film brilliantly shines on all the characters, as the direction is intelligently executed.

text: phileine is a super-bitch traveling to new york to visit her boyfriend maxto say sorry , for the first time in her life , for the argument the two of them were having before he left .
translation: Phileine est une super-salope qui se rend à New York pour rendre visite à son petit ami Maxto, pour lui dire désolé, pour la première fois de sa vie, pour l'argument qu'ils avaient avant qu'il ne parte.
back_translation: Phileine is a super-slut who goes to New York to visit her boyfriend Maxto, to say sorry for the first time in her life for the argument they had before he left.

text: anchored by a terrific performance by abbass , satin rouge shows that the idea of women 's self-actualization knows few continental divides .
translation: Ancré par une performance extraordinaire d'Abbass, Satin Rouge montre que l'idée de l'auto-réalisation des femmes connaît peu de divisions continentales.
back_translation: Anchored by an extraordinary performance by Abbass, Satin Rouge shows that the idea of women's self-realization knows few continental divides.

text: one well-timed explosion in a movie can be a knockout , but a hundred of them can be numbing . proof of this is ballistic : ecks vs . sever .
translation: Une explosion bien chronométrée dans un film peut être un coup de poing, mais une centaine d'entre elles peut devenir engourdissante. La preuve en est balistique : Ecks contre Sever.
back_translation: A well-timed explosion in a movie can be a punch, but a hundred of them can become numbing. The proof is ballistic: Ecks vs. Sever.

text: as the investigation continues , catherine is forced to choose between her past passions and new possibilities , even as handler is discovering surprising new facts about embry and his possible connection to another disappearance from campus .
translation: Alors que l'enquête se poursuit, Catherine est forcée de choisir entre ses passions passées et de nouvelles possibilités, même que Handler découvre des faits surprenants sur Embry et sa possible connexion avec une autre disparition sur le campus.
back_translation: As the investigation continues, Catherine is forced to choose between her past passions and new possibilities, while Handler uncovers surprising facts about Embry and his possible connection to another disappearance on campus.

text: adapted from a monologue in his `` blue jam `` radio series , chris morris ' first short film is a haunting black comedy about a man who no longer uses his name because he 's decided he 's ceased to deserve one , and a dog called rothko who says he is the man 's lawyer .
translation: adapté d'un monologue de sa série radio `` blue jam ``, le premier court-métrage de chris morris est une comédie noire troublante sur un homme qui n'utilise plus son nom car il a décidé qu'il ne mérite plus d'en avoir un, et un chien nommé rothko qui dit être l'avocat de l'homme.
back_translation: Adapted from a monologue from his radio series "Blue Jam," Chris Morris's first short film is a disturbing black comedy about a man who no longer uses his name because he has decided he no longer deserves one, and a dog named Rothko who claims to be the man's lawyer.

text: he has no life ( lives at home with his mother ) and no reason to live .
translation: il n'a pas de vie (il vit chez sa mère) et aucune raison de vivre.
back_translation: He has no life (he lives with his mother) and no reason to live.

text: [ shyamalan ] continues to cut a swathe through mainstream hollywood , while retaining an integrity and refusing to compromise his vision .
translation: [ shyamalan ] continue de se frayer un chemin à travers Hollywood mainstream, tout en conservant une intégrité et en refusant de compromettre sa vision.
back_translation: [Shyamalan] continues to carve his way through mainstream Hollywood while maintaining integrity and refusing to compromise his vision.

text: windtalkers celebrates the human spirit and packs an emotional wallop .
translation: Windtalkers célèbre l'esprit humain et a un impact émotionnel puissant.
back_translation: Windtalkers celebrates the human spirit and has a powerful emotional impact.

text: viveka is a glamorous woman and has high standards of living .
translation: Viveka est une femme glamour et a des normes de vie élevées.

text: kids five and up will be delighted with the fast , funny , and even touching story . parents may even find that it goes by quickly , because it has some of the funniest jokes of any movie this year , including those intended for adults .
translation: Les enfants de cinq ans et plus seront ravis par cette histoire rapide, drôle et même touchante. Les parents pourraient même trouver que le temps passe vite, car elle contient certaines des blagues les plus drôles de tous les films de cette année, y compris celles destinées aux adultes.
back_translation: Children aged five and up will be delighted by this quick, funny, and even touching story. Parents may even find that time flies, as it contains some of the funniest jokes of any movie this year, including those aimed at adults.

text: no one , including the viewers , seems to know who can be trusted , and that 's what makes this movie fun to watch .

back_translation: No one, including the spectators, seems to know who can be trusted, and that's what makes this movie fun to watch.

text: the director films a story of an immigrant actor who struggles with his religious and sexual identity in the new land .
translation: le réalisateur filme l'histoire d'un acteur immigrant qui lutte avec son identité religieuse et sexuelle dans le nouveau pays.

text: one day , lilja falls in love with andrej .

translation: Le documentaire d'Alex Nohe ressemble à un carnet de voyage pour ce qui ressemble principalement à une version réelle et coûteuse de Tank Girl, classée NC-17.

translation: qui sait ce qui se trouve au prochain coin de rue, ou ce qui attend gigi à la fin de la promenade ?

back_translation: Armed with only two revolvers and a dozen grenades, the king persuades Cuthbertson to join him on a mission in occupied France.

text: the story takes place in vermont , against the backdrop of the state capitol , where civil union laws are being debated along with gun control and dwi 's .
translation: L'histoire se déroule dans le Vermont, sur fond de capitole de l'État, où les lois sur l'union civile sont débattues, ainsi que le contrôle des armes à feu et les infractions liées à la conduite en état d'ébriété.
back_translation: The story takes place in Vermont, against the backdrop of the state capitol, where laws regarding civil unions are debated, as well as gun control and offenses related to driving under the influence.

text: now , years later he has two sons and they have a band .
translation: Maintenant, des années plus tard, il a deux fils et ils ont un groupe.

text: from his first hand accounts of the ( wonderland murders aka woodland murders ) .
translation: de ses récits de première main sur les (meurtres de Wonderland, également connus sous le nom de meurtres de Woodland).
back_translation: about his firsthand accounts of the Wonderland murders, also known as the Woodland murders.

text: in the months that followed , he gave dozens of talks on four continents , conducted scores of interviews , and wrote a book 9-11 that was published in 22 countries and became a surprise bestseller in many of them , including japan .
translation: Au cours des mois qui ont suivi, il a donné des dizaines de conférences sur quatre continents, réalisé des dizaines d'interviews et écrit un livre intitulé 9-11 qui a été publié dans 22 pays et est devenu un bestseller surprise dans nombre d'entre eux, y compris au Japon.
back_translation: In the months that followed, he gave dozens of lectures on four continents, conducted dozens of interviews, and wrote a book titled 9-11 that was published in 22 countries and became a surprise bestseller in many of them, including Japan.

text: gigantic is the story of they might be giants , a unique musical group centered on john flansburgh and john linnell .
translation: Gigantic est l'histoire de They Might Be Giants, un groupe musical unique centré sur John Flansburgh et John Linnell.

text: deliberately and devotedly constructed , far from heaven is too picture postcard perfect , too neat and new pin-like , too obviously a recreation to resonate .
translation: délibérément et avec dévotion construit, loin du ciel est trop parfait comme une carte postale, trop soigné et neuf, trop manifestement une reconstitution pour résonner.

text: the only young people who possibly will enjoy it are infants . . . who might be distracted by the movie 's quick movements and sounds .

back_translation: The only young people who could appreciate it are infants... who might be distracted by the rapid movements and sounds of the film.

text: still , she does n't want anyone , not samantha , not the cops and , most importantly , not her beloved dad , to come down on her .
translation: pourtant, elle ne veut personne, ni Samantha, ni les flics et, surtout, pas son cher papa, ne lui tombe dessus.
back_translation: However, she doesn't want anyone, neither Samantha, nor the cops, and especially not her dear dad, to come down on her.

text: with a tone as variable as the cinematography , schaeffer 's film never settles into the light-footed enchantment the material needs , and the characters ' quirks and foibles never jell into charm .
translation: Avec un ton aussi variable que la cinématographie, le film de Schaeffer ne parvient jamais à s'installer dans l'envoûtement léger que nécessite le matériau, et les singularités et petites manies des personnages ne se transforment jamais en charme.
back_translation: With a tone as variable as the cinematography, Schaeffer's film never manages to settle into the light enchantment that the material requires, and the singularities and little quirks of the characters never transform into charm.

text: the rock as a bounty hunter who attempts to square a debt by heading to the amazon jungle to capture someone .
translation: le rocher en tant que chasseur de primes qui tente de régler une dette en se rendant dans la jungle amazonienne pour capturer quelqu'un.
back_translation: the rock as a bounty hunter trying to settle a debt by going into the Amazon jungle to capture someone.

text: like all abstract art , the film does not make this statement in an easily accessible way , and -- unless prewarned -- it would be very possible for a reasonably intelligent person to sit through its tidal wave of imagery and not get this vision at all .
translation: Comme toute œuvre d'art abstrait, le film ne fait pas cette déclaration de manière facilement accessible, et -- à moins d'être averti à l'avance -- il serait tout à fait possible qu'une personne raisonnablement intelligente assiste à cette vague d'images sans en saisir cette vision.
back_translation: Like any work of abstract art, the film does not make this statement in an easily accessible manner, and -- unless warned in advance -- it would be quite possible for a reasonably intelligent person to watch this wave of images without grasping this vision.

text: a penetrating glimpse into the tissue-thin ego of the stand-up comic .
translation: un aperçu pénétrant dans l'ego fragile du comédien de stand-up.
back_translation: a penetrating insight into the fragile ego of the stand-up comedian.

text: [ shyamalan ] turns the goose-pimple genre on its empty head and fills it with spirit , purpose and emotionally bruised characters who add up to more than body count .
translation: [ Shyamalan ] renverse le genre du frisson et le remplit d'esprit, de but et de personnages émotionnellement meurtris qui comptent plus que le nombre de victimes.
back_translation: [Shyamalan] overturns the thriller genre and fills it with spirit, purpose, and emotionally wounded characters who matter more than the number of victims.

text: armed with a rad '80s soundtrack and a winning cast ( including indie rocker liz phair ) , cherish is an ingenious low-budget thriller .
translation: Armé d'une bande-son rad des années 80 et d'un casting gagnant (y compris la rockeuse indie Liz Phair), Cherish est un thriller ingénieux à petit budget.
back_translation: Armed with a rad 80s soundtrack and a winning cast (including indie rocker Liz Phair), Cherish is an ingenious low-budget thriller.

text: fireman-turned-writer larry brown are examined in a unique documentary format that incorporates narrative film adaptations of three of his short stories : samaritans , wild thing , and boy & # 38 ; dog .
translation: Le pompier devenu écrivain Larry Brown est examiné dans un format documentaire unique qui incorpore des adaptations cinématographiques narratives de trois de ses nouvelles : Samaritans, Wild Thing et Boy & Dog.
back_translation: The firefighter turned writer Larry Brown is examined in a unique documentary format that incorporates narrative film adaptations of three of his short stories: Samaritans, Wild Thing, and Boy & Dog.

text: the script was reportedly rewritten a dozen times -- either 11 times too many or else too few .
translation: le scénario aurait été réécrit une douzaine de fois -- soit 11 fois de trop, soit pas assez.

text: despite the 2-d animation , the wild thornberrys movie makes for a surprisingly cinematic experience .
translation: Malgré l'animation en 2D, le film Les Thornberrys : Le Film offre une expérience cinématographique étonnamment captivante.
back_translation: Despite the 2D animation, The Wild Thornberrys Movie offers a surprisingly captivating cinematic experience.

text: the two , along with their agent , go on a year long string of tryouts , impressing major league scouts with mid 90 mph pitching .
translation: tous les deux, accompagnés de leur agent, entreprennent une série d'auditions d'un an, impressionnant les recruteurs de la Major League avec des lancers à mi-90 mph.
back_translation: Both of them, accompanied by their agent, undertake a year-long series of auditions, impressing Major League recruiters with pitches in the mid-90 mph range.

text: oscar is certain that he could be a better mate to eve than his work-obsessed father .
translation: Oscar est certain qu'il pourrait être un meilleur compagnon pour Eve que son père obsédé par le travail.
back_translation: Oscar is sure he could be a better companion for Eve than her work-obsessed father.

text: in the near future in the asian city-state sintawan , everyone 's identity is recorded in the vast cyberlink .
translation: Dans un avenir proche, dans la cité-État asiatique de Sintawan, l'identité de chacun est enregistrée dans le vaste cyberlien.
back_translation: In the near future, in the Asian city-state of Sintawan, everyone's identity is recorded in the vast cyberlink.

text: sent to a german stalag prison camp , lieutenant hart is at once thrust into the social order of pows , where every man thinks of himself first with bribery and trading with german captors commonplace .
translation: Envoyé dans un camp de prisonniers de guerre en Allemagne, le lieutenant Hart est immédiatement plongé dans l'ordre social des prisonniers, où chaque homme pense d'abord à lui-même, avec la corruption et le commerce avec les captors allemands devenus courants.
back_translation: Sent to a prisoner of war camp in Germany, Lieutenant Hart is immediately immersed in the social order of the prisoners, where each man thinks first of himself, with corruption and trade with the German captors becoming commonplace.

text: can the elderly and feeble mccaleb , who had intended to spend his retirement living on his boat in the los angeles harbor , and who ca n't drive , and has to nap regularly , muster up the endurance to find the killer ?
translation: L'ancien et faible McCaleb, qui avait l'intention de passer sa retraite sur son bateau dans le port de Los Angeles, qui ne peut pas conduire et doit faire des siestes régulièrement, peut-il rassembler l'endurance nécessaire pour retrouver le meurtrier ?
back_translation: The old and frail McCaleb, who intended to spend his retirement on his boat in the port of Los Angeles, who cannot drive and needs to take naps regularly, can he gather the stamina needed to track down the murderer?

text: and in the dogs , she finds lost pieces of herself as she fumbles with the leash to her own life - struggling to hold on as it pulls her toward a brighter future before her past catches up with her .
translation: et dans les chiens, elle retrouve des morceaux perdus d'elle-même alors qu'elle jongle avec la laisse de sa propre vie - luttant pour s'accrocher alors qu'elle est entraînée vers un avenir meilleur avant que son passé ne la rattrape.
back_translation: And in the dogs, she finds lost pieces of herself as she juggles the leash of her own life - struggling to hold on as she is pulled towards a better future before her past catches up with her.

text: daphne must attempt to fit in with the social requirements demanded of her , while also getting to know her father , dealing with his territorial other daughter , and maintaining her own self-identity .
translation: Daphne doit essayer de s'adapter aux exigences sociales qui lui sont imposées, tout en apprenant à connaître son père, en gérant sa demi-sœur territoriale, et en préservant sa propre identité.
back_translation: Daphne must try to adapt to the social demands placed on her, while getting to know her father, managing her territorial half-sister, and preserving her own identity.

translation: désillusionné et sans argent, le chevalier secret rejoint les croisés et se lance dans de nouvelles aventures.

translation: sa copine mannequin (Anne Marie Johnson) le quitte immédiatement.

translation: Au fur et à mesure que leur relation évolue, Jenny commence à éprouver des difficultés avec ses croyances religieuses et son nouveau mode de vie.

text: the film 's trailer also looked like crap , so crap is what i was expecting .
translation: La bande-annonce du film avait aussi l'air nul, donc je m'attendais à ce que ce soit nul.

text: . . . unspeakably , unbearably dull , featuring reams of flatly delivered dialogue and a heroine who comes across as both shallow and dim-witted .
translation: ... d'une ennui indicible et insupportable, avec des tonnes de dialogues plats et une héroïne qui apparaît à la fois superficielle et ignorante.
back_translation: ... of an unspeakable and unbearable boredom, with tons of flat dialogue and a heroine who appears both superficial and ignorant.

text: or so he tells bobby ( alex feldman ) the eighteen year old male hustler smith employs for company .
translation: ou du moins c'est ce qu'il dit à Bobby (Alex Feldman), le jeune prostitué de dix-huit ans que Smith emploie pour lui tenir compagnie.
back_translation: or at least that's what he tells Bobby (Alex Feldman), the eighteen-year-old male prostitute that Smith employs to keep him company.

text: `` dylan 's run `` chronicles the experiences of dylan glenn , the great-grandson of emancipated slaves , as he seeks to become the first black republican from the deep south elected to congress since reconstruction .
translation: ``Dylan's Run`` raconte les expériences de Dylan Glenn, l'arrière-petit-fils d'esclaves émancipés, alors qu'il cherche à devenir le premier républicain noir du sud profond élu au congrès depuis la reconstruction.
back_translation: "Dylan's Run" tells the story of Dylan Glenn, the great-grandson of freed slaves, as he seeks to become the first black Republican from the Deep South elected to Congress since Reconstruction.

text: the book records the entire history of the universe , revealing to its readers anything they wish to know .
translation: le livre retrace toute l'histoire de l'univers, révélant à ses lecteurs tout ce qu'ils souhaitent savoir.
back_translation: The book recounts the entire history of the universe, revealing to its readers everything they wish to know.

text: elizabethean playwright christopher marlowe runs afoul of the queen as well as a jealous male admirer who ultimately hands marlowe 's unpublished work to william shakespeare , an unsuccessful scribe who then pilfers marlowe 's writings .
translation: Le dramaturge élisabéthain Christopher Marlowe se heurte à la reine ainsi qu'à un admirateur jaloux qui, en fin de compte, remet les œuvres inédites de Marlowe à William Shakespeare, un scribouillard sans succès qui vole ensuite les écrits de Marlowe.
back_translation: The Elizabethan playwright Christopher Marlowe clashes with the queen as well as a jealous admirer who ultimately hands Marlowe's unpublished works to William Shakespeare, an unsuccessful scribbler who then steals Marlowe's writings.

text: even though many of these guys are less than adorable ( their lamentations are pretty much self-centered ) , there 's something vital about the movie .
translation: même si beaucoup de ces gars sont moins qu'adorables (leurs lamentations sont plutôt égocentriques), il y a quelque chose de vital dans le film.
back_translation: Even though many of these guys are less than adorable (their complaints are quite self-centered), there is something vital in the film.

text: however to keep the image of him as a sex guru going he has to get more lessons from sharonna whom he begins to fall for despite using her .
translation: Cependant, pour maintenir l'image de lui en tant que gourou du sexe, il doit prendre plus de leçons de Sharonna, dont il commence à tomber amoureux malgré le fait qu'il l'utilise.
back_translation: However, to maintain his image as a sex guru, he must take more lessons from Sharonna, whom he is starting to fall in love with despite the fact that he is using her.

text: sent away by her proud parents after she disgraced them by getting pregnant at 15 , desiree , like marly , pursued a career in show business .
translation: envoyée par ses parents fiers après les avoir déshonorés en tombant enceinte à 15 ans, Désirée, comme Marly, a poursuivi une carrière dans le show business.
back_translation: Sent away by her proud parents after having dishonored them by becoming pregnant at 15, Désirée, like Marly, pursued a career in show business.

text: throws in enough clever and unexpected twists to make the formula feel fresh .
translation: ajoute suffisamment de rebondissements intelligents et inattendus pour rendre la formule fraîche.

text: with little visible talent and no energy , colin hanks is in bad need of major acting lessons and maybe a little coffee .
translation: Avec peu de talent visible et pas d'énergie, Colin Hanks a un grand besoin de cours de théâtre et peut-être d'un peu de café.
back_translation: With little visible talent and no energy, Colin Hanks has a great need for acting classes and perhaps a bit of coffee.

text: even though frode is only 7 years old , he does n't really believe in monsters .
translation: Même si Frode n'a que 7 ans, il ne croit pas vraiment aux monstres.

text: they create a new day care facility called `` daddy day care `` and have kids like : the smart-mouthed-but-became-polite crispin ( shane baumel ) , the really-smart becca ( hailey noelle johnson ) , and the flash/tony ( jimmy bennett ) .
translation: Ils créent une nouvelle garderie appelée « daddy day care » et ont des enfants comme : le sarcastique mais devenu poli Crispin (Shane Baumel), la très intelligente Becca (Hailey Noelle Johnson) et le rapide/Tony (Jimmy Bennett).
back_translation: They create a new daycare called "daddy day care" and have children such as the sarcastic but now polite Crispin (Shane Baumel), the very intelligent Becca (Hailey Noelle Johnson), and the quick/Tony (Jimmy Bennett).

text: a tired , unnecessary retread . . . a stale copy of a picture that was n't all that great to begin with .

back_translation: a tired and useless reheating... a worn-out copy of a film that wasn't so great to begin with.

text: the words , 'frankly , my dear , i do n't give a damn , ' have never been more appropriate .
translation: Les mots : « Franchement, ma chère, je m'en fiche complètement » n'ont jamais été aussi appropriés.

text: succumbs to the same kind of maudlin , sentimental mysticism that mars the touched by an angel school of non-god spiritual-uplift movies .

text: most fish stories are a little peculiar , but this is one that should be thrown back in the river .
translation: La plupart des histoires de poissons sont un peu particulières, mais celle-ci devrait être remise à l'eau.
back_translation: Most fish stories are a bit peculiar, but this one should be thrown back.

text: decades ago , the legendary james brown sold his soul to the devil for fame and fortune .
translation: Il y a des décennies, le légendaire James Brown a vendu son âme au diable pour la gloire et la fortune.
back_translation: Decades ago, the legendary James Brown sold his soul to the devil for glory and fortune.

text: no better or worse than 'truth or consequences , n . m . ' or any other interchangeable actioner with imbecilic mafia toolbags botching a routine assignment in a western backwater .
translation: pas meilleur ni pire que 'truth or consequences, n. m.' ou tout autre film d'action interchangeable avec des imbéciles de mafieux qui bafouillent une tâche routinière dans un trou en venant de l'ouest.
back_translation: neither better nor worse than 'truth or consequences, n. m.' or any other interchangeable action film with mafia idiots mumbling through a routine task in a hole coming from the west.

text: they detour from their trip to take the girl to the nearest town , where they meet the local sheriff who is hell bent on capturing the girl 's attackers .
translation: Ils dévient de leur voyage pour emmener la fille dans la ville la plus proche, où ils rencontrent le shérif local qui est déterminé à arrêter les attaquants de la fille.
back_translation: They deviate from their journey to take the girl to the nearest town, where they meet the local sheriff who is determined to stop the girl's attackers.

text: in a world ravaged by disease , disasters and hatred - a worldwide plan which dates back more than 2000 years has been implemented to show people that there 's more to life and living then just waste .
translation: dans un monde ravagé par la maladie, les catastrophes et la haine - un plan mondial qui remonte à plus de 2000 ans a été mis en œuvre pour montrer aux gens qu'il y a plus à la vie et à l'existence que de simplement gaspiller.
back_translation: In a world ravaged by disease, disasters, and hatred - a global plan that dates back over 2000 years has been implemented to show people that there is more to life and existence than simply wasting away.

text: like a veteran head cutter , barbershop is tuned in to its community .
translation: Comme un vétéran coiffeur, le salon de coiffure est à l'écoute de sa communauté.

text: a different kind of love story - one that is dark , disturbing , painful to watch , yet compelling .
translation: une histoire d'amour différente - une qui est sombre, troublante, douloureuse à regarder, mais captivante.
back_translation: a different love story - one that is dark, unsettling, painful to watch, but captivating.

text: for example , she collects cans and bottles to recycle from the beach and buys fish food with the money she makes , then paddles out in the ocean to feed the fish there .
translation: Par exemple, elle collecte des canettes et des bouteilles à recycler sur la plage et achète de la nourriture pour les poissons avec l'argent qu'elle gagne, puis elle pagaie dans l'océan pour nourrir les poissons là-bas.
back_translation: For example, she collects cans and bottles to recycle on the beach and buys food for the fish with the money she earns, then she paddles out into the ocean to feed the fish there.

text: about a boy vividly recalls the cary grant of room for one more , houseboat and father goose in its affectionate depiction of the gentle war between a reluctant , irresponsible man and the kid who latches onto him .
translation: Un garçon se rappelle vivement le Cary Grant de « Une place de choix », « Une maison sur l'eau » et « Papa, la bonne année » dans sa représentation affectueuse de la guerre douce entre un homme réticent et irresponsable et l'enfant qui s'accroche à lui.
back_translation: A boy vividly remembers Cary Grant in "A Place in the Sun," "A Houseboat," and "Dad, Happy New Year" in his affectionate portrayal of the gentle war between a reluctant and irresponsible man and the child who clings to him.

text: the lizard , chaos , scar , heartless and sic inhabit the violent and often bizarre world of backyard wrestling .
translation: le lézard, le chaos, la cicatrice, sans cœur et sic habitent le monde violent et souvent étrange du catch dans le jardin.
back_translation: the lizard, the chaos, the scar, heartless and sic inhabit the violent and often strange world of wrestling in the garden.

text: but when irrefutable proof that they are meant to be together arises , both of them are sent into conflict .

back_translation: But when irrefutable evidence that they are meant to be together arises, both are plunged into conflict.

text: the only camouflage carvey should now be considering is a paper bag to wear over his head when he goes out into public , to avoid being recognized as the man who bilked unsuspecting moviegoers .
translation: le seul camouflage que Carvey devrait désormais envisager est un sac en papier à porter sur sa tête lorsqu'il sort en public, pour éviter d'être reconnu comme l'homme qui a escroqué des cinéphiles sans méfiance.
back_translation: The only camouflage that Carvey should now consider is a paper bag to wear on his head when he goes out in public, to avoid being recognized as the man who scammed unsuspecting moviegoers.

text: a tender and touching drama , based on the true story of a troubled african-american 's quest to come to terms with his origins , reveals the yearning we all have in our hearts for acceptance within the family circle .
translation: un drame tendre et touchant, basé sur l'histoire vraie d'un afro-américain en proie à des troubles qui cherche à accepter ses origines, révèle le désir que nous avons tous dans nos cœurs d'être acceptés au sein du cercle familial.
back_translation: A tender and touching drama, based on the true story of an African American man struggling with issues as he seeks to accept his roots, reveals the desire we all have in our hearts to be accepted within the family circle.

text: `` bad santa `` is the story of two conmen who go on a road trip to malls dressed as santa and his elf .
translation: ``Bad Santa`` est l'histoire de deux escrocs qui partent en road trip vers des centres commerciaux déguisés en père Noël et en son elfe.
back_translation: "Bad Santa" is the story of two con artists who go on a road trip to shopping malls disguised as Santa Claus and his elf.

text: how i killed my father is one of those art house films that makes you feel like you 're watching an iceberg melt -- only it never melts .
translation: Comment j'ai tué mon père est l'un de ces films d'art et d'essai qui vous donne l'impression d'observer un iceberg fondre -- sauf qu'il ne fond jamais.
back_translation: How I Killed My Father is one of those art-house films that gives you the feeling of watching an iceberg melt -- except it never melts.

text: although shot with little style , skins is heartfelt and achingly real .
translation: bien que tourné sans beaucoup de style, Skins est sincère et douloureusement réaliste.
back_translation: Although shot without much style, Skins is sincere and painfully realistic.

text: must-see viewing for anyone involved in the high-tech industry . others may find it migraine-inducing , despite moore 's attempts at whimsy and spoon feeding .
translation: une vision incontournable pour quiconque impliqué dans l'industrie des hautes technologies. D'autres pourraient la trouver déclencheuse de migraine, malgré les tentatives de Moore de faire preuve de fantaisie et de faciliter la compréhension.
back_translation: An essential vision for anyone involved in the high-tech industry. Others might find it migraine-inducing, despite Moore's attempts to be whimsical and make it easier to understand.

text: has something to say . . . but it is a statement and issue worthy of a much more thoughtfulness and insight than a melodramatic and wholly predictable thriller .
translation: a quelque chose à dire . . . mais c'est une déclaration et un enjeu qui méritent bien plus de réflexion et d'intuition qu'un thriller mélodramatique et totalement prévisible.
back_translation: there is something to say . . . but it is a statement and an issue that deserve much more thought and intuition than a melodramatic and completely predictable thriller.

text: los angeles ' little tokyo 's foremost studio photographer , miyatake smuggled a lens and film holder into the u . s . wwii camp he was incarcerated in and captured life behind barbed wire with a makeshift camera made of scrap wood .
translation: Le principal photographe de studio de Little Tokyo à Los Angeles, Miyatake, a fait passer un objectif et un porte-film dans le camp de la Seconde Guerre mondiale où il était incarcéré et a capturé la vie derrière les barbelés avec un appareil photo improvisé en bois de récupération.
back_translation: The main studio photographer of Little Tokyo in Los Angeles, Miyatake, smuggled a lens and a film holder into the World War II camp where he was interned and captured life behind barbed wire with an improvised wooden camera.

text: it 's hard to recognize change when you 're in the middle of it college follows a young man in his final semester of college as he segues into adult life .
translation: Il est difficile de reconnaître le changement quand on est en plein dedans. "College" suit un jeune homme dans son dernier semestre d'université alors qu'il fait la transition vers la vie adulte.
back_translation: It is difficult to recognize change when you are in the thick of it. "College" follows a young man in his last semester of university as he makes the transition to adulthood.

text: amber ( madonna ) is 40 , beautiful , rich , spoiled , and arrogant beyond measure .
translation: Amber (Madonna) a 40 ans, est belle, riche, gâtée et d'une arrogance sans limite.

text: not a film for the faint of heart or conservative of spirit , but for the rest of us -- especially san francisco lovers -- it 's a spirited film and a must-see .
translation: ce n'est pas un film pour les âmes sensibles ou les esprits conservateurs, mais pour le reste d'entre nous -- en particulier les amoureux de san francisco -- c'est un film plein d'esprit et un incontournable.
back_translation: It is not a film for the faint-hearted or conservative minds, but for the rest of us -- especially lovers of San Francisco -- it is a witty film and a must-see.

text: a thoughtful , moving piece that faces difficult issues with honesty and beauty .

text: believing that he is the `` world 's greatest swordsman , `` juan antonio merrily accepts the challenge until he learns that the duel will be fought with pistols , not swords .

translation: En chemin, il rencontre une longue liste de personnages intéressants et colorés, tandis qu'à la maison, Ada apprend les rudiments de la gestion de la ferme de son défunt père avec Ruby (Renee Zellweger), une vagabonde tenace qui aide et enseigne à Ada en cours de route.
back_translation: On the way, he meets a long list of interesting and colorful characters, while at home, Ada learns the basics of managing her deceased father’s farm with Ruby (Renee Zellweger), a tenacious drifter who helps and teaches Ada along the way.

translation: De manière inattendue, le solitaire caustique se lie d'amitié avec la fille, seulement pour voir sa vie prendre un autre tournant lorsqu'elle est enlevée puis assassinée.

back_translation: He can't remember anything and starts trying to reconstruct his memory from clues such as the Swiss bank account, the number of which is implanted in his hip.

text: when longfellow deeds , a small-town pizzeria owner and poet , inherits $ 40 billion from his deceased uncle , he quickly begins rolling in a different kind of dough .
translation: Lorsque Longfellow Deeds, un propriétaire de pizzeria dans une petite ville et poète, hérite de 40 milliards de dollars de son oncle décédé, il commence rapidement à rouler dans un autre type de pâte.
back_translation: When Longfellow Deeds, a pizzeria owner in a small town and poet, inherits 40 billion dollars from his deceased uncle, he quickly starts rolling in a different kind of dough.

text: this goofy gangster yarn never really elevates itself from being yet another earnestly generic crime-busting comic vehicle -- a well-intentioned remake that shows some spunk and promise but fails to register as anything distinctive or daring
translation: ce récit de gangster loufoque ne parvient jamais vraiment à s'élever au-delà d'un autre véhicule de bande dessinée de lutte contre le crime sincèrement générique -- un remake bien intentionné qui montre du peps et du potentiel mais échoue à s'imposer comme quelque chose de distinctif ou d'audacieux
back_translation: This wacky gangster tale never quite rises above yet another sincerely generic crime-fighting comic book vehicle—a well-intentioned remake that shows energy and potential but fails to establish itself as something distinctive or bold.

text: the film is a confusing melange of tones and styles , one moment a romantic trifle and the next a turgid drama .
translation: le film est un mélange déroutant de tons et de styles, tantôt un futile romantique, tantôt un drame pesant.
back_translation: The film is a bewildering mix of tones and styles, at times a frivolous romance, and at other times a heavy drama.

text: both stars manage to be funny , but , like the recent i spy , the star chemistry begs the question of whether random gags add up to a movie .
translation: Les deux étoiles parviennent à être drôles, mais, comme dans le récent "I Spy", la chimie entre les stars soulève la question de savoir si des gags aléatoires s'assemblent pour former un film.

text: though the controversial korean filmmaker 's latest effort is not for all tastes , it offers gorgeous imagery , effective performances , and an increasingly unsettling sense of foreboding .
translation: Bien que le dernier effort du réalisateur coréen controversé ne soit pas à la portée de tous les goûts, il offre de superbes images, des performances efficaces et un sentiment de pressentiment de plus en plus troublant.

text: a big meal of cliches that the talented cast generally chokes on .
