text: methodical , measured , and gently tedious in its comedy , secret ballot is a purposefully reductive movie -- which may be why it 's so successful at lodging itself in the brain .
translation: méthodique, mesuré et doucement fatiguant dans sa comédie, le vote secret est un film volontairement réducteur - ce qui peut expliquer pourquoi il parvient si bien à s'ancrer dans l'esprit.
back_translation: Methodical, measured, and gently tiring in its comedy, the secret ballot is a deliberately reductive film - which may explain why it manages so well to stick in the mind.

translation: Situé dans le monde coloré des courses de chevaux, Horseplay suit la vie chaotique d'un aspirant entraîneur de chevaux alors qu'il navigue entre la turf, les dames et tous ceux qui veulent le déstabiliser.

text: judging from the strength of this superbly enigmatic film , oliveira himself seems far from ready to go home .
translation: À juger par la force de ce film superbement énigmatique, Oliveira lui-même semble loin d'être prêt à rentrer chez lui.
back_translation: Judging by the strength of this superbly enigmatic film, Oliveira himself seems far from ready to go home.

translation: c'est tout ce pour quoi vous ne allez pas au cinéma.

text: based on an acclaimed 1935 novel about the war of liberation ( 1918-1920 ) that ensured estonia 's independence , the film tells about a group of young schoolboys heading to the front to fight the army of soviet russia .
translation: Basé sur un roman acclamé de 1935 sur la guerre de libération (1918-1920) qui a assuré l'indépendance de l'Estonie, le film raconte l'histoire d'un groupe de jeunes écoliers se rendant sur le front pour combattre l'armée de la Russie soviétique.
back_translation: Based on a critically acclaimed novel from 1935 about the war of liberation (1918-1920) that secured Estonia's independence, the film tells the story of a group of young schoolboys going to the front to fight against the Soviet Russian army.

text: he - rugged , handsome , the independent outdoor type - is hitching a ride back to la and knows a good bet when he sees one .

back_translation: He - sturdy, attractive, the independent outdoors type - is hitchhiking back to Los Angeles and knows a good bet when he sees one.

text: stranded on hawaii , experiment # 626 ca n't actually do much harm : water all around , no big cities and two well-equipped representatives of the galactic federation already following close behind to catch him again .
translation: échoué à Hawaï, l'expérience n° 626 ne peut en réalité pas faire beaucoup de mal : de l'eau tout autour, pas de grandes villes et deux représentants bien équipés de la fédération galactique déjà à ses trousses pour le rattraper à nouveau.
back_translation: Stranded in Hawaii, experience number 626 can't actually do much harm: water all around, no big cities, and two well-equipped representatives from the galactic federation already on its trail to catch up with it again.

text: maudlin and melodramatic we expected . boring we did n't .
translation: nous nous attendions à du larmoyant et du mélodramatique. ennuyant, nous ne l'étions pas.
back_translation: We expected something tearful and melodramatic. Boring, we were not.

text: fired in disgrace , kids show host randolph smiley finds himself out on the street , while his replacement sheldon mopes , finds himself on the fast track to success with a new hit show as the proud purple rhino smoochy .
translation: Licencié dans le déshonneur, l'animateur de l'émission pour enfants Randolph Smiley se retrouve à la rue, tandis que son remplaçant Sheldon, mélancolique, se retrouve sur la voie rapide du succès avec une nouvelle émission à succès en tant que fier rhinocéros violet, Smoochy.
back_translation: Dismissed in disgrace, children's show host Randolph Smiley finds himself in the streets, while his replacement Sheldon, melancholic, finds himself on the fast track to success with a hit new show as the proud purple rhinoceros, Smoochy.

text: his wife , katharine ross , tries to mediate .
translation: sa femme, Katharine Ross, essaie de jouer les médiateurs.
back_translation: his wife, Katharine Ross, is trying to act as a mediator.

text: a once-in-a-lifetime chance to experience the free-thinking lifestyle of the '70s .
translation: une occasion unique de découvrir le mode de vie libre-penseur des années 70.
back_translation: A unique opportunity to discover the free-thinker lifestyle of the 1970s.

text: in some cases love means actual love , in other cases it means sex , and in one case it means losing one 's virginity .
translation: Dans certains cas, l'amour signifie un véritable amour, dans d'autres cas, cela signifie le sexe, et dans un cas, cela signifie perdre sa virginité.
back_translation: In some cases, love means true love, in other cases, it means sex, and in one case, it means losing one's virginity.

text: it 's dark but has wonderfully funny moments ; you care about the characters ; and the action and special effects are first-rate .

text: the lousy john q all but spits out denzel washington 's fine performance in the title role .

text: on a trip through texas to mexico , a group of teens pick up the survivor of a massacre that took place the night before .

back_translation: During a trip across Texas to Mexico, a group of teenagers takes in a survivor of a massacre that occurred the previous night.

text: a rebellious misfit , she is sent to summer camp by her frustrated parents .
translation: une paria rebelle, elle est envoyée au camp d'été par ses parents frustrés.

text: in auteil 's less dramatic but equally incisive performance , he 's a charismatic charmer likely to seduce and conquer .
translation: Dans la performance moins dramatique mais tout aussi incisive d'Auteuil, il est un charmeur charismatique susceptible de séduire et de conquérir.
back_translation: In the less dramatic but equally incisive performance of Auteuil, he is a charismatic charmer capable of seducing and conquering.

text: the film is a verbal duel between two gifted performers .
translation: le film est un duel verbal entre deux interprètes talentueux.

text: as he returns to moscow he finds a new world ruled by underworld bosses , criminal clans fighting each other and utter chaos on the desperately keeping appearances streets of russian capital .
translation: Alors qu'il retourne à Moscou, il découvre un nouveau monde régi par des chefs de l'underground, des clans criminels qui s'affrontent et un chaos total dans les rues désespérément soucieuses des apparences de la capitale russe.
back_translation: As he returns to Moscow, he discovers a new world ruled by underground chiefs, criminal clans clashing, and total chaos in the streets desperately concerned with the appearances of the Russian capital.

text: dennis clegg is in his thirties and lives in a halfway house for the mentally ill in london .
translation: Dennis Clegg a la trentaine et vit dans une maison de transition pour les malades mentaux à Londres.
back_translation: Dennis Clegg is in his thirties and lives in a transitional house for mentally ill people in London.

text: but when the substitute institutes some strange redefinitions of naughty and nice , putting christmas at risk , it 's up to scott to return with a new bag of magic to try to save christmas .
translation: mais quand le substitut institue des redéfinitions étranges de vilain et gentil, mettant Noël en danger, c'est à Scott de revenir avec un nouveau sac de magie pour essayer de sauver Noël.
back_translation: But when the substitute establishes strange redefinitions of naughty and nice, putting Christmas in jeopardy, it's up to Scott to come back with a new bag of magic to try to save Christmas.

text: the catholic church and the irish courts decide the doyle children put into church-run orphanages .
translation: l'Église catholique et les tribunaux irlandais décident que les enfants Doyle soient placés dans des orphelinats gérés par l'Église.
back_translation: The Catholic Church and the Irish courts decide that the Doyle children should be placed in orphanages run by the Church.

text: the tale of ancanar is an original fantasy story inspired by the author j . r . r . tolkien .

back_translation: The tale of Ancanar is an original fantasy story inspired by the author J.R.R. Tolkien.

text: the problem with the bread , my sweet is that it 's far too sentimental .

text: a static and sugary little half-hour , after-school special about interfaith understanding , stretched out to 90 minutes .
translation: un petit spécial de demi-heure statique et sucré, après l'école, sur la compréhension interreligieuse, étiré à 90 minutes.
back_translation: a small special of half an hour, static and sweet, after school, on interreligious understanding, stretched to 90 minutes.

text: ben rubin , a young israeli internist vying for the position of surgeon , learns that his internship has been terminated and he has been chosen to accompany abraham lazar , the hospital administrator and his wife , dori on a trip to india .
translation: Ben Rubin, un jeune interniste israélien en compétition pour le poste de chirurgien, apprend que son stage a été supprimé et qu'il a été choisi pour accompagner Abraham Lazar, l'administrateur de l'hôpital, et sa femme, Dori, lors d'un voyage en Inde.
back_translation: Ben Rubin, a young Israeli internist competing for a surgical position, learns that his internship has been canceled and that he has been chosen to accompany Abraham Lazar, the hospital administrator, and his wife, Dori, on a trip to India.

text: epic battles , spectacular effects and multiple story lines make the two towers a most excellent middle chapter in the lord of the rings film trilogy .
translation: des batailles épiques, des effets spectaculaires et des intrigues multiples font des deux tours un chapitre intermédiaire des plus excellents dans la trilogie cinématographique du seigneur des anneaux.
back_translation: Epic battles, spectacular effects, and multiple plots make the two towers an excellent intermediate chapter in the film trilogy of The Lord of the Rings.

text: throughout their journey they survive gun battles , vicious hand to hand fighting , vision blurring car chases and a heart stopping train wreck hundreds of feet above a rocky gorge .
translation: tout au long de leur voyage, ils survivent à des fusillades, des combats corps à corps acharnés, des courses-poursuites floues et un accident de train à couper le souffle à des centaines de pieds au-dessus d'un ravin rocheux.
back_translation: Throughout their journey, they survive shootings, fierce hand-to-hand combat, blurred car chases, and a breathtaking train crash hundreds of feet above a rocky ravine.

text: it has a caffeinated , sloppy brilliance , sparkling with ideas you wish had been developed with more care , but animated by an energy that puts the dutiful efforts of more disciplined grade-grubbers to shame .
translation: il a une brillance caféinée et désordonnée, scintillant d'idées que vous auriez souhaité voir développées avec plus de soin, mais animé par une énergie qui fait honte aux efforts dévoués des élèves plus disciplinés.
back_translation: He has a caffeinated and chaotic brilliance, sparkling with ideas that you would have liked to see developed with more care, but fueled by an energy that shames the dedicated efforts of more disciplined students.

text: evokes a little of the fear that parents have for the possible futures of their children -- and the sometimes bad choices mothers and fathers make in the interests of doing them good .
translation: évoque un peu la peur que les parents ont pour les futurs possibles de leurs enfants - et les choix parfois mauvais que les mères et les pères font dans l'intérêt de leur bien.
back_translation: It evokes a bit of the fear that parents have for the possible futures of their children - and the sometimes poor choices that mothers and fathers make in the interest of their well-being.

text: portentous and pretentious , the weight of water is appropriately titled , given the heavy-handedness of it drama .
translation: De portée et prétentieux, le poids de l'eau est intitulé de manière appropriée, étant donné la lourdeur de son drame.
back_translation: Broad and pretentious, the weight of water is aptly titled, given the gravity of its drama.

text: two badly interlocked stories drowned by all too clever complexity .
translation: deux histoires mal entrelacées noyées par une complexité trop astucieuse.
back_translation: Two poorly intertwined stories drowned by overly clever complexity.

text: what makes how i killed my father compelling , besides its terrific performances , is fontaine 's willingness to wander into the dark areas of parent-child relationships without flinching .
translation: Ce qui rend "Comment j'ai tué mon père" captivant, en plus de ses performances remarquables, c'est la volonté de Fontaine d'explorer les zones sombres des relations parent-enfant sans fléchir.
back_translation: What makes "How I Killed My Father" captivating, in addition to its remarkable performances, is Fontaine's willingness to explore the dark areas of parent-child relationships without faltering.

text: trapped in a lovers triangle and ruthless game of lust , greed , and betrayal we follow one woman 's hypnotic journey to discover her true self . . .
translation: piégée dans un triangle amoureux et un jeu impitoyable de désir, de cupidité et de trahison, nous suivons le voyage hypnotique d'une femme pour découvrir son vrai moi.
back_translation: Trapped in a love triangle and a ruthless game of desire, greed, and betrayal, we follow the hypnotic journey of a woman to discover her true self.

text: a movie more to be prescribed than recommended -- as visually bland as a dentist 's waiting room , complete with soothing muzak and a cushion of predictable narrative rhythms .
translation: un film plus à prescrire qu'à recommander -- aussi visuellement fade qu'une salle d'attente chez le dentiste, avec de la musique de fond apaisante et un coussin de rythmes narratifs prévisibles.
back_translation: a film more to prescribe than to recommend -- as visually bland as a dentist's waiting room, with soothing background music and a cushion of predictable narrative rhythms.

text: after returning home from a two week trial in chicago , rachel bishop ( rachel nord ) finds her sister emily bishop ( nancy walters ) missing .
translation: Après être rentrée chez elle après un procès de deux semaines à Chicago, Rachel Bishop (Rachel Nord) découvre que sa sœur Emily Bishop (Nancy Walters) est portée disparue.
back_translation: After returning home following a two-week trial in Chicago, Rachel Bishop (Rachel Nord) discovers that her sister Emily Bishop (Nancy Walters) is missing.

text: this event leads to deep thoughts about marriage , friendship , relationships and last not least life itself .
translation: cet événement amène à de profondes réflexions sur le mariage, l’amitié, les relations et enfin, la vie elle-même.
back_translation: This event leads to deep reflections on marriage, friendship, relationships, and ultimately, life itself.

text: ( hamlet ) privilege seeks to produce a subliminal confrontation with its ever-shifting subject matter , much as the body is reputed to create vortexes of healing and repose in response to traumas .
translation: ( Hamlet ) le privilège cherche à produire une confrontation subliminale avec son sujet en constante évolution, tout comme le corps est réputé créer des vortex de guérison et de repos en réponse aux traumatismes.
back_translation: (Hamlet) the privilege seeks to produce a subliminal confrontation with its constantly evolving subject, just as the body is believed to create vortices of healing and rest in response to trauma.

text: and suddenly , she spots her beloved , wandering over sand dunes and brings the exhausted patricia to his oasis called 'shangri-la ' . . .
translation: et soudain, elle aperçoit son bien-aimé, errant sur des dunes de sable et amène la Patricia épuisée vers son oasis appelée 'shangri-la' . . .
back_translation: And suddenly, she spots her beloved, wandering on sand dunes and brings the exhausted Patricia to her oasis called 'Shangri-La' . . .

text: no such thing may be far from perfect , but those small , odd hartley touches help you warm to it .
translation: Il n'y a rien de tel que cela puisse être loin d'être parfait, mais ces petites touches étranges de Hartley vous aident à vous y attacher.
back_translation: There is nothing quite like it; it may be far from perfect, but Hartley's little strange touches help you connect with it.

text: to worsen things , during the holidays aksel gets teamed up with the two girls , fatima and annika , to perform a song to the local youth club 's song contest , melodi grand prix .
translation: Pour aggraver les choses, pendant les vacances, Aksel se retrouve associé aux deux filles, Fatima et Annika, pour interpréter une chanson lors du concours de chansons du club de jeunes local, le Melodi Grand Prix.
back_translation: To make matters worse, during the holidays, Aksel finds himself teaming up with two girls, Fatima and Annika, to perform a song at the local youth club's song contest, the Melodi Grand Prix.

text: with dickens ' words and writer-director douglas mcgrath 's even-toned direction , a ripping good yarn is told .
translation: Avec les mots de Dickens et la direction équilibrée du scénariste et réalisateur Douglas McGrath, une histoire captivante est racontée.
back_translation: With the words of Dickens and the balanced direction of writer and director Douglas McGrath, a captivating story is told.

text: from the trembling fury of gheorgiu 's tosca to the penetrating stare of raimondi 's scarpia , this tosca blazes with passion . at its best , it 's sublime .
translation: De la fureur tremblante de la Tosca de Gheorgiu au regard perçant de Scarpia de Raimondi, cette Tosca brûle de passion. À son meilleur, elle est sublime.
back_translation: From the trembling fury of Gheorghiu's Tosca to the piercing gaze of Raimondi's Scarpia, this Tosca burns with passion. At its best, it is sublime.

text: some of the featured art events include `` burial in space `` by woodpussy ( a group of musicians and pyro-technicians who blast their deceased founder into space in a rocket of their own creation ) ; `` nebulous entity `` and `` futura deluxe `` ( two large , roving installation pieces engineered using mathematics derived from fields of neural networks , ecological systems and fractals ) ; and a performance artist dea million who stages her `` wedding `` to america .
translation: parmi les événements artistiques à l'affiche, on trouve `` l'enterrement dans l'espace '' par woodpussy (un groupe de musiciens et de pyrotechniciens qui lancent leur fondateur décédé dans l'espace dans une fusée de leur propre création); `` entité nébuleuse '' et `` futura deluxe '' (deux grandes installations itinérantes conçues à l'aide de mathématiques dérivées des réseaux de neurones, des systèmes écologiques et des fractales); et une performance artistique de dea million qui met en scène son `` mariage '' avec l'Amérique.
back_translation: Among the artistic events on display, there is "Burial in Space" by Woodpussy (a group of musicians and pyrotechnicians who launch their deceased founder into space in a rocket of their own design); "Nebulous Entity" and "Futura Deluxe" (two large traveling installations designed using mathematics derived from neural networks, ecological systems, and fractals); and an artistic performance by Dea Million that showcases her "marriage" with America.

text: . . . one big laugh , three or four mild giggles , and a whole lot of not much else .
translation: ... un grand éclat de rire, trois ou quatre rires légers, et pas grand-chose d'autre.
back_translation: ... a big burst of laughter, three or four light laughs, and not much else.

text: bold , imaginative , rational and persuasive an account of the lethally dangerous world we live in , the sum of all fears is an international spy drama with visceral impact .
translation: Audacieux, imaginatif, rationnel et convaincant, un récit du monde mortellement dangereux dans lequel nous vivons, La somme de toutes les peurs est un drame d'espionnage international avec un impact viscéral.
back_translation: Bold, imaginative, rational, and compelling, A Sum of All Fears is a gripping tale of the deadly dangerous world we live in, an international espionage drama with visceral impact.

text: continually challenges perceptions of guilt and innocence , of good guys and bad , and asks us whether a noble end can justify evil means .
translation: remet continuellement en question les perceptions de culpabilité et d'innocence, de bons et de méchants, et nous demande si une fin noble peut justifier des moyens malfaisants.
back_translation: constantly calls into question perceptions of guilt and innocence, of good and evil, and asks us whether a noble end can justify malevolent means.

text: but does she realize , that this version of francis , douglas and henry is in reality her grown up son alan ( timothy bottoms ) . . . ?

back_translation: But does she realize that this version of Francis, Douglas, and Henry is actually her adult son Alan (Timothy Bottoms)?

translation: les autres membres des po-boys - peter, joseph et guy, font également face à une crise de la quarantaine pour musiciens dans un milieu où l'âge de 30 ans est considéré comme étant sur le déclin.
back_translation: The other members of the po-boys - Peter, Joseph, and Guy - are also facing a midlife crisis as musicians in an environment where the age of 30 is considered to be on the decline.

translation: il l'attire de nouveau à Las Vegas pour continuer sa carrière.

text: the film has an infectious enthusiasm and we 're touched by the film 's conviction that all life centered on that place , that time and that sport .
translation: le film a un enthousiasme contagieux et nous sommes touchés par la conviction du film que toute vie était centrée sur cet endroit, ce moment et ce sport.
back_translation: the film has a contagious enthusiasm and we are touched by the film's conviction that all life revolved around this place, this moment, and this sport.

text: about as satisfying and predictable as the fare at your local drive through .
translation: aussi satisfaisant et prévisible que la nourriture de votre fast-food local.
back_translation: as satisfying and predictable as the food from your local fast food.

text: a new reality-style game show , `` treasure hunt `` has invited a cast of contestants , including a los angeles cop who 's joined to try and make up for an earlier pr blunder , to a tropical island to hunt for a buried treasure worth ten million dollars .
translation: Un nouveau jeu de style réalité, `` chasse au trésor ``, a invité une liste de concurrents, y compris un policier de Los Angeles qui a rejoint l'émission pour essayer de compenser un précédent faux pas médiatique, sur une île tropicale pour chasser un trésor enfoui d'une valeur de dix millions de dollars.
back_translation: A new reality-style game, "treasure hunt," invited a list of competitors, including a police officer from Los Angeles who joined the show to try to make up for a previous media misstep, to a tropical island to hunt for buried treasure worth ten million dollars.

text: it takes viewers on an intimate road trip across north america - from a polyamory conference in the catskills , a swingers ' convention in las vegas , to long-term multipartner families in california .
translation: il emmène les spectateurs dans un voyage intime à travers l'Amérique du Nord - d'une conférence sur le polyamour dans les Catskills, à une convention de libertins à Las Vegas, jusqu'à des familles multipartenaires à long terme en Californie.
back_translation: He takes the audience on an intimate journey through North America - from a conference on polyamory in the Catskills, to a libertine convention in Las Vegas, to long-term polyamorous families in California.

text: eight year old maria has her bicycle stolen , and like a lightning from the clear sky ploddy the policicar comes to the rescue !
translation: Maria, âgée de huit ans, s'est fait voler son vélo, et comme un éclair dans un ciel dégagé, Ploddy le policier vient à la rescousse !
back_translation: Maria, eight years old, had her bike stolen, and like a flash in a clear sky, Officer Ploddy comes to the rescue!

text: [ haynes ' ] homage to such films as `` all that heaven allows `` and `` imitation of life `` transcends them . simply put , `` far from heaven `` is a masterpiece .
translation: L'hommage de [haynes] à des films tels que "Tout ce que le ciel permet" et "L'imitation de la vie" les transcende. En d'autres termes, "Far from Heaven" est un chef-d'œuvre.
back_translation: The tribute from [haynes] to films such as "All That Heaven Allows" and "Imitation of Life" transcends them. In other words, "Far from Heaven" is a masterpiece.

text: if you go to attic town you 'll find a place where the streets have no names and you can never turn back .
translation: si vous allez à la ville des combles, vous trouverez un endroit où les rues n'ont pas de noms et vous ne pouvez jamais faire demi-tour.
back_translation: If you go to the city of attics, you will find a place where the streets have no names and you can never turn back.

text: all very stylish and beautifully photographed , but far more trouble than it 's worth , with fantasy mixing with reality and actors playing more than one role just to add to the confusion .
translation: tout est très élégant et magnifiquement photographié, mais c'est bien plus de tracas que cela en vaut, avec la fantaisie se mêlant à la réalité et des acteurs jouant plus d'un rôle juste pour ajouter à la confusion.
back_translation: Everything is very elegant and beautifully photographed, but it is much more trouble than it is worth, with fantasy mingling with reality and actors playing more than one role just to add to the confusion.

text: what 's most memorable about circuit is that it 's shot on digital video , whose tiny camera enables shafer to navigate spaces both large . . . and small . . . with considerable aplomb .
translation: Ce qui est le plus mémorable à propos de "Circuit", c'est qu'il est tourné en vidéo numérique, dont la petite caméra permet à Shafer de naviguer dans des espaces à la fois grands... et petits... avec beaucoup d'aplomb.
back_translation: What is most memorable about "Circuit" is that it is shot on digital video, allowing Shafer to navigate through spaces that are both large... and small... with a lot of confidence.

text: becoming fast friends , they soon both moved with their families near coney island , where they became active community leaders .
translation: devenus de bons amis, ils ont rapidement déménagé avec leurs familles près de Coney Island, où ils sont devenus des leaders communautaires actifs.
back_translation: Becoming good friends, they quickly moved with their families near Coney Island, where they became active community leaders.

text: watching haneke 's film is , aptly enough , a challenge and a punishment . but watching huppert , a great actress tearing into a landmark role , is riveting .
translation: Regarder le film de Haneke est, à juste titre, un défi et une punition. Mais regarder Huppert, une grande actrice s'attaquant à un rôle marquant, est captivant.
back_translation: Watching Haneke's film is rightly a challenge and a punishment. But watching Huppert, a great actress tackling a significant role, is captivating.

text: ramsay succeeds primarily with her typical blend of unsettling atmospherics , delivering a series of abrasive , stylized sequences that burn themselves upon the viewer 's memory .
translation: Ramsay réussit principalement grâce à son mélange typique d'atmosphères troublantes, délivrant une série de séquences abrasives et stylisées qui s'imprègnent dans la mémoire du spectateur.
back_translation: Ramsay succeeds mainly due to her typical blend of unsettling atmospheres, delivering a series of abrasive and stylized sequences that linger in the viewer's memory.

text: upon getting together on their spring break , they realize that they are bored in their small suburban connecticut hometown .
translation: En se retrouvant pendant leurs vacances de printemps, ils réalisent qu'ils s'ennuient dans leur petite ville de banlieue du Connecticut.
back_translation: While spending time together during their spring break, they realize that they are bored in their small suburban town in Connecticut.

text: kidd deals with lust and egoism the way a surgeon is interested in a tumor . he exposes ugly attitudes but maintains compassion for his mean-spirited subject .
translation: Kidd traite de la luxure et de l’égoïsme comme un chirurgien s’intéresse à une tumeur. Il expose des attitudes laides mais maintient une compassion pour son sujet au cœur malveillant.
back_translation: Kidd treats lust and selfishness like a surgeon interested in a tumor. He exposes ugly attitudes but maintains a compassion for his subject with a malevolent heart.

text: what if your most controversial act turned out to be the most traditional thing in the world ?
translation: Et si votre acte le plus controversé s'avérait être la chose la plus traditionnelle au monde ?
back_translation: And what if your most controversial act turned out to be the most traditional thing in the world?

text: the country bears wastes an exceptionally good idea . but the movie that does n't really deliver for country music fans or for family audiences
translation: Le pays des ours porte une idée exceptionnellement bonne. Mais le film ne tient vraiment pas ses promesses pour les fans de musique country ni pour les familles.
back_translation: The land of bears carries an exceptionally good idea. But the film really doesn't deliver on its promises for country music fans or families.

text: this is a movie filled with unlikable , spiteful idiots ; whether or not their friendship is salvaged makes no difference in the least .
translation: c'est un film rempli d'idiots détestables et malveillants ; que leur amitié soit sauvée ou non n'a aucune importance.
back_translation: It's a film filled with detestable and malicious idiots; whether their friendship is saved or not doesn't matter at all.

text: it 's a good thing that woolly mammoths are extinct , because this movie will have every kid in the schoolyard wishing for their very own .
translation: C'est une bonne chose que les mammouths laineux soient éteints, car ce film fera en sorte que chaque enfant dans la cour de récréation souhaite avoir le sien.
back_translation: It's a good thing that woolly mammoths are extinct, because this movie will make every child on the playground want their own.

text: someone killed legendary porn king fat guy , and detectives moose & # 38 ; squirrel must go deep undercover ( literally ) to find the murderer with the help of their `` special `` homicide unit .
translation: quelqu'un a tué le légendaire roi de la pornographie, le gros gars, et les détectives élan et écureuil doivent s'infiltrer en profondeur (littéralement) pour trouver le meurtrier avec l'aide de leur unité spéciale des homicides.
back_translation: Someone has killed the legendary king of pornography, the big guy, and the detectives Moose and Squirrel must go deep undercover (literally) to find the murderer with the help of their special homicide unit.

text: overall , it 's a very entertaining , thought-provoking film with a simple message : god is love .
translation: Dans l'ensemble, c'est un film très divertissant et qui fait réfléchir, avec un message simple : Dieu est amour.
back_translation: Overall, it is a very entertaining film that makes you think, with a simple message: God is love.

text: `` the ballad of bering strait `` is a two and a half year epic that follows bering strait 's amazing cultural fusion-coming of age journey in america .
translation: `` La ballade du détroit de Béring `` est une épopée de deux ans et demi qui suit le voyage incroyable de fusion culturelle et de maturation de Béring Strait en Amérique.
back_translation: "The Ballad of the Bering Strait" is an epic spanning two and a half years that follows the incredible journey of cultural fusion and maturation of the Bering Strait in America.

text: it is a look into one of the major social issues of the 21st century , inmigration .
translation: c'est un aperçu de l'un des principaux problèmes sociaux du 21e siècle, l'immigration.
back_translation: It is an overview of one of the main social issues of the 21st century, immigration.

text: anyone who can count to five ( the film 's target market ? ) can see where this dumbed-down concoction is going .
translation: quiconque sait compter jusqu'à cinq (le marché cible du film ?) peut voir où cette concoction simplifiée va.
back_translation: Anyone who can count to five (the target audience of the film?) can see where this simplified concoction is going.

text: about as enjoyable , i would imagine , as searching for a quarter in a giant pile of elephant feces . . . positively dreadful .
translation: aussi agréable, j'imagine, que de chercher un quart dans une énorme pile de déchets d'éléphant... absolument horrible.
back_translation: as pleasant, I imagine, as looking for a quarter in a huge pile of elephant trash... absolutely horrible.

text: but there is indie rock , a restless entrepreneurial spirit , and carly , morgan and chuck , three optimistic post college grads , ready to make their splash in the world .
translation: mais il y a du rock indépendant, un esprit entrepreneurial agité, et Carly, Morgan et Chuck, trois diplômés d'université optimistes, prêts à faire leurs preuves dans le monde.
back_translation: but there is independent rock, a restless entrepreneurial spirit, and Carly, Morgan, and Chuck, three optimistic university graduates ready to prove themselves in the world.

text: before they can win some money , a local mob boss , frank finnigan , sees the horse and steals it as payment for the gambling debt of tony , a local jockey and single parent .
translation: avant qu'ils ne puissent gagner de l'argent, un parrain local, Frank Finnigan, voit le cheval et le vole comme paiement pour la dette de jeu de Tony, un jockey local et père célibataire.
back_translation: Before they can make money, a local mobster, Frank Finnigan, sees the horse and steals it as payment for Tony's gambling debt, a local jockey and single father.

text: aside from minor tinkering , this is the same movie you probably loved in 1994 , except that it looks even better .
translation: À part quelques ajustements mineurs, c'est le même film que vous avez probablement aimé en 1994, sauf qu'il est encore plus beau.
back_translation: Aside from a few minor adjustments, it's the same movie you probably liked in 1994, except it's even more beautiful.

text: a year later , strange things start to happen , as each person that was connected to the hit and run incident is being killed . . . one
translation: Un an plus tard, des choses étranges commencent à se produire, alors que chaque personne liée à l'incident de délit de fuite est tuée... une.
back_translation: A year later, strange things begin to happen as each person connected to the hit-and-run incident is killed... one by one.

text: our america is the true story of two bright and ambitious chicago teenagers who , living in one of the worst inner-city neighborhoods in the country , get a chance to become reporters for npr .
translation: notre amérique est l'histoire véritable de deux adolescents brillants et ambitieux de Chicago qui, vivant dans l'un des pires quartiers du centre-ville du pays, obtiennent la chance de devenir reporters pour NPR.
back_translation: Our America is the true story of two bright and ambitious teenagers from Chicago who, living in one of the worst neighborhoods in the downtown area of the country, get the chance to become reporters for NPR.

text: when it comes to entertainment , children deserve better than pokemon 4ever .
translation: Quand il s'agit de divertissement, les enfants méritent mieux que Pokémon 4ever.
back_translation: When it comes to entertainment, children deserve better than Pokémon 4ever.

text: geordie ( thom fitzgerald ) , a visiting canadian pornographer , bogdan ( mihai calota ) , a reluctant city dog-catcher , and nathalie ( alberta watson ) , a lonely diplomat 's wife - each risks losing everything as they become embroiled in the struggles of bucharest 's abandoned children , gypsies , dogs and beggars .
translation: Geordie (Thom Fitzgerald), un pornographe canadien en visite, Bogdan (Mihai Calota), un attrape-chien réticent de la ville, et Nathalie (Alberta Watson), la femme d'un diplomate solitaire - chacun risque de tout perdre en s'impliquant dans les luttes des enfants abandonnés de Bucarest, des gitans, des chiens et des mendiants.
back_translation: Geordie (Thom Fitzgerald), a Canadian pornographer on a visit, Bogdan (Mihai Calota), a reluctant dogcatcher from the city, and Nathalie (Alberta Watson), the wife of a lonely diplomat - each risks losing everything by getting involved in the struggles of abandoned children in Bucharest, the gypsies, the dogs, and the beggars.

text: there are now two signs that m . night shyamalan 's debut feature sucked up all he has to give to the mystic genres of cinema : unbreakable and signs .
translation: il y a maintenant deux signes que le premier film de m. night shyamalan a épuisé tout ce qu'il avait à offrir aux genres mystiques du cinéma : incassable et signes.
back_translation: There are now two signs that M. Night Shyamalan's first film has exhausted everything it had to offer to the mystical genres of cinema: Unbreakable and Signs.

text: jonathan parker 's bartleby should have been the be-all-end-all of the modern-office anomie films .
translation: Le Bartleby de Jonathan Parker aurait dû être le summum des films sur l'anomie du bureau moderne.
back_translation: Jonathan Parker's Bartleby should have been the pinnacle of films about the anomie of modern office life.

text: her struggle for freedom and a sense of identity culminates in a conflict where the one love may not be the one you can trust and the habits with which one sleepwalks through life are not easily broken .
translation: sa lutte pour la liberté et un sens d'identité culmine dans un conflit où le grand amour peut ne pas être celui en qui l'on peut avoir confiance et les habitudes avec lesquelles on traverse la vie en somnambule ne sont pas facilement brisées.
back_translation: her struggle for freedom and a sense of identity culminates in a conflict where the great love may not be the one you can trust, and the habits with which you go through life in a sleepwalking manner are not easily broken.

text: if the plot seems a bit on the skinny side , that 's because panic room is interested in nothing more than sucking you inM-^Eand making you sweat .
translation: Si l'intrigue semble un peu maigre, c'est parce que Panic Room n'est intéressé à rien d'autre qu'à vous happer et à vous faire transpirer.
back_translation: If the plot seems a bit thin, it's because Panic Room is interested in nothing other than grabbing you and making you sweat.

text: feels aimless for much of its running time , until late in the film when a tidal wave of plot arrives , leaving questions in its wake .
translation: se sent sans but pendant une grande partie de son temps de projection, jusqu'à la fin du film où une vague de intrigue arrive, laissant des questions dans son sillage.
back_translation: feels aimless for a large part of its runtime, until the end of the film where a wave of intrigue arrives, leaving questions in its wake.

text: this sade is hardly a perverse , dangerous libertine and agitator -- which would have made for better drama . he 's just a sad aristocrat in tattered finery , and the film seems as deflated as he does .
translation: ce sade n'est guère un libertin et agitateur pervers et dangereux — ce qui aurait rendu le drame meilleur. c'est juste un triste aristocrate en haillons, et le film semble aussi dégonflé que lui.
back_translation: this Sade is hardly a libertine and dangerous pervert — which would have made the drama better. He is just a sad aristocrat in rags, and the film seems as deflated as he is.

text: despite its good nature and some genuinely funny moments , super troopers suffers from a bad case of arrested development .
translation: malgré sa bonne nature et quelques moments vraiment drôles, Super Troopers souffre d'un mauvais cas de développement arrêté.
back_translation: Despite its good nature and some truly funny moments, Super Troopers suffers from a bad case of arrested development.

text: a dark and quirky comedy set in an eccentric north london jewish old age home , paradise grove revolves around a dysfunctional family comprising 79-year-old izzie goldberg , determined to die with dignity , his daughter dee perry , a mixture of traditional jewish mother and child of the sixties , and her teenage son keith , who 's half-black and half-jewish , and understandably undergoing an identity crisis .
translation: Une comédie noire et décalée se déroulant dans un foyer pour personnes âgées juif excentrique du nord de Londres, Paradise Grove tourne autour d'une famille dysfonctionnelle composée d'Izzie Goldberg, 79 ans, déterminé à mourir avec dignité, de sa fille Dee Perry, un mélange de mère juive traditionnelle et d'enfant des années soixante, et de son fils adolescent Keith, qui est à la fois noir et juif, et qui traverse compréhensiblement une crise d'identité.
back_translation: A dark and quirky comedy set in an eccentric Jewish nursing home in North London, Paradise Grove centers around a dysfunctional family consisting of 79-year-old Izzie Goldberg, determined to die with dignity, her daughter Dee Perry, a mix of traditional Jewish mother and child of the sixties, and her teenage son Keith, who is both Black and Jewish, and who is understandably going through an identity crisis.

text: it 's a celebration of self-confidence and a slap in the face of a society that cherises impossibly unnatural physical perfection .
translation: c'est une célébration de la confiance en soi et une claque au visage d'une société qui chérit une perfection physique impossiblement naturelle.
back_translation: It is a celebration of self-confidence and a slap in the face of a society that cherishes an impossibly natural physical perfection.

text: and what dark secret does the house harbour that leaves them feeling as though they 're being watched by more than just a million pairs of eyes ?
translation: et quel secret obscur la maison renferme-t-elle qui leur fait sentir qu'ils sont observés par plus qu'un million de paires d'yeux ?
back_translation: And what dark secret does the house contain that makes them feel they are being watched by more than a million pairs of eyes?

text: none of this sounds promising and , indeed , the first half of sorority boys is as appalling as any 'comedy ' to ever spill from a projector 's lens .
translation: rien de tout cela ne semble prometteur et, en effet, la première moitié de Sorority Boys est aussi épouvantable que n'importe quelle "comédie" à avoir jamais jailli de l'objectif d'un projecteur.
back_translation: Nothing about this seems promising and, indeed, the first half of Sorority Boys is as dreadful as any "comedy" that has ever emerged from a projector lens.

text: a corrupt cop is more interested in the money on the criminals he catches than justice ; a young woman discovers she 's pregnant , and her boyfriend is unfeeling ; and a young man calls a prostitute it 's the first time for both , and neither can go through with it .
translation: un policier corrompu est plus intéressé par l'argent des criminels qu'il arrête que par la justice ; une jeune femme découvre qu'elle est enceinte, et son petit ami est insensible ; et un jeune homme appelle une prostituée, c'est la première fois pour tous les deux, et aucun d'eux ne peut aller jusqu'au bout.
back_translation: a corrupt policeman is more interested in the money from the criminals he arrests than in justice; a young woman discovers she is pregnant, and her boyfriend is indifferent; and a young man calls a prostitute, it's the first time for both of them, and neither of them can go through with it.

text: a newscaster for the channel 7 eyewitness news complains about how god has only made his life a total waste .
translation: Un présentateur du canal 7 Eyewitness News se plaint de la façon dont Dieu n'a fait de sa vie qu'un total gaspillage.
back_translation: A presenter from channel 7 Eyewitness News complains about how God has made his life a total waste.

text: twists of fate along the way test and strain their relationship even further .
translation: Des rebondissements du destin en cours de route mettent encore plus à l'épreuve leur relation.

text: desta vez , columbus capturou o pomo de ouro .
translation: Cette fois, Columbus a capturé la pomme d'or.

text: at his request , she puts him to death to end his suffering and is subsequently charged with murder .
translation: À sa demande, elle le fait exécuter pour mettre fin à ses souffrances et est ensuite accusée de meurtre.
back_translation: At her request, she has him executed to end his suffering and is then accused of murder.

text: will they be able to finally destroy the tall man for good ?
translation: pourront-ils enfin détruire le grand homme une bonne fois pour toutes ?
back_translation: Will they finally be able to destroy the great man once and for all?

text: legendary irish writer brendan behan 's memoir , borstal boy , has been given a loving screen transferral .
translation: Le mémoire du légendaire écrivain irlandais Brendan Behan, "Borstal Boy", a été adapté avec beaucoup d'affection à l'écran.
back_translation: The memoir of legendary Irish writer Brendan Behan, "Borstal Boy," was adapted to the screen with great affection.

text: any intellectual arguments being made about the nature of god are framed in a drama so clumsy , there is a real danger less sophisticated audiences will mistake it for an endorsement of the very things that bean abhors .
translation: Tout argument intellectuel sur la nature de Dieu est présenté dans un drame si maladroit qu'il y a un véritable risque que des publics moins sophistiqués le prennent pour un soutien des choses mêmes que Bean abhorre.
back_translation: Any intellectual argument about the nature of God is presented in such a clumsy manner that there is a real risk that less sophisticated audiences will take it as support for the very things that Bean abhors.

text: an inexplicable crack in the pyrenees mountains provokes excitement and scientific curiosity .
translation: une fissure inexplicable dans les montagnes des Pyrénées suscite l'excitation et la curiosité scientifique.
back_translation: An inexplicable crack in the Pyrenees mountains raises excitement and scientific curiosity.

text: on this tricky topic , tadpole is very much a step in the right direction , with its blend of frankness , civility and compassion .
translation: sur ce sujet délicat, têtard est vraiment un pas dans la bonne direction, avec son mélange de franchise, de civilité et de compassion.
back_translation: On this delicate subject, tadpole is truly a step in the right direction, with its blend of frankness, civility, and compassion.

text: impressed by his extravagant lifestyle and prowess , his young son kilo yearns to follow in his footsteps .
translation: Impressionné par son style de vie extravagant et ses compétences, son jeune fils Kilo aspire à suivre ses traces.
back_translation: Impressed by his extravagant lifestyle and skills, his young son Kilo aspires to follow in his footsteps.

text: the off-center humor is a constant , and the ensemble gives it a buoyant delivery .
translation: L'humour décalé est une constante, et l'ensemble lui donne une livraison dynamique.

text: the most memorable moment was when green threw medical equipment at a window ; not because it was particularly funny , but because i had a serious urge to grab the old lady at the end of my aisle 's walker and toss it at the screen in frustration .
translation: le moment le plus mémorable a été lorsque Green a jeté du matériel médical par la fenêtre ; non pas parce que c'était particulièrement drôle, mais parce que j'avais une sérieuse envie de prendre le déambulateur de la vieille dame au bout de mon allée et de le jeter à l'écran par frustration.
back_translation: The most memorable moment was when Green threw medical equipment out the window; not because it was particularly funny, but because I had a serious urge to take the old lady's walker at the end of my driveway and throw it at the screen out of frustration.

text: 'loosely based on a true love story ' is a romantic comedy starring kate hudson as emma and luke wilson as alex . alex is an author whose writer 's block and gambling debts have landed him in a jam .
translation: 'librement inspiré d'une histoire d'amour vraie' est une comédie romantique avec Kate Hudson dans le rôle d'Emma et Luke Wilson dans le rôle d'Alex. Alex est un auteur dont le blocage d'écrivain et les dettes de jeu lui ont mis dans une situation difficile.
back_translation: "Freely inspired by a true love story" is a romantic comedy with Kate Hudson playing the role of Emma and Luke Wilson as Alex. Alex is an author whose writer's block and gambling debts have put him in a difficult situation.

text: when kanna comes back from nagpur both the persons he loved the most rupi and ghisu are not there for him .
translation: Lorsque Kanna revient de Nagpur, les deux personnes qu'il aimait le plus, Rupi et Ghisu, ne sont pas là pour lui.
back_translation: When Kanna returns from Nagpur, the two people he loved the most, Rupi and Ghisu, are not there for him.

text: the gripping story of the dutch bettien martens , based on true facts .
translation: l'histoire captivante de la néerlandaise Bettien Martens, basée sur des faits réels.
back_translation: The captivating story of the Dutch Bettien Martens, based on true events.

text: ben 's rock-solid , promising future and romance with amy are turned upside-down with the arrival of madison bell .
translation: l'avenir prometteur et la romance de ben avec amy sont bouleversés par l'arrivée de madison bell.
back_translation: The promising future and the romance between Ben and Amy are disrupted by the arrival of Madison Bell.

text: naxalites are becoming more and more popular among tribles because of their capacity to give instant justice and more and more youths are joining them .
translation: Les naxalites gagnent en popularité parmi les tribus en raison de leur capacité à donner une justice immédiate et de plus en plus de jeunes les rejoignent.
back_translation: The Naxalites are gaining popularity among the tribes due to their ability to provide immediate justice, and more and more young people are joining them.

text: former maintenance man gary fitch becomes the least likely candidate for mayor of santa monica , california , when he teams up with the wackiest `` dream-team `` imaginable : glory , a former high-priced call-girl ; his homeless buddy foster edwards , iii ; and shane martinez , a gay delivery boy .
translation: L'ancien homme d'entretien Gary Fitch devient le candidat le moins probable pour le poste de maire de Santa Monica, en Californie, lorsqu'il s'associe avec la « dream-team » la plus loufoque imaginable : Glory, une ancienne call-girl haut de gamme ; son ami sans-abri Foster Edwards, III ; et Shane Martinez, un livreur gay.
back_translation: Former maintenance man Gary Fitch becomes the least likely candidate for the mayoral position in Santa Monica, California, when he teams up with the most outlandish "dream team" imaginable: Glory, a former high-end call girl; her homeless friend Foster Edwards, III; and Shane Martinez, a gay delivery man.

text: eric has married his high school sweetheart , has a good job , his first house , yet he jokes about all the things he 's missed in life .
translation: Eric a épousé son amour de lycée, a un bon emploi, sa première maison, pourtant il plaisante sur toutes les choses qu'il a manquées dans la vie.
back_translation: Eric married his high school sweetheart, has a good job, his first house, yet he jokes about all the things he missed out on in life.

text: a movie that 's just plain awful but still manages to entertain on a guilty-pleasure , so-bad-it's-funny level .
translation: un film qui est tout simplement horrible mais qui parvient quand même à divertir sur un niveau de plaisir coupable, tellement mauvais que c'en est drôle.
back_translation: a film that is simply horrible but still manages to entertain on a guilty pleasure level, so bad that it's funny.

text: but harper himself is a suspect in several bomb attacks , one of which killed rachel 's partner and friend .
translation: mais harper lui-même est un suspect dans plusieurs attaques à la bombe, dont l'une a tué le partenaire et ami de rachel.
back_translation: but Harper himself is a suspect in several bombing attacks, one of which killed Rachel's partner and friend.

text: a disaster of a drama , saved only by its winged assailants .
translation: un désastre de drame, sauvé uniquement par ses assaillants ailés.

text: this is n't an original film , but it is an effective one .
translation: ce n'est pas un film original, mais c'est un film efficace.
back_translation: It's not an original film, but it's an effective film.

text: poets concentrates on locations and issues within the uk and in an oblique way referencing poetry to the topography , at first seemingly random and esoterical , slowly and ultimately questioning the very nature of our british culture and heritage .
translation: Les poètes se concentrent sur des lieux et des problématiques au sein du Royaume-Uni tout en faisant de manière oblique référence à la poésie et à la topographie, au départ apparemment aléatoire et ésotérique, mais questionnant lentement et finalement la nature même de notre culture et patrimoine britannique.
back_translation: Poets focus on places and issues within the United Kingdom while making oblique references to poetry and topography, seemingly random and esoteric at first, but gradually and ultimately questioning the very nature of our British culture and heritage.

text: perhaps no picture ever made has more literally showed that the road to hell is paved with good intentions .
translation: Peut-être qu'aucune image jamais réalisée n'a montré plus littéralement que le chemin vers l'enfer est pavé de bonnes intentions.
back_translation: Perhaps no image ever created has shown more literally that the road to hell is paved with good intentions.

text: dance teacher ramu leaves india to go to america and join his cousin who is rich and successful .
translation: Le professeur de danse Ramu quitte l'Inde pour aller en Amérique rejoindre son cousin qui est riche et prospère.
back_translation: Dance teacher Ramu is leaving India to go to America to join his rich and prosperous cousin.

text: an un-relentless action film that will attract , through word of mouth , all those hooked on gaming on their pc 's and drag them back into the cinema auditoriums .

text: how do a man who has never loved and a woman who refused to ever love again deal with the fact that they are meant to be together ?

text: it is story of an innocent boy ( krishna ) .
translation: C'est l'histoire d'un garçon innocent (Krishna).

text: a film at once depressing and uplifting -- depressing in terms of the sad , often horrifying subjects of nachtwey 's photographs but uplifting in terms of his commitment and integrity .
translation: un film à la fois déprimant et encourageant -- déprimant en raison des sujets tristes et souvent horrifiants des photographies de Nachtwey, mais encourageant en raison de son engagement et de son intégrité.
back_translation: A film that is both depressing and encouraging -- depressing because of the sad and often horrifying subjects of Nachtwey's photographs, but encouraging because of his commitment and integrity.

text: on the surface , their exchanges are trivial and stilted .
translation: En surface, leurs échanges sont triviaux et guindés.

text: passing himself as a single father , he starts to meet a string of single mums , confident in his ability to leave them behind when they start to ask for a commitment .
translation: Se faisant passer pour un père célibataire, il commence à rencontrer une série de mamans célibataires, confiant dans sa capacité à les abandonner lorsqu'elles commencent à demander un engagement.
back_translation: Pretending to be a single father, he begins to meet a series of single moms, confident in his ability to abandon them when they start asking for a commitment.

translation: Gibney et Jarecki veulent juste pendre le salaud.
