translation: Rachel se retrouve rapidement impliquée avec le terrain de jeux et sur la liste des cibles du tueur.
back_translation: Rachel quickly finds herself involved with the playground and on the killer's target list.

text: the question is , will their lives change forever with the riches that come along with professional sports , or will they be destined to live a life in their home country , asking forever , what if ?
translation: la question est : leurs vies vont-elles changer pour toujours avec les richesses qui accompagnent le sport professionnel, ou seront-elles destinées à vivre une vie dans leur pays d'origine, se demandant pour toujours, et si ?
back_translation: The question is: will their lives change forever with the riches that come with professional sports, or will they be destined to live a life in their home country, always wondering, what if?

text: after three rowdy guys get booted from their frat house , they dress up as women and pledge the `` ugly girl `` sorority , where they figure they 'll blend right in .
translation: Après que trois gars turbulents aient été expulsés de leur maison de fraternité, ils se déguisent en femmes et rejoignent la sororité des "filles moches", où ils pensent qu'ils passeront inaperçus.
back_translation: After three rowdy guys are expelled from their fraternity house, they disguise themselves as women and join the "ugly girls" sorority, where they think they will go unnoticed.

text: . . . a fluffy , flaky croissant of a culture clash comedy , barely substantial enough for a feature but just light and tasty enough to satisfy .
translation: ... un croissant moelleux et feuilleté d'une comédie de choc culturel, à peine suffisamment consistant pour un long métrage mais juste assez léger et savoureux pour satisfaire.
back_translation: ... a soft and flaky croissant from a cultural shock comedy, barely substantial enough for a feature film but just light and tasty enough to satisfy.

text: you can tell almost immediately that welcome to collinwood is n't going to jell .
translation: on peut presque immédiatement dire que "Welcome to Collinwood" ne va pas fonctionner.
back_translation: One can almost immediately say that "Welcome to Collinwood" is not going to work.

text: anxious to use artificial life to improve the world , rosetta stone , ( tilda swinton ) , a bio-geneticist creates a recipe for cyborgs and uses her own dna in order to breed three self replicating automatons , part human , part computer named ruby , olive and marine ( also played by tilda swinton ) .
translation: anxieuse d'utiliser la vie artificielle pour améliorer le monde, Rosetta Stone (Tilda Swinton), une bio-généticienne, crée une recette pour des cyborgs et utilise son propre ADN afin de créer trois automates auto-réplicants, à moitié humains, à moitié ordinateurs, nommés Ruby, Olive et Marine (également interprétés par Tilda Swinton).
back_translation: Anxious to use artificial life to improve the world, Rosetta Stone (Tilda Swinton), a bio-geneticist, creates a recipe for cyborgs and uses her own DNA to create three self-replicating automatons, half human and half computer, named Ruby, Olive, and Marine (also portrayed by Tilda Swinton).

text: beginning with the world trade center 's north tower afire and billowing dense smoke , and ending on the vast expanse of ash-brown debris the following morning , the first 24 hours documents `` ground zero `` in the immediate aftermath of the terrorist attacks on september 11 , 2001 .
translation: commençant par la tour nord du World Trade Center en feu et émettant d'épais nuages de fumée, et se terminant sur la vaste étendue de débris brun cendré le lendemain matin, les premières 24 heures documentent `` le site zéro `` dans l'immédiate suite des attentats terroristes du 11 septembre 2001.
back_translation: Beginning with the north tower of the World Trade Center on fire and emitting thick clouds of smoke, and ending with the vast expanse of gray-brown debris the following morning, the first 24 hours document "ground zero" in the immediate aftermath of the terrorist attacks of September 11, 2001.

text: it is a dark comedy that challenges the traditional ideas of marriage and questions the societal values of money and sex .
translation: c'est une comédie noire qui remet en question les idées traditionnelles sur le mariage et interroge les valeurs sociétales de l'argent et du sexe.
back_translation: It is a black comedy that challenges traditional ideas about marriage and questions societal values of money and sex.

text: george discovers both the princess and the truth behind her strange disappearance .
translation: Georges découvre à la fois la princesse et la vérité derrière sa mystérieuse disparition.
back_translation: Georges discovers both the princess and the truth behind her mysterious disappearance.

text: the film sounds like the stuff of lurid melodrama , but what makes it interesting as a character study is the fact that the story is told from paul 's perspective .
translation: Le film semble être le genre de mélodrame saisissant, mais ce qui le rend intéressant en tant qu'étude de caractère, c'est le fait que l'histoire est racontée du point de vue de Paul.
back_translation: The film seems to be the kind of gripping melodrama, but what makes it interesting as a character study is the fact that the story is told from Paul's point of view.

text: now , it 's up to kimberly , along with the help of flight 180 junkie thomas burke , clear rivers , and the mortician william bloodworth , kimberly must find a way to stop death before it 's to late . . .
translation: Maintenant, c'est au tour de Kimberly, avec l'aide de Thomas Burke, le junkie du vol 180, de Clear Rivers et du thanatopracteur William Bloodworth, de trouver un moyen d'arrêter la mort avant qu'il ne soit trop tard...
back_translation: Now it's Kimberly's turn, with the help of Thomas Burke, the junkie from flight 180, Clear Rivers, and the mortician William Bloodworth, to find a way to stop death before it's too late...

text: after losing his and young son to divorce , he finds no alternative but to kidnap the boy inevitably dragging him through a harrowing journey of grief and as he learns to accept himself .
translation: Après avoir perdu sa femme et son jeune fils à cause d'un divorce, il ne trouve d'autre alternative que de kidnapper l'enfant, l'entraînant inévitablement dans un périple douloureux de chagrin alors qu'il apprend à s'accepter.
back_translation: After losing his wife and young son due to a divorce, he finds no other alternative but to kidnap the child, inevitably leading him on a painful journey of grief as he learns to accept himself.

text: from the late master filmmaker krzysztof kieslowski comes 'heaven ' , the first installment of a trilogy .
translation: Du maître cinéaste Krzysztof Kieślowski vient « Ciel », le premier épisode d'une trilogie.
back_translation: From the master filmmaker Krzysztof Kieślowski comes "Heaven," the first episode of a trilogy.

text: the plot is very clever , but boyd weighs it down with too many characters and events , all intertwined and far too complicated to keep track of .
translation: l'intrigue est très astucieuse, mais Boyd l'alourdit avec trop de personnages et d'événements, tous entrelacés et beaucoup trop compliqués à suivre.
back_translation: The plot is very clever, but Boyd weighs it down with too many characters and events, all intertwined and much too complicated to follow.

text: her constant groans and howls of amorous pleasure turn ted 's domain of conquest and libidinous triumph into a nightmare world of bachelorman-interruptus .
translation: ses gémissements constants et ses hurlements de plaisir amoureux transforment le domaine de conquête et de triomphe libidineux de Ted en un monde cauchemardesque de célibataire-interrompu.
back_translation: His constant moans and cries of amorous pleasure transform Ted's domain of conquest and libidinous triumph into a nightmarish world of interrupted bachelorhood.

text: in 8 minutes we go into the life of a little boy who tries to get away with not doing his task .
translation: Dans 8 minutes, nous plongeons dans la vie d'un petit garçon qui essaie de s'en sortir sans faire sa tâche.
back_translation: In 8 minutes, we will dive into the life of a little boy who is trying to get by without doing his chores.

text: under the pressure of her psychological assaults , sam 's do-gooder vaneer cracks and his true nature is revealed .
translation: Sous la pression de ses attaques psychologiques, le vernis de parfait gentil de Sam se fissure et sa vraie nature est révélée.
back_translation: Under the pressure of his psychological attacks, Sam's veneer of being the perfect nice guy cracks and his true nature is revealed.

text: offers a gentle summer fantasy for both grown-ups and little ones .
translation: offre une douce fantaisie estivale pour les adultes et les petits.
back_translation: offers a sweet summer fantasy for adults and little ones.

text: an empty exercise , a florid but ultimately vapid crime melodrama with lots of surface flash but little emotional resonance .
translation: un exercice vide, un mélodrame criminel fleuri mais finalement insipide avec beaucoup de superficialité mais peu de résonance émotionnelle.
back_translation: An empty exercise, a flowery yet ultimately insipid crime melodrama with a lot of superficiality but little emotional resonance.

text: . . . if it had been only half-an-hour long or a tv special , the humor would have been fast and furious -- at ninety minutes , it drags .
translation: ... si cela avait duré seulement une demi-heure ou un spécial télé, l'humour aurait été rapide et furieux - à quatre-vingt-dix minutes, ça traîne.
back_translation: ... if it had lasted only half an hour or a TV special, the humor would have been quick and furious - at ninety minutes, it drags on.

text: the x potion gives the quickly named blossom , bubbles and buttercup supernatural powers that include extraordinary strength and laser-beam eyes , which unfortunately do n't enable them to discern flimsy screenplays .
translation: La potion X donne à la rapidement nommée Fleur, Bulle et Beurré des pouvoirs surnaturels qui incluent une force extraordinaire et des yeux laser, ce qui, malheureusement, ne leur permet pas de discerner des scénarios peu solides.
back_translation: The potion X gives the quickly named Fleur, Bulle, and Beurré supernatural powers that include extraordinary strength and laser eyes, which, unfortunately, does not allow them to discern flimsy scenarios.

text: however , the enemy terrorists learn of his secret identity and kidnap his girlfriend/fiancee ( gabriel macht ) .
translation: Cependant, les terroristes ennemis découvrent son identité secrète et enlèvent sa petite amie/fiancée (Gabriel Macht).
back_translation: However, the enemy terrorists discover his secret identity and kidnap his girlfriend/fiancée (Gabriel Macht).

text: the ridiculed home secretary is slowly coming to life , but in his way stands a paranoid defense secretary .
translation: Le ministre de l'Intérieur ridiculisé commence lentement à reprendre vie, mais sur son chemin se dresse un ministre de la Défense paranoïaque.
back_translation: The ridiculed Interior Minister is slowly starting to come back to life, but in his way stands a paranoid Defense Minister.

text: what better place for a writer to pick up a girl ?
translation: quel meilleur endroit pour un écrivain pour séduire une fille ?
back_translation: What is the best place for a writer to charm a girl?

text: . . . while dark water is n't a complete wash ( no pun intended ) , watched side-by-side with ringu , it ultimately comes off as a pale successor .
translation: ... bien que Dark Water ne soit pas un lavage complet (sans jeu de mots), regardé côte à côte avec Ringu, il se présente finalement comme un pâle successeur.
back_translation: ... although Dark Water is not a complete washout (pun intended), when viewed side by side with Ringu, it ultimately comes off as a pale successor.

text: chelsea walls is a case of too many chefs fussing over too weak a recipe .
translation: Chelsea Walls est un cas de trop de chefs s'occupant d'une recette trop faible.
back_translation: Chelsea Walls is a case of too many cooks handling a recipe that is too weak.

text: what if hitler did n't die in berlin at the end of the war ?
translation: Que se passerait-il si Hitler n'était pas mort à Berlin à la fin de la guerre ?
back_translation: What would have happened if Hitler had not died in Berlin at the end of the war?

text: too restrained to be a freak show , too mercenary and obvious to be cerebral , too dull and pretentious to be engaging . . . the isle defies an easy categorization .
translation: trop retenu pour être un spectacle de freaks, trop mercenaire et évident pour être cérébral, trop ennuyeux et prétentieux pour être captivant... l'île défie une catégorisation facile.
back_translation: Too restrained to be a freak show, too mercenary and obvious to be cerebral, too boring and pretentious to be captivating... the island defies easy categorization.

text: the adventures of pluto nash is a whole lot of nada .
translation: Les aventures de Pluto Nash, c'est tout un tas de rien.
back_translation: The Adventures of Pluto Nash is a whole lot of nothing.

text: welcoming the challenge , roger guides nick through the city 's wild nightlife for an all-night crash course , only to realize that he -- the adult -- still has something to learn about what women , and men , really want .
translation: Accueillant le défi, Roger guide Nick à travers la vie nocturne sauvage de la ville pour un cours intensif toute la nuit, seulement pour réaliser qu'il - l'adulte - a encore quelque chose à apprendre sur ce que les femmes, et les hommes, veulent vraiment.
back_translation: Welcoming the challenge, Roger guides Nick through the wild nightlife of the city for an intensive all-night course, only to realize that he—the adult—still has something to learn about what women, and men, really want.

text: i have a confession to make : i did n't particularly like e . t . the first time i saw it as a young boy . that is because - damn it ! - i also wanted a little alien as a friend !
translation: J'ai une confession à faire : je n'ai pas particulièrement aimé E.T. la première fois que je l'ai vu en tant que jeune garçon. C'est parce que - zut alors ! - je voulais aussi un petit extraterrestre comme ami !
back_translation: I have a confession to make: I didn't particularly like E.T. the first time I saw it as a young boy. It's because - gosh! - I also wanted a little alien as a friend!

text: the crew traveled with the band to their homes in obninsk , russia and to their music conservatories in moscow , documenting how these two girls and five boys became so adept at playing american country music .
translation: l'équipage a voyagé avec le groupe jusqu'à leurs maisons à Obninsk, en Russie, et à leurs conservatoires de musique à Moscou, documentant comment ces deux filles et cinq garçons sont devenus si doués pour jouer de la musique country américaine.
back_translation: The crew traveled with the group to their homes in Obninsk, Russia, and to their music conservatories in Moscow, documenting how these two girls and five boys became so skilled at playing American country music.

text: nice balance between real emotions and cute movie moments with a hilarious love scene .
translation: un bon équilibre entre de vraies émotions et des moments mignons de film avec une scène d'amour hilarante.
back_translation: a good balance between genuine emotions and cute movie moments with a hilarious love scene.

text: louiso lets the movie dawdle in classic disaffected-indie-film mode , and brother hoffman 's script stumbles over a late-inning twist that just does n't make sense .
translation: Louiso laisse le film traîner dans un mode classique de film indépendant désenchanté, et le scénario du frère Hoffman trébuche sur un retournement tardif qui n'a tout simplement pas de sens.
back_translation: Louiso lets the film linger in a classic mode of disenchanted independent cinema, and brother Hoffman's screenplay stumbles over a late twist that simply makes no sense.

text: the venezuelans say things like `` si , pretty much `` and `` por favor , go home `` when talking to americans . that 's muy loco , but no more ridiculous than most of the rest of `` dragonfly . ``
translation: Les Vénézuéliens disent des choses comme « oui, à peu près » et « s'il vous plaît, rentrez chez vous » en parlant aux Américains. C'est muy loco, mais pas plus ridicule que le reste de « libellule ».
back_translation: Venezuelans say things like "yes, more or less" and "please, go home" when talking to Americans. It's muy loco, but not more ridiculous than the rest of "dragonfly."

text: his plan goes awry , however , when the group is forced to work for a drug ring .
translation: son plan tourne mal, cependant, lorsque le groupe est contraint de travailler pour un réseau de drogue.
back_translation: His plan goes wrong, however, when the group is forced to work for a drug network.

text: its audacious ambitions sabotaged by pomposity , steven soderbergh 's space opera emerges as a numbingly dull experience .
translation: Ses ambitions audacieuses sabotées par sa pompe, l'opéra spatial de Steven Soderbergh se révèle être une expérience d'un ennui accablant.
back_translation: His bold ambitions sabotaged by his own missteps, Steven Soderbergh's space opera turns out to be an experience of overwhelming boredom.

text: when she begins to question his sanity , she decides to take her chances on her own , only to run into another pair , who on the surface appear to be escaped prisoners on the run .
translation: Lorsqu'elle commence à remettre en question sa santé mentale, elle décide de tenter sa chance seule, pour finalement croiser un autre duo qui, en apparence, semblent être des prisonniers évadés en fuite.
back_translation: When she begins to question her mental health, she decides to try her luck alone, only to eventually encounter another duo who, on the surface, seem to be escaped prisoners on the run.

text: he must fend off beings that seek to gain control over the mysterious black mass .
translation: il doit repousser des êtres qui cherchent à prendre le contrôle de la mystérieuse masse noire.
back_translation: He must fend off beings that seek to take control of the mysterious black mass.

text: samira makhmalbaf 's new film blackboards is much like the ethos of a stream of consciousness , although , it 's unfortunate for the viewer that the thoughts and reflections coming through are torpid and banal
translation: Le nouveau film de Samira Makhmalbaf, "Tableaux noirs", ressemble beaucoup à l'éthos d'un flux de conscience, bien que, malheureusement pour le spectateur, les pensées et réflexions qui émergent soient terne et banales.
back_translation: The new film by Samira Makhmalbaf, "Blackboards," resembles the ethos of a stream of consciousness, although, unfortunately for the viewer, the thoughts and reflections that emerge are dull and mundane.

text: but when fred is fired , the well runs dry , and our heroes come up with a new plan : make their own `` adult `` film .
translation: mais quand Fred est renvoyé, le puits se tarit, et nos héros concoctent un nouveau plan : réaliser leur propre film "pour adultes".
back_translation: But when Fred is fired, the well runs dry, and our heroes concoct a new plan: to make their own "adult" film.

text: capitalizing on his fame as the star of `` hogan 's heroes , `` bob crane ( greg kinnear ) dove into the freewheeling spirit of the 60s and 70s with relish , having affairs with numerous women .
translation: Capitalisant sur sa notoriété en tant qu'étoile de « Hogan's Heroes », Bob Crane (Greg Kinnear) plongea avec délices dans l'esprit libre des années 60 et 70, ayant des aventures avec de nombreuses femmes.
back_translation: Capitalizing on his fame as a star of "Hogan's Heroes," Bob Crane (Greg Kinnear) indulged in the free-spiritedness of the 60s and 70s, having affairs with many women.

text: an intelligently made ( and beautifully edited ) picture that at the very least has a spark of life to it -- more than you can say for plenty of movies that flow through the hollywood pipeline without a hitch .
translation: une image intelligemment réalisée (et magnifiquement éditée) qui a au moins une étincelle de vie, plus que ce que l'on peut dire pour de nombreux films qui passent par le pipeline hollywoodien sans encombre.
back_translation: a cleverly crafted (and beautifully edited) image that has at least a spark of life, more than can be said for many films that go through the Hollywood pipeline without a hitch.

text: this is a third-person story now , told by hollywood , and much more ordinary for it .
translation: c'est une histoire racontée à la troisième personne maintenant, racontée par Hollywood, et beaucoup plus ordinaire pour cela.
back_translation: It's a story told in the third person now, narrated by Hollywood, and much more ordinary for that.

text: even if you 're an elvis person , you wo n't find anything to get excited about on this dvd .
translation: même si vous êtes un fan d'Elvis, vous ne trouverez rien de passionnant sur ce DVD.
back_translation: Even if you are an Elvis fan, you won't find anything exciting on this DVD.

text: but when he realizes that he has to deal with what has got to be god 's most arduous task , listening and answering prayers .
translation: mais quand il se rend compte qu'il doit faire face à ce qui doit être la tâche la plus difficile de Dieu, écouter et répondre aux prières.
back_translation: but when he realizes that he must face what must be God's most difficult task, listening to and answering prayers.

text: bravely explores the psychic damage inflicted on jean-luc by a withholding , then absent parent .
translation: explore courageusement les dommages psychiques infligés à Jean-Luc par un parent qui retient, puis absent.
back_translation: bravely explore the psychological damage inflicted on Jean-Luc by a parent who is withholding and then absent.

text: there 's something fishy about a seasonal holiday kids ' movie . . . that derives its moment of most convincing emotional gravity from a scene where santa gives gifts to grownups .
translation: Il y a quelque chose de louche dans un film pour enfants de vacances saisonnières... qui tire son moment de la plus convaincante gravité émotionnelle d'une scène où le père Noël offre des cadeaux aux adultes.
back_translation: There is something shady about a children's holiday movie... that draws its moment from the most convincingly emotional gravity of a scene where Santa Claus gives gifts to adults.

text: after gruelling training sessions , the three succeed in robbing the bank , but things go haywire .
translation: Après des séances d'entraînement éprouvantes, les trois réussissent à braquer la banque, mais les choses partent en vrille.
back_translation: After grueling training sessions, the three manage to rob the bank, but things go off the rails.

text: movie fans , get ready to take off . . . the other direction .
translation: fans de cinéma, préparez-vous à décoller... dans l'autre direction.
back_translation: Movie fans, get ready to take off... in the other direction.

text: she 's telling her story because she wants to set the record straight , to correct the lies in natalie 's book , which became a bestseller .
translation: Elle raconte son histoire parce qu'elle veut rétablir la vérité, corriger les mensonges dans le livre de Natalie, qui est devenu un best-seller.
back_translation: She tells her story because she wants to set the record straight, correct the lies in Natalie's book, which has become a bestseller.

text: the film intercuts between two days , two years apart .
translation: le film alterne entre deux jours, séparés par deux ans.
back_translation: The film alternates between two days, separated by two years.

text: phillip noyce and all of his actors -- as well as his cinematographer , christopher doyle -- understand the delicate forcefulness of greene 's prose , and it 's there on the screen in their version of the quiet american .
translation: Phillip Noyce et tous ses acteurs, ainsi que son directeur de la photographie, Christopher Doyle, comprennent la délicate force de la prose de Greene, et cela se ressent à l'écran dans leur version de L'Américain tranquille.
back_translation: Phillip Noyce and all his actors, as well as his director of photography, Christopher Doyle, understand the delicate strength of Greene's prose, and this is felt on screen in their version of The Quiet American.

text: he awakes to what appears to be the next morning only to find that he is one year into the future and is an escaped convict for the murder of his fianc & # 233 ; e .
translation: Il se réveille ce qui semble être le lendemain matin seulement pour découvrir qu'il est un an dans le futur et qu'il est un condamné en fuite pour le meurtre de sa fiancée.
back_translation: He wakes up what seems to be the following morning only to discover that he is a year into the future and that he is a fugitive convicted of his fiancée's murder.

text: thirty years ago he was a poor worker who left his girlfriend to pursuit his dream of success .
translation: Il y a trente ans, il était un pauvre travailleur qui a quitté sa petite amie pour poursuivre son rêve de succès.
back_translation: Thirty years ago, he was a poor worker who left his girlfriend to pursue his dream of success.

text: big-shot executive robert stiles ' car is damaged when parked at the lodge .
translation: La voiture du grand patron Robert Stiles est endommagée lorsqu'elle est garée au lodge.
back_translation: The car of the big boss Robert Stiles is damaged while parked at the lodge.

text: as the boyfriend also becomes obsessed , it becomes apparent that something more is happening .
translation: Alors que le petit ami devient également obsédé, il devient évident que quelque chose de plus se passe.
back_translation: As the boyfriend becomes increasingly obsessed, it becomes clear that something more is happening.

text: the asylum material is gripping , as are the scenes of jia with his family .
translation: Le matériel sur l'asile est captivant, tout comme les scènes de Jia avec sa famille.
back_translation: The material on asylum is captivating, just like the scenes with Jia and her family.

text: the pair wave farewell in the airport and yoyo returns to hong kong to further her studies , while cheung continues to write his unfinished dissertation .
translation: le couple fait ses adieux à l'aéroport et yoyo retourne à Hong Kong pour poursuivre ses études, tandis que Cheung continue d'écrire sa thèse inachevée.
back_translation: The couple says goodbye at the airport, and Yoyo returns to Hong Kong to continue her studies, while Cheung continues to write his unfinished thesis.

text: when fowler introduces pyle to his beautiful young vietnamese mistress phuong ( hai yen ) the three become swept up in a tempestuous love triangle that leads to a series of startling revelations and finally - murder .
translation: Lorsque Fowler présente Pyle à sa magnifique jeune maîtresse vietnamienne Phuong (Hai Yen), les trois se retrouvent plongés dans un triangle amoureux tumultueux qui entraîne une série de révélations étonnantes et, finalement, un meurtre.
back_translation: When Fowler introduces Pyle to his beautiful young Vietnamese mistress Phuong (Hai Yen), the three find themselves caught in a tumultuous love triangle that leads to a series of surprising revelations and, ultimately, a murder.

text: nevertheless , carlos puts his artistic aspirations on hold to take over the store and care for his father .
translation: Cependant, Carlos met ses aspirations artistiques en attente pour reprendre le magasin et s'occuper de son père.
back_translation: However, Carlos put his artistic aspirations on hold to run the store and take care of his father.

text: wanders all over the map thematically and stylistically , and borrows heavily from lynch , jeunet , and von trier while failing to find a spark of its own .
translation: se promène partout sur la carte thématiquement et stylistiquement, et emprunte lourdement à Lynch, Jeunet et Von Trier tout en n’arrivant pas à trouver une étincelle qui lui soit propre.
back_translation: wanders everywhere on the map thematically and stylistically, heavily borrowing from Lynch, Jeunet, and Von Trier while struggling to find a spark that is its own.

text: it is that rare combination of bad writing , bad direction and bad acting -- the trifecta of badness .
translation: c'est cette rare combinaison de mauvaise écriture, de mauvaise direction et de mauvaise interprétation - la trifecta de la médiocrité.
back_translation: It's this rare combination of poor writing, bad direction, and poor acting - the trifecta of mediocrity.

text: behind in rent , losing any real day jobs they have , they plan a bank robbery .
translation: en retard de loyer, perdant tout emploi stable qu'ils ont, ils prévoient un vol de banque.
back_translation: behind on rent, losing any stable job they have, they are planning a bank robbery.

text: believing himself capable of understanding people from the other side of the track , michael fails to recognize that the ex-con is manipulating him and so sets off a catastrophic chain of events in the community .
translation: Croyant être capable de comprendre les personnes de l'autre côté de la voie, Michael ne réalise pas que l'ex-détenu le manipule et déclenche ainsi une chaîne d'événements catastrophiques dans la communauté.
back_translation: Believing he can understand the people on the other side of the track, Michael doesn't realize that the ex-convict is manipulating him, thus triggering a chain of catastrophic events in the community.

text: working in secret , the progressive group organised the 1959 theatre boycott to end segregation in movie theatres in hamilton .
translation: Travaillant dans le secret, le groupe progressiste a organisé le boycott des théâtres de 1959 pour mettre fin à la ségrégation dans les cinémas de Hamilton.
back_translation: Working in secrecy, the progressive group organized the 1959 boycott of theaters to end segregation in the cinemas of Hamilton.

text: the soviet union has collapsed and armenia is on the verge of her independence .
translation: L'Union soviétique s'est effondrée et l'Arménie est sur le point d'obtenir son indépendance.
back_translation: The Soviet Union has collapsed and Armenia is about to gain its independence.

text: as charming , humorous and heimisch as its nomadic subjects .
translation: aussi charmante, humoristique et heimisch que ses sujets nomades.

text: a film within a film , this is a contemporary story of the making of a historical epic about the armenian holocaust between 1915 and 1918 .

text: the latest installment in the pokemon canon , pokemon 4ever is surprising less moldy and trite than the last two , likely because much of the japanese anime is set in a scenic forest where pokemon graze in peace .

text: ultimately , in the history of the academy , people may be wondering what all that jazz was about `` chicago `` in 2002 . zellweger 's whiny pouty-lipped poof faced and spindly attempt at playing an ingenue makes her nomination as best actress even more of a an a
translation: En fin de compte, dans l'histoire de l'académie, les gens se demandent peut-être ce que tout ce « jazz » à propos de « Chicago » en 2002 signifiait. La moue plaintive de Zellweger, son visage efféminé et sa tentative chétive de jouer une ingénue rendent sa nomination pour le meilleur rôle féminin encore plus discutables.
back_translation: Ultimately, in the history of the academy, people may wonder what all this "jazz" about "Chicago" in 2002 meant. Zellweger's plaintive pout, her feminine face, and her feeble attempt to play an ingénue make her nomination for Best Actress even more questionable.

text: set in the los angeles police department in april 1992 , dark blue is a dramatic thriller that takes place just days before the acquittal of four white officers in the beating of black motorist rodney king and the subsequent l . a . riots .
translation: Situé au sein du département de police de Los Angeles en avril 1992, Dark Blue est un thriller dramatique qui se déroule juste quelques jours avant l'acquittement de quatre officiers blancs dans le passage à tabac du conducteur noir Rodney King et les émeutes qui ont suivi à Los Angeles.
back_translation: Set within the Los Angeles Police Department in April 1992, Dark Blue is a dramatic thriller that takes place just a few days before the acquittal of four white officers in the beating of black driver Rodney King and the subsequent riots in Los Angeles.

text: 'murder by numbers ' is a psychological suspense-thriller that tells the story of a tenacious homicide detective , cassie mayweather ( sandra bullock ) and her new partner sam kennedy ( ben chaplin ) who become pitted against two malevolently brilliant young men ( ryan gosling and michael pitt ) in an ingenious battle of wits as they try to solve a murder case .

back_translation: "Murders by Numbers" is a psychological thriller that tells the story of a tenacious homicide detective, Cassie Mayweather (Sandra Bullock), and her new partner Sam Kennedy (Ben Chaplin) as they confront two brilliant and malicious young men (Ryan Gosling and Michael Pitt) in a clever battle of wits as they try to solve a murder case.

text: muccino seems to be exploring the idea of why human beings long for what they do n't have , and how this gets us in trouble . but even while his characters are acting horribly , he is always sympathetic .
translation: Muccino semble explorer l'idée de pourquoi les êtres humains désirent ce qu'ils n'ont pas, et comment cela peut nous causer des problèmes. Mais même lorsque ses personnages agissent horriblement, il est toujours compréhensif.
back_translation: Muccino seems to explore the idea of why human beings desire what they do not have, and how that can cause us problems. But even when his characters act horribly, he is still understanding.

text: his older brother junnie offers to coach him on how to be a player , promising martin that within two weeks , she 'll be his .
translation: son frère aîné Junnie propose de le coacher sur la manière d'être un joueur, promettant à Martin que dans deux semaines, elle sera à lui.
back_translation: his older brother Junnie offers to coach him on how to be a player, promising Martin that in two weeks, she will be his.

text: at the beginning , the cast assembles for a seemingly traditional wedding shower .
translation: Au début, le casting se réunit pour une fête nuptiale apparemment traditionnelle.
back_translation: At the beginning, the cast gathers for an apparently traditional wedding celebration.

text: feeling like a dope has rarely been more fun than it is in nine queens .
translation: Se sentir comme un imbécile n'a rarement été aussi amusant que dans "Neuf Reines".
back_translation: Feeling like a fool has rarely been as fun as in "Nine Queens".

text: a sham construct based on theory , sleight-of-hand , and ill-wrought hypothesis .
translation: un faux concept basé sur la théorie, des tours de main et des hypothèses mal conçues.
back_translation: a false concept based on theory, tricks of the trade, and poorly conceived hypotheses.

text: with nothing to go on but his dreams and gut instinct , vince launches into his own search for ellen . . . or is he really searching for sara ?
translation: avec rien d'autre que ses rêves et son instinct, Vince se lance dans sa propre recherche d'Ellen... ou est-il vraiment à la recherche de Sara ?
back_translation: With nothing but his dreams and instincts, Vince embarks on his own search for Ellen... or is he really looking for Sara?

text: . . . delivers few moments of inspiration amid the bland animation and simplistic story .
translation: ... offre peu de moments d'inspiration au milieu de l'animation fade et de l'histoire simpliste.
back_translation: ... offers few moments of inspiration amidst the bland animation and simplistic story.

text: terri ( eve ) is a hard-edged woman who ca n't seem to leave her two-timing boyfriend .
translation: Terri (Eve) est une femme dure qui semble incapable de quitter son petit ami infidèle.
back_translation: Terri (Eve) is a tough woman who seems unable to leave her unfaithful boyfriend.

text: before long , pazuzu , the demon from the movies , fully possesses the boy and father merrin is the only one who can stop pazuzu 's evil plan of world domination .
translation: Avant longtemps, Pazuzu, le démon des films, possède complètement le garçon et le père Merrin est le seul à pouvoir arrêter le plan diabolique de Pazuzu pour la domination mondiale.
back_translation: Before long, Pazuzu, the demon from the films, completely possesses the boy, and Father Merrin is the only one able to stop Pazuzu's evil plan for world domination.

text: to my taste , the film 's comic characters come perilously close to being amoses and andys for a new generation .
translation: À mon goût, les personnages comiques du film frôlent dangereusement d'être des Amos et Andy pour une nouvelle génération.
back_translation: In my opinion, the comedic characters in the film dangerously verge on being Amos and Andy for a new generation.

text: whenever it threatens to get bogged down in earnest dramaturgy , a stirring visual sequence like a surge through swirling rapids or a leap from pinnacle to pinnacle rouses us . if horses could fly , this is surely what they 'd look like .
translation: Chaque fois qu'il menace de s'enliser dans un drame sérieux, une séquence visuelle saisissante comme une vague à travers des rapides tourbillonnants ou un saut de sommet en sommet nous réveille. Si les chevaux pouvaient voler, c'est sûrement ce à quoi ils ressembleraient.
back_translation: Every time it threatens to bog down in serious drama, a striking visual sequence like a wave through swirling rapids or a leap from peak to peak wakes us up. If horses could fly, this is surely what they would look like.

text: caught in an intrigue of baby-snatching , a bounty hunter and diaper-changing , dave and ruby spend a hilarious , unexpected and wild night together .
translation: pris dans une intrigue d'enlèvement de bébés, un chasseur de primes et un changeur de couches, Dave et Ruby passent une nuit hilarante, inattendue et sauvage ensemble.
back_translation: Caught in a baby kidnapping plot, a bounty hunter and a diaper changer, Dave and Ruby spend a hilarious, unexpected, and wild night together.

text: as the girls begin to bond , laura gradually begins to find herself abandoning the safety of the fantasy and falling into her first real friendship .
translation: Alors que les filles commencent à tisser des liens, Laura commence progressivement à abandonner la sécurité de la fantaisie et à tomber dans son premier véritable amitié.
back_translation: As the girls begin to bond, Laura gradually starts to let go of the safety of fantasy and falls into her first true friendship.

text: a counterfeit 1000 tomin bank note is passed in a bazaar .
translation: Un faux billet de 1000 tomins est échangé dans un bazar.
back_translation: A fake 1000 tomins note is being exchanged in a bazaar.

text: this stuck pig of a movie flails limply between bizarre comedy and pallid horror .
translation: ce film comme un cochon piégé se débat mollement entre une comédie bizarre et une horreur pâle.
back_translation: This film, like a trapped pig, struggles weakly between a bizarre comedy and a pale horror.

text: paralyzed by the discovery he is only capable of leaving with a stupid excuse , trying to hide from ana the anguish that barely lets him breath .
translation: paralysé par la découverte qu'il n'est capable de partir qu'avec une excuse stupide, essayant de cacher à Ana l'angoisse qui lui permet à peine de respirer.
back_translation: paralyzed by the discovery that he can only leave with a stupid excuse, trying to hide from Ana the anxiety that barely allows him to breathe.

text: it seems that vince 's sister , sara , has shown up too , about 22 years after she was abducted and murdered .
translation: Il semble que la sœur de Vince, Sara, soit aussi réapparue, environ 22 ans après son enlèvement et son meurtre.
back_translation: It seems that Vince's sister, Sara, has also reappeared, about 22 years after her kidnapping and murder.

text: despite the inexperience of the director and his cast , there 's rarely a false moment .
translation: malgré l'inexpérience du réalisateur et de son équipe, il y a rarement un moment faux.
back_translation: Despite the inexperience of the director and his team, there is rarely a false moment.

text: absurdities and clichM-is accumulate like lint in a fat man 's navel .
translation: les absurdités et les clichés s'accumulent comme de la peluche dans le nombril d'un homme gros.
back_translation: Absurdities and clichés accumulate like fluff in the belly button of a fat man.

text: it 's all very cute , though not terribly funny if you 're more than six years old .
translation: c'est tout très mignon, bien que pas très drôle si vous avez plus de six ans.
back_translation: It's all very cute, although not very funny if you're over six years old.

text: ca n't get enough of libidinous young city dwellers ? try this obscenely bad dark comedy , so crass that it makes edward burns ' sidewalks of new york look like oscar wilde .
translation: Vous n'en avez jamais assez des jeunes citadins libidineux ? Essayez cette comédie noire obscène, si crasse qu'elle rend les trottoirs de New York d'Edward Burns dignes d'Oscar Wilde.
back_translation: Aren't you ever tired of the lustful young city dwellers? Try this obscene black comedy, so filthy that it makes Edward Burns' New York sidewalks worthy of Oscar Wilde.

text: but they 're also so much more , as you 'll find out in deborah dickson 's powerful and intimate documentary .
translation: mais ils sont aussi bien plus que cela, comme vous le découvrirez dans le puissant et intime documentaire de Deborah Dickson.
back_translation: But they are also much more than that, as you will discover in Deborah Dickson's powerful and intimate documentary.

text: between bursts of automatic gunfire , the story offers a trenchant critique of capitalism .
translation: entre les rafales de coups de feu automatiques, l'histoire offre une critique virulente du capitalisme.
back_translation: Amid the bursts of automatic gunfire, the story offers a scathing critique of capitalism.

text: it will probably prove interesting to ram dass fans , but to others it may feel like a parody of the mellow , peace-and-love side of the '60s counterculture .
translation: Cela sera probablement intéressant pour les fans de Ram Dass, mais pour d'autres, cela pourrait ressembler à une parodie du côté doux, paix et amour de la contre-culture des années 60.
back_translation: This will probably be interesting for Ram Dass fans, but for others, it might come across as a parody of the sweet, peace, and love side of the 1960s counterculture.

text: jacki resolves to play this one last gig and then throw in the towel if she does not find success .
translation: Jacki décide de jouer ce dernier concert et ensuite de jeter l'éponge si elle ne trouve pas le succès.
back_translation: Jacki decides to perform this last concert and then throw in the towel if she does not find success.

text: when max 's performance is no competition for producers ' nephews and bigger `` names , `` his only option is to cripple the competition - literally .
translation: Lorsque la performance de Max n'est pas à la hauteur de celles des neveux des producteurs et de plus grands "noms", sa seule option est d'handicaper la concurrence - littéralement.
back_translation: When Max's performance does not match that of the producers' nephews and larger "names," his only option is to handicap the competition - literally.

text: edi is wrongly accused of having raped the girl whose brothers have got the control over one of the city areas .
translation: edi est faussement accusé d'avoir violé la fille dont les frères ont le contrôle sur l'un des quartiers de la ville.
back_translation: Edi is falsely accused of raping the girl whose brothers control one of the neighborhoods in the city.

text: lapd patrol officer trey sellars joined the force as a day job until his acting career took off .
translation: L'officier de patrouille du LAPD, Trey Sellars, a rejoint la police comme un emploi de jour jusqu'à ce que sa carrière d'acteur décolle.
back_translation: LAPD patrol officer Trey Sellars joined the police as a day job until his acting career took off.

text: this formulaic chiller will do little to boost stallone 's career .
translation: ce thriller formulaïque ne fera guère avancer la carrière de Stallone.
back_translation: This formulaic thriller will hardly advance Stallone's career.

text: provides the kind of 'laugh therapy ' i need from movie comedies -- offbeat humor , amusing characters , and a happy ending . after seeing 'analyze that , ' i feel better already .
translation: fournit le genre de 'thérapie par le rire' dont j'ai besoin dans les comédies de film -- un humour décalé, des personnages amusants et une fin heureuse. Après avoir vu 'Analyze That', je me sens déjà mieux.
back_translation: It provides the kind of 'laughter therapy' that I need in movie comedies -- quirky humor, funny characters, and a happy ending. After watching 'Analyze That', I already feel better.

text: this roller coaster tale teams a young man , will turner , with an unlikely ally in rogue pirate jack sparrow .
translation: Cette histoire de montagnes russes réunit un jeune homme, Will Turner, avec un allié improbable en la personne du pirate hors-la-loi Jack Sparrow.
back_translation: This rollercoaster story brings together a young man, Will Turner, with an unlikely ally in the form of the outlaw pirate Jack Sparrow.

text: of course , this is n't the best idea , since it involves sneaking into gun-nut carl 's house in the middle of the night .
translation: Bien sûr, ce n'est pas la meilleure idée, puisque cela implique de s'introduire chez le passionné d'armes Carl au milieu de la nuit.
back_translation: Of course, it's not the best idea, since it involves breaking into the weapons enthusiast Carl's place in the middle of the night.

text: what if fate intervened and hitler was forced into hiding in post-war london ?
translation: Et si le destin intervenait et que Hitler était contraint de se cacher dans un Londres d'après-guerre ?
back_translation: And what if fate intervened and Hitler was forced to hide in a post-war London?

text: i did n't find much fascination in the swinging . what they 're doing is a matter of plumbing arrangements and mind games , of no erotic or sensuous charge . but that they are doing it is thought-provoking .
translation: Je n'ai pas trouvé beaucoup de fascination dans le swinging. Ce qu'ils font est une question d'arrangements de plomberie et de jeux d'esprit, sans charge érotique ou sensuelle. Mais le fait qu'ils le fassent est sujet à réflexion.
back_translation: I didn't find much fascination in swinging. What they do is a matter of plumbing arrangements and mind games, without any erotic or sensual charge. But the fact that they do it is thought-provoking.

text: an edgy indie-psychological drama about an alluring but mixed-up l . a . girl who flip-flops between facing life 's uncertainty under her own direction or `` the good life `` provided by a wealthy , disturbing middle-aged benefactor .
translation: un drame psychologique indépendant audacieux sur une séduisante mais déroutée fille de Los Angeles qui oscille entre affronter l'incertitude de la vie selon sa propre direction ou « la belle vie » offerte par un riche et troublant bienfaiteur d'âge moyen.
back_translation: A bold independent psychological drama about a captivating yet confused girl from Los Angeles who wavers between confronting the uncertainty of life on her own terms or "the good life" offered by a wealthy and troubled middle-aged benefactor.

text: as before , the resistance was able to send another t-800 as a protector for john , and its still a question of which one will reach him first . . .
translation: Comme auparavant, la résistance a pu envoyer un autre T-800 en tant que protecteur pour John, et il reste encore à savoir lequel d'entre eux l'atteindra en premier...
back_translation: As before, the resistance was able to send another T-800 as a protector for John, and it remains to be seen which one of them will reach him first...

text: when his only friend and co-worker dies , a young man born with dwarfism moves to an abandoned train depot in rural new jersey .
translation: Lorsque son seul ami et collègue meurt, un jeune homme né avec un nanisme déménage dans un dépôt de train abandonné dans le New Jersey rural.
back_translation: When his only friend and colleague dies, a young man born with dwarfism moves into an abandoned train depot in rural New Jersey.

text: many have no physical sex lives , living instead in a world of romance with stars like james dean or audrey hepburn .
translation: beaucoup n'ont pas de vie sexuelle physique, vivant plutôt dans un monde de romance avec des stars comme James Dean ou Audrey Hepburn.
back_translation: Many do not have a physical sex life, instead living in a world of romance with stars like James Dean or Audrey Hepburn.

text: he 's sixteen and lives with his younger sister , mother cheryl and her boyfriend john , in a modest house in bakersfield , california .
translation: Il a seize ans et vit avec sa sœur cadette, sa mère Cheryl et son petit ami John, dans une maison modeste à Bakersfield, Californie.
back_translation: He is sixteen years old and lives with his younger sister, his mother Cheryl, and her boyfriend John, in a modest house in Bakersfield, California.

text: he seems impossible to stop as when the possessed guest is killed , murray passes into the killer to continue his mission of murdering all nine of them .
translation: il semble impossible à arrêter car lorsque l'invité possédé est tué, Murray passe dans le tueur pour continuer sa mission de meurtre de chacun d'entre eux.
back_translation: He seems impossible to stop because when the possessed guest is killed, Murray passes into the killer to continue his murder mission against each of them.

text: to spite the hated infidel ways of her father , she has settled into a complacent relationship and is struggling ( not too hard ) with issues of fidelity to her kind but unexciting husband .
translation: Pour contrer les méthodes infidèles et haïes de son père, elle s'est installée dans une relation complaisante et lutte (pas trop fort) avec des questions de fidélité envers son mari, gentil mais peu excitant.
back_translation: To counter her father's unfaithful and hated methods, she settled into a complacent relationship and struggles (not too hard) with issues of fidelity towards her husband, who is nice but not very exciting.

text: willy , on impulse , takes her captive and murders her .
translation: Willy, sur un coup de tête, la prend en otage et la tue.
back_translation: Willy, on a whim, takes her hostage and kills her.

text: the tone shifts abruptly from tense to celebratory to soppy .
translation: le ton change brusquement de tendu à célébratoire puis à sentimental.
back_translation: the tone shifts abruptly from tense to celebratory and then to sentimental.

text: the story follows a visit to bobby by his mother .
translation: L'histoire suit une visite de la mère de Bobby.
back_translation: The story follows a visit from Bobby's mother.

text: 'you 'll laugh for not quite and hour and a half , but come out feeling strangely unsatisfied . you 'll feel like you ate a reeses without the peanut butter . . . '
translation: Vous rirez pendant presque une heure et demie, mais vous ressortirez vous sentant étrangement insatisfait. Vous aurez l'impression d'avoir mangé un Reese's sans le beurre de cacahuète...
back_translation: You will laugh for almost an hour and a half, but you will come out feeling strangely unsatisfied. You will feel like you have eaten a Reese's without the peanut butter...

text: as a young man , walter t . shaw jr . saw his father go unaccredited for his remarkable work and set out on his ironically celebrated career in crime .
translation: En tant que jeune homme, Walter T. Shaw Jr. a vu son père ne pas être reconnu pour son travail remarquable et a entrepris une carrière criminelle ironiquement célébrée.
back_translation: As a young man, Walter T. Shaw Jr. witnessed his father not being recognized for his remarkable work and undertook a criminal career ironically celebrated.

text: if the last man were the last movie left on earth , there would be a toss-up between presiding over the end of cinema as we know it and another night of delightful hand shadows .
translation: si le dernier homme était le dernier film restant sur terre, il y aurait un dilemme entre présider à la fin du cinéma tel que nous le connaissons et passer une autre nuit à faire d'adorables ombres avec les mains.
back_translation: If the last man were the last film remaining on earth, there would be a dilemma between presiding over the end of cinema as we know it and spending another night making adorable shadows with our hands.

text: but early on there are signs of trouble , and lena is prey to suspicions no one else need consider : a new face may be a new kid in town-or a face from the grave .
translation: Mais tôt dans l'histoire, il y a des signes de problèmes, et Lena est proie à des soupçons que personne d'autre ne doit considérer : un nouveau visage peut être un nouvel arrivant en ville - ou un visage sorti de la tombe.
back_translation: But early in the story, there are signs of trouble, and Lena is prey to suspicions that no one else should consider: a new face could be a newcomer to town - or a face risen from the grave.

text: shanghai ghetto may not be as dramatic as roman polanski 's the pianist , but its compassionate spirit soars every bit as high .
translation: Le ghetto de Shanghai ne peut pas être aussi dramatique que Le Pianiste de Roman Polanski, mais son esprit compatissant s'élève tout aussi haut.
back_translation: The Shanghai ghetto may not be as dramatic as Roman Polanski's The Pianist, but its compassionate spirit rises just as high.

text: in an isolated town named raccoon city , the largest corporate supplier of healthcare , medical supplies , and defense technology has a secret research facility located half a mile underground called the hive .
translation: Dans une ville isolée nommée Raccoon City, le plus grand fournisseur d'entreprises de soins de santé, de fournitures médicales et de technologies de défense possède un laboratoire de recherche secret situé à un demi-mile sous terre, appelé la Ruche.
back_translation: In an isolated city named Raccoon City, the largest supplier of healthcare businesses, medical supplies, and defense technologies has a secret research laboratory located half a mile underground, called the Hive.

text: it 's a shame that pokemon 4ever 's dialogue is so trite and flatly delivered because the tale itself presents serious ideas worthy of more poetic language .
translation: C'est dommage que le dialogue de Pokémon 4ever soit si banal et livré de manière plate, car l'histoire elle-même présente des idées sérieuses qui mériteraient un langage plus poétique.
back_translation: It's a shame that the dialogue in Pokémon 4ever is so mundane and delivered in such a flat manner, as the story itself presents serious ideas that deserve a more poetic language.

text: tor loves jessica but his life has got stuck in a rut .
translation: Tor aime Jessica mais sa vie est bloquée dans une routine.
back_translation: Tor loves Jessica, but his life is stuck in a routine.

text: an interview with rick rescorla , head of security for morgan stanley dean witter , filmed in his office on the 44th floor of the world trade center in 1998 .
translation: une interview avec Rick Rescorla, responsable de la sécurité pour Morgan Stanley Dean Witter, filmée dans son bureau au 44ème étage du World Trade Center en 1998.
back_translation: An interview with Rick Rescorla, head of security for Morgan Stanley Dean Witter, filmed in his office on the 44th floor of the World Trade Center in 1998.

text: bittersweet comedy/drama full of life , hand gestures , and some really adorable italian guys .
translation: comédie/drame douce-amère pleine de vie, de gestes de main et de certains gars italiens vraiment adorables.
back_translation: bittersweet comedy/drama full of life, hand gestures, and some really charming Italian guys.

text: a beyond-lame satire , teddy bears ' picnic ranks among the most pitiful directing debuts by an esteemed writer-actor .
translation: une satire au-delà de la nullité, le pique-nique des ours en peluche figure parmi les débuts de mise en scène les plus pathétiques d'un écrivain-acteur estimé.
back_translation: A satire beyond nullity, the teddy bears' picnic stands out as one of the most pathetic directorial debuts of a respected writer-actor.

text: but her stepmother bitch was to ruin it all .
translation: mais sa belle-mère était là pour tout gâcher.
back_translation: but her mother-in-law was there to ruin everything.

text: . . . the whole thing succeeded only in making me groggy .
translation: ... tout cela n'a réussi qu'à me rendre groggy.
back_translation: ... all of this only succeeded in making me groggy.

text: its salient points are simultaneously buried , drowned and smothered in the excesses of writer-director roger avary .
translation: Ses points saillants sont simultanément enterrés, noyés et étouffés dans les excès de l'écrivain-réalisateur Roger Avary.
back_translation: Its highlights are simultaneously buried, drowned, and stifled in the excesses of writer-director Roger Avary.

text: . . . a boring parade of talking heads and technical gibberish that will do little to advance the linux cause .
translation: ... une parade ennuyeuse de têtes parlantes et de jargon technique qui fera peu pour faire avancer la cause de Linux.
back_translation: ... a boring parade of talking heads and technical jargon that will do little to advance the cause of Linux.

text: but zamindar narayan mukherjee ( vijay crishna ) , devdas ' father , met paro 's mother sumitra 's ( kiran kher ) marriage proposal with condescending arrogance .
translation: Mais le zamindar Narayan Mukherjee (Vijay Krishna), le père de Devdas, a accueilli la proposition de mariage de la mère de Paro, Sumitra (Kiran Kher), avec une arrogance condescendante.
back_translation: But the zamindar Narayan Mukherjee (Vijay Krishna), Devdas's father, welcomed the marriage proposal from Paro's mother, Sumitra (Kiran Kher), with condescending arrogance.

text: it 's hard not to like a film that has sky divers jumping out of helicopters to catch flying dragons in a big net .
translation: Il est difficile de ne pas aimer un film avec des parachutistes sautant d'hélicoptères pour attraper des dragons volants dans un grand filet.
back_translation: It is hard not to like a movie with parachutists jumping from helicopters to catch flying dragons in a big net.

text: an endearingly offbeat romantic comedy with a great meet-cute gimmick .
translation: une comédie romantique délicieusement originale avec un super gimmick de rencontre.
back_translation: a delightfully original romantic comedy with a great meeting gimmick.

text: it is supremely unfunny and unentertaining to watch middle-age and older men drink to excess , piss on trees , b . s . one another and put on a show in drag .
translation: Il est extrêmement peu drôle et peu divertissant de voir des hommes d'âge moyen et plus âgés boire à outrance, pisser sur des arbres, se raconter des bêtises et se mettre en scène en drag.
back_translation: It is extremely unfunny and unentertaining to see middle-aged and older men drinking excessively, urinating on trees, telling silly stories, and staging themselves in drag.

text: a brutal and funny work . nicole holofcenter , the insightful writer/director responsible for this illuminating comedy does n't wrap the proceedings up neatly but the ideas tie together beautifully .
translation: une œuvre brutale et drôle. nicole holofcenter, l'écrivaine/réalisatrice perspicace responsable de cette comédie éclairante, ne conclut pas les choses de manière soignée mais les idées s'imbriquent merveilleusement bien.
back_translation: a brutal and funny work. nicole holofcenter, the insightful writer/director responsible for this enlightening comedy, does not wrap things up neatly but the ideas fit together wonderfully.

text: it 's like every bad idea that 's ever gone into an after-school special compiled in one place , minus those daytime programs ' slickness and sophistication ( and who knew they even had any ? ) .
translation: c'est comme chaque mauvaise idée qui a jamais été utilisée dans un programme après l'école compilée en un seul endroit, sans l'aspect lisse et la sophistication de ces émissions de jour (et qui savait qu'elles en avaient même ?)
back_translation: It's like every bad idea that has ever been used in an after-school program compiled in one place, without the smoothness and sophistication of those daytime shows (and who knew they even had any?).

text: when sara ( elizabeth hurley ) is served divorce papers while she is in new york , she is stunned .
translation: Lorsque Sara (Elizabeth Hurley) reçoit des papiers de divorce alors qu'elle est à New York, elle est stupéfaite.
back_translation: When Sara (Elizabeth Hurley) receives divorce papers while she is in New York, she is stunned.

text: whenever you think you 've figured out late marriage , it throws you for a loop .
translation: Chaque fois que vous pensez avoir compris le mariage tardif, cela vous surprend.
back_translation: Every time you think you have understood late marriage, it surprises you.

text: the overall result is an intelligent , realistic portrayal of testing boundaries .
translation: Le résultat global est un portrait intelligent et réaliste des limites à l'épreuve.
back_translation: The overall result is an intelligent and realistic portrait of the limits under test.

text: they wander around japan in panda outfits , wreak havoc on a once civilized golf court , they even do stunts involving live alligators , and so on .
translation: Ils se promènent autour du Japon en costumes de panda,semant le chaos sur un terrain de golf autrefois civilisé, ils réalisent même des cascades impliquant des alligators en direct, et ainsi de suite.
back_translation: They are walking around Japan in panda costumes, sowing chaos on a once civilized golf course, and they're even performing stunts involving live alligators, and so on.

text: 4 friends , 2 couples , 2000 miles , and all the pabst blue ribbon beer they can drink - it 's the ultimate redneck road-trip .
translation: 4 amis, 2 couples, 2000 miles, et toute la bière Pabst Blue Ribbon qu'ils peuvent boire - c'est le road-trip ultime des rednecks.
back_translation: 4 friends, 2 couples, 2000 miles, and all the Pabst Blue Ribbon beer they can drink - it's the ultimate redneck road trip.

text: it 's a decent glimpse into a time period , and an outcast , that is no longer accessible , but it does n't necessarily shed more light on its subject than the popular predecessor .
translation: c'est un aperçu décent d'une époque et d'un marginal qui n'est plus accessible, mais cela n'éclaire pas nécessairement son sujet plus que le prédécesseur populaire.
back_translation: It is a decent overview of an era and a marginalized figure that is no longer accessible, but it does not necessarily shed more light on its subject than the popular predecessor.

text: a sweet , tender sermon about a 12-year-old welsh boy more curious about god than girls , who learns that believing in something does matter .
translation: un sermon doux et tendre sur un garçon gallois de 12 ans plus curieux de Dieu que des filles, qui apprend que croire en quelque chose a de l'importance.
back_translation: A sweet and tender sermon about a 12-year-old Welsh boy who is more curious about God than girls, learning that believing in something matters.

text: when danny 's beloved grandfather dies , does his greed overcome his love ?
translation: Lorsque le grand-père bien-aimé de Danny meurt, sa cupidité l'emporte-t-elle sur son amour ?
back_translation: When Danny's beloved grandfather dies, does his greed overpower his love?

text: three mischevious employees ( paulo costanzo , woody harrelson , alicia silverstone ) of a bank in a small deserted town all make plans to rob at the same time , however none of them knows about the others .
translation: trois employés malicieux (paulo costanzo, woody harrelson, alicia silverstone) d'une banque dans une petite ville déserte prévoient tous de cambrioler en même temps, cependant aucun d'eux ne sait pour les autres.
back_translation: Three mischievous employees (Paulo Costanzo, Woody Harrelson, Alicia Silverstone) from a bank in a deserted small town plan to rob it at the same time, but none of them knows about the others.

text: the performances are strong , though the subject matter demands acting that borders on hammy at times .
translation: Les performances sont solides, bien que le sujet exige un jeu d'acteur qui frôle parfois le surjeu.
back_translation: The performances are solid, although the subject requires acting that sometimes borders on overacting.

text: borstal boy represents the worst kind of filmmaking , the kind that pretends to be passionate and truthful but is really frustratingly timid and soggy .
translation: Borstal Boy représente le pire type de réalisation, celui qui prétend être passionné et sincère mais qui est en réalité désespérément timide et mou.
back_translation: Borstal Boy represents the worst kind of filmmaking, one that claims to be passionate and sincere but is actually desperately timid and bland.

text: there 's something about a marching band that gets me where i live .
translation: Il y a quelque chose dans une fanfare qui me touche profondément.
back_translation: There is something in a brass band that deeply touches me.

text: one of those rare films that seems as though it was written for no one , but somehow manages to convince almost everyone that it was put on the screen , just for them .
translation: l'un de ces films rares qui semble avoir été écrit pour personne, mais qui réussit pourtant à convaincre presque tout le monde qu'il a été mis à l'écran rien que pour eux.
back_translation: One of those rare films that seems to have been written for no one, yet manages to convince almost everyone that it was made just for them.

text: to confirm his worst fears , thomas sprints outside and discovers that it is not just a terrible dream - his vision may never be the same .
translation: Pour confirmer ses pires craintes, Thomas court dehors et découvre que ce n'est pas juste un terrible cauchemar - sa vue ne sera peut-être jamais la même.
back_translation: To confirm his worst fears, Thomas runs outside and discovers that it is not just a terrible nightmare - his sight may never be the same.

text: two tedious acts light on great scares and a good surprise ending .
translation: deux actes ennuyeux légers sur de grandes frayeurs et une bonne fin surprenante.
back_translation: two light boring acts about great fears and a surprising happy ending.

text: for sokurov , the hermitage -- home to generations of romonovs and repository of so much russian history -- is the ark of the russian soul , guarding it affectionately until the world sees better days .
translation: Pour Sokurov, l'Hermitage - foyer de générations de Romanov et dépositaire de tant d'histoire russe - est l'arche de l'âme russe, la protégeant affectueusement jusqu'à ce que le monde connaisse de meilleurs jours.
back_translation: For Sokurov, the Hermitage - home to generations of Romanovs and custodian of so much Russian history - is the ark of the Russian soul, affectionately protecting it until the world knows better days.

text: a dopey movie clothed in excess layers of hipness .
translation: un film niais vêtu de couches excessives de branchitude.
back_translation: A silly movie dressed in excessive layers of trendiness.

text: it almost feels as if the movie is more interested in entertaining itself than in amusing us .
translation: On dirait presque que le film s'intéresse davantage à s'amuser lui-même qu'à nous divertir.
back_translation: It almost seems like the film is more interested in having fun itself than in entertaining us.

text: unfortunately , a cast of competent performers from movies , television and the theater are cast adrift in various new york city locations with no unifying rhythm or visual style .
translation: Malheureusement, une distribution de performeurs compétents provenant du cinéma, de la télévision et du théâtre est laissée à l'abandon dans divers endroits de New York sans rythme unificateur ni style visuel.
back_translation: Unfortunately, a distribution of skilled performers from film, television, and theater is left abandoned in various places in New York without a unifying rhythm or visual style.

text: jack valento has the goods on the da and casts a mean shadow over his hand-picked micro-community of indentured employees .

text: the truly independent film , the after school special , was a simple story that said so much and touched people in so many ways .

text: strong filmmaking requires a clear sense of purpose , and in that oh-so-important category , the four feathers comes up short .

back_translation: A good movie requires a clear sense of purpose, and in this very important category, The Four Feathers fails to convince.

text: charly comes off as emotionally manipulative and sadly imitative of innumerable past love story derisions .

text: the you-are-there style ultimately enhances abc africa 's ability to get inside the soul of uganda , and of the viewer .

back_translation: The "you-are-there" style ultimately enhances ABC Africa's ability to penetrate the soul of Uganda and that of the viewer.

text: thus , it is only natural that kyle begins a steady decline towards becoming one of the monsters he despises .
translation: Ainsi, il est tout à fait naturel que Kyle commence à subir un déclin progressif pour devenir l'un des monstres qu'il méprise.
back_translation: Thus, it is quite natural for Kyle to begin to experience a gradual decline into becoming one of the monsters he despises.

text: as his agent pushes him to be bigger , and valerie , the bakery owner , adds a surprise of her own , stan begins to strain under the pressures of mass production while simultaneously trying to create hand painted masterpieces . . .
translation: Alors que son agent le pousse à devenir plus grand, et que Valérie, la propriétaire de la boulangerie, ajoute une surprise de son cru, Stan commence à ressentir la pression de la production de masse tout en essayant simultanément de créer des chefs-d'œuvre peints à la main. . .
back_translation: As his agent pushes him to become bigger, and Valérie, the owner of the bakery, adds a surprise of her own, Stan begins to feel the pressure of mass production while simultaneously trying to create hand-painted masterpieces...

text: documentary about brazil 's best surfers , doing their thing on the best beaches around the world , located in hawaii , indonesia , brazil , south africa and california .
translation: documentaire sur les meilleurs surfeurs du Brésil, faisant leur truc sur les plus belles plages du monde, situées à Hawaï, en Indonésie, au Brésil, en Afrique du Sud et en Californie.
back_translation: documentary about the best surfers in Brazil, doing their thing on the most beautiful beaches in the world, located in Hawaii, Indonesia, Brazil, South Africa, and California.

text: based on nick hornby 's popular british novel , about a boy is a comedy-drama starring hugh grant as will , a rich , child-free and irresponsible londoner in his thirties who , in search of available women , invents an imaginary son and starts attending single parent meetings .
translation: Basé sur le roman britannique populaire de Nick Hornby, "About a Boy" est une comédie dramatique mettant en vedette Hugh Grant dans le rôle de Will, un Londonien riche, sans enfant et irresponsable dans la trentaine, qui, à la recherche de femmes disponibles, invente un fils imaginaire et commence à assister à des réunions de parents célibataires.
back_translation: Based on the popular British novel by Nick Hornby, "About a Boy" is a dramedy starring Hugh Grant as Will, a wealthy, childless, irresponsible thirty-something Londoner who, in search of available women, invents an imaginary son and starts attending single parents' meetings.

text: together , miller , kuras and the actresses make personal velocity into an intricate , intimate and intelligent journey .
translation: ensemble, Miller, Kuras et les actrices font de Personal Velocity un voyage complexe, intime et intelligent.
back_translation: Together, Miller, Kuras, and the actresses make Personal Velocity a complex, intimate, and intelligent journey.

text: i do n't think this movie loves women at all .
translation: Je ne pense pas que ce film aime les femmes du tout.

text: delia is a spirited , working-class woman from a small town in new york who leaves her abusive husband and sets out on a journey to reclaim the power she has lost .

text: jim and michelle are getting married , and need to do it quickly because jim 's grandmother is sick and wants to see jim walk down the aisle .

text: it just might all be bearable , somehow possible to live through , if it were n't for those damned 'monsters ' that keep trying to kill him .

text: fessenden continues to do interesting work , and it would be nice to see what he could make with a decent budget . but the problem with wendigo , for all its effective moments , is n't really one of resources .
translation: Fessenden continue à faire un travail intéressant, et ce serait bien de voir ce qu'il pourrait réaliser avec un budget décent. Mais le problème avec Wendigo, malgré tous ses moments efficaces, n'est pas vraiment une question de ressources.

translation: Dans Le Pianiste, Polanski exprime ce qu'il a longtemps voulu dire, confrontant les racines de ses propres préoccupations et obsessions, et il ne laisse rien s'interposer.

text: a member of a vigilante group , fields decides to go undercover with a hidden camera and cross with a group of undocumented immigrants .

text: a woozy , roisterous , exhausting mess , and the off-beat casting of its two leads turns out to be as ill-starred as you might expect .

text: impossible as it may sound , this film 's heart is even more embracing than monty , if only because it accepts nasty behavior and severe flaws as part of the human condition .
translation: Aussi impossible que cela puisse paraître, le cœur de ce film est encore plus accueillant que Monty, ne serait-ce que parce qu'il accepte le mauvais comportement et les graves défauts comme faisant partie de la condition humaine.

text: yes , 4ever is harmless in the extreme and it 'll mute your kids for nearly 80 minutes , but why not just treat the little yard apes to the real deal and take them to spirited away ?
translation: oui, 4ever est extrêmement inoffensif et il va rendre vos enfants muets pendant près de 80 minutes, mais pourquoi ne pas simplement offrir aux petits singes du jardin l'authentique et les emmener voir le voyage de Chihiro ?
back_translation: Yes, 4ever is extremely harmless and it will make your children mute for nearly 80 minutes, but why not just offer the little monkeys in the garden the authentic experience and take them to see Spirited Away?

text: . . . a visually seductive , unrepentantly trashy take on rice 's second installment of her vampire chronicles .

text: painfully bleak and disheartening . . . brilliantly made and uncompromising
translation: douloureusement sombre et décourageant . . . brillamment réalisé et sans compromis

text: granted , much of the marlovian argument is patently ridiculous ( was ben johnson really part of a massive cover-up ? ) but it 's good fun .

back_translation: Add to that a weeping sister, the unfortunate husband of Roxie, Amos, and a warm matron of a prison who looks after her girls (if there’s something to gain from it), and you have Chicago.

text: at the end of the second world war , 38 year-old career soldier gian singh resigns his commission with the british indian army and returns to his childhood village , near the border with pakistan .
translation: À la fin de la Seconde Guerre mondiale, le soldat de carrière de 38 ans Gian Singh démissionne de son poste dans l'armée indienne britannique et retourne dans son village d'enfance, près de la frontière avec le Pakistan.
back_translation: At the end of World War II, 38-year-old career soldier Gian Singh resigns from his position in the British Indian Army and returns to his childhood village, near the border with Pakistan.

text: it 's not a great monster movie . but if you 've paid a matinee price and bought a big tub of popcorn , there 's guilty fun to be had here . chomp chomp !

back_translation: It's not a great monster movie. But if you paid for a daytime viewing and bought a big bucket of popcorn, there's a guilty pleasure to be found in it. Crunch, crunch!

text: besides a few survivors , the only two who know about freddy 's plans are teenagers lori ( monica keena ) and will ( jason ritter ) .
