text: the miseducation of mitchell is a gritty , inner-city drama that covers one day in the life of mitchell , a quiet ten-year-old boy who lives with his crack-head mother ( nayomi ) in a roach infested downtown l . a . motel .
translation: La mise à l'écart de Mitchell est un drame urbain brut qui couvre une journée de la vie de Mitchell, un garçon tranquille de dix ans qui vit avec sa mère toxicomane (Nayomi) dans un motel infesté de cafards au centre-ville de Los Angeles.
back_translation: The sidelining of Mitchell is a raw urban drama that covers a day in the life of Mitchell, a quiet ten-year-old boy who lives with his drug-addicted mother (Nayomi) in a cockroach-infested motel in downtown Los Angeles.

text: red dragon is less baroque and showy than hannibal , and less emotionally affecting than silence . but , like silence , it 's a movie that gets under your skin .
translation: Le dragon rouge est moins baroque et ostentatoire que Hannibal, et moins touchant que Le Silence des agneaux. Mais, comme Le Silence, c'est un film qui s'insinue sous votre peau.
back_translation: The Red Dragon is less baroque and ostentatious than Hannibal, and lesstouching than The Silence of the Lambs. But, like The Silence, it's a film that seeps under your skin.

text: in the shadow of the casinos , is a world of backroom deals that can end a life over less money than the price of a bus ticket home .
translation: Dans l'ombre des casinos, se trouve un monde de transactions en coulisses qui peuvent mettre fin à une vie pour moins d'argent que le prix d'un ticket de bus pour rentrer chez soi.
back_translation: In the shadows of the casinos lies a world of behind-the-scenes transactions that can end a life for less money than the price of a bus ticket to get home.

text: the tale unfolds as a group of hustlers encounter `` the dean `` and pull off a successful sting that results in their pursuit by a vengeful gangster .

text: a few days later , during the ancient festival of samhain , a group of american university students moves in a beautiful cottage , surrounded by a lush forest and a majestic lake they are here to learn about the rituals of the ancient druids and other celtic legends .
translation: Quelques jours plus tard, durant l'ancien festival de Samhain, un groupe d'étudiants américains emménage dans un magnifique cottage, entouré d'une forêt luxuriante et d'un lac majestueux. Ils sont là pour en apprendre davantage sur les rituels des anciens druides et d'autres légendes celtiques.
back_translation: A few days later, during the ancient festival of Samhain, a group of American students moves into a beautiful cottage, surrounded by a lush forest and a majestic lake. They are there to learn more about the rituals of the ancient druids and other Celtic legends.

translation: Joe Enders, un marine décoré qui est rigide à l'excès, revient tout juste en service (en trichant sur ses tests médicaux).
back_translation: Joe Enders, a decorated marine who is excessively rigid, is just returning to service (by cheating on his medical tests).

text: through intimate vignettes of the milliner family , tiz 's close-knit crew , his pregnant girlfriend , his overzealous manager , and his mentor , the legendary kool g rap , tiz 's hopes and the quiet despair of his `` book of life filled with pain `` gradually emerge .
translation: À travers des vignettes intimes de la famille des chapeliers, de l'équipe soudée de Tiz, de sa petite amie enceinte, de son manager trop zélé et de son mentor, le légendaire Kool G Rap, les espoirs de Tiz et le désespoir silencieux de son "livre de la vie rempli de douleur" émergent progressivement.
back_translation: Through intimate vignettes of the hat maker's family, Tiz's tight-knit team, his pregnant girlfriend, his overly zealous manager, and his mentor, the legendary Kool G Rap, Tiz's hopes and the silent despair of his "book of life filled with pain" gradually emerge.

back_translation: light, but colorful and moving forward... wasabi has the mischievous dynamism and heart of a cluttered dog movie that aims to please its owner, nothing more, nothing less.

text: susie is obsessed about losing weight , thus being `` bonita `` and not `` gorda `` - the two keywords in the original spanish title .
translation: Susie est obsédée par la perte de poids, désirant ainsi être « bonita » et non « gorda » - les deux mots clés dans le titre original en espagnol.
back_translation: Susie is obsessed with losing weight, wanting to be "pretty" and not "fat" - the two key words in the original Spanish title.

text: a young man is struggling to get over harmful memories from his childhood , but while doing so discovers a technique that allows him to travel back in time and occupy his childhood body changing his history forever .
translation: Un jeune homme lutte pour surmonter des souvenirs douloureux de son enfance, mais en le faisant, il découvre une technique qui lui permet de voyager dans le temps et d'occuper son corps d'enfant, changeant ainsi son histoire pour toujours.
back_translation: A young man struggles to overcome painful memories from his childhood, but in doing so, he discovers a technique that allows him to time travel and inhabit his child's body, thereby changing his history forever.

text: ms . rampling , still beautiful well into her 50s , has an earth-bound weariness and lively spirit that convey a life fully and tragically lived .
translation: Mme Rampling, toujours belle bien dans la cinquantaine, a une fatigue ancrée à la terre et un esprit vif qui expriment une vie pleinement et tragiquement vécue.
back_translation: Mrs. Rampling, still beautiful in her fifties, carries a fatigue rooted in the earth and a sharp mind that expresses a life fully and tragically lived.

text: he has orchestrated a perverse sport where prisoners fight , sometime to the death for the entertainment and profit of he and his cronies .

back_translation: He orchestrated a twisted sport where prisoners fight, sometimes to the death, for the entertainment and profit of himself and his accomplices.

text: she 's answering questions about how she became the speed queen , one of the sonic killers how mainlining speed with her husband , lamont , and her lover , natalie , grew into dealing , how dealing turned into robbery , and robbery into mass murder .
translation: Elle répond à des questions sur la façon dont elle est devenue la reine de la vitesse, l'une des tueuses soniques, comment elle a commencé à consommer de la vitesse avec son mari, Lamont, et son amante, Natalie, comment la consommation est devenue du trafic, comment le trafic s'est transformé en vol à main armée, et comment le vol à main armée a conduit à un meurtre de masse.
back_translation: She answers questions about how she became the queen of speed, one of the sonic killers, how she started using speed with her husband, Lamont, and her lover, Natalie, how the use became trafficking, how trafficking turned into armed robbery, and how the armed robbery led to a mass murder.

translation: Pendant ce temps en Inde, Vikrant annonce un prix conséquent à ceux qui lui indiqueront les coordonnées de Guru.
back_translation: Meanwhile in India, Vikrant announces a significant reward for those who provide him with Guru's whereabouts.

text: he 's also still got a murder to solve , in addition to the blackmail and framing of an innocent bystander being orchestrated by the man they were chasing .
translation: Il a également un meurtre à résoudre, en plus du chantage et de la mise en scène d'un innocent orchestrés par l'homme qu'ils poursuivaient.
back_translation: He also has a murder to solve, in addition to the blackmail and the framing of an innocent person orchestrated by the man they were pursuing.

text: adam miauczynski , the character known from director marek koterski 's previous films , is a 44 year-old teacher , who reads poetry during school lessons and later goes home swearing and calling his neighbours ' names .
translation: Adam Miauczyński, le personnage connu des précédents films du réalisateur Marek Koterski, est un enseignant de 44 ans qui lit de la poésie pendant les cours et rentre chez lui en jurant et en insultant ses voisins.
back_translation: Adam Miauczyński, the character known from previous films by director Marek Koterski, is a 44-year-old teacher who reads poetry during class and goes home swearing and insulting his neighbors.

text: this curious figure gives nicholas the impression he is pressing his young son closer to the girls in his life and away from bobby .
translation: cette figure curieuse donne à Nicholas l’impression qu’il rapproche son jeune fils des filles de sa vie et l’éloigne de Bobby.
back_translation: This curious figure gives Nicholas the impression that he is bringing his young son closer to the girls in his life and pushing him away from Bobby.

text: a seasoned call girl is offered a way out of the business if she uncovers a blackmail ring in a house of prostitution .
translation: Une call-girl expérimentée se voit offrir une issue du métier si elle découvre un réseau de chantage dans une maison close.

text: he is increasingly tormented by his conscience as the new order of the day is revealed .

text: broomfield 's style of journalism is hardly journalism at all , and even those with an avid interest in the subject will grow impatient .

text: the corpse count ultimately overrides what little we learn along the way about vicarious redemption .
translation: le nombre de cadavres l'emporte finalement sur ce que nous apprenons de manière éphémère sur la rédemption par procuration.
back_translation: The number of corpses ultimately outweighs what we learn transiently about redemption by proxy.

text: the unluckiest man in vegas ( william h . macy ) - a guy whose bad luck is contagious - is used by the last of the old time mob run casinos to kill high rollers ' action .
translation: l'homme le plus malchanceux de Vegas (William H. Macy) - un gars dont la malchance est contagieuse - est utilisé par le dernier des anciens casinos dirigés par la mafia pour éliminer l'action des gros joueurs.

text: fly along with skilled helicopter crews as they carry out sea and mountain rescues , apprehend drug smugglers , repair high voltage lines , save endangered animals , deliver humanitarian aid , and undertake a reconnaissance mission .

text: a psychological thriller with a genuinely spooky premise and an above-average cast , actor bill paxton 's directing debut is a creepy slice of gothic rural americana .

text: this is a visually stunning rumination on love , memory , history and the war between art and commerce .

text: makes one thing abundantly clear . american musical comedy as we know it would n't exist without the precedent of yiddish theater , whose jolly , fun-for-fun's-sake communal spirit goes to the essence of broadway .

text: mike leigh mainstay timothy spall deftly shades in the designated goner , fellow still crazy alum bill nighy is sweetly wispy as the capable fop , and anger-management counselor olivia williams trembles pleasantly as usual .

Olivia Williams, conseillère en gestion de la colère, tremble agréablement comme toujours.
back_translation: Mike Leigh, a pillar of cinema, Timothy Spall delivers a nuanced performance in the role of the designated condemned man, while Bill Nighy, a former student of Still Crazy, is delightfully ethereal as the capable dandy. Olivia Williams, an anger management consultant, quivers pleasantly as always.

text: i did n't laugh . i did n't smile . i survived .

back_translation: Mitch doesn't really like the idea, especially of working with his new partner Trey Sellars (Eddie Murphy), a police officer who spends much of his time making faces for the cameras mounted inside the car he shares with Mitch.

text: ice age is the first computer-generated feature cartoon to feel like other movies , and that makes for some glacial pacing early on .
translation: L'ère glaciaire est le premier long métrage d'animation généré par ordinateur à ressentir comme d'autres films, ce qui entraîne un rythme glacial au début.

back_translation: Bennett's dramatization of his personal descent into ruin after a breakup has a morbid appeal that is hard to shake.

text: emerging from the human psyche and showing characteristics of abstract expressionism , minimalism and russian constructivism , graffiti removal has secured its place in the history of modern art while being created by artists who are unconscious of their artistic achievements .
translation: Émergeant de la psyché humaine et montrant des caractéristiques de l'expressionnisme abstrait, du minimalisme et du constructivisme russe, le retrait de graffiti a sécurisé sa place dans l'histoire de l'art moderne tout en étant créé par des artistes qui ne sont pas conscients de leurs réalisations artistiques.
back_translation: Emerging from the human psyche and displaying characteristics of abstract expressionism, minimalism, and Russian constructivism, graffiti has secured its place in the history of modern art while being created by artists who are unaware of their artistic achievements.

text: does an impressive job of relating the complicated history of the war and of filling in the background .
translation: fait un travail impressionnant pour relier l'histoire complexe de la guerre et pour fournir le contexte.

text: chabrol ratchets up such a level of suspense -- and huppert gives such a mesmerizingly deadpan performance -- that merci pour le chocolat turns out to be as irresistible as a piece of dark chocolate .
translation: Chabrol intensifie un tel niveau de suspense - et Huppert offre une performance captivante d'un stoïcisme remarquable - que Merci pour le chocolat s'avère aussi irrésistible qu'un morceau de chocolat noir.
back_translation: Chabrol intensifies such a level of suspense - and Huppert delivers a captivating performance of remarkable stoicism - that Merci pour le chocolat turns out to be as irresistible as a piece of dark chocolate.

text: in 19th-century new mexico , a father ( tommy lee jones ) comes back home , hoping to reconcile with his adult daughter maggie ( cate blanchett ) .
translation: Dans le Nouveau-Mexique du 19ème siècle, un père (Tommy Lee Jones) revient chez lui, espérant se réconcilier avec sa fille adulte Maggie (Cate Blanchett).
back_translation: In 19th century New Mexico, a father (Tommy Lee Jones) returns home, hoping to reconcile with his adult daughter Maggie (Cate Blanchett).

text: never mind whether you buy the stuff about barris being a cia hit man . the kooky yet shadowy vision clooney sustains throughout is daring , inventive and impressive .
translation: peu importe si vous croyez que Barris est un tueur à gages de la CIA. La vision pour le moins loufoque mais obscure que Clooney soutient tout au long du film est audacieuse, inventive et impressionnante.
back_translation: It doesn't matter if you believe that Barris is a CIA hitman. The at least wacky yet obscure vision that Clooney supports throughout the film is bold, inventive, and impressive.

text: . . . the first 2/3 of the film are incredibly captivating and insanely funny , thanks in part to interesting cinematic devices ( cool visual backmasking ) , a solid cast , and some wickedly sick and twisted humor . . .

text: the real reason to see runteldat is to watch lawrence deploy his deep and wide powers of empathy to depict such diverse experiences as childbirth , breast-feeding and recovering from illness .
translation: La vraie raison de voir Runteldat est d'observer Lawrence déployer ses profonds et vastes pouvoirs d'empathie pour dépeindre des expériences aussi diverses que l'accouchement, l'allaitement et la récupération après une maladie.
back_translation: The real reason to see Runteldat is to observe Lawrence deploying his deep and vast powers of empathy to portray experiences as diverse as childbirth, breastfeeding, and recovery after illness.

text: while awaiting trial , zoe is confined to house arrest , where she alternates falling in love with her frequent visitor and parole officer , daly , and trying to prove her innocence to regain her life and freedom .

text: the film uses chapman 's own unseen personal papers and unpublished memoirs in order to recreate his years at cambridge university , medical school , the monty python years , his struggles with alcohol , his ground-breaking stance on homosexuality , his exploits with john cleese , keith moon , harry nilsson , ringo starr , and his untimely death at age 48 , of cancer .
translation: le film utilise les propres documents personnels non vus de chapman et ses mémoires non publiés afin de recréer ses années à l'université de Cambridge, à l'école de médecine, les années de Monty Python, ses luttes contre l'alcool, sa position novatrice sur l'homosexualité, ses exploits avec john cleese, keith moon, harry nilsson, ringo starr, et sa mort prématurée à 48 ans, du cancer.
back_translation: The film uses Chapman’s unseen personal documents and unpublished memoirs to recreate his years at the University of Cambridge, medical school, the Monty Python years, his struggles with alcoholism, his groundbreaking stance on homosexuality, his exploits with John Cleese, Keith Moon, Harry Nilsson, Ringo Starr, and his premature death at 48 from cancer.

text: now , johnny and lena ( wayne 's girlfriend ) are asked to make the ultimate baby product , called mighty baby .
translation: Maintenant, Johnny et Lena (la petite amie de Wayne) sont invités à créer le produit ultime pour bébés, appelé Mighty Baby.
back_translation: Now, Johnny and Lena (Wayne's girlfriend) are invited to create the ultimate baby product called Mighty Baby.

text: for the first time in several years , mr . allen has surpassed himself with the magic he 's spun with the hollywood empress of ms . leoni 's ellie .
translation: Pour la première fois depuis plusieurs années, M. Allen s'est surpassé avec la magie qu'il a tissée avec l'impératrice d'Hollywood, Ellie de Mlle Leoni.
back_translation: For the first time in several years, Mr. Allen outdid himself with the magic he wove with Hollywood's empress, Ellie of Miss Leoni.

text: it 's all going well for the very single eleanor , until she realizes it 's all a ruse .
translation: tout va bien pour l'éternelle célibataire Eleanor, jusqu'à ce qu'elle réalise que tout cela n'est qu'une ruse.
back_translation: Everything is going well for the eternal single woman Eleanor until she realizes that it was all just a ruse.

text: the characters struggle to find love in a world that no longer needs sex to reproduce , a world that is changing and is populated with people who use provisional identities and are seen through virtual selves and a world where love is the only thing that makes things real .
translation: les personnages luttent pour trouver l'amour dans un monde qui n'a plus besoin du sexe pour se reproduire, un monde en mutation peuplé de personnes utilisant des identités provisoires et perçues à travers des avatars virtuels, et un monde où l'amour est la seule chose qui rend les choses réelles.
back_translation: The characters struggle to find love in a world that no longer needs sex to reproduce, a changing world populated by people using temporary identities perceived through virtual avatars, and a world where love is the only thing that makes things real.

text: talk to her is excellent movie-making and much of it is wondrous , but my conscience wo n't allow me to be devoted to unconditionally singing its praises .
translation: "Talk to Her" est un excellent film, et une grande partie est merveilleuse, mais ma conscience ne me permettra pas de lui consacrer une admiration inconditionnelle.
back_translation: "Talk to Her" is an excellent film, and a large part of it is wonderful, but my conscience will not allow me to give it unconditional admiration.

text: the story of two lads from belfast as they stumble their way through the london gay underworld in search of 'gainful employment ' .
translation: l'histoire de deux jeunes de Belfast qui trébuchent à travers le monde souterrain gay de Londres à la recherche d'un 'emploi rémunérateur'.
back_translation: The story of two young people from Belfast who stumble through London's gay underground world in search of a 'paying job'.

text: as a revenge thriller , the movie is serviceable , but it does n't really deliver the delicious guilty pleasure of the better film versions .
translation: En tant que thriller de vengeance, le film est passable, mais il ne procure pas vraiment le délicieux plaisir coupable des meilleures versions cinématographiques.
back_translation: As a revenge thriller, the film is passable, but it doesn't really provide the delicious guilty pleasure of the best cinematic versions.

text: another in-your-face wallow in the lower depths made by people who have never sung those blues .
translation: un autre affrontement flagrant dans les profondeurs, réalisé par des personnes qui n'ont jamais chanté ces blues.
back_translation: another blatant confrontation in the depths, carried out by people who have never sung these blues.

text: when the switchblade , the most sophisticated prototype stealth fighter created yet , is stolen from the u . s . government , one of the united states ' top spies , alex scott ( owen wilson ) , is called to action .
translation: Lorsque le Switchblade, le prototype de chasseur furtif le plus sophistiqué jamais créé, est volé par le gouvernement américain, l'un des meilleurs espions des États-Unis, Alex Scott (Owen Wilson), est appelé à l'action.
back_translation: When the Switchblade, the most sophisticated stealth fighter prototype ever created, is stolen by the U.S. government, one of the best spies in the United States, Alex Scott (Owen Wilson), is called to action.

text: as they used to say in the 1950s sci-fi movies , signs is a tribute to shyamalan 's gifts , which are such that we 'll keep watching the skies for his next project .
translation: comme on le disait dans les films de science-fiction des années 1950, Signs est un hommage aux talents de Shyamalan, si remarquables que nous continuerons à scruter le ciel pour son prochain projet.
back_translation: As was said in the science fiction films of the 1950s, Signs is a tribute to Shyamalan's talents, so remarkable that we will continue to gaze at the sky for his next project.

text: spellbound by the rich and mysterious world manuela has shown him , his idyll is shattered when the reality of why he 's there comes crashing down around him .
translation: Captivé par le monde riche et mystérieux que Manuela lui a montré, son idylle est brisée lorsque la réalité de la raison pour laquelle il est là s'écroule autour de lui.
back_translation: Captivated by the rich and mysterious world that Manuela has shown him, his romance is shattered when the reality of the reason he is there collapses around him.

text: during the course of the story we also learn that his father died at age 40 ; and now , as jones approaches his 40th birthday , he suffers from `` survivor 's guilt . ``
translation: Au cours de l'histoire, nous apprenons également que son père est mort à l'âge de 40 ans ; et maintenant, alors que Jones s'approche de son 40e anniversaire, il souffre du « syndrome du survivant ».
back_translation: Throughout history, we also learn that his father died at the age of 40; and now, as Jones approaches his 40th birthday, he suffers from "survivor's syndrome."

text: her stalker looks threatening but his manner seems to suggest that he is just a confused social outcast , trapped in an obsessive , repetitive rut that revolves around anna .
translation: son harceleur a l'air menaçant mais sa façon d'agir semble suggérer qu'il n'est qu'un paria social confus, coincé dans une routine obsessive et répétitive qui tourne autour d'Anna.
back_translation: his harasser seems threatening, but their behavior suggests that they are just a confused social outcast, caught in an obsessive and repetitive routine centered around Anna.

text: the cumulative effect of the movie is repulsive and depressing .
translation: L'effet cumulé du film est répugnant et déprimant.
back_translation: The cumulative effect of the film is disgusting and depressing.

text: insomnia is one of the year 's best films and pacino gives one of his most daring , and complicated , performances .
translation: L'insomnie est l'un des meilleurs films de l'année et Pacino livre l'une de ses performances les plus audacieuses et les plus complexes.
back_translation: Insomnia is one of the best films of the year, and Pacino delivers one of his boldest and most complex performances.

text: the heart of the film is the drop dead sexy drea de matteo who , as the mother and real head of the family , commands every scene .
translation: Le cœur du film est la séduisante Drea de Matteo qui, en tant que mère et véritable chef de la famille, monopolise chaque scène.
back_translation: The heart of the film is the alluring Drea de Matteo who, as a mother and true head of the family, dominates every scene.

text: he is under the impression that rupi is dead .
translation: Il est sous l'impression que Rupi est mort.
back_translation: He is under the impression that Rupi is dead.

text: in the affable maid in manhattan , jennifer lopez 's most aggressive and most sincere attempt to take movies by storm , the diva shrewdly surrounds herself with a company of strictly a-list players .
translation: Dans la sympathique "Maid in Manhattan", la tentative la plus agressive et la plus sincère de Jennifer Lopez pour faire sensation au cinéma, la diva s'entoure astucieusement d'une distribution exclusivement composée de célébrités de premier plan.
back_translation: In the charming "Maid in Manhattan," Jennifer Lopez's most aggressive and sincere attempt to make a splash in cinema, the diva cleverly surrounds herself with an exclusively star-studded cast.

text: what makes blade 2 marginally better than blade , especially if you thought the first was a hollow spectacle ? it has a plot .
translation: Qu'est-ce qui rend Blade 2 légèrement mieux que Blade, surtout si vous pensiez que le premier était un spectacle creux ? Il a une intrigue.
back_translation: What makes Blade 2 slightly better than Blade, especially if you thought the first one was a hollow spectacle? It has a plot.

text: each weekend they come back with nothing but a hangover .
translation: Chaque week-end, ils rentrent avec rien d'autre qu'une gueule de bois.
back_translation: Every weekend, they come back with nothing but a hangover.

text: she wants justice and will do anything to get it .
translation: elle veut la justice et fera tout pour l'obtenir.
back_translation: She wants justice and will do everything to achieve it.

text: after a chance encounter at a theater , two men , benigno and marco , meet at a private clinic where benigno works .
translation: Après une rencontre fortuite au théâtre, deux hommes, Benigno et Marco, se retrouvent dans une clinique privée où Benigno travaille.
back_translation: After a chance encounter at the theater, two men, Benigno and Marco, find themselves in a private clinic where Benigno works.

text: that haynes can both maintain and dismantle the facades that his genre and his character construct is a wonderous accomplishment of veracity and narrative grace .
translation: Le fait que Haynes puisse à la fois maintenir et démonter les façades que son genre et son personnage construisent est un accomplissement merveilleux de véracité et de grâce narrative.
back_translation: The fact that Haynes can both maintain and dismantle the facades that his genre and character construct is a wonderful achievement of truthfulness and narrative grace.

text: police and investigators believed the murders were in retaliation for a robbery days prior to the murders .
translation: La police et les enquêteurs croyaient que les meurtres étaient une réponse à un vol survenu quelques jours avant les meurtres.
back_translation: The police and investigators believed that the murders were a response to a theft that occurred a few days before the murders.

text: a canny , derivative , wildly gruesome portrait of a london sociopath who 's the scariest of sadists .
translation: un portrait astucieux, dérivé et horriblement macabre d'un sociopathe londonien qui est le plus terrifiant des sadiques.
back_translation: A clever, derivative, and horribly macabre portrait of a London sociopath who is the most terrifying of sadists.

text: well made but uninvolving , bloodwork is n't a terrible movie , just a stultifyingly obvious one -- an unrewarding collar for a murder mystery .
translation: bien conçu mais sans engagement, Bloodwork n'est pas un terrible film, juste un film d'une banalité écrasante - un mystère de meurtre peu gratifiant.
back_translation: Well-designed but without commitment, Bloodwork is not a terrible film, just a film of overwhelming banality - a little rewarding murder mystery.

text: like it or not , anne marie starts losing her balance - and finding it - as she falls for matt .
translation: Qu'on le veuille ou non, Anne Marie commence à perdre son équilibre - et à le retrouver - alors qu'elle tombe amoureuse de Matt.
back_translation: Whether we like it or not, Anne Marie begins to lose her balance - and to find it again - as she falls in love with Matt.

text: this is an ungainly movie , ill-fitting , with its elbows sticking out where the knees should be .
translation: c'est un film malhabile, mal ajusté, avec ses coudes qui dépassent là où devraient être les genoux.
back_translation: It is an awkward film, poorly adjusted, with its elbows sticking out where the knees should be.

text: jason must get back , therefore he gets a new and unique mask , and goes after the kids of elm street .
translation: Jason doit revenir, donc il obtient un nouveau masque unique et s'attaque aux enfants d'Elm Street.
back_translation: Jason must return, so he gets a new unique mask and goes after the children of Elm Street.

text: tam & # 225 ; s is a young , budapest-based director of video clips and commercials who dreams of directing his first feature film with the title 'the guilty city ' .
translation: Tamás est un jeune réalisateur de clips vidéo et de publicités basé à Budapest qui rêve de réaliser son premier long métrage intitulé "La ville coupable".
back_translation: Tamás is a young director of music videos and advertisements based in Budapest who dreams of making his first feature film titled "The Guilty City."

text: try as you might to scrutinize the ethics of kaufman 's approach , somehow it all comes together to create a very compelling , sensitive , intelligent and almost cohesive piece of film entertainment .
translation: Peu importe à quel point vous essayez d'examiner l'éthique de l'approche de Kaufman, d'une manière ou d'une autre, tout cela s'assemble pour créer une œuvre cinématographique très convaincante, sensible, intelligente et presque cohérente.
back_translation: No matter how much you try to examine the ethics of Kaufman's approach, somehow it all comes together to create a very compelling, sensitive, intelligent, and almost coherent work of cinema.

text: a young great gatsbyish hip hopper named summer g falls for a middle to upper class sister while in college .
translation: une jeune hip-hoppeuse dans le style de Gatsby le Magnifique nommée Summer G tombe amoureuse d'une sœur de la classe moyenne à supérieure pendant ses études universitaires.
back_translation: A young hip-hop dancer in the style of The Great Gatsby named Summer G falls in love with a middle to upper-class girl during her college studies.

text: in addition to hoffman 's powerful acting clinic , this is that rare drama that offers a thoughtful and rewarding glimpse into the sort of heartache everyone has felt , or will feel someday .
translation: En plus de la puissante clinique d'acteur de Hoffman, il s'agit d'un drame rare qui offre un aperçu réfléchi et gratifiant du type de chagrin que tout le monde a ressenti, ou ressentira un jour.
back_translation: In addition to Hoffman’s powerful acting clinic, it is a rare drama that offers a thoughtful and rewarding insight into the type of grief that everyone has felt or will feel one day.

text: and with the birth of tiz 's son , it becomes unavoidably evident that tiz 's fate and his hopes for success involve far more than just his own happiness .
translation: Et avec la naissance du fils de Tiz, il devient inévitablement évident que le destin de Tiz et ses espoirs de succès impliquent bien plus que simplement son propre bonheur.
back_translation: And with the birth of Tiz's son, it inevitably becomes clear that Tiz's fate and his hopes for success involve much more than just his own happiness.

text: imamura 's delight in the infinite oddity of men and women is goofy ; it 's also , at heart , reverent .
translation: L'enthousiasme d'Imamura pour l'infinité des bizarreries des hommes et des femmes est loufoque ; c'est aussi, au fond, respectueux.
back_translation: Imamura's enthusiasm for the infinite oddities of men and women is crazy; it is also, at its core, respectful.

text: halpern and rolov follow three young men : 23-year old straight-laced circuit virgin , brandon ; 21-year old party boy with a drug problem , tone ; and sensitive but strong-willed 19-year old , jon .
translation: Halpern et Rolov suivent trois jeunes hommes : Brandon, un jeune homme de 23 ans, sérieux et vierge ; Tone, un fêtard de 21 ans avec un problème de drogue ; et Jon, un jeune homme sensible mais déterminé, âgé de 19 ans.
back_translation: Halpern and Rolov follow three young men: Brandon, a serious 23-year-old virgin; Tone, a 21-year-old party animal with a drug problem; and Jon, a sensitive yet determined 19-year-old.

text: the fight scenes are fun , but it grows tedious .
translation: les scènes de combat sont amusantes, mais cela devient ennuyeux.
back_translation: The fight scenes are fun, but it becomes boring.

text: guns , money , and a chance at paradise . . .
translation: des armes, de l'argent et une chance au paradis . . .
back_translation: weapons, money, and a chance at paradise . . .

text: its weighty themes are too grave for youngsters , but the story is too steeped in fairy tales and other childish things to appeal much to teenagers .
translation: ses thèmes pesants sont trop graves pour les jeunes, mais l'histoire est trop imprégnée de contes de fées et d'autres choses enfantines pour séduire beaucoup les adolescents.
back_translation: Its heavy themes are too serious for young people, but the story is too steeped in fairy tales and other childish things to appeal much to teenagers.

text: with all the sympathy , empathy and pity fogging up the screen . . . his secret life enters the land of unintentional melodrama and tiresome love triangles .
translation: Avec toute la sympathie, l'empathie et la pitié brouillant l'écran... sa vie secrète entre dans le territoire du mélodrame involontaire et des triangles amoureux fatigants.
back_translation: With all the sympathy, empathy, and pity clouding the screen... his secret life enters the territory of unintentional melodrama and exhausting love triangles.

text: beneath clouds is the story of lena , the light-skinned daughter of an aboriginal mother and irish father and vaughn , a murri boy doing time in a minimum security prison in north west nsw .
translation: Beneath Clouds est l'histoire de Lena, la fille à la peau claire d'une mère aborigène et d'un père irlandais, et de Vaughn, un garçon murri purgée une peine dans une prison à sécurité minimale dans le nord-ouest de la Nouvelle-Galles du Sud.
back_translation: Beneath Clouds is the story of Lena, the light-skinned girl of an Aboriginal mother and an Irish father, and Vaughn, a Murri boy serving time in a minimum security prison in the northwestern part of New South Wales.

text: bright seems alternately amused and disgusted with this material , and he ca n't help throwing in a few of his own touches .
translation: Bright semble tour à tour amusé et dégoûté par ce matériel, et il ne peut s'empêcher d'y ajouter quelques-unes de ses propres touches.
back_translation: Bright seems alternately amused and disgusted by this material, and he can't help but add a few of his own touches to it.

text: when raj 's family move to england to get involved in an internet business , raj promises tina that he will keep in touch with her and that their friendship will always be forever .
translation: Lorsque la famille de Raj déménage en Angleterre pour s'investir dans un business internet, Raj promet à Tina qu'il restera en contact avec elle et que leur amitié sera toujours éternelle.
back_translation: When Raj's family moves to England to invest in an internet business, Raj promises Tina that he will stay in touch with her and that their friendship will always be eternal.

text: when wei is promoted from the rank of nightclub parking valet to the rank of debt-collector in brother gu 's gang , he persuades his boss to hire jie to work alongside him .
translation: Lorsque Wei est promu du rang de voiturier de boîte de nuit au rang de percepteur de dettes dans le gang de frère Gu, il persuade son patron d'embaucher Jie pour travailler à ses côtés.
back_translation: When Wei is promoted from the rank of nightclub parking attendant to debt collector in Brother Gu's gang, he persuades his boss to hire Jie to work alongside him.

text: a perplexing example of promise unfulfilled , despite many charming moments .
translation: un exemple perplexe de promesse non tenue, malgré de nombreux moments enchanteurs.
back_translation: A perplexing example of a promise unfulfilled, despite many enchanting moments.

text: a path that will lead to the day in and day out drudgery of a soul-less survival or a path that will lead them down the road in pursuit their dreams .
translation: un chemin qui les conduira à la routine quotidienne d'une survie sans âme ou un chemin qui les mènera sur la voie de la réalisation de leurs rêves.
back_translation: a path that will lead them to the daily routine of a soulless survival or a path that will take them towards the realization of their dreams.

text: when he loses his power the bully becomes victim and blames everyone else for his demise .
translation: Lorsqu'il perd son pouvoir, le tyran devient victime et blâme tout le monde pour sa chute.
back_translation: When the tyrant loses his power, he becomes a victim and blames everyone for his fall.

text: chomsky places the terrorist attacks in the context of american foreign intervention throughout the postwar decades -- in vietnam , central america , the middle east , and elsewhere .
translation: Chomsky place les attaques terroristes dans le contexte de l'intervention étrangère américaine tout au long des décennies d'après-guerre - au Vietnam, en Amérique centrale, au Moyen-Orient et ailleurs.
back_translation: Chomsky places terrorist attacks in the context of American foreign intervention throughout the decades following the war - in Vietnam, Central America, the Middle East, and elsewhere.

text: all these games of chasing , rejecting and seducing are played out in an economically and spiritually depressed hong kong , without much gusto .
translation: tous ces jeux de poursuite, de rejet et de séduction se déroulent dans un Hong Kong économiquement et spirituellement déprimé, sans beaucoup de goût.
back_translation: All these games of pursuit, rejection, and seduction take place in an economically and spiritually depressed Hong Kong, lacking much taste.

text: the ultimate forms of hell are about to be unleashed on earth once again .
translation: les formes ultimes de l'enfer vont être relâchées sur terre une fois de plus.
back_translation: The ultimate forms of hell will be unleashed on earth once again.

text: a punch line without a premise , a joke built entirely from musty memories of half-dimensional characters .
translation: une chute sans prémisse, une blague entièrement construite à partir de souvenirs vieux et poussiéreux de personnages à demi-dimensionnels.
back_translation: a fall without premise, a joke entirely built from old and dusty memories of half-dimensional characters.

text: despite what anyone believes about the goal of its makers , the show . . . represents a spectacular piece of theater , and there 's no denying the talent of the creative forces behind it .
translation: malgré ce que quiconque peut croire sur l'objectif de ses créateurs, le spectacle... représente une pièce de théâtre spectaculaire, et on ne peut nier le talent des forces créatives qui le soutiennent.
back_translation: Despite what anyone may believe about the intention of its creators, the performance... represents a spectacular piece of theater, and one cannot deny the talent of the creative forces that support it.

text: dizzy harrison is an unpopular , high school geek going through a hellish senior year .
translation: Dizzy Harrison est un geek impopulaire qui traverse une année de terminale infernale.
back_translation: Dizzy Harrison is an unpopular geek going through a hellish senior year.

text: according to wendigo , 'nature ' loves the members of the upper class almost as much as they love themselves .
translation: Selon Wendigo, la "nature" aime les membres de la classe supérieure presque autant qu'ils s'aiment eux-mêmes.
back_translation: According to Wendigo, "nature" loves the members of the upper class almost as much as they love themselves.

text: they all collide during the course of a typical no thrills weekend an urban fairy tale-romantic comedy , in which nola , an aspiring songwriter , leaves an abusive kansas home and journeys to new york to find her biological father .
translation: Ils se croisent tous au cours d'un week-end typique sans fioritures, une comédie romantique de conte de fées urbain, dans laquelle Nola, une chanteuse-compositrice en herbe, quitte un foyer abusif du Kansas et se rend à New York pour trouver son père biologique.
back_translation: They all cross paths over a typical no-frills weekend, a romantic comedy of urban fairy tales, in which Nola, an aspiring singer-songwriter, leaves an abusive home in Kansas and heads to New York to find her biological father.

text: when she hears about her plan going awry , she collapses .
translation: quand elle entend parler de son plan qui tourne mal, elle s'effondre.
back_translation: When she hears about her plan going wrong, she collapses.

text: a women from holland returns to indonesia , the country of her roots .
translation: Une femme des Pays-Bas retourne en Indonésie, le pays de ses racines.
back_translation: A woman from the Netherlands returns to Indonesia, the country of her roots.

text: often hilarious , well-shot and , importantly , entertaining , hell house is a fascinating document of an event that has to be seen to be believed .
translation: souvent hilarant, bien filmé et, surtout, divertissant, Hell House est un document fascinant d'un événement qui mérite d'être vu pour être cru.
back_translation: Often hilarious, well filmed, and especially entertaining, Hell House is a fascinating document of an event that deserves to be seen to be believed.

text: ziyad and maryam are a happy young couple in lebanon , yet after three years of marriage they remain childless .
translation: Ziyad et Maryam sont un jeune couple heureux au Liban, mais après trois ans de mariage, ils restent sans enfant.
back_translation: Ziyad and Maryam are a happy young couple in Lebanon, but after three years of marriage, they remain childless.

text: the name refers to the green mountains they felt they were being pushed into ( out of their new homes ) .
translation: le nom fait référence aux montagnes vertes dans lesquelles ils avaient l'impression d'être poussés (hors de leurs nouvelles maisons).
back_translation: The name refers to the green mountains in which they felt pushed (out of their new homes).

text: paco ( debora falabella ) and tonho ( roberto bomtempo ) are illegal brazilian immigrants in new york .
translation: Paco (Débora Falabella) et Tonho (Roberto Bomtempo) sont des immigrants brésiliens en situation irrégulière à New York.
back_translation: Paco (Débora Falabella) and Tonho (Roberto Bomtempo) are undocumented Brazilian immigrants in New York.

text: the police investigation that followed - led by detectives sam nico ( ted levine ) , louis cruz ( frankie g . ) and mike peters ( m . c .
translation: l'enquête policière qui a suivi - dirigée par les détectives Sam Nico (Ted Levine), Louis Cruz (Frankie G.) et Mike Peters (M.C.
back_translation: the police investigation that followed - led by detectives Sam Nico (Ted Levine), Louis Cruz (Frankie G.) and Mike Peters (M.C.

text: because eight legged freaks is partly an homage to them , tarantula and other low- budget b-movie thrillers of the 1950s and '60s , the movie is a silly ( but not sophomoric ) romp through horror and hellish conditions .
translation: Parce que "Eight Legged Freaks" est en partie un hommage à eux, aux tarentules et à d'autres thrillers de série B à petit budget des années 1950 et 1960, le film est une franche (mais pas puérile) escapade à travers l'horreur et des conditions infernales.
back_translation: Because "Eight Legged Freaks" is partly a tribute to them, to tarantulas and to other low-budget B-movie thrillers from the 1950s and 1960s, the film is a frank (but not childish) escapade through horror and hellish conditions.

text: williams has n't been this creepy since his starring role in popeye .
translation: Williams n'a pas été aussi creep depuis son rôle principal dans Popeye.
back_translation: Williams hasn't been this creepy since his lead role in Popeye.

text: pryor lite , with half the demons , half the daring , much less talent , many fewer laughs .
translation: pryor léger, avec la moitié des démons, la moitié du courage, beaucoup moins de talent, beaucoup moins de rires.
back_translation: lighter, with half the demons, half the courage, much less talent, much less laughter.

text: there are times when a rumor of angels plays like an extended episode of touched by an angel -- a little too much dancing , a few too many weeping scenes -- but i liked its heart and its spirit .
translation: Il y a des moments où une rumeur d'anges se déroule comme un épisode prolongé de "Touched by an Angel" - un peu trop de danse, quelques trop nombreuses scènes de larmes - mais j'ai aimé son cœur et son esprit.
back_translation: There are moments when a rumor of angels unfolds like an extended episode of "Touched by an Angel" - a bit too much dancing, a few too many scenes of tears - but I loved its heart and spirit.

text: this `` hitchcockian `` thriller tells the story of a young new york investment banker ( hartnett ) who becomes obsessed with a woman he sees in a cafe , believing her to be his long-lost love , following her home to her apartment , where he waits for her , going so far as to put his engagement on hold .
translation: Ce thriller « hitchcockien » raconte l'histoire d'un jeune banquier d'investissement new-yorkais (Hartnett) qui devient obsédé par une femme qu'il voit dans un café, croyant qu'elle est son amour perdu depuis longtemps, la suivant jusqu'à son appartement, où il l'attend, allant même jusqu'à mettre son engagement en attente.
back_translation: This "Hitchcockian" thriller tells the story of a young New York investment banker (Hartnett) who becomes obsessed with a woman he sees in a café, believing she is his long-lost love, following her to her apartment, where he waits for her, even putting his engagement on hold.

text: unhappy father of a draining family he has no controls whatsoever over his life .
translation: père malheureux d'une famille épuisante, il n'a aucun contrôle sur sa vie.
back_translation: unhappy father of an exhausting family, he has no control over his life.

text: the new insomnia is a surprisingly faithful remake of its chilly predecessor , and when it does elect to head off in its own direction , it employs changes that fit it well rather than ones that were imposed for the sake of commercial sensibilities .

text: `` nicholas nickleby `` is a perfect family film to take everyone to since there 's no new `` a christmas carol `` out in the theaters this year . charlie hunnam has the twinkling eyes , repressed smile and determined face needed to carry out a dickensian hero .
translation: ``Nicholas Nickleby`` est un film familial parfait à regarder en famille, surtout qu'il n'y a pas de nouvelle adaptation de ``Un chant de Noël`` dans les salles de cinéma cette année. Charlie Hunnam a les yeux pétillants, un sourire réprimé et un visage déterminé nécessaires pour incarner un héros dickensien.
back_translation: "Nickolas Nickleby" is a perfect family film to watch together, especially since there is no new adaptation of "A Christmas Carol" in theaters this year. Charlie Hunnam has the sparkling eyes, restrained smile, and determined face needed to embody a Dickensian hero.

back_translation: The news of the assault provokes public outrage against mutants, including renewed support for the mutant registration law, and William Stryker, a military leader rumored to have experimented on mutants (possibly including Wolverine), is among the most ardent supporters of this legislation.

text: a story of love and enchantment set in the coldest of winters , it explores the issues , dilemmas and barriers facing the lucky and unlucky in love in the 21st century , based on the novel of the same name by pullitzer prize-winning author carol shields .

back_translation: A love story filled with enchantment set against the cold of winter, it explores the issues, dilemmas, and obstacles faced by the fortunate and the unfortunate in love in the 21st century, based on the novel of the same name by Pulitzer Prize-winning author, Carol Shields.

text: stan lee discusses the origins of the industry ; neil gaiman and john byrne speak on superheroes as modern mythology ; frank miller and bill sienkewicz discuss the relationship of politics and comics ; peter david tells the story of the meanest thing he has ever done to a fan ; and much more .
translation: Stan Lee discute des origines de l'industrie ; Neil Gaiman et John Byrne parlent des super-héros en tant que mythologie moderne ; Frank Miller et Bill Sienkiewicz discutent de la relation entre la politique et les comics ; Peter David raconte l'histoire de la pire chose qu'il ait jamais faite à un fan ; et bien plus encore.

text: the nicest thing that can be said about stealing harvard ( which might have been called freddy gets molested by a dog ) is that it 's not as obnoxious as tom green 's freddie got fingered .
translation: La meilleure chose que l'on puisse dire sur Stealing Harvard (qui aurait pu être intitulé Freddy se fait molester par un chien) est que ce n'est pas aussi odieux que Freddie got fingered de Tom Green.
back_translation: The best thing you can say about Stealing Harvard (which could have been titled Freddy Gets Molested by a Dog) is that it's not as awful as Tom Green's Freddie Got Fingered.

text: but her marriage is loveless and she suffers from the loss of her baby in childbirth .
translation: mais son mariage est sans amour et elle souffre de la perte de son bébé lors de l'accouchement.

text: viewers of `` the ring `` are more likely to remember the haunting images than the plot holes .
translation: Les spectateurs de `` The Ring '' sont plus susceptibles de se souvenir des images saisissantes que des incohérences de l'intrigue.
back_translation: The viewers of "The Ring" are more likely to remember the striking images than the inconsistencies of the plot.

text: sleepwalking tells the story of three friends at three very different stages of their lives .
translation: le somnambulisme raconte l'histoire de trois amis à trois étapes très différentes de leur vie.
back_translation: Sleepwalking tells the story of three friends at three very different stages of their lives.

text: he soon escapes and runs into a woman who has recently had a car accident and is suffering with amnesia .

back_translation: He soon escapes and comes across a woman who has recently been in a car accident and is suffering from amnesia.

text: while some of the subplots are very sketchy and the motivations of some of the characters are not clear , it is a journey worth taking because of the wondrous imagery .
translation: Bien que certains des sous-intrigues soient très sommaires et que les motivations de certains personnages ne soient pas claires, c'est un voyage qui vaut la peine d'être fait en raison des images merveilleuses.
back_translation: Although some of the subplots are very basic and the motivations of some characters are unclear, it is a journey worth taking because of the wonderful images.

text: is it possible for a documentary to be utterly entranced by its subject and still show virtually no understanding of it ?
translation: Est-il possible qu'un documentaire soit complètement captivé par son sujet tout en montrant pratiquement aucune compréhension de celui-ci ?
back_translation: Is it possible for a documentary to be completely captivated by its subject while showing practically no understanding of it?

text: her cathexis was rapid and she formed an intense attachment to her young doctor , who seems to have reciprocated .

text: along the way , ash continues to mature into the unstoppable pok & # 233 ; mon trainer he will become in the future .

text: a muckraking job , the cinematic equivalent of a legal indictment , and a fairly effective one at that .
translation: un travail de fouille, l'équivalent cinématographique d'une inculpation légale, et plutôt efficace qui plus est.
back_translation: a digging job, the cinematic equivalent of a legal indictment, and quite effective in addition.

text: this is standard crime drama fare . . . instantly forgettable and thoroughly dull .

back_translation: It's a standard crime drama... instantly forgettable and completely dull.

text: first time director sam jones documents the making of wilco 's fourth studio album , yankee hotel foxtrot .
translation: Le premier réalisateur Sam Jones documente la réalisation de l'album studio numéro quatre de Wilco, Yankee Hotel Foxtrot.
back_translation: The first director, Sam Jones, documents the making of Wilco's fourth studio album, Yankee Hotel Foxtrot.

text: we have poignancy jostling against farce , thoughtful dialogue elbowed aside by one-liners , and a visual style that incorporates rotoscope animation for no apparent reason except , maybe , that it looks neat .
translation: nous avons de la poignance heurtant la farce, un dialogue réfléchi écarté par des répliques, et un style visuel qui intègre de l'animation en rotoscopie sans raison apparente sinon, peut-être, que cela a l'air sympa.
back_translation: We have poignancy clashing with farce, a thoughtful dialogue overshadowed by retorts, and a visual style that incorporates rotoscope animation for no apparent reason other than, perhaps, that it looks cool.

text: his mother persuades a renowned entomologist to take them on a trip to the jungle to search for the butterfly , leading to an adventure that will transform their lives .
translation: sa mère persuade un entomologiste renommé de les emmener en voyage dans la jungle à la recherche du papillon, ce qui mène à une aventure qui transformera leurs vies.
back_translation: His mother persuades a renowned entomologist to take them on a journey into the jungle in search of the butterfly, which leads to an adventure that will change their lives.

text: a martial artist , afflicted with a disease that makes beautiful women want to kill him , goes on a suicide mission to find true love anyway .
translation: Un artiste martial, atteint d'une maladie qui pousse les belles femmes à vouloir le tuer, se lance dans une mission suicidaire pour trouver l'amour véritable quand même.
back_translation: A martial artist, afflicted with a disease that drives beautiful women to want to kill him, embarks on a suicidal mission to find true love nonetheless.

text: terry and dean are lifelong friends who have grown-up together : shotgunning their first beers , forming their first garage band , and growing the great canadian mullet known as `` hockey hair `` .
translation: Terry et Dean sont des amis de longue date qui ont grandi ensemble : en buvant leur première bière, en formant leur premier groupe de garage, et en se laissant pousser la célèbre moumoute canadienne connue sous le nom de « cheveux de hockey ».
back_translation: Terry and Dean are longtime friends who grew up together: drinking their first beer, forming their first garage band, and growing out the famous Canadian fluff known as "hockey hair."

text: the low-key direction is pleasingly emphatic in this properly intense , claustrophobic tale of obsessive love .
translation: La direction discrète est agréablement emphatique dans cette histoire de passion obsessionnelle, proprement intense et claustrophobique.
back_translation: The discreet direction is pleasantly emphatic in this story of obsessive passion, strikingly intense and claustrophobic.

text: everyone thinks that it 's him that has opened the chamber of secrets because that is what slytherin was famous for .
translation: tout le monde pense que c'est lui qui a ouvert la chambre des secrets parce que c'est ce pour quoi Serpentard était célèbre.
back_translation: Everyone thinks that he is the one who opened the Chamber of Secrets because that is what Slytherin was famous for.

text: one senses in world traveler and in his earlier film that freundlich bears a grievous but obscure complaint against fathers , and circles it obsessively , without making contact .
translation: On sent dans "World Traveler" et dans son film précédent que Freundlich porte une plainte grave mais obscure contre les pères, et qu'il tourne autour de ce sujet de manière obsessionnelle, sans réellement y toucher.
back_translation: One can sense in "World Traveler" and in his previous film that Freundlich carries a serious yet obscure complaint against fathers, and he circles around this subject obsessively, without truly addressing it.

text: a lot more dimensional and complex than its sunny disposition would lead you to believe .
translation: beaucoup plus dimensionnel et complexe que sa disposition ensoleillée pourrait vous faire croire.

text: it 's push-the-limits teen comedy , the type written by people who ca n't come up with legitimate funny , and it 's used so extensively that good bits are hopelessly overshadowed .
translation: c'est une comédie pour adolescents qui pousse les limites, du type écrit par des personnes qui ne peuvent pas trouver de véritables moments drôles, et elle est utilisée de telle manière que les bonnes blagues sont désespérément éclipsées.
back_translation: It's a comedy for teenagers that pushes the limits, of the type written by people who can't find real funny moments, and it is used in such a way that the good jokes are desperately eclipsed.

text: writer-director steven soderbergh follows up ocean 's 11 with the low-budget 'full frontal ' , his first digitally shot film .
translation: Le scénariste-réalisateur Steven Soderbergh fait suite à Ocean's 11 avec le film à petit budget 'Full Frontal', son premier film tourné en numérique.
back_translation: Screenwriter-director Steven Soderbergh follows up Ocean's 11 with the low-budget film 'Full Frontal,' his first film shot digitally.

text: the movie features veteran horror heroines leslie culton and jenny wallace , and actors john saenz and jonathan tabor .
translation: Le film met en vedette les héroïnes d'horreur vétérans Leslie Culton et Jenny Wallace, ainsi que les acteurs John Saenz et Jonathan Tabor.
back_translation: The film stars horror veterans Leslie Culton and Jenny Wallace, along with actors John Saenz and Jonathan Tabor.

text: here the love scenes all end in someone screaming . maybe there 's a metaphor here , but figuring it out would n't make trouble every day any better .
translation: Ici, toutes les scènes d'amour se terminent par des cris. Peut-être qu'il y a une métaphore ici, mais essayer de la comprendre ne rendrait pas la vie quotidienne meilleure.
back_translation: Here, all the love scenes end with screams. Maybe there's a metaphor here, but trying to understand it wouldn't make everyday life any better.

text: an entertaining and topical adventure drama which responds to our society 's fascination with doomsday cults , survivalist sects and their messianic leaders .

text: [ t ] he film is never sure to make a clear point M-^V even if it seeks to rely on an ambiguous presentation .

translation: Sur la route du lac Tahoe, un jeune cadre stressé rencontre une femme qui change sa vie à jamais.

text: in gleefully , thumpingly hyperbolic terms , it covers just about every cliche in the compendium about crass , jaded movie types and the phony baloney movie biz .
translation: Avec des termes joyeusement et bruyamment hyperboliques, cela couvre presque tous les clichés du recueil sur les types de films crasseux et blasés et le cinéma bidon.

text: but , sometimes what we teach our children can be as deadly as not teaching them .
translation: Mais parfois, ce que nous enseignons à nos enfants peut être aussi mortel que de ne rien leur enseigner.

text: writer-director debrauwer does manage to wrap things up in an * * * -pleasing 78 minutes . it 's is n't much , but it 's a lot more than callous callie khouri did with that `` ya-ya `` mess . also , there are no irritating hats .
translation: L'écrivain-réalisateur Debrauwer parvient à conclure les choses en 78 minutes plaisantes. Ce n'est pas grand-chose, mais c'est beaucoup plus que ce que la glaciale Callie Khouri a fait avec ce désordre "ya-ya". De plus, il n'y a pas de chapeaux irritants.
back_translation: Writer-director Debrauwer manages to wrap things up in 78 enjoyable minutes. It's not much, but it's far more than what the icy Callie Khouri did with that "ya-ya" mess. Furthermore, there are no irritating hats.

text: to say analyze that is de niro 's best film since meet the parents sums up the sad state of his recent career .
translation: Dire que "Analyze This" est le meilleur film de De Niro depuis "Meet the Parents" résume l'état triste de sa carrière récente.

text: and the detective is n't convinced that this will be the last . . .

text: it suggests the wide-ranging effects of media manipulation , from the kind of reporting that is done by the supposedly liberal media . . . to the intimate and ultimately tragic heartache of maverick individuals like hatfield and hicks .
translation: il suggère les effets variés de la manipulation des médias, de la sorte de reportage effectué par les médias supposément libéraux... jusqu'à la douleur intime et finalement tragique d'individus marginaux comme Hatfield et Hicks.
back_translation: It suggests the varied effects of media manipulation, the type of reporting done by supposedly liberal media... up to the intimate and ultimately tragic pain of marginalized individuals like Hatfield and Hicks.

text: based on an attraction at disneyland , the country bear jamboree , `` the country bears `` ( 2002 ) is one in a long line of live action disney family films .
translation: Basé sur une attraction à Disneyland, le Country Bear Jamboree, "Les Ours à l'Intérieur" (2002) est l'un d'une longue série de films familiaux en live action de Disney.
back_translation: Based on a Disneyland attraction, the Country Bear Jamboree, "The Country Bears" (2002) is one of a long series of live-action family films from Disney.

translation: sur son lit de mort, Candice Klein demande accidentellement, `` Qu'est-ce que j'ai bien pu faire pour mériter ça ? ``
back_translation: On her deathbed, Candice Klein accidentally asks, "What could I have done to deserve this?"

text: chao was chen kaige 's assistant for years in china . he has not learnt that storytelling is what the movies are about .
translation: Chao a été l'assistant de Chen Kaige pendant des années en Chine. Il n'a pas appris que la narration est ce dont les films parlent.
back_translation: Chao was Chen Kaige's assistant for years in China. He did not learn that storytelling is what films are about.

text: stephen rea , aidan quinn , and alan bates play desmond 's legal eagles , and when joined by brosnan , the sight of this grandiloquent quartet lolling in pretty irish settings is a pleasant enough thing , 't is .
translation: Stephen Rea, Aidan Quinn et Alan Bates jouent dans "Les aigles de la loi" de Desmond, et lorsqu'ils sont rejoints par Brosnan, la vue de ce grand quatuor flânant dans de jolis paysages irlandais est une chose suffisamment agréable, c'est vrai.
back_translation: Stephen Rea, Aidan Quinn, and Alan Bates star in "The Law's Eagles" by Desmond, and when they are joined by Brosnan, the sight of this great quartet strolling through beautiful Irish landscapes is a pleasing enough thing, it’s true.

text: watching queen of the damned is like reading a research paper , with special effects tossed in .
translation: Regarder "Queen of the Damned", c'est comme lire un article de recherche, avec des effets spéciaux ajoutés.
back_translation: Watching "Queen of the Damned" is like reading a research article, with added special effects.

text: shaun brumder is a local surfer kid from orange county who dreams of going to stanford to become a writer and to get away from his disfunctional family household .
translation: Shaun Brumder est un jeune surfeur local du comté d'Orange qui rêve d'aller à Stanford pour devenir écrivain et s'éloigner de sa famille dysfonctionnelle.
back_translation: Shaun Brumder is a young local surfer from Orange County who dreams of going to Stanford to become a writer and escape from his dysfunctional family.

text: new best friend should n't have gone straight to video ; it should have gone straight to a mystery science theater 3000 video .
translation: Le nouveau meilleur ami n'aurait pas dû sortir directement en vidéo ; il aurait dû aller directement à une vidéo de Mystery Science Theater 3000.
back_translation: The new best friend should not have been released directly on video; it should have gone straight to a Mystery Science Theater 3000 video.

text: the mystery of enigma is how a rich historical subject , combined with so much first-rate talent . . . could have yielded such a flat , plodding picture .
translation: Le mystère de l'énigme est comment un sujet historique riche, associé à tant de talents de premier plan, a pu donner un film si plat et laborieux.
back_translation: The mystery of the enigma is how a rich historical subject, associated with so many leading talents, could produce such a flat and laborious film.

text: craig is an older , average-looking man who is n't handling aging well .
translation: Craig est un homme d'âge moyen, à l'apparence ordinaire, qui ne supporte pas bien le vieillissement.
back_translation: Craig is a middle-aged man with an ordinary appearance who does not cope well with aging.

text: in this cinematic concert , mesmerizing images are plucked from everyday reality , then visually altered with state-of-the-art digital techniques .
translation: dans ce concert cinématographique, des images fascinantes sont tirées de la réalité quotidienne, puis modifiées visuellement avec des techniques numériques à la pointe de la technologie.
back_translation: In this cinematic concert, fascinating images are drawn from everyday reality and then visually altered using cutting-edge digital techniques.

text: his destiny lies in the shadows of a black rose - the symbol of decayed innocence .
translation: son destin se trouve dans les ombres d'une rose noire - le symbole de l'innocence fanée.
back_translation: his destiny lies in the shadows of a black rose - the symbol of faded innocence.

text: strangely comes off as a kingdom more mild than wild .
translation: étrangement, cela apparaît comme un royaume plus doux que sauvage.
back_translation: Strangely, it appears to be a realm more gentle than wild.

text: gambling and throwing a basketball game for money is n't a new plot -- in fact toback himself used it in black and white . but toback 's deranged immediacy makes it seem fresh again .
translation: le jeu et le fait de truquer un match de basket pour de l'argent ne sont pas un nouveau scénario -- en fait, toback lui-même l'a utilisé en noir et blanc. mais l'immédiateté dérangée de toback le rend à nouveau frais.
back_translation: The game and the act of rigging a basketball match for money is not a new scenario -- in fact, Toback himself used it in black and white. But Toback's disturbed immediacy makes it fresh again.

text: smith examines the intimate , unguarded moments of folks who live in unusual homes -- which pop up in nearly every corner of the country .
translation: Smith examine les moments intimes et sans défense des gens qui vivent dans des maisons inhabituelles, qui apparaissent dans presque tous les coins du pays.
back_translation: Smith examines the intimate and vulnerable moments of people who live in unusual houses, which appear in almost every corner of the country.

text: two college grads land an entry level mafia job driving a retiring don 's car cross country .
translation: Deux diplômés universitaires décrochent un emploi de débutant dans la mafia en conduisant la voiture d'un don qui prend sa retraite à travers le pays.
back_translation: Two university graduates land a beginner's job in the mafia by driving the car of a retiring mob boss across the country.

text: screenwriter maureen tilyou , director martin duffy and an extremely competent cast handle the controversial aspects of the topic in an even-handed manner .
translation: La scénariste Maureen Tilyou, le réalisateur Martin Duffy et un casting extrêmement compétent abordent les aspects controversés du sujet de manière équilibrée.
back_translation: Screenwriter Maureen Tilyou, director Martin Duffy, and an extremely competent cast tackle the controversial aspects of the subject in a balanced manner.

text: katie 's father 's injury comes back to haunt him and he finds himself paralyzed from the neck down .
translation: La blessure du père de Katie revient le hanter et il se retrouve paralysé du cou vers le bas.

text: he is imprisoned , awaiting the death sentence for his crimes .
translation: il est emprisonné, en attente de la peine de mort pour ses crimes.

text: now the chinese man shows up wanting the gems .
translation: maintenant l'homme chinois apparaît en voulant les gemmes.

text: the whole mess boils down to a transparently hypocritical work that feels as though it 's trying to set the women 's liberation movement back 20 years .
translation: tout ce désordre revient à une œuvre manifestement hypocrite qui donne l'impression de tenter de faire reculer le mouvement de libération des femmes de 20 ans.
back_translation: All this disorder boils down to a manifestly hypocritical work that gives the impression of trying to roll back the women's liberation movement by 20 years.

text: after selling the shop to a local loan shark , calvin slowly begins to see his father 's vision and legacy and struggles with the notion that he just sold it out .
translation: Après avoir vendu la boutique à un prêteur sur gages local, Calvin commence lentement à comprendre la vision et l'héritage de son père et lutte avec la notion qu'il l'a simplement abandonnée.
back_translation: After selling the shop to a local pawnbroker, Calvin slowly begins to understand his father's vision and legacy and struggles with the notion that he simply abandoned it.

text: simultaneously devastating and hilarious , the film manages to capture the daily rituals and mundanities of life in such engrossing proximity that everything becomes drama .
translation: à la fois dévastateur et hilarant, le film parvient à capturer les rituels quotidiens et les banalités de la vie avec une telle proximité captivante que tout devient drame.
back_translation: Both devastating and hilarious, the film manages to capture the daily rituals and banalities of life with such captivating proximity that everything becomes drama.

text: adam sandler 's heart may be in the right place , but he needs to pull his head out of his butt
translation: Le cœur d'Adam Sandler peut être à la bonne place, mais il doit sortir sa tête de son derrière.

text: that the e-graveyard holds as many good ideas as bad is the cold comfort that chin 's film serves up with style and empathy .
translation: que le cimetière numérique contient autant de bonnes idées que de mauvaises est le froid réconfort que le film de Chin présente avec style et empathie.
back_translation: That the digital cemetery contains as many good ideas as bad ones is the cold comfort that Chin's film presents with style and empathy.

text: when virginia visits her aunt millie at christmas , she discovers a stack of handwritten letters over half a century old , and unlocks the story of her aunt 's youthful days as a young woman living in hamilton , mississippi , during the second world war .
translation: Lorsque Virginia rend visite à sa tante Millie à Noël, elle découvre une pile de lettres manuscrites datant de plus d'un demi-siècle et révèle l'histoire des jeunes années de sa tante en tant que jeune femme vivant à Hamilton, Mississippi, pendant la Seconde Guerre mondiale.
back_translation: When Virginia visits her Aunt Millie at Christmas, she discovers a pile of handwritten letters dating back over half a century, revealing the story of her aunt's young years as a young woman living in Hamilton, Mississippi, during World War II.

text: ultimately engages less for its story of actorly existential despair than for its boundary-hopping formal innovations and glimpse into another kind of chinese 'cultural revolution . '
translation: ultimement engage moins pour son histoire de désespoir existentiel d'acteur que pour ses innovations formelles transgressives et un aperçu d'un autre type de 'révolution culturelle' chinoise.
back_translation: Ultimately, it is less engaged with its story of existential despair of the actor than with its transgressive formal innovations and a glimpse of another type of Chinese 'cultural revolution.'

text: a few nonbelievers may rethink their attitudes when they see the joy the characters take in this creed , but skeptics are n't likely to enter the theater .
translation: Quelques non-croyants pourraient reconsidérer leurs attitudes lorsqu'ils voient la joie que les personnages tirent de ce credo, mais les sceptiques ne sont pas susceptibles d'entrer dans le théâtre.
back_translation: Some non-believers may reconsider their attitudes when they see the joy that the characters derive from this creed, but skeptics are unlikely to enter the theater.

text: and although billy does n't want jackson , two other guys do : derek , a clean-cut record store customer , and sam , the straight record store owner .
translation: et bien que billy ne veuille pas de jackson, deux autres gars le veulent : derek, un client de magasin de disques bien sous tous rapports, et sam, le propriétaire hétéro du magasin de disques.
back_translation: And although Billy doesn't want Jackson, two other guys want him: Derek, a well-to-do record store customer, and Sam, the straight owner of the record store.

text: i walked away not really know who `` they `` were , what `` they `` looked like . why `` they `` were here and what `` they `` wanted and quite honestly , i did n't care .
translation: Je me suis éloigné sans vraiment savoir qui étaient « eux », à quoi « ils » ressemblaient, pourquoi « ils » étaient là et ce que « ils » voulaient, et honnêtement, je ne m'en souciais pas.
back_translation: I distanced myself without really knowing who "they" were, what "they" looked like, why "they" were there, and what "they" wanted, and honestly, I didn't care.

text: with the machine they travel across the country ( uruguay ) traing to escape to brazil .
translation: Avec la machine, ils traversent le pays (Uruguay) en essayant d'échapper au Brésil.
back_translation: With the machine, they cross the country (Uruguay) trying to escape from Brazil.

text: in the spirit of voltaire and moliM-hre , on guard volleys great wit and deadly gestures in a milieu of lush apparel , landscapes , captivating music and 18th-century lacy sleeves .
translation: dans l'esprit de Voltaire et de Molière, en garde lance un grand esprit et des gestes mortels dans un milieu de vêtements luxueux, de paysages, de musique captivante et de manches en dentelle du XVIIIe siècle.

text: exonerated of lying , king and cuthbertson are nevertheless reprimanded by the court for their behaviour , but receive an invitation to tea with the prime minister should they ever be in whitehall .
translation: Exonérés de mensonge, King et Cuthbertson sont néanmoins réprimandés par le tribunal pour leur comportement, mais reçoivent une invitation à prendre le thé avec le premier ministre s'ils se trouvent un jour à Whitehall.
back_translation: Exonerated from lying, King and Cuthbertson are nevertheless reprimanded by the court for their behavior but receive an invitation to have tea with the Prime Minister if they ever find themselves in Whitehall.

text: the kind of sweet-and-sour insider movie that film buffs will eat up like so much gelati .

text: [ it 's ] a clever thriller with enough unexpected twists to keep our interest .

text: the word that comes to mind , while watching eric rohmer 's tribute to a courageous scottish lady , is painterly .

text: noyce films it more as a shocking history lesson than as drama .

text: a young professional discovers the difficulty of leaving the corporate nest .

text: rarely has so much money delivered so little entertainment .
translation: rarement autant d'argent n'a offert si peu de divertissement.

text: especially one girl , isa , has to choose between two boys who are fighting against each other .
translation: surtout une fille, Isa, doit choisir entre deux garçons qui se battent l'un contre l'autre.

text: the fictional film `` the dragon `` tells the story of how a young boy , who 's master is killed by a group of thugs , grows up to avenge his teacher 's murder .
translation: Le film fictif « Le Dragon » raconte l'histoire d'un jeune garçon dont le maître est tué par un groupe de voyous, qui grandit pour venger le meurtre de son enseignant.
back_translation: The fictional movie "The Dragon" tells the story of a young boy whose master is killed by a group of thugs, who grows up to avenge his teacher's murder.

text: michael , sr . and michael , jr . then set out to get revenge on the man who killed peter and mrs . sullivan .
translation: Michael, Sr. et Michael, Jr. se mirent alors en route pour se venger de l'homme qui avait tué Peter et Mme Sullivan.
back_translation: Michael Sr. and Michael Jr. then set off to take revenge on the man who had killed Peter and Mrs. Sullivan.

text: lukas and his friends live in a commune out in the woods .
translation: Lukas et ses amis vivent dans une commune dans les bois.
