text: when his affair with a young troubled janitor ( kidman ) is uncovered , the secret silk had harbored for over fifty years from his wife , his children and colleague , writer nathan zuckerman , fast explodes in a conflagration of devastating consequences .
translation: Lorsque sa liaison avec une jeune femme de ménage en difficulté (Kidman) est révélée, le secret que Silk a caché pendant plus de cinquante ans à sa femme, à ses enfants et à son collègue, l'écrivain Nathan Zuckerman, explose rapidement dans une conflagration de conséquences dévastatrices.
back_translation: When his relationship with a struggling young cleaning lady (Kidman) is revealed, the secret that Silk has hidden from his wife, his children, and his colleague, the writer Nathan Zuckerman, for over fifty years quickly explodes in a conflagration of devastating consequences.

text: the most impressive quality of this charming movie is the way the characters , who are all recognizable 'types , ' refuse to behave the way we expect .
translation: La qualité la plus impressionnante de ce charmant film est la façon dont les personnages, qui sont tous des "types" reconnaissables, refusent de se comporter comme on s'y attend.
back_translation: The most impressive quality of this charming film is the way the characters, who are all recognizable "types," refuse to behave as one would expect.

text: after one gets the feeling that the typical hollywood disregard for historical truth and realism is at work here , it 's a matter of finding entertainment in the experiences of zishe and the fiery presence of hanussen .
translation: Après avoir ressenti que le mépris typique d'Hollywood pour la vérité historique et le réalisme est à l'œuvre ici, il s'agit de trouver du divertissement dans les expériences de Zishe et la présence ardente de Hanussen.
back_translation: After feeling the typical Hollywood disdain for historical truth and realism at work here, it is about finding entertainment in Zishe's experiences and Hanussen's fiery presence.

text: it 's a movie -- and an album -- you wo n't want to miss .

text: what 's most unusual about beijing bicycle in terms of recent chinese history is that any form of class conflict is depicted at all .

back_translation: What is most unusual about "Beijing Bicycle" in terms of the recent history of China is that any form of class conflict is represented.

text: in present-day london , twelve-year-old quinn watches as his mother , a construction engineer , inadvertently wakes an enormous fire-breathing beast from its century-long slumber .
translation: À Londres de nos jours, Quinn, âgé de douze ans, regarde sa mère, ingénieure en construction, réveiller accidentellement une énorme bête cracheuse de feu de son sommeil de cent ans.
back_translation: In modern-day London, twelve-year-old Quinn watches as his mother, a construction engineer, accidentally awakens a huge fire-breathing beast from its hundred-year sleep.

text: the story suffers a severe case of oversimplification , superficiality and silliness .

text: a criminal mastermind has set in motion a plan to infiltrate a high tech prison in order to persuade a death row inmate to reveal the whereabouts of $ 200 million worth of gold .
translation: Un génie du crime a mis en marche un plan pour infiltrer une prison high-tech afin de persuader un condamné à mort de révéler l'emplacement de 200 millions de dollars en or.
back_translation: A criminal genius has set in motion a plan to infiltrate a high-tech prison in order to persuade a death row inmate to reveal the location of 200 million dollars in gold.

text: helmut busch ( now bruno ) will fall in love with adela , one of the activists , and that faces him into a dilema because he has orders to kill the head of the group where the young woman serves as a militant .
translation: Helmut Busch (maintenant Bruno) tombera amoureux d'Adela, l'une des militantes, ce qui lui posera un dilemme car il a reçu l'ordre de tuer le chef du groupe où la jeune femme agit en tant que militante.
back_translation: Helmut Busch (now Bruno) will fall in love with Adela, one of the militants, which will pose a dilemma for him as he has been ordered to kill the leader of the group where the young woman acts as a militant.

text: a poky and pseudo-serious exercise in sham actor workshops and an affected malaise .

text: this time nick is `` getting out ! `` . . . or
translation: cette fois, Nick `` sort ! `` . . . ou

translation: Le film riche en dialogues ressemble à l'un des œuvres mineures de Robert Altman.
back_translation: The dialogue-rich film resembles one of Robert Altman's minor works.

text: the way home is an ode to unconditional love and compassion garnered from years of seeing it all , a condition only the old are privy to , and . . . often misconstrued as weakness .
translation: Le chemin du retour est une ode à l'amour inconditionnel et à la compassion acquise au fil des années de tout avoir vu, une condition à laquelle seuls les vieux ont accès, et... souvent mal interprétée comme une faiblesse.
back_translation: The way back is an ode to unconditional love and compassion gained over years of seeing everything, a condition to which only the elderly have access, and... often misinterpreted as a weakness.

text: semi-improvised on the streets of liverpool , dan reed 's drama brings the true face of britain 's underworld to light .
translation: Semi-improvisé dans les rues de Liverpool, le drame de Dan Reed met en lumière le vrai visage du monde souterrain britannique.
back_translation: Semi-improvised on the streets of Liverpool, Dan Reed's drama sheds light on the true face of the British underworld.

text: there 's a sweetness to it that 's disarming and diverting -- mostly thanks to performances of slater , richard dreyfuss as his partner in crime , and portia di rossi as dreyfuss ' daughter .
translation: Il y a une douceur désarmante et divertissante – grâce principalement aux performances de Slater, Richard Dreyfuss en tant que son complice, et Portia de Rossi en tant que fille de Dreyfuss.
back_translation: There is a disarming and entertaining sweetness - mainly thanks to the performances of Slater, Richard Dreyfuss as his accomplice, and Portia de Rossi as Dreyfuss's daughter.

text: suffers from unlikable characters and a self-conscious sense of its own quirky hipness .

back_translation: The extravagant search for shoes begins as she follows the footprints through the lively streets of Havana, encountering the original and colorful characters that bring the dream of viva zapato and dolore to life.

translation: Bisset continue de commander l'écran en tant que Frances, élégante et franche.

text: chomsky 's voice may be unpopular , but his incisive arguments , based on decades of research and analysis , are heard and considered in this chronicle comprised of interview footage , and various talks he 's given .
translation: La voix de Chomsky peut être impopulaire, mais ses arguments incisifs, basés sur des décennies de recherche et d'analyse, sont entendus et considérés dans cette chronique composée d'images d'interviews et de divers discours qu'il a donnés.
back_translation: Chomsky's voice may be unpopular, but his incisive arguments, based on decades of research and analysis, are heard and taken into account in this chronicle made up of images from interviews and various speeches he has given.

text: it 's a mystery how the movie could be released in this condition .
translation: C'est un mystère comment le film a pu être sorti dans cet état.

translation: Ils se retrouvent bientôt pris dans la nature érotique des sessions de chat qu'ils animent, changeant ainsi leurs vies.

text: liman , of swingers and go , makes his big-budget action film debut something of a clunker as he delivers a long , low-heat chase , interrupted by a middling car chase .
translation: Liman, des "swingers" et "go", fait ses débuts dans le film d'action à gros budget avec quelque chose de médiocre alors qu'il livre une longue poursuite à faible intensité, interrompue par une poursuite automobile moyenne.
back_translation: Liman, a "swinger" and "go," makes his debut in the big-budget action film with something mediocre as he delivers a long low-intensity chase, interrupted by a mediocre car chase.

translation: jamais engageant, totalement prévisible et complètement dépourvu de quoi que ce soit de vaguement intéressant ou suspense.

back_translation: Michael, an obsessive-compulsive real estate agent who appreciates "the young generation."

text: hardly a masterpiece , but it introduces viewers to a good charitable enterprise and some interesting real people .
translation: à peine un chef-d'œuvre, mais il présente aux spectateurs une bonne œuvre caritative et des personnes réelles intéressantes.

text: because the intelligence level of the characters must be low , very low , very very low , for the masquerade to work , the movie contains no wit , only labored gags .
translation: Parce que le niveau d'intelligence des personnages doit être bas, très bas, très très bas, pour que la mascarade fonctionne, le film ne contient aucune esprit, seulement des gags laborieux.

translation: il doit apprendre à accepter Ian ; Ian doit apprendre à accepter la grande famille de Toula, et Toula doit apprendre à s'accepter elle-même.

back_translation: Obstacles arise left and right as the adventure becomes increasingly wild.

text: hank azaria and vincent d'onofrio also star as does screenwriter/comedienne heather morgan as the canine wife .
translation: Hank Azaria et Vincent D'Onofrio apparaissent également, tout comme la scénariste/comedienne Heather Morgan dans le rôle de la femme canine.
back_translation: Hank Azaria and Vincent D'Onofrio also appear, as well as writer/comedian Heather Morgan in the role of the canine woman.

text: you have to pay attention to follow all the stories , but they 're each interesting . the movie is well shot and very tragic , and one to ponder after the credits roll .
translation: Vous devez prêter attention pour suivre toutes les histoires, mais chacune d'entre elles est intéressante. Le film est bien réalisé et très tragique, et il donne à réfléchir après le générique.
back_translation: You need to pay attention to follow all the stories, but each one is interesting. The movie is well-made and very tragic, and it gives you something to think about after the credits.

text: on the heels of the ring comes a similarly morose and humorless horror movie that , although flawed , is to be commended for its straight-ahead approach to creepiness .
translation: à la suite de The Ring vient un film d'horreur tout aussi morose et sans humour qui, bien que imparfait, mérite d'être salué pour son approche directe de l'effroi.
back_translation: Following The Ring comes an equally grim and humorless horror film that, although imperfect, deserves to be praised for its direct approach to fear.

text: mr . soderbergh 's direction and visual style struck me as unusually and unimpressively fussy and pretentious .
translation: La direction et le style visuel de M. Soderbergh m'ont paru particulièrement minutieux et prétentieux de manière peu impressionnante.
back_translation: The direction and visual style of Mr. Soderbergh seemed particularly meticulous and pretentious in a rather unimpressive way.

text: this definitely delivers a remarkable mixture of explosive drama with wickedly ironical humor as you follow this eclectic story surrounding this tide-dyed , free spirited couple 's showdown with a mysterious faberge ' egg and a seedy , well-woven cast of criminals that will both trill and amuse .
translation: cela offre certainement un mélange remarquable de drame explosif avec un humour ironiquement malicieux alors que vous suivez cette histoire éclectique entourant l'affrontement d'un couple coloré et libre d'esprit avec un mystérieux œuf Fabergé et une bande de criminels bien tissée qui à la fois fera frémir et amuser.
back_translation: It certainly offers a remarkable blend of explosive drama with ironically mischievous humor as you follow this eclectic story surrounding the clash of a colorful and free-spirited couple with a mysterious Fabergé egg and a well-woven band of criminals that will both thrill and amuse.

text: . . . could easily be called the best korean film of 2002 .
translation: . . . pourrait facilement être considéré comme le meilleur film coréen de 2002.
back_translation: ...could easily be considered the best Korean film of 2002.

text: he 's your standard adrenaline junkie with no fear and a lousy attitude .
translation: C'est votre accro à l'adrénaline standard, sans peur et avec une mauvaise attitude.
back_translation: It’s your standard adrenaline junkie, fearless and with a bad attitude.

text: remember the kind of movie we were hoping `` ecks vs . sever `` or `` xxx `` was going to be ? this is it .
translation: souviens-toi du type de film que nous espérions que `` ecks vs . sever `` ou `` xxx `` seraient ? c'est ça.
back_translation: Remember the kind of movie we hoped that "Ecks vs. Sever" or "XXX" would be? That's it.

text: as things become increasingly more complicated in the small community , the walls around father amaro begin to crumble .
translation: Alors que les choses deviennent de plus en plus compliquées dans la petite communauté, les murs autour du père Amaro commencent à s'effondrer.
back_translation: As things become more and more complicated in the small community, the walls around Father Amaro begin to crumble.

text: moretti . . . is the rare common-man artist who 's wise enough to recognize that there are few things in this world more complex -- and , as it turns out , more fragile -- than happiness .
translation: Moretti... est l'artiste rare du commun qui a la sagesse de reconnaître qu'il y a peu de choses dans ce monde plus complexes -- et, il s'avère, plus fragiles -- que le bonheur.
back_translation: Moretti... is the rare common artist who has the wisdom to recognize that there are few things in this world more complex -- and, it turns out, more fragile -- than happiness.

text: a young man is found bruised , beaten and stumbling down a secluded road .
translation: Un jeune homme est trouvé meurtri, battu et titubant sur une route isolée.
back_translation: A young man is found bruised, battered, and staggering on a lonely road.

text: and having been with one woman his whole life , he loves to make silly jokes about how he , ami , steve , and claire should `` swap `` .
translation: et ayant été avec une seule femme toute sa vie, il aime faire des blagues idiotes sur comment lui, ami, steve et claire devraient « échanger ».
back_translation: And having been with only one woman all his life, he likes to make silly jokes about how he, friend, Steve, and Claire should "swap."

text: plummer steals the show without resorting to camp as nicholas ' wounded and wounding uncle ralph . it 's a great performance and a reminder of dickens ' grandeur .
translation: Plummer vole la vedette sans recourir au camp en tant que Nicholas, le blessé et blessant oncle Ralph. C'est une grande performance et un rappel de la grandeur de Dickens.
back_translation: Plummer steals the spotlight without resorting to the camp as Nicholas, the injured and hurtful Uncle Ralph. It’s a great performance and a reminder of Dickens' greatness.

text: they board the boat that is to carry them to the isles of the blessed .
translation: Ils montent à bord du bateau qui doit les emmener vers les îles bienheureuses.
back_translation: They board the boat that is going to take them to the blessed islands.

text: the true story of revolutionary war leader ethan allen ( 1738-1789 ) and his group of fighters , the green mountain boys , who fought for the freedom of vermont before the war officially started .
translation: l'histoire véritable du leader de la guerre d'indépendance ethan allen (1738-1789) et de son groupe de combattants, les green mountain boys, qui ont lutté pour la liberté du vermont avant le début officiel de la guerre.
back_translation: The true story of the leader of the War of Independence, Ethan Allen (1738-1789), and his group of fighters, the Green Mountain Boys, who fought for the freedom of Vermont before the official start of the war.

text: documentary feature about the traditional viennese cinema `` bellaria `` , which is specialised in german cinema from the 20s , 30s and 40s and its regular customers , whose idols are stars like zarah leander or karl sch & # 246 ; nb & # 246 ; ck .
translation: long métrage documentaire sur le cinéma viennois traditionnel `` bellaria ``, spécialisé dans le cinéma allemand des années 20, 30 et 40 et ses clients réguliers, dont les idoles sont des stars comme Zarah Leander ou Karl Schönböck.
back_translation: A feature documentary about the traditional Viennese cinema "Bellaria," specializing in German cinema from the 1920s, 30s, and 40s, and its regular patrons, whose idols are stars like Zarah Leander or Karl Schönböck.

text: [ the kid 's ] just too bratty for sympathy , and as the film grows to its finale , his little changes ring hollow .
translation: [ l'enfant est ] tout simplement trop gâté pour susciter la sympathie, et à mesure que le film progresse vers sa finale, ses petites transformations sonnent creux.
back_translation: The child is simply too spoiled to evoke sympathy, and as the film progresses towards its finale, his small transformations feel hollow.

text: in any case , i would recommend big bad love only to winger fans who have missed her since 1995 's forget paris . but even then , i 'd recommend waiting for dvd and just skipping straight to her scenes .
translation: Dans tous les cas, je ne recommanderais Big Bad Love qu'aux fans de Winger qui l'ont manquée depuis Forget Paris en 1995. Mais même dans ce cas, je recommanderais d'attendre la sortie en DVD et de sauter directement à ses scènes.
back_translation: In any case, I would only recommend Big Bad Love to fans of Winger who have missed it since Forget Paris in 1995. But even then, I would recommend waiting for the DVD release and jumping straight to its scenes.

text: glizty but formulaic and silly . . . cagney 's 'top of the world ' has been replaced by the bottom of the barrel .
translation: brillant mais formuleic et ridicule . . . le 'sommet du monde' de Cagney a été remplacé par le fond du baril.
back_translation: brilliant but formulaic and ridiculous... Cagney's 'peak of the world' has been replaced by the bottom of the barrel.

text: too loud , too long and too frantic by half , die another day suggests that the bond franchise has run into a creative wall that 007 can not fly over , tunnel under or barrel through .
translation: trop fort, trop long et trop frénétique à moitié, Die Another Day suggère que la franchise Bond a rencontré un mur créatif que 007 ne peut ni survoler, ni creuser en dessous, ni franchir en force.
back_translation: Too strong, too long, and too frenetic at times, Die Another Day suggests that the Bond franchise has hit a creative wall that 007 cannot fly over, dig under, or break through.

text: back home , he encounters a place which no longer exists .
translation: de retour chez lui, il découvre un endroit qui n'existe plus.

text: it 's a smart , funny look at an arcane area of popular culture , and if it is n't entirely persuasive , it does give exposure to some talented performers .
translation: C'est un regard intelligent et drôle sur un domaine obscure de la culture populaire, et même s'il n'est pas entièrement convaincant, il met en lumière quelques artistes talentueux.
back_translation: It is an intelligent and funny look at an obscure area of popular culture, and even though it is not entirely convincing, it highlights some talented artists.

text: as both marly and desiree grapple with the sometimes overwhelming weight of family history and family expectations , and wrestle with questions of love , duty and responsibility , the tale offers a portrait of two women , two families , and two communities standing on the brink of change .
translation: Alors que Marly et Désirée luttent contre le poids parfois écrasant de l'histoire familiale et des attentes familiales, et se débattent avec des questions d'amour, de devoir et de responsabilité, le récit propose un portrait de deux femmes, de deux familles et de deux communautés au bord du changement.
back_translation: As Marly and Désirée struggle against the sometimes overwhelming weight of family history and expectations, grappling with issues of love, duty, and responsibility, the narrative offers a portrait of two women, two families, and two communities on the brink of change.

text: as with so many merchandised-to-the-max movies of this type , more time appears to have gone into recruiting the right bands for the playlist and the costuming of the stars than into the script , which has a handful of smart jokes and not much else .
translation: Comme avec tant de films de ce type maximisés en termes de merchandising, il semble qu'on ait consacré plus de temps à recruter les bons groupes pour la playlist et à costumer les stars qu'à l'écriture du scénario, qui comporte quelques blagues intelligentes mais pas grand-chose d'autre.
back_translation: As with so many films of this type maximized in terms of merchandising, it seems that more time was spent on recruiting the right groups for the playlist and dressing up the stars than on writing the script, which has a few clever jokes but not much else.

back_translation: Serry does an excellent job of capturing the era's atmosphere and, perhaps unwittingly, tying it to what is happening in America in 2002. However, hard-to-believe plot twists derail the film in its last half hour.

translation: L'équipage du sous-marin, dirigé par le capitaine inflexible Alexi Vostrikov, se bat contre la montre pour prévenir une catastrophe nucléaire semblable à celle de Tchernobyl qui menace non seulement la vie de son équipage, mais a également le potentiel de déclencher une guerre mondiale entre les superpuissances.

text: though howard demonstrates a great eye as a director , this southern gothic drama is sadly a tough sit , with an undeveloped narrative and enough flashbacks and heavy-handed metaphors to choke a horse -- or at least slow him down to a canter .
translation: Bien que Howard démontre un grand talent en tant que réalisateur, ce drame gothique du sud est malheureusement difficile à regarder, avec une narration peu développée et suffisamment de flashbacks et de métaphores lourdes pour étouffer un cheval - ou du moins le ralentir au trot.
back_translation: Although Howard demonstrates great talent as a director, this Southern gothic drama is unfortunately difficult to watch, with underdeveloped storytelling and enough flashbacks and heavy metaphors to choke a horse - or at least slow it to a trot.

text: time changer may not be the most memorable cinema session but its profound self-evaluation message about our fragile existence and the absence of spiritual guidance should at least invade an abundance of mindsets
translation: Le film "Time Changer" n'est peut-être pas la séance de cinéma la plus mémorable, mais son message profond sur notre existence fragile et l'absence de guidance spirituelle devrait au moins envahir une abondance d'états d'esprit.

text: aka birdseye is the saga of an obsessive colorado sheriff and his trusting teenage son , who risk it all when their twisted reconstruction of a mysterious kidnapping case escalates into a dangerous hunt for a mythical swiss criminal .

text: this is the story of a pot-smoking , free-wheeling los angeles record producer ( mcdormand ) , with a rock star boyfriend ( nivola ) , whose straight-laced son ( bale ) comes back home after graduation from harvard medical school with his rich fianc & # 233 ; ( beckinsale ) , who 's working on a book .

back_translation: It's the story of a record producer from Los Angeles, a cannabis smoker and free spirit (McDormand), with a rock star boyfriend (Nivola), whose uptight son (Bale) comes home after graduating from Harvard Medical School with his wealthy fiancée (Beckinsale), who is working on a book.

text: it 's too harsh to work as a piece of storytelling , but as an intellectual exercise -- an unpleasant debate that 's been given the drive of a narrative and that 's been acted out -- the believer is nothing less than a provocative piece of work .
translation: C'est trop sévère pour fonctionner comme un récit, mais en tant qu'exercice intellectuel - un débat désagréable qui a été donné à la dynamique d'une narration et qui a été mis en scène - le croyant n'est rien de moins qu'une œuvre provocante.

text: `` washington heights `` tells the story of carlos ramirez , a young illustrator burning to escape the latino neighborhood of the same name to make a splash in new york city 's commercial downtown comic book scene .
translation: ``Washington Heights`` raconte l'histoire de Carlos Ramirez, un jeune illustrateur désireux d'échapper au quartier latino du même nom pour faire sensation dans le milieu des bandes dessinées commerciales du centre-ville de New York.
back_translation: "Washington Heights" tells the story of Carlos Ramirez, a young illustrator eager to escape the Latino neighborhood of the same name to make a splash in the commercial comic scene of downtown New York.

text: terry , a spoilt brat is just too lazy a student .

text: when his wayward sister , kassie ( kerry washington ) , goes missing eddie burns finds himself subjected to a fiendish and ingenious campaign of revenge by the mysterious charlie strom ( gary oldman ) .
translation: Lorsque sa sœur indisciplinée, Kassie (Kerry Washington), disparaît, Eddie Burns se retrouve soumis à une campagne de vengeance diabolique et ingénieuse de la part du mystérieux Charlie Strom (Gary Oldman).
back_translation: When his unruly sister, Kassie (Kerry Washington), goes missing, Eddie Burns finds himself subjected to a diabolical and ingenious revenge campaign from the mysterious Charlie Strom (Gary Oldman).

text: however a school teacher warned the train , so the gang and all the others in the pub ended up in a shootout with scores of policemen .

back_translation: However, a teacher warned the train, so the gang and everyone else in the pub found themselves in a shootout with dozens of police officers.

text: a coming-of-age tale from new zealand whose boozy , languid air is balanced by a rich visual clarity and deeply felt performances across the board .

back_translation: An initiatory tale from New Zealand, whose ethereal and languorous atmosphere is balanced by rich visual clarity and deeply felt performances from everyone.

text: several years after his release , his drug-using father manny comes back into his life and kilo reluctantly welcomes him back with a job overseeing all of his drug runners .

text: this film is based on `` our sunshine `` by robert drew , a novel based on the life of australian bushranger and icon , ned kelly .

text: to honestly address the flaws inherent in how medical aid is made available to american workers , a more balanced or fair portrayal of both sides will be needed .

text: from her complex and enduring relationship with her mentor and husband to her illicit and controversial affair with leon trotsky , to her provocative and romantic entanglements with women , frida kahlo lived a bold and uncompromising life as a political , artistic , and sexual revolutionary .
translation: De sa relation complexe et durable avec son mentor et mari à sa liaison illicite et controversée avec Léon Trotsky, en passant par ses entremêlements provocateurs et romantiques avec des femmes, Frida Kahlo a mené une vie audacieuse et sans compromis en tant que révolutionnaire politique, artistique et sexuelle.
back_translation: From her complex and enduring relationship with her mentor and husband to her illicit and controversial affair with Léon Trotsky, while going through her provocative and romantic entanglements with women, Frida Kahlo led a bold and uncompromising life as a political, artistic, and sexual revolutionary.

text: though it is by no means his best work , laissez-passer is a distinguished and distinctive effort by a bona-fide master , a fascinating film replete with rewards to be had by all willing to make the effort to reap them .
translation: Bien qu'il ne s'agisse en aucun cas de son meilleur travail, Laissez-passer est un effort distingué et distinctif d'un véritable maître, un film fascinant riche en récompenses pour tous ceux qui sont prêts à faire l'effort de les récolter.
back_translation: Although it is by no means his best work, Laissez-passer is a distinguished and distinctive effort from a true master, a fascinating film rich in rewards for all those willing to make the effort to reap them.

translation: leur mission : en utilisant une part égale de compétence et d'humour, capturer Arnold Gundars, l'un des plus grands trafiquants d'armes illégales au monde, et contrecarrer ses plans traîtres pour l'avion.

text: calvin ( cube ) , who inherited the struggling business from his deceased father , views the shop as nothing but a burden and waste of his time .
translation: Calvin (cube), qui a hérité de l'entreprise en difficulté de son père décédé, considère la boutique comme rien d'autre qu'un fardeau et une perte de temps.
back_translation: Calvin (cube), who inherited his late father's struggling business, sees the shop as nothing more than a burden and a waste of time.

text: failing cartoon writer , millard mudd , has sunk deep into one .
translation: un scénariste de dessins animés en difficulté, Millard Mudd, s'est enfoncé profondément dans l'un d'eux.
back_translation: A struggling cartoon screenwriter, Millard Mudd, has become deeply entrenched in one of them.

text: . . . an hour-and-a-half of inoffensive , unmemorable filler .
translation: ... une heure et demie de remplissage inoffensif et inoubliable.
back_translation: ... an hour and a half of harmless and unforgettable filling.

text: as gamely as the movie tries to make sense of its title character , there remains a huge gap between the film 's creepy , clean-cut dahmer ( jeremy renner ) and fiendish acts that no amount of earnest textbook psychologizing can bridge .
translation: Aussi courageusement que le film essaie de donner un sens à son personnage titular, il reste un énorme fossé entre le Dahmer effrayant et soigné (Jeremy Renner) du film et les actes diaboliques qu'aucune quantité de psychologisation érudite ne peut combler.
back_translation: As bravely as the film tries to make sense of its titular character, there remains a huge gap between the frightening and polished Dahmer (Jeremy Renner) in the film and the diabolical acts that no amount of scholarly psychologizing can bridge.

text: for those with the stomach and stamina for its heartbeat-quickening intensity and body-slamming action , rollerball delivers exactly what it promises : a people 's hero you can really get behind .
translation: Pour ceux qui ont le cœur et l'endurance nécessaires pour son intensité à couper le souffle et son action percutante, Rollerball offre exactement ce qu'il promet : un héros du peuple que vous pouvez réellement soutenir.
back_translation: For those who have the heart and endurance necessary for its breathtaking intensity and impactful action, Rollerball delivers exactly what it promises: a hero of the people that you can truly support.

text: goes some way towards explaining how the tragedy occurred and its enduring legacy today .
translation: explique en partie comment la tragédie s'est produite et son legs durable aujourd'hui.
back_translation: explain in part how the tragedy occurred and its lasting legacy today.

text: focuses on joan 's raging hormones and sledgehammers the audience with spanish inquisitions about her `` madness `` so much that i became mad that i wasted 123 minutes and $ 9 . 50 on this 21st century torture device .
translation: se concentre sur les hormones enragées de Joan et martèle le public avec des inquisiteurs espagnols sur sa "folie" à tel point que je suis devenu fou d'avoir gaspillé 123 minutes et 9,50 $ sur cet appareil de torture du 21e siècle.
back_translation: focuses on Joan's raging hormones and pounds the audience with Spanish inquisitors about her "madness" to the point that I went insane for wasting 123 minutes and $9.50 on this 21st-century torture device.

text: in visual fertility treasure planet rivals the top japanese animations of recent vintage .
translation: Dans le domaine de la fertilité visuelle, Trésor Planète rivalise avec les meilleures animations japonaises récentes.
back_translation: In the field of visual fertility, Treasure Planet competes with the best recent Japanese animations.

text: danny , who gets paranoid and makes a scene while they watch `` der lift `` ( a black & # 38 ; white german horror movie ) and hallucinates about being the actor in the film ( ricardo mamood ) , has not the courage to face a girl half his age .
translation: Danny, qui devient paranoïaque et fait une scène pendant qu'ils regardent "Der Lift" (un film d'horreur allemand en noir et blanc) et hallucine sur le fait d'être l'acteur dans le film (Ricardo Mamood), n'a pas le courage de faire face à une fille de la moitié de son âge.
back_translation: Danny, who becomes paranoid and creates a scene while they watch "Der Lift" (a German black-and-white horror film) and hallucinates about being the actor in the film (Ricardo Mamood), does not have the courage to confront a girl half his age.

text: brad , an art student hoping to win a prestigious fellowship , finds his life and career turned upside down when he falls for a faculty member at his college , lisa ducharme , who just happens to be his girlfriend 's thesis adviser . . .
translation: Brad, un étudiant en art espérant obtenir une bourse prestigieuse, voit sa vie et sa carrière bouleversées lorsqu'il tombe amoureux d'un membre du corps professoral de son collège, Lisa Ducharme, qui se trouve être la directrice de thèse de sa petite amie...
back_translation: Brad, an art student hoping to obtain a prestigious scholarship, sees his life and career turned upside down when he falls in love with a faculty member at his college, Lisa Ducharme, who happens to be the thesis advisor of his girlfriend...

text: from then on , patricia rises immediately to stardom .
translation: À partir de ce moment-là, Patricia accède immédiatement à la célébrité.
back_translation: From that moment on, Patricia immediately gained celebrity status.

text: samantha is then forced to question her own place in the shark-eat-shark world of ambition and power where truth is ever elusive , enemies wear a friend 's face and the stakes are nothing less than life or death .
translation: Samantha est alors forcée de remettre en question sa propre place dans le monde impitoyable de l'ambition et du pouvoir où la vérité est toujours insaisissable, les ennemis arborent le visage d'un ami et les enjeux ne sont rien de moins que la vie ou la mort.
back_translation: Samantha is then forced to question her own place in the ruthless world of ambition and power where the truth is always elusive, enemies wear the face of a friend, and the stakes are nothing less than life or death.

text: certainly no biopic , nijinsky is short on facts , but long on expression .
translation: certainement pas un biopic, Nijinsky manque de faits, mais est riche en expression.
back_translation: Certainly not a biopic, Nijinsky lacks facts but is rich in expression.

text: little ella 's birthright is the gift - and curse - of obedience .
translation: le droit de naissance de petite Ella est le don - et la malédiction - de l'obéissance.
back_translation: The birthright of little Ella is the gift - and the curse - of obedience.

text: . . . hopefully it 'll be at the dollar theatres by the time christmas rolls around . wait to see it then .
translation: ... j'espère qu'il sera dans les cinémas à un dollar d'ici Noël. J'attendrai pour le voir à ce moment-là.
back_translation: ... I hope it will be in the dollar theaters by Christmas. I will wait to see it then.

text: a former eastern germany secret agent runs away fron his past and lands in m & # 233 ; xico under a fake identity .
translation: un ancien agent secret de l'est de l'Allemagne s'enfuit de son passé et atterrit au Mexique sous une fausse identité.
back_translation: A former secret agent from East Germany flees his past and lands in Mexico under a false identity.

text: it 's too long , too repetitive , and takes way too many years to resolve to be a total winner .
translation: c'est trop long, trop répétitif, et cela prend beaucoup trop d'années à se résoudre pour être un véritable gagnant.
back_translation: It's too long, too repetitive, and it takes way too many years to resolve to be a true winner.

text: there is simply not enough of interest onscreen to sustain its seventy-minute running time .
translation: il n'y a tout simplement pas assez d'intérêt à l'écran pour soutenir sa durée de soixante-dix minutes.
back_translation: There simply isn’t enough interest on screen to sustain its seventy-minute duration.

text: by the time its otherwise paint-by-numbers story reaches a finale , drumline has made band seem cool -- no small feat in the wake of american pie 2 .
translation: Au moment où son histoire autrement prévisible atteint une conclusion, Drumline a réussi à rendre les orchestres cool, ce qui n'est pas une mince affaire après American Pie 2.
back_translation: At the moment when its otherwise predictable story reaches a conclusion, Drumline has succeeded in making marching bands cool, which is no small feat after American Pie 2.

text: the characters . . . are paper-thin , and their personalities undergo radical changes when it suits the script .
translation: les personnages . . . sont d'une minceur papier, et leur personnalité subit des changements radicaux quand cela convient au scénario.
back_translation: The characters... are as thin as paper, and their personalities undergo radical changes when it suits the plot.

text: a young idealistic priest in northern ireland has his faith put to the test when he is faced with the ultimate moral dilemma .
translation: un jeune prêtre idéaliste en Irlande du Nord voit sa foi mise à l'épreuve lorsqu'il est confronté au dilemme moral ultime.
back_translation: A young idealistic priest in Northern Ireland sees his faith put to the test when he faces the ultimate moral dilemma.

text: an efficient , exceedingly likable family film about orphans and sports that comes with equal doses of sentimentality , corny jokes and life lessons .
translation: un film familial efficace et extrêmement sympathique sur les orphelins et le sport qui apporte des doses égales de sentimentalité, de blagues ringardes et de leçons de vie.
back_translation: An effective and extremely likable family film about orphans and sports that delivers equal doses of sentimentality, corny jokes, and life lessons.

text: as bob the tomato and the kids settle in to wait for a tow truck to help get their van back on the road , the `` pirates who do n't do anything `` share a little story about a guy named jonah .
translation: Alors que Bob le tomate et les enfants s'installent pour attendre un dépanneuse afin de remettre leur fourgonnette sur la route, les « pirates qui ne font rien » partagent une petite histoire sur un gars nommé Jonas.
back_translation: As Bob the Tomato and the kids settle in to wait for a tow truck to get their van back on the road, the "lazy pirates" share a little story about a guy named Jonah.

text: while treating a homicide detective for smoking , hypnotherapist michael strother has a telepathic vision of a young girl floating beneath the surface of a stream .
translation: Alors qu'il traite un détective des homicides pour son tabagisme, l'hypnothérapeute Michael Strother a une vision télépathique d'une jeune fille flottant sous la surface d'un ruisseau.
back_translation: While treating a homicide detective for his smoking habit, the hypnotherapist Michael Strother has a telepathic vision of a young girl floating beneath the surface of a stream.

text: the case is re-opened when two more bodies are discovered , both pregnant women .
translation: l'affaire est rouverte lorsque deux autres corps sont découverts, toutes deux des femmes enceintes.
back_translation: The case is reopened when two other bodies are discovered, both of them pregnant women.

text: young is a tribute to the nobility of those men under fire , their common acts of uncommon valor , and their loyalty to and love for one another .
translation: young est un hommage à la noblesse de ces hommes sous le feu, à leurs actes communs de courage exceptionnel, et à leur loyauté et leur amour les uns pour les autres.
back_translation: Young is a tribute to the nobility of these men under fire, to their shared acts of exceptional courage, and to their loyalty and love for one another.

text: six of the nations brightest spoken word artists came together in new orleans on september 2 , to begin a life transforming journey to new york city for the memorial anniversary of september 11 .
translation: Six des artistes de spoken word les plus brillants de la nation se sont réunis à La Nouvelle-Orléans le 2 septembre pour commencer un voyage transformateur vers New York pour l'anniversaire commémoratif du 11 septembre.
back_translation: Six of the nation's brightest spoken word artists came together in New Orleans on September 2 to begin a transformative journey to New York for the 9/11 memorial anniversary.

text: both lead performances are oscar-size . quaid is utterly fearless as the tortured husband living a painful lie , and moore wonderfully underplays the long-suffering heroine with an unflappable '50s dignity somewhere between jane wyman and june cleaver .
translation: Les deux performances principales sont de taille oscarienne. Quaid est totalement intrépide en tant que mari torturé vivant un mensonge douloureux, et Moore interprète merveilleusement la héroïne longtemps souffrante avec une dignité inébranlable des années 50, quelque part entre Jane Wyman et June Cleaver.
back_translation: The two main performances are of Oscar-worthy caliber. Quaid is completely fearless as the tortured husband living a painful lie, and Moore wonderfully portrays the long-suffering heroine with an unshakeable dignity from the 1950s, somewhere between Jane Wyman and June Cleaver.

text: they 're jewish , they 're grandmothers , and they 're lesbians .
translation: elles sont juives, elles sont grands-mères et elles sont lesbiennes.
back_translation: They are Jewish, they are grandmothers, and they are lesbians.

text: i wo n't argue with anyone who calls 'slackers ' dumb , insulting , or childish . . . but i laughed so much that i did n't mind .
translation: Je ne débattrai pas avec quiconque qui qualifie les "fainéants" de stupides, insultants ou puérils... mais j'ai tellement ri que ça ne m'a pas dérangé.
back_translation: I will not debate with anyone who describes "lazy people" as stupid, insulting, or childish... but I laughed so much that it didn't bother me.

text: a well-done film of a self-reflexive , philosophical nature .
translation: un film bien réalisé d'une nature auto-réflexive et philosophique.
back_translation: a well-made film of a self-reflective and philosophical nature.

text: as they try to keep one step ahead of peter , it becomes clear that there is someone else in the woods , someone who is watching them all .
translation: Alors qu'ils essaient de garder une longueur d'avance sur Peter, il devient clair qu'il y a quelqu'un d'autre dans les bois, quelqu'un qui les observe tous.
back_translation: As they try to stay one step ahead of Peter, it becomes clear that there is someone else in the woods, someone who is watching them all.

text: the two leads , nearly perfect in their roles , bring a heart and reality that buoy the film , and at times , elevate it to a superior crime movie .
translation: les deux acteurs principaux, quasi parfaits dans leurs rôles, apportent une émotion et une réalité qui soutiennent le film et, par moments, le rehaussent à un niveau supérieur de film criminel.
back_translation: The two main actors, almost perfect in their roles, bring an emotion and a reality that support the film and, at times, elevate it to a higher level of crime film.

text: whether or not ram dass proves as clear and reliable an authority on that as he was about inner consciousness , fierce grace reassures us that he will once again be an honest and loving one .
translation: que Ram Dass soit un auteur aussi clair et fiable à ce sujet qu'il l'était sur la conscience intérieure, Fierce Grace nous rassure qu'il sera à nouveau un écrivain honnête et aimant.
back_translation: That Ram Dass is an author as clear and reliable on this subject as he was on inner consciousness, Fierce Grace reassures us that he will once again be an honest and loving writer.

text: when starla is forced to quit the cheerleading squad after getting some bad grads , genevieve moves in to take her place .
translation: Lorsque Starla est contrainte de quitter l'équipe de cheerleading après avoir obtenu de mauvaises notes, Geneviève prend sa place.
back_translation: When Starla is forced to leave the cheerleading team after receiving bad grades, Geneviève takes her place.

text: when jack rebuffs charlie 's alcoholic advances , an enemy is born .
translation: Lorsque Jack repousse les avances alcooliques de Charlie, un ennemi est né.
back_translation: When Jack rebuffs Charlie's drunken advances, an enemy is born.

text: then from 1983 to 1984 , the `` stander gang `` ( stander , alan heyl & # 38 ; patrick mccall ) rob as many as four banks a day .
translation: Puis, de 1983 à 1984, le « gang Stander » (Stander, Alan Heyl et Patrick McCall) vole jusqu'à quatre banques par jour.
back_translation: Then, from 1983 to 1984, the "Stander gang" (Stander, Alan Heyl, and Patrick McCall) robbed up to four banks a day.

text: it 's one of the most honest films ever made about hollywood .
translation: C'est l'un des films les plus honnêtes jamais réalisés sur Hollywood.
back_translation: It's one of the most honest films ever made about Hollywood.

text: the entire movie is filled with deja vu moments .
translation: tout le film est rempli de moments de déjà-vu.
back_translation: The whole movie is filled with moments of déjà vu.

text: joe is beaten up by some of johnny 's buddies as a sign to leave him alone , and with this final act of freedom , johnny leaves the world of pool-sharking .
translation: Joe est battu par certains des amis de Johnny comme signe de le laisser tranquille, et avec ce dernier acte de liberté, Johnny quitte le monde des arnaques au billard.
back_translation: Joe is beaten by some of Johnny's friends as a sign to leave him alone, and with this last act of freedom, Johnny leaves the world of pool hustles.

text: a dark , quirky road movie that constantly defies expectation .
translation: un film de route sombre et excentrique qui défie constamment les attentes.
back_translation: a dark and eccentric road movie that constantly defies expectations.

text: even with all those rough edges safely sanded down , the american insomnia is still pretty darned good .
translation: même avec tous ces bords rugueux soigneusement poncés, l'insomnie américaine est quand même plutôt bonne.
back_translation: Even with all these carefully sanded rough edges, American insomnia is still quite good.

text: we weave in and out of eight defective lives and go for a turbulent mental ride where lilli 's reality spirals out of control and we 're lead to an unforgettable climax where some fall apart and some piece themselves together .
translation: Nous naviguons à travers huit vies défectueuses et vivons une expérience mentale tumultueuse où la réalité de Lilli devient incontrôlable, et nous sommes conduits vers un climax inoubliable où certains s'effondrent et d'autres se recomposent.
back_translation: We navigate through eight flawed lives and experience a tumultuous mental journey where Lilli's reality becomes uncontrollable, leading us to an unforgettable climax where some collapse and others recombine.

text: filmmaker tian zhuangzhuang triumphantly returns to narrative filmmaking with a visually masterful work of quiet power .
translation: Le cinéaste Tian Zhuangzhuang fait un retour triomphant à la réalisation de films narratifs avec une œuvre visuellement magistrale de puissance tranquille.
back_translation: Filmmaker Tian Zhuangzhuang makes a triumphant return to directing narrative films with a visually masterful work of quiet power.

text: a slick new york publicist ( farrell ) who picks up a ringing receiver in a phone booth is told that if he hangs up , he 'll be killed . . .
translation: un publiciste new-yorkais élégant (Farrell) qui répond à un téléphone dans une cabine se voit dire que s'il raccroche, il sera tué...
back_translation: An elegant New York publicist (Farrell) who answers a phone in a booth is told that if he hangs up, he will be killed...

text: sam and ash become good friends as they fight to save celebi from the new team rocket villain , the iron-masked marauder and his darkball , which turns pok & # 233 ; mon evil and augments their powers to the maximum .
translation: Sam et Ash deviennent de bons amis alors qu'ils luttent pour sauver Celebi du nouveau méchant de la Team Rocket, le maraudeur masqué de fer et sa balle sombre, qui rend les Pokémon maléfiques et augmente leurs pouvoirs au maximum.
back_translation: Sam and Ash become good friends as they struggle to save Celebi from the new villain of Team Rocket, the masked iron marauder and his dark ball, which makes Pokémon evil and maximizes their powers.

text: 'enigma ' is the kind of engaging historical drama that hollywood appears to have given up on in favor of sentimental war movies in the vein of 'we were soldiers . '
translation: 'Enigma' est le type de drame historique captivant que Hollywood semble avoir abandonné au profit de films de guerre sentimentaux dans la lignée de 'Nous étions soldats'.
back_translation: 'Enigma' is the type of captivating historical drama that Hollywood seems to have abandoned in favor of sentimental war films like 'We Were Soldiers'.

text: a turkish fortune-teller predicts that the girl will convalesce if somebody sacrifices his life for her .
translation: Une voyante turque prédit que la fille se remettra si quelqu'un sacrifie sa vie pour elle.
back_translation: A Turkish fortune-teller predicts that the girl will recover if someone sacrifices their life for her.

text: the trinity assembly approaches the endeavor with a shocking lack of irony , and george ratliff 's documentary , hell house , reflects their earnestness M-^W which makes for a terrifying film .
translation: L'assemblée de la trinité aborde l'entreprise avec un choc d'ironie, et le documentaire de George Ratliff, Hell House, reflète leur sérieux, ce qui en fait un film terrifiant.
back_translation: The Trinity Assembly approaches the enterprise with a shock of irony, and George Ratliff's documentary, Hell House, reflects their seriousness, making it a terrifying film.

text: this is especialy true when he makes a special connection at a hollywood industry party .
translation: C'est particulièrement vrai lorsqu'il établit une connexion spéciale lors d'une fête de l'industrie hollywoodienne.
back_translation: This is particularly true when he establishes a special connection during a Hollywood industry party.

text: a triumph , a film that hews out a world and carries us effortlessly from darkness to light .
translation: un triomphe, un film qui façonne un monde et nous entraîne sans effort des ténèbres vers la lumière.
back_translation: a triumph, a film that shapes a world and effortlessly leads us from darkness to light.

text: the originally noble motive rapidly degenerated into an orgy of bloodletting and terror .
translation: le motif noble à l'origine a rapidement dégénéré en une orgie de sang et de terreur.
back_translation: The noble motive quickly degenerated into an orgy of blood and terror.

text: as this bizarro weekend unfolds , we see exactly what adam has to do to preserve his sanity and his friendships .
translation: Alors que ce week-end bizarre se déroule, nous voyons exactement ce qu'Adam doit faire pour préserver sa santé mentale et ses amitiés.
back_translation: As this strange weekend unfolds, we see exactly what Adam needs to do to preserve his mental health and friendships.

text: despite its flaws . . . belinsky is still able to create an engaging story that keeps you guessing at almost every turn .
translation: malgré ses défauts . . . belinski parvient tout de même à créer une histoire captivante qui vous tient en haleine à presque chaque tournant.
back_translation: Despite its flaws, Belinski still manages to create a captivating story that keeps you on the edge of your seat at almost every turn.

text: when taraneh discovers she is pregnant she decides against all advice and intense social pressure , to keep the baby .
translation: Lorsque Taraneh découvre qu'elle est enceinte, elle décide, contre tous les conseils et la forte pression sociale, de garder le bébé.
back_translation: When Taraneh discovers that she is pregnant, she decides, against all advice and strong social pressure, to keep the baby.

text: he begins to spread the gospel of communal ideals , which he has absorbed during his travels in india .
translation: Il commence à répandre l'évangile des idéaux communautaires, qu'il a absorbés lors de ses voyages en Inde.
back_translation: He begins to spread the gospel of community ideals, which he absorbed during his travels in India.

text: where the trail ends , terror begins soft-spoken 15-year old leland fitzgerald ( gosling ) commits a seemingly senseless murder that shocks his community , affecting both his victim 's family and his own .
translation: là où le sentier se termine, la terreur commence. Leland Fitzgerald, un adolescent de 15 ans à la voix douce (Gosling), commet un meurtre apparemment insensé qui choque sa communauté, affectant à la fois la famille de sa victime et la sienne.
back_translation: Where the path ends, terror begins. Leland Fitzgerald, a 15-year-old with a soft voice (Gosling), commits an apparently senseless murder that shocks his community, affecting both the family of his victim and his own.

text: but tongue-in-cheek preposterousness has always been part of for the most part wilde 's droll whimsy helps `` being earnest `` overcome its weaknesses and parker 's creative interference . . .
translation: mais le ridicule grinçant a toujours fait partie de la plupart des plaisanteries farfelues de Wilde, aidant « L'Importance d'être sérieux » à surmonter ses faiblesses et l'interférence créative de Parker...
back_translation: but the biting ridicule has always been a part of most of Wilde's whimsical jokes, helping "The Importance of Being Earnest" to overcome its weaknesses and Parker's creative interference...

text: it 's supposed to be a romantic comedy - it suffers from too much norma rae and not enough pretty woman .
translation: C'est censé être une comédie romantique - il souffre de trop de Norma Rae et pas assez de Pretty Woman.
back_translation: It's supposed to be a romantic comedy - it suffers from too much Norma Rae and not enough Pretty Woman.

text: if you 're an extreme sports fan , this is probably a must own dvd .
translation: Si vous êtes un fan de sports extrêmes, c'est probablement un DVD incontournable.
back_translation: If you are a fan of extreme sports, this is probably a must-have DVD.

text: a playful iranian parable about openness , particularly the need for people of diverse political perspectives to get along despite their ideological differences .
translation: Une parabole iranienne ludique sur l'ouverture, en particulier la nécessité pour des personnes ayant des perspectives politiques diverses de s'entendre malgré leurs différences idéologiques.
back_translation: A playful Iranian parable about openness, particularly the need for people with diverse political perspectives to come to an understanding despite their ideological differences.

text: arriving in the us with a phony passport , she was imprisoned by the ins for one year while her asylum case was being tried .
translation: Arrivant aux États-Unis avec un passeport faux, elle a été emprisonnée par l'INS pendant un an pendant que son affaire d'asile était jugée.
back_translation: Arriving in the United States with a false passport, she was imprisoned by the INS for a year while her asylum case was being adjudicated.

text: nadine works there as a prostitute though she is married with children , hannah keeps the appointment book , christie is an actress who has been cast as a prostitute and must learn the ins and outs , and josephine is a student who is forced into it for economical reasons .
translation: Nadine y travaille comme prostituée bien qu'elle soit mariée et mère de famille, Hannah tient le livre des rendez-vous, Christie est une actrice qui a été choisie pour jouer le rôle d'une prostituée et doit apprendre les tenants et les aboutissants, et Joséphine est une étudiante qui y est contrainte pour des raisons économiques.
back_translation: Nadine works there as a prostitute even though she is married and a mother of a family, Hannah keeps the appointment book, Christie is an actress who has been chosen to play the role of a prostitute and must learn the ins and outs, and Joséphine is a student who is forced to do it for economic reasons.

text: `` sumo east and west `` takes us into this world through the story of wayne vierra of hawaii , aka kamakiiwa , a former professional sumo wrestler in japan whose pro career was cut short by injury , but who rebounded to become a champion in the growing world of amateur sumo .
translation: `` sumo est et ouest `` nous plonge dans cet univers à travers l'histoire de Wayne Vierra d'Hawaï, alias Kamakiiwa, un ancien lutteur de sumo professionnel au Japon dont la carrière professionnelle a été interrompue par une blessure, mais qui a su rebondir pour devenir champion dans le monde en pleine expansion du sumo amateur.
back_translation: ``Sumo is both east and west`` immerses us in this universe through the story of Wayne Vierra from Hawaii, also known as Kamakiiwa, a former professional sumo wrestler in Japan whose professional career was interrupted by an injury, but who managed to bounce back to become a champion in the rapidly expanding world of amateur sumo.

text: as `` daddy day care `` starts to catch on , it launches them into a comedic rivalry with the chapman academy tough-as-nails director , ms . harridan ( anjelica huston ) .
translation: Alors que "Daddy Day Care" commence à prendre de l'ampleur, cela les entraîne dans une rivalité comique avec la directrice intraitable de l'académie Chapman, Mme Harridan (Anjelica Huston).
back_translation: As "Daddy Day Care" begins to gain momentum, it leads them into a comedic rivalry with the uncompromising director of Chapman Academy, Mrs. Harridan (Anjelica Huston).

text: stupid , infantile , redundant , sloppy , over-the-top , and amateurish . yep , it 's `` waking up in reno . `` go back to sleep .
translation: stupide, infantile, redondant, négligé, exagéré et amateur. Oui, c'est "se réveiller à Reno." Retourne te coucher.
back_translation: stupid, childish, redundant, neglected, exaggerated, and amateurish. Yes, it's "waking up in Reno." Go back to bed.

text: this is pure , exciting moviemaking . you wo n't exactly know what 's happening but you 'll be blissfully exhausted .
translation: c'est un pur et excitant filmmaking. vous ne saurez pas exactement ce qui se passe mais vous serez délicieusement épuisé.
back_translation: It's pure and exciting filmmaking. You won't know exactly what's going on, but you'll be delightfully exhausted.

text: john , and world-famous ice skating star , elena , are about to sign divorce papers when they realise that , in spite of everything happening around them , their love is worth fighting for .

back_translation: The film has the polished shine and high-octane thrills you expect from De Palma, but what makes it transcendent is that it is also one of the most intelligent and enjoyable expressions of pure love for cinema from an American director in years.
