text: when a storm leaves the two shipwrecked on a deserted island , however , the tables suddenly turn . . .
translation: Lorsqu'une tempête laisse les deux naufragés sur une île déserte, cependant, les choses tournent soudainement...
back_translation: When a storm leaves the two castaways on a deserted island, however, things suddenly take a turn...

text: is this love or is it masochism ? binoche makes it interesting trying to find out .
translation: Est-ce de l'amour ou est-ce du masochisme ? Binoche rend cela intéressant en essayant de le découvrir.
back_translation: Is it love or is it masochism? Binoche makes it interesting by trying to find out.

text: every time you look , sweet home alabama is taking another bummer of a wrong turn .
translation: Chaque fois que tu regardes, Sweet Home Alabama prend un autre virage malheureux.
back_translation: Every time you watch, Sweet Home Alabama takes another unfortunate turn.

text: he grew up in the lush village of taj sonapur , where he spent his childhood , indulged by his lovely playmate paro ( aishwarya ) .
translation: Il a grandi dans le village verdoyant de Taj Sonapur, où il a passé son enfance, choyé par sa charmante camarade de jeu Paro (Aishwarya).
back_translation: He grew up in the green village of Taj Sonapur, where he spent his childhood, pampered by his charming playmate Paro (Aishwarya).

text: a moving essay about the specter of death , especially suicide .
translation: un essai touchant sur le spectre de la mort, en particulier le suicide.
back_translation: A touching essay on the specter of death, particularly suicide.

text: personal velocity ought to be exploring these women 's inner lives , but it never moves beyond their surfaces .
translation: la vélocité personnelle devrait explorer la vie intérieure de ces femmes, mais elle ne dépasse jamais leur surface.
back_translation: Personal velocity should explore the inner lives of these women, but it never goes beyond their surface.

text: he comes to the terrible realization that he has never held his mothers right hand .
translation: il prend conscience avec horreur qu'il n'a jamais tenu la main droite de sa mère.
back_translation: He realizes with horror that he has never held his mother's right hand.

text: based on a true story , the blue butterfly tells the story of a terminally ill 10-year-old boy whose dream is to catch the most beautiful butterfly on earth , the mythic and elusive blue morpho .
translation: Basé sur une histoire vraie, Le Papillon Bleu raconte l'histoire d'un garçon de 10 ans en phase terminale dont le rêve est de capturer le plus beau papillon du monde, le mythique et insaisissable morpho bleu.
back_translation: Based on a true story, The Blue Butterfly tells the story of a 10-year-old boy in the terminal stage whose dream is to capture the most beautiful butterfly in the world, the mythical and elusive blue morpho.

text: as the sisters approach the end of an era , and the end of an order , they search their souls in an examination of their life 's work .
translation: Alors que les sœurs approchent de la fin d'une époque et de la fin d'un ordre, elles plongent dans leur âme pour examiner le travail de leur vie.
back_translation: As the sisters approach the end of an era and the end of an order, they delve into their souls to examine the work of their lives.

text: making such a tragedy the backdrop to a love story risks trivializing it , though chouraqui no doubt intended the film to affirm love 's power to help people endure almost unimaginable horror .
translation: Faire d'une telle tragédie le décor d'une histoire d'amour risque de la banaliser, bien que Chouraqui ait sans doute voulu que le film confirme le pouvoir de l'amour d'aider les gens à endurer des horreurs presque inimaginables.
back_translation: Making such a tragedy the backdrop for a love story risks trivializing it, although Chouraqui likely intended for the film to affirm the power of love to help people endure almost unimaginable horrors.

text: blessed encompasses the lives of four women who are inescapably involved in a brothel at the centre of the plot .
translation: Bénies englobe la vie de quatre femmes qui sont inévitablement impliquées dans un bordel au centre de l'intrigue.
back_translation: Bénies encompasses the lives of four women who are inevitably involved in a brothel at the heart of the story.

text: this is a fragmented film , once a good idea that was followed by the bad idea to turn it into a movie .
translation: c'est un film fragmenté, autrefois une bonne idée qui a été suivie par la mauvaise idée de le transformer en film.
back_translation: It's a fragmented film, once a good idea that was followed by the bad idea of turning it into a movie.

text: [ gosling 's ] combination of explosive physical energy and convincing intelligence helps create a complex , unpredictable character .
translation: La combinaison de l'énergie physique explosive et de l'intelligence convaincante de Gosling aide à créer un personnage complexe et imprévisible.
back_translation: The combination of Gosling's explosive physical energy and compelling intelligence helps create a complex and unpredictable character.

text: august -- a pupil of ingmar bergman 's -- manages to tell a tragic tale while avoiding the heavy-laden angst of a bergman film .
translation: august -- un élève d'Ingmar Bergman -- parvient à raconter une histoire tragique tout en évitant l'angoisse lourde d'un film de Bergman.
back_translation: August - a student of Ingmar Bergman - manages to tell a tragic story while avoiding the heavy anguish of a Bergman film.

text: marjorie standiford sits on oklahoma 's death row , hours away from execution , speaking into a tape recorder , telling her life story .
translation: Marjorie Standiford est dans le couloir de la mort de l'Oklahoma, à quelques heures de son exécution, parlant dans un magnétophone et racontant son histoire de vie.
back_translation: Marjorie Standiford is on death row in Oklahoma, just hours from her execution, speaking into a tape recorder and telling her life story.

text: the locale . . . remains far more interesting than the story at hand .
translation: le décor . . . reste de loin plus intéressant que l'histoire en cours .
back_translation: the decor . . . is far more interesting than the ongoing story.

text: it 's sweet and romantic without being cloying or melodramatic .
translation: c'est doux et romantique sans être sucré ou melo-dramatique.
back_translation: It's sweet and romantic without being sugary or melodramatic.

text: so , in addition to curing him she 's also trying to get him married off to a `` good , strong , responsible `` woman .
translation: Donc, en plus de le guérir, elle essaie aussi de le marier à une femme `` bien, forte, responsable ``.
back_translation: So, in addition to healing him, she is also trying to marry him to a "good, strong, responsible" woman.

text: the actors pull out all the stops in nearly every scene , but to diminishing effect . the characters never change .
translation: les acteurs donnent tout ce qu'ils ont dans presque chaque scène, mais avec un effet décroissant. les personnages ne changent jamais.
back_translation: The actors give everything they have in almost every scene, but with a diminishing effect. The characters never change.

text: the deuces are determined to do whatever is necessary to keep drugs off their block even if that means dying .
translation: les deuces sont déterminés à faire tout ce qui est nécessaire pour maintenir les drogues hors de leur quartier, même si cela signifie mourir.
back_translation: The deuces are determined to do whatever it takes to keep drugs out of their neighborhood, even if it means dying.

text: this film tells the true story of fraudulent washington , d . c . journalist stephen glass ( christensen ) , who rose to meteoric heights as a young writer in his 20s , becoming a staff writer at `` the new republic `` for three years ( 1995-1998 ) , where 27 of his 41 published stories were either partially or completely made up .
translation: Ce film raconte l'histoire vraie du journaliste frauduleux de Washington, D.C., Stephen Glass (Christensen), qui a connu une ascension fulgurante en tant que jeune écrivain dans la vingtaine, devenant rédacteur au « New Republic » pendant trois ans (1995-1998), où 27 de ses 41 histoires publiées étaient en partie ou entièrement inventées.
back_translation: This film tells the true story of the fraudulent Washington, D.C. journalist, Stephen Glass (Christensen), who experienced a meteoric rise as a young writer in his twenties, becoming an editor at the "New Republic" for three years (1995-1998), where 27 of his 41 published stories were partly or entirely fabricated.

text: as carolyn 's `` perfect life `` falls apart , pumpkin teaches her that perfect is n't always perfect after all .
translation: Alors que la "vie parfaite" de Carolyn s'effondre, Pumpkin lui enseigne que parfait n'est finalement pas toujours parfait.
back_translation: As Carolyn's "perfect life" collapses, Pumpkin teaches her that perfect isn't always perfect after all.

text: it 's often faintly amusing , but the problems of the characters never become important to us , and the story never takes hold .
translation: C'est souvent légèrement amusant, mais les problèmes des personnages ne deviennent jamais importants pour nous, et l'histoire ne prend jamais d'ampleur.
back_translation: It is often slightly amusing, but the characters' problems never become important to us, and the story never gains any depth.

text: not that any of us should be complaining when a film clocks in around 90 minutes these days , but the plotting here leaves a lot to be desired .
translation: Ce n'est pas que l'un d'entre nous devrait se plaindre lorsqu'un film dure environ 90 minutes de nos jours, mais l'intrigue ici laisse beaucoup à désirer.
back_translation: It's not that one of us should complain when a movie lasts around 90 minutes these days, but the plot here leaves much to be desired.

text: all of a sudden , one brings up the topic of her going to los angeles for a record contract audition .
translation: tout à coup, on évoque le sujet de son audition à Los Angeles pour un contrat d'enregistrement.
back_translation: Suddenly, the subject of his audition in Los Angeles for a recording contract comes up.

text: a little weak -- and it is n't that funny .
translation: un peu faible - et ce n'est pas si drôle.
back_translation: a little weak - and it's not that funny.

text: the movie is saved from unbearable lightness by the simplicity of the storytelling and the authenticity of the performances .
translation: le film est sauvé de l'insupportable légèreté par la simplicité du récit et l'authenticité des performances.
back_translation: The film is saved from unbearable lightness by the simplicity of the story and the authenticity of the performances.

text: the harrowing rescue of the young woman opens the door to a dark history hidden below the surface , revealing the true identity of the killer and answering the mystery of who killed jack 's daughter .
translation: Le sauvetage éprouvant de la jeune femme ouvre la porte à une sombre histoire cachée sous la surface, révélant la véritable identité du tueur et répondant au mystère de qui a tué la fille de Jack.
back_translation: The harrowing rescue of the young woman uncovers a dark story hidden beneath the surface, revealing the true identity of the killer and answering the mystery of who killed Jack's daughter.

text: josch now has to convince t & # 252 ; rlich about the evil intentions of dump fast , only has there just been quite a fight between the two lifelong friends .
translation: Josch doit maintenant convaincre Tü rlich des intentions malveillantes de Dump Fast, alors qu'il vient d'y avoir une forte dispute entre les deux amis de longue date.
back_translation: Josch must now convince Tü rlich of Dump Fast's malicious intent, as there has just been a heated argument between the two longtime friends.

text: a tale of three women who have reached a turning point in their lives .
translation: un conte de trois femmes qui ont atteint un tournant dans leur vie.
back_translation: A tale of three women who have reached a turning point in their lives.

text: armed with twenty dollars and a backpack , pastor william sets off on an unusual call from god to walk across the country preaching the gospel .
translation: Armé de vingt dollars et d'un sac à dos, le pasteur William part en voyage à la suite d'un appel inhabituel de Dieu pour traverser le pays et prêcher l'évangile.
back_translation: Armed with twenty dollars and a backpack, Pastor William embarks on a journey following an unusual call from God to cross the country and preach the gospel.

text: once he leaves his chinese prison cell robert would rather enjoy his freedom back in the u . s . and keep his past behind him , but the tong catches up to him and threatens not only his life but that of his wife .
translation: Une fois sorti de sa cellule de prison en Chine, Robert préfère profiter de sa liberté aux États-Unis et laisser son passé derrière lui, mais le Tong le rattrape et menace non seulement sa vie mais aussi celle de sa femme.
back_translation: Once out of his prison cell in China, Robert prefers to enjoy his freedom in the United States and leave his past behind him, but the Tong catches up with him and threatens not only his life but also that of his wife.

text: femme fatale offers nothing more than a bait-and-switch that is beyond playing fair with the audience . are we dealing with dreams , visions or being told what actually happened as if it were the third ending of clue ?
translation: femme fatale n'offre rien de plus qu'un leurre qui dépasse la simple notion de jouer franc jeu avec le public. Sommes-nous confrontés à des rêves, des visions ou à un récit de ce qui s'est réellement passé comme si c'était la troisième fin de Cluedo ?
back_translation: The femme fatale offers nothing more than a lure that goes beyond the simple notion of playing fair with the audience. Are we confronted with dreams, visions, or a narrative of what actually happened as if it were the third ending of Cluedo?

text: and the moment they touch each other for a first time , the fortune-teller 's prophesy comes true .
translation: et au moment où ils se touchent pour la première fois, la prophétie de la voyante devient réalité.
back_translation: And at the moment they touch for the first time, the seer's prophecy comes true.

text: he began a film , a search , to discover not only what had happened to stevie over the past ten years but to understand the forces that had shaped his entire life .
translation: il a commencé un film, une recherche, pour découvrir non seulement ce qui était arrivé à Stevie au cours des dix dernières années, mais aussi pour comprendre les forces qui avaient façonné toute sa vie.
back_translation: He started a film, a search, to discover not only what had happened to Stevie over the last ten years, but also to understand the forces that had shaped his entire life.

text: while the ensemble player who gained notice in guy ritchie 's lock , stock and two smoking barrels and snatch has the bod , he 's unlikely to become a household name on the basis of his first starring vehicle .
translation: Bien que l'acteur d'ensemble qui a attiré l'attention dans "Lock, Stock and Two Smoking Barrels" et "Snatch" ait le physique qu'il faut, il est peu probable qu'il devienne un nom connu du grand public sur la base de son premier film en tête d'affiche.
back_translation: Although the ensemble actor who drew attention in "Lock, Stock and Two Smoking Barrels" and "Snatch" has the right physique, it is unlikely that he will become a well-known name to the general public based on his first leading film.

text: all the movie 's narrative gymnastics ca n't disguise the fact that it 's inauthentic at its core and that its story just is n't worth telling .
translation: Toutes les gymnastiques narratives du film ne peuvent pas masquer le fait qu'il est inauthentique dans son essence et que son histoire ne vaut tout simplement pas la peine d'être racontée.
back_translation: All the narrative gymnastics of the film cannot hide the fact that it is inauthentic in its essence and that its story simply is not worth telling.

text: ziyad repeatedly reassures her of his undying love , but family and social pressure , particularly his evil , meddling mother , gradually poison their happy relationship until the love , enthusiasm and humour of their early days soon take a tragic turn .
translation: Ziyad ne cesse de la rassurer de son amour éternel, mais la pression familiale et sociale, en particulier sa mère malveillante et envahissante, empoisonne progressivement leur heureuse relation jusqu'à ce que l'amour, l'enthousiasme et l'humour de leurs débuts prennent rapidement un tour tragique.
back_translation: Ziyad keeps reassuring her of his eternal love, but the family and social pressure, especially his malicious and intrusive mother, gradually poisons their happy relationship until love, enthusiasm, and the humor of their beginnings quickly take a tragic turn.

text: only an epic documentary could get it all down , and spike lee 's jim brown : all american at long last gives its subject a movie worthy of his talents .
translation: seule une épopée documentaire pourrait tout retranscrire, et le film de Spike Lee sur Jim Brown : All American donne enfin à son sujet un film digne de ses talents.
back_translation: Only a documentary epic could capture it all, and Spike Lee's film on Jim Brown: All American finally gives its subject a film worthy of his talents.

text: one of the most incoherent features in recent memory .
translation: l'une des caractéristiques les plus incohérentes de la mémoire récente.
back_translation: one of the most inconsistent characteristics of recent memory.

text: set on an island off the coast of florida , a techno rave party attracts a diverse group of college coeds and a coast guard officer .
translation: Située sur une île au large des côtes de la Floride, une fête techno attire un groupe diversifié de étudiantes et un agent de la garde côtière.
back_translation: Located on an island off the coast of Florida, a techno party attracts a diverse group of students and a coast guard officer.

text: it 's a great american adventure and a wonderful film to bring to imax .
translation: c'est une grande aventure américaine et un merveilleux film à apporter en IMAX.
back_translation: It's a great American adventure and a wonderful film to bring to IMAX.

text: what we have is a character faced with the possibility that her life is meaningless , vapid and devoid of substance , in a movie that is definitely meaningless , vapid and devoid of substance .
translation: Ce que nous avons, c'est un personnage confronté à la possibilité que sa vie soit dénuée de sens, vide et dépourvue de substance, dans un film qui est définitivement dénué de sens, vide et dépourvu de substance.
back_translation: What we have is a character confronted with the possibility that their life is meaningless, empty, and devoid of substance, in a film that is definitively meaningless, empty, and devoid of substance.

text: coral reef adventure is a heavyweight film that fights a good fight on behalf of the world 's endangered reefs -- and it lets the pictures do the punching .
translation: L'aventure des récifs coralliens est un film lourd qui se bat pour défendre les récifs menacés du monde -- et il laisse les images porter le coup.
back_translation: The adventure of coral reefs is a heavy film that fights to defend the world's threatened reefs -- and it lets the images deliver the message.

text: nothing more than an amiable but unfocused bagatelle that plays like a loosely-connected string of acting-workshop exercises .
translation: rien de plus qu'une bagatelle aimable mais désinvolte qui se joue comme une série de exercices de théâtre peu connectés.
back_translation: nothing more than a charming but casual trifle that unfolds like a series of loosely connected theater exercises.

text: an unusual and compelling chinese film about the loving interventions of a father and mother whose oldest son is a drug addict .
translation: un film chinois inhabituel et captivant sur les interventions affectueuses d'un père et d'une mère dont le fils aîné est un toxicomane.
back_translation: An unusual and captivating Chinese film about the affectionate interventions of a father and mother whose eldest son is a drug addict.

text: the taxi driver is a serial killer who picks up innocent women but not all of his victims are as innocent as he thinks .
translation: Le chauffeur de taxi est un tueur en série qui prend des femmes innocentes, mais toutes ses victimes ne sont pas aussi innocentes qu'il le pense.
back_translation: The taxi driver is a serial killer who targets innocent women, but not all of his victims are as innocent as he thinks.

text: the government sends in an elite military task force lead by alice ( jovovich ) and rain ( rodriguez ) to contain the virus in three hours before it escapes and infects the rest of the world .
translation: Le gouvernement envoie une unité d'élite militaire dirigée par Alice (Jovovich) et Rain (Rodriguez) pour contenir le virus dans les trois heures avant qu'il ne s'échappe et n'infecte le reste du monde.
back_translation: The government sends an elite military unit led by Alice (Jovovich) and Rain (Rodriguez) to contain the virus within three hours before it escapes and infects the rest of the world.

text: unwilling to disappoint his proud mother , morales wastes no time in looking for a job to pay his way through school .
translation: ne voulant pas décevoir sa mère fière, Morales ne perd pas de temps à chercher un emploi pour financer ses études.
back_translation: Not wanting to disappoint his proud mother, Morales wastes no time looking for a job to finance his studies.

text: scott calvin ( tim allen ) has been santa claus for the past eight years , and his loyal elves consider him the best santa ever .
translation: Scott Calvin (Tim Allen) est devenu le Père Noël depuis huit ans, et ses fidèles elfes le considèrent comme le meilleur Père Noël de tous les temps.
back_translation: Scott Calvin (Tim Allen) has been Santa Claus for eight years, and his loyal elves consider him the best Santa Claus of all time.

text: douglas mcgrath 's nicholas nickleby does dickens as it should be done cinematically .
translation: Le Nicholas Nickleby de Douglas McGrath fait de Dickens ce qu'il doit être fait au cinéma.
back_translation: Douglas McGrath's Nicholas Nickleby does what must be done with Dickens on screen.

text: the story is so light and sugary that were it a macy 's thanksgiving day parade balloon , extra heavy-duty ropes would be needed to keep it from floating away .
translation: L'histoire est si légère et sucrée que si c'était un ballon du défilé de Thanksgiving de Macy's, il faudrait des cordes extra lourdes pour l'empêcher de s'envoler.
back_translation: The story is so light and sweet that if it were a balloon from the Macy's Thanksgiving Day Parade, it would require extra heavy ropes to keep it from flying away.

text: the assembled team includes local guide clayton tyne ( russel ferrier ) , renowned wilderness expert and author winston burg ( phil granger ) and the beautiful marla lawson ( andrea roth ) .
translation: l'équipe réunie comprend le guide local Clayton Tyne (Russel Ferrier), l'expert en nature renommé et auteur Winston Burg (Phil Granger) et la belle Marla Lawson (Andrea Roth).
back_translation: The assembled team includes local guide Clayton Tyne (Russel Ferrier), renowned nature expert and author Winston Burg (Phil Granger), and the beautiful Marla Lawson (Andrea Roth).

text: uneven performances and a spotty script add up to a biting satire that has no teeth .
translation: des performances inégales et un scénario inconstant s'additionnent à une satire mordante qui n'a pas de dents.
back_translation: une mediocre performances and an inconsistent plot add up to a biting satire that has no teeth.

text: a perfectly respectable , perfectly inoffensive , easily forgettable film .
translation: un film parfaitement respectable, parfaitement inoffensif, facilement oubliable.
back_translation: a perfectly respectable film, perfectly harmless, easily forgettable.

text: gangs , despite the gravity of its subject matter , is often as fun to watch as a good spaghetti western .
translation: Les gangs, malgré la gravité de son sujet, est souvent aussi agréable à regarder qu'un bon western spaghetti.
back_translation: Gangs, despite the seriousness of its subject, is often just as enjoyable to watch as a good spaghetti western.

text: although initially repelled by simon , rose is determined to make him fall in love with her and succeeds .
translation: Bien qu'au départ repoussée par Simon, Rose est déterminée à le faire tomber amoureux d'elle et réussit.
back_translation: Although initially rejected by Simon, Rose is determined to make him fall in love with her and succeeds.

text: at the eleventh hour king and cuthbertson are saved by the arrival of major merton ( derek jacobi ) , churchill 's chief intelligence advisor .
translation: À la dernière minute, le roi et Cuthbertson sont sauvés par l'arrivée du major Merton (Derek Jacobi), le principal conseiller en intelligence de Churchill.
back_translation: At the last minute, the king and Cuthbertson are saved by the arrival of Major Merton (Derek Jacobi), Churchill's chief intelligence advisor.

text: . . . a quietly introspective portrait of the self-esteem of employment and the shame of losing a job . . .
translation: ... un portrait introspectif de l'estime de soi liée à l'emploi et de la honte de perdre un travail...
back_translation: ... an introspective portrait of self-esteem related to employment and the shame of losing a job...

text: but when sy begins spying on the yorkins , he begins to feel that he wants to be in the yorkin 's life .
translation: mais quand Sy commence à espionner les Yorkin, il commence à sentir qu'il veut faire partie de la vie des Yorkin.
back_translation: But when Sy starts spying on the Yorkins, he begins to feel that he wants to be a part of the Yorkins' lives.

text: some will fall in love , one will change his life , another will be out for whatever and whomever she can get .
translation: certains tomberont amoureux, l'un changera sa vie, une autre sera à la recherche de tout et de n'importe qui.
back_translation: some will fall in love, one will change their life, another will be in search of everything and anything.

text: a real step forward for the digital video revolution .
translation: un véritable pas en avant pour la révolution de la vidéo numérique.
back_translation: a real step forward for the revolution of digital video.

text: when your subject is illusion versus reality , should n't the reality seem at least passably real ?
translation: Quand votre sujet est l'illusion contre la réalité, la réalité ne devrait-elle pas sembler au moins passablement réelle ?
back_translation: When your subject is illusion versus reality, shouldn't reality at least seem somewhat real?

text: this is dicaprio 's best performance in anything ever , and easily the most watchable film of the year .
translation: C'est la meilleure performance de DiCaprio dans n'importe quel film, et c'est de loin le film le plus regardable de l'année.
back_translation: It's DiCaprio's best performance in any film, and it's by far the most watchable movie of the year.

text: then the next day he finds out that the previous night his mother actually died in a car crash .
translation: Puis le lendemain, il découvre que sa mère est en réalité décédée dans un accident de voiture la nuit précédente.
back_translation: The next day, he discovers that his mother actually passed away in a car accident the previous night.

text: two brothers inherit an old , broken down carousel on an abandoned boardwalk in new jersey .
translation: Deux frères héritent d'un vieux carrousel enruiné sur une promenade abandonnée du New Jersey.
back_translation: Two brothers inherit an old ruined carousel on an abandoned boardwalk in New Jersey.

text: pitted against steroid-taking competitors and the biggest sports-nutrition company in the world , he is up against odds and enemies who want to destroy him .
translation: confronté à des concurrents utilisant des stéroïdes et à la plus grande entreprise de nutrition sportive au monde, il fait face à des obstacles et à des ennemis qui veulent le détruire.
back_translation: Confronted with competitors using steroids and the largest sports nutrition company in the world, he faces obstacles and enemies who want to destroy him.

text: now escaped from prison , mel begins his quest for vengeance .
translation: maintenant échappé de prison, Mel commence sa quête de vengeance.
back_translation: Now escaped from prison, Mel begins his quest for revenge.

text: alice is a cleaning lady at the nearby hospital and she sells the books that the patients leave behind .
translation: Alice est femme de ménage à l'hôpital voisin et elle vend les livres que les patients laissent derrière eux.
back_translation: Alice is a cleaner at the nearby hospital, and she sells the books that patients leave behind.

text: the story starts with hakimi , a freelance scriptwriter who is on his way to send his 7-year-old daughter , imelda , to his ex-wife 's house on one stormy night .
translation: L'histoire commence avec Hakimi, un scénariste indépendant qui se rend chez son ex-femme pour déposer sa fille de 7 ans, Imelda, par une nuit d'orage.
back_translation: The story begins with Hakimi, an independent screenwriter, who goes to his ex-wife's house to drop off his 7-year-old daughter, Imelda, on a stormy night.

text: akash has a soft corner for his fellow doctor neha mathur , a suave and self-assured woman who will never let her personal life get in the way of her profession .
translation: Akash a un faible pour sa collègue docteure Neha Mathur, une femme suave et sûre d'elle qui ne laissera jamais sa vie personnelle interférer avec sa profession.
back_translation: Akash has a crush on his colleague Dr. Neha Mathur, a suave and self-assured woman who will never let her personal life interfere with her profession.

text: simone is not a bad film . it just does n't have anything really interesting to say .
translation: Simone n'est pas un mauvais film. Il n'a simplement rien de vraiment intéressant à dire.
back_translation: Simone is not a bad film. It simply has nothing really interesting to say.

text: one stormy night , they go to get the shoes when calvin and the shoes are struck by lightning .
translation: Une nuit orageuse, ils vont chercher les chaussures quand Calvin et les chaussures sont frappés par la foudre.
back_translation: One stormy night, they go to look for the shoes when Calvin and the shoes are struck by lightning.

text: trying to make head or tail of the story in the hip-hop indie snipes is enough to give you brain strain -- and the pay-off is negligible .

text: 3 years after retiring from the fbi because of a near-fatal encounter with hannibal lecter , who was helping him catch the `` chesapeake ripper `` , only to reveal it was hannibal himself , will graham is asked by his ex-partner jack crawford to come solve one last case - 2 slaughtered families every full moon .
translation: Trois ans après avoir pris sa retraite du FBI en raison d'une rencontre presque mortelle avec Hannibal Lecter, qui l'a aidé à capturer le "Chesapeake Ripper", seulement pour révéler que c'était Hannibal lui-même, Will Graham est sollicité par son ancien partenaire Jack Crawford pour résoudre une dernière affaire : deux familles massacrées à chaque pleine lune.
back_translation: Three years after retiring from the FBI due to a near-fatal encounter with Hannibal Lecter, who helped him capture the "Chesapeake Ripper," only to reveal that it was Hannibal himself, Will Graham is called upon by his former partner Jack Crawford to solve one last case: two families massacred with each full moon.

text: such a good-looking picture deserved to have more depth and unpredictability in its story . but it does stand out as a personal and unique entry in a time-worn genre , and that may be good enough .

back_translation: When four children stop to refuel at a strange gas station/monster show/chicken stand the night before Halloween, they get directions to a scary local site from a very odd attendant whose intentions are quite unclear, and the story starts from there.

text: star trek : nemesis meekly goes where nearly every star trek movie has gone before . wince-inducing dialogue , thrift-shop costumes , prosthetic makeup by silly putty and kmart blue-light-special effects all conspire to test trekkie loyalty .

Des dialogues qui font grincer des dents, des costumes de friperie, du maquillage prothétique fait avec de la pâte à modeler et des effets spéciaux à rabais viennent tous mettre à l'épreuve la fidélité des trekkies.
back_translation: Star Trek: Nemesis timidly goes where almost all Star Trek films have already been. Cringe-worthy dialogue, thrift store costumes, prosthetic makeup made with modeling clay, and cheap special effects all test the loyalty of the trekkies.

text: rebuffed in love and uncertain of life , simon is the story of a young englishman 's physical and spiritual journey during algeria 's battle for independence from france .

text: the pain , loneliness and insecurity of the screenwriting process are vividly and painfully brought to slovenly life in this self-deprecating , biting and witty feature written by charlie kaufman and his twin brother , donald , and directed by spike jonze .

back_translation: The pain, loneliness, and insecurity of the screenwriting process are vividly and painfully portrayed in this self-deprecating, biting, and witty work written by Charlie Kaufman and his twin brother, Donald, and directed by Spike Jonze.

text: this is a children 's film in the truest sense . it 's packed with adventure and a worthwhile environmental message , so it 's great for the kids . parents , on the other hand , will be ahead of the plot at all times , and there is n't enough clever innuendo to fil
translation: c'est un film pour enfants dans le sens le plus pur. Il est rempli d'aventures et d'un message environnemental précieux, donc il est parfait pour les enfants. Les parents, en revanche, seront toujours en avance sur l'intrigue, et il n'y a pas assez de sous-entendus intelligents pour compenser.
back_translation: It is a children's film in the purest sense. It is filled with adventures and a valuable environmental message, making it perfect for kids. Parents, on the other hand, will always be ahead of the plot, and there are not enough clever innuendos to make up for it.

text: when the three precogs , who only work together , floating connected in a tank of fluid , have a vision , the names of the victim and the perpetrator as well as video imagery of the crime and the exact time it will happen , are given out to the special cops who then try to prevent the crime from happening .
translation: Lorsque les trois precogs, qui ne travaillent ensemble que, flottent connectés dans un réservoir de fluide, ont une vision, les noms de la victime et du coupable ainsi que des images vidéo du crime et l'heure exacte à laquelle il se produira, sont communiqués aux policiers spéciaux qui essaient ensuite d'empêcher le crime de se produire.
back_translation: When the three precogs, who only work together, float connected in a fluid reservoir, have a vision, the names of the victim and the culprit as well as video images of the crime and the exact time it will occur are communicated to the special police who then try to prevent the crime from happening.

text: now faced with the discovery of a bloodied body , a flaming liquor store just off native land that sells millions of cans of beer a year to the native population , and his brother 's ongoing self-destruction , rudy goes on a quest to avenge himself , his family , and his culture and to seek justice .
translation: maintenant confronté à la découverte d'un corps ensanglanté, d'un magasin d'alcool en flammes juste à l'extérieur des terres autochtones qui vend des millions de canettes de bière par an à la population autochtone, et de l'autodestruction continue de son frère, Rudy se lance dans une quête pour se venger, lui-même, sa famille et sa culture, et pour rechercher la justice.
back_translation: now confronted with the discovery of a bloody body, a liquor store ablaze just outside of Indigenous lands that sells millions of cans of beer each year to the Indigenous population, and the ongoing self-destruction of his brother, Rudy embarks on a quest for vengeance, for himself, his family, and his culture, and to seek justice.

text: a tough go , but leigh 's depth and rigor , and his skill at inspiring accomplished portrayals that are all the more impressive for their lack of showiness , offsets to a notable degree the film 's often-mined and despairing milieu .
translation: Un parcours difficile, mais la profondeur et la rigueur de Leigh, ainsi que son talent pour inspirer des interprétations accomplies qui sont d'autant plus impressionnantes par leur absence de tape-à-l'œil, compensent dans une mesure notable le milieu souvent exploité et désespérant du film.
back_translation: A difficult journey, but Leigh's depth and rigor, as well as his talent for inspiring accomplished performances that are all the more impressive for their lack of showiness, considerably compensate for the often exploitative and despairing backdrop of the film.

translation: un peu en deçà des tremblements sur la scène b moderne : ni aussi drôle ni aussi malin, bien qu’une façon agréablement peu prétentieuse de passer quatre-vingt-dix minutes.
back_translation: A bit below the tremors on the modern B scene: neither as funny nor as clever, although a pleasantly unpretentious way to spend ninety minutes.

text: as their adopted identity grows , the gang tumbles into a downward spiral of excitement , excess and fun .
translation: À mesure que leur identité adoptée grandit, le gang s'engouffre dans une spirale descendante d'excitation, d'excès et de plaisir.
back_translation: As their adopted identity grows, the gang plunges into a downward spiral of excitement, excess, and pleasure.

text: the movie is beautiful to behold and engages one in a sense of epic struggle -- inner and outer -- that 's all too rare in hollywood 's hastier productions .
translation: le film est magnifique à voir et engage dans un sens de lutte épique -- intérieure et extérieure -- qui est trop rare dans les productions plus hâtives d'Hollywood.
back_translation: The film is beautiful to watch and engages in a sense of epic struggle -- both internal and external -- that is too rare in the more hasty productions of Hollywood.

text: it 's pretentious in a way that verges on the amateurish .

text: in the end , ted bundy 's only justification is the director 's common but unexplored fascination with the frustrated maniac ; there 's no larger point , and little social context .
translation: Au final, la seule justification de Ted Bundy est la fascination commune mais inexplorée du réalisateur pour le maniaque frustré ; il n'y a pas de point plus large et peu de contexte social.
back_translation: In the end, the only justification for Ted Bundy is the common but unexplored fascination of the director for the frustrated maniac; there is no broader point and little social context.

text: she is married to henry bauford ( linus roache ) son of a wealthy british industrialist , when she encounters nick callahan ( clive owen ) a renegade doctor , whose impassioned plea for help to support his relief efforts in war-torn africa moves her deeply .
translation: Elle est mariée à Henry Bauford (Linus Roache), fils d'un riche industriel britannique, lorsqu'elle rencontre Nick Callahan (Clive Owen), un médecin renégat, dont l'appel passionné à l'aide pour soutenir ses efforts humanitaires en Afrique dévastée par la guerre la touche profondément.
back_translation: She is married to Henry Bauford (Linus Roache), the son of a wealthy British industrialist, when she meets Nick Callahan (Clive Owen), a renegade doctor, whose passionate appeal for help to support his humanitarian efforts in war-torn Africa deeply moves her.

text: it 's dumb fun slapped silly , a new franchise inspired by the bond films that 's not far from the porn its title promises ; the film is a veritable orgy of outrageous stunts .
translation: c'est un divertissement idiot et extravagant, une nouvelle franchise inspirée des films de James Bond qui n'est pas loin de la pornographie que son titre promet ; le film est une véritable orgie de cascades audacieuses.
back_translation: It is an idiotic and extravagant entertainment, a new franchise inspired by James Bond films that is not far from the pornography its title promises; the movie is a true orgy of daring stunts.

text: discovering the hard way that their involved in witchcraft .
translation: découvrir à ses dépens qu'ils sont impliqués dans la sorcellerie.

text: danny is antagonized by undercover narcotics agents ( anthony lapaglia and doug hutchison ) and sadistic dealer pooh bear ( vincent d'onfronio ) .

back_translation: Danny is being harassed by undercover drug enforcement agents (Anthony LaPaglia and Doug Hutchison) and by the sadistic dealer Pooh Bear (Vincent D'Onofrio).

text: evergon is ultimately a compelling story about the human condition , exploring a young man 's search for love , steady employment and self-respect .
translation: Evergon est finalement une histoire captivante sur la condition humaine, explorant la quête d'un jeune homme pour l'amour, un emploi stable et le respect de soi.
back_translation: Evergon is ultimately a captivating story about the human condition, exploring a young man's quest for love, stable employment, and self-respect.

text: with `` ichi the killer `` , takashi miike , japan 's wildest filmmaker gives us a crime fighter carrying more emotional baggage than batman . . .
translation: Avec "Ichi the Killer", Takashi Miike, le réalisateur le plus audacieux du Japon, nous offre un héros criminel portant plus de bagages émotionnels que Batman...
back_translation: With "Ichi the Killer," Takashi Miike, Japan's boldest director, presents us with a criminal hero carrying more emotional baggage than Batman...

text: a handsome and talented college student , david morales , is devastated when a bum knee causes him to lose his scholarship to the university of san diego .
translation: Un étudiant brillant et talentueux, David Morales, est dévasté lorsque son genou blessé le fait perdre sa bourse à l'université de San Diego.
back_translation: A brilliant and talented student, David Morales, is devastated when his injured knee causes him to lose his scholarship at the University of San Diego.

text: stir in some language barriers , cultural faux pas and a bright , young japanese female undergrad , and the intensity of the experience heightens to comical proportions .
translation: ajoutez quelques barrières linguistiques, des faux pas culturels et une brillante étudiante japonaise, et l'intensité de l'expérience prend des proportions comiques.
back_translation: Add a few language barriers, cultural faux pas, and a brilliant Japanese student, and the intensity of the experience takes on comic proportions.

text: a vile , incoherent mess . . . a scummy ripoff of david cronenberg 's brilliant 'videodrome . '

back_translation: a vile and incoherent horror . . . a disgusting scam of David Cronenberg's brilliant work 'videodrome.'

text: a number of new allies join with aragorn , gimli , legolas , pippin and merry .

text: a documentary , this film , co-produced by several countries finally became reality .
translation: un documentaire, ce film, coproduit par plusieurs pays, est finalement devenu réalité.

text: when possum lodge is taken to court by big-shot executive robert stiles ( richard fitzpatrick ) , whose limousine was damaged while parking at the lodge , the boys are ordered to pay $ 10 , 000 in damages within ten days - or their beloved lodge will become property of the town .
translation: Lorsque le lodge Possum est traîné devant les tribunaux par le grand exécutif Robert Stiles (Richard Fitzpatrick), dont la limousine a été endommagée alors qu'il se garait au lodge, les garçons sont condamnés à payer 10 000 $ de dommages dans les dix jours - sinon leur précieux lodge deviendra propriété de la ville.
back_translation: When the Possum lodge is taken to court by the big executive Robert Stiles (Richard Fitzpatrick), whose limousine was damaged while parking at the lodge, the boys are ordered to pay $10,000 in damages within ten days - otherwise their precious lodge will become the property of the town.

text: the lead character of bruce is a tribute to the late great martial arts legend and portrays many of the stereotypical characteristics and ideosyncrasies that distinguished his illustrious career .
translation: Le personnage principal de Bruce est un hommage à la grande légende des arts martiaux disparue et incarne de nombreuses caractéristiques stéréotypées et idiosyncrasies qui ont distingué sa carrière illustre.
back_translation: The main character of Bruce is a tribute to the great martial arts legend who has passed away and embodies many stereotypical characteristics and idiosyncrasies that distinguished his illustrious career.

text: `` the ring `` is pretty much an english-language copy of the film that inspired it , and it carries the same strengths and flaws .
translation: `` le cercle '' est presque une copie en anglais du film qui l'a inspiré, et il porte les mêmes forces et faiblesses.
back_translation: "The Circle" is almost a copy in English of the film that inspired it, and it carries the same strengths and weaknesses.

text: nair does n't treat the issues lightly . she allows each character to confront their problems openly and honestly .
translation: Nair ne prend pas les problèmes à la légère. Elle permet à chaque personnage de confronter ses problèmes de manière ouverte et honnête.
back_translation: Nair does not take problems lightly. She allows each character to confront their issues in an open and honest manner.

text: told in five parts to represent each of the five senses , the sheltered 25-year-old learns to understand his own senses and those around him .
translation: Racontée en cinq parties pour représenter chacun des cinq sens, le jeune homme de 25 ans, protégé, apprend à comprendre ses propres sens et ceux qui l'entourent.
back_translation: Told in five parts to represent each of the five senses, the 25-year-old young man, sheltered, learns to understand his own senses and those around him.

text: but this is 1960 's england , and when the neighbours start to make life difficult for the new arrivals , david 's family are caught in the middle , and he has to choose between fitting in and standing up for the new friends who have turned his world upside down .
translation: Mais nous sommes en Angleterre dans les années 1960, et lorsque les voisins commencent à compliquer la vie des nouveaux arrivants, la famille de David se retrouve au milieu, et il doit choisir entre s'intégrer et défendre les nouveaux amis qui ont bouleversé son monde.
back_translation: But we are in England in the 1960s, and when the neighbors start complicating life for the newcomers, David's family finds themselves in the middle, and he must choose between fitting in and defending the new friends who have shaken up his world.

text: it helps that lil bow wow . . . tones down his pint-sized gangsta act to play someone who resembles a real kid .

back_translation: It is helpful for Lil Bow Wow... to tone down his mini gangsta act to embody someone who resembles a real child.

text: the planet however is populated by murderous psychopaths who kill two of the astronauts right away .

back_translation: The planet, however, is populated by murderous psychopaths who immediately kill two of the astronauts.

text: cinematic pyrotechnics aside , the only thing avary seems to care about are mean giggles and pulchritude . it makes sense that he went back to school to check out the girls -- his film is a frat boy 's idea of a good time .
translation: Mises à part les pyrotechnies cinématographiques, la seule chose qui semble intéresser Avary, ce sont les rires malveillants et la beauté. Il est logique qu'il soit retourné à l'école pour observer les filles - son film est l'idée d'un bon moment d'un étudiant en fraternité.
back_translation: Apart from the cinematic fireworks, the only thing that seems to interest Avary is malicious laughter and beauty. It makes sense that he went back to school to observe girls - his film is the idea of a good time for a fraternity student.

text: the script , the gags , the characters are all direct-to-video stuff , and that 's where this film should have remained .
translation: le scénario, les gags, les personnages sont tous du matériel direct-to-video, et c'est là que ce film aurait dû rester.
back_translation: The script, the gags, the characters are all direct-to-video material, and that's where this film should have stayed.

text: if you love the music , and i do , its hard to imagine having more fun watching a documentary . . .
translation: Si vous aimez la musique, et moi aussi, il est difficile d'imaginer s'amuser davantage en regardant un documentaire...
back_translation: If you love music, and so do I, it is hard to imagine having more fun than watching a documentary...

text: the script is a disaster , with cloying messages and irksome characters .

back_translation: The script is a disaster, with cringe-worthy messages and irritating characters.

text: fresh out of a long-term relationship in which she lost custody of a dog , janey passes the end of day on her stoop .

back_translation: Fresh out of a long-term relationship in which she lost custody of a dog, Janey spends the end of the day on her porch.

text: just a kiss wants desperately to come off as a fanciful film about the typical problems of average people . but it is set in a world that is very , very far from the one most of us inhabit .
translation: Just a Kiss veut désespérément se présenter comme un film fantaisiste sur les problèmes typiques des gens ordinaires. Mais il est situé dans un monde qui est très, très éloigné de celui que la plupart d'entre nous habitent.
back_translation: Just a Kiss desperately wants to present itself as a whimsical film about the typical problems of ordinary people. But it is set in a world that is very, very far from the one most of us inhabit.

text: part travelogue , part road picture , part meditation on class , mortality and intimacy , this extraordinary little movie might be the perfect harbinger of summer , as astute as it is steamy .
translation: partie carnet de voyage, partie film de route, partie méditation sur la classe, la mortalité et l'intimité, ce petit film extraordinaire pourrait être le parfait annonciateur de l'été, aussi astucieux que sensuel.
back_translation: Part travel journal, part road movie, part meditation on class, mortality, and intimacy, this extraordinary little film could be the perfect herald of summer, as clever as it is sensual.

text: a woman who has recently discovered that she is the daughter of angelo , a major mafia boss , decides to wreak vengeance when he is killed by a hitman .
translation: Une femme qui a récemment découvert qu'elle est la fille d'Angelo, un grand patron de la mafia, décide de se venger lorsqu'il est tué par un tueur à gages.
back_translation: A woman who recently discovered that she is the daughter of Angelo, a major mafia boss, decides to take revenge when he is killed by a hitman.

text: the two jedi are then sent on two different missions , anakin is sent to naboo with padme and obi-wan is sent to the planet of kamino where he will investigate the assassination attempts .

back_translation: The two Jedi are then sent on two different missions, Anakin is sent to Naboo with Padmé and Obi-Wan is sent to the planet Kamino where he will investigate the assassination attempts.

back_translation: One day, his own name appears in the list of "guilty," and the precogs predict that he will kill a man he has never known in less than 36 hours.

text: a young african american man , quickly closing in on the much sought after american dream , comes to terms with the fact that no amount of success can shield him from the ills that face our society .
translation: un jeune homme afro-américain, se rapprochant rapidement du très convoité rêve américain, accepte le fait qu'aucun succès ne peut le protéger des maux que rencontre notre société.
back_translation: A young African American man, quickly approaching the highly coveted American dream, accepts the fact that no success can protect him from the ills faced by our society.

translation: le joueur de ligne défensive à la retraite de la NFL, `` terrible `` terry tate, applique les règles du bureau au siège de felcher et fils de la seule manière qu'il connaît : avec des plaquages écrasants et des provocations percutantes.

text: a strong first quarter , slightly less so second quarter , and average second half .

text: all in all , it 's a pretty good execution of a story that 's a lot richer than the ones hollywood action screenwriters usually come up with on their own .
translation: Dans l'ensemble, c'est une assez bonne exécution d'une histoire qui est beaucoup plus riche que celles que les scénaristes d'action d'Hollywood créent habituellement eux-mêmes.

translation: un tambourin britannique fidèle, l'un des milliers de soldats britanniques stationnés en Amérique, fait accidentellement tomber sa gourde dans un ruisseau en essayant de la remplir d'eau.
back_translation: A faithful British drummer, one of the thousands of British soldiers stationed in America, accidentally drops his canteen into a stream while trying to fill it with water.

text: can the three dons outwit them and not get bluffed by their obvious charms ?
translation: les trois dons peuvent-ils les devancer et ne pas se laisser tromper par leurs charmes évidents ?

translation: à la suite de l'une de ses liaisons, il rencontre Marcus, un garçon étrange de 12 ans ayant des problèmes à l'école.

text: vile and tacky are the two best adjectives to describe ghost ship .

text: . . . very funny , very enjoyable . . .

text: it understands , in a way that speaks forcefully enough about the mechanisms of poverty to transcend the rather simplistic filmmaking .
translation: il comprend, d'une manière qui parle de manière assez forte des mécanismes de la pauvreté pour transcender le cinéma plutôt simpliste.

text: spanning from post world war ii during the late 1950 's through the irish mob wars of the 1970 's and culminating in their adulthood in the 1990 's , the story is set to the backdrop of backroom politics and the realities of the irish mob and it 's gang wars .
translation: s'étendant de l'après-seconde guerre mondiale à la fin des années 1950 jusqu'aux guerres de gangs irlandaises des années 1970 et culminant dans leur âge adulte dans les années 1990, l'histoire se déroule sur fond de politique en coulisses et des réalités de la mafia irlandaise et de ses guerres de gangs.
back_translation: spanning from the post-World War II period to the late 1950s, through the Irish gang wars of the 1970s, and culminating in their adulthood in the 1990s, the story unfolds against the backdrop of behind-the-scenes politics and the realities of the Irish mafia and its gang wars.

text: in the vein of raiders of the lost ark , this action packed thriller takes us on a roller coaster ride from the bone chilling cold of moscow to the mystical beauty of india .
translation: Dans la lignée des hommes du président, ce thriller riche en action nous emmène dans un tourbillon de sensations fortes, du froid glacial de Moscou à la beauté mystique de l'Inde.
back_translation: In the vein of the president's men, this action-packed thriller takes us on a whirlwind of thrills, from the icy chill of Moscow to the mystical beauty of India.

text: he comes back , calling himself the master , and becomes a charismatic spiritual leader , running a teen shelter in hollywood .
translation: Il revient, se qualifiant de maître, et devient un leader spirituel charismatique, dirigeant un refuge pour adolescents à Hollywood.

text: not really bad so much as distasteful : we need kidnapping suspense dramas right now like we need doomsday thrillers .
translation: pas vraiment mauvais autant que déplaisant : nous avons besoin de drames de suspense sur les enlèvements en ce moment comme nous avons besoin de thrillers sur l'apocalypse.
back_translation: Not really bad as much as unpleasant: we need suspense dramas about kidnappings right now as much as we need thrillers about the apocalypse.

text: the beatle fan is a drama about albert , a psychotic prisoner who is a devoted fan of john lennon and the beatles .
translation: Le fan des Beatles est un drame sur Albert, un prisonnier psychotique qui est un fan dévoué de John Lennon et des Beatles.

text: scherfig 's light-hearted profile of emotional desperation is achingly honest and delightfully cheeky .
translation: Le profil léger et chaleureux de l'urgence émotionnelle de Scherfig est désespérément honnête et délicieusement coquin.
back_translation: The light and warm profile of Scherfig's emotional urgency is desperately honest and delightfully cheeky.

text: accompanied by his assistant bough ( ben miller ) , johnny bungles his way through one scrape after another .
translation: accompagné de son assistant Bough (Ben Miller), Johnny enchaîne les gaffes les unes après les autres.
back_translation: Accompanied by his assistant Bough (Ben Miller), Johnny keeps making blunders one after another.

text: all ms . jovovich , as the sanctified heroine , has to do is look radiant , grimly purposeful and mildly alarmed while forcing open doors , wielding wrenches and fleeing monsters .
translation: Tout ce que Mme Jovovich, en tant qu'héroïne sanctifiée, a à faire est de paraître radieuse, résolue et légèrement alarmée tout en ouvrant des portes de force, en maniant des clés à molette et en fuyant des monstres.
back_translation: All Mrs. Jovovich, as a sanctified heroine, has to do is appear radiant, resolute, and slightly alarmed while forcing open doors, wielding wrenches, and fleeing from monsters.

text: by the end of the day , everybody is nervous and tensions gets high .
translation: À la fin de la journée, tout le monde est nerveux et les tensions montent.

text: it is a story about finding yourself when you did n't even know you were looking .
translation: C'est une histoire sur la découverte de soi lorsque vous ne saviez même pas que vous cherchiez.

text: if you can keep your eyes open amid all the blood and gore , you 'll see del toro has brought unexpected gravity to blade ii .

text: juwanna mann follows the story of jamal jeffries ( miguel a . nunez , jr . ) , the reigning 'bad boy ' of basketball , whose undisciplined on-court antics land him out of the league and without any prospects .

text: [ n ] o matter how much good will the actors generate , showtime eventually folds under its own thinness .

text: interview with the assassin is structured less as a documentary and more as a found relic , and as such the film has a difficult time shaking its blair witch project real-time roots .

text: it 's a bad sign when you 're rooting for the film to hurry up and get to its subjects ' deaths just so the documentary will be over , but it 's indicative of how uncompelling the movie is unless it happens to cover your particular area of interest .
translation: C'est un mauvais signe quand vous espérez que le film accélére pour en arriver aux décès de ses sujets juste pour que le documentaire se termine, mais cela indique à quel point le film est peu captivant, sauf s'il aborde votre domaine d'intérêt particulier.
back_translation: It's a bad sign when you hope that the film speeds up to get to the deaths of its subjects just so the documentary can end, but that indicates how unengaging the film is, unless it touches on your particular area of interest.

text: for all its failed connections , divine secrets of the ya-ya sisterhood is nurturing , in a gauzy , dithering way .

text: by halfway through this picture i was beginning to hate it , and , of course , feeling guilty for it . . . . then , miracle of miracles , the movie does a flip-flop .
