text: as this sacrifice draws to its close , our story begins .
translation: Alors que ce sacrifice touche à sa fin, notre histoire commence.
back_translation: As this sacrifice comes to an end, our story begins.

text: returning aggressively to his formula of dimwitted comedy and even dimmer characters , sandler , who also executive produces , has made a film that makes previous vehicles look smart and sassy .
translation: revenant agressivement à sa formule de comédie stupide et de personnages encore plus bêtes, Sandler, qui est également producteur exécutif, a réalisé un film qui rend les œuvres précédentes intelligentes et pleines d'esprit.
back_translation: Aggressively returning to his formula of stupid comedy and even dumber characters, Sandler, who is also the executive producer, has created a film that makes previous works seem intelligent and witty.

text: you 'll laugh at either the obviousness of it all or its stupidity or maybe even its inventiveness , but the point is , you 'll laugh .
translation: vous rirez soit de l'évidence de tout cela, soit de sa stupidité, ou peut-être même de son inventivité, mais l'essentiel est que vous rirez.
back_translation: You will laugh either at the obviousness of all this, or at its foolishness, or perhaps even at its inventiveness, but the main thing is that you will laugh.

text: just another combination of bad animation and mindless violence . . . lacking the slightest bit of wit or charm .
translation: juste une autre combinaison de mauvaise animation et de violence insensée . . . manquant du moindre soupçon d'esprit ou de charme .
back_translation: just another combination of bad animation and senseless violence... lacking the slightest hint of wit or charm.

text: about nowhere kids who appropriated turfs as they found them and become self-made celebrity athletes -- a low-down version of the american dream .
translation: à propos d'enfants sans lieu qui ont approprié des espaces comme ils les trouvaient et sont devenus des athlètes célèbres autodidactes - une version dégradante du rêve américain.
back_translation: about children without a place who appropriated spaces as they found them and became famous self-taught athletes - a degrading version of the American dream.

text: as he struggles to achieve social success , he discovers his darker side .
translation: Alors qu'il s'efforce d'atteindre le succès social, il découvre son côté sombre.
back_translation: As he strives for social success, he discovers his dark side.

text: faced with endless dead-end gigs and his own loss of passion for the music he once thought was his life , he finds himself returning home to the three generations of women that he left behind .
translation: confronté à des concerts sans issue et à sa propre perte de passion pour la musique qu'il pensait autrefois être sa vie, il se retrouve à retourner chez les trois générations de femmes qu'il avait laissées derrière lui.
back_translation: confronted with dead-end concerts and his own loss of passion for music that he once thought was his life, he finds himself returning to the three generations of women he had left behind.

text: unfortunately , it 's also not very good . especially compared with the television series that inspired the movie .
translation: malheureusement, ce n'est pas non plus très bon. surtout comparé à la série télévisée qui a inspiré le film.
back_translation: Unfortunately, this is not very good either, especially compared to the TV series that inspired the film.

text: watching `` ending `` is too often like looking over the outdated clothes and plastic knickknacks at your neighbor 's garage sale . you ca n't believe anyone would really buy this stuff .
translation: Regarder '' Ending '' est trop souvent comme jeter un coup d'œil aux vêtements démodés et aux bibelots en plastique lors de la vente de garage de votre voisin. Vous ne pouvez pas croire que quelqu'un pourrait vraiment acheter ces choses.
back_translation: Watching "Ending" is too often like taking a look at outdated clothing and plastic trinkets at your neighbor's garage sale. You can't believe that anyone would really buy those things.

text: as long as vincent lives in the protection of the present , he does n't have to deal with the pain of his past -- or his sorrow over his broken relationship with joey .
translation: tant que Vincent vit sous la protection du présent, il n'a pas à faire face à la douleur de son passé - ni à son chagrin pour sa relation brisée avec Joey.
back_translation: As long as Vincent lives under the protection of the present, he doesn't have to face the pain of his past - nor his grief over his broken relationship with Joey.

text: deep in the blue ridge mountains , just outside of a small , quiet town , lives willy , an animalistic , southern rebel .
translation: Au cœur des montagnes Blue Ridge, juste à l'extérieur d'une petite ville tranquille, vit Willy, un rebelle du Sud au comportement animal.
back_translation: In the heart of the Blue Ridge Mountains, just outside a small quiet town, lives Willy, a Southern rebel with animal-like behavior.

text: the touch is generally light enough and the performances , for the most part , credible .
translation: le toucher est généralement assez léger et les performances, pour la plupart, crédibles.
back_translation: The touch is generally quite light and the performances are mostly credible.

text: lynn runs into yan , the cousin of an old friend who died .
translation: Lynn croise Yan, le cousin d'un vieil ami qui est décédé.
back_translation: Lynn meets Yan, the cousin of an old friend who has passed away.

text: in theory , a middle-aged romance pairing clayburgh and tambor sounds promising , but in practice it 's something else altogether -- clownish and offensive and nothing at all like real life .
translation: En théorie, un couple romantique d'âge mûr associant Clayburgh et Tambor semble prometteur, mais en pratique, c'est tout autre chose : clownesque, offensant et rien de ce qu'est la vraie vie.
back_translation: In theory, a mature romantic couple featuring Clayburgh and Tambor seems promising, but in practice, it is quite another thing: clownish, offensive, and nothing like real life.

text: set in present-day hollywood , the story concerns a script which does not exist , but nonetheless draws praise and bids from the creative community .
translation: se déroulant dans le Hollywood d'aujourd'hui, l'histoire concerne un scénario qui n'existe pas, mais qui suscite néanmoins des éloges et des enchères de la part de la communauté créative.
back_translation: Set in today's Hollywood, the story concerns a script that does not exist, yet still garners praise and bids from the creative community.

text: as it stands , there 's some fine sex onscreen , and some tense arguing , but not a whole lot more .
translation: En l'état actuel des choses, il y a quelques scènes de sexe intéressantes à l'écran et des disputes tendues, mais pas grand-chose de plus.
back_translation: In the current state of affairs, there are a few interesting sex scenes on screen and tense arguments, but not much else.

text: secretary manages a neat trick , bundling the flowers of perversity , comedy and romance into a strangely tempting bouquet of a movie .
translation: le secrétaire gère un tour de magie, regroupant les fleurs de la perversion, de la comédie et de la romance dans un bouquet de film étrangement tentant.
back_translation: The secretary manages a magic trick, bringing together the flowers of perversion, comedy, and romance into a strangely enticing bouquet of film.

text: those of you who are not an eighth grade girl will most likely doze off during this one .
translation: Ceux d'entre vous qui ne sont pas des filles de huitième année s'endormiront probablement pendant celui-ci.
back_translation: Those of you who are not eighth-grade girls will probably fall asleep during this.

text: while they think they are driving out the rojas , a local gang that runs the meth trade for bosses in cabo san lucas , rikki is running an elaborate double-cross on his own family .
translation: Alors qu'ils pensent chasser les rojas, un gang local qui contrôle le commerce de la méthamphétamine pour des patrons à Cabo San Lucas, Rikki prépare une double trahison élaborée contre sa propre famille.
back_translation: While they think they are hunting the rojas, a local gang that controls the methamphetamine trade for bosses in Cabo San Lucas, Rikki is preparing an elaborate double betrayal against her own family.

text: it 's like a rap rashomon . there 's a million different stories here .
translation: C'est comme un Rashomon rap. Il y a un million d'histoires différentes ici.
back_translation: It's like a rap Rashomon. There are a million different stories here.

text: 4ever has the same sledgehammer appeal as pokemon videos , but it breathes more on the big screen and induces headaches more slowly .
translation: 4ever a le même attrait écrasant que les vidéos Pokémon, mais il prend plus de temps à se développer sur grand écran et provoque des maux de tête plus lentement.
back_translation: 4ever has the same overwhelming appeal as Pokémon videos, but it takes longer to develop on the big screen and induces headaches more slowly.

text: a cellophane-pop remake of the punk classic ladies and gentlemen , the fabulous stains . . . crossroads is never much worse than bland or better than inconsequential .
translation: un remake en cellophane-pop du classique punk ladies and gentlemen, the fabulous stains... crossroads n'est jamais beaucoup pire que banal ou mieux que insignifiant.
back_translation: a cellophane-pop remake of the punk classic ladies and gentlemen, the fabulous stains... crossroads is never much worse than banal or better than insignificant.

text: cameroon and its peoples are the lark , its feathers plucked first by colonialism and then by native strong-men : `` alouette , je te plumerai . ``
translation: Le Cameroun et ses peuples sont l'alouette, ses plumes arrachées d'abord par le colonialisme puis par des hommes forts autochtones : « alouette, je te plumerai. »
back_translation: Cameroon and its people are the lark, its feathers torn off first by colonialism and then by strong local men: "lark, I will pluck you."

text: he then goes to paris where he prepares to make a political film criticizing the state of repression in his native land .
translation: il se rend ensuite à Paris où il se prépare à réaliser un film politique critiquant l'état de répression dans son pays natal.
back_translation: He then goes to Paris where he prepares to make a political film criticizing the state of repression in his home country.

text: like a documentary version of fight club , shorn of social insight , intellectual pretension and cinematic interest .
translation: comme une version documentaire de Fight Club, dépouillée de toute perspective sociale, de prétention intellectuelle et d'intérêt cinématographique.
back_translation: like a documentary version of Fight Club, stripped of any social perspective, intellectual pretension, and cinematic interest.

text: the film is an earnest try at beachcombing verismo , but it would be even more indistinct than it is were it not for the striking , quietly vulnerable personality of ms . ambrose .
translation: Le film est une tentative sincère de verismo en matière de recherche sur la plage, mais il serait encore plus indistinct qu'il ne l'est sans la personnalité frappante et discrètement vulnérable de Mlle Ambrose.
back_translation: The film is a sincere attempt at verismo regarding beach research, but it would be even more indistinct than it is without the striking and subtly vulnerable personality of Miss Ambrose.

text: true to its animatronic roots : . . . as stiff , ponderous and charmless as a mechanical apparatus . . . 'the country bears ' should never have been brought out of hibernation .
translation: fidèle à ses racines animatroniques : . . . aussi rigide, lourd et sans charme qu'un appareil mécanique . . . 'les ours du pays' n'auraient jamais dû sortir de l'hibernation.
back_translation: faithful to its animatronic roots: ... as rigid, heavy, and charm-less as a mechanical device ... 'the bears of the land' should never have come out of hibernation.

text: frei assembles a fascinating profile of a deeply humanistic artist who , in spite of all that he 's witnessed , remains surprisingly idealistic , and retains an extraordinary faith in the ability of images to communicate the truth of the world around him .
translation: frei dresse un profil fascinant d'un artiste profondément humaniste qui, malgré tout ce qu'il a vu, reste curieusement idéaliste et conserve une foi extraordinaire dans la capacité des images à communiquer la vérité du monde qui l'entoure.
back_translation: He paints a fascinating profile of an artist who is profoundly humanist and, despite all he has seen, remains curiously idealistic and retains an extraordinary faith in the ability of images to convey the truth of the world around him.

text: the crossing , even after a hard year of hiding , was to be a hardship : three months in a makeshift vessel with two thousand other fugitives , the victims not only of disease , hunger , and death , but primarily of the british navy and intelligence services .
translation: la traversée, même après une année difficile de cachette, devait être une épreuve : trois mois dans une embarcation de fortune avec deux mille autres fugitifs, victimes non seulement de la maladie, de la faim et de la mort, mais principalement de la marine britannique et des services de renseignement.
back_translation: The crossing, even after a difficult year in hiding, was bound to be a trial: three months in a makeshift boat with two thousand other fugitives, victims not only of disease, hunger, and death, but primarily of the British navy and intelligence services.

text: the circles cause a media frenzy and test hess 's faith as he journeys to find out the truth behind the crop circles .
translation: les cercles provoquent une frénésie médiatique et mettent à l'épreuve la foi de Hess alors qu'il cherche à découvrir la vérité derrière les cercles de cultures.
back_translation: The circles provoke a media frenzy and test Hess's faith as he seeks to uncover the truth behind the crop circles.

text: this is , not to put too fine a point on it , a swashbuckler , a costume drama . if you love that old story form , you will be in old-fogy heaven , as it is nearly a perfect example of a genre that died out years ago .
translation: ceci est, sans rentrer dans les détails, un film de cape et d'épée, un drame costumé. si vous aimez cette vieille forme de récit, vous serez au paradis des vieux jeux, car c'est presque un exemple parfait d'un genre qui a disparu il y a des années.
back_translation: This is, without going into details, a swashbuckler film, a costumed drama. If you enjoy this old form of storytelling, you will be in the paradise of old games, as it is almost a perfect example of a genre that disappeared years ago.

text: director shekhar kapur and screenwriters michael schiffer and hossein amini have tried hard to modernize and reconceptualize things , but the barriers finally prove to be too great .
translation: Le réalisateur Shekhar Kapur et les scénaristes Michael Schiffer et Hossein Amini ont essayé de moderniser et de reconceptualiser les choses, mais les barrières se révèlent finalement trop grandes.
back_translation: Director Shekhar Kapur and screenwriters Michael Schiffer and Hossein Amini tried to modernize and reconceptualize things, but the barriers ultimately prove too great.

text: arrests of his posse are piling up and profits are plummeting .
translation: les arrestations de sa bande s'accumulent et les profits s'effondrent.
back_translation: The arrests of his gang are piling up and the profits are collapsing.

text: in the not-too-distant future , movies like ghost ship will be used as analgesic balm for overstimulated minds . right now , they 're merely signposts marking the slow , lingering death of imagination .
translation: dans un avenir pas trop lointain, des films comme "ghost ship" seront utilisés comme un baume analgésique pour des esprits surstimulés. pour l'instant, ils ne sont que des panneaux indicateurs marquant la lente et persistante mort de l'imagination.
back_translation: In a not too distant future, films like "Ghost Ship" will be used as a pain-relieving balm for overstimulated minds. For now, they are just signposts marking the slow and persistent death of imagination.

text: a ragbag of promising ideas and failed narrative , of good acting and plain old bad filmmaking .
translation: un patchwork d'idées prometteuses et de récits échoués, de bonnes performances et de simples mauvais films.
back_translation: a patchwork of promising ideas and failed stories, of good performances and simply bad movies.

text: who , exactly , is fighting whom here ? ah , yes , that would be me : fighting off the urge to doze .
translation: qui, exactement, se bat contre qui ici ? ah, oui, ce serait moi : luttant contre l'envie de m'assoupir.
back_translation: Who, exactly, is fighting against whom here? Ah, yes, it would be me: struggling against the desire to doze off.

text: you need n't be steeped in '50s sociology , pop culture or movie lore to appreciate the emotional depth of haynes ' work . though haynes ' style apes films from the period . . . its message is not rooted in that decade .
translation: Vous n'avez pas besoin d'être plongé dans la sociologie, la culture pop ou l'histoire du cinéma des années 50 pour apprécier la profondeur émotionnelle du travail de Haynes. Bien que le style de Haynes imite des films de cette période... son message n'est pas ancré dans cette décennie.
back_translation: You don't need to be immersed in sociology, pop culture, or the history of 1950s cinema to appreciate the emotional depth of Haynes' work. Although Haynes' style mimics films from that period... his message is not rooted in that decade.

text: an action comedy prequel to spang olsen 's box office hit in china they eat dogs .
translation: une comédie d'action préquelle du succès au box-office de Spang Olsen "En Chine, ils mangent des chiens".
back_translation: An action-comedy prequel to the box office hit by Spang Olsen "In China, They Eat Dogs".

text: but as each retreats into their private worlds of fantasy , a much more lively story unfolds - a story of confrontations that should have happened , of secrets that need to be revealed .
translation: mais alors que chacun se retire dans ses mondes privés de fantasmes, une histoire beaucoup plus vivante se déroule - une histoire de confrontations qui auraient dû se produire, de secrets qui doivent être révélés.
back_translation: But as everyone retreats into their private worlds of fantasies, a much more vivid story unfolds - a story of confrontations that should have taken place, of secrets that must be revealed.

text: emory , a former governor of his tribe , is reunited with his son larry , via the help of a friend , sky montgomery , who invites larry to travel from the old pueblo to the new `` big city `` to join his father at a photo-art exhibition hosted by sky .
translation: Emory, un ancien gouverneur de sa tribu, est réuni avec son fils Larry grâce à l'aide d'un ami, Sky Montgomery, qui invite Larry à voyager de l'ancien pueblo vers la nouvelle « grande ville » pour rejoindre son père lors d'une exposition photo-artistique organisée par Sky.
back_translation: Emory, a former governor of his tribe, is reunited with his son Larry thanks to the help of a friend, Sky Montgomery, who invites Larry to travel from the old pueblo to the new "big city" to join his father at a photo-art exhibition organized by Sky.

text: a much better documentary -- more revealing , more emotional and more surprising -- than its pedestrian english title would have you believe .
translation: un documentaire bien meilleur -- plus révélateur, plus émouvant et plus surprenant -- que ne le laisserait croire son titre anglais banal.
back_translation: a documentary that is much better -- more revealing, more moving, and more surprising -- than its bland English title would suggest.

text: it 's the brilliant surfing photography bringing you right inside the massive waves that lifts blue crush into one of the summer 's most pleasurable movies .
translation: C'est la brillante photographie de surf qui vous plonge au cœur des énormes vagues qui élève Blue Crush parmi les films les plus agréables de l'été.
back_translation: It is the stunning surf photography that immerses you in the heart of the huge waves that elevates Blue Crush among the most enjoyable films of the summer.

text: this latest installment of the horror film franchise that is apparently as invulnerable as its trademark villain has arrived for an incongruous summer playoff , demonstrating yet again that the era of the intelligent , well-made b movie is long gone .
translation: ce dernier volet de la franchise de films d'horreur qui est apparemment aussi invulnérable que son méchant emblématique est arrivé pour un décalage estival incongru, montrant une fois de plus que l'ère du film de série B intelligent et bien fait est bel et bien révolue.
back_translation: This latest installment of the horror film franchise, which is apparently as invulnerable as its iconic villain, has arrived for an incongruous summer release, once again showing that the era of smart and well-made B-movies is indeed long gone.

text: the overall effect is awe and affection -- and a strange urge to get on a board and , uh , shred , dude .
translation: l'effet global est l'émerveillement et l'affection -- et une étrange envie de prendre une planche et, euh, de déchirer, mec.
back_translation: The overall effect is amazement and affection -- and a strange urge to take a board and, uh, tear it apart, man.

text: toledo ( daniel hendler ) , 25 years old , future architect , suffers from an acute jealousy .
translation: Toledo (Daniel Hendler), 25 ans, futur architecte, souffre d'une jalousie aiguë.
back_translation: Toledo (Daniel Hendler), 25 years old, aspiring architect, suffers from acute jealousy.

text: then after rumers spread that he was a communist he was blacklisted from hollywood forever .
translation: Puis, après que des rumeurs aient circulé selon lesquelles il était communiste, il a été mis sur liste noire à Hollywood pour toujours.
back_translation: Then, after rumors circulated that he was a communist, he was blacklisted in Hollywood forever.

text: 'cq may one day be fondly remembered as roman coppola 's brief pretentious period before going on to other films that actually tell a story worth caring about
translation: 'cq pourrait un jour être affectueusement rappelé comme la brève période prétentieuse de Roman Coppola avant de passer à d'autres films qui racontent réellement une histoire digne d'intérêt.
back_translation: "It could one day be affectionately remembered as the brief pretentious period of Roman Coppola before moving on to other films that actually tell a story worth telling."

text: hawn and sarandon hit the ground running , and are so funny and goofy that they distract and delight us .
translation: Hawn et Sarandon démarrent sur les chapeaux de roues, et sont si drôles et délirants qu'ils nous distraient et nous ravissent.
back_translation: Hawn and Sarandon kick off with a bang, and they are so funny and outrageous that they entertain and delight us.

text: the title not only describes its main characters , but the lazy people behind the camera as well .
translation: le titre décrit non seulement ses personnages principaux, mais aussi les paresseux derrière la caméra.
back_translation: The title describes not only its main characters but also the sloths behind the camera.

text: at dinner , his father asks him about his new telescope .
translation: Au dîner, son père lui demande des nouvelles de son nouveau télescope.
back_translation: At dinner, his father asks him for news about his new telescope.

text: it feels like an after-school special gussied up with some fancy special effects , and watching its rote plot points connect is about as exciting as gazing at an egg timer for 93 minutes .
translation: On dirait un téléfilm de l'après-midi embelli avec des effets spéciaux sophistiqués, et regarder ses points d'intrigue répétitifs se connecter est aussi excitant que de fixer un minuteur de cuisine pendant 93 minutes.
back_translation: It looks like an afternoon TV movie embellished with sophisticated special effects, and watching its repetitive plot points connect is as exciting as staring at a kitchen timer for 93 minutes.

text: jordan must decide if simon 's answers are good or evil as the paths become intertwined into each other and the lives of the four friends are eopardized as one falls victim to society 's views and the other three bond together to carry out a friends promise .
translation: Jordan doit décider si les réponses de Simon sont bonnes ou mauvaises alors que les chemins s'entrelacent les uns avec les autres et que la vie des quatre amis est mise en danger alors que l'un devient victime des opinions de la société et que les trois autres se rassemblent pour tenir la promesse d'un ami.
back_translation: Jordan must decide if Simon's answers are right or wrong as the paths intertwine with each other and the lives of the four friends are put at risk while one becomes a victim of society's opinions and the other three come together to keep a promise to a friend.

text: has a shambling charm . . . a cheerfully inconsequential diversion .
translation: a un charme désordonné . . . une diversion joyeusement sans conséquence.
back_translation: has a disordered charm . . . a joyfully inconsequential diversion.

text: when they get there , strange happenings invade the school .
translation: Lorsqu'ils arrivent là-bas, d'étranges événements envahissent l'école.
back_translation: When they arrive there, strange events invade the school.

text: brutally honest and told with humor and poignancy , which makes its message resonate .
translation: brutalement honnête et raconté avec humour et poignance, ce qui rend son message résonnant.
back_translation: brutally honest and told with humor and poignancy, making its message resonate.

text: this is the story of `` johnny `` , a struggling blues musician estranged from both his family and the country roots he left behind .
translation: c'est l'histoire de `` johnny ``, un musicien de blues en difficulté, éloigné à la fois de sa famille et des racines rurales qu'il a laissées derrière lui.
back_translation: It's the story of "Johnny," a struggling blues musician, distanced from both his family and the rural roots he left behind.

text: this is christmas future for a lot of baby boomers .
translation: c'est Noël futur pour beaucoup de baby-boomers.
back_translation: It is future Christmas for many baby boomers.

text: soon after , his wife passes away and he must come to terms with his daughter 's marriage to a man he does not care for and the failure that his life has become .
translation: Peu après, sa femme décède et il doit faire face au mariage de sa fille avec un homme qu'il n'apprécie pas et à l'échec que sa vie est devenue.
back_translation: Shortly after, his wife passes away and he must face his daughter's marriage to a man he does not like and the failure that his life has become.

text: . . . an agreeable time-wasting device -- but george pal 's low-tech 1960 version still rules the epochs .
translation: ... un dispositif de distraction agréable - mais la version à faible technologie de George Pal de 1960 domine toujours les époques.
back_translation: ... a pleasant distraction device - but George Pal's low-tech version from 1960 still dominates the eras.

text: manages to be wholesome and subversive at the same time .
translation: réussit à être à la fois sain et subversif.
back_translation: succeeds in being both healthy and subversive.

text: secret ballot is too contemplative to be really funny .
translation: le scrutin secret est trop contemplatif pour être vraiment drôle.
back_translation: The secret ballot is too contemplative to be truly funny.

text: the man from elysian fields is a cold , bliss-less work that groans along thinking itself some important comment on how life throws us some beguiling curves .
translation: L'homme des champs Élysées est une œuvre froide et sans bonheur qui avance en gémissant, se croyant une importante réflexion sur la manière dont la vie nous lance des courbes séduisantes.
back_translation: The man from the Champs-Élysées is a cold and joyless work that moves forward with moaning, believing it to be an important reflection on how life throws seductive curves at us.

text: irene is about to experience all new ways of romance .
translation: Irène est sur le point de vivre de toutes nouvelles façons de romantisme.
back_translation: Irène is about to experience brand new ways of romance.

text: less funny than it should be and less funny than it thinks it is .
translation: moins drôle qu'il ne devrait l'être et moins drôle qu'il ne le pense.
back_translation: less funny than it should be and less funny than he thinks.

text: this nickleby thing might have more homosexual undertones than an eddie murphy film . and just when you think it ca n't get any more gay , in pops nathan lane .
translation: ce truc de nickleby pourrait avoir plus de sous-entendus homosexuels qu'un film d'eddie murphy. et juste au moment où vous pensez qu'il ne peut pas être plus gay, voilà nathan lane.
back_translation: This Nickleby thing could have more homosexual undertones than an Eddie Murphy movie. And just when you think it can't get gayer, in comes Nathan Lane.

text: it 's hard to quibble with a flick boasting this many genuine cackles , but notorious c . h . o . still feels like a promising work-in-progress .
translation: Il est difficile de chipoter sur un film qui offre autant de véritables éclats de rire, mais le notoire c. h. o. semble encore être un travail en cours prometteur.
back_translation: It is difficult to nitpick a movie that offers so many genuine bursts of laughter, but the notorious c. h. o. still seems to be a promising work in progress.

text: what is unique about his secret life is that an assumption of intelligence , tolerance , and acceptance is already made , and thus the movie can focus on telling a compelling story .
translation: Ce qui est unique dans sa vie secrète, c'est qu'une hypothèse d'intelligence, de tolérance et d'acceptation est déjà établie, et ainsi le film peut se concentrer sur la narration d'une histoire captivante.
back_translation: What is unique about his secret life is that a hypothesis of intelligence, tolerance, and acceptance is already established, allowing the film to focus on telling a captivating story.

text: as of then , bettien became a `` pentita `` and now is a guest of the `` witness protection program `` .
translation: À partir de ce moment-là, Bettien est devenu un « pentita » et est maintenant un invité du « programme de protection des témoins ».
back_translation: From that moment on, Bettien became a "pentita" and is now a guest of the "witness protection program."

text: it 's a sci-fi , time travel , action adventure , comedy , drama mystery all rolled into one as mark twain on the way home from one of his last speaking tours in 1906 , is jostled on a train by 2 men , one in pursuit of the other , twain picks up a newspaper that one of them drops and the headline reads `` manned mars mission . . . .
translation: C'est un mélange de science-fiction, de voyage dans le temps, d'aventure d'action, de comédie, de drame et de mystère, alors que Mark Twain, sur le chemin du retour d'une de ses dernières tournées de conférences en 1906, est bousculé dans un train par deux hommes, l'un poursuivant l'autre. Twain ramasse un journal que l'un d'eux a laissé tomber et le titre dit : « Mission habitée sur Mars... ».
back_translation: It is a mix of science fiction, time travel, action adventure, comedy, drama, and mystery, as Mark Twain, on his way back from one of his last lecture tours in 1906, is jostled on a train by two men, one chasing the other. Twain picks up a newspaper that one of them dropped, and the headline reads: "Manned Mission to Mars...".

text: by the miserable standards to which the slasher genre has sunk , . . . actually pretty good . of course , by more objective measurements it 's still quite bad .

text: on the other side of town a woman named jill valentine tries to escape from the city while battling zombies and matt adison , now transformed into a monster called `` the nemesis `` who is bent on destroying all who live .
translation: De l'autre côté de la ville, une femme nommée Jill Valentine essaie d'échapper à la ville tout en combattant des zombies et Matt Addision, désormais transformé en un monstre appelé « le Némésis », qui a pour but de détruire tous ceux qui vivent.
back_translation: On the other side of the city, a woman named Jill Valentine is trying to escape the city while fighting zombies and Matt Addison, who has now transformed into a monster called "the Nemesis," whose goal is to destroy all living things.

text: told as if reading the pages of a diary , along with a stunning visual style , quiet illustrates that beyond the brink of madness lies one man 's sanity .

back_translation: Tell it as if we were reading the pages of a diary, while providing a stunning visual style, subtly illustrating that behind the edge of madness lies the mental health of a man.

text: directed by rob bowman ( `` the x-files `` ) , `` reign of fire `` fuses a medieval past with a post-apocalyptic future in this exciting tale of adventure and survival .

text: the only surprise is that heavyweights joel silver and robert zemeckis agreed to produce this ; i assume the director has pictures of them cavorting in ladies ' underwear .
translation: La seule surprise est que les poids lourds Joel Silver et Robert Zemeckis aient accepté de produire cela ; je suppose que le réalisateur a des photos d'eux en train de folâtrer en sous-vêtements féminins.
back_translation: The only surprise is that heavyweight producers Joel Silver and Robert Zemeckis agreed to produce this; I suppose the director has photos of them frolicking in women's underwear.

text: outrageousness is all plympton seemed to be going for this time . we miss the quirky amazement that used to come along for an integral part of the ride .
translation: l'outrance est tout ce que Plympton semblait viser cette fois-ci. Nous regrettons l'émerveillement excentrique qui faisait autrefois partie intégrante du voyage.

text: `` die another day `` is a worthy entry in the pantheon of james bond movies .

text: this is n't a good movie ; this is n't a bad movie . this is a movie that dispenses with the whole good/bad paradigm and exists on its own plane of reality .
translation: ce n'est pas un bon film ; ce n'est pas un mauvais film. c'est un film qui se passe de tout le paradigme bon/mauvais et existe sur son propre plan de réalité.
back_translation: It is not a good movie; it is not a bad movie. It is a film that transcends the entire good/bad paradigm and exists on its own plane of reality.

text: you can fire a torpedo through some of clancy 's holes , and the scripters do n't deserve any oscars . but the nerve-raked acting , the crackle of lines , the impressive stagings of hardware , make for some robust and scary entertainment .
translation: vous pouvez tirer une torpille à travers certains des trous de Clancy, et les scénaristes ne méritent pas d'oscars. mais le jeu d'acteur écorché, le crépitement des dialogues, les mises en scène impressionnantes des équipements, offrent un divertissement robuste et effrayant.
back_translation: You can fire a torpedo through some of Clancy's holes, and the screenwriters don't deserve Oscars. But the raw acting, the crackling dialogue, and the impressive staging of the equipment provide robust and terrifying entertainment.

text: shot on location in the williamsburgh and flatbush neighborhoods of brooklyn , hung-up is a 35mm short story in the tradition of happy gilmore and taxi driver .
translation: Tourné sur place dans les quartiers de Williamsburg et Flatbush à Brooklyn, "Hung-Up" est une courte histoire en 35 mm dans la tradition de "Happy Gilmore" et "Taxi Driver".
back_translation: Filmed on location in the neighborhoods of Williamsburg and Flatbush in Brooklyn, "Hung-Up" is a short story in 35 mm in the tradition of "Happy Gilmore" and "Taxi Driver."

back_translation: An unpredictable mix of intelligent conversations among friends, romantic comedy, and dark tragedy that far exceeds what the screenwriter/director John McKay can handle.

text: the narrator and the other characters try to convince us that acting transfigures esther , but she 's never seen speaking on stage ; one feels cheated , and esther seems to remain an unchanged dullard .
translation: le narrateur et les autres personnages essaient de nous convaincre que jouer transforme Esther, mais elle n'a jamais été vue en train de parler sur scène ; on se sent trompé, et Esther semble rester une idiote inaltérée.
back_translation: The narrator and the other characters try to convince us that playing transforms Esther, but she has never been seen speaking on stage; we feel deceived, and Esther seems to remain an unaltered idiot.

text: after he 's dumped on valentine 's day by mallory , his girlfriend of three years , charlie finds himself obsessed and unable to live a normal life without her .
translation: Après avoir été quitté le jour de la Saint-Valentin par Mallory, sa copine depuis trois ans, Charlie se retrouve obsédé et incapable de mener une vie normale sans elle.
back_translation: After being dumped on Valentine's Day by Mallory, his girlfriend of three years, Charlie finds himself obsessed and unable to lead a normal life without her.

text: many a parent and their teen ( or preteen ) kid could bond while watching a walk to remember . so could young romantics out on a date .
translation: De nombreux parents et leur enfant adolescent (ou préadolescent) pourraient renforcer leurs liens en regardant "Souviens-toi de moi". Il en va de même pour les jeunes romantiques lors d'un rendez-vous.

text: jacobi , the most fluent of actors , is given relatively dry material from nijinsky 's writings to perform , and the visuals , even erotically frank ones , become dullingly repetitive .
translation: Jacobi, le plus fluide des acteurs, se voit confier un matériel relativement sec tiré des écrits de Nijinski à interpréter, et les visuels, même ceux érotiquement francs, deviennent douloureusement répétitifs.
back_translation: Jacobi, the most fluid of actors, is given relatively dry material drawn from Nijinski's writings to interpret, and the visuals, even those that are erotically frank, become painfully repetitive.

text: as [ the characters ] get more depressed , the story gets more tiresome , especially as it continues to mount a conspicuous effort to be profound .
translation: À mesure que [les personnages] deviennent de plus en plus déprimés, l'histoire devient de plus en plus fatigante, surtout alors qu'elle continue à faire un effort notoire pour être profonde.
back_translation: As the characters become more and more depressed, the story becomes increasingly exhausting, especially as it continues to make a notable effort to be profound.

text: but this murder investigation is drawing vincent home to long beach , the self-proclaimed city by the sea , where the past has been waiting for him to return .

back_translation: But this investigation into the murder brings Vincent back home to Long Beach, the self-proclaimed seaside city, where the past has never stopped waiting for him.

text: a story about a troubled genius who attempts to build a magnetic engine in hopes of greatly reducing the worlds consumption of fossil fuels and electricity .

text: even if you do n't understand what on earth is going on , this is a movie that will stimulate hours of post viewing discussion , if only to be reminded of who did what to whom and why .

text: the subtitled costume drama is set in a remote african empire before cell phones , guns , and the internal combustion engine , but the politics that thump through it are as timely as tomorrow .

text: after being trapped in hell for quite some time , freddy krueger meets up with jason voorhees after jason is sent to hell by creighton duke ( forget part x ; rewind to friday the 13th part ix ) .

text: sunshine state is sayles at his most robert altman-ish , purposefully juggling about a dozen narrative balls in the air , and letting the mundanity and smallish drama of everyday life tell a larger story .
translation: L'État de la lumière du soleil est Sayles à son plus Altmanien, jonglant intentionnellement avec une douzaine de fils narratifs en l'air, laissant la banalité et le petit drame de la vie quotidienne raconter une histoire plus grande.
back_translation: The state of sunlight is Sayles at its most Altmanian, intentionally juggling a dozen narrative threads in the air, allowing the banality and small drama of everyday life to tell a larger story.

text: the story revolves around a dying father and his son , who is trying to learn more about his dad by piecing together the stories he has gathered over the years .

back_translation: The story revolves around a dying father and his son, who is trying to learn more about his father by gathering the stories he has collected over the years.

text: based on euripides ' immortal drama of the same name , the bacchae ( bahk-ai ' ) is an intense and contemporary retelling of the classic myth in which dionysus , son of zeus , seeks vengeance on thebes , the city of his birth and site of his mortal mother semele 's cruel and horrible death .
translation: Basé sur le drame immortel d'Euripide du même nom, les Bacchantes (bahk-ai') est une relecture intense et contemporaine du mythe classique dans lequel Dionysos, fils de Zeus, cherche à se venger de Thèbes, la ville de sa naissance et lieu de la mort cruelle et horrible de sa mère mortelle Sémélé.
back_translation: Based on the immortal drama by Euripides of the same name, The Bacchae (bahk-ai') is an intense and contemporary reinterpretation of the classical myth in which Dionysus, son of Zeus, seeks to take revenge on Thebes, the city of his birth and the place of the cruel and horrific death of his mortal mother Semele.

text: `` pink-loving , blonde-haired harvard law school graduate elle woods ( witherspoon ) returns in this sequel , as she turns her legal and fashion-savvy know-how towards getting a bill passed through congress , relocating a second time , after adapting her beverly hills ways to harvard , and now . . .
translation: La diplômée en droit de Harvard, Elle Woods (Witherspoon), amoureuse du rose et aux cheveux blonds, revient dans cette suite, alors qu'elle met à profit son expertise juridique et son sens de la mode pour faire passer un projet de loi au Congrès, se relocalisant une deuxième fois après avoir adapté ses manières de Beverly Hills à Harvard, et maintenant...
back_translation: Harvard Law graduate Elle Woods (Witherspoon), who loves pink and has blonde hair, returns in this sequel as she puts her legal expertise and fashion sense to work to pass a bill in Congress, relocating a second time after adapting her ways from Beverly Hills to Harvard, and now...

text: in the end , the film is less the cheap thriller you 'd expect than it is a fairly revealing study of its two main characters M-^W damaged-goods people whose orbits will inevitably and dangerously collide .
translation: Au final, le film est moins le thriller bon marché auquel on pourrait s'attendre qu'une étude assez révélatrice de ses deux personnages principaux : des personnes abîmées dont les trajectoires vont inévitablement et dangereusement se croiser.
back_translation: In the end, the film is less the cheap thriller one might expect than a rather revealing study of its two main characters: damaged individuals whose paths will inevitably and dangerously cross.

text: he 's not happy just to run this fratricidal con , he also wants to cash in as much as he can of one hundred kilos of crystal meth that he stole from the rojas ( and the mexicans ) , seduce the girlfriend of one of his victims , and stay ahead of a cop who was a childhood friend .
translation: Il n'est pas content de simplement diriger cette escroquerie fratricide, il veut aussi tirer le maximum de profit de cent kilos de crystal meth qu'il a volés aux Rojas (et aux Mexicains), séduire la copine de l'une de ses victimes, et devancer un flic qui était un ami d'enfance.
back_translation: He is not satisfied with simply running this fratricidal scam; he also wants to make the maximum profit from the hundred kilos of crystal meth he stole from the Rojas (and the Mexicans), seduce the girlfriend of one of his victims, and outsmart a cop who was a childhood friend.

text: one by one , his friends are deserting his annual pilgrimage to the wisconsin state high school hockey tournament , forcing him to confront some harsh truths about his bizarre obsession .

back_translation: One by one, his friends desert his annual pilgrimage to the Wisconsin state high school hockey tournament, forcing him to confront some harsh truths about his strange obsession.

text: using two separate filmmaking teams ( an all-white crew filming white residents and an all-black camera crew filming black residents ) , two towns of jasper captures very different racial views by townsfolk in jasper , texas , the location for a racially motivated murder of an african american in 1998 .
translation: Utilisant deux équipes de tournage distinctes (une équipe entièrement blanche filmant les résidents blancs et une équipe de caméramen entièrement noire filmant les résidents noirs), "Two Towns of Jasper" capture des points de vue raciaux très différents par les habitants de Jasper, au Texas, lieu d'un meurtre motivé par des raisons raciales d'un Afro-Américain en 1998.
back_translation: Using two distinct filming teams (one all-white team filming white residents and one all-black team filming black residents), "Two Towns of Jasper" captures very different racial viewpoints from the residents of Jasper, Texas, the site of a racially motivated murder of an African American in 1998.

text: like lisa gossels ' children of chabannes ( 2000 ) , which tells another little-known story about french villagers who saved 400 jewish children , shanghai ghetto is a celebration of humanity .

text: bella is the picture of health with boundless energy until a few days before she dies . this is absolutely and completely ridiculous and an insult to every family whose mother has suffered through the horrible pains of a death by cancer .

translation: Situé à l'été 1942 pendant la Seconde Guerre mondiale, le film retrace la trajectoire de simples gens plongés dans des vies extraordinaires, révélant la flamme réconfortante d'espoir et d'humanité qui persiste, même en temps de guerre et de désespoir.
back_translation: Set in the summer of 1942 during World War II, the film traces the journey of ordinary people thrown into extraordinary lives, revealing the comforting flame of hope and humanity that persists, even in times of war and despair.

text: a dutch girl is getting sick of always losing her boyfriends , so when she loses her newest `` gain `` she decides to follow max ( her friend ) to new york where he 's starting a carreer as an actor .
translation: Une fille néerlandaise en a assez de toujours perdre ses petits amis, alors quand elle perd son dernier "trophée", elle décide de suivre Max (son ami) à New York où il commence une carrière d'acteur.
back_translation: A Dutch girl is fed up with always losing her boyfriends, so when she loses her latest "trophy," she decides to follow Max (her friend) to New York where he is starting an acting career.

text: however , finch also has a dilemma when , after wise words from stifler , stifler 's mom and stifler 's dad ( played by tim allen ) decide to renew their vows , and get married again .
translation: Cependant, Finch est également confronté à un dilemme lorsque, après des paroles sages de Stifler, la mère de Stifler et le père de Stifler (interprété par Tim Allen) décident de renouveler leurs vœux et de se marier à nouveau.
back_translation: However, Finch is also faced with a dilemma when, after some wise words from Stifler, Stifler's mother and Stifler's father (played by Tim Allen) decide to renew their vows and get married again.

text: when a group of teens win a contest to spend a night in michael myers ' childhood home to be broadcast live on the internet , they believe they are in for a little fun and some free publicity .
translation: Lorsqu'un groupe d'adolescents remporte un concours pour passer une nuit dans la maison d'enfance de Michael Myers, diffusée en direct sur Internet, ils croient qu'ils sont en route pour un peu de plaisir et une certaine publicité gratuite.
back_translation: When a group of teenagers wins a contest to spend a night in Michael Myers' childhood home, streamed live on the internet, they think they are in for some fun and free publicity.

text: old people will love this movie , and i mean that in the nicest possible way : last orders will touch the heart of anyone old enough to have earned a 50-year friendship .
translation: Les personnes âgées aimeront ce film, et je le dis de la manière la plus agréable possible : Last Orders touchera le cœur de quiconque assez âgé pour avoir gagné une amitié de 50 ans.
back_translation: Older people will love this film, and I say that in the most pleasant way possible: Last Orders will touch the heart of anyone old enough to have had a 50-year friendship.

text: when so many hollywood films actively discourage higher brain functions , you have to give changing lanes credit for giving you food for thought .

text: it 's a compelling and horrifying story , and the laramie project is worthwhile for reminding us that this sort of thing does , in fact , still happen in america .

back_translation: It's a captivating and horrifying story, and the Laramie project is worth reminding us that this kind of thing is, in fact, still happening in America.

text: gainey ) - would unearth a seedy world of drugs and violence , ultimately revealing a motley crew from la 's underbelly including ex-con david lind ( dylan mcdermott ) , nightclub impresario eddie nash ( eric bogosian ) , the most unlikely of american heroes - porn legend john holmes ( val kilmer ) - holmes ' estranged wife sharon ( lisa kudrow ) and his teenage lover dawn schiller ( kate bosworth ) . ``
translation: Gainey - déterrerait un monde sordide de drogues et de violence, dévoilant finalement une équipe hétéroclite du ventre mou de Los Angeles, y compris l'ex-détenu David Lind (Dylan McDermott), l'impresario de club de nuit Eddie Nash (Eric Bogosian), le héros américain le plus improbable - la légende du porno John Holmes (Val Kilmer) - la femme séparée de Holmes, Sharon (Lisa Kudrow) et sa jeune amante, Dawn Schiller (Kate Bosworth).
back_translation: Gainey would unearth a sordid world of drugs and violence, ultimately revealing a motley crew from the soft underbelly of Los Angeles, including ex-con David Lind (Dylan McDermott), nightclub impresario Eddie Nash (Eric Bogosian), the most unlikely American hero - porn legend John Holmes (Val Kilmer) - Holmes's estranged wife, Sharon (Lisa Kudrow), and his young mistress, Dawn Schiller (Kate Bosworth).

text: wallowing in self-pity for years , he decides to commit suicide .

text: a comedy that swings and jostles to the rhythms of life .

text: when two thirteen-year-old boys fall deeply in love with her , they find themselves on a collision course with one another that could not only destroy their friendship , but take the tiny town of medda , alabama with them .
translation: Lorsque deux garçons de treize ans tombent follement amoureux d'elle, ils se retrouvent sur une trajectoire de collision qui pourrait non seulement détruire leur amitié, mais aussi emporter avec eux la petite ville de Medda, Alabama.
back_translation: When two thirteen-year-old boys fall madly in love with her, they find themselves on a collision course that could not only destroy their friendship but also take the small town of Medda, Alabama, with them.

text: the main story involves an innocent teenage boy and a conniving teenage girl who meet on a beach one summer in southern brazil .

back_translation: The main story involves an innocent teenage boy and a sly teenage girl who meet on a beach one summer in southern Brazil.

text: the film lapses too often into sugary sentiment and withholds delivery on the pell-mell pyrotechnics its punchy style promises .

text: as his family is rounded up to be shipped off to the nazi labor camps , he escapes deportation and eludes capture by living in the ruins of warsaw .

back_translation: As his family is gathered to be sent to the Nazi labor camps, he escapes deportation and avoids capture by living in the ruins of Warsaw.

text: though shiri 's eruptions of violence , mayhem and gunplay are every bit as kinetic and dazzling as anything generated in hong kong or hollywood , the film 's primary focus is always on its characters .
translation: Bien que les éruptions de violence, de chaos et de fusillade de Shiri soient tout aussi cinétiques et éblouissantes que tout ce qui est produit à Hong Kong ou à Hollywood, le principal objectif du film reste toujours sur ses personnages.
back_translation: Although the eruptions of violence, chaos, and gunfire in Shiri are just as kinetic and dazzling as anything produced in Hong Kong or Hollywood, the main focus of the film remains on its characters.

text: i liked the movie , but i know i would have liked it more if it had just gone that one step further . i 'm left slightly disappointed that it did n't .

back_translation: I liked the movie, but I know I would have liked it even more if it had just taken that little extra step. I am slightly disappointed that it didn't.

text: secretary is not a movie about fetishism . it is a movie about passion .
translation: Secretary n'est pas un film sur le fétichisme. C'est un film sur la passion.

text: set in the early 1970 's , this is the tale of a young man whose fiancee has been killed , but who finds himself falling for another woman even while he is still living with his fiancee 's grieving parents and being drawn into the legal battle to bring her killer to justice .
translation: Situé au début des années 1970, c'est l'histoire d'un jeune homme dont la fiancée a été tuée, mais qui se retrouve à tomber amoureux d'une autre femme tout en vivant encore avec les parents en deuil de sa fiancée et en étant entraîné dans la bataille juridique pour traduire son meurtrier en justice.
back_translation: Set in the early 1970s, it is the story of a young man whose fiancée has been killed, but who finds himself falling in love with another woman while still living with his fiancée's grieving parents and being drawn into the legal battle to bring her murderer to justice.

text: proof once again that if the filmmakers just follow the books , they ca n't go wrong . better effects , better acting and a hilarious kenneth branagh . an excellent sequel .

back_translation: proves once again that if filmmakers simply follow the books, they cannot go wrong. better effects, better performances, and a hilarious Kenneth Branagh. an excellent sequel.

text: this daring film challenges most widely held notions about religious conviction while providing a complex portrait of an identity crisis that 's run amok and a good mind that 's jumped the tracks .

back_translation: This bold film challenges most preconceived notions about religious conviction while offering a complex portrait of a spiraling identity crisis and a good spirit that has lost its reason.

text: when not wallowing in its characters ' frustrations , the movie is busy contriving false , sitcom-worthy solutions to their problems .

text: after witnessing a horrific and traumatic event , julia lund ( laura regan ) , a graduate student in psychology , gradually comes to the realization that everything which scared her as a child could be real .
translation: Après avoir été témoin d'un événement horrible et traumatisant, Julia Lund (Laura Regan), une étudiante diplômée en psychologie, prend progressivement conscience que tout ce qui l'effrayait dans son enfance pourrait être réel.
back_translation: After witnessing a horrific and traumatic event, Julia Lund (Laura Regan), a graduate student in psychology, gradually becomes aware that everything that frightened her in childhood could be real.

back_translation: Confronting her past, both culturally and emotionally, Eve finds herself involved in the independence movement of Armenia and the crisis of commitment with the man she falls in love with.

text: ami , having dropped out of college with twelve credits left , works at a flower shop , biding her time till she can get eric to understand what she knows deep down what she wants to do - be a mother .

back_translation: Friend, having dropped out of university with twelve credits remaining, works in a florist shop, waiting for the moment when she can make Eric understand what she knows deep down she wants to do - be a mother.

text: but there is a political dilemma : if someone is arrested before he commits a murder , can the person be accused of the murder , which - because of the arrest - never took place ?
translation: mais il y a un dilemme politique : si quelqu'un est arrêté avant de commettre un meurtre, peut-on accuser cette personne de meurtre, qui - en raison de l'arrestation - n'a jamais eu lieu ?

text: then there 's nicole , who gets her orgasmic intimacy watching chan every night .

text: an attorney ( ben affleck ) in a rush to make a court appointment to file legal papers involving a multi-million dollar trust accidentally collides with an alcoholic insurance salesman ( samuel jackson ) , who also is a rush for a court appointment involving the custody of his children .
translation: un avocat (Ben Affleck) pressé d'assister à une audience pour déposer des documents juridiques concernant un trust de plusieurs millions de dollars heurte accidentellement un vendeur d'assurances alcoolique (Samuel Jackson), qui est également pressé pour un rendez-vous au tribunal concernant la garde de ses enfants.
back_translation: A lawyer (Ben Affleck) in a hurry to attend a hearing to file legal documents concerning a multi-million dollar trust accidentally hits an alcoholic insurance salesman (Samuel Jackson), who is also in a rush for a court appointment regarding custody of his children.

text: those outside show business will enjoy a close look at people they do n't really want to know .

text: everyone should be able to appreciate the wonderful cinematography and naturalistic acting .
translation: tout le monde devrait être capable d'apprécier la merveilleuse cinématographie et le jeu d'acteur naturaliste.
back_translation: Everyone should be able to appreciate the wonderful cinematography and the naturalistic acting.

text: originality ai n't on the menu , but there 's never a dull moment in the giant spider invasion comic chiller .
translation: L'originalité n'est pas au menu, mais il n'y a jamais de moment ennuyeux dans le comic frisson de l'invasion des gigantesques araignées.
back_translation: Originality is not on the menu, but there is never a dull moment in the thrilling comic of the invasion of giant spiders.

text: unbeknownst to her , the real scoop is much more awesome then even she could write about , should she live to tell .
translation: À son insu, la véritable histoire est bien plus incroyable que tout ce qu'elle pourrait écrire, si elle devait vivre pour raconter.

text: each brush stroke brings him inexorably closer to an unknown fate , a fate that is perhaps foretold in the very visions that fuel his work .

text: a filmmaker , fascinated by the power of the camera and obsessed with the theories of russian film pioneer dziga vertov , decides to get a camera eye to replace the real eye he lost as a child .
translation: Un cinéaste, fasciné par la puissance de la caméra et obsédé par les théories du pionnier du cinéma russe Dziga Vertov, décide de se procurer un œil de caméra pour remplacer l'œil réel qu'il a perdu dans son enfance.
back_translation: A filmmaker, fascinated by the power of the camera and obsessed with the theories of Russian cinema pioneer Dziga Vertov, decides to acquire a camera eye to replace the real eye he lost in his childhood.

text: she soon finds out it 's hard to get to know him , or even to get nearby him !
translation: elle découvre bientôt qu'il est difficile de le connaître, voire même de s'approcher de lui !

text: a thriller with an edge -- which is to say that it does n't follow the stale , standard , connect-the-dots storyline which has become commonplace in movies that explore the seamy underbelly of the criminal world .
translation: un thriller avec une touche – c'est-à-dire qu'il ne suit pas l'histoire usée et standard du genre "reliez les points" qui est devenue courante dans les films explorant le ventre mou du monde criminel.
back_translation: A thriller with a twist – that is, it doesn't follow the worn-out and standard story of the "connect the dots" genre that has become common in films exploring the underbelly of the criminal world.

text: it can become even more complicated when the visit is a most unusual homestay with three single , american men with extremely diverse and . . . unique personalities .

text: the film 's almost unbearable portrait of sadness and grief transcends its specific story to speak to the ways in which need , history and presumption tangle , and sometimes destroy , blood ties .
translation: Le portrait presque insupportable de la tristesse et du chagrin dans le film transcende son histoire spécifique pour parler des manières dont le besoin, l'histoire et la présomption s'entrelacent et, parfois, détruisent les liens du sang.
back_translation: The almost unbearable portrait of sadness and grief in the film transcends its specific story to speak to the ways in which need, history, and assumption intertwine and, at times, destroy the bonds of blood.

text: sean , an all go no quit , military driven high school student recieves a video tape of a brutal murder .

text: a retired army colonel and veteran of three wars , rescorla was killed in the september 11 , 2001 attack on the world trade center , during which he saved the lives of thousands of wtc employees at the cost of his own life .
translation: Un colonel de l'armée à la retraite et vétéran de trois guerres, Rescorla a été tué lors de l'attaque du 11 septembre 2001 contre le World Trade Center, au cours de laquelle il a sauvé la vie de milliers d'employés du WTC au péril de la sienne.
back_translation: A retired army colonel and veteran of three wars, Rescorla was killed in the September 11, 2001 attack on the World Trade Center, during which he saved the lives of thousands of WTC employees at the risk of his own.

text: the screenplay is hugely overwritten , with tons and tons of dialogue -- most of it given to children .

back_translation: the script is overly written, with an enormous amount of dialogue - most of it being attributed to children.

text: an unremarkable , modern action/comedy buddy movie whose only nod to nostalgia is in the title .

text: despite its old-hat set-up and predictable plot , empire still has enough moments to keep it entertaining .

text: its adult themes of familial separation and societal betrayal are head and shoulders above much of the director 's previous popcorn work .

text: the movie is obviously a labour of love so howard appears to have had free rein to be as pretentious as he wanted .
translation: Le film est manifestement un travail d'amour, donc Howard semble avoir eu les coudées franches pour être aussi prétentieux qu'il le souhaitait.
back_translation: The film is clearly a labor of love, so Howard seems to have had the freedom to be as pretentious as he wanted.

text: he has had no formal education , but on his own , he systematically studies western theories of industrial management and such classical chinese philosophies as confucianism , taoism , and suntzu .
translation: Il n'a reçu aucune éducation formelle, mais de son propre chef, il étudie systématiquement les théories occidentales de la gestion industrielle ainsi que des philosophies chinoises classiques telles que le confucianisme, le taoïsme et Sun Tzu.
back_translation: He received no formal education, but on his own initiative, he systematically studies Western theories of industrial management as well as classic Chinese philosophies such as Confucianism, Taoism, and Sun Tzu.

text: the three leads produce adequate performances , but what 's missing from this material is any depth of feeling .
translation: les trois acteurs offrent des performances adéquates, mais ce qui manque à ce matériel, c'est une profondeur de sentiment.

text: visually imaginative , thematically instructive and thoroughly delightful , it takes us on a roller-coaster ride from innocence to experience without even a hint of that typical kiddie-flick sentimentality .

text: after taking a look at the people around her and examining her life 's choices , lucy decides that it would be unfair to give up this baby just because she did n't do what she wanted to with her own life .
translation: Après avoir regardé les personnes autour d'elle et examiné les choix de sa vie, Lucy décide qu'il serait injuste d'abandonner ce bébé simplement parce qu'elle n'a pas fait ce qu'elle voulait de sa propre vie.
back_translation: After looking at the people around her and examining the choices in her life, Lucy decides that it would be unfair to abandon this baby simply because she did not do what she wanted with her own life.

text: director and co-writer hilary birmingham 's maiden featureM-^E is a strong , polished , professional indie effort that bodes well for bigger success .

back_translation: The debut film and co-writer Hilary Birmingham is a solid, polished, and professional independent film that bodes well for greater success.

text: like most of godard 's films , in praise of love makes you stay awake and lean forward .
translation: Comme la plupart des films de Godard, "À la gloire de l'amour" vous fait rester éveillé et penché en avant.

text: in this playful and rollicking swashbuckler , drag king pirates take to the high seas on a quest to restore stolen treasures .
translation: dans ce flamboyant et entraîneur film de pirates, des pirates drag king s'attaquent aux mers pour retrouver des trésors volés.
back_translation: In this flamboyant and captivating pirate movie, drag king pirates set sail on the seas to recover stolen treasures.

text: it follows and in some cases re-enacts the chronology of shepherd 's visit to a local bar , his kidnap and beating , the discovery of him tied to a fence , the vigil at the hospital , his death and funeral , and the trial of his killers .
translation: Il suit et, dans certains cas, reconstitue la chronologie de la visite du berger dans un bar local, son enlèvement et son passage à tabac, la découverte de lui attaché à une clôture, la veillée à l'hôpital, sa mort et ses funérailles, ainsi que le procès de ses meurtriers.
back_translation: It follows and, in some cases, reconstructs the timeline of the shepherd's visit to a local bar, his kidnapping and beating, the discovery of him tied to a fence, the vigil at the hospital, his death and funeral, as well as the trial of his murderers.

text: taylor williams iii , a wealthy seventeen year old meets his dream `` lavender `` girl ( mandi carson , who comes from a lower-middle class ) for the very first time at mr . dodson 's business education class at seaport-greene high school .
translation: Taylor Williams III, un riche adolescent de dix-sept ans, rencontre pour la toute première fois sa `` fille lavande `` (Mandi Carson, qui vient d'une classe moyenne inférieure) dans le cours d'éducation commerciale de Mr. Dodson au lycée Seaport-Greene.
back_translation: Taylor Williams III, a wealthy seventeen-year-old, meets for the very first time his "lavender girl" (Mandi Carson, who comes from a lower-middle-class background) in Mr. Dodson's business education class at Seaport-Greene High School.

text: a heady , biting , be-bop ride through nighttime manhattan , a loquacious videologue of the modern male and the lengths to which he 'll go to weave a protective cocoon around his own ego .
translation: une montée en ivresse, mordante, en be-bop à travers le Manhattan nocturne, un vidéologue loquace de l’homme moderne et des longueurs auxquelles il ira pour tisser un cocon protecteur autour de son propre ego.
back_translation: a rise in intoxication, biting, in bebop through nocturnal Manhattan, a loquacious videologist of the modern man and the lengths to which he will go to weave a protective cocoon around his own ego.

text: it looks good , but it is essentially empty .

text: this includes never-before-seen images of tests of modified v-1s at point mugu naval air station , and the flight test program for regulus at edwards air force base in 1950 .
translation: cela inclut des images jamais vues auparavant des tests de v-1 modifiés à la station aéronavale de Point Mugu, et le programme d'essai de vol pour Regulus à la base aérienne d'Edwards en 1950.
back_translation: This includes previously unseen images of modified V-1 tests at the Point Mugu Naval Air Station, and the flight test program for Regulus at Edwards Air Force Base in 1950.

text: as shaky as the plot is , kaufman 's script is still memorable for some great one-liners .

text: in the end , the movie bogs down in insignificance , saying nothing about kennedy 's assassination and revealing nothing about the pathology it pretends to investigate .
translation: Au final, le film s'enlise dans l'insignifiance, ne disant rien sur l'assassinat de Kennedy et ne révélant rien sur la pathologie qu'il prétend explorer.
back_translation: In the end, the film bogs down in insignificance, saying nothing about the assassination of Kennedy and revealing nothing about the pathology it claims to explore.

text: one of the most depressing movie-going experiences i can think of is to sit through about 90 minutes of a so-called 'comedy ' and not laugh once .
translation: Une des expériences de cinéma les plus déprimantes auxquelles je puisse penser est de passer environ 90 minutes à regarder une soi-disant 'comédie' sans rire une seule fois.
back_translation: One of the most depressing cinema experiences I can think of is spending about 90 minutes watching a so-called 'comedy' without laughing once.

text: the cousins work nights at a local mall as security guards .

text: armed with a bag of money and mysterious martial arts skills , with marie by his side , bourne scours paris for clues about his identity and past life . . .

back_translation: Armed with a bag of money and mysterious martial arts skills, with Marie by his side, Bourne traverses Paris in search of clues about his identity and past life...

text: with only a few weapons and time running out , they take shelter in an ancient house , inside which they will uncover the secrets of the `` house of the dead . ``
translation: Avec seulement quelques armes et le temps qui s'écoule, ils prennent refuge dans une maison ancienne, à l'intérieur de laquelle ils découvriront les secrets de la « maison des morts ».
back_translation: With only a few weapons and time passing, they take refuge in an old house, inside of which they will uncover the secrets of the "house of the dead."

text: although the editing might have been tighter , hush ! sympathetically captures the often futile lifestyle of young people in modern japan .
translation: Bien que le montage aurait pu être plus serré, Hush ! capture avec sympathie le mode de vie souvent futile des jeunes au Japon moderne.
back_translation: Although the editing could have been tighter, Hush! sympathetically captures the often futile lifestyle of the youth in modern Japan.

text: chicago glorifies murder , glamorizes sex & death -- in other words it is just right for today 's unsunny times .
translation: Chicago glorifie le meurtre, glamorise le sexe et la mort - en d'autres termes, c'est juste ce qu'il faut pour les temps peu ensoleillés d'aujourd'hui.
back_translation: Chicago glorifies murder, glamorizes sex and death - in other words, it's just what is needed for today's gloomy times.

text: at no point during k-19 : the widowmaker did this viewer feel enveloped in a story that , though meant to be universal in its themes of loyalty , courage and dedication to a common goal , never seems to leave the lot .
translation: À aucun moment pendant K-19 : le tueur de veuves, ce spectateur ne s'est senti enveloppé dans une histoire qui, bien que censée être universelle dans ses thèmes de loyauté, de courage et de dévouement à un objectif commun, ne semble jamais quitter le plateau.
back_translation: At no point during K-19: The Widowmaker did this spectator feel enveloped in a story that, while meant to be universal in its themes of loyalty, courage, and dedication to a common goal, never seems to leave the stage.

text: the egyptian queen cleopatra bets against the roman emperor , julius caesar , that her people are still great , even if the times of the pharaohs has long passed .

back_translation: The Egyptian queen Cleopatra bets against the Roman emperor Julius Caesar that her people are still great, even though the time of the pharaohs has long since passed.

text: it works its magic with such exuberance and passion that the film 's length becomes a part of its fun .

text: series of 12 short movies from the start of the twentieth century , compiled by michel reilhac .
translation: série de 12 courts-métrages du début du vingtième siècle, compilée par Michel Reilhac.

text: this bold and lyrical first feature from raja amari expands the pat notion that middle-aged women just wan na have fun into a rousing treatise of sensual empowerment .
translation: ce premier long métrage audacieux et lyrique de raja amari élargit la notion banale selon laquelle les femmes d'âge moyen veulent juste s'amuser en un vibrant traité de l'émancipation sensuelle.
back_translation: This bold and lyrical debut feature by Raja Amari expands the banal notion that middle-aged women just want to have fun into a vibrant treatise on sensual emancipation.

text: atanarjuat , unfolding on a cold-blasted primeval arctic plain , has the quality of totem .

text: . it 's a brilliant revision of the book and it offers a motivation for the invention that 's lacking in the first film version .

text: the country bears has no scenes that will upset or frighten young viewers . unfortunately , there is almost nothing in this flat effort that will amuse or entertain them , either .
translation: Le pays des ours n'a aucune scène qui pourrait déranger ou effrayer les jeunes spectateurs. Malheureusement, il n'y a presque rien dans cet effort plat qui puisse les amuser ou les divertir non plus.
back_translation: The land of bears has no scenes that could disturb or scare young viewers. Unfortunately, there is almost nothing in this flat effort that could amuse or entertain them either.

text: austin powers in goldmember is a cinematic car wreck , a catastrophic collision of tastelessness and gall that nevertheless will leave fans clamoring for another ride .
translation: Austin Powers in Goldmember est un accident de cinéma, une collision catastrophique de mauvais goût et d'audace qui, néanmoins, laissera les fans réclamer une autre aventure.
back_translation: Austin Powers in Goldmember is a cinema accident, a catastrophic collision of bad taste and audacity that, nonetheless, will leave fans clamoring for another adventure.

text: as the strange thefts escalate , detective phil barbara ( gale harold ) is assigned to the case and is soon on chep and fran 's trail .
translation: Alors que les étranges vols s'intensifient, le détective Phil Barbara (Gale Harold) est assigné à l'affaire et se met bientôt sur la trace de Chep et Fran.

text: let 's hope -- shall we ? -- that the 'true story ' by which all the queen 's men is allegedly `` inspired `` was a lot funnier and more deftly enacted than what 's been cobbled together onscreen .
translation: Espérons – n'est-ce pas ? – que la « vraie histoire » qui aurait soi-disant « inspiré » tous les hommes de la reine était beaucoup plus drôle et mieux mise en scène que ce qui a été bricolé à l'écran.
back_translation: Let's hope – shall we? – that the "real story" that supposedly "inspired" all the queen's men was much funnier and better staged than what was put together on screen.

text: as jake and sam bicker throughout their trek across majestic india , they find kabir , a museum curator who possesses an artifact which he claims can produce the musical tone required to open the door to the temple .
translation: Alors que Jake et Sam se chamaillent tout au long de leur voyage à travers l'Inde majestueuse, ils rencontrent Kabir, un conservateur de musée qui possède un artefact qu'il prétend capable de produire la tonalité musicale nécessaire pour ouvrir la porte du temple.
back_translation: As Jake and Sam bicker throughout their journey across majestic India, they meet Kabir, a museum curator who possesses an artifact he claims can produce the musical tone needed to open the temple door.

text: yet , one rare pok & # 233 ; mon is n't safe without help from another - thus enters suicune , a . k . a . the north wind .

text: throughout the rest of the movie , the two never got along , whereas mitch is trying to investigate the whereabouts of a criminal who possesses a mythical `` big gun `` that has enough firepower to collapse a house , while trey just wants to be famous .

text: `` cold mountain `` tells the story of a wounded confederate soldier named inman ( jude law ) who struggles on a perilous journey to get back home to cold mountain , n . c . as well as to ada ( nicole kidman ) , the woman he left behind before going off to fight in the civil war .
translation: `` montagne froide `` raconte l'histoire d'un soldat confédéré blessé nommé Inman (Jude Law) qui lutte lors d'un périlleux voyage pour retourner chez lui à Cold Mountain, en Caroline du Nord, ainsi que vers Ada (Nicole Kidman), la femme qu'il a laissée derrière lui avant de partir se battre dans la guerre civile.
back_translation: "Cold Mountain" tells the story of a wounded Confederate soldier named Inman (Jude Law) who struggles during a perilous journey to return home to Cold Mountain, North Carolina, as well as to Ada (Nicole Kidman), the woman he left behind before going off to fight in the Civil War.

text: finally paula , who ran away from home and got pregnant , is now in a relationship she does n't want .
