back_translation: Finally, Paula, who ran away from home and became pregnant, is now in a relationship she does not want.

text: but all is not smooth in the rockies , as their relationship accelerates - cultural differences , family issues , former loves and life-altering challenges threaten to shake things up .
translation: Mais tout n'est pas facile dans les Rocheuses, alors que leur relation s'accélère - des différences culturelles, des problèmes familiaux, des anciens amours et des défis qui changent la vie menacent de bouleverser les choses.
back_translation: But not everything is easy in the Rockies, as their relationship intensifies - cultural differences, family issues, old loves, and life-changing challenges threaten to upset things.

text: a weaving trail of twists and turns that left people unsettled for two generations until investigative persistence aided by modern technology brings justice for a young mother and her family some 28 years later .

back_translation: Then one night, while he is in his mother's attic, a famous deceased comedian appears and tells Pauly to commit suicide because he will be considered a comedic genius who died before his time.

text: where as many films of this nature linger on the hard , the ugly , the blood , or just the stylistic ; empire focuses on the thinking , the love , and even the light-heartedness , as well as the violence .
translation: tandis que de nombreux films de cette nature s'attardent sur le dur, le laid, le sang, ou simplement sur le style ; Empire se concentre sur la réflexion, l'amour, et même la légèreté, ainsi que sur la violence.

back_translation: It's a question of the problems that most adults face in marriage, and I think that's what I loved about it: the real issues hidden beneath the absurd and vulgar plot.

text: in prospect bay , a remote outpost on the south australian coast , two communities , the goonyas ( whites ) and the nungas ( blacks ) , come together on the one field they have in common , the football field .
translation: À Prospect Bay, un avant-poste isolé sur la côte sud de l'Australie, deux communautés, les Goonyas (blancs) et les Nungas (noirs), se réunissent sur le seul terrain qu'elles ont en commun, le terrain de football.
back_translation: In Prospect Bay, an isolated outpost on the south coast of Australia, two communities, the Goonyas (whites) and the Nungas (blacks), come together on the only ground they have in common, the football field.

text: [ toback 's ] fondness for fancy split-screen , stuttering editing and pompous references to wittgenstein and kirkegaard . . . blends uneasily with the titillating material .
translation: La prédilection de Toback pour les montages sophistiqués en écran partagé, le montage saccadé et les références pompeuses à Wittgenstein et Kierkegaard... se mélange difficilement avec le contenu titillant.
back_translation: Toback's preference for sophisticated split-screen editing, choppy editing, and pompous references to Wittgenstein and Kierkegaard... struggles to blend with the titillating content.

text: this is human comedy at its most amusing , interesting and confirming .
translation: c'est une comédie humaine à son plus amusant, intéressant et confirmant.

text: based on a true story , sergeant peter king ( kenneth cranham ) of the army dental corps , too old to fight , and private leslie cuthbertson ( leo bill ) , a trainee dental mechanic in the corps , are thrown together by their passionate desire to see active service .
translation: Basé sur une histoire vraie, le sergent Peter King (Kenneth Cranham) du corps dentaire de l'armée, trop vieux pour combattre, et le soldat Leslie Cuthbertson (Leo Bill), un apprenti mécanicien dentaire dans le corps, se retrouvent ensemble en raison de leur désir passionné de voir un service actif.
back_translation: Based on a true story, Sergeant Peter King (Kenneth Cranham) of the army dental corps, too old to fight, and Private Leslie Cuthbertson (Leo Bill), a dental mechanic apprentice in the corps, find themselves together due to their passionate desire to see active service.

text: in addition to the overcooked , ham-fisted direction , which has all the actors reaching for the back row , the dialogue sounds like horrible poetry .
translation: En plus d'une direction médiocre et maladroite, qui pousse tous les acteurs à surjouer, le dialogue ressemble à de la poésie horrible.

text: daphne then must struggle with a snobby half-sister and with following the social obligations expected of her while maintaining her own identity .

text: godard has never made a more sheerly beautiful film than this unexpectedly moving meditation on love , history , memory , resistance and artistic transcendence .
translation: Godard n'a jamais réalisé un film aussi purement beau que cette méditation inopinément touchante sur l'amour, l'histoire, la mémoire, la résistance et la transcendance artistique.
back_translation: Godard never made a film as purely beautiful as this unexpectedly touching meditation on love, history, memory, resistance, and artistic transcendence.

text: set in 1986 when best friends harry ( olsen ) and lloyd ( richardson ) were teenagers , this is the madcap comic tale of their attempt to get out of the `` special needs `` department and into regular high school life .
translation: Situé en 1986, lorsque les meilleurs amis Harry (Olsen) et Lloyd (Richardson) étaient adolescents, voici l'histoire comique et folle de leur tentative de sortir du département `` besoins spéciaux '' et d'intégrer la vie normale au lycée.
back_translation: Set in 1986, when best friends Harry (Olsen) and Lloyd (Richardson) were teenagers, here’s the comical and crazy story of their attempt to escape the “special needs” department and integrate into normal high school life.

text: this is snappy , frothy screwball comedy awash in french understatement .
translation: c'est une comédie débridée et pétillante imprégnée de sous-entendus français.
back_translation: It is an unrestrained and sparkling comedy infused with French innuendos.

text: cuts right through the b . s . giving a big middle-fingered `` shut up `` to those who talk up what is nothing more than two guys beating the hell outta one another .

back_translation: cutting through the nonsense, giving a big middle finger to say "shut up" to those who glorify what is nothing more than two guys fighting each other.

text: their life , though unusual , is satisfying until one day , a man named barry kolker ( that her mother refers to at first as `` the goat man `` ) comes into their lives , and ingrid falls madly in love with him , only to have her heart broken , and her life ruined .
translation: leur vie, bien que peu ordinaire, est satisfaisante jusqu'à ce qu'un jour, un homme nommé Barry Kolker (que sa mère appelle d'abord « l'homme chèvre ») entre dans leur vie, et Ingrid tombe follement amoureuse de lui, seulement pour se faire briser le cœur et voir sa vie ruinée.
back_translation: Their life, although somewhat unusual, is satisfying until one day, a man named Barry Kolker (whom his mother initially calls "the goat man") enters their lives, and Ingrid falls hopelessly in love with him, only to have her heart broken and see her life ruined.

text: romantic comedy and dogme 95 filmmaking may seem odd bedfellows , but they turn out to be delightfully compatible here .
translation: La comédie romantique et le cinéma Dogme 95 peuvent sembler des associés improbables, mais ils s'avèrent ici délicieusement compatibles.

back_translation: After pulling off an incredible gold bullion heist from a heavily guarded palace in Venice, Italy, Charlie and his gang - the inside man Steve (Norton), computer whiz Lyle (Green), the charming driver Rob (Statham), explosives expert Left Ear (Mos Def), and veteran thief John Bridger (Sutherland) - can't believe their eyes when it turns out that one of them is a traitor.

text: his religious devotion to the work is challenged however , when his best friend and personal mentor is run down by an irate motorist and knocked into a deep coma .
translation: sa dévotion religieuse au travail est cependant remise en question lorsque son meilleur ami et mentor personnel est renversé par un automobiliste en colère et plongé dans un profond coma.
back_translation: His religious devotion to work is, however, called into question when his best friend and personal mentor is struck by an angry driver and falls into a deep coma.

text: while dutifully pulling on heartstrings , directors dean deblois and chris sanders valiantly keep punching up the mix .
translation: Tout en tirant respectueusement sur les cordes sensibles, les réalisateurs Dean DeBlois et Chris Sanders continuent vaillamment à pimenter le mélange.
back_translation: While respectfully pulling on the heartstrings, directors Dean DeBlois and Chris Sanders bravely continue to spice up the mix.

text: it 's the extra layer that makes this one , the movie 's understanding of how disillusion and inner compromise can gradually separate a young artist from his divine spark .
translation: c'est la couche supplémentaire qui fait que celui-ci, la compréhension par le film de la façon dont la désillusion et le compromis intérieur peuvent progressivement séparer un jeune artiste de son étincelle divine.
back_translation: It is the additional layer that allows the film to understand how disillusionment and internal compromise can gradually separate a young artist from their divine spark.

text: the plants are the only break in the grey monotony around her .
translation: les plantes sont la seule interruption dans la monotonie grise qui l'entoure.

text: with the fbi and press in hot pursuit , she must make the hardest decision in her life .
translation: Avec le FBI et la presse à ses trousses, elle doit prendre la décision la plus difficile de sa vie.

text: the film truly does rescue [ the funk brothers ] from motown 's shadows . it 's about time .

text: briar patch is a modern , southern gothic tale of true love and murder .
translation: Briar Patch est un conte gothique moderne du sud sur le véritable amour et le meurtre.

text: a must for fans of british cinema , if only because so many titans of the industry are along for the ride .

text: lazy , miserable and smug . this is one of the biggest disappointments of the year .

text: a supernatural mystery that does n't know whether it wants to be a suspenseful horror movie or a weepy melodrama . it ends up being neither , and fails at both endeavors .
translation: un mystère surnaturel qui ne sait pas s'il veut être un film d'horreur palpitant ou un mélodrame larmoyant. Il finit par n'être ni l'un ni l'autre, et échoue dans les deux entreprises.
back_translation: A supernatural mystery that doesn't know if it wants to be a thrilling horror film or a tearful melodrama. It ends up being neither, failing in both endeavors.

text: my wife is an actress has its moments in looking at the comic effects of jealousy . in the end , though , it is only mildly amusing when it could have been so much more .
translation: ma femme est actrice et a ses moments à contempler les effets comiques de la jalousie. à la fin, cependant, c'est seulement légèrement amusant alors que cela aurait pu être tellement plus.
back_translation: My wife is an actress and has her moments to contemplate the comedic effects of jealousy. In the end, however, it's only slightly funny when it could have been so much more.

text: she faces exams , completion of her thesis , and a competitive interview process , all of which is compounded when a police detective , wade handler ( bratt ) , begins investigating the two year-old disappearance of her boyfriend , embry langan ( hunnam ) , a young man whose memory haunts and obsesses her .
translation: Elle fait face à des examens, à la rédaction de sa thèse et à un processus d'entretien compétitif, le tout aggravé lorsque le détective de police, Wade Handler (Bratt), commence à enquêter sur la disparition de son petit ami, Embry Langan (Hunnam), qui a eu lieu il y a deux ans, un jeune homme dont le souvenir la hante et l'obsède.
back_translation: She is facing exams, writing her thesis, and a competitive interview process, all compounded when police detective Wade Handler (Bratt) begins investigating the disappearance of her boyfriend, Embry Langan (Hunnam), which happened two years ago, a young man whose memory haunts and obsesses her.

text: the very definition of the 'small ' movie , but it is a good stepping stone for director sprecher .
translation: la définition même du film 'petit', mais c'est une bonne étape pour le réalisateur Sprecher.

text: this movie in a single breath goes to the very heart of the russian experience .
translation: ce film en une seule respiration va au cœur de l'expérience russe.

text: even if it pushes its agenda too forcefully , this remains a film about something , one that attempts and often achieves a level of connection and concern .
translation: même si cela pousse son agenda trop fermement, il s'agit tout de même d'un film sur quelque chose, qui essaie et réussit souvent à établir un niveau de connexion et de préoccupation.
back_translation: Even if it pushes its agenda too firmly, it is still a film about something, which often tries and succeeds in establishing a level of connection and concern.

text: hoping to settle , once and for all , the issue of his virginity , nick begs roger to school him in the art of seducing women .
translation: espérant régler, une fois pour toutes, la question de sa virginité, Nick supplie Roger de lui apprendre l'art de séduire les femmes.
back_translation: Hoping to settle, once and for all, the question of his virginity, Nick begs Roger to teach him the art of seducing women.

text: the film follows fictional movie star gray evans through the disintegration of his marriage , his gradual mental breakdown , and his increasing obsession with a young film student who reminds gray of his own life before becoming famous .
translation: Le film suit la star de cinéma fictive Gray Evans à travers la désintégration de son mariage, sa lente dépression mentale, et son obsession croissante pour une jeune étudiante en cinéma qui lui rappelle sa propre vie avant de devenir célèbre.
back_translation: The film follows the fictional movie star Gray Evans through the disintegration of his marriage, his slow mental depression, and his growing obsession with a young film student who reminds him of his own life before becoming famous.

text: like edward norton in american history x , ryan gosling ( murder by numbers ) delivers a magnetic performance .
translation: Comme Edward Norton dans American History X, Ryan Gosling (Meurtre par nombres) livre une performance magnétique.
back_translation: Like Edward Norton in American History X, Ryan Gosling (Murder by Numbers) delivers a magnetic performance.

text: a series of mysterious and bizarre death threats soon ushers in symptoms of paranoia , unwelcome fame , and eventually a severe case of writer 's block .
translation: une série de menaces de mort mystérieuses et bizarres entraîne rapidement des symptômes de paranoïa, une célébrité indésirable, et finalement un cas sévère de blocage de l'écrivain.
back_translation: A series of mysterious and bizarre death threats quickly leads to symptoms of paranoia, an unwanted celebrity, and ultimately a severe case of writer's block.

text: definitely not the knee-slapper that i was told it would be , but enough hahas for me to grade as passable .
translation: ce n'est définitivement pas le rire à se taper sur les genoux qu'on m'avait dit que ce serait, mais il y a assez de rires pour que je le juge passable.
back_translation: It's definitely not the knee-slapping laughter I was told it would be, but there are enough laughs for me to deem it acceptable.

text: after letting his screenwriting software sit on his shelf for three years , he finally has the big idea that inspires him to load screenwriter 4 . 0 and get writing .
translation: Après avoir laissé son logiciel de scénarisation sur son étagère pendant trois ans, il a enfin la grande idée qui l'inspire à charger Screenwriter 4.0 et à se mettre à écrire.
back_translation: After leaving his screenwriting software on his shelf for three years, he finally has the great idea that inspires him to load Screenwriter 4.0 and start writing.

text: entwined with maggie 's search for hope , the film explores her interaction with her family and friends .

text: best enjoyed as a work of fiction inspired by real-life events . those seeking a definitive account of eisenstein 's life would do better elsewhere .

back_translation: better appreciated as a work of fiction inspired by real events. Those looking for a definitive account of Eisenstein's life would do better to look elsewhere.

text: there 's only one thing his cousin did n't tell him . . .
translation: il n'y a qu'une seule chose que son cousin ne lui a pas dite . . .

text: the story focuses on an ambitious young executive , amanda , who inherits a lovely b & # 38 ; b on a remote island in maine when her grandmother dies .
translation: L'histoire se concentre sur une jeune cadre ambitieuse, Amanda, qui hérite d'un charmant gîte sur une île isolée dans le Maine lorsque sa grand-mère décède.
back_translation: The story focuses on an ambitious young executive, Amanda, who inherits a charming cottage on an isolated island in Maine when her grandmother passes away.

text: beautifully shot against the frozen winter landscapes of grenoble and geneva , the film unfolds with all the mounting tension of an expert thriller , until the tragedy beneath it all gradually reveals itself .
translation: magnifiquement tourné contre les paysages d'hiver gelés de Grenoble et de Genève, le film se déroule avec toute la tension croissante d'un thriller expert, jusqu'à ce que la tragédie sous-jacente se révèle progressivement.
back_translation: Magnificently shot against the frozen winter landscapes of Grenoble and Geneva, the film unfolds with all the mounting tension of an expert thriller, until the underlying tragedy gradually reveals itself.

text: `` mr . deeds `` is suitable summer entertainment that offers escapism without requiring a great deal of thought .
translation: `` Mister Deeds `` est un divertissement estival adapté qui offre une échappatoire sans nécessiter beaucoup de réflexion.

text: fresh from a series of emotional traumas , allison is distrustful and not so easily rescued , though over a period of two days she comes to regard her idealization of dylan as a last opportunity for security and happiness .
translation: Fraîchement sortie d'une série de traumatismes émotionnels, Allison est méfiante et ne se laisse pas sauver si facilement, bien qu'au cours de deux jours, elle en vienne à considérer son idéalisme pour Dylan comme une dernière opportunité de sécurité et de bonheur.
back_translation: Freshly out of a series of emotional traumas, Allison is wary and does not allow herself to be saved so easily, although over the course of two days, she comes to see her idealism for Dylan as a last chance for safety and happiness.

text: sam decker ( dolph lundgren ) is giving up .
translation: Sam Decker (Dolph Lundgren) abandonne.

text: now a full time tattoo artist , he meets a young student named sienna ( de rossi ) who secretly works as a bar stripper .

back_translation: Now a full-time tattoo artist, he meets a young student named Sienna (de Rossi) who secretly works as a stripper in a bar.

text: kudos to director doug liman for injecting textbook spy fare with slick intelligence and a truckload of tension .

back_translation: Bravo to director Doug Liman for injecting a dose of intelligence and a ton of tension into a classic spy film.

text: full of bland hotels , highways , parking lots , with some glimpses of nature and family warmth , time out is a discreet moan of despair about entrapment in the maze of modern life .
translation: plein d'hôtels insipides, d'autoroutes, de parkings, avec quelques aperçus de nature et de chaleur familiale, "time out" est un gémissement discret de désespoir face à l'enfermement dans le labyrinthe de la vie moderne.
back_translation: Full of bland hotels, highways, parking lots, with a few glimpses of nature and family warmth, "time out" is a discreet moan of despair in the face of being trapped in the labyrinth of modern life.

text: leigh is one of the rare directors who feels acting is the heart and soul of cinema . he allows his cast members to make creative contributions to the story and dialogue . this method almost never fails him , and it works superbly here .
translation: Leigh est l'un des rares réalisateurs qui considère que le jeu d'acteur est le cœur et l'âme du cinéma. Il permet à ses acteurs de faire des contributions créatives à l'histoire et aux dialogues. Cette méthode ne lui fait presque jamais défaut, et cela fonctionne à merveille ici.
back_translation: Leigh is one of the few directors who believes that acting is the heart and soul of cinema. He allows his actors to make creative contributions to the story and dialogues. This method almost never lets him down, and it works wonderfully here.

text: the kind of movie that comes along only occasionally , one so unconventional , gutsy and perfectly executed it takes your breath away .
translation: le genre de film qui n'apparaît que rarement, un film si peu conventionnel, audacieux et parfaitement exécuté qu'il vous coupe le souffle.
back_translation: the kind of film that rarely appears, a film so unconventional, bold, and perfectly executed that it takes your breath away.

text: it 's a fractured story about a naive , impulsive , but above all else passionate man , one who will do anything for his family , who will stop at nothing to live his dream .
translation: C'est une histoire fragmentée sur un homme naïf, impulsif, mais surtout passionné, prêt à tout pour sa famille et qui n'hésitera devant rien pour vivre son rêve.
back_translation: It's a fragmented story about a naïve, impulsive man, but above all passionate, willing to do anything for his family and who will stop at nothing to live his dream.

text: for all its random chaos , divine secrets works because of the power of its convictions -- and its cast .
translation: Pour tout son chaos aléatoire, Divine Secrets fonctionne grâce à la force de ses convictions -- et de son casting.
back_translation: For all its random chaos, Divine Secrets works through the strength of its beliefs -- and its casting.

text: a boy named frank ( pidgeon ) and his sister caroline ( podbielska ) find themselves in attic town after investigating strange noises coming from the house top .
translation: Un garçon nommé Frank (Pigeon) et sa sœur Caroline (Podbielska) se retrouvent dans la ville des greniers après avoir enquêté sur des bruits étranges venant du toit de la maison.
back_translation: A boy named Frank (Pigeon) and his sister Caroline (Podbielska) find themselves in the attic city after investigating strange noises coming from the roof of the house.

back_translation: This could... serve as a walk down memory lane for teenagers and young adults who grew up with the Scooby-Doo television shows or their reruns.

translation: Chaque printemps, dans la petite ville portuaire de Beaufort, en Caroline du Nord, Landon Carter se souvient de sa dernière année au lycée de Beaufort et de Jamie Sullivan, la fille qui a changé sa vie.
back_translation: Every spring, in the small port town of Beaufort, North Carolina, Landon Carter remembers his last year at Beaufort High School and Jamie Sullivan, the girl who changed his life.

text: more prophetic words have never been spoken in a world where love , sex , race , and betrayal are more than skin deep .

text: at times the guys taps into some powerful emotions , but this kind of material is more effective on stage . it 's not a motion picture ; it 's an utterly static picture .
translation: parfois, les gars puisent dans des émotions puissantes, mais ce genre de matériel est plus efficace sur scène. ce n'est pas un film ; c'est une image totalement statique.
back_translation: Sometimes, guys draw on powerful emotions, but this kind of material is more effective on stage. It's not a movie; it's a completely static image.

text: when his daughter is kidnapped and held in exchange for priceless diamonds , the leader of a crew of highly skilled urban thieves ( dmx ) forges an unlikely alliance with a taiwanese intelligence officer ( jet li ) to rescue her .
translation: Lorsque sa fille est kidnappée et retenue en échange de diamants inestimables, le chef d'une équipe de voleurs urbains hautement qualifiés (dmx) forge une alliance inattendue avec un agent du renseignement taïwanais (jet li) pour la sauver.
back_translation: When his daughter is kidnapped and held in exchange for priceless diamonds, the leader of a team of highly skilled urban thieves (DMX) forges an unexpected alliance with a Taiwanese intelligence agent (Jet Li) to save her.

text: there 's also a local detective ( swank ) who is conducting her own personal investigation . . .
translation: il y a aussi une détective locale (Swank) qui mène sa propre enquête personnelle . . .

text: never again does n't quite rise above the conventions it attempts to deconstruct , but at its center are two gifted actors who are more than willing to take chances .
translation: never again ne parvient pas vraiment à dépasser les conventions qu'il tente de déconstruire, mais au centre se trouvent deux acteurs talentueux qui sont plus que disposés à prendre des risques.
back_translation: Never Again does not really manage to surpass the conventions it attempts to deconstruct, but at the center are two talented actors who are more than willing to take risks.

text: hollywood comedian/actor pauly shore loses everything : his house , nobody in hollywood wants to represent him , he moves back home with his mom and is now parking cars at the comedy store .
translation: Le comédien/acteur de Hollywood Pauly Shore perd tout : sa maison, personne à Hollywood ne veut le représenter, il retourne vivre chez sa mère et gare maintenant des voitures au Comedy Store.
back_translation: Hollywood comedian/actor Pauly Shore loses it all: his house, no one in Hollywood wants to represent him, he returns to live with his mother, and now he parks cars at the Comedy Store.

text: muccino is honest in the emotional damage left by his immature men and passionate in his portraits of twentysomething commitment-phobes struggling against growing up .
translation: Muccino est honnête sur les dégâts émotionnels laissés par ses hommes immatures et passionné dans ses portraits de jeunes adultes fuyant l'engagement alors qu'ils luttent pour grandir.

text: in 1968 poland expelled the last remaining jews from what once used to be the largest jewish settlement in the world , effectively ending over thousand year long history .
translation: En 1968, la Pologne a expulsé les derniers Juifs restants de ce qui était autrefois le plus grand établissement juif au monde, mettant ainsi fin à une histoire de plus de mille ans.
back_translation: In 1968, Poland expelled the last remaining Jews from what was once the largest Jewish settlement in the world, thus ending a history of over a thousand years.

translation: mais il y a un problème majeur : le véritable amour d'Oscar est sa belle-mère Eve.

text: mocking kung fu pictures when they were a staple of exploitation theater programming was witty . mocking them now is an exercise in pointlessness .
translation: Se moquer des films de kung-fu quand ils étaient un incontournable des programmations de théâtre d'exploitation était plein de pertinence. Se moquer d'eux maintenant est un exercice d'inutilité.
back_translation: Making fun of kung fu movies when they were a staple of exploitation theater programming was full of relevance. Making fun of them now is an exercise in futility.

text: in flashbacks that parallel his investigation , we see alicia , a scholarship girl worried about her grades , gradually pulled into the social life of three rich and amoral young women , led by the blond hadley , a femme fatale .
translation: Dans des flashbacks qui font écho à son enquête, nous voyons Alicia, une boursière préoccupée par ses notes, progressivement entraînée dans la vie sociale de trois jeunes femmes riches et amoral, dirigées par la blonde Hadley, une femme fatale.

text: an 83 minute document of a project which started in a muddle , seesawed back and forth between controlling interests multiple times , then found its sweet spot
translation: un document de 83 minutes d'un projet qui a commencé dans le désordre, a oscillé plusieurs fois entre des intérêts contrôlants, puis a trouvé son point d'équilibre.
back_translation: A 83-minute document of a project that started in chaos, oscillated several times between controlling interests, and then found its balance.

text: while grieving along with her parents and drawn into legal issues presented by a district attorney seeking justice for the family , he finds himself falling in love with another woman , against his own best intentions .
translation: Tout en faisant son deuil avec ses parents et entraîné dans des problèmes juridiques présentés par un procureur cherchant à obtenir justice pour la famille, il se retrouve à tomber amoureux d'une autre femme, contre ses propres meilleures intentions.
back_translation: While mourning with his parents and caught up in legal issues presented by a prosecutor seeking justice for the family, he finds himself falling in love with another woman, against his own best intentions.

text: with salvage crews ordered to clear the crash zone for the busy easter traffic , the locals undertook their own salvage operation , making it their best easter ever .
translation: Avec les équipes de récupération chargées de dégager la zone de crash pour le trafic intense de Pâques, les habitants ont entrepris leur propre opération de sauvetage, en faisant de cette Pâques leur meilleure jamais vécue.
back_translation: With the recovery teams tasked with clearing the crash site for the heavy Easter traffic, the locals undertook their own rescue operation, making this Easter their best ever.

text: trivial where it should be profound , and hyper-cliched where it should be sincere .
translation: triviale là où cela devrait être profond, et hyper-cliché là où cela devrait être sincère.
back_translation: trivial where it should be profound, and hyper-cliché where it should be sincere.

text: watching living actors interact against the lush , studied inertia of the backdrops gives us the impression of history come to life , or statues magically transformed into living creatures .
translation: Regarder des acteurs vivants interagir contre l'inertie luxuriante et étudiée des décors nous donne l'impression que l'histoire prend vie, ou que des statues se transforment magiquement en créatures vivantes.
back_translation: Watching living actors interact against the lush and studied inertia of the sets gives us the impression that the story comes to life, or that statues magically transform into living creatures.

text: unable to remember his name or anything from his past life , he can not get a job or an apartment , so he starts living on the outskirts of the city and slowly starts putting his life back on track .
translation: incapable de se souvenir de son nom ou de quoi que ce soit de sa vie passée, il ne peut pas obtenir de travail ni d'appartement, alors il commence à vivre en périphérie de la ville et commence lentement à remettre sa vie sur les rails.
back_translation: Unable to remember his name or anything from his past life, he cannot get a job or an apartment, so he starts living on the outskirts of the city and slowly begins to get his life back on track.

text: it 's kind of sad that so many people put so much time and energy into this turkey .
translation: C'est un peu triste que tant de gens consacrent autant de temps et d'énergie à cette dinde.

text: this insufferable movie is meant to make you think about existential suffering . instead , it 'll only put you to sleep .
translation: ce film insupportable est censé vous faire réfléchir sur la souffrance existentielle. au lieu de cela, il ne fera que vous endormir.
back_translation: this unbearable film is supposed to make you think about existential suffering. instead, it will only put you to sleep.

text: i basically went in expecting garbage , but color me surprised when it actually turned out to be quite funny !
translation: Je suis essentiellement allé avec des attentes très basses, mais je suis agréablement surpris quand cela s'est avéré plutôt drôle !
back_translation: I essentially went in with very low expectations, but I was pleasantly surprised when it turned out to be quite funny!

text: hoffman 's performance is authentic to the core of his being .

text: nair and writer laura cahill dare to build a movie around some flawed but rather unexceptional women , emerging with a fine character study that 's short on plot but rich in the tiny revelations of real life .
translation: Nair et l'écrivain Laura Cahill osent construire un film autour de femmes imparfaites mais plutôt peu exceptionnelles, aboutissant à une belle étude de caractère qui manque d'intrigue mais est riche en petites révélations de la vie réelle.
back_translation: Nair and the writer Laura Cahill dare to construct a film around imperfect yet rather unexceptional women, resulting in a beautiful character study that lacks intrigue but is rich in small revelations of real life.

text: with its young cast and an appealing balance of uplifting attitude and irreverent humor , drumline has the potential to be a sleeper hit .
translation: Avec sa jeune distribution et un équilibre attrayant entre une attitude optimiste et un humour irrévérencieux, Drumline a le potentiel d'être un succès inattendu.
back_translation: With its young cast and an appealing balance between an optimistic attitude and irreverent humor, Drumline has the potential to be an unexpected success.

text: largely , this is a movie that also does it by the numbers .

text: it has that rare quality of being able to creep the living hell out of you . . .

text: . . . a trashy little bit of fluff stuffed with enjoyable performances and a bewildering sense of self-importance
translation: ... un petit morceau sans valeur rempli de performances agréables et d'un sens déroutant de l'importance de soi.

text: in his flight he encounters sonya , a young bosnian mother desperately trying to return home to see her son .
translation: Dans sa fuite, il rencontre Sonya, une jeune mère bosniaque qui essaie désespérément de rentrer chez elle pour voir son fils.
back_translation: In his flight, he meets Sonya, a young Bosnian mother who is desperately trying to get home to see her son.

text: the movie is essentially a series of fleetingly interesting actors ' moments .

text: she 's saving herself for her very shallow boyfriend , victor johnson ( kip pardue ) , who 's left the states to backpack across europe .
translation: Elle se réserve pour son petit ami très superficiel, Victor Johnson (Kip Pardue), qui a quitté les États-Unis pour faire du backpacking à travers l'Europe.
back_translation: She is saving herself for her very superficial boyfriend, Victor Johnson (Kip Pardue), who left the United States to backpack through Europe.

text: set from his college student years , to his first victims , his capture , escape from prison ( twice ) , his final killing spree to his trial , conviction and execution .
translation: des années universitaires, à ses premières victimes, sa capture, son évasion de prison (deux fois), sa dernière série de meurtres, jusqu'à son procès, sa condamnation et son exécution.
back_translation: university years, to his first victims, his capture, his escape from prison (twice), his last series of murders, up to his trial, his conviction, and his execution.

text: if you want a movie time trip , the 1960 version is a far smoother ride .
translation: Si vous voulez un voyage dans le temps au cinéma, la version de 1960 est une expérience beaucoup plus agréable.
back_translation: If you want a time travel experience at the cinema, the 1960 version is a much more enjoyable experience.

text: with a story inspired by the tumultuous surroundings of los angeles , where feelings of marginalization loom for every dreamer with a burst bubble , the dogwalker has a few characters and ideas , but it never manages to put them on the same path .
translation: avec une histoire inspirée par les environs tumultueux de Los Angeles, où les sentiments de marginalisation planent pour chaque rêveur dont la bulle a éclaté, le promeneur de chiens a quelques personnages et idées, mais il n'arrive jamais à les mettre sur le même chemin.
back_translation: With a story inspired by the tumultuous surroundings of Los Angeles, where feelings of marginalization loom for every dreamer whose bubble has burst, the dog walker has some characters and ideas, but he never manages to set them on the same path.

text: starts as an intense political and psychological thriller but is sabotaged by ticking time bombs and other hollywood-action cliches .
translation: commence comme un intense thriller politique et psychologique mais est saboté par des bombes à retardement et d'autres clichés d'action hollywoodiens.
back_translation: It starts as an intense political and psychological thriller but is sabotaged by ticking bombs and other Hollywood action clichés.

text: if you are into splatter movies , then you will probably have a reasonably good time with the salton sea .
translation: Si vous aimez les films de splatter, alors vous passerez probablement un moment raisonnablement agréable avec le Salton Sea.

text: high in the mountains of macedonia a team of young film makers are making a documentary about katerina vandeva - a descendant of an ancient and very famous family .
translation: Dans les montagnes de Macédoine, une équipe de jeunes cinéastes réalise un documentaire sur Katerina Vandeva, une descendante d'une famille ancienne et très célèbre.
back_translation: In the mountains of Macedonia, a team of young filmmakers is making a documentary about Katerina Vandeva, a descendant of an ancient and very famous family.

text: by the end of the girl 's journey there is only one question to be answered : what is real and what is her imagination ?
translation: À la fin du voyage de la fille, il n'y a qu'une seule question à répondre : qu'est-ce qui est réel et qu'est-ce qui est son imagination ?
back_translation: At the end of the girl's journey, there is only one question to answer: what is real and what is her imagination?

text: it comes the closest to any movie experience i 've had in re-creating the aftermath of unexplained suicide .
translation: cela s'approche le plus de toute expérience cinématographique que j'ai eue en recréant les conséquences d'un suicide inexpliqué.
back_translation: This comes closest to any cinematic experience I have had in recreating the consequences of an unexplained suicide.

text: laugh-out-loud lines , adorably ditsy but heartfelt performances , and sparkling , bittersweet dialogue that cuts to the chase of the modern girl 's dilemma .
translation: des répliques éclatantes de rire, des performances adorablement distraites mais sincères, et un dialogue pétillant et mélancolique qui va droit au but du dilemme de la fille moderne.
back_translation: bursting laughter, adorably distracted yet sincere performances, and sparkling and melancholic dialogue that goes straight to the heart of the modern girl's dilemma.

text: see clockstoppers if you have nothing better to do with 94 minutes . but be warned , you too may feel time has decided to stand still . or that the battery on your watch has died .
translation: Regardez Clockstoppers si vous n'avez rien de mieux à faire pendant 94 minutes. Mais attention, vous pourriez aussi avoir l'impression que le temps a décidé de s'arrêter. Ou que la pile de votre montre est morte.
back_translation: Watch Clockstoppers if you have nothing better to do for 94 minutes. But beware, you might also feel like time has decided to stop. Or that the battery in your watch is dead.

text: twenty years later , e . t . is still a cinematic touchstone .
translation: Vingt ans plus tard, E.T. reste une référence cinématographique.

text: the girls have unwittingly botched up a diamond delivery to the middle east .

text: alternative medicine obviously has its merits . . . but ayurveda does the field no favors .
translation: La médecine alternative a évidemment ses mérites... mais l'ayurveda ne rend pas service au domaine.

text: he goes to a small room downtown , where he finds some rich asian teenager punks who are slumming it in their own little kick pad .
translation: Il se rend dans une petite pièce au centre-ville, où il trouve des adolescents punks asiatiques riches qui traînent dans leur propre petit repaire.
back_translation: He goes to a small room in the city center, where he finds rich Asian punk teenagers hanging out in their own little hideout.

text: an eloquent , reflective and beautifully acted meditation on both the profoundly devastating events of one year ago and the slow , painful healing process that has followed in their wake .
translation: une méditation éloquente, réfléchie et magnifiquement interprétée sur les événements profondément dévastateurs d'il y a un an et le lent processus de guérison douloureux qui a suivi dans leur sillage.
back_translation: an eloquent, thoughtful meditation beautifully interpreted on the deeply devastating events from a year ago and the slow, painful healing process that followed in their wake.

text: anna changes her mind : when some rich , ignorant american couple wondering about if they should buy the house asks for the swimming pool ( while the mediterranean is half a mile away ) , she simply doubles the charge , and finally puts the `` for sale `` plate into the garbage can .
translation: Anna change d'avis : lorsqu'un couple américain riche et ignorant se demande s'il doit acheter la maison et demande à propos de la piscine (alors que la Méditerranée est à un demi-mile), elle double simplement le tarif, puis met finalement le panneau "à vendre" dans la poubelle.
back_translation: Anna changes her mind: when a rich and ignorant American couple wonders if they should buy the house and asks about the pool (while the Mediterranean is half a mile away), she simply doubles the price, then ultimately puts the "for sale" sign in the trash.

text: this is one of mr . chabrol 's subtlest works , but also one of his most uncanny .
translation: C'est l'une des œuvres les plus subtiles de M. Chabrol, mais aussi l'une des plus étranges.
back_translation: It is one of Mr. Chabrol's most subtle works, but also one of the strangest.

text: in his determination to lighten the heavy subject matter , silberling also , to a certain extent , trivializes the movie with too many nervous gags and pratfalls .
translation: Dans sa détermination à alléger le sujet lourd, Silberling trivialise également, dans une certaine mesure, le film avec trop de gags nerveux et de chutes.
back_translation: In his determination to lighten the heavy subject, Silberling also trivializes the film to some extent with too many nervous gags and punchlines.

text: it 's the most nimble epic you 're likely to see .
translation: c'est l'épopée la plus agile que vous soyez susceptible de voir.

text: after the fellowship has broken , merry and pippin , taken by orcs , make new allies in the ents , while legolas , gimli and aragorn make allies in the people of rohan , and all of them must launch an assault on isengard .
translation: Après la rupture de la communauté, Merry et Pippin, capturés par des orques, se font de nouveaux alliés chez les Ents, tandis que Legolas, Gimli et Aragorn se lient d'amitié avec les Rohirrim, et tous doivent lancer une attaque contre Isengard.
back_translation: After the breaking of the fellowship, Merry and Pippin, captured by orcs, gain new allies among the Ents, while Legolas, Gimli, and Aragorn forge an alliance with the Rohirrim, and all must launch an attack against Isengard.

text: this charmless nonsense ensues amid clanging film references that make jay and silent bob 's excellent adventure seem understated .
translation: ce non-sens sans charme s'ensuit au milieu de références cinématographiques tonitruantes qui rendent l'excellente aventure de Jay et Silent Bob presque sous-estimée.
back_translation: This charm-free nonsense follows amidst loud cinematic references that almost underestimate the excellent adventure of Jay and Silent Bob.

text: for a film that 's being advertised as a comedy , sweet home alabama is n't as funny as you 'd hoped . for a film that 's being advertised as a comedy , sweet home alabama is n't as funny as you 'd hoped .
translation: Pour un film qui est annoncé comme une comédie, Sweet Home Alabama n'est pas aussi drôle que vous l'espériez. Pour un film qui est annoncé comme une comédie, Sweet Home Alabama n'est pas aussi drôle que vous l'espériez.
back_translation: For a film that is marketed as a comedy, Sweet Home Alabama is not as funny as you hoped. For a film that is marketed as a comedy, Sweet Home Alabama is not as funny as you hoped.

text: who is murdered & # 38 ; who is the murderer . . .

text: but genevieve is anticipating exactly that type of response from starla and soon turns everyone , including starla 's friends and family , against her by playing the poor victim and making it appear that starla 's the aggressor .
translation: Mais Geneviève anticipe exactement ce type de réponse de la part de Starla et parvient bientôt à retourner tout le monde, y compris les amis et la famille de Starla, contre elle en jouant la pauvre victime et en faisant croire que c'est Starla qui est l'agresseur.
back_translation: But Geneviève anticipates exactly this type of response from Starla and soon manages to turn everyone, including Starla's friends and family, against her by playing the poor victim and making it seem like Starla is the aggressor.

text: aaliyah rarely dampens her diva persona enough to spark genuine chemistry with townsend . when she speaks , her creepy egyptian demigod voice is as computer processed and overproduced as it was in her music .
translation: Aaliyah atténue rarement son personnage de diva au point de susciter une véritable alchimie avec Townsend. Quand elle parle, sa voix étrange de demoiselle égyptienne est aussi traitée par ordinateur et surproduite qu'elle l'était dans sa musique.
back_translation: Aaliyah rarely tones down her diva character enough to create a genuine chemistry with Townsend. When she speaks, her strange Egyptian damsel voice is as digitally altered and overproduced as it was in her music.

text: while staking out his next assignment -- the innocent girlfriend of his notorious boss -- contract killer malik reflects on the dark path he 's chosen but can not escape .
translation: tout en surveillant sa prochaine mission -- la petite amie innocente de son patron notoire -- le tueur à gages malik réfléchit au chemin sombre qu'il a choisi mais dont il ne peut pas s'échapper.
back_translation: While monitoring his next mission -- the innocent girlfriend of his notorious boss -- the hitman Malik reflects on the dark path he has chosen but from which he cannot escape.

text: a great script brought down by lousy direction . same guy with both hats . big mistake .
translation: un excellent scénario gâché par une direction médiocre. le même gars avec les deux casquettes. grosse erreur.
back_translation: an excellent script ruined by mediocre direction. the same guy wearing both hats. big mistake.

text: rumours of haunting , paired with the desire to forget the painful tragedy that took place five years before , have kept the truth of holy angel 's last days buried with the innocent victims .
translation: les rumeurs de hantise, associées au désir d'oublier la douloureuse tragédie qui a eu lieu cinq ans auparavant, ont gardé la vérité sur les derniers jours de l'ange saint enfouie avec les victimes innocentes.
back_translation: The rumors of haunting, associated with the desire to forget the painful tragedy that occurred five years earlier, have kept the truth about the last days of the holy angel buried along with the innocent victims.

text: in the process , he comes to understand that if he is to make it as a comic artist , he must engage with the community he comes from , take that experience back out into the world , and put it in his work .
translation: Dans le processus, il comprend que s'il veut réussir en tant qu'artiste de bande dessinée, il doit s'engager avec la communauté dont il vient, ramener cette expérience dans le monde, et l'intégrer dans son œuvre.
back_translation: In the process, he understands that if he wants to succeed as a comic artist, he must engage with the community he comes from, bring that experience into the world, and integrate it into his work.

text: the funny thing is , i did n't mind all this contrived nonsense a bit .
translation: La chose drôle, c'est que cela ne me dérangeait pas du tout toute cette absurdité mise en scène.
back_translation: The funny thing is that all this staged absurdity didn't bother me at all.

text: `` 13 conversations about one thing `` is an intelligent flick that examines many different ideas from happiness to guilt in an intriguing bit of storytelling .
translation: `` 13 conversations about one thing `` est un film intelligent qui examine de nombreuses idées différentes, de la joie à la culpabilité, dans un récit intrigant.
back_translation: "13 conversations about one thing" is an intelligent film that explores many different ideas, from joy to guilt, within an intriguing narrative.

text: although attorney matt murdock is blind , his other four senses function with superhuman sharpness .
translation: Bien que l'avocat Matt Murdock soit aveugle, ses quatre autres sens fonctionnent avec une acuité surhumaine.
back_translation: Although the lawyer Matt Murdock is blind, his four other senses function with superhuman acuity.

text: soon , disease spread , robbing people 's abilities to speak ; the endless rain killing all other forms of communication with its acidic torrent .
translation: bientôt, la maladie se répand, dépouillant les gens de leur capacité à parler ; la pluie incessante tuant toutes les autres formes de communication avec son torrent acide.
back_translation: Soon, the disease spreads, stripping people of their ability to speak; the incessant rain killing all other forms of communication with its acid torrent.

text: maggie 's daughter is kidnapped , forcing father and estranged daughter to work together to get her back .

text: it 's as if de palma spent an hour setting a fancy table and then served up kraft macaroni and cheese .

back_translation: It's as if De Palma spent an hour setting an elegant table and then served Kraft macaroni and cheese.

text: mature , graceful documentary on conservative christian parents with homosexual children .
translation: Documentaire mature et gracieux sur des parents chrétiens conservateurs ayant des enfants homosexuels.

text: barry convinces us he 's a dangerous , secretly unhinged guy who could easily have killed a president because it made him feel powerful .
translation: Barry nous convainc qu'il est un gars dangereux, secrètement déséquilibré, qui pourrait facilement avoir tué un président parce que cela lui donnait un sentiment de puissance.
back_translation: Barry convinces us that he is a dangerous guy, secretly unbalanced, who could easily have killed a president because it gave him a sense of power.

text: he is extremely strict at work and believes in pushing his workers to the limit .
translation: Il est extrêmement strict au travail et croit en poussant ses employés à leurs limites.

text: staggers between flaccid satire and what is supposed to be madcap farce .

text: the story is risen out of the conflicts between the white anglo-saxon `` natives `` and the irish immigrants coming into the five points .

back_translation: The story was born from the conflicts between the white Anglo-Saxon "natives" and the Irish immigrants arriving in the Five Points.

text: . . . the one thing this wild film has that other imax films do n't : chimps , lots of chimps , all blown up to the size of a house . that 's fun for kids of any age .
translation: ... la seule chose que ce film fou a par rapport aux autres films IMAX : des chimpanzés, beaucoup de chimpanzés, tous gonflés à la taille d'une maison. C'est amusant pour les enfants de tous âges.
back_translation: ... the only thing this crazy movie has compared to other IMAX films: chimpanzees, lots of chimpanzees, all inflated to the size of a house. It's fun for kids of all ages.

text: the classic tale of 'peter pan ' continues in disney 's sequel 'return to never land ' .
translation: Le conte classique de 'Peter Pan' se poursuit dans la suite de Disney 'Retour au pays imaginaire'.

text: a byzantine melodrama that stimulates the higher brain functions as well as the libido .
translation: un mélodrame byzantin qui stimule les fonctions cérébrales supérieures ainsi que la libido.

text: can those memories be strong enough to make them find their own ways , back in each others arms again ?
translation: ces souvenirs peuvent-ils être assez forts pour les amener à retrouver leur chemin, de nouveau dans les bras l'un de l'autre ?
back_translation: Can these memories be strong enough to lead them back to each other’s arms?

text: when tony takes her on a private cruise from greece to italy , amber is unimpressed at this impromptu no-frills vacation , and takes out her anger on the ship 's first mate , giuseppe ( adriano giannini ) .
translation: Lorsque Tony l'emmène en croisière privée de la Grèce à l'Italie, Amber n'est pas impressionnée par cette vacance improvisée sans fioritures et fait part de sa colère au premier mate du navire, Giuseppe (Adriano Giannini).
back_translation: When Tony takes her on a private cruise from Greece to Italy, Amber is not impressed by this impromptu, no-frills vacation and expresses her anger to the ship's first mate, Giuseppe (Adriano Giannini).

text: warren schmidt ( nicholson ) is forced to deal with an ambiguous future as he enters retirement .
translation: Warren Schmidt (Nicholson) est contraint de faire face à un avenir ambigu alors qu'il entre en retraite.

text: the story captures the dilemma of gifted musicians turning music into a professional career without losing artistic integrity and soul .
translation: L'histoire capture le dilemme des musiciens talentueux qui font de la musique une carrière professionnelle sans perdre leur intégrité artistique et leur âme.
back_translation: The story captures the dilemma of talented musicians who make music a professional career without losing their artistic integrity and soul.

text: their brother was killed by a drug overdose a few years earlier and the gang is determined to keep drugs off their block .
translation: leur frère a été tué par une overdose de drogue quelques années plus tôt et le gang est déterminé à garder la drogue hors de leur secteur.

text: suffers from the lack of a compelling or comprehensible narrative . still , as a visual treat , the film is almost unsurpassed .

back_translation: suffers from a lack of captivating or understandable narrative. However, as a visual pleasure, the film is almost unmatched.

text: what jones needs , however , is not to be cured - but to be accepted for what and who he is .
translation: Ce dont Jones a besoin, cependant, ce n'est pas d'être guéri - mais d'être accepté pour ce qu'il est et qui il est.
back_translation: What Jones needs, however, is not to be cured - but to be accepted for who he is and what he is.

text: the story has its redundancies , and the young actors , not very experienced , are sometimes inexpressive .
translation: l'histoire présente des redondances, et les jeunes acteurs, peu expérimentés, sont parfois inexpressifs.

Depuis qu'Alex est sorti de l'avion, le dessein de la mort n'affecte pas seulement les survivants du vol 180, mais chaque personne avec laquelle ils ont été en contact. Comment vont-ils maintenant l'arrêter ?
back_translation: After a dream of a horrible car accident, Kimberly helps save several people and causes a new break in the design of death, but this time it's different. Since Alex got off the plane, the design of death is not only affecting the survivors of Flight 180, but every person they have come into contact with. How will they stop it now?

back_translation: Two young gentlemen (Rupert Everett and Colin Firth) living in England in the 1890s use the same pseudonym ("Ernest") in secret, which is acceptable until they both fall in love with women using that name, leading to a comedy of mistaken identities...

translation: `` dragon rouge `` est divertissant. un évident copié d'un des meilleurs films jamais réalisés, comment cela pourrait-il en être autrement ? mais c'est divertissant à un niveau inférieur. c'est un film à grignoter, pas un must-have, ni même un must-see.

translation: Regardez superfag avec l'aide de ses super amis loufoques, la fille taco et la fille salsa, la dyke incroyable, la mamie bionique, supermaman, la diva disco, les wonder transexuels et bien d'autres, combattre le méchant, le professeur peckerhead qui tente de débarrasser le monde de l'homosexualité pour toujours !

text: a document about a unique political and artistic moment , the film traces the links between the two most important latin american filmmaking movements of the late '60s the brazilian cinema n & # 244 ; vo and the cuban cine revolucionario .
translation: Un document sur un moment politique et artistique unique, le film retrace les liens entre les deux mouvements cinématographiques latino-américains les plus importants de la fin des années 60 : le cinéma novo brésilien et le cine revolucionario cubain.
back_translation: A document on a unique political and artistic moment, the film traces the connections between the two most important Latin American cinematic movements of the late 1960s: Brazilian cinema novo and Cuban cine revolucionario.

text: the filmmakers try to balance pointed , often incisive satire and unabashed sweetness , with results that are sometimes bracing , sometimes baffling and quite often , and in unexpected ways , touching .
translation: Les cinéastes essaient de trouver un équilibre entre une satire mordante, souvent incisive, et une douceur sans retenue, avec des résultats qui sont parfois revigorants, parfois déroutants et, assez souvent, d'une manière inattendue, émouvants.
back_translation: Filmmakers try to find a balance between biting satire, often incisive, and unrestrained sweetness, with results that are sometimes refreshing, sometimes puzzling, and quite often, in an unexpected way, moving.

text: this is the decades-long story of the relationship between a prominent high school football coach ( harris ) in a small south carolina town and the illiterate , mentally-challenged man nicknamed radio ( gooding ) whom he mentors , who before that had always been the target of jokes and teasing by the community .
translation: C'est l'histoire de plusieurs décennies de la relation entre un entraîneur de football au lycée prominent (Harris) dans une petite ville de Caroline du Sud et un homme illettré et handicapé mental, surnommé Radio (Gooding), qu'il mentore, et qui, auparavant, avait toujours été la cible de blagues et de moqueries de la part de la communauté.
back_translation: It is the story of several decades of the relationship between a prominent high school football coach (Harris) in a small town in South Carolina and an illiterate man with a mental disability, nicknamed Radio (Gooding), whom he mentors, and who had previously always been the target of jokes and ridicule from the community.

back_translation: Oscar Wilde's masterpiece, The Importance of Being Earnest, is perhaps the best play of the 19th century. It is so good that its sharp and polished wit can withstand not only incompetent school productions but even the film adaptation by Oliver Parker.

text: using everything from closely mic-ed subjects to infrared video standing by yourself gets uncomfortably close to its subjects as they get drunk and high , squander money , rip-off their parents , and get in trouble with pretty much everyone in their paths as a conduit to simply having a good time .
translation: Utilisant tout, des sujets minutieusement microphonés aux vidéos infrarouges, se tenir seul s'approche de manière inconfortable de ses sujets alors qu'ils se ivre et se défoncent, dilapident de l'argent, abusent de leurs parents et se mettent dans tous les problèmes possibles en travers de leur chemin, en tant que moyen de simplement passer un bon moment.
back_translation: Using everything from meticulously mic'd subjects to infrared videos, standing alone uncomfortably approaches its subjects as they get drunk and high, waste money, abuse their parents, and get into every possible trouble in their way, as a way to just have a good time.

text: while the costumes hint at changes beneath the surface , it is abbass ' performance , as she vacillates flawlessly between muted hausfrau and shining hoofer , that reveals the depths of her transformation .
translation: Alors que les costumes laissent entrevoir des changements sous la surface, c'est la performance d'Abbass, alors qu'elle oscille parfaitement entre une femme au foyer éclipsée et une danseuse pétillante, qui révèle les profondeurs de sa transformation.

text: the correspondence between spielrein , freud and jung discovered that day in the geneva basement has become essential to understanding the evolution of psychoanalysis ^ & # 214 ; and the virtually insurmountable challenges facing women who sought to contribute in any role other than that of patient .
translation: La correspondance entre Spielrein, Freud et Jung, découverte ce jour-là dans la cave de Genève, est devenue essentielle pour comprendre l'évolution de la psychanalyse ; et les défis pratiquement insurmontables auxquels étaient confrontées les femmes qui cherchaient à contribuer dans un rôle autre que celui de patiente.
back_translation: The correspondence between Spielrein, Freud, and Jung, discovered that day in the cellar of Geneva, became essential for understanding the evolution of psychoanalysis; and the practically insurmountable challenges faced by women who sought to contribute in a role other than that of patient.

text: the story of trouble every day . . . is so sketchy it amounts to little more than preliminary notes for a science-fiction horror film , and the movie 's fragmentary narrative style makes piecing the story together frustrating difficult .
translation: L'histoire de Trouble Every Day... est si ébauchée qu'elle ne représente guère plus que des notes préliminaires pour un film d'horreur de science-fiction, et le style narratif fragmentaire du film rend l'assemblage de l'histoire frustrant et difficile.

text: with wit and empathy to spare , waydowntown acknowledges the silent screams of workaday inertia but stops short of indulging its characters ' striving solipsism .
translation: Avec esprit et empathie à revendre, Waydowntown reconnaît les cris silencieux de l'inertie quotidienne mais s'arrête avant de céder au solipsisme désespéré de ses personnages.
back_translation: With spirit and empathy to spare, Waydowntown recognizes the silent cries of daily inertia but stops short of succumbing to the desperate solipsism of its characters.

translation: Tom est un animateur de radio charismatique de nuit, dont l'éducation peu conventionnelle l'a rendu un peu trop prompt à tomber amoureux et à se marier, ce qui a entraîné trois divorces avant l'âge de 40 ans.
back_translation: Tom is a charismatic night radio host whose unconventional upbringing has made him a bit too quick to fall in love and get married, resulting in three divorces before the age of 40.

text: narc is a no-bull throwback to 1970s action films . it zips along with b-movie verve while adding the rich details and go-for-broke acting that heralds something special .
translation: Narc est un retour sans chichis aux films d'action des années 1970. Il avance à toute allure avec l'énergie des films de série B tout en ajoutant des détails riches et un jeu d'acteur audacieux qui annonce quelque chose de spécial.
