back_translation: as difficult and satisfying as any of David Mamet's hermetic cinematic shell games.

text: from the choppy editing to the annoying score to 'special effects ' by way of replacing objects in a character 's hands below the camera line , `` besotted `` is misbegotten
translation: De la coupe saccadée au score ennuyeux en passant par les "effets spéciaux" consistant à remplacer des objets dans les mains d'un personnage en dessous de la ligne de caméra, « besotted » est mal conçu.
back_translation: From the choppy editing to the boring score, not to mention the "special effects" that involve replacing objects in a character's hands below the camera line, "besotted" is poorly made.

text: the pink house is a fast-paced , youthful comedy that has been called a sweeter , more intellectual animal house .
translation: La maison rose est une comédie rapide et jeune qui a été qualifiée de maison des animaux plus douce et plus intellectuelle.
back_translation: The pink house is a fast-paced and youthful comedy that has been described as a softer and more intellectual animal house.

text: shy tonho dreams of being successful , but misses his family and brazil .
translation: Tonho timide rêve de réussir, mais il manque sa famille et le Brésil.
back_translation: Shy Tonho dreams of succeeding, but he misses his family and Brazil.

text: with a single clue to their whereabouts and nothing to lose , he leaves to find 'his people ' .
translation: avec un seul indice sur leur emplacement et rien à perdre, il part à la recherche de 'son peuple'.
back_translation: With only a single clue about their whereabouts and nothing to lose, he sets out in search of 'his people'.

text: in the end , egoyan 's enormous talent and mychael danna 's intense score keep ararat interesting and emotional .
translation: Au final, le talent énorme d'Egoyan et la bande sonore intense de Mychael Danna rendent Ararat intéressant et émouvant.
back_translation: In the end, Egoyan's enormous talent and Mychael Danna's intense soundtrack make Ararat interesting and moving.

text: an afterschool special without the courage of its convictions .
translation: un spécial après-école sans le courage de ses convictions.
back_translation: a special after-school without the courage of its convictions.

text: despite the authenticity of the trappings , the film is overblown in its plotting , hackneyed in its dialogue and anachronistic in its style .
translation: Malgré l'authenticité des atours, le film est exagéré dans son intrigue, banal dans ses dialogues et anachronique dans son style.
back_translation: Despite the authenticity of the decor, the film is exaggerated in its plot, mundane in its dialogues, and anachronistic in its style.

text: despite a quieter middle section , involving aragorn 's dreams of arwen , this is even better than the fellowship . there are scenes of cinematic perfection that steal your heart away .
translation: malgré une partie centrale plus calme, impliquant les rêves d'Aragorn d'Arwen, c'est même mieux que la communauté de l'anneau. il y a des scènes de perfection cinématographique qui volent votre cœur.
back_translation: Despite a quieter central part, involving Aragorn's dreams of Arwen, it is even better than The Fellowship of the Ring. There are scenes of cinematic perfection that steal your heart.

text: you really have to wonder how on earth anyone , anywhere could have thought they 'd make audiences guffaw with a script as utterly diabolical as this .
translation: On se demande vraiment comment quelqu'un, n'importe où, a pu penser qu'il ferait rire aux éclats les spectateurs avec un script aussi diabolique que celui-ci.
back_translation: One really wonders how someone, anywhere, could have thought they would make the audience laugh out loud with a script as devilish as this one.

text: the vitality of the actors keeps the intensity of the film high , even as the strafings blend together .
translation: la vitalité des acteurs maintient l'intensité du film élevée, même lorsque les mitraillages se mélangent.
back_translation: The vitality of the actors keeps the intensity of the film high, even when the gunfire blends together.

text: during that time , evelyn and her brothers suffer the abuses of living in orphanages while desmond struggles to secure finances .
translation: Pendant ce temps, Évelyne et ses frères subissent les abus de la vie dans des orphelinats tandis que Desmond lutte pour obtenir des finances.
back_translation: Meanwhile, Évelyne and her brothers endure the abuses of life in orphanages while Desmond struggles to obtain finances.

text: the discovery of this new world is described parallel to other stories of emancipation , such as that of three young prostitutes , of an aged couple going nowhere and man 's n landing on the moon .
translation: La découverte de ce nouveau monde est décrite en parallèle à d'autres histoires d'émancipation, telles que celle de trois jeunes prostituées, d'un couple âgé allant nulle part et de l'homme posant le pied sur la lune.
back_translation: The discovery of this new world is described alongside other stories of emancipation, such as that of three young prostitutes, an elderly couple going nowhere, and the man stepping on the moon.

text: an occasionally funny , but overall limp , fish-out-of-water story .
translation: une histoire de poisson hors de l'eau qui est parfois drôle, mais dans l'ensemble plate.
back_translation: A story about a fish out of water that is sometimes funny, but overall flat.

text: the period -- swinging london in the time of the mods and the rockers -- gets the once-over once again in gangster no . 1 , but falls apart long before the end .
translation: la période -- le Londres en pleine effervescence à l'époque des mods et des rockers -- est une nouvelle fois examinée dans gangster n° 1, mais s'effondre bien avant la fin.
back_translation: The period -- London in full swing at the time of the mods and rockers -- is once again examined in Gangster No. 1, but collapses long before the end.

text: ben affleck as jack ryan , tom clancy 's intrepid hero ? ridiculous . what 's next ? d . j . qualls as indiana jones ? or tom green as han solo ?
translation: Ben Affleck dans le rôle de Jack Ryan, le héros intrépide de Tom Clancy ? Ridicule. Qu'est-ce qui vient ensuite ? D. J. Qualls dans le rôle d'Indiana Jones ? Ou Tom Green dans le rôle de Han Solo ?
back_translation: Ben Affleck as Jack Ryan, the intrepid hero of Tom Clancy? Ridiculous. What's next? D. J. Qualls as Indiana Jones? Or Tom Green as Han Solo?

text: in the world of skin deep , not all suspects are created equal .
translation: Dans le monde de la superficialité, tous les suspects ne sont pas créés égaux.
back_translation: In the world of superficiality, not all suspects are created equal.

text: their reporting becomes more compelling when they gather the courage to tell the truth about witnessing two of their peers throw a four-year-old out of a 14th story window .
translation: leurs rapports deviennent plus convaincants lorsqu'ils rassemblent le courage de dire la vérité sur le fait d'avoir vu deux de leurs camarades jeter un enfant de quatre ans par la fenêtre du 14ème étage.
back_translation: Their reports become more compelling when they muster the courage to speak the truth about seeing two of their peers throw a four-year-old child out of a 14th-floor window.

text: hellbent on vengence , jason renews his bloodbath in pursuit of personally slaughtering krueger , and anyone else in his path .
translation: obsédé par la vengeance, Jason reprend son bain de sang à la recherche d'un massacre personnel de Krueger et de quiconque se trouve sur son chemin.
back_translation: Obsessed with revenge, Jason resumes his bloodbath in search of a personal massacre of Krueger and anyone who stands in his way.

text: gradually , will and marcus become friends , and as will teaches marcus how to be a cool kid , marcus helps will to finally grow up .
translation: Petit à petit, Will et Marcus deviennent amis, et tandis que Will enseigne à Marcus comment être un enfant cool, Marcus aide Will à enfin grandir.
back_translation: Little by little, Will and Marcus become friends, and while Will teaches Marcus how to be a cool kid, Marcus helps Will finally grow up.

text: documentary-style drama showing the events that lead up to the tragic incident on january 30 , 1972 in the northern ireland town of derry when a protest march led by civil rights activist ivan cooper was fired upon by british troops , killing 13 protesters and wounding 14 more .
translation: Un drame de style documentaire montrant les événements qui ont conduit au tragique incident du 30 janvier 1972 dans la ville de Derry, en Irlande du Nord, lorsque une marche de protestation dirigée par l'activiste des droits civiques Ivan Cooper a été tirée par des troupes britanniques, tuant 13 manifestants et en blessant 14 autres.
back_translation: A documentary-style drama depicting the events that led to the tragic incident of January 30, 1972, in the city of Derry, Northern Ireland, when a protest march led by civil rights activist Ivan Cooper was fired upon by British troops, leaving 13 demonstrators dead and 14 others injured.

text: but even with the two-wrongs-make-a-right chemistry between jolie and burns . . . this otherwise appealing picture loses its soul to screenwriting for dummies conformity .
translation: mais même avec la chimie à deux erreurs font un droit entre jolie et burns . . . ce film autrement séduisant perd son âme à cause d'un scénario qui se conformes à un niveau basique.
back_translation: but even with the chemistry, two mistakes create a divide between pretty and burns . . . this otherwise appealing film loses its soul because of a plot that conforms to a basic level.

text: in its understanding , often funny way , it tells a story whose restatement is validated by the changing composition of the nation .
translation: Dans sa compréhension, souvent drôle, il raconte une histoire dont la reformulation est validée par la composition changeante de la nation.
back_translation: In his understanding, often funny, he tells a story whose reformulation is validated by the changing composition of the nation.

text: though the dutchman is white , he has been found to be a reincarnated king in the west african nation of ghana - his wife 's homeland .
translation: Bien que le Hollandais soit blanc, il a été découvert qu'il est un roi réincarné dans la nation ouest-africaine du Ghana - le pays natal de sa femme.
back_translation: Although the Dutchman is white, it has been discovered that he is a reincarnated king in the West African nation of Ghana - the homeland of his wife.

text: how inept is serving sara ? it makes even elizabeth hurley seem graceless and ugly .
translation: À quel point "Serving Sara" est-il inepte ? Cela rend même Elizabeth Hurley maladroite et laide.
back_translation: How inept is "Serving Sara"? It even makes Elizabeth Hurley awkward and unattractive.

text: money 's tight , relationships are tough and all around us , media and advertising constantly bombard us with competing messages .
translation: L'argent est serré, les relations sont difficiles et tout autour de nous, les médias et la publicité nous bombardent constamment de messages concurrents.
back_translation: Money is tight, relationships are difficult, and all around us, the media and advertising constantly bombard us with competing messages.

text: hard as this may be to believe , here on earth , a surprisingly similar teen drama , was a better film .
translation: Aussi difficile à croire que cela puisse être, ici sur terre, un drame adolescent étonnamment similaire était un meilleur film.
back_translation: As hard to believe as it may be, here on earth, a surprisingly similar teenage drama was a better film.

text: it throws quirky characters , odd situations , and off-kilter dialogue at us , all as if to say , `` look at this ! this is an interesting movie ! `` but the film itself is ultimately quite unengaging .
translation: Il nous jette des personnages étranges, des situations bizarres et des dialogues décalés, comme pour dire : « Regardez ça ! C'est un film intéressant ! » mais le film lui-même est finalement assez peu captivant.
back_translation: He throws us strange characters, bizarre situations, and offbeat dialogues, as if to say: "Look at this! It's an interesting movie!" but the movie itself is ultimately quite unengaging.

text: those 24-and-unders looking for their own caddyshack to adopt as a generational signpost may have to keep on looking .
translation: ceux de 24 ans et moins à la recherche de leur propre caddyshack à adopter comme un repère générationnel pourraient devoir continuer à chercher.
back_translation: Those aged 24 and under looking for their own Caddyshack to adopt as a generational landmark may have to keep searching.

text: first kammy meets the 40-year-old danny ( dave wong ) and falls head over heels .
translation: d'abord, Kammy rencontre Danny, 40 ans (Dave Wong), et tombe follement amoureux.
back_translation: First, Kammy meets Danny, 40 years old (Dave Wong), and falls madly in love.

text: when investigative reporter , chase somete and her team are on a trail of uncovering this organized fight ring , suk is torn between protecting the only family he knows , and defending the person who can bring him down .
translation: Quand la journaliste d'investigation, Chase Somete, et son équipe sont sur la piste de la découverte de ce réseau de combats organisé, Suk est déchiré entre la protection de la seule famille qu'il connaît et la défense de la personne qui peut le faire tomber.
back_translation: When investigative journalist Chase Somete and her team are on the trail of discovering this organized fight network, Suk is torn between protecting the only family he knows and defending the person who could bring him down.

text: you might say tykwer has done all that heaven allows , if you wanted to make as anti-kieslowski a pun as possible . suffice to say its total promise is left slightly unfulfilled .
translation: On pourrait dire que Tykwer a fait tout ce que le ciel permet, si l'on voulait faire un jeu de mots aussi anti-Kieslowski que possible. Il suffit de dire que sa promesse totale reste légèrement incomplète.
back_translation: One could say that Tykwer did everything the heavens allow, if one wanted to make a pun as anti-Kieslowski as possible. It is enough to say that his total promise remains slightly incomplete.

text: when the young and highly repressive king pentheus discovers that his own mother agave has given herself over to this upstart god of wine and erotic joy , he declares a state of war , despite the very stern warnings of cadmus , the former king and the famed prophet teiresias .
translation: Lorsque le jeune roi penthée, très répressif, découvre que sa propre mère Agave s'est abandonnée à ce dieu de la vin et de la joie érotique, il déclare un état de guerre, malgré les avertissements très sévères de Cadmus, l'ancien roi, et du célèbre prophète Tirésias.
back_translation: When the young king Pentheus, very repressive, discovers that his own mother Agave has surrendered to this god of wine and erotic joy, he declares a state of war, despite the very stern warnings from Cadmus, the former king, and the famous prophet Tiresias.

text: a plan to start a parisian salon with a distinctively democratic air brings conflict with her new surroundings and an unusual ally in a country girl raised by pigs .
translation: Un plan pour ouvrir un salon parisien avec une atmosphère distinctement démocratique entraîne des conflits avec son nouvel environnement et un allié inhabituel en la personne d'une fille de la campagne élevée par des cochons.
back_translation: A plan to open a Parisian salon with a distinctly democratic atmosphere leads to conflicts with its new surroundings and an unusual ally in the form of a countryside girl raised by pigs.

text: boll uses a lot of quick cutting and blurry step-printing to goose things up , but dopey dialogue and sometimes inadequate performances kill the effect .
translation: Boll utilise beaucoup de coupures rapides et de pas imprimés flous pour dynamiser les choses, mais un dialogue stupide et parfois des performances insuffisantes tuent l'effet.
back_translation: Boll uses a lot of quick cuts and blurred prints to energize things, but silly dialogue and sometimes lackluster performances kill the effect.

text: just like any other elevator in any old building .
translation: exactement comme n'importe quel autre ascenseur dans n'importe quel vieux bâtiment.

text: `` issaquena `` chronicles the decay of a wealthy mississippi delta family in the 1930 's .
translation: « Issaquena » raconte la décadence d'une riche famille du delta du Mississippi dans les années 1930.
back_translation: "Issaquena" tells the story of the decline of a wealthy family in the Mississippi delta during the 1930s.

text: then one night she surprises her husband frank ( dennis quaid ) having sex with another man , and her tidy world starts spinning out of control .
translation: Puis, une nuit, elle surprend son mari Frank (Dennis Quaid) en train d'avoir des relations sexuelles avec un autre homme, et son monde bien rangé commence à perdre le contrôle.
back_translation: Then, one night, she catches her husband Frank (Dennis Quaid) having sex with another man, and her orderly world begins to spiral out of control.

text: haynes has so fanatically fetishized every bizarre old-movie idiosyncrasy with such monastic devotion you 're not sure if you should applaud or look into having him committed .
translation: Haynes a tellement fétichisé chaque bizarrerie des vieux films avec une telle dévotion monastique que vous ne savez pas si vous devez applaudir ou envisager de le faire interner.
back_translation: Haynes has fetishized every oddity of old films with such monastic devotion that you don't know whether to applaud or consider having him institutionalized.

text: i 'm not a fan of the phrase 'life affirming ' because it usually means 'schmaltzy , ' but real women have curves truly is life affirming .
translation: Je ne suis pas fan de l'expression « qui confirme la vie » car cela signifie généralement « sentimental », mais « Les vraies femmes ont des courbes » est vraiment une affirmation de la vie.
back_translation: I am not a fan of the expression "that confirms life" because it generally means "sentimental," but "Real women have curves" is truly an affirmation of life.

text: with the help of an angry young filmmaker , a russian sound recordist hoping to break into the local film industry , and a seven-foot tall tow truck driver from quebec , he embarks on a comical investigation into . . .
translation: avec l'aide d'un jeune cinéaste en colère, d'un preneur de son russe espérant percer dans l'industrie cinématographique locale, et d'un conducteur de dépanneuse de sept pieds de haut du Québec, il se lance dans une enquête comique sur . . .
back_translation: with the help of an angry young filmmaker, a Russian sound technician hoping to break into the local film industry, and a seven-foot-tall tow truck driver from Quebec, he embarks on a comical investigation into . . .

text: but when it comes down to it , the one thing stopping you from living your dreams is you .
translation: mais au fond, la seule chose qui vous empêche de vivre vos rêves, c'est vous.
back_translation: But deep down, the only thing preventing you from living your dreams is you.

text: pray 's film works well and will appeal even to those who are n't too familiar with turntablism .
translation: Le film de Pray fonctionne bien et attirera même ceux qui ne sont pas trop familiers avec le turntablism.
back_translation: The film Pray works well and will even attract those who are not too familiar with turntablism.

text: when a regular fashion show goes horribly wrong , they are sucked into the nasty but irresistible underworld of bombay .
translation: quand un défilé de mode régulier tourne mal, ils sont aspirés dans le monde souterrain sale mais irrésistible de Bombay.
back_translation: When a regular fashion show goes wrong, they are drawn into the dirty yet irresistible underground world of Bombay.

text: they start an in-depth investigation of a doctor chu , who is shin-hyun 's psychiatrist .
translation: Ils commencent une enquête approfondie sur le docteur Chu, qui est le psychiatre de Shin-hyun.
back_translation: They are starting a thorough investigation into Dr. Chu, who is Shin-hyun's psychiatrist.

text: with spy kids 2 : the island of lost dreams , the spy kids franchise establishes itself as a durable part of the movie landscape : a james bond series for kids .
translation: Avec Spy Kids 2 : L'île des rêves perdus, la franchise Spy Kids s'établit comme une partie durable du paysage cinématographique : une série James Bond pour enfants.
back_translation: With Spy Kids 2: The Island of Lost Dreams, the Spy Kids franchise establishes itself as a lasting part of the cinematic landscape: a James Bond series for kids.

text: for the first time in years , de niro digs deep emotionally , perhaps because he 's been stirred by the powerful work of his co-stars .
translation: Pour la première fois depuis des années, De Niro s’investit émotionnellement, peut-être parce qu’il a été touché par le travail puissant de ses co-stars.
back_translation: For the first time in years, De Niro is emotionally invested, perhaps because he was moved by the powerful work of his co-stars.

text: the sweetest thing , a romantic comedy with outrageous tendencies , may be a mess in a lot of ways . but it does have one saving grace . a lot of its gags and observations reflect a woman 's point-of-view .
translation: La chose la plus douce, une comédie romantique avec des tendances outrageuses, peut être un désastre à bien des égards. Mais elle a une grâce salvatrice. Beaucoup de ses blagues et de ses observations reflètent le point de vue d'une femme.
back_translation: The sweetest thing, a romantic comedy with outrageous tendencies, can be a disaster in many ways. But it has a saving grace. Many of its jokes and observations reflect a woman's perspective.

text: adopting the name `` spider-man `` , peter first uses his newfound powers to make money , but after his uncle is murdered at the hands of a criminal peter failed to stop , he swears to use his powers to fight the evil that killed his uncle .
translation: adoptant le nom de « spider-man », Peter utilise d'abord ses nouveaux pouvoirs pour gagner de l'argent, mais après que son oncle a été assassiné par un criminel que Peter n'a pas réussi à arrêter, il jure d'utiliser ses pouvoirs pour lutter contre le mal qui a tué son oncle.
back_translation: Adopting the name "Spider-Man," Peter initially uses his new powers to make money, but after his uncle is murdered by a criminal that Peter failed to stop, he vows to use his powers to fight the evil that killed his uncle.

text: he is still famous , although still disliked by snape , malfoy , and the rest of the slytherins .
translation: il est toujours célèbre, bien qu'il soit toujours détesté par Snape, Malfoy et le reste des Serpentards.
back_translation: He is still famous, although he is still hated by Snape, Malfoy, and the rest of the Slytherins.

text: sandra bullock , despite downplaying her good looks , carries a little too much ain't- she-cute baggage into her lead role as a troubled and determined homicide cop to quite pull off the heavy stuff .
translation: Sandra Bullock, malgré sa volonté de minimiser sa beauté, traîne un peu trop de bagages du genre "n'est-elle pas mignonne" dans son rôle principal de détective de police meurtrie et déterminée pour réussir à faire passer les choses lourdes.
back_translation: Sandra Bullock, despite her desire to downplay her beauty, carries a bit too much baggage of the kind "isn't she cute" in her lead role as a wounded and determined police detective to successfully convey the heavier aspects.

text: if oscar had a category called best bad film you thought was going to be really awful but was n't , guys would probably be duking it out with the queen of the damned for the honor .
translation: Si les Oscars avaient une catégorie appelée meilleur mauvais film que vous croyiez vraiment horrible mais qui ne l'était pas, les gars se disputeraient probablement le titre avec la reine des damnés pour l'honneur.
back_translation: If the Oscars had a category called best bad movie that you really thought was horrible but wasn’t, the guys would probably be fighting for the title with Queen of the Damned for the honor.

text: one of those decades-spanning historical epics that strives to be intimate and socially encompassing but fails to do justice to either effort in three hours of screen time .
translation: l'un de ces épopées historiques qui s'étendent sur des décennies et qui s'efforce d'être intime et socialement englobante, mais qui n'arrive pas à rendre justice à l'un ou l'autre de ces efforts en trois heures de temps d'écran.
back_translation: one of those historical epics that span decades and strives to be intimate and socially encompassing, but fails to do justice to either of those efforts in three hours of screen time.

text: every moment crackles with tension , and by the end of the flick , you 're on the edge of your seat .
translation: Chaque moment est chargé de tension, et à la fin du film, vous êtes sur le bord de votre siège.
back_translation: Every moment is filled with tension, and by the end of the movie, you are on the edge of your seat.

text: combining historical documentation , personal stories , and interviews with noted experts and legislators , this documentary honors the dildo 's fight for legitimacy and its many admirers .
translation: en combinant des documents historiques, des histoires personnelles et des interviews avec des experts et des législateurs de renom, ce documentaire rend hommage au combat du dildo pour la légitimité et à ses nombreux admirateurs.
back_translation: By combining historical documents, personal stories, and interviews with experts and renowned legislators, this documentary pays tribute to the fight of the dildo for legitimacy and its many admirers.

text: the film is to be produced by jules , melina 's husband .
translation: le film sera produit par Jules, le mari de Mélina.
back_translation: The film will be produced by Jules, Mélina's husband.

text: provides an intriguing look at how the new economy has redrawn class lines in contemporary china .
translation: offre un aperçu fascinant sur la façon dont la nouvelle économie a redessiné les lignes de classe dans la Chine contemporaine.
back_translation: offers a fascinating insight into how the new economy has redrawn class lines in contemporary China.

text: a film without surprise geared toward maximum comfort and familiarity .
translation: un film sans surprise axé sur un maximum de confort et de familiarité.
back_translation: a film without surprises focused on maximum comfort and familiarity.

text: in other words , it 's just another sports drama/character study . yet this one makes up for in heart what it lacks in outright newness . plus , like i already mentioned . . . it 's robert duvall ! c'mon !
translation: En d'autres termes, c'est juste un autre drame sportif/étude de personnage. Pourtant, celui-ci compense avec du cœur ce qu'il manque en nouveauté absolue. De plus, comme je l'ai déjà mentionné... c'est Robert Duvall ! Allez !
back_translation: In other words, it's just another sports drama/character study. Yet, this one makes up for its lack of absolute novelty with heart. Moreover, as I mentioned before... it's Robert Duvall! Come on!

text: he has the wrong blood type to be able to donate one of his kidneys , so he arranges a trade with a group of organ dealers : one of his kidneys , and 10 million won , in return for their finding a kidney for his sister .
translation: Il a un groupe sanguin incompatible pour pouvoir donner l'un de ses reins, alors il arrange un échange avec un groupe de trafiquants d'organes : un de ses reins, et 10 millions de wons, en échange de leur aide pour trouver un rein pour sa sœur.
back_translation: He has an incompatible blood type to donate one of his kidneys, so he arranges an exchange with a group of organ traffickers: one of his kidneys, and 10 million wons, in exchange for their help in finding a kidney for his sister.

text: these people , most of whom were american citizens , were taken from their homes and sent to `` relocation `` camps in desolate , isloated areas .
translation: ces personnes, dont la plupart étaient des citoyens américains, ont été extraites de chez elles et envoyées dans des camps de "réinstallation" dans des zones désolées et isolées.
back_translation: These people, most of whom were American citizens, were taken from their homes and sent to "relocation" camps in desolate and isolated areas.

text: a bit too derivative to stand on its own as the psychological thriller it purports to be .
translation: un peu trop dérivé pour se tenir seul en tant que thriller psychologique qu'il prétend être.
back_translation: a little too derivative to stand alone as the psychological thriller it claims to be.

text: in the throes of falling for one another , they are soon forced to deal with the bitter realities of their lives prior to that chance encounter .
translation: Dans le tourbillon de leurs sentiments, ils sont bientôt contraints de faire face aux dures réalités de leur vie avant cette rencontre fortuite.
back_translation: In the whirlwind of their feelings, they are soon forced to confront the harsh realities of their lives before this chance meeting.

text: while soderbergh succeeds in recapturing the themes and mood of tarkovsky 's version , he also brings with them a cold , emotionless sheen , a detached air that defeats his efforts to truly engage us .
translation: Bien que Soderbergh réussisse à retrouver les thèmes et l'ambiance de la version de Tarkovski, il apporte également avec lui un éclat froid et sans émotion, une distance qui contredit ses efforts pour réellement nous engager.
back_translation: Although Soderbergh manages to recapture the themes and atmosphere of Tarkovsky's version, he also brings with him a cold and emotionless sheen, a distance that contradicts his efforts to truly engage us.

text: its purpose is to use the precog ( nitive ) potential of three genetically altered humans to prevent murders .
translation: Son but est d'utiliser le potentiel precog (cognitif) de trois humains génétiquement modifiés pour prévenir les meurtres.
back_translation: Its goal is to use the precognitive (cognitive) potential of three genetically modified humans to prevent murders.

text: every so often a movie comes along that confirms one 's worse fears about civilization as we know it . the new guy is one of them .
translation: De temps en temps, un film arrive qui confirme nos pires craintes sur la civilisation telle que nous la connaissons. Le nouveau film en fait partie.
back_translation: From time to time, a film arrives that confirms our worst fears about civilization as we know it. The new film is one of them.

text: director kevin bray excels in breaking glass and marking off the `` miami vice `` checklist of power boats , latin music and dog tracks . he does n't , however , deliver nearly enough of the show 's trademark style and flash .
translation: Le réalisateur Kevin Bray excelle dans la destruction de verre et dans le respect de la liste de contrôle de « Miami Vice » avec des bateaux rapides, de la musique latine et des champs de courses de chiens. Cependant, il ne parvient pas à offrir suffisamment du style et du dynamisme emblématiques de l'émission.
back_translation: Director Kevin Bray excels in the destruction of glass and in adhering to the "Miami Vice" checklist with fast boats, Latin music, and dog racing tracks. However, he fails to deliver enough of the style and dynamism that are emblematic of the show.

text: unlike most anime , whose most ardent fans outside japan seem to be introverted young men with fantasy fetishes , metropolis never seems hopelessly juvenile .

back_translation: Unlike most anime, whose most ardent fans outside Japan seem to be introverted young men with fantasy fetishes, Metropolis never appears desperately juvenile.

text: guzman 's powerful and sometimes triumphant documentary is not only an excellent overview of the affair , but serves as the perfect finale to the monumental trilogy about the coup and its aftermath .
translation: Le documentaire puissant et parfois triomphant de Guzman n'est pas seulement un excellent aperçu de l'affaire, mais il sert également de parfaite finale à la trilogie monumentale sur le coup d'État et ses conséquences.

text: bigelow handles the nuclear crisis sequences evenly but milks drama when she should be building suspense , and drags out too many scenes toward the end that should move quickly .
translation: Bigelow gère les séquences de crise nucléaire de manière équilibrée, mais tire trop de drame quand elle devrait construire du suspense, et fait traîner trop de scènes vers la fin qui devraient avancer rapidement.
back_translation: Bigelow manages nuclear crisis sequences in a balanced way, but she creates too much drama when she should build suspense, and drags out too many scenes towards the end that should progress quickly.

translation: Situé dans les années 1960 à Sydney, c'est l'histoire d'un gangster australien dont les affaires florissantes, renforcées par l'afflux de soldats américains en ville pour des congés durant leurs tournées au Vietnam, attirent l'attention d'abord de la mafia de Chicago, puis de leurs concurrents de la côte est.
back_translation: Set in the 1960s in Sydney, it's the story of an Australian gangster whose thriving business, bolstered by the influx of American soldiers in town on leave during their tours in Vietnam, attracts the attention first of the Chicago mafia, and then of their competitors from the East Coast.

text: coppola 's directorial debut is an incredibly layered and stylistic film that , despite a fairly slow paced , almost humdrum approach to character development , still manages at least a decent attempt at meaningful cinema .
translation: Le premier film de Coppola en tant que réalisateur est un film incroyablement complexe et stylisé qui, malgré un rythme plutôt lent et une approche presque monotone du développement des personnages, parvient tout de même à proposer au moins une tentative décente de cinéma significatif.

text: a morality tale whose thought-provoking potential is hampered by a made-for-tv look , rigid performances and an asinine 'twist ' that brazenly rips off the sixth sense .

back_translation: Thinking that the young man is dead, a curious fisherman with a scalpel finds two bullets in his back and a miniature laser device in his hip.

text: the story starts with a bit more in depth on the court house scene which ended the last film .
translation: L'histoire commence par un peu plus de détails sur la scène du tribunal qui a mis fin au dernier film.
back_translation: The story begins with a bit more detail about the courtroom scene that ended the last film.

text: a lyrical , bittersweet film about what could be termed a by-product of battle .
translation: un film lyrique et doux-amer sur ce qui pourrait être qualifié de sous-produit de la bataille.
back_translation: A lyrical and bittersweet film about what could be qualified as a byproduct of the battle.

text: while `` real women have curves `` suffers from an obvious and simplistic screenplay , it 's a bright looking , well-acted charmer .
translation: Bien que « les vraies femmes ont des courbes » souffre d'un scénario évident et simpliste, c'est un charme éclatant, bien joué.
back_translation: Although "Real Women Have Curves" suffers from an obvious and simplistic script, it has a radiant charm and solid performances.

text: meticulously mounted , exasperatingly well-behaved film , which ticks off kahlo 's lifetime milestones with the dutiful precision of a tax accountant .
translation: un film méticuleusement monté, exaspérément bien comporté, qui coche les jalons de la vie de Kahlo avec la précision dévouée d'un comptable fiscal.
back_translation: A meticulously crafted film, frustratingly well-behaved, that ticks off the milestones of Kahlo's life with the devoted precision of a tax accountant.

text: the work of a filmmaker who has secrets buried at the heart of his story and knows how to take time revealing them . strange occurrences build in the mind of the viewer and take on extreme urgency .
translation: le travail d'un cinéaste qui a des secrets enfouis au cœur de son histoire et sait prendre le temps de les révéler. des événements étranges s'accumulent dans l'esprit du spectateur et prennent une urgence extrême.
back_translation: the work of a filmmaker who has secrets buried at the heart of their story and knows how to take the time to reveal them. strange events accumulate in the viewer's mind and take on extreme urgency.

text: despite its lavish formalism and intellectual austerity , the film manages to keep you at the edge of your seat with its shape-shifting perils , political intrigue and brushes with calamity .
translation: malgré son formalisme somptueux et son austérité intellectuelle, le film parvient à vous tenir en haleine grâce à ses dangers métamorphes, son intrigue politique et ses épreuves avec la calamité.
back_translation: Despite its sumptuous formalism and intellectual austerity, the film manages to keep you on the edge of your seat thanks to its metamorphic dangers, political intrigue, and trials with calamity.

text: years later murdock has grown into a man and becomes a respected criminal attorney .
translation: Des années plus tard, Murdock est devenu un homme et est devenu un avocat criminel respecté.
back_translation: Years later, Murdock has become a man and has become a respected criminal lawyer.

text: icon-bashing has never been as amusing as it is in michael rubbo 's documentary much ado about something .
translation: La déconstruction des icônes n'a jamais été aussi amusante que dans le documentaire de Michael Rubbo, Much Ado About Something.
back_translation: The deconstruction of icons has never been as enjoyable as in Michael Rubbo's documentary, Much Ado About Something.

text: too bland and fustily tasteful to be truly prurient .

text: only a supremely flexible talent like kinnear could whittle away at crane 's nuances and come up with thespian gold .

text: never quite transcends jokester status . . . and the punchline does n't live up to barry 's dead-eyed , perfectly chilled delivery .

text: rocha 's years of exile in cuba ( 1971-72 ) , coincided with a period of great cultural ferment and debate about the roles of the arts in the social and political revolutions of latin america and the third world .
translation: Les années d'exil de Rocha à Cuba (1971-72) ont coïncidé avec une période de grand ferment culturel et de débat sur les rôles des arts dans les révolutions sociales et politiques de l'Amérique latine et du tiers monde.
back_translation: Rocha's years of exile in Cuba (1971-72) coincided with a period of great cultural ferment and debate about the roles of the arts in social and political revolutions in Latin America and the Third World.

text: a dim-witted and lazy spin-off of the animal planet documentary series , crocodile hunter is entertainment opportunism at its most glaring .
translation: Un dérivé peu intelligent et paresseux de la série documentaire Animal Planet, "Crocodile Hunter" est un exemple d'opportunisme ludique à son plus éclatant.
back_translation: A little intelligent and lazy derivative of the Animal Planet documentary series, "Crocodile Hunter" is an example of playful opportunism at its most striking.

text: an alcoholic former schoolteacher hired as security finds himself a reluctant mentor to mouse , the impressionable boy ward of the pimp dewey .
translation: Un ancien professeur alcoolique engagé comme agent de sécurité se retrouve malgré lui mentor du garçon impressionnable Mouse, le pupille du proxénète Dewey.
back_translation: A former alcoholic teacher hired as a security guard finds himself, despite himself, mentoring the impressionable boy Mouse, the ward of the pimp Dewey.

text: miyazaki has provided another triumph , and , in the midst of the quality fall-off of disney 's in-house animated projects , a reason for animation-lovers to rejoice .
translation: Miyazaki a une fois de plus offert un triomphe, et, au milieu de la baisse de qualité des projets animés réalisés en interne par Disney, une raison de se réjouir pour les amateurs d'animation.
back_translation: Miyazaki has once again delivered a triumph, and amidst the decline in quality of animated projects produced in-house by Disney, a reason for celebration for animation enthusiasts.

text: one night , tobias knifes his father in the back , and escape to switzerland .

text: scherfig , who has had a successful career in tv , tackles more than she can handle .

text: on the granger movie gauge of 1 to 10 , the powerpuff girls is a fast , frenetic , funny , even punny 6 -- aimed specifically at a grade-school audience .
translation: Sur l'échelle Granger du cinéma de 1 à 10, Les Super Nanas est un film rapide, frénétique, drôle, voire plein de jeux de mots, avec une note de 6 -- spécifiquement destiné à un public d'écoliers.
back_translation: On the Granger scale of cinema from 1 to 10, The Powerpuff Girls is a fast, frantic, funny film, even full of puns, with a score of 6 -- specifically aimed at a school-aged audience.

text: there are touching moments in etoiles , but for the most part this is a dull , dour documentary on what ought to be a joyful or at least fascinating subject .
translation: Il y a des moments émouvants dans Étoiles, mais pour la plupart, c'est un documentaire ennuyeux et sombre sur ce qui devrait être un sujet joyeux ou du moins fascinant.

text: what one is left with , even after the most awful acts are committed , is an overwhelming sadness that feels as if it has made its way into your very bloodstream .
translation: Ce qu'il reste, même après les actes les plus atroces, c'est une tristesse écrasante qui semble avoir pénétré jusqu'à votre propre sang.
back_translation: What remains, even after the most atrocious acts, is an overwhelming sadness that seems to have penetrated even into your own blood.

text: the story is about a man , bruce hickman , and his relationship with another man , frank , the thing that they have in common is the relation with a deaf person .

back_translation: The story is about a man, Bruce Hickman, and his relationship with another man, Frank. What they have in common is their relationship with a deaf person.

text: allen 's underestimated charm delivers more goodies than lumps of coal .

text: for oscar , diane is somewhat of a distraction , as his continued pursuit of eve leads to an unexpected resolution .
translation: Pour Oscar, Diane est en quelque sorte une distraction, car sa quête continue d'Eve mène à une résolution inattendue.

text: this is a winning ensemble comedy that shows canadians can put gentle laughs and equally gentle sentiments on the button , just as easily as their counterparts anywhere else in the world .
translation: c'est une comédie d'ensemble gagnante qui montre que les Canadiens peuvent mettre des rires délicats et des sentiments tout aussi délicats sur le devant de la scène, tout aussi facilement que leurs homologues ailleurs dans le monde.
back_translation: It is a winning ensemble comedy that shows that Canadians can bring delicate laughs and equally delicate feelings to the forefront just as easily as their counterparts elsewhere in the world.

text: a week later , jash contacts the police , asking not for a ransom but for retired police inspector mo to be his police contact .
translation: Une semaine plus tard, Jash contacte la police, demandant non pas une rançon mais que l'inspecteur de police à la retraite Mo soit son contact.
back_translation: A week later, Jash contacts the police, asking not for a ransom but for retired police inspector Mo to be his contact.

text: the production values are up there . the use of cgi and digital ink-and-paint make the thing look really slick . the voices are fine as well . the problem , it is with most of these things , is the script .
translation: les valeurs de production sont élevées. l'utilisation de cgi et d'encre et peinture numérique donne à l'ensemble un aspect vraiment soigné. les voix sont également bonnes. le problème, comme c'est souvent le cas avec la plupart de ces choses, c'est le scénario.
back_translation: The production values are high. The use of CGI and digital ink and paint gives the whole thing a really polished look. The voices are also good. The problem, as is often the case with most of these things, is the script.

text: this is a romantic comedy about a girl named christina who , one day , meets a guy in a bar .
translation: c'est une comédie romantique sur une fille nommée Christina qui, un jour, rencontre un garçon dans un bar.

text: a psychological thriller that does n't really hold up if you think about it too much , but is nonetheless highly entertaining in a low-budget , david lynch-ian way .

back_translation: A psychological thriller that doesn't really hold up if you think about it too much, but is nonetheless very entertaining in a low-budget way, à la David Lynch.

text: e . t . works because its flabbergasting principals , 14-year-old robert macnaughton , 6-year-old drew barrymore and 10-year-old henry thomas , convince us of the existence of the wise , wizened visitor from a faraway planet .
translation: e . t . fonctionne grâce à ses principes épatants, Robert MacNaughton, 14 ans, Drew Barrymore, 6 ans, et Henry Thomas, 10 ans, nous convainquent de l'existence du sage visiteur venu d'une planète lointaine.
back_translation: E.T. operates thanks to its amazing principles; Robert MacNaughton, 14, Drew Barrymore, 6, and Henry Thomas, 10, convince us of the existence of the wise visitor from a distant planet.

text: `` 13 conversations `` holds its goodwill close , but is relatively slow to come to the point .
translation: `` 13 conversations `` tient sa bonne volonté à cœur, mais met relativement du temps à en venir au fait.
back_translation: "13 conversations" takes its goodwill to heart, but takes relatively long to get to the point.

text: cedar takes a very open-minded approach to this sensitive material , showing impressive control , both visually and in the writing .
translation: Cedar adopte une approche très ouverte d'esprit envers ce matériau sensible, montrant un contrôle impressionnant, tant sur le plan visuel que dans l'écriture.
back_translation: Cedar takes a very open-minded approach to this sensitive material, showing impressive control both visually and in writing.

text: he dwells in a world of external night -- but the blackness is filled with sounds and scents , tastes and textures that most can not perceive .
translation: il habite un monde de nuit extérieure -- mais l'obscurité est remplie de sons et de senteurs, de saveurs et de textures que la plupart ne peuvent pas percevoir.
back_translation: He lives in a world of outside night -- but the darkness is filled with sounds and scents, flavors and textures that most cannot perceive.

text: reign of fire may well be the most grim dragon movie ever made -- and it 's all the more effective for the filmmakers ' decision to play it straight .
translation: Le règne du feu est peut-être le film de dragon le plus sombre jamais réalisé - et c'est d'autant plus efficace grâce à la décision des réalisateurs de le traiter au sérieux.

text: during the year 2000 geyrhalter and his teams travelled to a different destination each month , looking for places untouched by the millennium hysteria .

back_translation: In the year 2000, Geyrhalter and his teams traveled to a different destination each month, in search of places untouched by the millennium hysteria.

text: if you keep a list of films you want to see one way or another , you would be doing yourself a service by keeping this film high up on that list .

text: it 's all entertaining enough , but do n't look for any hefty anti-establishment message in what is essentially a whip-crack of a buddy movie that ends with a whimper .

text: though the characters are sometimes forced into madcap situations for the sake of adding yuks , the film works best when the protagonists are just being themselves
translation: Bien que les personnages soient parfois contraints de se retrouver dans des situations loufoques pour ajouter des rires, le film fonctionne le mieux lorsque les protagonistes sont simplement eux-mêmes.
back_translation: Although the characters are sometimes forced to find themselves in wacky situations to add laughs, the film works best when the protagonists are simply themselves.

text: however after roxie has undergone the 'casting couch ' treatment , and fred has had his wicked way with her , he reveals that he has no more connections in showbusiness than she does .
translation: Cependant, après que Roxie a subi le traitement du "canapé de casting", et que Fred a eu son bon temps avec elle, il révèle qu'il n'a plus de connexions dans le monde du spectacle qu'elle n'en a.
back_translation: However, after Roxie has gone through the "casting couch" treatment, and Fred has had his good time with her, he reveals that he no longer has any connections in the show business that she doesn't have.

text: it 's young guns meets goodfellas in this easily skippable hayseeds-vs . -greaseballs mob action-comedy .

text: that a high-profile movie with big-name actors could inspire such philosophical reflection is impressive .

text: as he chases the elusive bounty hunter , jango ( and his cloned son boba ) leads obi wan to geonosis , where he meets count dooku and finds a startling revelation about the former jedi .
translation: Alors qu'il poursuit le chasseur de primes insaisissable, Jango (et son fils cloné Boba) mène Obi-Wan à Géonosis, où il rencontre le comte Dooku et découvre une révélation surprenante sur l'ancien Jedi.
back_translation: While pursuing the elusive bounty hunter, Jango (and his cloned son Boba) leads Obi-Wan to Geonosis, where he meets Count Dooku and discovers a surprising revelation about the former Jedi.

text: one can only assume that the jury who bestowed star hoffman 's brother gordy with the waldo salt screenwriting award at 2002 's sundance festival were honoring an attempt to do something different over actually pulling it off
translation: on ne peut que supposer que le jury qui a décerné à Gordy, le frère de Star Hoffman, le prix de scénario Waldo Salt lors du festival Sundance de 2002 a honoré une tentative de faire quelque chose de différent plutôt que de l'avoir réellement réussi.
back_translation: One can only assume that the jury that awarded Gordy, Star Hoffman's brother, the Waldo Salt Screenwriting Award at the 2002 Sundance Festival honored an attempt to do something different rather than actually having succeeded.

text: daily prison life is not drab but full of unexpected happenings like a story .
translation: La vie quotidienne en prison n'est pas monotone mais pleine d'événements inattendus, comme une histoire.

text: he tries to recapture the past , and make some sense of his life , that of his friends and family , and the present state of his native country .
translation: il essaie de raviver le passé et de donner un sens à sa vie, à celle de ses amis et de sa famille, ainsi qu'à l'état actuel de son pays natal.

text: as david letterman and the onion have proven , the worst of tragedies can be fertile sources of humor , but lawrence has only a fleeting grasp of how to develop them .
translation: Comme David Letterman et The Onion l'ont prouvé, les pires tragédies peuvent être des sources fertiles d'humour, mais Lawrence n'a qu'une compréhension fugace de la manière de les développer.

text: starving artist gus bishop ca n't even give away his paintings .

text: through it all , carlos comes to understand that if he is to make it as a comic artist , he must engage with the community he comes from , take that experience back out into the world , and put it in his work .
translation: À travers tout cela, Carlos comprend que s'il veut réussir en tant qu'artiste de bande dessinée, il doit s'engager avec la communauté d'où il vient, ramener cette expérience dans le monde et l'incorporer dans son travail.

text: it 's difficult to imagine that a more confused , less interesting and more sloppily made film could possibly come down the road in 2002 .

back_translation: It is hard to imagine that a more confusing, less interesting, and more carelessly made film could be released in 2002.

text: the result reverberates on the screen with a deadly force and fury more intense than anything mr . scorsese has yet achieved on the meanest and most beloved streets he could imagine or recall .
translation: le résultat résonne à l'écran avec une force mortelle et une fureur plus intense que tout ce que M. Scorsese a encore réalisé dans les rues les plus dures et les plus bien-aimées qu'il puisse imaginer ou se rappeler.
back_translation: The result resonates on screen with a deadly force and a fury more intense than anything Mr. Scorsese has yet created in the hardest and most beloved streets he can imagine or remember.

text: uses sharp humor and insight into human nature to examine class conflict , adolescent yearning , the roots of friendship and sexual identity .

text: in doing so , he learns that the conventional answers of easy availability of guns , violent national history , violent entertainment and even poverty are inadequate to explain this violence when other cultures share those same factors without the equivalent carnage .
translation: Ce faisant, il apprend que les réponses conventionnelles telles que la disponibilité facile des armes, l'histoire nationale violente, le divertissement violent et même la pauvreté sont inadéquates pour expliquer cette violence lorsque d'autres cultures partagent ces mêmes facteurs sans l'équivalent de carnage.
back_translation: In doing so, he learns that conventional answers such as easy access to weapons, a violent national history, violent entertainment, and even poverty are inadequate to explain this violence when other cultures share these same factors without the equivalent of carnage.

text: nine queens is exactly the sort of film hollywood is always re-making and utterly ruining in the process . see it in this incarnation .

text: by turns gripping , amusing , tender and heart-wrenching , laissez-passer has all the earmarks of french cinema at its best .

text: when a movie is as down-and-out funny as austin powers in goldmember , it 's easy to overlook the missed opportunities and fizzled jokes littering the barrage of hilarity .

text: the story , touching though it is , does not quite have enough emotional resonance or variety of incident to sustain a feature , and even at 85 minutes it feels a bit long .

back_translation: The story, although moving, does not quite have enough emotional resonance or variety of incidents to support a feature film, and even at 85 minutes, it feels a bit long.

text: shaky close-ups of turkey-on-rolls , stubbly chins , liver spots , red noses and the filmmakers new bobbed do draw easy chuckles but lead nowhere .

text: mitch is left for dead in the desert -- or so they think -- rescued and nursed back to health by a gorgeous women named , angela rose ( nicole austin ) .

text: a feature documentary offering a gripping portrait of the esgenoopetitj mi'gmaq first nation during the summer of 2000 as the canadian government appears to wage war on the community for exercising their inherent and court-affirmed fishing rights .
translation: un documentaire feature offrant un portrait saisissant de la Première Nation mi'gmaq esgenoopetitj durant l'été 2000, alors que le gouvernement canadien semble faire la guerre à la communauté pour avoir exercé ses droits de pêche inhérents et confirmés par la cour.
back_translation: A feature documentary offering a striking portrait of the Mi'gmaq First Nation of Esgenoopetitj during the summer of 2000, when the Canadian government appears to be waging war on the community for exercising its inherent fishing rights confirmed by the court.

text: even if the ride 's a little bumpy , with a final lap that 's all too suspiciously smooth , you got ta give director roger michell , best known for the superfluous notting hill , credit for trying .
translation: Même si le trajet est un peu cahoteux, avec un dernier tour qui est trop soudainement fluide, il faut donner au réalisateur Roger Michell, mieux connu pour le superflu Notting Hill, le crédit d'avoir essayé.
back_translation: Even though the journey is a bit bumpy, with a last turn that is suddenly too smooth, one must give director Roger Michell, better known for the superficial Notting Hill, credit for trying.

back_translation: The two leading actors are almost good enough to mask the silly plot, but so much naturalistic dialogue, delivered in almost muffled exchanges, ultimately has a calming effect.

text: raunchy though [ cho 's ] material is , it embraces all comers , regardless of gender , sexuality , race or ethnicity . and it 's never been sharper -- or funnier -- than it is here .
translation: Bien que le matériel de [cho 's] soit osé, il accepte tout le monde, quelle que soit leur genre, sexualité, race ou ethnicité. Et il n'a jamais été aussi affûté - ou aussi drôle - qu'il ne l'est ici.
back_translation: Although [cho 's] material is bold, it welcomes everyone, regardless of their gender, sexuality, race, or ethnicity. And it has never been sharper - or funnier - than it is here.

text: by turns whimsical and absurdist , babek payami 's secret ballot is a slight but likable iranian film with the flavor of a shaggy-dog story conceived by samuel beckett and directed by jim jarmusch .
translation: À la fois fantaisiste et absurde, le bulletin secret de Babek Payami est un petit mais aimable film iranien ayant le goût d'une histoire à la longue digression, conçue par Samuel Beckett et réalisée par Jim Jarmusch.
back_translation: Both fanciful and absurd, Babek Payami's secret bulletin is a small but charming Iranian film that has the flavor of a story with long digressions, conceived by Samuel Beckett and directed by Jim Jarmusch.

text: reminds viewers of how beautiful and sexy a pregnant woman can be .
translation: rappelle aux spectateurs à quel point une femme enceinte peut être belle et sexy.

text: veteran actor serrault and rising newcomer seigner . . . pitch their performances perfectly , skilfully underplaying to match carion 's understated direction .
translation: l'acteur vétéran Serrault et la nouvelle venue Seigner . . . livrent des performances parfaitement assorties, jouant habilement en sous-ton pour correspondre à la direction discrète de Carion.
back_translation: The veteran actor Serrault and the newcomer Seigner deliver perfectly matched performances, skillfully playing in subtle tones to align with Carion's understated direction.

text: meanwhile , una makes herself being fired in the supermarket .

text: if you saw benigni 's pinocchio at a public park , you 'd grab your kids and run and then probably call the police .

text: [ reynolds ] takes a classic story , casts attractive and talented actors and uses a magnificent landscape to create a feature film that is wickedly fun to watch .

text: daphne , a free-spirited american 19-year-old ( amanda bynes ) raised by her equally free-spirited mother goes to england to establish a relationship with her father ( colin firth ) , who turns out to be a prominent political figure heavily involved in social customs .
translation: Daphne, une Américaine de 19 ans au caractère libre (Amanda Bynes), élevée par sa mère tout aussi libre d'esprit, se rend en Angleterre pour établir une relation avec son père (Colin Firth), qui s'avère être une figure politique éminente fortement impliquée dans les coutumes sociales.
back_translation: Daphne, a 19-year-old free-spirited American (Amanda Bynes), raised by her equally free-minded mother, travels to England to establish a relationship with her father (Colin Firth), who turns out to be a prominent political figure heavily involved in social customs.

text: the santa clause 2 `` goes down as easy as an eggnog on christmas eve .

text: much like robin williams , death to smoochy has already reached its expiration date .

text: as elegantly crafted as it often is , anderson 's movie is essentially a one-trick pony that , hampered by an undeveloped script , ultimately pulls up lame .
translation: Aussi élégamment conçu qu'il soit souvent, le film d'Anderson est essentiellement un cheval de course à un seul tour qui, freiné par un scénario peu développé, finit par ne pas aller loin.
back_translation: As elegantly designed as it often is, Anderson's film is essentially a one-lap racehorse that, hindered by a poorly developed script, ultimately doesn't go far.

text: a little girl steals from the jar , containing her poor family 's meager savings .

text: as they struggle to get out of the country and fight to stay alive , they find a special love and compassion from which emerges their ultimate moral and spiritual redemption .

back_translation: As they struggle to escape the country and fight to stay alive, they discover a special love and compassion from which their ultimate moral and spiritual redemption emerges.

text: greg puts up with martha 's harsh criticism in exchange for a place to lay-low until he can evade the police and repair his delicate relationship with his young daughter , chelsea .

text: but will 's drive for the brass ring hits a last-minute obstacle when his mistress suddenly vanishes - with the capital for his latest plans for expansion .

text: it is too bad that this likable movie is n't more accomplished . the actors try hard but come off too amateurish and awkward .

text: jones ' desire was to document the creative work of yhf 's production , he seems to have found a bit more , including band members departing and a conflict with reprise record company .
translation: Le désir de Jones était de documenter le travail créatif de la production de YHF ; il semble avoir trouvé un peu plus, y compris des départs de membres du groupe et un conflit avec la compagnie de disque Reprise.

text: how much you are moved by the emotional tumult of [ franM-gois and michM-hle 's ] relationship depends a lot on how interesting and likable you find them .

text: louis is a struggling painter whose life is turned upside down when his wish comes true and he becomes trapped in his own paintings .

translation: La vie est-elle une série d'événements incontrôlables qui sont prédéterminés pour nous ou est-ce vraiment ce que nous en faisons ?

translation: contrairement à Cendrillon, Ella doit compter sur elle-même et son intelligence pour surmonter ses problèmes et retrouver Lucinda afin que sa ``malédiction`` soit brisée !

text: it 's hard to say who might enjoy this , are there tolstoy groupies out there ? it 's dark and tragic , and lets the business of the greedy talent agents get in the way of saying something meaningful about facing death
translation: Il est difficile de dire qui pourrait apprécier cela, y a-t-il des groupies de Tolstoï là dehors ? C'est sombre et tragique, et cela laisse les affaires des agents de talents avares interférer avec le fait de dire quelque chose de significatif sur le fait de faire face à la mort.
back_translation: It is difficult to say who might appreciate this, are there any Tolstoy groupies out there? It is dark and tragic, and it lets the affairs of greedy talent agents interfere with saying something meaningful about facing death.

text: time of fear is a taut psychological thriller thrusting an fbi agent and a grieving father into the dark world of a demented killer .
translation: "Time of Fear" est un thriller psychologique tendu plongeant un agent du FBI et un père en deuil dans le sombre monde d'un tueur déséquilibré.
back_translation: "Time of Fear" is a tense psychological thriller that immerses an FBI agent and a grieving father in the dark world of an unstable killer.

text: despite the film 's bizarre developments , hoffman keeps us riveted with every painful nuance , unexpected flashes of dark comedy and the character 's gripping humanity .
translation: malgré les développements bizarres du film, Hoffman nous captive avec chaque nuance douloureuse, des éclats inattendus de comédie noire et l'humanité saisissante du personnage.
back_translation: Despite the film's bizarre developments, Hoffman captivates us with every painful nuance, unexpected bursts of dark comedy, and the striking humanity of the character.

text: `` bums in the mist `` will expose you to a world where alcohol is king and sloth is a virtue ; buddy george will discover , bums who are able to find love and professional success all while maintaining their `` mondern frontiersman `` lifestyle ; bums who 's natural gifts enable them to move down the ladder of success at an astronomical rate ( or whatever the opposite of astronomical is ) and who 's penchant for violence impact every aspect of their lives .
translation: ``les clochards dans la brume`` vous plongera dans un monde où l'alcool est roi et la paresse est une vertu ; Buddy George découvrira des clochards capables de trouver l'amour et le succès professionnel tout en maintenant leur mode de vie de ``nouveaux explorateurs`` ; des clochards dont les talents naturels leur permettent de descendre l'échelle du succès à un rythme astronomique (ou ce qui est l'opposé d'astronomique) et dont la penchant pour la violence impacte chaque aspect de leur vie.
back_translation: ``The Tramps in the Mist`` will immerse you in a world where alcohol reigns and laziness is a virtue; Buddy George will discover tramps capable of finding love and professional success while maintaining their lifestyle of ``new explorers``; tramps whose natural talents allow them to descend the ladder of success at an astronomical rate (or the opposite of astronomical) and whose penchant for violence impacts every aspect of their lives.

text: little does he know , he is investigating some of the biggest events of the star wars saga , as he finds out that there is a connection between the assassination attempts and a separtists movement led by a former jedi ( christopher lee ) against the republic .
translation: Il ne sait pas qu'il enquête sur certains des plus grands événements de la saga Star Wars, alors qu'il découvre qu'il y a un lien entre les tentatives d'assassinat et un mouvement séparatiste dirigé par un ancien Jedi (Christopher Lee) contre la République.
back_translation: He doesn't know that he is investigating some of the greatest events of the Star Wars saga as he discovers a link between the assassination attempts and a separatist movement led by a former Jedi (Christopher Lee) against the Republic.

text: however , nicholas can not keep the creature hidden forever and must eventually face his own feelings .
translation: Cependant, Nicholas ne peut pas garder la créature cachée indéfiniment et doit finalement affronter ses propres sentiments.
back_translation: However, Nicholas cannot keep the creature hidden indefinitely and must ultimately confront his own feelings.

text: it takes you on a personal journey through one family 's history , one man 's self-destructive grief and a love that transcends time and death .
translation: Cela vous emporte dans un voyage personnel à travers l'histoire d'une famille, le chagrin autodestructeur d'un homme et un amour qui transcende le temps et la mort.
back_translation: It takes you on a personal journey through the history of a family, the self-destructive sorrow of a man, and a love that transcends time and death.

text: short stories revolving around a bar and a hotel in recife , unveil a mosaic of exotic characters living in the brazilian underground : a butcher married with an evangelical woman , a necrophile in love with a bar owner , a transvestite , and many others .
translation: Des histoires courtes tournant autour d'un bar et d'un hôtel à Recife, dévoilent une mosaïque de personnages exotiques vivant dans le sous-monde brésilien : un boucher marié à une femme évangélique, un nécrophile amoureux d'un propriétaire de bar, un travesti, et bien d'autres.
back_translation: Short stories set around a bar and a hotel in Recife reveal a mosaic of exotic characters living in the Brazilian underworld: a butcher married to an evangelical woman, a necrophiliac in love with a bar owner, a transgender person, and many more.

text: compared to sorority boys . . . this is high comedic art .

text: with billy badly wounded , hotly pursued by a determined sheriff , the gang makes an unexpected and unwelcome visit .

back_translation: With Billy seriously injured and relentlessly pursued by a determined sheriff, the gang pays an unexpected and unwelcome visit.

text: when jason sees a movie preview of his story , he and best friend kaylee ( amanda bynes ) go to los angeles to make wolf confess to using jason 's story as well as to clear jason 's name and to get him out of having to attend summer school .
translation: Lorsque Jason voit un aperçu du film de son histoire, lui et sa meilleure amie Kaylee (Amanda Bynes) se rendent à Los Angeles pour faire avouer à Wolf qu'il a utilisé l'histoire de Jason, ainsi que pour laver le nom de Jason et le sortir de l'obligation d'assister à l'école d'été.
back_translation: When Jason sees a preview of the movie based on his story, he and his best friend Kaylee (Amanda Bynes) go to Los Angeles to force Wolf to confess that he used Jason's story, as well as to clear Jason's name and exempt him from having to attend summer school.

text: she must finally step out of her rarefied world and confront the assumptions on which she 's built her whole life .

back_translation: She must finally step out of her rarified world and confront the assumptions on which she has built her entire life.

text: a genuinely funny ensemble comedy that also asks its audience -- in a heartwarming , nonjudgmental kind of way -- to consider what we value in our daily lives .

text: in the end , each must deal with the mysterious and , perhaps , scandalous reason their affair suddenly ended .

text: the teen must decide whether to become immortal and stay with a tuck she 's fallen in love with .

text: the performances are so leaden , michael rymer 's direction is so bloodless and the dialogue is so corny that the audience laughs out loud .

text: movies like this are selling the old european candor , the old wink of 'bold ' revelation . but in 2002 , such revelations wilt .

text: otis wants to relive the old days , mark does n't .

text: one of the finest , most humane and important holocaust movies ever made .

text: a young korean war veteran returns home to find his parents have died and his wife has left him for another man .
translation: Un jeune vétéran de la guerre de Corée rentre chez lui pour trouver que ses parents sont morts et que sa femme l'a quitté pour un autre homme.
back_translation: A young veteran of the Korean War returns home to find that his parents have died and his wife has left him for another man.

text: fontaine indulges her signature style , creating a carefully measured film -- the kind whose impact slowly sneaks up on its audience and haunts them long after leaving the theatre .
translation: Fontaine s'adonne à son style signature, créant un film soigneusement mesuré -- du genre dont l'impact s'immisce lentement chez son public et les hante bien après avoir quitté le cinéma.
back_translation: Fontaine indulges in his signature style, creating a carefully measured film -- the kind whose impact gradually seeps into its audience and haunts them long after they have left the cinema.

text: living with the fosters is a darkly funny and dangerously subtle comedy about one family 's paranoid preparation for the year 2000 crisis and beyond .
translation: Vivre avec les Fosters est une comédie à la fois sombrement drôle et dangereusement subtile sur les préparatifs paranoïaques d'une famille pour la crise de l'an 2000 et au-delà.

text: his odyssey finally leads him onto a theatre stage .
translation: son odyssée le mène enfin sur une scène de théâtre.

text: on his way he gets again and again into situations of obsessive self-uncovering .
translation: Sur son chemin, il se retrouve encore et encore dans des situations d'auto-découverte obsessionnelle.

text: the connected stories of breitbart and hanussen are actually fascinating , but the filmmaking in invincible is such that the movie does not do them justice .
translation: Les histoires connexes de Breitbart et Hanussen sont en fait fascinantes, mais le filmmaking dans Invincible est tel que le film ne leur rend pas justice.
back_translation: The related stories of Breitbart and Hanussen are actually fascinating, but the filmmaking in Invincible is such that the film does not do them justice.

text: dex and eric are ordinary , twenty-something guys dealing with work , relationships and friends .

text: novak manages to capture a cruelly hilarious vein of black comedy in the situation with his cast of non-actors and a gritty , no-budget approach .

text: malone does have a gift for generating nightmarish images that will be hard to burn out of your brain . but the movie 's narrative hook is way too muddled to be an effectively chilling guilty pleasure .
translation: Malone a un talent pour générer des images cauchemardesques qui seront difficiles à brûler de votre esprit. Mais l'accroche narrative du film est beaucoup trop confuse pour être un plaisir coupable véritablement glaçant.
back_translation: Malone has a talent for generating nightmarish images that will be hard to burn from your mind. But the narrative hook of the film is far too confusing to be a truly chilling guilty pleasure.

text: subconscious art : a product of artistic merit that was created without conscious artistic intentions .

text: if you 're part of her targeted audience , you 'll cheer . otherwise , maybe .

text: however , when one of the lads accidentally shags a punter ( steven berkoff ) to death , they are forced to look for 'work ' elsewhere .
translation: Cependant, lorsque l'un des gars tue accidentellement un client (Steven Berkoff) en le violant, ils sont obligés de chercher du "travail" ailleurs.
back_translation: However, when one of the guys accidentally kills a client (Steven Berkoff) while assaulting him, they are forced to look for "work" elsewhere.

text: the film provides some great insight into the neurotic mindset of all comics -- even those who have reached the absolute top of the game .

back_translation: The film offers an excellent insight into the neurotic mindset of all comedians, even those who have reached the absolute pinnacle of the profession.

text: a perfect example of rancid , well-intentioned , but shamelessly manipulative movie making .

text: discarded and forgotten , pete williams is living out his days in an old soldiers home in galveston , texas .
translation: Écarté et oublié, Pete Williams passe ses jours dans un ancien foyer de soldats à Galveston, au Texas.
back_translation: Set aside and forgotten, Pete Williams spends his days in an old soldiers' home in Galveston, Texas.

text: while some will object to the idea of a vietnam picture with such a rah-rah , patriotic tone , soldiers ultimately achieves its main strategic objective : dramatizing the human cost of the conflict that came to define a generation .
translation: Bien que certains s'opposent à l'idée d'une image du Vietnam avec un ton aussi enthousiaste et patriotique, "Soldats" parvient finalement à atteindre son objectif stratégique principal : dramatiser le coût humain du conflit qui a marqué une génération.
back_translation: Although some oppose the idea of an image of Vietnam with such an enthusiastic and patriotic tone, "Soldiers" ultimately manages to achieve its main strategic objective: to dramatize the human cost of the conflict that marked a generation.

text: for anni they are not enemies , but just men .
translation: pour Anni, ils ne sont pas des ennemis, mais juste des hommes.
back_translation: For Anni, they are not enemies, but just men.

text: are they illusions , visions from the past , ghosts - or is it reality ?
translation: sont-elles des illusions, des visions du passé, des fantômes - ou est-ce la réalité ?
back_translation: Are they illusions, visions of the past, ghosts - or is it reality?

text: sometimes makes less sense than the bruckheimeresque american action flicks it emulates .

text: M-^Eit was n't the subject matter that ultimately defeated the filmM-^Eit was the unfulfilling , incongruous , `` wait a second , did i miss something ? `` ending .
translation: Ce n'était pas le sujet qui a finalement défait le film, c'était la fin insatisfaisante, incongrue, « une seconde, est-ce que j'ai raté quelque chose ? ».
back_translation: It wasn't the subject that ultimately ruined the film; it was the unsatisfying, incongruous ending, "wait, did I miss something?".

text: the l . a . dogwalking scene provides a colorful backdrop for the story of ellie moore ( diane gaidry ) , damaged goods on the run from her latest abusive boyfriend and on the verge of transformation .
translation: La scène de promenade de chiens à Los Angeles offre un décor coloré à l'histoire d'Ellie Moore (Diane Gaidry), une personne abîmée en fuite de son dernier petit ami abusif et sur le point de se transformer.
back_translation: The dog-walking scene in Los Angeles provides a colorful backdrop to the story of Ellie Moore (Diane Gaidry), a damaged person fleeing from her last abusive boyfriend and on the verge of transformation.

text: the 50-something lovebirds are too immature and unappealing to care about .
translation: Les amoureux d'une cinquantaine d'années sont trop immatures et peu attrayants pour que cela nous importe.
back_translation: Lovers in their fifties are too immature and unappealing for us to care.

text: reluctantly , busy katherine allows patricia to audition and , at once , recognizes her incredible talent .
translation: À contrecœur, la occupée Katherine permet à Patricia de passer l'audition et, immédiatement, reconnaît son incroyable talent.

text: one of the best examples of how to treat a subject , you 're not fully aware is being examined , much like a photo of yourself you did n't know was being taken .

text: the crassness of this reactionary thriller is matched only by the ridiculousness of its premise .
translation: la vulgarité de ce thriller réactionnaire n'a d'égale que le ridicule de son intrigue.

text: jones has crafted a natty narrative that , enhanced by erin nordstrom 's editing , is filled with payoffs .

back_translation: Jones has crafted a polished narrative that, enhanced by Erin Nordstrom's editing, is full of rewards.

text: vividly conveys the shadow side of the 30-year friendship between two english women .
translation: transmet de manière vive le côté obscur de l'amitié de 30 ans entre deux femmes anglaises.
