translation: ... cinquante minutes de mélodrames adolescents ennuyeux suivies de trente-cinq minutes de nonsens exagéré.
back_translation: ... fifty minutes of boring adolescent melodrama followed by thirty-five minutes of exaggerated nonsense.

text: the rebellion against sauron is building up and will be led by gandalf the white ( sir ian mckellen ) , who was thought to be dead after the balrog captured him .

back_translation: The rebellion against Sauron is gaining strength and will be led by Gandalf the White (Sir Ian McKellen), who was thought to be dead after the balrog captured him.

text: every sequel you skip will be two hours gained . consider this review life-affirming .
translation: Chaque suite que vous ignorez sera deux heures gagnées. Considérez cette critique comme affirmant la vie.

text: that the chuck norris `` grenade gag `` occurs about 7 times during windtalkers is a good indication of how serious-minded the film is .
translation: Le fait que le « gag de la grenade » de Chuck Norris se produise environ 7 fois dans Windtalkers est une bonne indication de la gravité du film.

text: together they discover that a corporation funds and is profitting from the plantation-like work environment they are forced to work under .
translation: ensemble, ils découvrent qu'une corporation finance et tire profit de l'environnement de travail semblable à une plantation sous lequel ils sont forcés de travailler.
back_translation: Together, they discover that a corporation finances and profits from the work environment similar to a plantation under which they are forced to work.

text: in the 1880 's , chon wang ( jackie chan ) 's father and keeper of the imperial seal has been murdered by parliament and royal family member rathbone ( aidan gillen ) , ( who steals the imperial seal ) with chon wang 's sister , chon lin ( fann wong ) witnessing the murder .
translation: Dans les années 1880, le père de Chon Wang (Jackie Chan) et gardien du sceau impérial a été assassiné par un membre du parlement et de la famille royale, Rathbone (Aidan Gillen), qui vole le sceau impérial, tandis que la sœur de Chon Wang, Chon Lin (Fann Wong), est témoin du meurtre.
back_translation: In the 1880s, Chon Wang's father (Jackie Chan), the guardian of the imperial seal, was assassinated by a member of parliament and the royal family, Rathbone (Aidan Gillen), who steals the imperial seal, while Chon Wang's sister, Chon Lin (Fann Wong), witnesses the murder.

text: the events of the film are just so weird that i honestly never knew what the hell was coming next .
translation: les événements du film sont tellement étranges que je ne savais honnêtement jamais ce qui allait se passer ensuite.
back_translation: The events of the movie are so strange that I honestly never knew what was going to happen next.

text: the film is shot in multiple formats from 35mm ( the majority ) to the newer digital format of digi-beta , with a short , eerily beautiful dream segment shot in super-8 .
translation: Le film est tourné dans plusieurs formats, du 35 mm (la majorité) au format numérique plus récent de digi-beta, avec un court segment de rêve étrangement beau tourné en super-8.
back_translation: The film is shot in several formats, from 35 mm (the majority) to the newer digital format of digi-beta, with a short segment of strangely beautiful dream footage shot in super-8.

text: soon , however , they are regretting their decision and wishing christmas would hurry up and finish until a surprise christmas `` miracle `` , could there still be hope for christmas , and the websters ?
translation: bientôt, cependant, ils regrettent leur décision et souhaitent que Noël se termine rapidement jusqu'à un `` miracle '' de Noël surprise, pourrait-il encore y avoir de l'espoir pour Noël et les Websters ?
back_translation: Soon, however, they regret their decision and wish for Christmas to end quickly until a surprise "Christmas miracle," could there still be hope for Christmas and the Websters?

text: gino and settimo try to repay roberto 's hospitality by chasing off a debt collector who wants his property , but their strong arm tactics alarm him and he realises they are n't the pr consultants they claimed to be liquor store night clerk jose ( freddie ganno ) has two dreams : winning the state lottery and winning the heart of a lovely young shoe store salesperson , diana ( christi adams ) .
translation: Gino et Settimo essaient de rendre à Roberto son hospitalité en chassant un créancier qui veut sa propriété, mais leurs tactiques musclées l'alarment et il réalise qu'ils ne sont pas les consultants en relations publiques qu'ils prétendaient être. Le commis de nuit du magasin d'alcools, José (Freddie Ganno), a deux rêves : gagner à la loterie de l'État et conquérir le cœur d'une charmante jeune vendeuse de chaussures, Diana (Christi Adams).
back_translation: Gino and Settimo try to repay Roberto for his hospitality by chasing away a creditor who wants his property, but their heavy-handed tactics alarm him and he realizes that they are not the public relations consultants they pretended to be. The night clerk at the liquor store, José (Freddie Ganno), has two dreams: to win the state lottery and to win the heart of a charming young shoe saleswoman, Diana (Christi Adams).

text: at night he is daredevil , a masked vigilante stalking the dark streets of the city , a relentless avenger of justice .
translation: La nuit, il est un casse-cou, un vigilant masqué rôdant dans les rues sombres de la ville, un vengeur implacable de la justice.
back_translation: At night, he is a daredevil, a masked vigilante prowling the dark streets of the city, an unstoppable avenger of justice.

text: pauly then fakes his own death , and the media goes crazy .
translation: Pauly fait alors semblant de mourir, et les médias deviennent fous.
back_translation: Pauly then pretends to die, and the media goes crazy.

text: with the exception of mccoist , the players do n't have a clue on the park . the acting is n't much better .
translation: à l'exception de McCoist, les joueurs n'ont aucune idée sur le terrain. Le jeu d'acteur n'est pas beaucoup mieux.
back_translation: Except for McCoist, the players have no idea on the field. The acting isn't much better.

text: but jim 's team , knowing their coach is a great ball player , makes a deal with him : if they win the district championship , they want jim to try out for a major-league organization .
translation: mais l'équipe de Jim, sachant que leur entraîneur est un excellent joueur, fait un accord avec lui : s'ils gagnent le championnat de district, ils veulent que Jim passe des essais pour une organisation de la ligue majeure.
back_translation: But Jim's team, knowing that their coach is an excellent player, makes an agreement with him: if they win the district championship, they want Jim to try out for a major league organization.

text: watching beanie and his gang put together his slasher video from spare parts and borrowed materials is as much fun as it must have been for them to make it .
translation: Regarder Beanie et sa bande assembler son vidéo de slasher à partir de pièces détachées et de matériaux empruntés est aussi amusant que cela a dû l’être pour eux de le faire.
back_translation: Watching Beanie and his gang put together their slasher video from spare parts and borrowed materials is as fun as it must have been for them to do it.

text: chock full of ethnic flavor , whimsy , doubt , faith , joy and wonder , mary and joe is a delightful surprise , as the old story is brought into the present with startling freshness and power .
translation: plein de saveurs ethniques, de fantaisie, de doute, de foi, de joie et d'émerveillement, Mary et Joe est une délicieuse surprise, alors que l'ancienne histoire est portée dans le présent avec une fraîcheur et une puissance saisissantes.
back_translation: Full of ethnic flavors, fantasy, doubt, faith, joy, and wonder, Mary and Joe is a delightful surprise, as the ancient story is brought into the present with striking freshness and strength.

text: unfortunately , the bomb goes off unplanned and kills four innocent people .
translation: Malheureusement, la bombe explose de manière imprévue et tue quatre personnes innocentes.
back_translation: Unfortunately, the bomb explodes unexpectedly and kills four innocent people.

text: that rare film whose real-life basis is , in fact , so interesting that no embellishment is needed .
translation: ce film rare dont la base réelle est, en fait, si intéressante qu'aucune embellissement n'est nécessaire.
back_translation: this rare film whose real foundation is, in fact, so interesting that no embellishment is necessary.

text: he 's confused , he 's hurt , and he does n't know what to do .
translation: Il est confus, il est blessé et il ne sait pas quoi faire.
back_translation: He is confused, he is hurt, and he doesn't know what to do.

text: more concerned with overall feelings , broader ideas , and open-ended questions than concrete story and definitive answers , soderbergh 's solaris is a gorgeous and deceptively minimalist cinematic tone poem .
translation: Plus préoccupé par les sentiments globaux, les idées plus larges et les questions ouvertes que par une histoire concrète et des réponses définitives, Solaris de Soderbergh est un poème cinématographique magnifique et trompeusement minimaliste.
back_translation: More concerned with global feelings, broader ideas, and open questions than with a concrete story and definitive answers, Soderbergh's Solaris is a magnificent and deceptively minimalist cinematic poem.

text: while everybody else sweats and frets , jim 's dad is cool while giving advice and getting ready for one of the best days of his life .
translation: Pendant que tout le monde transpiré et s'inquiète, le père de Jim reste calme en donnant des conseils et en se préparant pour l'un des plus beaux jours de sa vie.
back_translation: While everyone is sweating and worrying, Jim's father remains calm, giving advice and preparing for one of the most beautiful days of his life.

text: once convicted , he ends up on death row in texas himself , telling his story to a reporter through a series of flashbacks .
translation: une fois condamné, il se retrouve dans le couloir de la mort au Texas, racontant son histoire à un reporter à travers une série de flashbacks.
back_translation: Once condemned, he finds himself on death row in Texas, telling his story to a reporter through a series of flashbacks.

text: russian ark moves beyond a simple technical exercise and into the realm of greatness . it 's a masterpiece on every level .
translation: L'Arche russe va au-delà d'un simple exercice technique et entre dans le domaine de la grandeur. C'est un chef-d'œuvre à tous les niveaux.
back_translation: The Russian Arch goes beyond a simple technical exercise and enters the realm of greatness. It is a masterpiece at all levels.

text: the pianist is a fine valedictory work for polanski , made richer by his own experiences , making his other movies somehow richer in the bargain .
translation: Le pianiste est une belle œuvre de fin d'études pour Polanski, enrichie par ses propres expériences, rendant ses autres films d'une certaine manière plus riches en retour.
back_translation: The Pianist is a beautiful thesis work for Polanski, enriched by his own experiences, making his other films in a certain way richer in return.

text: in the latino neighborhood of new york city 's washington heights , two sons of immigrants one dominican , one irish wrestle with ambition and identity , only to discover that sometimes pursuing one 's dreams comes at a heavy cost .
translation: Dans le quartier latino de Washington Heights à New York, deux fils d'immigrants, l'un dominicain, l'autre irlandais, luttent avec leurs ambitions et leur identité, pour finalement découvrir que poursuivre ses rêves peut avoir un lourd prix.
back_translation: In the Latino neighborhood of Washington Heights in New York, two sons of immigrants, one Dominican and the other Irish, struggle with their ambitions and identity, ultimately discovering that pursuing one's dreams can come at a heavy price.

text: it 's fun , wispy , wise and surprisingly inoffensive for a film about a teen in love with his stepmom .
translation: C'est amusant, léger, sage et étonnamment inoffensif pour un film sur un adolescent amoureux de sa belle-mère.
back_translation: It's fun, light, wise, and surprisingly inoffensive for a film about a teenager in love with his stepmother.

text: too bad maggio could n't come up with a better script .
translation: dommage que Maggio n'ait pas pu proposer un meilleur scénario.
back_translation: It's a pity that Maggio couldn't come up with a better scenario.

text: the tragic real life story of a serial killer who stalked his victims in the early 1970 's in small town america .
translation: l'histoire tragique réelle d'un tueur en série qui traquait ses victimes au début des années 1970 dans une petite ville américaine.
back_translation: The true tragic story of a serial killer who hunted his victims in a small American town in the early 1970s.

text: its message has merit and , in the hands of a brutally honest individual like prophet jack , might have made a point or two regarding life .
translation: son message a du mérite et, dans les mains d'un individu d'une honnêteté brutale comme le prophète Jack, aurait pu faire un ou deux points concernant la vie.
back_translation: His message has merit and, in the hands of an individual with brutal honesty like the prophet Jack, could have made one or two points about life.

text: five hundred years before columbus ( 996 a . d . ) , a young norwegian viking with the heart of a lion and the soul of a poet discovers america while on a quest to bring his loved one to 'the top of the world ' .
translation: Cinq cents ans avant Colomb (996 apr. J.-C.), un jeune viking norvégien au cœur de lion et à l'âme de poète découvre l'Amérique lors d'une quête pour amener son être cher 'au sommet du monde'.
back_translation: Five hundred years before Columbus (996 A.D.), a young Norwegian viking with a lion's heart and a poet's soul discovers America on a quest to bring his loved one 'to the top of the world.'

text: over 80 of the world 's greatest martial artists demonstrate techniques and discuss philosophy in this fascinating account of the martial arts phenomenon and its increasing global popularity .
translation: Plus de 80 des plus grands artistes martiaux du monde démontrent des techniques et discutent de la philosophie dans ce récit fascinant du phénomène des arts martiaux et de sa popularité croissante à l'échelle mondiale.
back_translation: More than 80 of the world's greatest martial artists demonstrate techniques and discuss philosophy in this fascinating account of the martial arts phenomenon and its growing popularity worldwide.

text: an entertaining but unspectacular film . pretty goofy at times - but the slick and gleefully self-indulgent violence will not disappoint the action fan .
translation: un film divertissant mais peu spectaculaire. plutôt loufoque par moments - mais la violence lisse et joyeusement autocomplaisante ne décevra pas les amateurs d'action.
back_translation: a entertaining but not very spectacular film. rather wacky at times - but the smooth and joyfully self-indulgent violence will not disappoint action lovers.

text: based on actual accounts , the untold is the story of harlan knowles ( lance henriksen ) , billionaire and president of bio-comp industries who heads up a team of experts in a quest to locate a company plane that disappeared over the remote forests of the pacific northwest .
translation: Basé sur des faits réels, "L'Inexprimé" raconte l'histoire de Harlan Knowles (Lance Henriksen), milliardaire et président de Bio-Comp Industries, qui dirige une équipe d'experts dans une quête pour retrouver un avion de l'entreprise disparu au-dessus des forêts éloignées du nord-ouest pacifique.
back_translation: Based on true events, "The Unexpressed" tells the story of Harlan Knowles (Lance Henriksen), a billionaire and president of Bio-Comp Industries, who leads a team of experts on a quest to recover a company plane that disappeared over the remote forests of the Pacific Northwest.

text: the character of zigzag is not sufficiently developed to support a film constructed around him .
translation: Le personnage de Zigzag n'est pas suffisamment développé pour soutenir un film construit autour de lui.
back_translation: The character of Zigzag is not sufficiently developed to support a film built around him.

text: as a good old-fashioned adventure for kids , spirit : stallion of the cimarron is a winner .

back_translation: As a good old-fashioned adventure for children, Spirit: Stallion of the Cimarron is a winner.

text: two men ( eddie murphy and jeff garlin ) get laid off in product development at a large food company and are forced to become stay-at-home fathers and take their sons out of the exclusive chapman academy .
translation: Deux hommes (Eddie Murphy et Jeff Garlin) se font licencier dans le développement de produits d'une grande entreprise alimentaire et sont contraints de devenir des pères au foyer et d'enlever leurs fils de l'exclusive Chapman Academy.
back_translation: Two men (Eddie Murphy and Jeff Garlin) get fired from the product development department of a major food company and are forced to become stay-at-home dads and pull their sons out of the exclusive Chapman Academy.

text: henry romero discovers , samantha already knows ( firsthand ) of the evils young men do .
translation: Henry Romero découvre que Samantha sait déjà (de première main) les maux que les jeunes hommes commettent.

text: harry , a world-weary career criminal masquerading as a priest , takes to the road with escaped convict nate and his jailbait girlfriend angel .
translation: Harry, un criminel fatigué du monde se faisant passer pour un prêtre, prend la route avec l'évadé Nate et sa petite amie mineure, Angel.
back_translation: Harry, a tired criminal posing as a priest, hits the road with the fugitive Nate and his underage girlfriend, Angel.

text: shot like a postcard and overacted with all the boozy self-indulgence that brings out the worst in otherwise talented actors . . .

text: a stirring tribute to the bravery and dedication of the world 's reporters who willingly walk into the nightmare of war not only to record the events for posterity , but to help us clearly see the world of our making .
translation: un hommage émouvant à la bravoure et au dévouement des reporters du monde entier qui s'engagent volontairement dans le cauchemar de la guerre, non seulement pour enregistrer les événements pour la postérité, mais aussi pour nous aider à voir clairement le monde que nous avons créé.
back_translation: A moving tribute to the bravery and dedication of reporters around the world who voluntarily engage in the nightmare of war, not only to record events for posterity but also to help us see clearly the world we have created.

text: rewarding for its brash originality and daring in etching a portrait of a man who refuses to take life 's disappointments lying down .

back_translation: rewarding for its bold originality and its daring portrayal of a man who refuses to accept life's disappointments without reacting.

text: as blunt as it is in depicting child abuse , el bola is a movie steeped in an ambiguity that lends its conflicts a symbolic resonance .

text: solondz is without doubt an artist of uncompromising vision , but that vision is beginning to feel , if not morally bankrupt , at least terribly monotonous .

text: a classic romance always involves a certain formula : boy meets girl , boy loses girl , boy gets girl . beijing bicycle is a romance , except the love interest is a bicycle and not a girl .
translation: une romance classique implique toujours une certaine formule : garçon rencontre fille, garçon perd fille, garçon retrouve fille. Beijing Bicycle est une romance, sauf que l'objet de l'affection est un vélo et non une fille.
back_translation: A classic romance always involves a certain formula: boy meets girl, boy loses girl, boy finds girl. Beijing Bicycle is a romance, except that the object of affection is a bicycle and not a girl.

text: there 's no denying the physically spectacular qualities of the film . . . or the emotional integrity of the performances .

text: at its heart and most importantly , spirited away concerns a little girl learning to honour her friends and her family by valuing herself .

back_translation: At the heart of its message, and above all, Spirited Away is about a little girl who learns to honor her friends and family by valuing herself.

back_translation: In Betsy, she discovers a dark mirror of herself - a lonely, angry, and complex woman whose troubled past proves disturbingly close to her own.

text: with no job possibilities on the horizon , the two dads open their own day care facility , `` daddy day care `` , and employ some fairly unconventional and sidesplitting methods of caring for children .
translation: N'ayant aucune possibilité d'emploi en vue, les deux papas ouvrent leur propre crèche, `` daddy day care ``, et emploient des méthodes de garde d'enfants plutôt peu conventionnelles et hilarantes.
back_translation: Having no job prospects in sight, the two dads open their own daycare, "daddy day care," and use rather unconventional and hilarious childcare methods.

text: scooby-doo does n't know if it wants to be a retro-refitting exercise in campy recall for older fans or a silly , nickelodeon-esque kiddie flick .

text: the process of figuring out the moment the movie re-imagines the battle of the bulge with a bare-chested guardsman and a pike is more than worth the price of admission .

back_translation: The process of determining the moment when the film reinvents the Battle of the Ardennes with a bare-chested guard and a halberd is well worth the ticket price.

back_translation: Turin, Italy: Philippa Paccard, deeply disappointed by the lax police investigation following her husband's overdose death, places a bomb in the dealer's cover office.

text: with a court martial to keep visser and the germans distracted , mcnamara orchestrates a cunning scheme to escape and destroy a nearby munitions plant , enlisting the unwitting help of young lt . tommy hart .
translation: Avec une cour martiale pour distraire Visser et les Allemands, McNamara orchestre un plan astucieux pour s'échapper et détruire une usine de munitions à proximité, en utilisant l'aide inconsciente du jeune lieutenant Tommy Hart.
back_translation: With a court-martial to distract Visser and the Germans, McNamara orchestrates a clever plan to escape and destroy a nearby ammunition factory, using the unwitting help of young lieutenant Tommy Hart.

text: using previously unseen video footage , the film shows rocha all jerky and with florid rhetoric urging his cuban comrades to embrace the new political and cultural challenges of the age ; outlining his vision of a unified third world ; and expounding on the differences and peculiarities of latin americans and the means by which their revolutionary aims might be achieved .
translation: Utilisant des images vidéo inédites, le film montre Rocha, tout en mouvements saccadés et avec une rhétorique florissante, exhortant ses camarades cubains à embrasser les nouveaux défis politiques et culturels de l'époque ; décrivant sa vision d'un tiers-monde unifié ; et exposant les différences et les particularités des Latinos-américains ainsi que les moyens par lesquels leurs objectifs révolutionnaires pourraient être atteints.
back_translation: Using previously unseen video footage, the film shows Rocha, in jerky movements and with flourishing rhetoric, urging his Cuban comrades to embrace the new political and cultural challenges of the time; describing his vision of a unified third world; and outlining the differences and particularities of Latin Americans as well as the ways in which their revolutionary goals could be achieved.

text: broomfield seems to uncover a massive scoop here , revealing the multitude of people involved and the possible motivations behind the killings of his titular subjects .

text: in her confusion and grief , she finds consolation in the friendship of their african-american gardener , raymond ( dennis haysbert ) - a socially taboo relationship that leads to the further disintegration of life as she knew it .
translation: Dans sa confusion et sa douleur, elle trouve du réconfort dans l'amitié de leur jardinier afro-américain, Raymond (Dennis Haysbert) - une relation socialement taboue qui conduit à une désintégration encore plus grande de la vie telle qu'elle la connaissait.
back_translation: In her confusion and pain, she finds solace in the friendship of their African American gardener, Raymond (Dennis Haysbert) - a socially taboo relationship that leads to an even greater disintegration of life as she knew it.

text: the ingenious construction ( adapted by david hare from michael cunningham 's novel ) constantly flows forwards and back , weaving themes among three strands which allow us to view events as if through a prism
translation: la construction ingénieuse (adaptée par David Hare du roman de Michael Cunningham) s'écoule constamment en avant et en arrière, tissant des thèmes parmi trois fils qui nous permettent de voir les événements comme à travers un prisme.
back_translation: The ingenious construction (adapted by David Hare from Michael Cunningham's novel) flows constantly back and forth, weaving themes among three threads that allow us to see the events as through a prism.

text: figuring it will be a good way to make money fellow convict emmanuel 'mendy ' ripstein ( peter falk ) sets up a prison boxing match between the two men to decide who is the real undisputed champ .
translation: Pensant que ce sera un bon moyen de gagner de l'argent, son camarade de cellule Emmanuel "Mendy" Ripstein (Peter Falk) organise un match de boxe en prison entre les deux hommes pour décider qui est le véritable champion incontesté.
back_translation: Thinking it would be a good way to make money, his cellmate Emmanuel "Mendy" Ripstein (Peter Falk) organizes a boxing match in prison between the two men to decide who is the true undisputed champion.

translation: ils ont tous des crises de la quarantaine : le castor clownesque a des problèmes d'amour ; le thérapeute intellectuel, Henry, succombe lentement au chant des sirènes du suicide ; Pete perd une guerre contre la bière ; Jonesy a eu des prémonitions étranges depuis qu'il a été percuté par une voiture.
back_translation: They are all having mid-life crises: the clownish beaver has love problems; the intellectual therapist, Henry, is slowly succumbing to the siren call of suicide; Pete is losing a war against beer; Jonesy has had strange premonitions since he was hit by a car.

text: in a big corner office in hell , satan is throwing up his hands in surrender , is firing his r & d people , and has decided he will just screen the master of disguise 24/7 .
translation: Dans un grand bureau dans l'enfer, Satan lève les mains en signe de reddition, renvoie son équipe de recherche et développement, et a décidé qu'il ne diffusera que le Maître de la déguisement 24h/24 et 7j/7.
back_translation: In a large office in hell, Satan raises his hands in surrender, sends his research and development team away, and has decided that he will only broadcast the Master of Disguise 24/7.

text: matt lee has to stay a few steps ahead of his own police force and everyone he 's trusted in order to find out the truth .

text: his sister nicole is 15 , and dealing with her impending womanhood ; middle brother mike is the `` normal `` one , but in some ways the most childish - his latest conquest is nadine , who runs the dog kennel at his security guard job .

text: what it lacks in originality it makes up for in intelligence and b-grade stylishness .

text: essentially , noyce just wants to tell a good story , which he does .
translation: Essentiellement, Noyce veut juste raconter une bonne histoire, ce qu'il fait.

text: it shows that some studios firmly believe that people have lost the ability to think and will forgive any shoddy product as long as there 's a little girl-on-girl action .
translation: Cela montre que certains studios croient fermement que les gens ont perdu la capacité de réfléchir et pardonneront n'importe quel produit de mauvaise qualité tant qu'il y a un peu d'action entre filles.

text: though it was made with careful attention to detail and is well-acted by james spader and maggie gyllenhaal , i felt disrespected .

back_translation: Although it was made with meticulous attention to detail and well interpreted by James Spader and Maggie Gyllenhaal, I felt disrespected.

text: when she was a little child she was given up for adoption and now she is ready to discover the story of her life .
translation: Quand elle était petite, elle a été donnée en adoption et maintenant elle est prête à découvrir l'histoire de sa vie.

text: charlotte sometimes is a brilliant movie . it is about irrational , unexplainable life and it seems so real because it does not attempt to filter out the complexity .
translation: Charlotte parfois est un film brillant. Il s'agit de la vie irrationnelle et inexplicable et il semble si réel car il n'essaie pas de filtrer la complexité.
back_translation: Charlotte sometimes is a brilliant film. It is about irrational and inexplicable life and it feels so real because it does not try to filter complexity.

text: a man brutally beats his girlfriend to death and tosses her remains into a local river . . .
translation: un homme bat brutalement sa petite amie à mort et jette ses restes dans une rivière locale . . .

text: or so he thinks until the blackmailer pulls a u-turn on rodney .

text: the movie takes place in mexico , 2002 ( based on a story from the 1800 's ) .

text: gigli abducts the brother from his mental hospital and holds him hostage in his apartment .

text: why would anyone cast the magnificent jackie chan in a movie full of stunt doubles and special effects ?

text: it 's a beautiful experience , nearly perfect with a fragile flowing fluid score .

text: theology aside , why put someone who ultimately does n't learn at the center of a kids ' story ?
translation: Théologie mise à part, pourquoi placer quelqu'un qui, au final, n'apprend pas au centre d'une histoire pour enfants ?

text: from the creative mind of pulizter winner dave barry , comes a film following a chain of events inspired by the arrival of a mysterious suitcase in miami .
translation: De l'esprit créatif du lauréat du prix Pulitzer Dave Barry, vient un film suivant une chaîne d'événements inspirée par l'arrivée d'une mystérieuse valise à Miami.

text: `` notebook `` follows a young couple ( mcadams and gosling ) who meet in their teens and are reunited after world war ii .
translation: `` notebook `` suit un jeune couple ( McAdams et Gosling ) qui se rencontrent à l'adolescence et se retrouvent après la Seconde Guerre mondiale.
back_translation: ``The Notebook`` follows a young couple (McAdams and Gosling) who meet during their teenage years and reunite after World War II.

text: where tom green stages his gags as assaults on america 's knee-jerk moral sanctimony , jackass lacks aspirations of social upheaval .
translation: où Tom Green met en scène ses gags comme des attaques contre le sanctimonieux moralisme réactif de l'Amérique, Jackass n'a pas d'aspirations à provoquer un bouleversement social.
back_translation: While Tom Green stages his gags as attacks on the sanctimonious reactive morality of America, Jackass has no aspirations to provoke a social upheaval.

text: andrew moves to a small town way up north to isolate himself from the rest of the world .
translation: Andrew déménage dans une petite ville au fin fond du nord pour s'isoler du reste du monde.
back_translation: Andrew is moving to a small town in the far north to isolate himself from the rest of the world.

text: a hilarious film for anyone who remembers lying as a kid -- and anyone who wants to see a movie that 's just plain fun .
translation: un film hilarant pour quiconque se souvient d'avoir menti enfant -- et quiconque veut voir un film qui est tout simplement amusant.
back_translation: A hilarious movie for anyone who remembers lying as a child -- and anyone who wants to see a film that is simply fun.

text: a mobster 's wife is forced to confront her dark side when her young child is kidnapped and held for ransom .
translation: La femme d'un mafieux est forcée de confronter son côté sombre lorsque son jeune enfant est enlevé et tenu en rançon.
back_translation: The wife of a mobster is forced to confront her dark side when her young child is kidnapped and held for ransom.

text: screenwriter dan schneider and director shawn levy substitute volume and primary colors for humor and bite .
translation: Le scénariste Dan Schneider et le réalisateur Shawn Levy substituent le volume et les couleurs primaires à l'humour et au mordant.
back_translation: Screenwriter Dan Schneider and director Shawn Levy substitute volume and primary colors for humor and bite.

text: never rising above routine episodic storytelling , white oleander nonetheless retains something of its source novel 's ravaged emotional surface and cool , observant manner .
translation: ne s'élevant jamais au-dessus d'un récit épistolaire routinier, le laurier-rose conserve néanmoins quelque chose de la surface émotionnelle ravagée de son roman source et de sa manière froide et observatrice.
back_translation: never rising above a routine epistolary narrative, the oleander nevertheless retains something of the ravaged emotional surface of its source novel and its cold, observational style.

text: and this particular scheme requires a large amount of time-travel , and kidnapping austin powers ' father , england 's master spy , nigel powers .
translation: et ce schéma particulier nécessite une grande quantité de voyage dans le temps, ainsi que l'enlèvement du père d'Austin Powers, le maître espion anglais, Nigel Powers.

text: once the downward spiral comes to pass , auto focus bears out as your typical junkie opera . . .
translation: Une fois que la spirale descendante se réalise, l'autofocus s'avère être votre opéra de junkie typique.

text: it is most remarkable not because of its epic scope , but because of the startling intimacy it achieves despite that breadth .
translation: C'est particulièrement remarquable non pas en raison de son ampleur épique, mais en raison de l'intimité surprenante qu'il parvient à atteindre malgré cette envergure.
back_translation: It is particularly remarkable not because of its epic scale, but because of the surprising intimacy it manages to achieve despite this scope.

text: fine acting but there is no sense of connecting the dots , just dots .

text: a gorgeously strange movie , heaven is deeply concerned with morality , but it refuses to spell things out for viewers .
translation: un film étrangement magnifique, le ciel est profondément préoccupé par la morale, mais il refuse de tout expliquer aux spectateurs.
back_translation: a strangely beautiful film, the sky is deeply concerned with morality, but it refuses to explain everything to the audience.

text: a player in a famous orchestra finds sexual experiences with a russian opera singer , which he enjoys much because his wife has just left due to the fact that he has purchased a porno movie .
translation: Un musicien d'une célèbre orchestre trouve des expériences sexuelles avec une chanteuse d'opéra russe, qu'il apprécie beaucoup car sa femme vient de le quitter à cause de l'achat d'un film pornographique.
back_translation: A musician from a famous orchestra has sexual experiences with a Russian opera singer, whom he appreciates very much because his wife has just left him due to his purchase of a pornographic film.

text: woody allen 's latest is an ambling , broad comedy about all there is to love -- and hate -- about the movie biz .
translation: Le dernier film de Woody Allen est une comédie décontractée et large sur tout ce qu'il y a à aimer – et à détester – dans l'industrie cinématographique.
back_translation: Woody Allen's latest film is a relaxed and broad comedy about everything there is to love – and to hate – in the film industry.

translation: Elle est la suppléante de la classe de 6D, le pire groupe de l'école élémentaire St-Cécile.

text: two sisters aged six years , no sooner see their remaining parent buried when they are torn apart .
translation: Deux sœurs âgées de six ans, à peine ont-elles vu leur parent restant enterré qu'elles sont séparées.
back_translation: Two six-year-old sisters, barely having seen their remaining parent buried, are separated.

text: [ drumline ] is entertaining for what it does , and admirable for what it does n't do .
translation: [ drumline ] est divertissant pour ce qu'il fait, et admirable pour ce qu'il ne fait pas.

text: `` all for nothin ' `` is their story of love , forgiveness and redemption .
translation: ``Tout cela pour rien`` est leur histoire d'amour, de pardon et de rédemption.

text: woody allen can write and deliver a one liner as well as anybody . but i had a lot of problems with this movie .
translation: Woody Allen peut écrire et délivrer une réplique aussi bien que quiconque. Mais j'ai eu beaucoup de problèmes avec ce film.
back_translation: Woody Allen can write and deliver a line as well as anyone. But I had a lot of problems with this film.

text: he 's a middle aged hermit who likes to talk and has an answer to everything .
translation: C'est un ermite d'âge moyen qui aime parler et a une réponse à tout.
back_translation: He is a middle-aged hermit who loves to talk and has an answer for everything.

text: despite suffering a sense-of-humour failure , the man who wrote rocky does not deserve to go down with a ship as leaky as this .

text: a non-britney person might survive a screening with little harm done , except maybe for the last 15 minutes , which are as maudlin as any after-school special you can imagine .

text: meanwhile , on jesse & # 180 ; s trail is the saint of the killers , a holy cowboy assassin with the mission of kill custer .
translation: Pendant ce temps, sur le chemin de Jesse se trouve le saint des tueurs, un cowboy assassin sacré avec la mission de tuer Custer.

text: . . . this is n't even a movie we can enjoy as mild escapism ; it is one in which fear and frustration are provoked to intolerable levels .
translation: . . . ce n'est même pas un film que nous pouvons apprécier comme un léger escapisme ; c'est un film dans lequel la peur et la frustration sont poussées à des niveaux intolérables.

text: the screenplay comes across , rather unintentionally , as hip-hop scooby-doo .

text: into their midst come a hotshot american , van zan ( matthew mcconaughey ) , who says he has a way to kill the beasts and save mankind - a way quinn 's never seen done .
translation: Au milieu d'eux arrive un Américain doué, Van Zan (Matthew McConaughey), qui dit avoir un moyen de tuer les bêtes et de sauver l'humanité - un moyen que Quinn n'a jamais vu être réalisé.
back_translation: Among them arrives a gifted American, Van Zan (Matthew McConaughey), who claims to have a way to kill the beasts and save humanity - a way that Quinn has never seen accomplished.

text: the quest is hope and the passions that drive us in this search .
translation: la quête est l'espoir et les passions qui nous animent dans cette recherche.
back_translation: The quest is the hope and the passions that drive us in this search.

text: ultimately she discovers that what appears on the surface to be true quite often is not .
translation: en fin de compte, elle découvre que ce qui semble être vrai en surface ne l'est souvent pas.
