text: leela is the story of leela , an aware , liberal woman who struggles with the true meaning of independence .
translation: Leela est l'histoire de Leela, une femme éveillée et libérale qui lutte pour comprendre le véritable sens de l'indépendance.
back_translation: Leela is the story of Leela, an awakened and liberal woman who struggles to understand the true meaning of independence.

text: robert harmon 's less-is-more approach delivers real bump-in -the-night chills -- his greatest triumph is keeping the creepy crawlies hidden in the film 's thick shadows .
translation: L'approche "moins c'est plus" de Robert Harmon apporte de véritables frissons nocturnes - son plus grand triomphe est de garder les frissons cachés dans les épaisses ombres du film.
back_translation: Robert Harmon's "less is more" approach brings real night chills - his greatest triumph is keeping the thrills hidden in the thick shadows of the film.

text: labute masterfully balances both traditional or modern stories together in a manner that one never overwhelms the other . something for everyone .
translation: Labute équilibre habilement les histoires traditionnelles et modernes de manière à ce qu'aucune ne domine l'autre. Il y en a pour tous les goûts.
back_translation: Labute skillfully balances traditional and modern stories so that neither dominates the other. There is something for everyone's taste.

text: however , his son is a celibate priest who has never had any success with women . . . , ever .
translation: Cependant, son fils est un prêtre célibataire qui n'a jamais eu de succès avec les femmes... jamais.
back_translation: However, his son is a single priest who has never had success with women... never.

text: well , bruce nolan , played by jim carrey , gets that chance after he freaks out on live tv , is fired and is offered a new job by an unknown place .
translation: Eh bien, Bruce Nolan, joué par Jim Carrey, obtient cette chance après avoir craqué en direct à la télévision, est licencié et se voit offrir un nouvel emploi par un endroit inconnu.
back_translation: Well, Bruce Nolan, played by Jim Carrey, gets this chance after having a meltdown live on television, is fired, and is offered a new job by an unknown place.

text: burns ' fifth beer-soaked film feels in almost every possible way -- from the writing and direction to the soggy performances -- tossed off .
translation: Le cinquième film imbibé de bière de Burns semble, à presque tous points de vue - de l'écriture et de la réalisation aux performances détrempées - avoir été bâclé.
back_translation: Burns' fifth beer-soaked film seems, in almost every respect - from the writing and directing to the soggy performances - to have been rushed.

text: contributors include : director mimi leder , editor anne v . coates , producer gail katz and director claudia weill .
translation: Les contributeurs incluent : la réalisatrice Mimi Leder, la monteuse Anne V. Coates, la productrice Gail Katz et la réalisatrice Claudia Weill.
back_translation: The contributors include: director Mimi Leder, editor Anne V. Coates, producer Gail Katz, and director Claudia Weill.

text: takes a look at an old world , passionless arrangement in a way that is at once so biting and so brutally honest that you chuckle first , then shudder .
translation: jette un œil sur un ancien monde, un agencement sans passion d'une manière qui est à la fois si mordante et si brutalement honnête que vous riez d'abord, puis vous frémissez.
back_translation: take a look at an old world, a passionless arrangement in a way that is both so biting and so brutally honest that you first laugh, then shudder.

text: but what exactly is good and waht exactly is evil ?
translation: mais qu'est-ce qui est exactement bon et qu'est-ce qui est exactement mauvais ?
back_translation: But what is exactly good and what is exactly bad?

text: . . . [ a ] strained comedy that jettisons all opportunities for rock to make his mark by serving up the usual chaotic nonsense .
translation: . . . [une] comédie tendue qui rejette toutes les opportunités pour Rock de laisser sa marque en servant le chaos habituel.
back_translation: ... a tense comedy that rejects all opportunities for Rock to make his mark by serving the usual chaos.

text: this is a harrowing movie about how parents know where all the buttons are , and how to push them .
translation: c'est un film éprouvant sur la façon dont les parents savent où se trouvent tous les boutons et comment les activer.
back_translation: It's a challenging film about how parents know where all the buttons are and how to activate them.

text: at once emotional and richly analytical , the cosby-seinfeld encounter alone confirms the serious weight behind this superficially loose , larky documentary .
translation: à la fois émotionnelle et richement analytique, la rencontre entre Cosby et Seinfeld confirme à elle seule le poids sérieux derrière ce documentaire apparemment léger et enjoué.
back_translation: Both emotional and richly analytical, the meeting between Cosby and Seinfeld alone confirms the serious weight behind this seemingly light and cheerful documentary.

text: a fast-moving , fluidly told tale , eugene jarecki 's documentary certainly will likely inflame kissinger 's ardent cronies . and yet , as one-sided as its story is , the movie also manages a measured disposition .
translation: Un récit rapide et fluidement raconté, le documentaire d'Eugene Jarecki risque certainement d'enflammer les ardents partisans de Kissinger. Et pourtant, aussi unilatérale que soit son histoire, le film réussit également à avoir une disposition mesurée.
back_translation: A quick and smoothly told story, Eugene Jarecki's documentary is sure to inflame the ardent supporters of Kissinger. Yet, as one-sided as its narrative may be, the film also manages to have a measured disposition.

text: along the way , the filmmakers try to learn from these relationship veterans , while navigating their own fledgling polyamorous relationships .
translation: Tout au long du chemin, les cinéastes essaient d'apprendre de ces vétérans des relations, tout en naviguant dans leurs propres relations polyamoureuses naissantes.
back_translation: Throughout the journey, the filmmakers try to learn from these veterans of relationships, while navigating their own budding polyamorous relationships.

text: would anyone believe mary and joe 's claim to abstinence ?
translation: Est-ce que quelqu'un croirait à la revendication d'abstinence de Mary et Joe ?
back_translation: Would anyone believe Mary and Joe's claim of abstinence?

text: until it goes off the rails in its final 10 or 15 minutes , wendigo , larry fessenden 's spooky new thriller , is a refreshingly smart and newfangled variation on several themes derived from far less sophisticated and knowing horror films .
translation: jusqu'à ce qu'il déraille dans ses 10 ou 15 dernières minutes, wendigo, le nouveau thriller effrayant de larry fessenden, est une variation rafraîchissante, intelligente et moderne sur plusieurs thèmes dérivés de films d'horreur bien moins sophistiqués et avertis.
back_translation: Until it goes off the rails in its last 10 or 15 minutes, Wendigo, the new scary thriller by Larry Fessenden, is a refreshing, intelligent, and modern variation on several themes derived from much less sophisticated and aware horror films.

text: if ever a concept came handed down from the movie gods on a silver platter , this is it . if ever such a dependable concept was botched in execution , this is it .
translation: s'il y a jamais eu un concept transmis par les dieux du cinéma sur un plateau d'argent, c'est celui-ci. s'il y a jamais eu un concept aussi fiable raté dans son exécution, c'est celui-ci.
back_translation: If there has ever been a concept handed down by the cinema gods on a silver platter, it's this one. If there has ever been a concept that was so reliable and failed in its execution, it's this one.

text: as self-aware movies go , who is cletis tout ? is clever enough , though thin writing proves its undoing .
translation: En ce qui concerne les films auto-référentiels, qui est Cletis Tout ? Il est assez intelligent, bien que l'écriture mince prouve sa perte.
back_translation: In terms of self-referential films, who is Cletis Tout? He is quite intelligent, although the thin writing proves his downfall.

text: saigon , 1952 , a beautiful , exotic , and mysterious city caught in the grips of the vietnamese war of liberation from the french colonial powers .
translation: Saigon, 1952, une ville belle, exotique et mystérieuse, prise dans les griffes de la guerre de libération vietnamienne contre les puissances coloniales françaises.
back_translation: Saigon, 1952, a beautiful, exotic, and mysterious city, caught in the claws of the Vietnamese liberation war against the French colonial powers.

text: well , jason 's gone to manhattan and hell , i guess a space station in the year 2455 can be crossed off the list of ideas for the inevitable future sequels ( hey , do n't shoot the messenger ) .
translation: Eh bien, Jason est parti pour Manhattan et bon sang, je suppose qu'une station spatiale en l'an 2455 peut être rayée de la liste des idées pour les inévitables suites futures (hé, ne tirez pas sur le messager).
back_translation: Well, Jason has gone to Manhattan and good grief, I guess a space station in the year 2455 can be crossed off the list of ideas for inevitable future sequels (hey, don’t shoot the messenger).

text: the heedless impetuousness of youth is on full , irritating display in [ this ] meandering and pointless french coming-of-age import from writer-director anne-sophie birot .
translation: l'imprudence implacable de la jeunesse est pleinement et irritamment affichée dans [ce] film français de passage sur le passage à l'âge adulte, réalisé par anne-sophie birot.
back_translation: The relentless recklessness of youth is fully and irritatingly displayed in this French film about the transition to adulthood, directed by Anne-Sophie Birot.

text: eva is an accidental witness of the death of a young girl , even more : she 's got it all on tape .
translation: Eva est une témoin accidentelle de la mort d'une jeune fille, et encore plus : elle a tout enregistré sur bande.
back_translation: Eva is an accidental witness to the death of a young girl, and even more: she recorded everything on tape.

text: i 'm not sure which half of dragonfly is worse : the part where nothing 's happening , or the part where something 's happening , but it 's stupid .
translation: Je ne suis pas sûr de quelle moitié de libellule est la pire : la partie où rien ne se passe, ou la partie où quelque chose se passe, mais c'est stupide.
back_translation: I'm not sure which half of the dragonfly is worse: the part where nothing happens, or the part where something happens, but it's stupid.

text: and while bruce is getting everything he wants , he has been ignoring his girlfriend , grace and loses her .
translation: et pendant que Bruce obtient tout ce qu'il veut, il ignore sa petite amie, Grace, et la perd.
back_translation: And while Bruce gets everything he wants, he ignores his girlfriend, Grace, and loses her.

text: the acting is amateurish , the cinematography is atrocious , the direction is clumsy , the writing is insipid and the violence is at once luridly graphic and laughably unconvincing .
translation: le jeu d'acteur est amateur, la cinématographie est atroce, la réalisation est maladroite, l'écriture est insipide et la violence est à la fois excessivement graphique et risiblement peu convaincante.
back_translation: The acting is amateur, the cinematography is atrocious, the direction is clumsy, the writing is insipid, and the violence is both excessively graphic and laughably unconvincing.

text: oblivious of all the differences of status and background , a bond that would never break grew between them .
translation: Ignorants de toutes les différences de statut et d'origine, un lien qui ne se briserait jamais se forma entre eux.
back_translation: Ignorant all differences of status and origin, a bond that would never be broken formed between them.

text: from spiritual rebirth to bruising defeat , vincent 's odyssey resonates in a profound way , comparable to the classic films of jean renoir .
translation: De la renaissance spirituelle à la défaite écrasante, l'odyssée de Vincent résonne de manière profonde, comparable aux films classiques de Jean Renoir.
back_translation: From spiritual renaissance to crushing defeat, Vincent's odyssey resonates profoundly, akin to the classic films of Jean Renoir.

text: in this debut short , meeper valiantly tries to warn the patrons of the ale-e-inn ( an intergalactic watering hole with its own constellation of stars ) of impending danger , only to find himself face-to-face with the most fearsome creatures in the galaxy .
translation: dans ce court-métrage de début, meeper essaie vaillamment d'avertir les clients de l'ale-e-inn (un bar intergalactique avec sa propre constellation d'étoiles) du danger imminent, seulement pour se retrouver face à face avec les créatures les plus redoutables de la galaxie.
back_translation: In this short film, Meeper bravely tries to warn the customers of the Ale-e-inn (an intergalactic bar with its own constellation of stars) about the imminent danger, only to find themselves face to face with the most fearsome creatures in the galaxy.

text: friday after next has the same problem that next friday did -- it 's called where 's chris tucker when you need him ?
translation: le vendredi d'après a le même problème que le vendredi prochain -- ça s'appelle où est Chris Tucker quand on a besoin de lui ?
back_translation: The Friday after has the same problem as next Friday -- it's called where is Chris Tucker when we need him?

text: the director 's twitchy sketchbook style and adroit perspective shifts grow wearisome amid leaden pacing and indifferent craftsmanship ( most notably wretched sound design ) .
translation: le style de carnet de croquis nerveux du directeur et ses changements de perspective adroits deviennent lassants au milieu d'un rythme lourd et d'un savoir-faire indifférent (notamment un design sonore épouvantable).
back_translation: The director's nervously sketched style and his deft changes in perspective become tiresome amidst a heavy pace and indifferent craftsmanship (notably a dreadful sound design).

text: that 's why handsome and his three best friends sammy , victor and the cribsheet genius applebee have banded together and found ways to cheat on their tests all through their school years .
translation: C'est pourquoi Handsome et ses trois meilleurs amis Sammy, Victor et le génie de la feuille de triche Applebee se sont regroupés et ont trouvé des moyens de tricher à leurs examens tout au long de leurs années scolaires.
back_translation: That's why Handsome and his three best friends Sammy, Victor, and the cheat sheet genius Applebee teamed up and found ways to cheat on their exams throughout their school years.

text: beautifully filmed and well acted . . . but admittedly problematic in its narrative specifics .
translation: magnifiquement filmé et bien joué . . . mais il est certes problématique dans ses spécificités narratives .
back_translation: magnificently filmed and well acted... but it is certainly problematic in its narrative specifics.

text: lindberg demonstrates a remarkable sense of place , a keen understanding that emotions are boiled into a concentrate , not diluted , in the rural setting .
translation: Lindberg démontre un sens du lieu remarquable, une compréhension aiguë que les émotions sont concentrées, et non diluées, dans ce cadre rural.
back_translation: Lindberg demonstrates a remarkable sense of place, a keen understanding that emotions are concentrated, not diluted, in this rural setting.

text: i cry for i spy -- or i would if this latest and laziest imaginable of all vintage-tv spinoffs were capable of engendering an emotional response of any kind .
translation: Je pleure pour espionner -- ou je le ferais si cette dernière et la plus paresseuse imaginable de toutes les séries dérivées de la télévision vintage était capable de susciter une réponse émotionnelle de quelque nature que ce soit.
back_translation: I cry to spy -- or I would if this latest and most lazily imaginable of all the vintage television spin-offs were capable of eliciting any emotional response whatsoever.

text: four outlandish but faithful men , a moslem , a hindu , a jew and a christian coincidently meet up a mountain , at an altitude of 3000 metres .
translation: Quatre hommes extravagants mais fidèles, un musulman, un hindou, un juif et un chrétien, se rencontrent par hasard sur une montagne, à une altitude de 3000 mètres.
back_translation: Four extravagant yet loyal men, a Muslim, a Hindu, a Jew, and a Christian, meet by chance on a mountain, at an altitude of 3000 meters.

text: but on the wedding day , they also sign a divorce agreement which is effective one year after their marriage .
translation: mais le jour du mariage, ils signent également un accord de divorce qui prend effet un an après leur mariage.
back_translation: But on the wedding day, they also sign a divorce agreement that takes effect one year after their marriage.

text: the film falls short on tension , eloquence , spiritual challenge -- things that have made the original new testament stories so compelling for 20 centuries .
translation: le film manque de tension, d'éloquence, de défi spirituel - des éléments qui ont rendu les histoires du Nouveau Testament si captivantes pendant 20 siècles.
back_translation: The film lacks tension, eloquence, and spiritual challenge - elements that have made the stories of the New Testament so captivating for 20 centuries.

text: you watch for that sense of openness , the little surprises .
translation: tu cherches ce sentiment d'ouverture, les petites surprises.
back_translation: You are looking for that feeling of openness, the little surprises.

text: miyazaki 's nonstop images are so stunning , and his imagination so vivid , that the only possible complaint you could have about spirited away is that there is no rest period , no timeout .
translation: Les images incessantes de Miyazaki sont si époustouflantes et son imagination si vive que la seule critique que l'on pourrait formuler à propos de "Le Voyage de Chihiro" est qu'il n'y a pas de période de repos, pas de temps mort.
back_translation: The incessant images of Miyazaki are so breathtaking and his imagination so vibrant that the only criticism one could make about "Spirited Away" is that there are no rest periods, no downtime.

text: it 's the end of the world as metaphor for how we scuttle relationships , and it 's a remarkably apt one .
translation: c'est la fin du monde comme métaphore de la façon dont nous brisons les relations, et c'est une métaphore remarquablement appropriée.
back_translation: it's the end of the world as a metaphor for how we break relationships, and it is a remarkably fitting metaphor.

text: this film was made by and for those folks who collect the serial killer cards and are fascinated by the mere suggestion of serial killers . for the rest of us , sitting through dahmer 's two hours amounts to little more than punishment .
translation: ce film a été réalisé par et pour ceux qui collectionnent les cartes de tueurs en série et sont fascinés par la simple suggestion de tueurs en série. pour le reste d'entre nous, passer deux heures avec Dahmer revient à peu près à une punition.
back_translation: This film was made by and for those who collect serial killer cards and are fascinated by the mere suggestion of serial killers. For the rest of us, spending two hours with Dahmer is about like a punishment.

text: from stag beetle to swastika narrates in a richly detailed , associative montage the boundless possibilities of manipulating images and using images the historionaut , a history machine , produces an incessant stream of remembered , contemporary and future images .
translation: de la punaise de Saint-Sébastien à la swastika raconte dans un montage richement détaillé et associatif les possibilités illimitées de manipulation des images et d'utilisation des images ; l'historionaute, une machine à histoire, produit un flux incessant d'images mémorisées, contemporaines et futures.
back_translation: From the Saint-Sebastian bug to the swastika, it tells in a richly detailed and associative montage the unlimited possibilities of manipulating images and using images; the historionaut, a machine for history, produces an incessant flow of memorized, contemporary, and future images.

text: by the time it ends in a rush of sequins , flashbulbs , blaring brass and back-stabbing babes , it has said plenty about how show business has infiltrated every corner of society -- and not always for the better .
translation: au moment où cela se termine dans une ruée de paillettes, de flashs, de cuivres tonitruants et de bébés traîtres, cela a beaucoup dit sur la façon dont le show-business a infiltré tous les coins de la société -- et pas toujours pour le meilleur.
back_translation: At the moment it ends in a rush of glitter, flashes, booming brass, and treacherous babies, it says a lot about how show business has infiltrated every corner of society -- and not always for the better.

text: the film succeeds as an homage to human spirit in the most shattering of circumstances .
translation: le film réussit en tant qu'hommage à l'esprit humain dans les circonstances les plus dévastatrices.
back_translation: The film succeeds as a tribute to the human spirit in the most devastating circumstances.

text: arcangel and his son travel to hometown , the familiy house looks abandoned , only isabel , a misterious old woman , is there .
translation: Arcangel et son fils voyagent vers leur ville natale, la maison familiale semble abandonnée, seule Isabel, une mystérieuse vieille femme, est présente.
back_translation: Arcangel and his son are traveling to their hometown, the family house seems abandoned, only Isabel, a mysterious old woman, is present.

text: smart science fiction for grown-ups , with only a few false steps along the way .
translation: science-fiction intelligente pour les adultes, avec seulement quelques faux pas en cours de route.
back_translation: intelligent science fiction for adults, with only a few missteps along the way.

text: i 'll go out on a limb . it is n't quite one of the worst movies of the year . it 's just merely very bad .
translation: Je vais m'avancer. Ce n'est pas vraiment l'un des pires films de l'année. C'est juste très mauvais.
back_translation: I'm going to step forward. It's not really one of the worst films of the year. It's just very bad.

text: disney has always been hit-or-miss when bringing beloved kids ' books to the screen . . . tuck everlasting is a little of both .
translation: Disney a toujours eu des réussites et des échecs en adaptant des livres pour enfants bien-aimés à l'écran... Tuck Everlasting est un peu des deux.
back_translation: Disney has always had successes and failures in adapting beloved children's books to the screen... Tuck Everlasting is a bit of both.

text: . . . its stupidities wind up sticking in one 's mind a lot more than the cool bits .
translation: . . . ses stupidités finissent par rester en tête beaucoup plus que les moments intéressants.
back_translation: ... his stupidities end up sticking in the mind much more than the interesting moments.

text: in a world besieged by world war ii , wendy , now grown up , tries to give her own children hope by telling them of her magical experiences with peter pan in never land .
translation: Dans un monde assiégé par la Seconde Guerre mondiale, Wendy, maintenant adulte, essaie de donner à ses propres enfants de l'espoir en leur racontant ses expériences magiques avec Peter Pan au Pays Imaginaire.
back_translation: In a world besieged by World War II, Wendy, now an adult, tries to give hope to her own children by telling them about her magical experiences with Peter Pan in Neverland.

text: the script is smart and dark - hallelujah for small favors .
translation: le scénario est intelligent et sombre - alléluia pour les petits services.
back_translation: the scenario is intelligent and dark - hallelujah for small services.

text: a love story played out against a backdrop of political and religious upheaval .
translation: une histoire d'amour se déroulant sur fond de troubles politiques et religieux.
back_translation: a love story set against a backdrop of political and religious turmoil.

text: an internet terrorist creates a computer source code based on the dna of a junkie .
translation: un terroriste d'internet crée un code source informatique basé sur l'ADN d'un junkie.
back_translation: An internet terrorist creates a source code based on the DNA of a junkie.

text: it 's at once laughable and compulsively watchable , in its committed dumbness .
translation: c'est à la fois risible et captivant à regarder, dans son idiotie engagée.
back_translation: It is both laughable and captivating to watch, in its committed idiocy.

text: retired fbi profiler terry mccaleb ( eastwood ) , who has recently had a heart transplant , is hired by graciela rivers ( de jesus ) , to investigate the death of her sister , gloria , who happens to have given mccaleb his heart .
translation: L'ancien profileur du FBI Terry McCaleb (Eastwood), qui a récemment subi une greffe cardiaque, est engagé par Graciela Rivers (de Jesus) pour enquêter sur la mort de sa sœur, Gloria, qui se trouve avoir donné son cœur à McCaleb.
back_translation: Former FBI profiler Terry McCaleb (Eastwood), who has recently undergone a heart transplant, is hired by Graciela Rivers (de Jesus) to investigate the death of her sister, Gloria, who happens to have donated her heart to McCaleb.

text: sassy postgrad elle woods ( witherspoon ) is all about animal rights .
translation: La pétillante diplômée elle woods (witherspoon) est entièrement consacrée aux droits des animaux.
back_translation: The bubbly graduate Elle Woods (Witherspoon) is fully dedicated to animal rights.

text: centuries of tradition place this holy mountain in the sinai peninsula of egypt , but compelling evidence will show that this hallowed ground , where moses was told to take the shoes of his feet before the burning bush , may actually be in the barren deserts of northwestern saudi arabia .
translation: Des siècles de tradition placent cette montagne sacrée dans la péninsule du Sinaï en Égypte, mais des preuves convaincantes montreront que ce sol sacré, où Moïse a été invité à retirer ses chaussures devant le buisson ardent, pourrait en réalité se trouver dans les déserts arides du nord-ouest de l'Arabie saoudite.
back_translation: Centuries of tradition place this sacred mountain in the Sinai Peninsula in Egypt, but compelling evidence will show that this holy ground, where Moses was invited to take off his shoes before the burning bush, may actually lie in the arid deserts of northwestern Saudi Arabia.

text: its valuable message makes it a must-see for children and teenagers , and even more so for those callous adults who have become casually corrupt in their efforts to simply get through life .
translation: Son message précieux en fait un incontournable pour les enfants et les adolescents, et encore plus pour ces adultes insensibles qui sont devenus corrompus de manière désinvolte dans leurs efforts pour traverser la vie.
back_translation: Its precious message makes it a must-have for children and teenagers, and even more so for those insensitive adults who have become casually corrupted in their efforts to navigate through life.

text: it seems like i have been waiting my whole life for this movie and now i ca n't wait for the sequel .
translation: Il semble que j'aie attendu toute ma vie pour ce film et maintenant je suis impatient de voir la suite.
back_translation: It seems that I have waited my whole life for this movie and now I can't wait to see the sequel.

text: this is n't just the cliffsnotes version of nicholas nickleby , it 's the cliffsnotes with pages missing .
translation: ce n'est pas seulement la version CliffsNotes de Nicholas Nickleby, c'est la version CliffsNotes avec des pages manquantes.
back_translation: It's not just the CliffsNotes version of Nicholas Nickleby, it's the CliffsNotes version with missing pages.

text: years later , at the inauguration of the 'paradise-casino ' , patricia announces to a stunned crowd and a flabbergasted katherine that she immediately retires from showbusiness .
translation: Des années plus tard, lors de l'inauguration du 'paradis-casino', Patricia annonce à une foule stupéfaite et à une Katherine ahurie qu'elle prend immédiatement sa retraite du show-business.
back_translation: Years later, during the inauguration of the 'paradise-casino', Patricia announces to a stunned crowd and a bewildered Katherine that she is immediately retiring from show business.

text: a hip ride into hyper-time , clockstoppers is a lively and enjoyable adventure for all ages at any time .
translation: Une aventure dynamique et agréable pour tous les âges à tout moment, Clockstoppers est une expérience palpitante dans l'hyper-temps.
back_translation: A dynamic and enjoyable adventure for all ages at any time, Clockstoppers is an exciting experience in hyper-time.

text: an entertaining and poignantly bittersweet take-down of a good man 's midlife crisis .
translation: une critique divertissante et délicieusement mélancolique de la crise de la quarantaine d'un homme bien.
back_translation: An entertaining and delightfully melancholy critique of a good man's mid-life crisis.

text: ultimately this is a frustrating patchwork : an uneasy marriage of louis begley 's source novel ( about schmidt ) and an old payne screenplay .
translation: en fin de compte, c'est un patchwork frustrant : un mariage difficile entre le roman source de louis begley (à propos de schmidt) et un ancien scénario de payne.
back_translation: Ultimately, it's a frustrating patchwork: a difficult marriage between Louis Begley's source novel (about Schmidt) and an old script by Payne.

text: sort of an existential version of a seinfeld episode .
translation: une sorte de version existentielle d'un épisode de Seinfeld.
back_translation: a sort of existential version of a Seinfeld episode.

text: the camera cuts back and forth between gus and grace : he talks about what a great driver he is , she says he 's a lousy driver .
translation: la caméra passe d'un personnage à l'autre entre gus et grace : il parle de quel grand conducteur il est, elle dit qu'il est un mauvais conducteur.
back_translation: The camera moves between Gus and Grace: he talks about what a great driver he is, and she says that he is a bad driver.

text: there has to be a few advantages to never growing old . like being able to hit on a 15-year old when you 're over 100 .
translation: Il doit y avoir quelques avantages à ne jamais vieillir. Comme pouvoir draguer une adolescente de 15 ans quand on a plus de 100 ans.
back_translation: There must be some advantages to never aging. Like being able to hit on a 15-year-old when you're over 100 years old.

text: a london website designer ops out of her comfortable but ordinary relationship with a nice boyfriend when she forms a dangerously obsessive bond with a handsome , mysterious mountaineer , who turns out to have some secrets .
translation: Une designer de sites Web londonienne renonce à sa relation confortable mais ordinaire avec un petit ami sympathique lorsqu'elle crée un lien dangereusement obsédant avec un beau montagnard mystérieux, qui s'avère avoir quelques secrets.
back_translation: A London web designer gives up her comfortable but ordinary relationship with a nice boyfriend when she forms a dangerously obsessive connection with a handsome, mysterious mountaineer who turns out to have a few secrets.

text: not only is it a charming , funny and beautifully crafted import , it uses very little dialogue , making it relatively effortless to read and follow the action at the same time .
translation: non seulement c'est un import charmant, drôle et magnifiquement réalisé, mais il utilise très peu de dialogue, ce qui le rend relativement facile à lire et à suivre l'action en même temps.
back_translation: Not only is it a charming, funny, and beautifully crafted import, but it uses very little dialogue, which makes it relatively easy to read and follow the action at the same time.

text: they will try to find hanareh , a singer with a magic voice who crossed the border and may now be in danger in the iraqi kurdistan .
translation: Ils vont essayer de retrouver Hanareh, une chanteuse au voix magique qui a franchi la frontière et qui pourrait maintenant être en danger au Kurdistan irakien.
back_translation: They will try to find Hanareh, a singer with a magical voice who has crossed the border and could now be in danger in Iraqi Kurdistan.

text: nearly manages to be what `` blow `` could n't - a perpetual night party that generates a sick fascination to the bitter end .
translation: parvient presque à être ce que `` blow `` ne pouvait pas - une fête nocturne perpétuelle qui génère une fascination malsaine jusqu'à la fin.
back_translation: almost manages to be what "blow" could not - a perpetual night party that generates a morbid fascination until the end.

text: the project of pre-crime , at the time being in a state of trial run , is going to be voted about in the near future .
translation: Le projet de pré-crime, actuellement en phase d'essai, sera bientôt soumis au vote.
back_translation: The pre-crime project, currently in the testing phase, will soon be put to a vote.

text: fontaine 's direction , especially her agreeably startling use of close-ups and her grace with a moving camera , creates sheerly cinematic appeal .
translation: La direction de Fontaine, en particulier son utilisation agréablement surprenante des gros plans et sa grâce avec une caméra en mouvement, crée un attrait purement cinématographique.
back_translation: Fontaine's direction, particularly her surprisingly pleasant use of close-ups and her grace with a moving camera, creates a purely cinematic appeal.

text: it 's a race against the clock as jay must convince kay -- who not only has no memory of his time spent with the agency , but is also the only person alive who has the expertise to save the galaxy -- to reunite with the mib before earth is destroyed completely .
translation: c'est une course contre la montre alors que jay doit convaincre kay — qui non seulement n'a aucun souvenir de son temps passé avec l'agence, mais qui est aussi la seule personne vivante ayant l'expertise pour sauver la galaxie — de se réunir avec les mib avant que la terre ne soit complètement détruite.
back_translation: It's a race against time as Jay must convince Kay — who not only has no memory of his time with the agency but is also the only living person with the expertise to save the galaxy — to reunite with the MIB before Earth is completely destroyed.

text: marly has given her career as an aquatic weeki wachee mermaid up and her marriage to steve is over .
translation: Marly a renoncé à sa carrière de sirène aquatique à Weeki Wachee et son mariage avec Steve est terminé.
back_translation: Marly has given up her career as a water mermaid at Weeki Wachee, and her marriage to Steve is over.

text: perry 's good and his is an interesting character , but `` serving sara `` has n't much more to serve than silly fluff . nor is it a romantic comedy .
translation: Perry est bon et c'est un personnage intéressant, mais "Serving Sara" n'a pas grand-chose d'autre à offrir que des banalités. Ce n'est pas non plus une comédie romantique.
back_translation: Perry is good and he's an interesting character, but "Serving Sara" doesn't have much else to offer besides clichés. It's not really a romantic comedy either.

text: the result of a weekend affair he had back at the height of his fame produced olivia , a newpaper delivery girl for the south wales echo .
translation: Le résultat d'une liaison d'un week-end qu'il avait eue à l'apogée de sa gloire a produit Olivia, une fille de livraison de journaux pour le South Wales Echo.
back_translation: The result of a weekend affair he had at the height of his glory produced Olivia, a girl who delivers newspapers for the South Wales Echo.

text: everyone around graham has their reasons why he should or should n't fully recover . . .
translation: tout le monde autour de Graham a ses raisons pour lesquelles il devrait ou ne devrait pas se rétablir complètement...
back_translation: Everyone around Graham has their reasons for why he should or shouldn't make a full recovery...

text: after confidential ( and shameful ) information was released by british authorities , this amazing story of survival was finally confirmed .
translation: Après que des informations confidentielles (et honteuses) ont été révélées par les autorités britanniques, cette incroyable histoire de survie a enfin été confirmée.
back_translation: After confidential (and embarrassing) information was revealed by the British authorities, this incredible survival story has finally been confirmed.

text: hope looms on the horizon though : he 's closing in fast on his dream of opening a four-star restaurant in north conway .
translation: L'espoir se profile à l'horizon cependant : il se rapproche rapidement de son rêve d'ouvrir un restaurant quatre étoiles à North Conway.
back_translation: Hope is on the horizon, however: he is quickly getting closer to his dream of opening a four-star restaurant in North Conway.

text: plays like one long , meandering sketch inspired by the works of john waters and todd solondz , rather than a fully developed story .
translation: se joue comme un long croquis errant inspiré des œuvres de John Waters et Todd Solondz, plutôt que d'une histoire entièrement développée.
back_translation: plays out like a long wandering sketch inspired by the works of John Waters and Todd Solondz, rather than a fully developed story.

text: using his family 's old mob connections , tony has mapped out every detail for a very special evening .
translation: En utilisant les anciennes connexions de sa famille avec la mafia, Tony a planifié chaque détail pour une soirée très spéciale.
back_translation: Using his family's old connections with the mafia, Tony planned every detail for a very special evening.

text: although no pastry is violated , this nasty comedy pokes fun at the same easy targets as other rowdy raunch-fests -- farts , boobs , unmentionables -- without much success .
translation: Bien qu'aucune pâtisserie ne soit violée, cette comédie crasseuse se moque des mêmes cibles faciles que d'autres comédies désinhibées : les pets, les seins, les intouchables - sans beaucoup de succès.
back_translation: Although no pastry is violated, this crude comedy mocks the same easy targets as other uninhibited comedies: farts, breasts, the untouchables - without much success.

text: it is only natural for `` the shu `` to flourish under the care of corrupt and powerful men like battista .
translation: Il est tout à fait naturel que « le shu » prospère sous le soin d'hommes corrompus et puissants comme Battista.
back_translation: It is entirely natural that "the shu" thrives under the care of corrupt and powerful men like Battista.

text: she trails the couch through a quirky landscape populated by hasidim in brooklyn , holocaust survivors and ex-communists in hungary , and , finally , the next generation of formerly-hasidic jews on the margins of their communities in new york and israel .
translation: elle suit le canapé à travers un paysage singulier peuplé de hassidim à Brooklyn, de survivants de l'Holocauste et d'anciens communistes en Hongrie, et enfin de la prochaine génération de juifs anciens hassidiques en marge de leurs communautés à New York et en Israël.
back_translation: She follows the couch through a unique landscape populated by Hasidim in Brooklyn, Holocaust survivors, and former communists in Hungary, and finally the next generation of ancient Hasidic Jews on the margins of their communities in New York and Israel.

text: in cinemania , hollywood 's biggest fans become the true stars .
translation: Dans Cinemania, les plus grands fans d'Hollywood deviennent les véritables stars.
back_translation: In Cinemania, the biggest Hollywood fans become the true stars.

text: through his addiction to these ardent visions , he becomes more reclusive .
translation: à travers son addiction à ces visions ardentes, il devient plus reclus.
back_translation: Through his addiction to these fiery visions, he becomes more reclusive.

text: . . . best seen as speculative history , as much an exploration of the paranoid impulse as a creative sequel to the warren report .
translation: . . . mieux perçu comme une histoire spéculative, autant une exploration de l'impulsion paranoïaque qu'une suite créative au rapport Warren.
back_translation: ... better perceived as a speculative story, as much an exploration of paranoid impulse as a creative sequel to the Warren report.

text: in building a home-made bomb and setting off a plan that fails miserably , her status changes from young widow to that of a criminal in custody .
translation: en construisant une bombe artisanale et en mettant en œuvre un plan qui échoue misérablement, son statut change de jeune veuve à celui de criminelle en détention.
back_translation: By building a homemade bomb and implementing a plan that fails miserably, her status changes from young widow to criminal in custody.

text: searching for validity , recognition , and truth , he befriends a quirky computer genius and a kickboxing goddess , who all help one another realize what they have been missing from their lives .
translation: à la recherche de validité, de reconnaissance et de vérité, il se lie d'amitié avec un génie de l'informatique excentrique et une déesse du kickboxing, qui s'entraident à réaliser ce qui leur a manqué dans leur vie.
back_translation: In search of validity, recognition, and truth, he befriends an eccentric computer genius and a kickboxing goddess, who help each other achieve what they have missed in their lives.

text: set in an american town in the rocky mountains in the 1930s .
translation: situé dans une ville américaine dans les montagnes Rocheuses dans les années 1930.
back_translation: set in an American city in the Rocky Mountains in the 1930s.

text: when a humans camp is attacked by tigers , a woman takes her baby and jumps on a river .
translation: Lorsque le camp de humains est attaqué par des tigres, une femme prend son bébé et saute dans une rivière.
back_translation: When the humans' camp is attacked by tigers, a woman takes her baby and jumps into a river.

text: mother and daughter hide in the `` panic room , `` a secret room designed for just such a purpose , but still end up fighting for their lives . . .
translation: mère et fille se cachent dans la « chambre de panique », une pièce secrète conçue à cet effet, mais finissent tout de même par se battre pour leur vie . . .
back_translation: Mother and daughter hide in the "panic room," a secret room designed for this purpose, but ultimately end up fighting for their lives...

text: unless you 're a fanatic , the best advice is : 'scooby ' do n't .
translation: À moins que vous ne soyez un fanatique, le meilleur conseil est : 'Scooby' ne le fait pas.
back_translation: Unless you are a fanatic, the best advice is: 'Scooby' doesn't do it.

text: it takes a strange kind of laziness to waste the talents of robert forster , anne meara , eugene levy , and reginald veljohnson all in the same movie .
translation: Il faut une étrange paresse pour gâcher les talents de Robert Forster, Anne Meara, Eugene Levy et Reginald VelJohnson tous dans le même film.
back_translation: It requires a strange laziness to waste the talents of Robert Forster, Anne Meara, Eugene Levy, and Reginald VelJohnson all in the same film.

text: french director helene angel 's dark but deftly handled fable about familial violence has a terrifying , fairy-tale atmosphere that 's in perfect keeping with its unique point of view .
translation: La réalisatrice française Hélène Angel propose une fable sombre mais habilement traitée sur la violence familiale, qui possède une atmosphère terrifiante de conte de fées, parfaitement en accord avec son point de vue unique.
back_translation: French director Hélène Angel presents a dark yet skillfully handled fable about domestic violence, which has a terrifying fairy tale atmosphere, perfectly in line with her unique perspective.

text: rainone 's love affair with singing sensation kelly mcguire whom he discovered and his near demise by the hands of his own prot & # 233 ; g & # 233 ; vincent riccola is the juice that fuels this roller coaster ride through two debauchery-filled decades of greed , sex , drugs and rock and roll .
translation: L'histoire d'amour de Rainone avec la sensation musicale Kelly McGuire, qu'il a découverte, et sa quasi-démise aux mains de son propre protégé, Vincent Riccola, est le sel qui alimente ce tourbillon à travers deux décennies remplies de débauche, de cupidité, de sexe, de drogues et de rock and roll.
back_translation: The love story of Rainone with the musical sensation Kelly McGuire, whom he discovered, and his near downfall at the hands of his own protégé, Vincent Riccola, is the salt that fuels this whirlwind through two decades filled with debauchery, greed, sex, drugs, and rock and roll.

text: he holds her prisoner while awaiting the surgery , but she escapes and hides out until she raises enough money to flee to the u . s . when she arrives in new york , she is placed in a detention center .

back_translation: He keeps her captive while waiting for the surgery, but she escapes and hides until she gathers enough money to flee to the United States. When she arrives in New York, she is placed in a detention center.

text: a big time drug dealer victor rosa ( john leguizamo ) is looking to get out of the game and sees his chance with a big deal with a new friend who happens to be a wall st . stockbroker .

text: clashing their swords in fiece mortal combat , will and jack attempt to recapture the black pearl ship , save the british navy , and relinquish a fortune in forbidden treasure thereby lifting the curse of the pirates of the caribbean .
translation: S'affrontant avec leurs épées dans un combat mortel féroce, Will et Jack tentent de reprendre le navire Black Pearl, de sauver la marine britannique et de renoncer à une fortune en trésors interdits, levant ainsi la malédiction des pirates des Caraïbes.
back_translation: Facing off with their swords in a fierce mortal combat, Will and Jack attempt to reclaim the Black Pearl, save the British Navy, and forgo a fortune in forbidden treasures, thus lifting the curse of the Caribbean pirates.

text: besides being performers , they are also political activists - in aids awareness , anti-gay violence , the sex workers movement and the struggle against the extreme right and racism .

back_translation: In addition to being artists, they are also political activists - raising awareness about AIDS, against anti-gay violence, for the sex worker movement, and in the fight against the far right and racism.

back_translation: The film follows three storylines: the slow recruitment of Bennie by Banks, the preparation for the assassination at an upscale resort in Mexico, and the close pursuit of Banks by the FBI, which hopes to capture him alive in the hope that he will testify against his bosses.

text: after an attempt is made on his life by unknown gunmen , whom he kills them all using martal arts skills he did n't know he had , he learns that all of his dreams of a past life are real and that for the past three years he was raised by the couple after finding him in a river , half-dead with five bullet wounds in him .
translation: Après une tentative d'assassinat par des tireurs inconnus, qu'il tue tous en utilisant des compétences en arts martiaux qu'il ne savait pas avoir, il découvre que tous ses rêves d'une vie antérieure sont réels et que, pendant les trois dernières années, il a été élevé par un couple après l'avoir trouvé dans une rivière, à moitié mort avec cinq balles dans le corps.
back_translation: After an assassination attempt by unknown shooters, which he kills all using martial arts skills he didn't know he had, he discovers that all his dreams of a past life are real and that, for the last three years, he has been raised by a couple who found him in a river, halfway dead with five bullets in his body.

text: the eccentric stories of a free spirited couple , the husband 's brother , a basket ball game , a bookie named dutch , two sinister , corrupt twins conniving over a faberge ' egg for their wife 's anniversary , a business is business hit-man , and an ex-con that has nothing to do with this story .
translation: les histoires excentriques d’un couple libre d’esprit, le frère du mari, un match de basketball, un bookmaker nommé Dutch, deux jumeaux sinistres et corrompus complotant pour un œuf Fabergé à l’occasion de l’anniversaire de leur femme, un homme de main professionnel et un ancien détenu qui n’a rien à voir avec cette histoire.
back_translation: the eccentric stories of an open-minded couple, the husband's brother, a basketball game, a bookmaker named Dutch, two sinister and corrupt twins plotting for a Fabergé egg on the occasion of their wife's birthday, a professional henchman, and an ex-convict who has nothing to do with this story.

text: hilarious musical comedy though stymied by accents thick as mud .
translation: une comédie musicale hilarante bien que freinée par des accents épais comme de la boue.

text: he pays the price for his sleepless night , however , the next morning when his father awakens him into a whole nude world .
translation: il paie le prix de sa nuit blanche, cependant, le lendemain matin, lorsque son père le réveille dans un monde entièrement nu.
back_translation: He pays the price for his sleepless night, however, the next morning, when his father wakes him up in a completely bare world.

text: the true story about robyn davidson who tamed four wild camels and with her dog , trekked from alice springs to the indian ocean , a trip no-one had ever made .
translation: l'histoire vraie de Robyn Davidson qui a dompté quatre chameaux sauvages et, avec son chien, a parcouru le chemin d'Alice Springs à l'océan Indien, un voyage que personne n'avait jamais réalisé.
back_translation: The true story of Robyn Davidson who tamed four wild camels and, with her dog, traveled the path from Alice Springs to the Indian Ocean, a journey that no one had ever completed.

text: this is the final straw for roxie , and her constant anger at rejection explodes .

text: the sentimental script has problems , but the actors pick up the slack .

text: most of the storylines feel like time fillers between surf shots . the movie is n't horrible , but you can see mediocre cresting on the next wave .

text: the `` actress `` becomes an overnight sensation , with a major singing career as well , and everyone thinks she 's a real person .

text: the aftermath of a high school shooting leaves deanna cartwright ( erika christensen ) seriously wounded and nine others dead , including the perpetrator .
translation: Les conséquences d'une fusillade dans un lycée laissent Deanna Cartwright (Erika Christensen) gravement blessée et neuf autres morts, y compris le coupable.
back_translation: The consequences of a shooting at a high school leave Deanna Cartwright (Erika Christensen) severely injured and nine others dead, including the perpetrator.

text: he and his girlfriend , a terrorist seeking to change how the poor are treated in korea , kidnap his former boss 's daughter .

text: sean bateman ( james van der beek ) is the younger brother of psychotic wall street broker patrick bateman .
translation: Sean Bateman (James Van Der Beek) est le frère cadet du courtier psychotique de Wall Street, Patrick Bateman.

text: writer/director walter hill is in his hypermasculine element here , once again able to inject some real vitality and even art into a pulpy concept that , in many other hands would be completely forgettable .
translation: Le scénariste/réalisateur Walter Hill est ici dans son élément hypermasculin, parvenant une fois de plus à insuffler une véritable vitalité et même de l'art dans un concept pulp qui, entre d'autres mains, serait complètement oubliable.
back_translation: Screenwriter/director Walter Hill is here in his hypermasculine element, once again managing to infuse real vitality and even art into a pulp concept that, in other hands, would be completely forgettable.

text: she becomes part of anita 's world , but events do not run smoothly .

text: although sensitive to a fault , it 's often overwritten , with a surfeit of weighty revelations , flowery dialogue , and nostalgia for the past and roads not taken .
translation: bien que sensible à un défaut, il est souvent surchargé, avec un excès de révélations lourdes, de dialogues fleuris et de nostalgie pour le passé et les chemins non empruntés.
back_translation: Although sensitive to a flaw, it is often overloaded, with an excess of heavy revelations, flowery dialogues, and nostalgia for the past and untraveled paths.

text: at times a bit melodramatic and even a little dated ( depending upon where you live ) , ignorant fairies is still quite good-natured and not a bad way to spend an hour or two .
translation: Par moments un peu mélodramatique et même un peu daté (selon l'endroit où vous vivez), Ignorant fairies est tout de même de bonne nature et constitue un moyen pas trop mauvais de passer une heure ou deux.
back_translation: At times a bit melodramatic and even somewhat dated (depending on where you live), Ignorant Fairies is nonetheless good-natured and serves as a not too bad way to spend an hour or two.

text: full of unforgiving irony and quiet realism , a song for martin stands as a powerful and moving achievement .

back_translation: Full of relentless irony and silent realism, "A Song for Martin" stands as a powerful and touching achievement.

text: this romantic thriller is steeped in the atmosphere of wartime england , and ably captures the speech patterns , moral codes and ideals of the 1940s .

text: a macabre and very stylized swedish fillm about a modern city where all the religious and civic virtues that hold society in place are in tatters .

text: waydowntown may not be an important movie , or even a good one , but it provides a nice change of mindless pace in collision with the hot oscar season currently underway .

text: a belgian gem on the twilight existence of four sisters of a certain age drawn together reluctantly by the need to care for one of their number .

text: jedi knights obi-wan kenobi and anakin skywalker discover there is more than meets the eye behind an assassination attempt on naboo senator padm & # 233 ; amidala 's life .

text: the cooler is bernie lootz ( william h . macy ) , and the cooler is a love story about the changing fortunes of this down-at-heels loser who has made a career out of spreading his virulent bad luck on the floor of las vegas ' aging shangri-la casino .
translation: Le Cooler est Bernie Lootz (William H. Macy), et Le Cooler est une histoire d'amour sur la chance changeante de ce perdant dans le besoin qui a fait carrière en répandant sa malchance virulente sur le sol du vieil casino Shangri-La de Las Vegas.
back_translation: The Cooler is Bernie Lootz (William H. Macy), and The Cooler is a love story about the changing luck of this desperate loser who has made a career out of spreading his virulent bad luck on the floor of the old Shangri-La casino in Las Vegas.

text: the master rescues melinda ( jennie dallery ) , a gang-banger on the run ; blake ( jeff sauber ) , a failed young artist ; and ariel ( shannon morris ) , teen hooker ; and brings them to his shelter along with other social rejects .
translation: le maître sauve melinda (jennie dallery), une membre de gang en fuite ; blake (jeff sauber), un jeune artiste raté ; et ariel (shannon morris), une adolescente prostituée ; et les amène dans son abri avec d'autres exclus sociaux.
back_translation: The master saves Melinda (Jennie Dallery), a runaway gang member; Blake (Jeff Sauber), a failed young artist; and Ariel (Shannon Morris), a teenage prostitute; and brings them to his shelter with other social outcasts.

back_translation: The day a young photographer moves in to live with his girlfriend, he meets the beautiful girl who is moving in and falls in love with her at first sight.

text: a mix of gritty realism , crisp storytelling and radiant compassion that effortlessly draws you in .

text: heart problems force boston cop pally lamarr to retire ; he 's in a funk and his wife charlotte sends him packing .
translation: Des problèmes cardiaques obligent le policier de Boston Pally Lamarr à prendre sa retraite ; il est déprimé et sa femme Charlotte le met à la porte.
back_translation: Heart problems force Boston police officer Pally Lamarr to retire; he is depressed and his wife Charlotte kicks him out.

text: if you 're like me , a sucker for a good old fashion romance and someone who shamelessly loves to eat , then mostly martha offers all the perfect ingredients to more than satisfy your appetite .
translation: Si vous êtes comme moi, un amoureux d'une bonne vieille romance et quelqu'un qui aime sans vergogne manger, alors Mostly Martha offre tous les ingrédients parfaits pour satisfaire plus que votre appétit.
back_translation: If you're like me, a lover of good old-fashioned romance and someone who unabashedly enjoys eating, then Mostly Martha offers all the perfect ingredients to satisfy more than just your appetite.

text: jesse custer , a texas preacher , is imbued by the power of an entity called genesis , part angel and part demon , who give him the power of the word , the ability to make anybody do anything he says .
translation: Jesse Custer, un prédicateur du Texas, est imprégné par le pouvoir d'une entité appelée Genesis, à la fois ange et démon, qui lui confère le pouvoir de la parole, la capacité de faire faire à quiconque ce qu'il veut.
back_translation: Jesse Custer, a preacher from Texas, is imbued with the power of an entity called Genesis, both angel and demon, which grants him the power of speech, the ability to make anyone do what he wants.

text: fails in making this character understandable , in getting under her skin , in exploring motivation . . . well before the end , the film grows as dull as its characters , about whose fate it is hard to care .

text: this may not have the dramatic gut-wrenching impact of other holocaust films , but it 's a compelling story , mainly because of the way it 's told by the people who were there .
translation: cela peut ne pas avoir l'impact dramatique déchirant d'autres films sur l'holocauste, mais c'est une histoire captivante, principalement en raison de la façon dont elle est racontée par les personnes qui étaient présentes.

back_translation: It is one of the last true high-security penitentiary farms in the country.

text: there are few things more frustrating to a film buff than seeing an otherwise good movie marred beyond redemption by a disastrous ending .
translation: Il y a peu de choses plus frustrantes pour un cinéphile que de voir un bon film par ailleurs gâché de manière irrémédiable par une fin désastreuse.
back_translation: There are few things more frustrating for a film lover than watching a good film otherwise ruined irreparably by a disastrous ending.

text: forced to exist between living and dead , and only revealing their skeleton forms in the moonlight , the pirates intend to use elizabeth 's blood and necklace ( a part of their curse ) to return to their normal state .
translation: forcés d'exister entre les vivants et les morts, et ne révélant leurs formes squelettiques qu'à la lumière de la lune, les pirates ont l'intention d'utiliser le sang et le collier d'Élisabeth (une partie de leur malédiction) pour retrouver leur état normal.
back_translation: Forced to exist between the living and the dead, and revealing their skeletal forms only in the moonlight, the pirates intend to use Elizabeth's blood and necklace (a part of their curse) to regain their normal state.

text: this is a fudged opportunity of gigantic proportions -- a lunar mission with no signs of life .
translation: c'est une opportunité faussée de proportions gigantesques -- une mission lunaire sans signe de vie.
back_translation: It's a distorted opportunity of gigantic proportions -- a lunar mission without signs of life.

text: the subject of this documentary is private life in the big city , apartments as a last stronghold of individuality , in addition to emphasizing the fact that to live together in one and the same place does not ensure that a community will be formed .
translation: Le sujet de ce documentaire est la vie privée dans la grande ville, les appartements comme dernier bastion de l'individualité, en plus de souligner le fait que vivre ensemble au même endroit ne garantit pas qu'une communauté se formera.
back_translation: The subject of this documentary is privacy in the big city, apartments as the last bastion of individuality, while also highlighting the fact that living together in the same place does not guarantee that a community will form.

text: a sexy , surprising romance . . . idemoto and kim make a gorgeous pair . . . their scenes brim with sexual possibility and emotional danger .
translation: une romance sexy et surprenante . . . idemoto et kim forment un duo magnifique . . . leurs scènes débordent de possibilités sexuelles et de danger émotionnel.
back_translation: a sexy and surprising romance . . . Idemoto and Kim make a magnificent duo . . . their scenes overflow with sexual possibilities and emotional danger.

text: sorvino makes the princess seem smug and cartoonish , and the film only really comes alive when poor hermocrates and leontine pathetically compare notes about their budding amours .
translation: sorvino rend la princesse arrogante et caricaturale, et le film ne prend vraiment vie que lorsque le pauvre hermocrates et léontine comparent patétiquement leurs notes sur leurs amours naissantes.
back_translation: Sorvino makes the princess arrogant and caricatural, and the film only truly comes to life when the poor Hermocrates and Léontine pathetically compare their notes on their budding romances.

text: perhaps it 's cliche to call the film 'refreshing , ' but it is . 'drumline ' shows a level of young , black manhood that is funny , touching , smart and complicated .
translation: Peut-être que c'est un cliché de qualifier le film de "rafraîchissant", mais c'est le cas. "Drumline" montre un niveau de jeunesse, de virilité noire qui est drôle, touchant, intelligent et complexe.
back_translation: It may be a cliché to describe the film as "refreshing," but it is. "Drumline" showcases a level of youth, black masculinity that is funny, touching, smart, and complex.

text: the women clash as plans go awry , tragedy strikes , and hearts get broken .
translation: les femmes s'affrontent alors que les plans déraillent, la tragédie frappe et les cœurs se brisent.
back_translation: Women clash as plans go awry, tragedy strikes, and hearts break.

text: it 's one of those baseball pictures where the hero is stoic , the wife is patient , the kids are as cute as all get-out and the odds against success are long enough to intimidate , but short enough to make a dream seem possible .
translation: C'est l'une de ces images de baseball où le héros est stoïque, la femme est patiente, les enfants sont adorables et les chances de succès sont suffisamment longues pour intimider, mais assez courtes pour faire sembler un rêve possible.
back_translation: It's one of those baseball images where the hero is stoic, the woman is patient, the children are adorable, and the odds of success are long enough to be intimidating, but short enough to make it seem like a possible dream.

text: the story has some nice twists but the ending and some of the back-story is a little tired . the performances are all solid ; it merely lacks originality to make it a great movie .
translation: L'histoire a quelques jolis rebondissements, mais la fin et une partie de l'histoire sont un peu fatiguées. Les performances sont toutes solides ; il lui manque simplement de l'originalité pour en faire un grand film.
back_translation: The story has some nice twists, but the ending and part of the story are a bit tired. The performances are all solid; it simply lacks originality to make it a great film.

text: ahas , son from a poor family , in his inner struggles , joins the troop of his classmates and heads for the front .
translation: Ahas, fils d'une famille pauvre, dans ses luttes intérieures, rejoint la troupe de ses camarades de classe et se dirige vers le front.
back_translation: Ahas, son of a poor family, in his inner struggles, joins his classmates and heads to the front.

text: the 70-year-old godard has become , to judge from in praise of love , the sort of bitter old crank who sits behind his light meter and harangues the supposed injustices of the artistic world-at-large without doing all that much to correct them .
translation: Le cinéaste de 70 ans, Godard, est devenu, à en juger par In Praise of Love, le genre de vieux râleur amer qui s'assoit derrière son posemètre et harangue les supposées injustices du monde artistique en général sans vraiment faire grand-chose pour les corriger.
back_translation: The 70-year-old filmmaker, Godard, has become, judging by In Praise of Love, the kind of bitter old grumbler who sits behind his light meter and harangues the supposed injustices of the artistic world in general without really doing much to correct them.

text: the pianist [ is ] a supremely hopeful cautionary tale of war 's madness remembered that we , today , can prevent its tragic waste of life . here is a divine monument to a single man 's struggle to regain his life , his dignity and his music .
translation: Le pianiste est un récit d'avertissement suprêmement plein d'espoir sur la folie de la guerre, rappelant que nous, aujourd'hui, pouvons prévenir son tragique gaspillage de vies. Voici un monument divin à la lutte d'un seul homme pour retrouver sa vie, sa dignité et sa musique.
back_translation: The Pianist is a supremely hopeful cautionary tale about the madness of war, reminding us that we, today, can prevent its tragic waste of lives. Here is a divine monument to one man's struggle to regain his life, his dignity, and his music.

text: a cold-hearted judge finds out when a seemingly crazy young couple break into his house and take him captive .
translation: Un juge au cœur froid découvre cela lorsqu'un jeune couple apparemment fou fait irruption chez lui et le prend en otage.
back_translation: A cold-hearted judge discovers this when a seemingly crazy young couple bursts into his home and takes him hostage.

text: i ca n't remember the last time i saw a movie where i wanted so badly for the protagonist to fail .
translation: Je ne me souviens pas de la dernière fois que j'ai vu un film où je souhaitais tellement que le protagoniste échoue.
back_translation: I don't remember the last time I saw a movie where I so desperately wanted the protagonist to fail.

text: as a technical exercise that redefines moviemaking , it is astonishing .
translation: en tant qu'exercice technique qui redéfinit le cinéma, c'est incroyable.
back_translation: as a technical exercise that redefines cinema, it's amazing.

text: eul-boon kim 's soulful portrayal of the illiterate , deaf-mute grandmother illuminates the dignity of her demeanor and the sad resignation in her eyes .
translation: La représentation pleine d'âme de la grand-mère illettrée, sourde et muette par Eul-boon Kim illumine la dignité de son comportement et la triste résignation dans ses yeux.
back_translation: The soulful portrayal of the illiterate grandmother, deaf and mute, by Eul-boon Kim illuminates the dignity of her behavior and the sad resignation in her eyes.

text: there is one surefire way to get a nomination for a best-foreign-film oscar : make a movie about whimsical folk who learn a nonchallenging , life-affirming lesson while walking around a foreign city with stunning architecture .
translation: il existe une méthode infaillible pour obtenir une nomination aux oscars du meilleur film étranger : réaliser un film sur des gens fantasques qui apprennent une leçon simple et positive en se promenant dans une ville étrangère avec une architecture époustouflante.
back_translation: There is a foolproof method to get a nomination for the Oscar for Best Foreign Film: make a film about quirky people who learn a simple and positive lesson while strolling through a foreign city with breathtaking architecture.

text: also , anthony is black and victoria is white , which does n't sit well with michael , anthony 's best friend since childhood and a surrogate older brother .
translation: De plus, Anthony est noir et Victoria est blanche, ce qui ne convient pas à Michael, le meilleur ami d'Anthony depuis l'enfance et un frère aîné de substitution.
back_translation: Moreover, Anthony is Black and Victoria is white, which does not sit well with Michael, Anthony's best friend since childhood and a substitute older brother.

text: a mix of velocity and idiocy , this ruinous remake lacks the brawn -- and the brains -- of the 1970s original .
translation: un mélange de vitesse et d'idiotie, ce remake ruineux manque de force - et de cerveau - par rapport à l'original des années 1970.
back_translation: A mix of speed and idiocy, this ruinous remake lacks strength - and brains - compared to the original from the 1970s.

text: a young rebell oversteps the boarder between stage and life on the trail of francois villon .
translation: un jeune rebelle dépasse la frontière entre la scène et la vie sur les traces de François Villon.
back_translation: A young rebel crosses the border between the stage and life, following in the footsteps of François Villon.

text: events go from tragic to dangerous as racism , paranoia , and a secret mistress come into play .
translation: Les événements passent du tragique au dangereux alors que le racisme, la paranoïa et une maîtresse secrète entrent en jeu.
back_translation: Events shift from tragic to dangerous as racism, paranoia, and a secret mistress come into play.

text: yet , beneath an upbeat appearance , she is struggling desperately with the emotional and physical scars left by the attack .
translation: pourtant, derrière une apparence joyeuse, elle lutte désespérément contre les cicatrices émotionnelles et physiques laissées par l'attaque.
back_translation: yet, behind a cheerful appearance, she is desperately battling the emotional and physical scars left by the attack.

text: each of the five patients realise their dreams individually , but ultimately they decide to choose for each other and the familiarity of their own place .
translation: Chacun des cinq patients réalise ses rêves individuellement, mais finalement, ils décident de choisir les uns pour les autres et la familiarité de leur propre lieu.
back_translation: Each of the five patients realizes their dreams individually, but ultimately, they decide to choose for one another and the familiarity of their own place.

text: from naboo to tatooine , it grows into love for her .
translation: De Naboo à Tatooine, cela se transforme en amour pour elle.
back_translation: From Naboo to Tatooine, it turns into love for her.

text: he is to build the palace and be covered in gold , if not , his fate is to be eaten by crocodiles .
translation: il doit construire le palais et être couvert d'or, sinon son destin est d'être mangé par des crocodiles.
back_translation: He must build the palace and be covered in gold, otherwise his fate is to be eaten by crocodiles.

text: if this is the danish idea of a good time , prospective tourists might want to consider a different destination -- some jolly country embroiled in a bloody civil war , perhaps .
translation: Si c'est l'idée danoise d'un bon moment, les touristes potentiels pourraient envisager une autre destination - peut-être un pays joyeux embourbé dans une guerre civile sanglante.
back_translation: If this is the Danish idea of a good time, potential tourists might consider another destination - perhaps a cheerful country mired in a bloody civil war.

text: that storytelling has value can not be denied . not even solondz 's thirst for controversy , sketchy characters and immature provocations can fully succeed at cheapening it .
translation: La valeur de la narration ne peut être niée. Même la soif de controverse de Solondz, ses personnages douteux et ses provocations immatures ne peuvent pas vraiment réussir à la dévaloriser.
back_translation: The value of storytelling cannot be denied. Even Solondz's thirst for controversy, his doubtful characters, and his immature provocations cannot really succeed in devaluing it.

text: the kind of movie that seduces you into becoming putty in its manipulative card-sharking hands and making you enjoy being taken in by its shameless contrivance .
translation: le genre de film qui vous séduit pour vous transformer en pâte dans ses mains manipulatrices de tricheur et vous fait apprécier d'être pris dans son artifice éhonté.
back_translation: the kind of film that seduces you to turn you into putty in its manipulative hands of a trickster and makes you enjoy being caught in its shameless artifice.

text: when a cia agent is killed during a nuclear arms purchase , his partner oakes ( anthony hopkins ) , recruits his twin brother , jake hayes ( chris rock ) .
translation: Lorsqu'un agent de la CIA est tué lors d'un achat d'armes nucléaires, son partenaire Oakes (Anthony Hopkins) recrute son frère jumeau, Jake Hayes (Chris Rock).
back_translation: When a CIA agent is killed during a nuclear arms deal, his partner Oakes (Anthony Hopkins) recruits his twin brother, Jake Hayes (Chris Rock).

text: . . . plays like somebody spliced random moments of a chris rock routine into what is otherwise a cliche-riddled but self-serious spy thriller .
translation: . . . joue comme si quelqu'un avait entrecroisé des moments aléatoires d'un numéro de Chris Rock dans ce qui est par ailleurs un thriller d'espionnage ennuyeux mais empreint de sérieux, rempli de clichés.
back_translation: ... plays as if someone had interwoven random moments from a Chris Rock routine into what is otherwise a dull but serious espionage thriller, filled with clichés.

text: christians sensitive to a reductionist view of their lord as a luv-spreading dr . feelgood or omnipotent slacker will feel vastly more affronted than secularists , who might even praise god for delivering such an instant camp classic .
translation: Les chrétiens sensibles à une vision réductrice de leur seigneur comme un propagateur d'amour ou un paresseux omnipotent se sentiront énormément plus offusqués que les laïques, qui pourraient même rendre grâce à Dieu pour avoir livré un tel classique de camp instantané.
back_translation: Christians sensitive to a reductionist view of their lord as a propagator of love or an omnipotent sloth will feel immensely more offended than secular people, who might even thank God for delivering such a classic of instant camp.

text: drank water from a spring that was actually a fountain of youth .
translation: a bu de l'eau d'une source qui était en réalité une fontaine de jouvence.

text: the truth is that the truth about charlie gets increasingly tiresome .
translation: la vérité est que la vérité sur Charlie devient de plus en plus fatigante.
back_translation: The truth is that the truth about Charlie is becoming more and more exhausting.

text: however , she got more than what she bargained for when she realised she could even see ghosts .
translation: Cependant, elle a eu plus que ce à quoi elle s'attendait quand elle a réalisé qu'elle pouvait même voir des fantômes.
back_translation: However, she had more than she expected when she realized that she could even see ghosts.

text: the trials of henry kissinger is a remarkable piece of filmmaking M-^E because you get it .
translation: Les épreuves de Henry Kissinger est un film remarquable parce que vous le comprenez.
back_translation: The Trials of Henry Kissinger is a remarkable film because you understand it.

text: pacino , connery , de nero , schwarzenegger - together on film - for the first time . . .
translation: Pacino, Connery, De Niro, Schwarzenegger - ensemble au cinéma - pour la première fois...
back_translation: Pacino, Connery, De Niro, Schwarzenegger - together in cinema - for the first time...

text: . . . begins on a high note and sustains it beautifully .
translation: ... commence sur une note élevée et la maintient magnifiquement.
