translation: c'est un voyage qui mènera à la fois Carol et Charlie au bord de la réalité et obligera Carol à faire face à son destin terrifiant.
back_translation: It is a journey that will take both Carol and Charlie to the edge of reality and force Carol to confront her terrifying fate.

text: a twisted collision of `` barney `` `` the fisher king `` and `` serpico . ``
translation: une collision tordue de `` barney `` `` le roi pêcheur `` et `` serpico . ``
back_translation: a twisted collision of "barney" "the fisher king" and "serpico."

text: with films like 'mouna ragam ' , 'alaipayuthe ' and now 'kannathil muthamittal ' , maniratnam yet again proves that he is at his best when tackling human emotions and relationships .
translation: Avec des films comme 'Mouna Ragam', 'Alaipayuthe' et maintenant 'Kannathil Muthamittal', Maniratnam prouve une fois de plus qu'il est à son meilleur lorsqu'il s'agit d'aborder les émotions humaines et les relations.
back_translation: With films like 'Mouna Ragam', 'Alaipayuthe' and now 'Kannathil Muthamittal', Maniratnam proves once again that he is at his best when it comes to addressing human emotions and relationships.

text: what a pity . . . that the material is so second-rate .
translation: quel dommage . . . que le matériel soit si de seconde zone .
back_translation: What a pity... that the equipment is so second-rate.

text: she is a very sweet girl , and they get along quite well with her .
translation: c'est une fille très gentille, et ils s'entendent assez bien avec elle.
back_translation: She is a very nice girl, and they get along quite well with her.

text: annie , an alluring lady , catches the eye of old widower leoncio .
translation: Annie, une femme séduisante, attire l'attention du vieux veuf Léoncio.
back_translation: Annie, an attractive woman, catches the attention of the old widower Léoncio.

text: `` sumo east and west `` is a feature documentary about americans in the ancient japanese sport of sumo wrestling .
translation: ``Sumo Est et Ouest`` est un documentaire qui présente des Américains dans le sport ancien japonais du sumo.
back_translation: "Sumo East and West" is a documentary that features Americans in the ancient Japanese sport of sumo.

text: all the pieces in the mystery are finally starting to fit together , and the case seems almost resolved .
translation: Tous les éléments du mystère commencent finalement à s'imbriquer, et l'affaire semble presque résolue.
back_translation: All the elements of the mystery are finally starting to fit together, and the case seems almost solved.

text: this is a story about the warm relationship between a little girl and her father despite the difficult conditions they have to live in .
translation: C'est une histoire sur la relation chaleureuse entre une petite fille et son père malgré les conditions difficiles dans lesquelles ils doivent vivre.
back_translation: It is a story about the warm relationship between a little girl and her father despite the difficult conditions in which they have to live.

text: rather than spreading good cheer , the duo 's motive is to rob each establishment , a strategy that becomes complicated when they encounter an 8-year-old who teaches them the true meaning of christmas .
translation: plutôt que de répandre la bonne humeur, le motif du duo est de cambrioler chaque établissement, une stratégie qui se complique lorsqu'ils rencontrent un enfant de 8 ans qui leur enseigne la véritable signification de Noël.
back_translation: Rather than spreading good cheer, the duo's motive is to rob each establishment, a strategy that becomes complicated when they encounter an 8-year-old child who teaches them the true meaning of Christmas.

text: one thursday evening , their disagreements reach a fever pitch - anna is incensed that her mother does n't support her musical aspirations and tess , a widow about to remarry , ca n't see why anna wo n't give her fiance ( mark harmon ) a break .
translation: Un jeudi soir, leurs désaccords atteignent un point de non-retour - Anna est furieuse que sa mère ne soutienne pas ses aspirations musicales et Tess, une veuve sur le point de se remarier, ne comprend pas pourquoi Anna ne laisse pas une chance à son fiancé (Mark Harmon).
back_translation: One Thursday night, their disagreements reach a point of no return - Anna is furious that her mother does not support her musical aspirations, and Tess, a widow about to remarry, does not understand why Anna does not give her fiancé (Mark Harmon) a chance.

text: as an added twist robert discovers upon meeting wong dai , that the evil man himself has been manipulating our protagonist in order to have him kill wong dai 's own tong members and thus , secure the ill gotten gains of wong dai 's empire of crime for himself .
translation: Comme une tournure supplémentaire, Robert découvre en rencontrant Wong Dai que le maléfique homme lui-même avait manipulé notre protagoniste afin de le pousser à tuer les membres du tong de Wong Dai et ainsi, s'assurer les gains mal acquis de l'empire criminel de Wong Dai pour lui-même.
back_translation: As an additional twist, Robert discovers upon meeting Wong Dai that the evil man himself had manipulated our protagonist in order to drive him to kill the members of Wong Dai's tong and thus secure the ill-gotten gains of Wong Dai's criminal empire for himself.

text: the problem is that the mysterious inhabitants are murderous lunatics out to kill every one of them . . .
translation: le problème est que les habitants mystérieux sont des fous meurtriers décidés à tuer chacun d'entre eux . . .
back_translation: The problem is that the mysterious inhabitants are murderous crazies determined to kill each and every one of them...

text: writer/director dante tomaselli merges two disturbing storylines into this visually arresting chiller .
translation: L'écrivain/réalisateur Dante Tomaselli fusionne deux intrigues dérangeantes dans ce thriller visuellement saisissant.
back_translation: Writer/director Dante Tomaselli merges two disturbing plotlines in this visually striking thriller.

text: a small fortune in salaries and stunt cars might have been saved if the director , tom dey , had spliced together bits and pieces of midnight run and 48 hours ( and , for that matter , shrek ) .
translation: une petite fortune en salaires et voitures de cascade aurait pu être économisée si le directeur, Tom Dey, avait assemblé des morceaux de Midnight Run et 48 heures (et, à vrai dire, Shrek).
back_translation: A small fortune in salaries and stunt cars could have been saved if the director, Tom Dey, had pieced together elements from Midnight Run and 48 Hours (and, to be honest, Shrek).

text: during the heist , the kids overcome high-tech security systems , guard dogs , and a nasty head of security to get to a bank vault suspended 100-feet above ground .
translation: Lors du braquage, les enfants surmontent des systèmes de sécurité de haute technologie, des chiens de garde et un responsable de la sécurité désagréable pour accéder à un coffre-fort bancaire suspendu à 30 mètres du sol.
back_translation: During the heist, the children overcome high-tech security systems, guard dogs, and an unpleasant security manager to access a bank vault suspended 30 meters above the ground.

text: director rob marshall went out gunning to make a great one .
translation: Le réalisateur Rob Marshall s'est donné pour mission de faire un grand film.
back_translation: Director Rob Marshall has set out to make a great film.

text: a 19th century insane asylum is memorialized by a captivating montage of inventories , histories , and brain surgeries .
translation: Un asile d'aliénés du 19ème siècle est commémoré par un montage captivant d'inventaires, d'histoires et de chirurgies cérébrales.
back_translation: A 19th century insane asylum is commemorated by a captivating montage of inventories, stories, and brain surgeries.

text: will anyone who is n't a fangoria subscriber be excited that it has n't gone straight to video ?
translation: Est-ce que quelqu'un qui n'est pas abonné à Fangoria sera excité que cela ne soit pas directement en vidéo ?
back_translation: Will someone who is not subscribed to Fangoria be excited that it is not directly in video?

text: having given permission to male nurse greg focker to marry his daughter , ex-cia man jack byrnes and his wife travel to detroit to greg 's parents , who this time around are mr . and mrs . focker , who are as different from them as can be .
translation: Ayant donné la permission à l'infirmier Greg Focker d'épouser sa fille, l'ancien agent de la CIA Jack Byrnes et sa femme se rendent à Detroit chez les parents de Greg, qui cette fois-ci sont M. et Mme Focker, qui sont aussi différents d'eux que possible.
back_translation: Having given permission to the nurse Greg Focker to marry his daughter, former CIA agent Jack Byrnes and his wife go to Detroit to meet Greg's parents, Mr. and Mrs. Focker, who are as different from them as possible.

text: ray finds himself feeling cursed , trapped , and miserable as a parade of `` injured `` clients constantly pressure him for their money , most of which is not deserved .
translation: Ray se sent maudit, piégé et misérable alors qu'un défilé de clients « blessés » le presse constamment pour leur argent, dont la plupart n'est pas mérité.
back_translation: Ray feels cursed, trapped, and miserable as a parade of "injured" clients constantly pressures him for money, most of which is undeserved.

text: it 's refreshing that someone understands the need for the bad boy ; diesel , with his brawny frame and cool , composed delivery , fits the bill perfectly .
translation: C'est rafraîchissant que quelqu'un comprenne le besoin du mauvais garçon ; Diesel, avec son physique musclé et sa livraison détendue et posée, correspond parfaitement au profil.
back_translation: It's refreshing that someone understands the need for the bad boy; Diesel, with his muscular physique and laid-back delivery, perfectly fits the profile.

text: a top secret military project hires prestigious university students to assist create a cell altering machine called the 'gammasphere ' .
translation: Un projet militaire top secret recrute des étudiants de prestigieuses universités pour les aider à créer une machine modifiant les cellules appelée le 'gammasphère'.
back_translation: A top secret military project is recruiting students from prestigious universities to help them create a cell-modifying machine called the 'gammasphere'.

text: the movie , despite its rough edges and a tendency to sag in certain places , is wry and engrossing .
translation: le film, malgré ses aspects rugueux et une tendance à traîner par moments, est ironique et captivant.
back_translation: The film, despite its rough aspects and a tendency to drag at times, is ironic and captivating.

text: isabelle huppert excels as the enigmatic mika and anna mouglalis is a stunning new young talent in one of chabrol 's most intense psychological mysteries .
translation: Isabelle Huppert excelle dans le rôle énigmatique de Mika et Anna Mouglalis est un talent jeune et éblouissant dans l'un des mystères psychologiques les plus intenses de Chabrol.
back_translation: Isabelle Huppert excels in the enigmatic role of Mika and Anna Mouglalis is a young and dazzling talent in one of Chabrol's most intense psychological mysteries.

text: the movie starts with a legend and ends with a story that is so far-fetched it would be impossible to believe if it were n't true . this is the stuff that disney movies are made of .
translation: le film commence par une légende et se termine par une histoire si invraisemblable qu'il serait impossible de croire si ce n'était pas vrai. c'est la matière des films Disney.
back_translation: The film begins with a legend and ends with a story so unbelievable that it would be impossible to believe if it weren't true. This is the stuff of Disney movies.

text: . . . pays tribute to heroes the way julia roberts hands out awards -- with phony humility barely camouflaging grotesque narcissism .
translation: ... rend hommage aux héros de la manière dont Julia Roberts remet des prix -- avec une fausse humilité à peine camouflant un narcissisme grotesque.
back_translation: ... pays tribute to the heroes in the way that Julia Roberts presents awards -- with a faux humility barely disguising a grotesque narcissism.

text: but slowly , their teenage-son alan ( kristian horn ) got suspicious that henry is n't his father .
translation: mais lentement, leur fils adolescent Alan (Kristian Horn) a commencé à soupçonner que Henry n'est pas son père.
back_translation: But slowly, their teenage son Alan (Kristian Horn) began to suspect that Henry is not his father.

text: in their love for each other and their ability to move on , the women are , in a way , lovely and amazing .
translation: Dans leur amour l'une pour l'autre et leur capacité à aller de l'avant, les femmes sont, d'une certaine manière, adorables et étonnantes.
back_translation: In their love for each other and their ability to move forward, women are, in a way, delightful and amazing.

text: this mild-mannered farce , directed by one of its writers , john c . walsh , is corny in a way that bespeaks an expiration date passed a long time ago .

text: there follow three months of exhausting interrogation and isolation .

text: for once the kids do n't let sam down - and they 're not likely to forget the lessons they 've learned .

text: it has a dashing and resourceful hero ; a lisping , reptilian villain ; big fights ; big hair ; lavish period scenery ; and a story just complicated enough to let you bask in your own cleverness as you figure it out .

text: haris seems to be an all-american guy except that he creates strange installations of hanging ropes , and suffers from terrible visions- of himself as a child in afghanistan in traditional dress , of smoke and bombs , of his dead parents and the russian soldier who shot them during the soviet invasion .
translation: Haris semble être un Américain typique, sauf qu'il crée de drôles d'installations de cordes suspendues et souffre de terribles visions : de lui-même enfant en Afghanistan dans un habit traditionnel, de fumée et de bombes, de ses parents décédés et du soldat russe qui les a abattus pendant l'invasion soviétique.
back_translation: Haris seems to be a typical American, except that he creates funny hanging rope installations and suffers from terrible visions: of himself as a child in Afghanistan in traditional clothing, of smoke and bombs, of his deceased parents, and of the Russian soldier who shot them during the Soviet invasion.

text: . it 's a testament to the film 's considerable charm that it succeeds in entertaining , despite playing out like a feature-length sitcom replete with stereotypical familial quandaries . there 's a sheer unbridled delight in the way the story unfurls . . .

text: these were the first boats to perform deterrent patrols in the history of the navy , and they did it during some of the most crucial moments of the cold war including the 1962 cuban missile crisis .
translation: Ceux-ci étaient les premiers navires à effectuer des patrouilles de dissuasion dans l'histoire de la marine, et ils l'ont fait pendant certains des moments les plus cruciaux de la guerre froide, y compris la crise des missiles cubains de 1962.
back_translation: These were the first ships to conduct deterrent patrols in naval history, and they did so during some of the most critical moments of the Cold War, including the Cuban Missile Crisis of 1962.

text: ong chooses to present ah na 's life as a slight , weightless fairy tale , whose most unpleasant details seem to melt away in the face of the character 's blank-faced optimism .

text: by presenting an impossible romance in an impossible world , pumpkin dares us to say why either is impossible -- which forces us to confront what 's possible and what we might do to make it so .
translation: En présentant une romance impossible dans un monde impossible, Pumpkin nous met au défi de dire pourquoi l'un ou l'autre est impossible, ce qui nous pousse à confronter ce qui est possible et ce que nous pourrions faire pour que cela le devienne.
back_translation: By presenting an impossible romance in an impossible world, Pumpkin challenges us to articulate why either one is impossible, prompting us to confront what is possible and what we could do to make it so.

text: proves that a movie about goodness is not the same thing as a good movie .

back_translation: The change in political leaders raises paranoia among American CIA officials, so the CIA director, Bill Cabot, recruits a young analyst to provide insights and advice on the situation.

text: though excessively tiresome , the uncertainty principle , as verbally pretentious as the title may be , has its handful of redeeming features , as long as you discount its ability to bore .
translation: Bien que excessivement fastidieux, le principe d'incertitude, aussi verbalement prétentieux que puisse être le titre, a quelques caractéristiques rédemptrices, tant que l'on ne tient pas compte de sa capacité à ennuyer.
back_translation: Although excessively tedious, the principle of uncertainty, as verbally pretentious as the title may be, has some redeeming characteristics, as long as one does not take into account its ability to bore.

text: in their late twenties and tired of partying their way around the world , danish marie and irish sophie come ashore in northern scotland .

back_translation: In their twenties and tired of partying around the world, the Danish Marie and the Irish Sophie arrive in northern Scotland.

text: in the burial society , sheldon kasner , an unlikely criminal who works as a bank loan manager , infiltrates the mysterious world of the chevrah kadisha ( the jewish society that prepares bodies for burial according to ancient ritual ) in order to steal a body and fake his own death after mobsters come after him looking for two million dollars that he is accused of having stolen .
translation: Dans la société funéraire, Sheldon Kasner, un criminel improbable travaillant comme gestionnaire de prêts bancaires, s'infiltre dans le monde mystérieux de la chevrah kadisha (la société juive qui prépare les corps pour l'inhumation selon des rituels anciens) afin de voler un corps et de simuler sa propre mort après que des mafieux le poursuivent à la recherche de deux millions de dollars qu'il est accusé d'avoir volés.
back_translation: In the funeral home, Sheldon Kasner, an unlikely criminal working as a bank loan manager, infiltrates the mysterious world of the chevrah kadisha (the Jewish society that prepares bodies for burial according to ancient rituals) in order to steal a corpse and fake his own death after mobsters pursue him in search of two million dollars he is accused of having stolen.

text: jude law plays a leading role as inman , a wounded confederate soldier who is on a perilous journey home to his mountain community , hoping to reunite with his prewar sweetheart , ada , played by nicole kidman .
translation: Jude Law joue un rôle principal en tant qu'Inman, un soldat confédéré blessé qui entreprend un périlleux voyage de retour vers sa communauté montagnarde, espérant retrouver son ancienne petite amie, Ada, interprétée par Nicole Kidman.
back_translation: Jude Law plays a leading role as Inman, a wounded Confederate soldier who undertakes a perilous journey back to his mountain community in hopes of finding his former girlfriend, Ada, played by Nicole Kidman.

translation: Un jeune homme d'une vingtaine d'années découvre que son premier amour se marie, alors il abandonne tout pour traverser la Californie et l'arrêter, sans argent et sans voiture, où il découvre la vie, l'amour et des secrets de son passé.

text: almost nothing else -- raunchy and graphic as it may be in presentation -- is one-sided , outwardly sexist or mean-spirited . and in a sense , that 's a liability .
translation: presque rien d'autre -- aussi osé et graphique soit-il dans sa présentation -- n'est unidimensionnel, ouvertement sexiste ou malveillant. Et en un sens, c'est un inconvénient.

text: the three roommates have proudly scammed their way through the last four years of college and now , during the final exams , these big-men-on-campus are about to be busted by the most unlikely dude in school .
translation: Les trois colocataires ont fièrement escroqué leur chemin pendant les quatre dernières années de l'université et maintenant, pendant les examens finaux, ces gros bonnets du campus sont sur le point d'être démasqués par le type le plus improbable de l'école.

text: all the amped-up tony hawk-style stunts and thrashing rap-metal ca n't disguise the fact that , really , we 've been here , done that .

text: bielinsky 's script is slick and fiendishly clever , with seemingly a twist a minute .

text: an l . a . artist ( mark ruffalo ) with everything seemingly going for him suddenly finds a change in his life when an art curator cancels his upcoming one-man show .

text: [ siegal ] proves that you do n't have to be a just out of film school gen-x'er to make a resonant and entertaining movie about young adults .

text: opens at a funeral , ends on the protagonist 's death bed and does n't get much livelier in the three hours in between .

text: called `` an elegant documentary `` by sundance and `` eloquent and deeply moving `` by the la times , toyo miyatake : infinite shades of gray is a penetrating portrait of this photographer 's search for truth and beauty in a world of impermanence .

back_translation: Described as "an elegant documentary" by Sundance and "eloquent and profoundly moving" by the LA Times, Toyo Miyatake: Infinite Shades of Gray is a penetrating portrait of this photographer's quest for truth and beauty in a world of impermanence.

text: watching trouble every day , at least if you do n't know what 's coming , is like biting into what looks like a juicy , delicious plum on a hot summer day and coming away with your mouth full of rotten pulp and living worms .
translation: regarder des problèmes chaque jour, au moins si vous ne savez pas ce qui s'en vient, c'est comme mordre dans ce qui semble être une prune juteuse et délicieuse par une chaude journée d'été et ressortir avec la bouche pleine de chair pourrie et de vers vivants.
back_translation: Facing problems every day, at least if you don't know what's coming, it's like biting into what appears to be a juicy and delicious plum on a hot summer day, only to come away with your mouth full of rotten flesh and live worms.

text: `` the bride `` was once part of a group of world class female assassins , until the group leader , `` bill `` and the other assassins turn against her .
translation: « La mariée » faisait autrefois partie d'un groupe d'assassines de classe mondiale, jusqu'à ce que le chef du groupe, « Bill », et les autres assassines se retournent contre elle.
back_translation: "The Bride" used to be part of a group of world-class assassins until the leader of the group, "Bill," and the other assassins turned against her.

text: drumline is a movie that treats its characters and audience with respect ; it ca n't be accused of being a dumbed-down teen comedy .
translation: Drumline est un film qui traite ses personnages et son public avec respect ; il ne peut pas être accusé d'être une comédie pour adolescents simpliste.
back_translation: Drumline is a film that treats its characters and its audience with respect; it cannot be accused of being a simplistic teen comedy.

text: there 's lots of cool stuff packed into espn 's ultimate x .
translation: Il y a beaucoup de trucs sympas dans Ultimate X d'ESPN.
back_translation: There are a lot of cool things in ESPN's Ultimate X.

text: the film takes place over the course of a day as anthony , victoria , michael and his wife , sarah , spend the afternoon dining , drinking , and soaking in the hot tub .
translation: Le film se déroule sur une journée alors qu'Anthony, Victoria, Michael et sa femme, Sarah, passent l'après-midi à dîner, boire et se détendre dans le jacuzzi.
back_translation: The film takes place over the course of a day as Anthony, Victoria, Michael, and his wife, Sarah, spend the afternoon dining, drinking, and relaxing in the jacuzzi.

text: in a classic homage to chinese martial arts films , he is involved in intense hand to hand combat including sword fighting , guns , car chases , and other ingenious forms of fighting to mame and kill these tong members .
translation: Dans un hommage classique aux films d'arts martiaux chinois, il est impliqué dans des combats rapprochés intenses, y compris des combats à l'épée, des fusillades, des courses-poursuites en voiture et d'autres formes de combat ingénieuses pour mutiler et tuer ces membres des triades.
back_translation: In a classic tribute to Chinese martial arts films, he is involved in intense close-quarter combat, including sword fights, shootouts, car chases, and other ingenious forms of combat to mutilate and kill these members of the triads.

text: it finds its moviegoing pleasures in the tiny events that could make a person who has lived her life half-asleep suddenly wake up and take notice .
translation: il trouve ses plaisirs cinématographiques dans les petits événements qui pourraient faire en sorte qu'une personne ayant vécu sa vie à moitié endormie se réveille soudainement et prenne conscience.
back_translation: He finds his cinematic pleasures in the small events that might cause a person who has lived their life half asleep to suddenly wake up and become aware.

text: enough to ensure adrien 's family 's future and to give werner one last opportunity to face death head on . . .
translation: suffisamment pour garantir l'avenir de la famille d'Adrien et donner à Werner une dernière chance de faire face à la mort de front . . .
back_translation: sufficiently to ensure the future of Adrien's family and give Werner one last chance to face death head-on...

text: there 's no doubting that this is a highly ambitious and personal project for egoyan , but it 's also one that , next to his best work , feels clumsy and convoluted .
translation: Il ne fait aucun doute que c'est un projet très ambitieux et personnel pour Egoyan, mais c'est aussi un projet qui, par rapport à ses meilleures œuvres, semble maladroit et complexe.
back_translation: There is no doubt that this is a very ambitious and personal project for Egoyan, but it is also a project that, compared to his best works, seems awkward and complex.

text: the saturation bombing of reggio 's images and glass ' evocative music . . . ultimately leaves viewers with the task of divining meaning .
translation: le bombardement de saturation des images de Reggio et la musique évocatrice de Glass... laissent finalement aux spectateurs la tâche de donner un sens.
back_translation: the saturation bombardment of the images of Reggio and the evocative music of Glass... ultimately leave it to the spectators to make sense of it.

text: no worse than a lot of the crap we 've been offered this summer , and slightly better than men in black 2 as far as slapdash extraterrestrial comedies go .
translation: pas pire que beaucoup des bêtises qu'on nous a proposées cet été, et légèrement mieux que Men in Black 2 en ce qui concerne les comédies extraterrestres bâclées.
back_translation: Not worse than many of the nonsense that was offered to us this summer, and slightly better than Men in Black 2 when it comes to shoddy alien comedies.

text: matt was drunk and as he reached for the car radio , he struck the girl as she crossed the road .
translation: Matt était ivre et alors qu'il tendait la main vers la radio de la voiture, il a heurté la fille alors qu'elle traversait la route.
back_translation: Matt was drunk, and as he reached for the car radio, he hit the girl while she was crossing the road.

text: even if you feel like you 've seen this movie a thousand times before , it is kind of enjoyable thanks mainly to belushi 's easy-going likableness .
translation: Même si vous avez l'impression d'avoir vu ce film mille fois auparavant, il est plutôt agréable grâce principalement à la sympathie décontractée de Belushi.
back_translation: Even if you feel like you've seen this movie a thousand times before, it is quite enjoyable mainly due to Belushi's relaxed charm.

text: haris embarks on a journey through the world of afghan-americans to learn more about their culture , and there he finds both humor and tragedy .
translation: Haris se lance dans un voyage à travers le monde des Afghano-Américains pour en apprendre davantage sur leur culture, et là, il découvre à la fois de l'humour et de la tragédie.
back_translation: Haris embarks on a journey through the world of Afghan-Americans to learn more about their culture, and there, he discovers both humor and tragedy.

text: at this far away place he bares his inside .
translation: À cet endroit lointain, il dévoile son intérieur.
back_translation: In that distant place, it reveals its interior.

text: what lee does so marvelously compelling is present brown as a catalyst for the struggle of black manhood in restrictive and chaotic america . . . sketchy but nevertheless gripping portrait of jim brown , a celebrated wonder in the spotlight
translation: Ce que Lee fait de manière tellement merveilleusement convaincante, c'est de présenter Brown comme un catalyseur de la lutte pour la virilité noire dans l'Amérique restrictive et chaotique... un portrait esquissé mais néanmoins saisissant de Jim Brown, une merveille célébrée sous les projecteurs.
back_translation: What Lee does so wonderfully convincingly is to present Brown as a catalyst for the struggle for black masculinity in restrictive and chaotic America... a sketched yet striking portrait of Jim Brown, a marvel celebrated under the spotlight.

text: a close acquaintance overhears their conversation , and , promised a fee , reports the win to max ( david winburn ) , smooth-talking but deadly leader of a hoodlum gang , who sends his beautiful paramour , cindy ( kelly taylor ) , to seduce jose , if necessary , to get her hands on the winning ticket .
translation: Un proche connaissance surprend leur conversation et, moyennant une rémunération, informe Max (David Winburn), le leader de gang charismatique mais redoutable, qui envoie sa belle amante, Cindy (Kelly Taylor), séduire José, si nécessaire, pour mettre la main sur le billet gagnant.
back_translation: A close acquaintance overhears their conversation and, for a fee, informs Max (David Winburn), the charismatic yet fearsome gang leader, who sends his beautiful lover, Cindy (Kelly Taylor), to seduce José, if necessary, to get hold of the winning ticket.

text: enough is not a bad movie , just mediocre . the performances are so overstated , the effect comes off as self-parody .
translation: "Enough" n'est pas un mauvais film, juste moyen. Les performances sont tellement exagérées que l'effet ressemble à de l'auto-parodie.
back_translation: "Enough" is not a bad film, just average. The performances are so exaggerated that the effect feels like self-parody.

text: although estela bravo 's documentary is cloyingly hagiographic in its portrait of cuban leader fidel castro , it 's still a guilty pleasure to watch .
translation: Bien que le documentaire d'Estela Bravo soit d'une hagiographie sucrée dans son portrait du leader cubain Fidel Castro, c'est quand même un plaisir coupable à regarder.
back_translation: Although Estela Bravo's documentary is a sugary hagiography in its portrayal of the Cuban leader Fidel Castro, it is still a guilty pleasure to watch.

text: without resorting to hyperbole , i can state that kissing jessica stein may be the best same-sex romance i have seen .
translation: Sans recourir à l'hyperbole, je peux affirmer que "Kiss Jessica Stein" est peut-être la meilleure romance entre deux femmes que j'ai vue.
back_translation: Without resorting to hyperbole, I can say that "Kiss Jessica Stein" is perhaps the best romance between two women that I have seen.

text: the film has a few cute ideas and several modest chuckles but it is n't exactly kiddie-friendlyM-^E alas , santa is more ho-hum than ho-ho-ho and the snowman ( who never gets to play that flute ) has all the charm of a meltdown .
translation: le film a quelques idées mignonnes et plusieurs rires modestes mais il n'est pas vraiment adapté aux enfants, hélas, le père Noël est plus ennuyant que rigolo et le bonhomme de neige (qui ne joue jamais de cette flûte) a tout le charme d'une crise de nerfs.
back_translation: The film has some cute ideas and several modest laughs, but it is not really suitable for children. Unfortunately, Santa Claus is more boring than funny, and the snowman (who never plays that flute) has all the charm of a nervous breakdown.

text: what begins as a friendly 'extreme ' week long camping trip goes from a warm 'big chill ' into a chilling 'deliverance ' as old wounds unsurface , passions rise and personalities unravel .
translation: Ce qui commence comme une semaine de camping 'extrême' amicale passe d'un 'grand froid' chaleureux à une 'délivrance' glaciale alors que de vieilles blessures refont surface, les passions montent et les personnalités se décomposent.
back_translation: What starts as a friendly 'extreme' camping week shifts from a warm 'deep freeze' to a chilling 'deliverance' as old wounds resurface, passions rise, and personalities break down.

text: but the break turns into a nightmare when sanjana starts hearing screams .
translation: mais la pause se transforme en cauchemar lorsque Sanjana commence à entendre des cris.
back_translation: but the break turns into a nightmare when Sanjana starts hearing screams.

text: little do they know but help is on the way and this friday will get freaky !
translation: Ils ne le savent pas, mais de l'aide arrive et ce vendredi sera fou !
back_translation: They don't know it, but help is on the way and this Friday will be crazy!

text: a charming and funny story of clashing cultures and a clashing mother/daughter relationship .
translation: une histoire charmante et drôle de cultures en confrontation et d'une relation mère/fille conflictuelle.
back_translation: A charming and funny story about clashing cultures and a conflicted mother/daughter relationship.

text: years later , on a hunting trip in the maine woods , they are overtaken by a blizzard , a vicious storm in which something much more ominous moves .
translation: Des années plus tard, lors d'un voyage de chasse dans les forêts du Maine, ils sont rattrapés par une tempête de neige, une tempête vicieuse dans laquelle quelque chose de bien plus sinistre se déplace.
back_translation: Years later, during a hunting trip in the forests of Maine, they are caught in a snowstorm, a fierce storm in which something much more sinister moves.

text: he can not explain her intermittent crying and disturbed reactions .
translation: Il ne peut pas expliquer ses pleurs intermittents et ses réactions perturbées.
back_translation: He cannot explain his intermittent crying and disturbed reactions.

text: the assasins force walter to drive their escape car .
translation: les assassins forcent Walter à conduire leur voiture d'évasion.

text: the characters are so generic and the plot so bland that even as rogue cia assassins working for chris cooper 's agency boss close in on the resourceful amnesiac , we do n't feel much for damon/bourne or his predicament .
translation: les personnages sont si génériques et l'intrigue si banale que même lorsque des assassins renégats de la CIA travaillant pour le patron de l'agence de chris cooper se rapprochent de l'amnésique ingénieux, nous n'éprouvons pas beaucoup de sympathie pour damon/bourne ou sa situation.
back_translation: The characters are so generic and the plot so mundane that even when renegade assassins from the CIA working for Chris Cooper's agency close in on the ingenious amnesiac, we don't feel much sympathy for Damon/Bourne or his situation.

text: now the monk must look for a new scrollkeeper .
translation: maintenant le moine doit chercher un nouveau gardien des rouleaux.

text: purpo $ e is a story about business in the new millenium , and a world shifted away from quality to quantity .
translation: Purpo $ e est une histoire sur les affaires dans le nouveau millénaire, et un monde qui s'est éloigné de la qualité pour se concentrer sur la quantité.
back_translation: Purpo$e is a story about business in the new millennium, and a world that has moved away from quality to focus on quantity.

text: it is not long before the doctor realizes that his underworld patient is in love with his own sister , so he decides to take her to malaysia and get her married off .
translation: Il ne faut pas longtemps au docteur pour réaliser que son patient du monde souterrain est amoureux de sa propre sœur, alors il décide de l'emmener en Malaisie et de la marier.
back_translation: It doesn't take long for the doctor to realize that his patient from the underground world is in love with his own sister, so he decides to take her to Malaysia and marry her.

text: despite all evidence to the contrary , this clunker has somehow managed to pose as an actual feature movie , the kind that charges full admission and gets hyped on tv and purports to amuse small children and ostensible adults .
translation: malgré toutes les preuves du contraire, ce navet a réussi à se faire passer pour un véritable film, celui qui fait payer le plein tarif et est vendu sur les écrans de télévision tout en prétendant divertir les petits enfants et des adultes soi-disant mûrs.
back_translation: Despite all the evidence to the contrary, this dud has managed to pass itself off as a real movie, the kind that charges full price and is sold on television screens while pretending to entertain small children and supposedly mature adults.

text: we 've seen it all before in one form or another , but director hoffman , with great help from kevin kline , makes us care about this latest reincarnation of the world 's greatest teacher .
translation: Nous avons déjà tout vu sous une forme ou une autre, mais le réalisateur Hoffman, avec l'aide précieuse de Kevin Kline, nous fait nous soucier de cette dernière réincarnation du plus grand enseignant du monde.
back_translation: We have already seen it all in one form or another, but director Hoffman, with the invaluable help of Kevin Kline, makes us care about this latest reincarnation of the greatest teacher in the world.

text: along comes sonja , who wants to know how the horny tale he 's now working on will end .
translation: Voici venir Sonja, qui veut savoir comment se terminera l'histoire cochonne sur laquelle il travaille maintenant.

text: this is the story of a deaf mute who is laid off , and his sister , who requires a kidney transplant .
translation: C'est l'histoire d'un sourd-muet qui est licencié, et de sa sœur, qui nécessite une greffe de rein.
back_translation: It is the story of a deaf-mute who is laid off, and his sister, who needs a kidney transplant.

text: frank capra played this story straight . but the 2002 film does n't really believe in it , and breaks the mood with absurdly inappropriate 'comedy ' scenes .
translation: Frank Capra a traité cette histoire au sérieux. Mais le film de 2002 n'y croit pas vraiment et brise l'ambiance avec des scènes de 'comédie' absurdes et inappropriées.
back_translation: Frank Capra treated this story seriously. But the 2002 film doesn't really believe in it and breaks the mood with absurd and inappropriate 'comedy' scenes.

text: change up is a documentary that follows the lives of best friends , rafael `` pepey `` rodriguez , and alex sosa , two hard throwing pitchers from the economically poor , but baseball rich island of the dominican republic .
translation: "Change Up" est un documentaire qui suit la vie de deux meilleurs amis, Rafael "Pepey" Rodriguez et Alex Sosa, deux lanceurs puissants de l'île économiquement pauvre, mais riche en baseball, de la République dominicaine.
back_translation: "Change Up" is a documentary that follows the lives of two best friends, Rafael "Pepey" Rodriguez and Alex Sosa, two powerful pitchers from the economically poor yet baseball-rich island of the Dominican Republic.

text: nearly a decade after skynet sent back the t-1000 , john connor faces a female terminator , the t-x , with power over all machines .
translation: près d'une décennie après que Skynet a envoyé le T-1000, John Connor est confronté à une terminatrice féminine, le T-X, dotée du pouvoir sur toutes les machines.
back_translation: Nearly a decade after Skynet sent the T-1000, John Connor faces a female terminator, the T-X, endowed with power over all machines.

text: how can neil and stevie get out of their mistaken marriages and into each others arms ?
translation: comment Neil et Stevie peuvent-ils sortir de leurs mariages erronés et se retrouver dans les bras l'un de l'autre ?

text: the chateau has one very funny joke and a few other decent ones , but all it amounts to is a mildly funny , sometimes tedious , ultimately insignificant film .
translation: Le château a une blague très drôle et quelques autres convenables, mais tout cela se résume à un film légèrement amusant, parfois ennuyeux, et finalement sans importance.
back_translation: The castle has one very funny joke and a few other suitable ones, but it all adds up to a slightly amusing film, sometimes boring, and ultimately insignificant.

text: dude schmitz , an independent filmmaker , attempting to secure funds for his second feature , blows an opportunity at what promises to be a lucrative interview with pop sensation britney spears .
translation: Dude Schmitz, un réalisateur indépendant, tentant de sécuriser des fonds pour son deuxième long-métrage, rate une opportunité lors de ce qui promet d'être une interview lucrative avec la sensation pop Britney Spears.
back_translation: Dude Schmitz, an independent director, trying to secure funding for his second feature film, misses an opportunity during what promises to be a lucrative interview with pop sensation Britney Spears.

text: dealing with the aftermath of the 'accident ' brings out the best and the worst in them .
translation: Faire face aux conséquences de l'« accident » fait ressortir le meilleur et le pire en eux.
back_translation: Facing the consequences of the "accident" brings out the best and the worst in them.

text: daringly perceptive , taut , piercing and feisty , biggie and tupac is undeniably subversive and involving in its bold presentation .
translation: Audacieusement perspicace, tendu, perçant et combatif, Biggie et Tupac est indéniablement subversif et captivant dans sa présentation audacieuse.
back_translation: Boldly insightful, tense, piercing, and combative, Biggie and Tupac is undeniably subversive and captivating in its daring presentation.

text: they spend their afternoons discussing theater and lucy 's role as antigone in a school loneliness of the city more bearable .

text: but again , her guardian angel reactivates her will to live .
translation: mais encore une fois, son ange gardien réactive sa volonté de vivre.

text: the film is divided into three stories , each associated with one of the three main ideologies of the 20th century : fascism , communism & # 38 ; liberalism .
translation: Le film est divisé en trois histoires, chacune associée à l'une des trois principales idéologies du 20ème siècle : le fascisme, le communisme et le libéralisme.
back_translation: The film is divided into three stories, each associated with one of the three main ideologies of the 20th century: fascism, communism, and liberalism.

text: a magnificent conjuring act , an eerie historical mirage evoked in a single sweeping wave of the hand by alexander sokurov .
translation: un acte de magie magnifique, un mirage historique étrange évoqué d'un seul mouvement de la main par alexandre sokurov.
back_translation: a magnificent act of magic, a strange historical mirage evoked with a single wave of the hand by alexander sokurov.

text: her loving parents feel helpless as they watch their daughter suffer .
translation: Ses parents aimants se sentent impuissants en voyant leur fille souffrir.
back_translation: Her loving parents feel helpless seeing their daughter suffer.

text: a wonderfully speculative character study that made up for its rather slow beginning by drawing me into the picture .
translation: une étude de caractère merveilleusement spéculative qui a compensé son début plutôt lent en me plongeant dans l'histoire.
back_translation: A wonderfully speculative character study that compensated for its rather slow start by immersing me in the story.

text: kyle goes back to darkness falls to face his past , and the woman in the porceline mask ( aka the tooth fairy ) chance barron , a has-been `` cock-rock `` front-man , has wasted nearly eight years of his life working a dead-end job at softwipe incorporated , the world 's second largest manufacturer/distributor of double-plied toliet paper , but things change drastically for mr . barron when he receives a mysterious watch which counts down the number of days he has left to live .
translation: Kyle retourne à Darkness Falls pour affronter son passé, et la femme masquée en porcelaine (alias la fée des dents), Chance Barron, un ancien chanteur de "cock-rock", a perdu près de huit ans de sa vie à travailler dans un emploi sans avenir chez Softwipe Incorporated, le deuxième fabricant/distributeur mondial de papier toilette double épaisseur. Mais les choses changent radicalement pour M. Barron lorsqu'il reçoit une montre mystérieuse qui compte le nombre de jours qu'il lui reste à vivre.
back_translation: Kyle returns to Darkness Falls to confront his past, and the masked porcelain woman (aka the tooth fairy), Chance Barron, a former "cock-rock" singer, has lost nearly eight years of his life working in a dead-end job at Softwipe Incorporated, the second largest manufacturer/distributor of double-ply toilet paper in the world. But things change radically for Mr. Barron when he receives a mysterious watch that counts down the days he has left to live.

text: the second chapter of the harry potter series is even more magical than the first and simply the best family film of the year .
translation: le deuxième chapitre de la série Harry Potter est encore plus magique que le premier et tout simplement le meilleur film familial de l'année.
back_translation: The second chapter of the Harry Potter series is even more magical than the first and simply the best family film of the year.

text: behind the snow games and lovable siberian huskies ( plus one sheep dog ) , the picture hosts a parka-wrapped dose of heart .
translation: Derrière les jeux de neige et les adorables huskies sibériens (plus un chien de berger), la photo présente une dose de chaleur enveloppée dans un parka.
back_translation: Behind the snow games and the adorable Siberian huskies (plus one shepherd dog), the photo presents a dose of warmth wrapped in a parka.

text: singer patricia paradise ( dee wallace stone ) has everything : beauty , fame , success , money . . .
translation: La chanteuse Patricia Paradise (Dee Wallace Stone) a tout : beauté, renommée, succès, argent...

text: what if jesus were born in the year 2002 to a young jewish couple in new york city , instead of bethlehem two millennia ago ?
translation: Et si Jésus était né en l'an 2002 d'un jeune couple juif à New York, au lieu de Bethléem il y a deux millénaires ?
back_translation: And if Jesus had been born in the year 2002 to a young Jewish couple in New York, instead of Bethlehem two millennia ago?

text: exploits [ headbanger ] stereotypes in good fun , while adding a bit of heart and unsettling subject matter .
translation: exploite les stéréotypes [tête-bangeur] de manière amusante, tout en ajoutant un peu de cœur et des sujets troublants.

text: leading his army of women into the surrounding mountain glens , dionysus casts a spell on the city 's females , who abandon their husbands and fathers in order to engage in forbidden revels .
translation: mène son armée de femmes dans les vallées montagneuses environnantes, Dionysos jette un sort sur les femmes de la ville, qui abandonnent leurs maris et leurs pères pour se livrer à des festivités interdites.
