translation: les personnages fictifs deviennent partie du monde des créateurs en apparaissant dans le métro avec eux, l'imagination devient réalité.
back_translation: Fictional characters become part of the creators' world by appearing in the subway with them, imagination becomes reality.

text: carefully crafted , notably in its deft dramatic structuring , and has become timely in a way its maker could never have anticipated .
translation: élaboré avec soin, notamment dans sa structure dramatique habile, et est devenu opportun d'une manière que son auteur n'aurait jamais pu anticiper.
back_translation: carefully crafted, particularly in its skillful dramatic structure, and has become timely in a way that its author could never have anticipated.

text: a comedic short about a man flying through mexico who despite not speaking the language meets a pretty girl only to juggle his attention between her and the world 's worst case of 'montezuma 's revenge ' .
translation: Un court-métrage comique sur un homme volant à travers le Mexique qui, malgré le fait de ne pas parler la langue, rencontre une jolie fille, seulement pour jongler entre son attention pour elle et le pire cas de 'la vengeance de Montezuma' au monde.
back_translation: A comedic short film about a man flying through Mexico who, despite not speaking the language, meets a pretty girl, only to juggle between his attention for her and the worst case of 'Montezuma's revenge' in the world.

text: for all its violence , the movie is remarkably dull with only caine making much of an impression .
translation: Malgré toute sa violence, le film est remarquablement ennuyeux, seul Caine laissant vraiment une impression.
back_translation: Despite all its violence, the film is remarkably boring, with only Caine really leaving an impression.

text: follows the original film virtually scene for scene and yet manages to bleed it almost completely dry of humor , verve and fun .
translation: suit le film original presque scène par scène et parvient pourtant à l'aspirer presque complètement de son humour, de sa verve et de son plaisir.
back_translation: It follows the original film almost scene by scene and yet manages to almost completely drain it of its humor, its wit, and its enjoyment.

text: after an ultimatum from his girlfriend tara ( alison eastwood ) , johnny finally commits to a `` real `` job in the construction business , but is soon miserable there .
translation: Après un ultimatum de sa petite amie Tara (Alison Eastwood), Johnny s'engage finalement dans un "vrai" travail dans le secteur de la construction, mais il s'y sent rapidement misérable.
back_translation: After an ultimatum from his girlfriend Tara (Alison Eastwood), Johnny finally takes a "real" job in the construction sector, but he quickly feels miserable there.

text: while certainly more naturalistic than its australian counterpart , amari 's film falls short in building the drama of lilia 's journey .
translation: Bien que certainement plus naturaliste que son homologue australien, le film d'Amari n'atteint pas le niveau de drame dans le parcours de Lilia.
back_translation: Although certainly more naturalistic than its Australian counterpart, Amari's film does not reach the level of drama in Lilia's journey.

text: despite dire warnings from his uncle , dean is seduced by the book 's knowledge .
translation: malgré les avertissements sévères de son oncle, Dean est séduit par le savoir du livre.
back_translation: Despite his uncle's stern warnings, Dean is captivated by the knowledge in the book.

text: keith bennets ( mark thompson ) mother passed away a year ago , and he feels like he has moved on with his life , until one morning his mothers jewellery shows up on keiths bathroom sink .
translation: La mère de Keith Bennets (Mark Thompson) est décédée il y a un an, et il a l'impression d'avoir tourné la page de sa vie, jusqu'à ce qu'un matin, les bijoux de sa mère apparaissent sur le lavabo de la salle de bains de Keith.
back_translation: Keith Bennett's mother (Mark Thompson) passed away a year ago, and he feels like he has turned a page in his life, until one morning, his mother's jewelry appears on the bathroom sink.

text: despite the predictable parent vs . child coming-of-age theme , first-class , natural acting and a look at `` the real americans `` make this a charmer .
translation: malgré le thème prévisible du parent contre l'enfant dans le passage à l'âge adulte, un jeu d'acteur naturel de premier ordre et un regard sur "les vrais américains" en font un charme.
back_translation: Despite the predictable theme of parent versus child in the transition to adulthood, a first-rate natural performance and a perspective on "real Americans" make it a charm.

text: as it abruptly crosscuts among the five friends , it fails to lend the characters ' individual stories enough dramatic resonance to make us care about them .
translation: Alors qu'il coupe abruptement entre les cinq amis, il ne parvient pas à donner aux histoires individuelles des personnages suffisamment de résonance dramatique pour nous faire nous soucier d'eux.
back_translation: As it abruptly cuts between the five friends, it fails to give the individual stories of the characters enough dramatic resonance to make us care about them.

text: a film so terrifying - even the monsters are frightened !
translation: un film si terrifiant - même les monstres ont peur !
back_translation: a film so terrifying - even the monsters are scared!

text: romy dispenses orders like a drill sergeant as they scramble southwest to round up the last two surviving members of eagle 's wwii , b-17 bomber crew .
translation: Romy donne des ordres comme un sergent instructeur alors qu'ils se précipitent vers le sud-ouest pour rassembler les deux derniers membres survivants de l'équipage du B-17 d'Eagle pendant la Seconde Guerre mondiale.
back_translation: Romy gives orders like a drill sergeant as they rush southwest to gather the last two surviving crew members of Eagle's B-17 during World War II.

text: at best , cletis tout might inspire a trip to the video store -- in search of a better movie experience .
translation: au mieux, Cletis Tout pourrait inspirer une visite au vidéo-club -- à la recherche d'une meilleure expérience cinématographique.
back_translation: At best, Cletis Tout could inspire a visit to the video store -- in search of a better cinematic experience.

text: for a movie about the power of poetry and passion , there is precious little of either .
translation: Pour un film sur le pouvoir de la poésie et de la passion, il y a très peu de l'un ou de l'autre.
back_translation: For a film about the power of poetry and passion, there is very little of either.

text: he also shies away from the shallow young women that he and his friends micke and mario meet at bars .
translation: Il évite également les jeunes femmes superficielles que lui et ses amis Micke et Mario rencontrent dans les bars.
back_translation: He also avoids superficial young women that he and his friends Micke and Mario meet in bars.

text: the story is set against a relationship that forms between a runaway american teenage boy and a brazilian teenage girl who meet in the drug and gang controlled slums of rio de janeiro .
translation: L'histoire se déroule autour d'une relation qui se forme entre un adolescent américain fugueur et une adolescente brésilienne qui se rencontrent dans les favelas contrôlées par la drogue et les gangs de Rio de Janeiro.
back_translation: The story revolves around a relationship that forms between a runaway American teenager and a Brazilian teenager who meet in the drug- and gang-controlled favelas of Rio de Janeiro.

text: you will emerge with a clearer view of how the gears of justice grind on and the death report comes to share airtime alongside the farm report .
translation: vous aurez une vision plus claire de la manière dont les rouages de la justice fonctionnent et le rapport sur les décès vient partager le temps d'antenne avec le rapport agricole.
back_translation: You will have a clearer view of how the wheels of justice operate, and the report on deaths will share airtime with the agricultural report.

text: occupied france 1944 : in the castle , their local headquarters , the german officers decide to organize a party .
translation: France occupée 1944 : dans le château, leur quartier général local, les officiers allemands décident d'organiser une fête.
back_translation: Occupied France 1944: in the castle, their local headquarters, the German officers decide to organize a party.

text: but the memories of their time together lingers inside their hearts .
translation: mais les souvenirs de leur temps ensemble demeurent dans leur cœur.
back_translation: but the memories of their time together remain in their hearts.

text: kids who are into this thornberry stuff will probably be in wedgie heaven . anyone else who may , for whatever reason , be thinking about going to see this movie is hereby given fair warning .
translation: Les enfants qui aiment ces trucs Thornberry seront probablement aux anges des wedgies. Quiconque d'autre, pour une raison quelconque, pense aller voir ce film est donc averti.
back_translation: Children who love those Thornberry things will probably be thrilled with the wedgies. Anyone else, for some reason, thinking about watching this movie is hereby warned.

text: however , after an inexplicable letter arrives , any signs of normalcy in his life begin to fade .
translation: Cependant, après qu'une lettre inexplicable arrive, tout signe de normalité dans sa vie commence à s'effacer.
back_translation: However, after an inexplicable letter arrives, all signs of normality in his life begin to fade away.

text: jonathan ecks ( antonio banderas ) , an fbi agent , realizes that he must join with his lifelong enemy , agent sever ( lucy liu ) , a rogue dia agent with whom he is in mortal combat , in order to defeat a common enemy .
translation: Jonathan Ecks (Antonio Banderas), un agent du FBI, réalise qu'il doit s'associer à son ennemi de longue date, l'agent Sever (Lucy Liu), une agente de la DIA renégate avec qui il est en combat mortel, afin de vaincre un ennemi commun.
back_translation: Jonathan Ecks (Antonio Banderas), an FBI agent, realizes that he must team up with his longtime enemy, agent Sever (Lucy Liu), a rogue DIA agent with whom he is in a deadly battle, in order to defeat a common enemy.

text: completely creatively stillborn and executed in a manner that i 'm not sure could be a single iota worse . . . a soulless hunk of exploitative garbage .
translation: complètement créativement mort-né et exécuté d'une manière qui, je ne suis pas sûr, pourrait être une seule iota pire . . . un morceau sans âme de déchets exploiteurs.
back_translation: completely creatively stillborn and executed in a way that, I'm not sure, could be a single iota worse... a soulless piece of exploitative waste.

text: as animation increasingly emphasizes the computer and the cool , this is a film that takes a stand in favor of tradition and warmth .
translation: Alors que l'animation met de plus en plus l'accent sur l'ordinateur et le moderne, c'est un film qui prend position en faveur de la tradition et de la chaleur.
back_translation: While animation increasingly focuses on computers and the modern, this is a film that takes a stance in favor of tradition and warmth.

text: the characters , cast in impossibly contrived situations , are totally estranged from reality .
translation: les personnages, plongés dans des situations impossiblement artificielles, sont totalement étrangers à la réalité.
back_translation: The characters, immersed in impossibly artificial situations, are completely foreign to reality.

text: in the end , white oleander is n't an adaptation of a novel . it 's a flashy , star-splashed reduction .
translation: En fin de compte, Le Pervenche blanc n'est pas une adaptation d'un roman. C'est une réduction tape-à-l'œil, pleine d'étoiles.
back_translation: In the end, The White Periwinkle is not an adaptation of a novel. It is a flashy reduction, full of stars.

text: guaranteed to move anyone who ever shook , rattled , or rolled .
translation: garanti de faire bouger quiconque a déjà tremblé, secoué ou roulé.
back_translation: guaranteed to move anyone who has ever trembled, shaken, or rolled.

text: will tom be able to persuade his naturally cautious and terminally confused fianc & # 233 ; e to work through all the damage and chaos ?
translation: Tom réussira-t-il à persuader sa fiancée, naturellement prudente et perpétuellement confuse, de surmonter tous les dégâts et le chaos ?
back_translation: Will Tom succeed in persuading his fiancée, naturally cautious and perpetually confused, to overcome all the damage and chaos?

text: when fran , ( paige turco ) walks into the prop house where he lives looking for unusual objects , chep immediately develops a crush .
translation: Quand Fran (Paige Turco) entre dans la maison des accessoires où il vit à la recherche d'objets inhabituels, Chep développe immédiatement un coup de cœur.
back_translation: When Fran (Paige Turco) enters the accessory house where he lives in search of unusual items, Chep immediately develops a crush.

text: the first question to ask about bad company is why anthony hopkins is in it . we assume he had a bad run in the market or a costly divorce , because there is no earthly reason other than money why this distinguished actor would stoop so low .
translation: La première question à poser concernant "Bad Company" est pourquoi Anthony Hopkins y apparaît. On suppose qu'il a eu une mauvaise passe sur le marché ou un divorce coûteux, car il n'y a aucune raison autre que l'argent pour laquelle cet acteur distingué descendra si bas.
back_translation: The first question to ask about "Bad Company" is why Anthony Hopkins appears in it. It is assumed that he went through a rough patch in the market or a costly divorce, as there is no reason other than money for this distinguished actor to stoop so low.

text: upon arriving in los reyes , the ambitious father amaro meets amelia , a beautiful 16-year-old girl whose religious devotion soon becomes helplessly entangles in a growing attraction to the new priest .
translation: À son arrivée à Los Reyes, le père Amaro, ambitieux, rencontre Amélia, une belle fille de 16 ans dont la dévotion religieuse devient rapidement inextricablement liée à une attraction croissante pour le nouveau prêtre.
back_translation: Upon his arrival in Los Reyes, Father Amaro, ambitious, meets Amélia, a beautiful 16-year-old girl whose religious devotion quickly becomes inextricably linked to a growing attraction to the new priest.

text: a gratingly unfunny groaner littered with zero-dimensional , unlikable characters and hackneyed , threadbare comic setups .
translation: une blague pénible et sans humour jonchée de personnages unidimensionnels et antipathiques ainsi que de situations comiques éculées et usées.
back_translation: A painful and unfunny joke strewn with one-dimensional and unsympathetic characters, as well as clichéd and worn-out comic situations.

text: as the geological fracture deepens and widens , the european community begins to disassociate itself from the calamity , and panic ensues among tourists and residents attempting to escape .
translation: Alors que la fracture géologique s'approfondit et s'élargit, la communauté européenne commence à se désassocier de la calamité, et la panique s'ensuit parmi les touristes et les résidents tentant de s'échapper.
back_translation: As the geological fracture deepens and widens, the European community begins to dissociate from the calamity, and panic ensues among tourists and residents trying to escape.

text: unfortunately , the experience of actually watching the movie is less compelling than the circumstances of its making .
translation: Malheureusement, l'expérience de visionner réellement le film est moins captivante que les circonstances de sa réalisation.
back_translation: Unfortunately, the experience of actually watching the film is less captivating than the circumstances of its making.

text: set against the bright lights of manhattan , a tale which takes a comic , urbane look at the modern male ego at war in the singles scene trenches .
translation: dans le cadre des lumières brillantes de Manhattan, un récit qui offre un regard comique et urbain sur l'ego masculin moderne en guerre dans les tranchées de la scène des célibataires.
back_translation: In the bright lights of Manhattan, a story that offers a humorous and urban look at the modern male ego at war in the trenches of the singles scene.

text: but before he is able to set out on his expedition , the professor , along with the tablet , are taken hostage by a group of mercenaries , led by the vicious philipe gallo .
translation: Mais avant qu’il ne puisse se lancer dans son expédition, le professeur, avec la tablette, est pris en otage par un groupe de mercenaires dirigé par le vicieux Philippe Gallo.
back_translation: But before he can embark on his expedition, the professor, with the tablet, is taken hostage by a group of mercenaries led by the vicious Philippe Gallo.

text: the movie mixes the personal life of the ancestors of this man as well as historical moments for m & # 233 ; xico such as the reform war , the mexican revolution , etc . arc & # 225 ; ngel ca n't sleep .
translation: Le film mélange la vie personnelle des ancêtres de cet homme ainsi que des moments historiques pour le Mexique tels que la guerre de réforme, la révolution mexicaine, etc. Arcángel ne peut pas dormir.
back_translation: The film mixes the personal lives of this man's ancestors with historical moments for Mexico such as the Reform War, the Mexican Revolution, etc. Arcángel cannot sleep.

text: pronounced cured , she became a psychoanalyst herself and , within eight years , was practising alongside the founding fathers .
translation: Ayant réussi à guérir, elle est devenue elle-même psychanalyste et, en huit ans, pratiquait aux côtés des pères fondateurs.
back_translation: Having succeeded in healing, she became a psychoanalyst herself and, in eight years, practiced alongside the founding fathers.

text: this causes duncan 's father ( jenkins ) further grief , who does n't understand his son 's unusual mourning rituals .
translation: cela cause davantage de chagrin à père de Duncan (Jenkins), qui ne comprend pas les rituels de deuil inhabituels de son fils.
back_translation: This causes more grief to Duncan's father (Jenkins), who does not understand his son's unusual mourning rituals.

text: the ill-conceived modern-day ending falls flat where it should deliver a moral punch .
translation: la fin moderne mal conçue tombe à plat là où elle devrait délivrer un coup de poing moral.
back_translation: the poorly conceived modern ending falls flat where it should deliver a moral punch.

text: the tenement is a four story anthology that in which each of its characters live within the same building and walk a fine line between good and evil .
translation: Le bâtiment est une anthologie de quatre étages dans laquelle chacun de ses personnages vit dans le même immeuble et évolue sur une fine ligne entre le bien et le mal.
back_translation: The building is an anthology of four stories in which each of its characters lives in the same building and operates on a fine line between good and evil.

text: dr . singh ( amitabh bachchan ) a senior doctor raise funds to fulfil his dream of having a state-of-the-art hospital .
translation: Dr. Singh (Amitabh Bachchan), un médecin senior, collecte des fonds pour réaliser son rêve d'avoir un hôpital à la pointe de la technologie.
back_translation: Dr. Singh (Amitabh Bachchan), a senior doctor, is raising funds to fulfill his dream of having a state-of-the-art hospital.

text: henry bean 's thoughtful screenplay provides no easy answers , but offers a compelling investigation of faith versus intellect
translation: Le scénario réfléchi de Henry Bean ne fournit pas de réponses faciles, mais propose une enquête captivante sur la foi contre l'intellect.
back_translation: Henry Bean's thoughtful script does not provide easy answers but offers a captivating investigation into faith versus intellect.

text: it 's not that kung pow is n't funny some of the time -- it just is n't any funnier than bad martial arts movies are all by themselves , without all oedekerk 's impish augmentation .
translation: Ce n'est pas que Kung Pow ne soit pas drôle par moments, c'est juste qu'il n'est pas plus drôle que les mauvais films d'arts martiaux le sont par eux-mêmes, sans toute l'augmentation malicieuse d'Oedekerk.
back_translation: It's not that Kung Pow isn't funny at times; it's just that it's not funnier than bad martial arts movies are on their own, without all the mischievous enhancement from Oedekerk.

text: has the kitsch appeal of a farm implement on a restaurant wall , or an andy warhol mao poster : interesting , but not for its original purpose .
translation: a le charme kitsch d'un outil agricole accroché au mur d'un restaurant, ou d'une affiche d'Andy Warhol de Mao : intéressant, mais pas pour sa fonction originale.
back_translation: It has the kitsch charm of a farming tool hanging on the wall of a restaurant, or an Andy Warhol poster of Mao: interesting, but not for its original function.

text: without getting grand or preachy , the sprechers use an unconventional approach to coax us into asking ourselves fundamental questions .
translation: Sans devenir grandiloquent ou moralisateur, les sprechers utilisent une approche peu conventionnelle pour nous inciter à nous poser des questions fondamentales.
back_translation: Without becoming grandiloquent or moralizing, the speakers use an unconventional approach to encourage us to ask fundamental questions.

text: battling his own demons he realizes he is just like the rest of us : good and evil .
translation: luttant contre ses propres démons, il réalise qu'il est comme le reste d'entre nous : bon et mauvais.
back_translation: fighting against his own demons, he realizes that he is like the rest of us: good and bad.

text: ben is a perfectionist and overachiever whose tunnel vision leads to nothing less than graduating at the top of his class .
translation: Ben est un perfectionniste et un surdoué dont la vision tunnel le pousse à rien de moins que d'obtenir son diplôme au sommet de sa classe.
back_translation: Ben is a perfectionist and a gifted individual whose tunnel vision drives him to nothing less than graduating at the top of his class.

text: the movie fails to portray its literarily talented and notorious subject as anything much more than a dirty old man .
translation: le film échoue à dépeindre son sujet littéraire talentueux et notoire comme quelque chose de plus qu'un vieux dégoûtant.
back_translation: The film fails to portray its talented and notorious literary subject as anything more than an old disgusting man.

text: while gertie is able to manipulate ollie with the finesse of an adult , she is ultimately daddy 's little girl .
translation: Bien que Gertie soit capable de manipuler Ollie avec la finesse d'un adulte, elle est finalement la petite fille de papa.
back_translation: Although Gertie is able to manipulate Ollie with the finesse of an adult, she is ultimately daddy's little girl.

text: it makes me feel weird / thinking about all the bad things in the world / like puppies with broken legs / and butterflies that die / and movies starring pop queens
translation: cela me rend étrange / de penser à toutes les mauvaises choses dans le monde / comme les chiots avec des pattes cassées / et les papillons qui meurent / et les films avec des reines de la pop
back_translation: It makes me strange / to think about all the bad things in the world / like puppies with broken legs / and butterflies that die / and movies with pop queens

text: [ a ] superbly controlled , passionate adaptation of graham greene 's 1955 novel .
translation: [ a ] une adaptation superbement maîtrisée et passionnée du roman de Graham Greene de 1955.
back_translation: [a] a superbly mastered and passionate adaptation of Graham Greene's 1955 novel.

text: his attempt at becoming a lefty leads to an interesting turn of events which suggest that he may be at the start of a never-ending cycle .
translation: sa tentative de devenir gaucher mène à un tournant intéressant des événements qui suggère qu'il pourrait être au début d'un cycle sans fin.
back_translation: His attempt to become left-handed leads to an interesting turning point in events that suggests he might be at the beginning of a never-ending cycle.

text: marisa ventura ( lopez ) is a single mother born and bred in the boroughs of new york city , who works as a maid in a first-class manhattan hotel .
translation: Marisa Ventura (Lopez) est une mère célibataire née et élevée dans les quartiers de New York, qui travaille comme femme de chambre dans un hôtel de grand luxe à Manhattan.
back_translation: Marisa Ventura (Lopez) is a single mother born and raised in the neighborhoods of New York, who works as a maid in a luxury hotel in Manhattan.

text: meanwhile , on a distant planet , alien authorities have captured the most dangerous of all criminals and are sending him via rocket to a prison planet .
translation: Pendant ce temps, sur une planète lointaine, les autorités extraterrestres ont capturé le criminel le plus dangereux de tous et l'envoient par fusée vers une planète-prison.
back_translation: Meanwhile, on a distant planet, the extraterrestrial authorities have captured the most dangerous criminal of all and are sending him by rocket to a prison planet.

text: for escape he paints the visions that haunt him , while eleanor sends all of his hard earned money to a seedy tele-evangelist .
translation: pour échapper, il peint les visions qui le hantent, tandis qu'Eleanor envoie tout son argent durement gagné à un télévangéliste douteux.
back_translation: To escape, he paints the visions that haunt him, while Eleanor sends all her hard-earned money to a dubious televangelist.

text: in harlem , martin blaze , a writer for vibe , thinks he 's a loser since his fianc & # 233 ; e cheated on him .
translation: À Harlem, Martin Blaze, un écrivain pour Vibe, se considère comme un loser depuis que sa fiancée l'a trompé.
back_translation: In Harlem, Martin Blaze, a writer for Vibe, sees himself as a loser since his fiancée cheated on him.

text: no movement , no yuks , not much of anything .
translation: pas de mouvement, pas de rires, pas grand-chose en fait.
back_translation: no movement, no laughter, not much actually.

text: a by-the-numbers effort that wo n't do much to enhance the franchise .
translation: un effort standard qui ne fera guère progresser la franchise.
back_translation: a standard effort that will hardly advance the franchise.

text: an enchanting spectacular for potter fans anxious to ride the hogwarts express toward a new year of magic and mischief .
translation: un spectacle enchanteur pour les fans de Potter impatients de monter à bord de l'Express de Poudlard vers une nouvelle année de magie et de malice.
back_translation: An enchanting show for Potter fans eager to board the Hogwarts Express for a new year of magic and mischief.

text: new arrival alden pyle ( brendan fraser ) , an idealistic american aid worker , befriends london times correspondent thomas fowler ( michael caine ) .
translation: le nouvel arrivant alden pyle (brendan fraser), un travailleur humanitaire américain idéaliste, se lie d'amitié avec le correspondant du london times thomas fowler (michael caine).
back_translation: The new arrival Alden Pyle (Brendan Fraser), an idealistic American humanitarian worker, befriends Thomas Fowler (Michael Caine), the correspondent for the London Times.

text: there are things to like about murder by numbers -- but , in the end , the disparate elements do n't gel .
translation: Il y a des choses à aimer dans Meurtre par chiffres - mais, au final, les éléments disparates ne s'harmonisent pas.
back_translation: There are things to like in Murder by Numbers - but, in the end, the disparate elements do not come together.

text: lando , after knowing the situation , attempted to kill roman .
translation: Lando, après avoir pris connaissance de la situation, a tenté de tuer Roman.
back_translation: Lando, after becoming aware of the situation, tried to kill Roman.

text: it 's rare to find a film to which the adjective 'gentle ' applies , but the word perfectly describes pauline & paulette .
translation: Il est rare de trouver un film auquel l'adjectif 'doux' s'applique, mais ce mot décrit parfaitement Pauline et Paulette.
back_translation: It is rare to find a film to which the adjective 'sweet' applies, but this word perfectly describes Pauline and Paulette.

text: seeking a mental escape , simone begins to tune into what 's happening with the other couples around her .
translation: à la recherche d'une échappatoire mentale, Simone commence à prêter attention à ce qui se passe avec les autres couples autour d'elle.
back_translation: In search of a mental escape, Simone begins to pay attention to what is happening with the other couples around her.

text: vera 's technical prowess ends up selling his film short ; he smoothes over hard truths even as he uncovers them .
translation: le savoir-faire technique de Vera finit par sous-estimer son film ; il adoucit des vérités difficiles tout en les révélant.
back_translation: Vera's technical know-how ultimately underestimates her film; it softens difficult truths while revealing them.

text: filmmaker rick mckay documents actor/illusionist james beaman 's transformation from an attractive young actor to the legendary icon marlene dietrich .
translation: Le cinéaste Rick McKay documente la transformation de l'acteur/illusionniste James Beaman, d'un jeune acteur séduisant à l'icône légendaire Marlene Dietrich.
back_translation: Filmmaker Rick McKay documents the transformation of actor/illusionist James Beaman from a charming young actor to the legendary icon Marlene Dietrich.

text: a take on the classic tale 'the boy who cried wolf ' , 'big fat liar ' is about a 14-year-old boy named jason shephard ( frankie muniz ) who lies for the fun of it .
translation: Une relecture du conte classique 'le garçon qui criait au loup', 'un gros menteur' raconte l'histoire d'un garçon de 14 ans nommé Jason Shephard (Frankie Muniz) qui ment juste pour le plaisir.
back_translation: A retelling of the classic tale 'The Boy Who Cried Wolf,' 'A Big Liar' tells the story of a 14-year-old boy named Jason Shephard (Frankie Muniz) who lies just for fun.

text: with the prospect of films like kangaroo jack about to burst across america 's winter movie screens it 's a pleasure to have a film like the hours as an alternative .
translation: Avec la perspective de films comme Kangourou Jack sur le point d'envahir les écrans cinématographiques d'hiver en Amérique, c'est un plaisir d'avoir un film comme Les Heures en alternative.
back_translation: With films like Kangaroo Jack about to invade winter movie screens in America, it's a pleasure to have a movie like The Hours as an alternative.

text: shot on wide screen digibeta , sendak with his night kitchen theater partner , arthur yorinks and pilobolus artistic directors robby barnett , michael tracy , and jonathan wolken shows us the tenacity and wit that drive the creative process when serious artists work together .
translation: tourné en format large digibeta, sendak avec son partenaire de théâtre de la cuisine de nuit, arthur yorinks et les directeurs artistiques de pilobolus, robby barnett, michael tracy et jonathan wolken nous montrent la ténacité et l'esprit qui animent le processus créatif lorsque des artistes sérieux travaillent ensemble.
back_translation: Shot in widescreen digibeta format, Sendak with his theater partner from the Night Kitchen, Arthur Yorinks, and the artistic directors of Pilobolus, Robby Barnett, Michael Tracy, and Jonathan Wolken, demonstrate the tenacity and spirit that drive the creative process when serious artists work together.

text: uneven but ultimately appealing satire of the dreck we call white man 's rap music . some good performances and an often goofy script make for a generally good time .
translation: une satire inégale mais finalement attrayante du déchet que nous appelons la musique rap des hommes blancs. De bonnes performances et un scénario souvent loufoque font de ce film un bon moment en général.
back_translation: An uneven but ultimately appealing satire of the garbage we call rap music by white men. Good performances and a frequently absurd storyline make this film an enjoyable time overall.

text: wes craven 's presence is felt ; not the craven of 'a nightmare on elm street ' or 'the hills have eyes , ' but the sad schlock merchant of 'deadly friend . '
translation: la présence de wes craven se fait sentir ; pas le craven de 'un cauchemar en elm street' ou 'la colline a des yeux', mais le triste marchand de slasher de 'deadly friend'.
back_translation: The presence of Wes Craven is felt; not the Craven of 'A Nightmare on Elm Street' or 'The Hills Have Eyes', but the sad purveyor of slasher films from 'Deadly Friend'.

text: a splendid entertainment , young in spirit but accomplished in all aspects with the fullness of spirit and sense of ease that comes only with experience .
translation: un divertissement splendide, jeune d'esprit mais accompli dans tous les aspects avec la plénitude de l'esprit et le sens de la facilité qui vient uniquement avec l'expérience.
back_translation: a splendid entertainment, youthful in spirit but accomplished in all aspects with the fullness of mind and the ease that comes only with experience.

text: evil czar and his no-less-evil sidekick general with the help of the local witch yaga try to eliminate fedot by giving him more and more complex quests and to take marusya to tsar 's palace .
translation: le czar maléfique et son acolyte tout aussi maléfique, le général, avec l'aide de la sorcière locale Yaga, essaient d'éliminer Fedot en lui confiant des quêtes de plus en plus complexes et d'emmener Marusya au palais du czar.
back_translation: The evil czar and his equally evil accomplice, the general, with the help of the local witch Yaga, try to eliminate Fedot by giving him increasingly complex quests and taking Marusya to the czar's palace.

text: before they can begin repairing and towing the ghost ship towards harbor , the crew encounters a series of bizarre ocurrences , and the group becomes trapped inside the ship .
translation: Avant de pouvoir commencer à réparer et à remorquer le vaisseau fantôme vers le port, l'équipage rencontre une série d'occurrences bizarres, et le groupe se retrouve piégé à l'intérieur du navire.
back_translation: Before they can start repairing and towing the ghost ship to the port, the crew encounters a series of bizarre occurrences, and the group finds themselves trapped inside the vessel.

text: kimberly corman , 19 , was just taking a trip with her friends . .
translation: Kimberly Corman, 19 ans, était en train de faire un voyage avec ses amis.
back_translation: Kimberly Corman, 19 years old, was on a trip with her friends.

text: her harrowing story ends in victory , but she has not forgotten the thousands of asylum seekers who remain in detention today .
translation: son histoire déchirante se termine par une victoire, mais elle n'a pas oublié les milliers de demandeurs d'asile qui restent en détention aujourd'hui.
back_translation: Her heartbreaking story ends in victory, but she has not forgotten the thousands of asylum seekers who remain in detention today.

text: the best way to describe it is as a cross between paul thomas anderson 's magnolia and david lynch 's mulholland dr .
translation: la meilleure façon de le décrire est comme un croisement entre Magnolia de Paul Thomas Anderson et Mulholland Drive de David Lynch.
back_translation: The best way to describe it is as a cross between Magnolia by Paul Thomas Anderson and Mulholland Drive by David Lynch.

text: in 1959 , berry gordy jr . gathered the best musicians from detroit 's thriving jazz and blues scene to begin cutting songs for his new record company .
translation: En 1959, Berry Gordy Jr. rassembla les meilleurs musiciens de la scène jazz et blues florissante de Détroit pour commencer à enregistrer des chansons pour sa nouvelle maison de disques.
back_translation: In 1959, Berry Gordy Jr. gathered the best musicians from Detroit's thriving jazz and blues scene to start recording songs for his new record label.

text: maggie is a young cuban-american freelance writer who takes an eye opening trip back to her roots and meets a young enchanting native , mateo .
translation: Maggie est une jeune écrivain cubaine-américaine indépendante qui fait un voyage révélateur de retour à ses racines et rencontre un jeune natif enchanteur, Mateo.
back_translation: Maggie is a young independent Cuban-American writer who takes a revealing journey back to her roots and meets a charming young native, Mateo.

text: haneke keeps us at arm 's length . guided more by intellect than heart , his story flattens instead of sharpens .
translation: Haneke nous garde à distance. Guidé plus par l'intellect que par le cœur, son histoire s'aplatit au lieu de se raffiner.
back_translation: Haneke keeps us at a distance. Guided more by intellect than by heart, his story flattens instead of refining.

text: so vivid a portrait of a woman consumed by lust and love and crushed by betrayal that it conjures up the intoxicating fumes and emotional ghosts of a freshly painted rembrandt .
translation: un portrait si vif d'une femme consumée par la luxure et l'amour, écrasée par la trahison, qu'il évoque les fumées enivrantes et les fantômes émotionnels d'un Rembrandt fraîchement peint.
back_translation: a vivid portrait of a woman consumed by lust and love, crushed by betrayal, that evokes the intoxicating smokes and emotional ghosts of a freshly painted Rembrandt.

text: in singapore , that means that at the age of 12 , the government has decided that they are not as academically inclined as their peers .
translation: À Singapour, cela signifie qu'à l'âge de 12 ans, le gouvernement a décidé qu'ils ne sont pas aussi doués académiquement que leurs pairs.
back_translation: In Singapore, this means that at the age of 12, the government has decided that they are not as academically gifted as their peers.

text: all while jolynn is persued by a masculine , toothpick chewing sheriff .
translation: tout en étant poursuivie par un shérif masculin qui mâche un cure-dent.
back_translation: while being pursued by a male sheriff who is chewing a toothpick.

text: [ the film ] tackles the topic of relationships in such a straightforward , emotionally honest manner that by the end , it 's impossible to ascertain whether the film is , at its core , deeply pessimistic or quietly hopeful .
translation: [ le film ] aborde le sujet des relations de manière si directe et émotionnellement honnête qu'à la fin, il est impossible de déterminer si le film est, à sa base, profondément pessimiste ou discrètement plein d'espoir.
back_translation: The film addresses the subject of relationships in such a direct and emotionally honest way that by the end, it's impossible to determine whether the film is, at its core, deeply pessimistic or quietly full of hope.

text: krueger is able to disguise himself as pamela voorhees , and instructs jason to start murdering on elm street upon his resurrection , therefore restoring freddy 's power as well .
translation: Krueger est capable de se déguiser en Pamela Voorhees et ordonne à Jason de commencer à tuer sur Elm Street dès sa résurrection, restaurant ainsi le pouvoir de Freddy.
back_translation: Krueger is capable of disguising himself as Pamela Voorhees and orders Jason to start killing on Elm Street upon his resurrection, thereby restoring Freddy's power.

text: unfortunately , the evil tall man ( angus scrimm ) controls that area .
translation: malheureusement, le méchant homme grand (Angus Scrimm) contrôle cette zone.
back_translation: Unfortunately, the evil tall man (Angus Scrimm) controls this area.

text: takes a simple premise and carries it to unexpected heights .
translation: prend une prémisse simple et la porte à des hauteurs inattendues.
back_translation: Take a simple premise and elevate it to unexpected heights.

text: ruby acts out these scenes in real life with the men and shares her spoils with her sisters .
translation: Ruby rejoue ces scènes dans la vie réelle avec les hommes et partage ses butins avec ses sœurs.
back_translation: Ruby reenacts these scenes in real life with men and shares her spoils with her sisters.

text: we get some truly unique character studies and a cross-section of americana that hollywood could n't possibly fictionalize and be believed .
translation: nous obtenons des études de caractères vraiment uniques et un aperçu de l'americana que hollywood ne pourrait pas fictionnaliser et être crue.
back_translation: We get truly unique character studies and a glimpse of Americana that Hollywood couldn't fictionalize and be believed.

text: in this refreshingly shameless celebration of money and expensive stuff , director kevin bray grabs every retro action-film clichM-i .
translation: Dans cette célébration rafraîchissante et sans vergogne de l'argent et des choses chères, le réalisateur Kevin Bray s'empare de chaque cliché rétro des films d'action.
back_translation: In this refreshing and unabashed celebration of money and luxury items, director Kevin Bray seizes every retro cliché of action movies.

text: the result is a chronicle of the shift from a world organized by the principles of nature to one dominated by technology , the synthetic and the virtual .
translation: le résultat est une chronique du passage d'un monde organisé par les principes de la nature à un monde dominé par la technologie, le synthétique et le virtuel.
back_translation: The result is a chronicle of the transition from a world organized by the principles of nature to a world dominated by technology, the synthetic, and the virtual.

text: as they each play out their own con , the line between rescuer and executioner , betrayer and martyr become blurred and they must learn to trust each other in order to survive .
translation: Alors qu'ils jouent chacun leur propre escroquerie, la frontière entre sauveur et bourreau, traître et martyr devient floue et ils doivent apprendre à se faire confiance pour survivre.
back_translation: While each of them plays their own con game, the line between savior and executioner, traitor and martyr becomes blurred, and they must learn to trust each other to survive.

text: over a fourteen year period they were the heartbeat on every hit from motown 's detroit era .
translation: pendant quatorze ans, ils ont été le cœur de chaque succès de l'ère de Detroit de Motown.
back_translation: For fourteen years, they were the heart of every success of Motown's Detroit era.

text: leoncio 's son robert and daughter marites disapprove of their father 's single-handed decision , leading to a conflict that causes the old man 's fatal heart attack .
translation: Le fils de Léoncio, Robert, et sa fille Marites désapprouvent la décision unilatérale de leur père, entraînant un conflit qui provoque l'attaque cardiaque fatale du vieil homme.
back_translation: Léoncio's son, Robert, and his daughter Marites disapprove of their father's unilateral decision, leading to a conflict that causes the old man's fatal heart attack.

text: this epic film , eschewing dialogue and conventional narrative logic , tells a gripping tale of biological drama through a highly improbable series of evocative images , superb acting and editing , and haunting music .
translation: Ce film épique, en évitant le dialogue et la logique narrative conventionnelle, raconte une histoire captivante de drame biologique à travers une série d'images évocatrices hautement improbables, un jeu d'acteurs et un montage superbement exécutés, et une musique envoûtante.
back_translation: This epic film, by avoiding dialogue and conventional narrative logic, tells a captivating story of biological drama through a series of highly improbable evocative images, superbly executed acting and editing, and enchanting music.

text: if you sometimes like to go to the movies to have fun , wasabi is a good place to start .
translation: Si vous aimez parfois aller au cinéma pour vous amuser, Wasabi est un bon endroit pour commencer.
back_translation: If you sometimes enjoy going to the movies for fun, Wasabi is a good place to start.

text: when she fails to find the `` perfect man `` that will make her happy , she decides to construct him herself , using parts from different people .
translation: quand elle ne parvient pas à trouver l'`` homme parfait `` qui la rendra heureuse, elle décide de le construire elle-même, en utilisant des parties de différentes personnes.
back_translation: When she fails to find the "perfect man" who will make her happy, she decides to build him herself, using parts from different people.

text: but sue , angry and feeling abandoned by lynn , decides to carry out the killing herself .
translation: mais Sue, en colère et se sentant abandonnée par Lynn, décide de réaliser le meurtre elle-même.
back_translation: But Sue, angry and feeling abandoned by Lynn, decides to carry out the murder herself.

text: emma 's a succesful sale agent for a home security company , due in part to being the police chief 's daughter .
translation: Emma est une agente de vente prospère pour une entreprise de sécurité domestique, en partie grâce au fait qu'elle est la fille du chef de la police.
back_translation: Emma is a successful sales agent for a home security company, partly because she is the daughter of the police chief.

text: culkin , who 's in virtually every scene , shines as a young man who uses sarcastic lies like a shield .
translation: Culkin, qui est dans presque chaque scène, brille en tant que jeune homme qui utilise des mensonges sarcastiques comme un bouclier.
back_translation: Culkin, who is in almost every scene, shines as a young man who uses sarcastic lies as a shield.

text: not only better than its predecessor , it may rate as the most magical and most fun family fare of this or any recent holiday season .
translation: non seulement meilleur que son prédécesseur, il pourrait être considéré comme le plus magique et le plus amusant des films familiaux de cette saison des fêtes ou de toute autre saison récente.
back_translation: Not only better than its predecessor, it could be considered the most magical and fun family film of this holiday season or any recent season.

text: just one more collection of penis , breast and flatulence gags in search of a story . or a profit . or some damn thing .
translation: juste une autre collection de blagues sur le pénis, les seins et les pets à la recherche d'une histoire. ou d'un profit. ou de quelque chose de foutu.
back_translation: just another collection of jokes about penises, breasts, and farts in search of a story. or a profit. or something messed up.

text: this odd , poetic road movie , spiked by jolts of pop music , pretty much takes place in morton 's ever-watchful gaze -- and it 's a tribute to the actress , and to her inventive director , that the journey is such a mesmerizing one .
translation: ce road movie étrange et poétique, émaillé de secousses de musique pop, se déroule presque entièrement sous le regard vigilant de morton -- et c'est un hommage à l'actrice et à son réalisateur inventif que ce voyage soit si captivant.
back_translation: This strange and poetic road movie, punctuated by jolts of pop music, unfolds almost entirely under the watchful eye of Morton -- and it is a tribute to the actress and her inventive director that this journey is so captivating.

text: if you 're a crocodile hunter fan , you 'll enjoy at least the `` real `` portions of the film . if you 're looking for a story , do n't bother .
translation: Si vous êtes fan des chasseurs de crocodiles, vous apprécierez au moins les portions "réelles" du film. Si vous cherchez une histoire, ne vous donnez pas la peine.
back_translation: If you're a fan of crocodile hunters, you'll at least appreciate the "real" portions of the film. If you're looking for a story, don't bother.

text: true love is right around the corner as long as he does n't lose sight of what he 's looking for .
translation: le véritable amour est juste au coin de la rue tant qu'il ne perd pas de vue ce qu'il cherche.
back_translation: True love is just around the corner as long as it does not lose sight of what it is looking for.

text: after several fruitless attempts to sell the car , shirley dumps johnny , who has hopelessly fallen in love with her .
translation: Après plusieurs tentatives infructueuses pour vendre la voiture, Shirley largue Johnny, qui est désespérément tombé amoureux d'elle.
back_translation: After several unsuccessful attempts to sell the car, Shirley dumps Johnny, who has desperately fallen in love with her.

text: dr . kanna & # 38 ; rupi are childhood lovers and made for each other .
translation: Dr. Kanna et Rupi sont des amoureux d'enfance et sont faits l'un pour l'autre.
back_translation: Dr. Kanna and Rupi are childhood sweethearts and are made for each other.

text: there is something in full frontal , i guess , about artifice and acting and how it distorts reality for people who make movies and watch them , but like most movie riddles , it works only if you have an interest in the characters you see .
translation: Il y a quelque chose de totalement explicite, je suppose, sur l'artifice et le jeu d'acteur et sur la façon dont cela distord la réalité pour les personnes qui font des films et ceux qui les regardent, mais comme la plupart des énigmes cinématographiques, cela ne fonctionne que si vous avez un intérêt pour les personnages que vous voyez.
back_translation: There is something completely explicit, I suppose, about artifice and acting and how it distorts reality for both the people who make films and those who watch them, but like most cinematic puzzles, it only works if you have an interest in the characters you see.

text: armed with a game supporting cast , from the pitch-perfect forster to the always hilarious meara and levy , like mike shoots and scores , doing its namesake proud .
translation: armé d'un casting de soutien exceptionnel, du parfait Forster à l'incontournable Meara et Levy, Like Mike tire et marque, faisant honneur à son nom.
back_translation: Armed with an exceptional supporting cast, from the perfect Forster to the unavoidable Meara and Levy, Like Mike shoots and scores, living up to its name.

text: forced to move back to his old job at a pizza parlor and into a rundown tenement where a number of oddballs wander the hall including a lonely middle aged woman ( mary coleston ) who makes spam casseroles for all the bachelors , a daffy prostitute ( krystina carson ) , and a spanish don juan ( manual cabra ) who wanders the halls in his bathrobe .
translation: forcé de retourner à son ancien emploi dans une pizzeria et dans un immeuble délabré où plusieurs personnages étranges arpentent les couloirs, y compris une femme d'âge moyen solitaire (Mary Coleston) qui prépare des casseroles de spam pour tous les célibataires, une prostituée loufoque (Krystina Carson) et un don Juan espagnol (Manuel Cabra) qui erre dans les couloirs en peignoir.
back_translation: forced to return to his old job in a pizzeria and in a rundown building where several strange characters roam the halls, including a solitary middle-aged woman (Mary Coleston) who cooks spam casseroles for all the singles, a quirky prostitute (Krystina Carson), and a Spanish Don Juan (Manuel Cabra) who wanders the halls in a bathrobe.

text: we ca n't accuse kung pow for misfiring , since it is exactly what it wants to be : an atrociously , mind-numbingly , indescribably bad movie . unfortunately , we 'd prefer a simple misfire .
translation: nous ne pouvons pas accuser Kung Pow d'échec, car c'est exactement ce qu'il veut être : un film atrocement, horriblement, indescriptiblement mauvais. malheureusement, nous aurions préféré un simple raté.
back_translation: We cannot blame Kung Pow for failing, because it is exactly what it wants to be: an atrociously, horribly, indescribably bad movie. Unfortunately, we would have preferred a simple misfire.

text: hardly an objective documentary , but it 's great cinematic polemic . . . love moore or loathe him , you 've got to admire . . . the intensity with which he 's willing to express his convictions .
translation: à peine un documentaire objectif, mais c'est une grande polémique cinématographique... aimez Moore ou détestez-le, vous devez admirer... l'intensité avec laquelle il est prêt à exprimer ses convictions.
back_translation: Barely an objective documentary, but it is a major cinematic controversy... love him or hate him, you have to admire... the intensity with which he is willing to express his beliefs.

text: lauren ambrose comes alive under the attention from two strangers in town - with honest performances and realistic interaction between the characters , this is a coming-of-age story with a twist .
translation: Lauren Ambrose prend vie sous l'attention de deux étrangers en ville - avec des performances sincères et des interactions réalistes entre les personnages, c'est une histoire d'apprentissage avec une touche d'originalité.
back_translation: Lauren Ambrose comes to life under the watch of two strangers in town - with sincere performances and realistic interactions between the characters, it's a coming-of-age story with a touch of originality.

text: these four will collide in a titanic battle to determine the fate of the world .
translation: ces quatre s'affronteront dans une bataille titanesque pour déterminer le sort du monde.
back_translation: These four will clash in a titanic battle to determine the fate of the world.

text: ya-yas everywhere will forgive the flaws and love the film .
translation: Les ya-yas partout pardonneront les défauts et aimeront le film.
back_translation: The ya-yas everywhere will forgive the flaws and love the film.

text: baaba andoh fled ghana in fear for her life , when her long-lost father tried to force her to undergo female genital mutilation .
translation: Baaba Andoh a fui le Ghana par crainte pour sa vie, lorsque son père qu'elle n'avait pas vu depuis longtemps a tenté de la forcer à subir une mutilation génitale féminine.
back_translation: Baaba Andoh fled Ghana for fear of her life when her father, whom she had not seen in a long time, tried to force her to undergo female genital mutilation.

text: it 's also clear from the start that the transporter is running purely on adrenaline , and once the initial high wears off , the film 's shortcomings start to shine through .
translation: Il est également clair dès le début que le transporteur fonctionne uniquement à l'adrénaline, et une fois que l'euphorie initiale s'est estompée, les défauts du film commencent à ressortir.
back_translation: It is also clear from the start that the carrier operates solely on adrenaline, and once the initial euphoria fades, the flaws of the film begin to stand out.

text: she marches coldly through her day , ignoring him , going about her business .
translation: Elle avance froidement à travers sa journée, l'ignorant, vaquant à ses occupations.
back_translation: She coldly moves through her day, ignoring it, going about her tasks.

text: from classrooms to dorm rooms , it 's hard to keep it together when you ca n't even find the door .
translation: Des salles de classe aux chambres d'étudiants, il est difficile de garder le cap quand on ne trouve même pas la porte.
back_translation: From classrooms to student rooms, it's hard to stay on track when you can't even find the door.

text: diane lane works nothing short of a minor miracle in unfaithful .
translation: Diane Lane accomplit rien de moins qu'un petit miracle dans "Unfaithful".
back_translation: Diane Lane performs nothing short of a small miracle in "Unfaithful."

text: will graham must risk his family 's security and his own safety to track down this one last murderer - the epitome of all evil - the red dragon .
translation: Will Graham doit risquer la sécurité de sa famille et sa propre sécurité pour traquer ce dernier meurtrier - l'incarnation de tout le mal - le dragon rouge.
back_translation: Will Graham must risk the safety of his family and his own safety to hunt down this latest murderer - the embodiment of all evil - the Red Dragon.

text: spider-man is in the same category as x-men - occasionally brilliant but mostly average , showing signs of potential for the sequels , but not giving us much this time around .
translation: Spider-man est dans la même catégorie que les X-Men : parfois brillant mais généralement moyen, montrant des signes de potentiel pour les suites, mais ne nous offrant pas grand-chose cette fois-ci.
back_translation: Spider-Man is in the same category as the X-Men: sometimes brilliant but generally average, showing signs of potential for sequels, but not offering us much this time around.

text: skagerrak is the story of being hit by happiness when you least expect it .
translation: Skagerrak est l'histoire d'être frappé par le bonheur quand on s'y attend le moins.
back_translation: Skagerrak is the story of being struck by happiness when you least expect it.

text: ben stiller and jack black star as tim and nick , best friends , neighbors and co-workers , whose equal footing is suddenly tripped up when one of nick 's harebrained get-rich-quick schemes actually succeeds : vapoorizer , a spray that literally makes dog poop , or any other kind for that matter , evaporate into thin air -- to where exactly is anyone 's guess .
translation: Ben Stiller et Jack Black jouent les rôles de Tim et Nick, deux meilleurs amis, voisins et collègues, dont l'équilibre est soudainement perturbé lorsque l'un des plans loufoques de Nick pour s'enrichir rapidement réussit réellement : Vapoorizer, un spray qui fait littéralement disparaître les excréments de chien, ou n'importe quel autre type, dans les airs - où exactement, c'est une question pour quiconque.
back_translation: Ben Stiller and Jack Black play the roles of Tim and Nick, two best friends, neighbors, and coworkers, whose balance is suddenly disrupted when one of Nick's crazy schemes to get rich quick actually succeeds: Vapoorizer, a spray that literally makes dog poop, or any other kind, disappear into thin air - where exactly, is a question for anyone.

text: after a really wild night jim and the gang wake up in an abandoned warehouse in a small town in the middle of no where , of which they have never heard of .
translation: Après une nuit vraiment folle, Jim et sa bande se réveillent dans un entrepôt abandonné dans une petite ville perdue au milieu de nulle part, dont ils n'ont jamais entendu parler.
back_translation: After a wild night, Jim and his gang wake up in an abandoned warehouse in a small town lost in the middle of nowhere, which they have never heard of.

text: isabel and clara are growing up in a time of terror .
translation: Isabel et Clara grandissent à une époque de terreur.
back_translation: Isabel and Clara are growing up in a time of terror.

text: an astonishing feat for a major star let alone a 27 year old from pickum , south carolina who only two years ago was sleeping in a cardboard box in the back alleys of detroit with her mother , connie , and her uncle clutch , while playing guitar on the streets for spare change .
translation: un exploit étonnant pour une grande star, encore plus pour une jeune femme de 27 ans originaire de Pickum, en Caroline du Sud, qui, il y a seulement deux ans, dormait dans une boîte en carton dans les ruelles de Detroit avec sa mère, Connie, et son oncle Clutch, tout en jouant de la guitare dans la rue pour quelques centimes.
back_translation: An astonishing achievement for a big star, even more so for a 27-year-old woman from Pickum, South Carolina, who just two years ago was sleeping in a cardboard box in the alleys of Detroit with her mother, Connie, and her uncle Clutch, while playing guitar in the streets for a few pennies.

text: renata is a young high-class girl and ulises is a poor guy .
translation: Renata est une jeune fille de haute société et Ulises est un gars pauvre.
back_translation: Renata is a young girl from high society and Ulises is a poor guy.

text: detective kuroda tries to find the answer , which is n't as simple as one could hope .
translation: Le détective Kuroda essaie de trouver la réponse, qui n'est pas aussi simple qu'on pourrait l'espérer.
back_translation: Detective Kuroda is trying to find the answer, which is not as simple as one might hope.

text: like any warhol/morrissey relic , arnon goldfinger 's the komediant rediscovers chapters in new york 's cultural past .
translation: Comme toute relique de Warhol/Morrissey, "The Komediant" d'Arnon Goldfinger redécouvre des chapitres du passé culturel de New York.
back_translation: Like any relic of Warhol/Morrissey, "The Komediant" by Arnon Goldfinger rediscovers chapters of New York's cultural past.

text: she has been programmed to eliminate other cybernetic organisms .
translation: elle a été programmée pour éliminer d'autres organismes cybernétiques.
back_translation: She was programmed to eliminate other cybernetic organisms.

text: debrauwer handles the story with such feeling and understanding that you quickly come to , not just like , but love these characters .
translation: debrauwer traite l'histoire avec tant de sentiment et de compréhension que vous finissez par, non seulement aimer, mais adorer ces personnages.
back_translation: Debrauwere treats the story with so much feeling and understanding that you end up not only liking but loving these characters.

text: if an oscar category existed for ensemble acting , the hours would unquestionably earn it . watching a trio of actors at the top of their game is a delight .
translation: S'il existait une catégorie aux Oscars pour la performance en ensemble, "The Hours" la gagnerait sans aucun doute. Regarder un trio d'acteurs au sommet de leur art est un vrai bonheur.
back_translation: If there were a category at the Oscars for ensemble performance, "The Hours" would undoubtedly win it. Watching a trio of actors at the peak of their craft is a real delight.

text: the mafia 's paul vitti ( de niro ) is back in prison and will need some serious counseling when he gets out .
translation: Le mafieux Paul Vitti (De Niro) est de retour en prison et aura besoin de conseils sérieux à sa sortie.
back_translation: The mobster Paul Vitti (De Niro) is back in prison and will need serious advice when he gets out.

text: it shows us a slice of life that 's very different from our own and yet instantly recognizable .
translation: Cela nous montre une tranche de vie très différente de la nôtre et pourtant instantanément reconnaissable.
back_translation: This shows us a slice of life very different from our own and yet instantly recognizable.

text: in an alternate space and time , a mythological being called the guardian is charged with manipulating and protecting dark matter .
translation: Dans un espace et un temps alternatifs, un être mythologique appelé le gardien est chargé de manipuler et de protéger la matière noire.
back_translation: In an alternate space and time, a mythical being called the Guardian is tasked with manipulating and protecting dark matter.

text: vince 's flood of memories about sara 's disappearance is brought on when he happens upon 10-year-old ellen , one of julie 's students .
translation: Le flot de souvenirs de Vince concernant la disparition de Sara est déclenché lorsqu'il tombe sur Ellen, 10 ans, l'une des élèves de Julie.
back_translation: The flood of memories for Vince regarding Sara's disappearance is triggered when he encounters Ellen, 10 years old, one of Julie's students.

text: in the first trip in november 2001 , majidi visited the refugee camp of makaki in a taliban controlled area and mile 46 , another small camp situated in a northern alliance held area .
translation: Lors de son premier voyage en novembre 2001, Majidi a visité le camp de réfugiés de Makaki dans une zone contrôlée par les talibans et le mile 46, un autre petit camp situé dans une zone contrôlée par l'Alliance du Nord.
back_translation: During his first trip in November 2001, Majidi visited the Makaki refugee camp in a Taliban-controlled area and mile 46, another small camp located in an area controlled by the Northern Alliance.

text: told in one fluid shot , a tale which floats like a dreamlike journey through the majestic spaces of the hermitage in st . petersburg , engaging real and imagined characters from russian and european history .
translation: raconté en un plan séquence, un conte qui flotte comme un voyage onirique à travers les espaces majestueux de l'ermitage à Saint-Pétersbourg, engageant des personnages réels et imaginaires de l'histoire russe et européenne.
back_translation: told in a single shot, a tale that drifts like a dreamlike journey through the majestic spaces of the hermitage in Saint Petersburg, engaging real and imaginary characters from Russian and European history.

text: this slender plot feels especially thin stretched over the nearly 80-minute running time .
translation: ce scénario mince semble particulièrement léger étiré sur la durée de près de 80 minutes.
back_translation: This thin scenario seems particularly light stretched over a duration of nearly 80 minutes.

text: jirM-m hubac 's script is a gem . his characters are engaging , intimate and the dialogue is realistic and greatly moving . the scope of the silberstein family is large and we grow attached to their lives , full of strength , warmth and vitality . .
translation: Le script de jirM-m hubac est un bijou. Ses personnages sont captivants, intimes et les dialogues sont réalistes et très émouvants. La portée de la famille Silberstein est vaste et nous nous attachons à leur vie, pleine de force, de chaleur et de vitalité.
back_translation: The script of jirM-m hubac is a gem. Its characters are captivating, intimate, and the dialogues are realistic and very moving. The scope of the Silberstein family is vast, and we become attached to their life, full of strength, warmth, and vitality.

text: what would have otherwise been a routine nostalgic coming-of-ager takes on a new , innovative form .
translation: ce qui aurait autrement été un récit de jeunesse nostalgique prend une nouvelle forme innovante.
back_translation: what would have otherwise been a nostalgic coming-of-age story takes on a new innovative form.

text: often overwrought and at times positively irritating , the film turns into an engrossing thriller almost in spite of itself .
translation: souvent excessif et parfois positivement irritant, le film se transforme en un thriller captivant presque malgré lui.
back_translation: Often excessive and sometimes positively irritating, the film turns into a captivating thriller almost despite itself.

text: good , -- * interviews with dp neihouse and astronaut susan helms *
translation: bon, -- * interviews avec dp neihouse et l'astronaute susan helms *

text: the leaping story line , shaped by director peter kosminsky into sharp slivers and cutting impressions , shows all the signs of rich detail condensed into a few evocative images and striking character traits .
translation: la trame de l'histoire en sauts, façonnée par le réalisateur Peter Kosminsky en tranches nettes et impressions percutantes, montre tous les signes d'un riche détail condensé en quelques images évocatrices et traits de caractère marquants.
back_translation: The storyline, presented in leaps and shaped by director Peter Kosminsky in sharp slices and striking impressions, shows all the signs of rich detail condensed into a few evocative images and memorable character traits.

text: he has just graduated college , he has a beautiful girlfriend , jane , and a publisher has picked up his first novel .
translation: Il vient de terminer ses études universitaires, il a une belle petite amie, Jane, et un éditeur a accepté son premier roman.
back_translation: He has just completed his university studies, he has a beautiful girlfriend, Jane, and a publisher has accepted his first novel.

text: . . . the movie is just a plain old monster .
translation: ... le film est juste un vieux monstre ordinaire.
back_translation: ... the movie is just an ordinary old monster.

text: an apparent gynaecologist dr . nightingale hastily marries a pregnant patient , modesta and takes her home to his mysterious manor to meet mother .
translation: Un apparent gynécologue, le Dr Nightingale, épouse précipitamment une patiente enceinte, Modesta, et l'emmène chez lui dans son mystérieux manoir pour rencontrer sa mère.
back_translation: An apparent gynecologist, Dr. Nightingale, hastily marries a pregnant patient, Modesta, and takes her to his mysterious mansion to meet his mother.

text: the film is a travesty of the genre and even as spoof takes itself too seriously .
translation: le film est une travestie du genre et même en tant que parodie, il se prend trop au sérieux.
back_translation: The film is a travesty of the genre and even as a parody, it takes itself too seriously.

text: in the end , all you can do is admire the ensemble players and wonder what the point of it is .
translation: À la fin, tout ce que vous pouvez faire est d'admirer les artistes du groupe et de vous demander quel en est le sens.
back_translation: In the end, all you can do is admire the artists of the group and wonder what it means.

text: a bounty hunter is on the trail of a conman who skipped bail .
translation: un chasseur de primes est à la poursuite d'un escroc qui a fui la caution.
back_translation: A bounty hunter is in pursuit of a crook who has fled bail.

text: they 've known each other since they met as children , when both discovered hip-hop for the first time .
translation: Ils se connaissent depuis qu'ils se sont rencontrés enfants, lorsqu'ils ont découvert le hip-hop pour la première fois.
back_translation: They have known each other since they met as children, when they discovered hip-hop for the first time.

text: in its chicken heart , crush goes to absurd lengths to duck the very issues it raises .
translation: Dans son cœur de poulet, Crush va à des longueurs absurdes pour esquiver les questions même qu'il soulève.

text: dong does n't demonize the conservative christians he talks to , but he does n't have to . . .
translation: Dong ne diabolise pas les chrétiens conservateurs avec lesquels il parle, mais il n'en a pas besoin...

text: when she decides to cancel her only holiday with tor and go on a self-development course with per instead , the passive bystander tor realises he 's going to have to stand up and be a man .
translation: Lorsqu'elle décide d'annuler ses seules vacances avec Tor et de suivre un cours de développement personnel avec Per à la place, le spectateur passif Tor réalise qu'il va devoir se lever et être un homme.
back_translation: When she decides to cancel her only vacation with Tor and take a personal development course with Per instead, the passive observer Tor realizes that he is going to have to step up and be a man.

text: five years later `` the bride `` awakens from the coma the assassins left her in and heads out to seek bloody revenge .
translation: Cinq ans plus tard, `` la mariée `` se réveille du coma dans lequel les assassins l'avaient plongée et part en quête d'une vengeance sanglante.
back_translation: Five years later, "the bride" wakes up from the coma into which the assassins had plunged her and sets out on a quest for bloody revenge.

text: this is a happy throwback to the time when cartoons were cinema 's most idiosyncratic form instead of one of its most predictable .
translation: c'est un heureux retour en arrière à l'époque où les dessins animés étaient la forme la plus idiosyncratique du cinéma au lieu d'être l'une de ses plus prévisibles.
back_translation: It's a happy return to the time when animated films were the most idiosyncratic form of cinema instead of being one of its most predictable ones.

text: because of her finn is finally able to accept himself .
translation: à cause d'elle, Finn est enfin capable de s'accepter.

text: . . . plays like a badly edited , 91-minute trailer ( and ) the director ca n't seem to get a coherent rhythm going . in fact , it does n't even seem like she tried .
translation: ... ressemble à une bande-annonce mal montée de 91 minutes (et) la réalisatrice n'arrive pas à établir un rythme cohérent. En fait, on dirait même qu'elle n'a pas essayé.
back_translation: ... looks like a poorly edited 91-minute trailer (and) the director fails to establish a coherent rhythm. In fact, it even seems like she didn't try.

text: he then dedicates himself to making sure the video tape is released to the public .
translation: il se consacre alors à s'assurer que la cassette vidéo soit publiée au public.

text: what drives a young african-american man to become a member of the republican party and to run for a united states congressional seat in a district in south georgia with a disturbing racist history ?
translation: Qu'est-ce qui pousse un jeune homme afro-américain à devenir membre du parti républicain et à se présenter pour un siège au Congrès des États-Unis dans un district du sud de la Géorgie avec une histoire raciste troublante ?
back_translation: What motivates a young African American man to join the Republican Party and run for a seat in the United States Congress in a district in South Georgia with a troubling racist history?

text: pratfalls aside , barbershop gets its greatest play from the timeless spectacle of people really talking to each other .
translation: Mis à part les chutes, le barbershop tire son plus grand attrait du spectacle intemporel des gens qui communiquent vraiment les uns avec les autres.
back_translation: Apart from the falls, the barbershop draws its greatest appeal from the timeless spectacle of people truly communicating with one another.

text: in the near future a young biker leaves his crumbling life in rural ireland to join a strange 'metal circus ' as it tours the cities of europe .
translation: Dans un avenir proche, un jeune motard quitte sa vie en ruine dans la campagne irlandaise pour rejoindre un étrange « cirque de métal » alors qu'il fait le tour des villes d'Europe.
back_translation: In the near future, a young biker leaves his ruined life in the Irish countryside to join a strange "metal circus" as he travels through the cities of Europe.

text: although they have fallen into a habitual rivalry based on a cause long forgotten , the pair unite when the multinational fast-food outlet `` burgies `` unveils a new store directly opposite the twin fish & # 38 ; chips shops .
translation: bien qu'ils soient tombés dans une rivalité habituelle fondée sur une cause depuis longtemps oubliée, le couple s'unit lorsque la chaîne de restauration rapide multinationale `` Burgies `` inaugure un nouveau magasin directement en face des deux fish & chips.
back_translation: Although they had fallen into a usual rivalry based on a cause long forgotten, the couple united when the multinational fast food chain "Burgies" opened a new store directly across from the two fish & chips.

text: it is the weekend and the lottery office is closed .
translation: c'est le week-end et le bureau de loterie est fermé.

text: . . . a joke at once flaky and resonant , lightweight and bizarrely original .
translation: ... une blague à la fois légère et résonnante, superficielle et bizarrement originale.
back_translation: ... a joke that is both light and resonant, superficial and strangely original.

text: as an actor 's showcase , hart 's war has much to recommend it , even if the top-billed willis is not the most impressive player . as a story of dramatic enlightenment , the screenplay by billy ray and terry george leaves something to be desired .
translation: En tant que vitrine pour les acteurs, "Hart's War" a beaucoup d'atouts à recommander, même si le rôle principal de Willis n'est pas le plus impressionnant. En tant qu'histoire d'illumination dramatique, le scénario de Billy Ray et Terry George laisse à désirer.
back_translation: As a showcase for the actors, "Hart's War" has many strengths to recommend, even though Willis's lead role is not the most impressive. As a story of dramatic illumination, the script by Billy Ray and Terry George leaves much to be desired.

text: the time constraints of his job prevent him from spending time with his family and friends .
translation: les contraintes de temps de son travail l'empêchent de passer du temps avec sa famille et ses amis.
back_translation: The time constraints of his job prevent him from spending time with his family and friends.

text: although their friendship raises some eyebrows at first , radio 's growth under the coach 's guidance ultimately inspires the local townsfolk , from 1964 when he first starts helping the hanna yellow jackets football team , through a 38+ career with the school that continues today ( 2002 ) , including tenures as the head cheerleader , assistant coach and team manager .
translation: Bien que leur amitié suscite d'abord quelques interrogations, la croissance de Radio sous la direction de l'entraîneur inspire finalement les habitants de la ville, de 1964, lorsqu'il commence à aider l'équipe de football des Hanna Yellow Jackets, à une carrière de plus de 38 ans avec l'école qui se poursuit aujourd'hui (2002), y compris des mandats en tant que chef des pom-pom girls, entraîneur adjoint et manager de l'équipe.
back_translation: Although their friendship initially raises some questions, Radio's growth under the coach's leadership ultimately inspires the townspeople, starting in 1964, when he begins to help the Hanna Yellow Jackets football team, leading to a career of over 38 years with the school that continues today (2002), including stints as head of the cheerleaders, assistant coach, and team manager.

text: sweet home alabama certainly wo n't be remembered as one of [ witherspoon 's ] better films .
translation: Sweet Home Alabama ne sera certainement pas considéré comme l'un des meilleurs films de [Witherspoon].

translation: dans l'ensemble très bon pour ce qu'il essaie de faire.
