text: when a powerful developer named mr . scheck wants to knock down all the stores and houses in arnold 's neighborhood to build a huge `` mall-plex `` , it looks likes the neighborhood is doomed to disappear .
translation: Lorsqu'un puissant promoteur nommé M. Scheck veut démolir tous les magasins et maisons du quartier d'Arnold pour construire un énorme « mall-plex », on dirait que le quartier est condamné à disparaître.
back_translation: When a powerful developer named Mr. Scheck wants to demolish all the shops and houses in the Arnold neighborhood to build a huge "mall-plex," it seems that the neighborhood is doomed to disappear.

text: gosling creates a staggeringly compelling character , a young man whose sharp intellect is at the very root of his contradictory , self-hating , self-destructive ways .
translation: Gosling crée un personnage incroyablement captivant, un jeune homme dont l'intellect aigu est à la racine même de ses manières contradictoires, de sa haine de soi et de son autodestruction.
back_translation: Gosling creates an incredibly captivating character, a young man whose sharp intellect is at the very root of his contradictory manners, his self-hatred, and his self-destruction.

text: when the king meets the god in a face-to-face confrontation , the result takes on a horrible logic all its own .
translation: Lorsque le roi rencontre le dieu lors d'une confrontation en face à face, le résultat prend une logique horrible qui lui est propre.
back_translation: When the king meets the god in a face-to-face confrontation, the outcome takes on a terrible logic of its own.

text: in converging with angels , a world-weary sex worker ( dylan thomas ) impulsively takes in a drunk , fragile young woman who is in distress ( allison campbell ) , hoping to force some measure of redemption in a life that is financially comfortable , but morally and spiritually bankrupt .
translation: Dans "Converging with Angels", une travailleuse du sexe fatiguée du monde (Dylan Thomas) accueille impulsivement une jeune femme ivre et fragile en détresse (Allison Campbell), espérant forcer une certaine forme de rédemption dans une vie qui est financièrement confortable, mais moralement et spirituellement ruinée.
back_translation: In "Converging with Angels," a sex worker weary of the world (Dylan Thomas) impulsively welcomes a young, drunk, and fragile woman in distress (Allison Campbell), hoping to force a certain form of redemption in a life that is financially comfortable but morally and spiritually ruined.

text: the movie eventually snaps under the strain of its plot contrivances and its need to reassure .
translation: le film finit par céder sous le poids de ses artifices narratifs et de sa nécessité de rassurer.
back_translation: The film ultimately collapses under the weight of its narrative artifice and its need to reassure.

text: the plot involves an innocent poor boy , who is a happy go lucky , always trying to live a stylish life .
translation: L'intrigue implique un pauvre petit garçon innocent, qui est insouciant, essayant toujours de vivre une vie stylée.
back_translation: The plot involves a poor little innocent boy, who is carefree, always trying to live a stylish life.

text: as the national media become more sedate and incurious , this country desperately needs a gadfly like moore . indeed , we need more like him .
translation: Alors que les médias nationaux deviennent plus calmes et moins curieux, ce pays a désespérément besoin d'un provocateur comme Moore. En effet, nous avons besoin de plus de personnes comme lui.
back_translation: As national media become quieter and less curious, this country desperately needs a provocateur like Moore. Indeed, we need more people like him.

text: god appears in human form ( freeman ) and , endowing bruce with divine powers , challenges bruce to take on the big job to see if he can do it any better .
translation: Dieu apparaît sous forme humaine (Freeman) et, dotant Bruce de pouvoirs divins, défie Bruce de relever le grand défi pour voir s'il peut le faire mieux.
back_translation: God appears in human form (Freeman) and, granting Bruce divine powers, challenges Bruce to take on the great challenge to see if he can do it better.

text: the story of a normal family in which come out the dreams of those who have lost their possibilities and of those who want to realize them .
translation: l'histoire d'une famille normale où se révèlent les rêves de ceux qui ont perdu leurs possibilités et de ceux qui veulent les réaliser.
back_translation: the story of a normal family where the dreams of those who have lost their opportunities and those who want to achieve them are revealed.

text: would be an unendurable viewing experience for this ultra-provincial new yorker if 26-year-old reese witherspoon were not on hand to inject her pure fantasy character , melanie carmichael , with a massive infusion of old-fashioned hollywood magic .
translation: ce serait une expérience de visionnage intolérable pour cet ultra-provincial new-yorkais si la jeune femme de 26 ans, reese witherspoon, n'était pas là pour insuffler à son personnage de pure fantaisie, melanie carmichael, une énorme dose de magie hollywoodienne à l'ancienne.
back_translation: It would be an intolerable viewing experience for this ultra-provincial New Yorker if the 26-year-old woman, Reese Witherspoon, were not there to infuse her character of pure fantasy, Melanie Carmichael, with a huge dose of old-fashioned Hollywood magic.

translation: Mary va vivre avec sa cousine esthéticienne dans un appartement bondé et commence à perdre courage.

text: is the story of eight very different people who go on a catalogue modeling trip from sophisticated los angeles to the remote mountains of california .
translation: C'est l'histoire de huit personnes très différentes qui partent en voyage de mannequinat pour un catalogue, de la sophistiquée Los Angeles aux montagnes reculées de Californie.
back_translation: It's the story of eight very different people who go on a modeling trip for a catalog, from sophisticated Los Angeles to the remote mountains of California.

text: turturro is fabulously funny and over the top as a 'very sneaky ' butler who excels in the art of impossible disappearing/reappearing acts
translation: Turturro est fabuleusement drôle et exagéré en tant que majordome "très sournois" qui excelle dans l'art des actes d'impossible disparition/réapparition.

text: the career of a disillusioned producer , who is desperate for a hit , is endangered when his star walks off the film set .

back_translation: the career of a disenchanted producer, who despairs of finding success, is threatened when his star leaves the film set.

translation: Le mythe que Peralta a créé aurait pu bénéficier d'un certain recul informé et adulte.

text: this case made history in the new jersey judicial system and these teenagers ( who , at the time , were between the ages of 14 and 16 ) were the first in the state to be tried and convicted as adults .
translation: cette affaire a marqué l'histoire du système judiciaire du New Jersey et ces adolescents (qui, à l'époque, avaient entre 14 et 16 ans) ont été les premiers dans l'État à être jugés et condamnés comme des adultes.
back_translation: This case marked the history of the judicial system in New Jersey, and these teenagers (who, at the time, were between 14 and 16 years old) were the first in the state to be tried and sentenced as adults.

translation: Parfois, il semble partager la fascination de Nicholas, mais apparaît ensuite plus intéressé à nouer des liens avec les filles à l'école.
back_translation: Sometimes, he seems to share Nicholas's fascination but then appears more interested in connecting with the girls at school.

translation: c'est un cas où vous pouvez réellement croire au battage médiatique -- le seigneur des anneaux : les deux tours est en effet encore meilleur que son prédécesseur.
back_translation: This is a case where you can truly believe the hype -- The Lord of the Rings: The Two Towers is indeed even better than its predecessor.

text: it 's a fun movie with lots of colorful characters , lots of bizarre plot meanderings and quite a few memorable lines and sequences .
translation: c'est un film amusant avec lots de personnages colorés, beaucoup de méandres de l'intrigue bizarres et pas mal de répliques et de séquences mémorables.
back_translation: It's a fun movie with lots of colorful characters, many strange twists in the plot, and quite a few memorable lines and scenes.

text: the twist that ends the movie is the one with the most emotional resonance , but twists are getting irritating , and this is the kind of material where the filmmakers should be very careful about raising eyebrows .
translation: le retournement qui conclut le film est celui qui a le plus d'impact émotionnel, mais les rebondissements deviennent irritants, et c'est le genre de matériau où les réalisateurs devraient faire très attention à attirer les regards.
back_translation: The twist that concludes the film is the one that has the most emotional impact, but the plot twists become irritating, and this is the kind of material where directors should be very careful to draw attention.

text: she and her daughter try to escape ( such as to her previous boyfriend played by futterman ) , but he pursues relentlessly .
translation: Elle et sa fille essaient de s'échapper (par exemple vers son ancien petit ami joué par Futterman), mais il les poursuit sans relâche.
back_translation: She and her daughter try to escape (for example, to her ex-boyfriend played by Futterman), but he relentlessly pursues them.

text: expect the same-old , lame-old slasher nonsense , just with different scenery .
translation: attendez-vous au même vieux, ennuyeux slasher, juste avec un décor différent.
back_translation: expect the same old, boring slasher, just with a different setting.

text: mcconaughey 's fun to watch , the dragons are okay , not much fire in the script .
translation: McConaughey est amusant à regarder, les dragons sont corrects, mais il n'y a pas beaucoup de feu dans le scénario.

text: based on the edgar allen poe short story , `` the facts in the case of m . valdemar , `` comedy revolves around a doctor who convinces a dying man 's family to allow him to put the man in a trance as he takes his final breaths .
translation: basé sur la nouvelle d'Edgar Allan Poe, "les faits dans l'affaire M. Valdemar", la comédie tourne autour d'un docteur qui convainc la famille d'un homme mourant de lui permettre de plonger l'homme dans un transe alors qu'il prend ses derniers souffles.
back_translation: Based on the short story by Edgar Allan Poe, "The Facts in the Case of M. Valdemar," the comedy revolves around a doctor who convinces the family of a dying man to allow him to plunge the man into a trance while he takes his last breaths.

text: black picket fence is director 's sergio goes ' poignant portrait of the bleak realities of life in the public housing projects of brooklyn 's east new york , one of the inner city 's most dangerous and violent neighborhoods .
translation: La clôture noire est un portrait poignant des réalités sombres de la vie dans les projets de logement public de l'est de New York à Brooklyn, l'un des quartiers les plus dangereux et violents de la ville.

text: `` underground poets railroad `` is equal parts concert film of performances at universities , churches , fire stations and national monuments across the country ; road trip documentary ; and , ultimately , a tribute to the 12 black firefighters who gave their lives on september 11 .
translation: `` Le chemin de fer des poètes underground `` est à la fois un film concert de performances dans des universités, des églises, des casernes de pompiers et des monuments nationaux à travers le pays ; un documentaire sur un road trip ; et, en fin de compte, un hommage aux 12 pompiers noirs qui ont perdu la vie le 11 septembre.
back_translation: "The Underground Poets' Railroad" is both a concert film of performances in universities, churches, firehouses, and national monuments across the country; a documentary about a road trip; and ultimately, a tribute to the 12 black firefighters who lost their lives on September 11th.

back_translation: If your senses haven't been dulled by slasher films and gore feasts, if you're a connoisseur of psychological horror, this is your ticket.

text: a gang of robbers , lead by career criminal charlie croker , create the largest traffic jam in los angeles history , giving them time to pull off a theft of gold bullion .
translation: une bande de voleurs, dirigée par le criminel en carrière Charlie Croker, crée le plus grand embouteillage de l'histoire de Los Angeles, leur laissant le temps de réaliser un vol de lingots d'or.
back_translation: A gang of thieves, led by career criminal Charlie Croker, creates the biggest traffic jam in the history of Los Angeles, giving them time to carry out a gold bar heist.

text: the film documents the band responding to the twists and turns of the recording industry , rehearsing for their tour , preparing for their debut concert at the grand ole opry , charting the course for their career with their managers , and living every-day life on the farm where they reside in rural tennessee .
translation: Le film documente le groupe répondant aux rebondissements de l'industrie musicale, répétant pour leur tournée, se préparant pour leur concert de débuts au Grand Ole Opry, traçant le parcours de leur carrière avec leurs managers et vivant la vie quotidienne à la ferme où ils résident dans le Tennessee rural.
back_translation: The film documents the group responding to the twists and turns of the music industry, rehearsing for their tour, preparing for their debut concert at the Grand Ole Opry, tracing the path of their career with their managers, and living daily life on the farm where they reside in rural Tennessee.

text: once again , director chris columbus takes a hat-in-hand approach to rowling that stifles creativity and allows the film to drag on for nearly three hours .
translation: Une fois de plus, le réalisateur Chris Columbus adopte une approche de soumission envers Rowling qui étouffe la créativité et permet au film de s'éterniser pendant près de trois heures.
back_translation: Once again, director Chris Columbus takes a submissive approach towards Rowling that stifles creativity and allows the film to drag on for nearly three hours.

text: embracing the afghan women 's cause as a primary commitment , iara lee 's short film not only spotlights the despair on both sides of the afghan-pakistan border , but also captures the hope and dignity that still define afghan men , women and children .
translation: En adoptant la cause des femmes afghanes comme un engagement principal, le court-métrage d'Iara Lee met non seulement en lumière le désespoir des deux côtés de la frontière afghano-pakistanaise, mais capture également l'espoir et la dignité qui définissent encore les hommes, les femmes et les enfants afghans.
back_translation: By adopting the cause of Afghan women as a primary commitment, Iara Lee's short film not only highlights the despair on both sides of the Afghan-Pakistani border but also captures the hope and dignity that still define Afghan men, women, and children.

text: too many improbabilities and rose-colored situations temper what could 've been an impacting film .

text: in its combination of religion , love story and exotic locales , `` heaven `` is a bit reminiscent of james michener 's `` hawaii , `` although this is a somewhat simpler , more personal tale .
translation: Dans sa combinaison de religion, d'histoire d'amour et de lieux exotiques, « le paradis » rappelle un peu « Hawaï » de James Michener, bien que ce soit une histoire quelque peu plus simple et plus personnelle.
back_translation: In its blend of religion, love story, and exotic locations, "Paradise" somewhat resembles "Hawaii" by James Michener, although it is a somewhat simpler and more personal story.

text: fragmented , elliptical and overplotted to the point of being hard to track . still , it 's worth hanging in for the finish . . . [ when ] soderbergh pulls off a delicious trick , a gesture of pure , tender , unabashed movie love that makes up for everything .
translation: fragmenté, elliptique et surchargé au point d'être difficile à suivre. pourtant, cela vaut la peine de tenir bon jusqu'à la fin... [quand] Soderbergh réussit un délicieux tour, un geste d'amour cinématographique pur, tendre et sans réserve qui compense tout.
back_translation: fragmented, elliptical, and overloaded to the point of being difficult to follow. yet it is worth holding on until the end... [when] Soderbergh pulls off a delightful trick, a gesture of pure, tender, and unreserved cinematic love that makes up for everything.
